item.text: bam po brgyad culnga pa/// kyi rgyal ba'i
sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang tshub sems dpa' rnams kyi
snying po byang chub la 'dug pa ste/bcu gang zhe na/'di ltar
@#// 'jig rten gyi khams brams cad rab tu skyod cing/ byang chub sems dpa
rnams snying po kyang chub la 'khod do// 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad snang bar byed cing//
byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po byang chub la 'khod do// ngan song thams cad rab tu zhi bar
byed cing/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po byang chub la 'khod do// 'jig rten gyi khams
thams cad rdo rje'i rang bzhin du byin gyis rlob snying/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po byang chub la 'khod do// de bzhin
gshegs pa'i gdan sa ge'i khri la rnam par lta zhing/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po byang chub la 'khodo// yid nam
mkha' dang mnyam pa la rnam par mi rtog cing/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po byang chub la 'khod do// ji ltar mthun pa'i
lus dang spyod lam yongs su ston cing/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po byang chub la 'khod do// rdo rje'i snying po'i ting nge
'dzin rjes su rtogs par byed cing/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po byang chub lo 'khod do// de bzhinagshegs pa
thams cad byin gyi rlabs rnam par dag pa'i gnas yang dag par len snying/ byang nubasams dpa' rnams snying po byang chub la
'khod do// bdag gi dge ba'i rtsa pa'i mthus 'gro ba thams cad byin gyis rlob cing/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams snying po byang chub la 'khod de/ dkye
rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag zhu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi snying po byang chub la 'dug pa'o/ kyi rgyal ba'i sras byang chub sems dpa'
rnams snying po byang chub kyi mchog la 'khod nas kyang/ ngomatshard du byung ba'i chos bcu 'byung ste/ banugazhan/ kye rgyalaba'i sras de la snying po
byang chub mchog la 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la 'jig rtenagyi khams thams cad na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa
yang dag par rdzogs pa'isangs rgyas rnams kyis zhal mngon par bstan// phyag g.yas pa brkya bzhi ng/ kyi ded dpon chen po rgyal bar gyur cige rgyal
bar gyur cig ces gsung rjod de/ 'di'i ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos dang po'/ kyi rgyal ba'i sras snying po byang chub mchog la 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa de//
dag thams cad dgongs pa dang/ byin gyis rlob pa yang dag par mdzad de/ 'di ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos gnyis pa'o// kyi rgyal ba'i sras snying po byang chub mchog la 'khod pa'i byang chub
soms dpa' rnams la sngon lhan cig tu spyod spyod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams 'ongs te byang chub sems dpa' de dag la kun nas bskor cing mchod pa'ilas rnam par phye ba rnam pa
sna tshogs mngon par sgrub pa ste// 'di ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i tshes gsum pa'o// kyi rgyal ba'i sras snying po byang chub mchog la 'khod pa'i khyang chub sems dpa' rnams la 'jig
rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rgyudang/ gal ba dang/ sdong po dang/ nags tshal thams cad kyang bsam pa yod ko lta ste/ snying po byang chub gang na ba der 'dud cing phyag
'tshal te/ 'di ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung nga 'i chos bzhi pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa thams cad las yang dag par 'da' ba'i tshi yang chos kyi dbyangs rnam par 'byed pa zhes

bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin mngon du 'gyur to/ ting nge 'dzin de thob ma thag tu byang chub sems dang ba'i spyod thams cad las yang dag par 'dabab pa gyur to/'di ni rilatsha rmad du byung ba'i chos lnga pa'o// kyi rgyal
dba'i sras rgya mtsho mchog gi dam pa du ma yod cing kun nas snang la 'od gsal ba'i sa'i snying po la 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rjes
kyi sngon chen pos kun nas yog par 'gyur te/ 'di na ngematshar rmad du byung ba'i tshes drug pa'o kyi rgyal ba'i sras snying po byang chub mchog la 'bod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi mthus
de bzhin gshegs pa la mchod pa dang/ mi gror bya ba shin tu chen po'i rnams de bzhin gshags pa'i mchod pa'i las kyi phyir 'jig rten gyi khams 'khyam klas pa thams cad du 'byung ste/
'di ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i tshes bdun pa'o// kyi rgyal ba'i sras snying po byang chub mchog la 'bod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la yod shes mchog gis sems can thams cad kyi bsam
ba dang/ dbang po dang/ spyod pa mngon du 'gyur te/ 'di ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i tshes brgyad pa'o/ dkyi rgyal ba'i sras snying po byang chub mchog la 'khod pas byang chub sems dpa'
rnams la blo netu rnam par dag pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin mngon du 'gyur te/ting nge 'dzin de thob ma thag tunam mkha'adabyangs tshad med pa dang/ dus gsum rgyas par 'gangs pa'i lus kun nas
gnas par 'gyur te/ 'di ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i tshes dgu pa'o dkyi rgyal ba'i sras snying po byang chub mchog la 'khod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi lus kyi las dus thams

cad la yang dag bar gzhol zhing/ yi gnas chen po chags pa med pa rdul dang bral ba'i snang ba dang ldan par 'gyur te/ 'di ni ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos bcu pa'i// kyi rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de
dag na byang chub sams dpa' rnams kyi ngo mtshar rmad du byung ba'i chos rnams te/ byang chub sems dpa' snying po byang chub mchog la gnas pa rnams la 'byung bar 'gyur ba dag go
kyi rgyal ba'i sras don rnam pa bcu po 'di dgag dbang yang dag par mthong nas/ snying po byang chub mchog la 'dug pa'i byang chub sems dpa' bdud 'dul la ston// bcu gang zhan/
'di ltar kun nas nyon mongs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa na/ 'thab mo dang g.yul la mos pa'i sems can rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i stobs kyi re ba nyid yang dag par bstan
ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' bdud 'dul ba ston to// yid gnyis dang the tshom du gyur pa'i mi dang lha rnams kyi yod gnyis dang the tshom gcad pa'i phyirje bdud 'dul ba ston to/ bdud
kyi sde yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyirje bdud 'dul ba ston to// 'thab mo dang g.yul la mos pa'i lha dang mi rnams kun nas bsdu ba dang/ kun nas 'dus pa'i lce dang mi rnams 'dul ba'i dbang gi phyir
bdud 'dul ba ston to// byang chub sems dpa'i mthu la thub pa med pa yongs su bstan pa'i phyire bdud 'dul ba ston to// sems can gzhan tshos shing sngo bar bya ba'i phyire bdud 'dul pa ston
gto phyi ma'i skya bo rnams la snying brtse ba phye bdud 'dul ba ston to// snying bo byang chub kyi bar gyi bdud kyi las yongs su bstan pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'
bdud kyi lam thams cad las 'das pa yongs su bstan pa'i phyirje bdud 'dul ba ston te// nyon mongs pa'i stobs kyis nyam smad cing stobs med par byas pa yongs su bstan pa dang/
dag ba'i rtsa ba brjod pa dang/ byams pa'i stobs yang dag par bstan pa'i phyir bdud 'dul ba ston to// kun nas nyon mongs pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam kyi sa pa dag tu chos nyid
rjes su 'brang bar bya ba'i phyi'i/ byang chub sems dpa'i bdud 'dul ba ston to// kyi rgyal ba'i sras don bcu po de dag gi debang mngon pas na/ byang chub sems dpa' bdud 'dul ba
ston to// kyi rgyal ba'i sras bcu po 'di dag ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi de bzhin gshags pa'i stobs mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa ste// bcu gang zhe na/
kyi rgyal ba'i sras de la byang chub sems dpa' rnams bdud dang/ las dang/ nyon mongs pa thams cad las 'das shing/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs pa yin/
! byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad la rnam par rtsi ba yin/ byang chub sems dpa'i bsam gtana'abyam klas ba thams cad dang ldan pa yin/ ches dkar po'i tshogs thams cad
ba0yang dag par kha sog sa pa yin/ chos snang ba rnam par dpyad par bya ba thams cad shin tu rnam par phye ba yin/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du khyab pa'i lus dang ldan pa yin/ sems can
thams cad la snyoms pa'i sems dang dbyangs su ldan pa yin/ byin gyi rlabs thams cad kyis rab mchog por byin gyisabarlabs pa yin/ 'das pa dang/ ma byon pa dang/ da ltar byung ba'i
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku dang/ gsung dang/ thugs rnam par mi rtog pa thob pa yin/ skad cig gcig gis dus gsum rnam par 'tshang rgya ba yin/ shin tu rnam par M
sangs rgyas pa zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin kyang rab tu thob pa yin/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang ldan pa yin te/ 'di ltar gnas dang gnas ma yin pa'i stobs dang ldan pa yin/ thog pa/
brad pa zhes pa'i khor gyi stobs dang ldan pa yin te/ kye rgyal ba'i sras bcu po de dag ni/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa
sta/ stobs bcu po de dag dang ldan pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ni/ de bzhin gshegs pa nyes bya ba'i grongs su 'gro'o// kyi rgyal ba'i sas de ltar mngon par sangs
rgyas pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni/ chos kyi 'khor lo chen po rnam pa bar bskor te/ rnam pa bcu gangazhin/ 'di ltar mi 'jigs pas
shin tu sbyangs pa'i yongashes dang ldan pa dang/ tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa bzhi'i sgra rjes su bsgrags pa dang/ bden pa bzhi'i tshul gyis shin tu brtags pa dang
sangs rgyas kyi rnam par thar pa bsgribs pa med pa'i rjes su song ba dang/ sems can thams cad kyi sems dga' bar 'gyur ba dang/ thogs pa med cing blta bar dka' la yo ba med bde sdug bsngal
gyi gsal shing 'byin pa dang/ sngon gyi snying rje chen po'i byin gyis brlabs pa dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du grags pa dang/ bskal pa grangs med par chos ston pa rgyun mi 'ched pa dang/
dbang po dang/ stobs dang/ byang chub kyi yan lag dang/ bsam gtan dang/ rnam par thar pa dang/ ting nge 'dzin dang/ snyoms par 'jug pa dang/ legs par spyad pos ba sor ba'o/
kyi rgyal ba'i sras sgo rnam pa bcu po de dag la sogs pa rnam pa tshad mar par de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ro// kyi rgyal ba'i sras de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos kyi 'khor la de ni sems can gzhan gyi sems kyi rgyud la skyes dkar po'i rnam pa bcus thogs pa med pa dang/ mngon pa med par 'byang bar 'gyur to/ bcu
gang zhe na/ 'di ltar smon lam thams cad kyi stobs kyi shugs dang/ snying rje chen po'i byin gyi rlabs dang/phams can gyi khams thams cad mi gtong ba dang/ ye shes kyi rnam par 'phrul pa
khasam pa ji lta bzhin du ston pa dang/ dus la bab par thob par byed pa dang/ rigs pa'i tshul bzhin du ma 'khrul ba dang/ dus gsum shes par bya ba rab tu rtogs pa dang/ lus kyi dbang zil//
gyis mi non pa dang tshig gi dbang dmigs par dka' ba dang/ yi shes kyi dbang tshig bzhin du khong du chud pa byed pa ste/ kyi rgyal ba'i sras chos dkar po'i rnam pa bcu po de dag gis/
de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas rnams kyi chos kyi 'khor 'khe sems can gzhan gyi sams kyi rgyud la thogs pa med pa dang/ mngon pa med pa la 'byung
bar 'gyur ro// kyi rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las rdzogs par mdzad zin pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ni debcu'i
dbang gzigs nas/ yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba chen po ston to// bcu gang yin/ 'di ltar yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'du byed mi rtag pa yongs su bstan pa dang/ 'dus
byas thams cad yid brtan du mi rung bar bstan pa dang/ mya ngan las 'da' ba'i phyogs bde bar 'gro bas 'jigs pa dang bag tsha ba thams cad dang 'bral ba yang dag par bstan pa dang/
gzugs kyi lus la zhen pa'i lha dang mi rnams la gzugs kyi lus mi rtag pa nyid du yang dag par bstan pa dang/ chos kyi sku la yang dag par sbyar ba dang rnam par 'gyur ba'i mah+phu phyir mi
ldeg par yongs su bstan pa dang/ 'du byed thams cad 'dod dgur mi rung zhing dbang sgyur du med pa yongs su bstan pa dang/ sa kasum gyi 'khor ba thams cad sgyu
ma'i sgom pa lta bur yongs su bstan pa dang/ mya ngan las 'das pa ni snying po dam pa ste/ mi 'aN+Digs pa'i chos nyid du yang dag par bstan pa dang/ kun 'byung zhing 'jig pas 'bul
bar 'gyur ba yongs su bstan pa dang/ kye rgyal ba'i sras sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das kyi chos nyid kyis kyang de bzhin to/ sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las thams cad rdzogs par mdzad de/
dgongs pa thams cad yongs su rdzogs shing chos kyi 'khor shin tu bskos te/ 'dul ba thams cahe tu rul nas/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad ni tu lung bstan par 'gyur te/
mnyam pa med pa'i go 'phang yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba chen por yongs su mya ngan las 'da' 'o/ kyi rgyal kha'i grasadano pacu po de yang ga Nar gatregos nus/ de bzhin gsheg
pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mnyam pa med pa'i go 'phang longs su mya ngan las 'das pa chen po yongs su ston to// kyi rgyal ba'i sras
'di ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi spyod pa yongs su sbyong ba zhi sa bya ba'i chos kyi sgo ste/ yang dag par rdzobags pa'i sangs rgyus ma badzes gsungs pa'o/
no tshad mad pa khong du chud par 'gyur ba'o// mkhas pa'i skye bo dga' bar byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyod pa dang smon lam chen po rgyun mi 'chad par byed pa'o// sems can
gang gis 'di thes par gyur to/ thos nas kyang mos par byed pa dang/ mos par gyur nas kyang nan tan gyis yang dag pa bsgrub pa de dag thams cad myur du bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i

sangs rgyas su mngon pa rigs 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur ro// kye rgyal ba'i sras de ci'i phyir zhon/ byang chub na byang chub sems dpa' nan tan lhur byed pa rnams kyis 'grub kyi/ nan tan dang mi ldan pa rnams
kyis ma yin no/ dkyi rgyal ba'i sras de lta bas nabyang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po nan tan la gnas pas/ 'jig rten las 'dus pa'i chos kyi sgo'i le'u/ byang chub sems dpa'i
spyod pa dang yon tan gyi 'byung gnas/ don rnam par gdon mi za ba'i me tog/ chos kyi sgo thams cad la yang dag par gzhol ba/ yang shas kyi sgo la 'jug pa/ 'jig rten gyi lam thams
cad las yang dag par 'das pa// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi lam dang bral ba/ 'gro ba thams cad dang thun mong ma yin pa/ chos thams cad kyi sgo snang bar byed pa// 'gro
ba thams cad kyi 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'phel bar byed pa 'di reb gong byas te mnyan par bya'o// blang bar bya'o// yongs su gzung bar bya'o//
yongs su bzung nas kyang des las rtogs pa'i sgos yongs su sbyang ba dang/ smon lam mngon par bsgrub pa la brtson par bya'o/ dkyi rgyal ba'i sras de ltar brtson
pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub dkan pa ma yin no// 'jig rten las 'das pa'i tshes kyi sgo'i le'u chos thams cad kyi
sgor yang dag par gzhol ba'i tshes kyi rnam grangs 'di bstan pa'i tshe/ sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'di'i chos nyid thob pas/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams tshad
smad grangs med pa rnams rab tu g.yos pa gagyur to// 'jig rten gyi khams g.yos par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang snang ba chen pos rgyas shing gsal bar gyur to// phyogs bcu'i
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dus kyang dbyas par gyur to/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po la yul bstan nas gsung brjod pa// kyi rgyal ba'i bu lags so legs so// ji ltar khyod kyis
byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po rnams la/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i chos kyi sgo'i le'u/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang yon tan gyi 'byung gnas/ don rnam par gdon
tsho mi khro ba'i me tog/ chos kyi sgo thams cad la yang dag par gzhol ba/ yengashes kyi sgo la 'jug pa/ 'jig rten gyi lam thams cad las yang dag par 'das pa/ nyan thos dang
rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi lam dang bral ba// 'gro ba thams cad dang thun mongs ma yin pa// chos thams cad kyi sgo snang bar byed pa// 'gro ba thams cad kyi 'jig rten dang 'jig rten las 'das/
pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'phel bar byed pa 'di bstan pa ni/ rgyal ba'i bu khyod chos 'di dag la legs par bslabs pas shin tu byang ba ste/ rgyal ba'i bu khyod kyis chos kyi byin gyi rlabs
dang [0f10 ]mthus mos pa'i chos kyi rnam grangs 'di legs par bshad de/ nged kyis kyang mngon par bsngags so// de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis kyang mngon par bsngags so/
kyi rgyal ba'i bu khyed kyi tshes kyi rnam grangs 'di de ltar dang ma 'ongs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyis ma thus pa'i tshes thos par bya ba'i phyir/ nged kyis byin gyis brlabs
pa mdzad do// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen po kun tu bzang bos sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlobs kyis phyogs bcur bltas te/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad
la bltas nas chos kyi dbyings thams cad la bltas te/ de'i tsho tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// gang rnams de dag bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig stong du brtul zhugs dka' spyad pa//
gang rnams de dag sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig stong las byung ba'i chos kyi sos// gang rnams de dag sems can bye ba khrag khrig stong rnams khyadachub rab 'god pa// dpe zla med pa de dag rnams
kyi spyod pa bshad kyis rtse gcig mnyan par byos// gang dag sangs rgyas khrag khrig mtha' yas mchod kyang bdag ni sangs rgyas mi gnas pa/// gang dag nyon mongs
bcings pa'i 'a grol thag byed sems can 'dushes mi gnas dang/ gang rnams de da ga sangs rgyas yon tan rtag tu tshol yang yon tan mi gnas pa/ de dag 'jig rten rab tu dga' bar byed pa'i
spyod mchog mdzes ba brjod par bya// gang rnams de dag srid pa gsum las dang nyon mongs bdud kyi rtobang song snang// gang rnams de dag 'phags pa'i yon tan ldan zhing khyu mchob/ spyod/
pa ston pa po// gang rnams de dag gti mug nyon mongs nyes bral bsam pa zhi zhing rab zhi ba// 'gro ba rnams la spyod pa'i rim pa ston pa de dag yon tan brjod par bya// gang rnams de dag
bdud g.yo 'gro ba kun las rgal te thams cad dbang byed pa// 'gro ba thams cad dag la sprul pa sna tshogs tha dad mtha' yas rab tu ston// sems bskyed gyur ma thag tu go gnas dang 'jig
pa'i bya ba thams cad ston byed pa// de dag yon tan sna tshogs mdzes pa sems can dga' bar byed pa brjod par bya// srid pa'i rgyud na sems can sdug bsngal nyon cing skya dang rga bas gzir ba
dang// 'chi dang mya ngan dag gis gtses shing gnod byas nyon mongs kun tu gzir mthong nas// de dag thar par bya phyiro snying rje rgya chen bskyod nas ye shes mchog 'god pa// de dag yon tan
shin tudag ba phyogs tsam bshad kyis rtse gcig mnyan par byos// sbyin dang tshul khrims bzod pa brtson 'grus dga' bar bsam gtan la yang rnam par can// shes rab thabs kyi pha rol phyin cing
byams dang snying rje lhag pa'i bsam pa dang// dga' ba'i tshes la brtson zhing btang snyoms dga' bas bskal pa brgyar yang spyod spyad pa// de dag sbyod ldan yon tan ldan pa rnams kyi yon tan bstan
gyis de dag nyon// gang rnams de dag byang chub gnyer phyir bye ba khrag khrig stong gi lus sems pa// gang rnams byang chub zhi ba tshol zhing srog la lta ba med par gyur pa dang// gang rnams de
dag sems can phan phyir rtag brtson bdag gi bde ba ma tshol ba// byams dang snying rje'i sems ldan thub pa de dag kun gyi spyod mchog brjod par bya// rgya mtsho'i chu thigs bgrangs pa re res thams
cad zad par bya bar rung srid kyi// de dag yon tan bskal pa bye ba khrag khrig du ma stong du brjod byas kyang// dang tsam bya bar mi nus lags par brjod cing bstan par mi nus 'on kyang go/
sems can phan pa'i don du sangs rgyas yul rnams bstan par bya ba mnyan par byos// gang dag 'gro ba rnams kyi den phyir dge ba kun 'dzin dkar po 'phel byed kyang// mtho bar mi sems dma'
bar sams mad mi dman chos tshol ngoms par yong ma 'gyur// 'gro ba kun gnas de na gnyar chu klung ye shes mtsho chen nas rab shing sdong ste// ston pa'i mkhas pa de dag rnams ni se ltar
'gro ba thams cad 'tsho ba yin// byams pa dran yin snying rje rtsa ba dga' ba sdong po brtan pa sdom pa ste// bro ba yo shas dra ni tshul khrims bzang po lo ma ma tog yon
tan can// sangs rgyas 'od kyis rab tu rgyas byas blo gros ldan pa sems can dgar byed pa// de dang de dag patshod+molta bur 'dusu byas ma gos 'gro ba rnams la snang// sa bon mos pas
gzhi bsam pa byams dang snying rje dang ni rtso ba ste// sdong po shes rab thabs ni yol galcag ma dag pha rol phyin ra ba lnga// bsam gtanangashes rdub mngon shes me tog rgyas pa kun mkhyen
ya nas 'bras bu ste// chos kyi shing mchog rdzu 'phrul bya 'khod de dang des ni 'jig rten gsum pa khebs/ rim gyis dkar yangs yongs su sngol ba lus yin bden pa rnams ni kang
pa sta/ dran pa mgrin pa spyod mchog nas dpa mgo yin rdzal pa rnam par grol ba dag/ stong pa don dam sul dang sug yin byams dang snying rje dag ni meg gnyis te// de dag song
ga lta bur bdag med sgra 'byin bdud sde rab tu skrag par byed// 'gro ba ma lus rnams ni 'khor ba'i 'brog dgon nyon mongs mi bgrad 'khyams gyur te/ bdud kyi byam rta dang rkun
por bcas pas zin cing ga ti mug mdongs gyur pa// laman ri ba ston ma mkhas sems can mthong nas dad dpon mkhas pa de dag ni// lam gyi mthar khrid 'jigs pa med pa'i
grong khyer dam pa mchog la rab tu 'god// 'gro ba dag ni 'dod chags la sdang mun pa nyon mongs sna tshogs nad btab cing// yun ring nas ni 'dus byas sdug bsngal dag la gzhol zhing sdug bsngal ba
'khor ba// sems can mthong nas snying rdzabaskyod de nyon mongs pa ya nod pa kun gso zhing// nad rnams zhi bar byed pa stong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi dam pa dag kyang ston// rgyal po lta bu de
dang de dag 'khor rnams dgar byed 'gro la chos ston pa// sdig pa spongs la dag la bsnyen cing sangs rgyas yon tan rnams kyang tshol cig ces// rkang gnyis dbang po'i tshes kyi yul la kun
mkhyen ye shes dbang por dbang bskur ba// rgya chen byang chub yan lag ni na 'byung gnas de dag 'gro ba'i 'phags pa'i nor// tshul khrims lta ba ting 'dzin mu khyud brgyan pa ye shes
'od dang shes rab mtshon/ (yagashis rno ba'i gzhu can nyon mongs 'joms shing bdud kyi sde rnams dkrug byed pa// chos kyi sgron ma rma 'byin mchog rnams de dang de dag sangs rgyas bskor
ba yin// 'kher le'i mchog rnams bskor zhing pha rol rgol ba de gdang mu stags thams cad 'ams// ye shes rgyun thob cing me bod shin tu rgya chon chos kyi ri dang ldan// byang chub yan
lag de bzhin bsam gtan rin chen gang ba 'gro kun shes par dka'// thams cad mkhyen pa'i gnas kyi mtha' yas yul rnams dag cing lhag bsam dge/ de dang de dag ye shes rgya mtsho
mtshungs med bstan pas zad par mi 'gyur ro// 'jig rten rab 'phags rtag tu yul gyis mi gos 'gro ba rnams kyi gnas gyur pa// bsam gtan mngon gsar ba
'ba' pa ye shes rtsomo lhag pa'i bsam pa mi bskul ba// gang dag de dang nyar phu shes rab ga shas mtshog gis rab tu 'dra bar 'gyur// de dang de dag yon tan rab sajab rab brtan
'gro ba kun gyis bltas// lhag pa'i bo sam pa mchog ni rdo rje mtshungs shing 'dra su brtul zhugs thams cad bstan// sangs rgyas chos dang dge 'dun thams cad mkhyen pa'i spyod las
bsam pa ma spyad de// bdud dang sems can nyon mongs 'jig rten rlung dag gis ni mi bskyod ba brtan pa// dodang de dag 'jig rten dam pa nyon mongs 'bar ba dag las zlog par byed//
byams pa'i sngon rnams kun 'dus snying rje stug po rig pa'i glog chen rgyu zhing ldeg/ thub pa rnams ni rdzu 'phrul gnas bzhi dbyangs kyi 'brug sgra 'byin cing rab tu sgrog// tha dad yang dag
shis dang tshul khrims yan lag brgyad ldan chu yi chos 'bebs pa// de dang de dag sgen chen nyon mongs zhi byed sems can don phyir mngon par 'phags// bshes kho na ba dga' dang khrel yod
! dgan 'obs te chos kyi rgyal mtshan bsgreng// ye shes shing thabs yan te thar pa'i sgo bya ngan pa de dgag sgo ba yin/ bden pa rnams ni lam chen bzhi ste shin tu dag pa'i rdzu 'phrul rab brgyan
pa srid pa gsum n bdud sde dag gis ma shul grong khyer chos nyid dag tu ston// thams cad mkhyen gyi sems mchog shing la rab 'dug rdzu 'phrul rkang pa'i rkang pa brtan// gshog pa/
thabs kyi stobs te pa rol gnon mthu byams dang snying rje mig gnyis pa na// ston pa de dag 'gro ba kun thub med mkha' lding dbang po'i drag shul 'dra// srid pa'i mtsho nas 'don
cing lha mi rnams kyang mya ngan 'da' ba'i mchog la 'god// tshul khrims dkyil 'khor rdzu 'phrul rkang pa'i shugs ldan ye shes 'od zer 'phreng ba madzras// 'od snang kun char nyon mongs
'jomasar ngo srid pa'i rgya mtsho rab tu skam par byed// stobs dang dbang po dag ba'i sman 'thal sems can pa yongs su rgyas byed pa// de dang de dag snang khyad chos kyi nyime'i khyu mchog
'gro ba kun tu 'byung// chos dbyings rnam par dag pa dkyil 'kho 'gro ba kun gyis blta na mdzes pa ste// nyan thos rang rgyal rnams kyi tshogs mang skar ma 'dra ba dag ni thel gyis nono//
sams kyi rgyud rnams mthong nas srid pa gsum du 'phel dang 'grib pa rnam pa/ ja ston/ de dang de dag de shes zla ba 'gro la 'char zhing mkhas pa nam mkha'i mtha'// chos kyidabang po
'gro ba kun la dbang byed gzugs dang yon tan dag gis brgyan// ye shes rdo rje mnga' ba thabs n mgo sku chos la dbang chen sgyur gnas pa// lus dang mtshan dang dpa byad bzang po sna
tshogs kun gyis kha lta ba'i dbang po ste// chos kyis 'gro ba kun las rgyal ba de dang de dag chos kyi deb nga po yin// srid pa gsum na 'dod pa'i 'dam dang nyon mongs las
las rab 'das kun dbang po/ byams pa snang dang thugs rje bsam gtan dga' dang btang snyoms rnams la mos// srid pa gsum po kun tu tha dad lus ston chos kyi sgras kyang go byed pa//
de dang de dag tshangs pa lta bur rnam dag mos shing lta ba'i rnam pa sal/ 'kher las rab tu 'das shing rnam dag yul dang ldan pa bdag po chos kyi dbang// phyir ldog mi 'gyur blo gros mi 'chung
gang rnams thob da pa' dma' dang tha dad la// chos kyi dbang pa'i dbang bskur 'jig rten dam pa yod shas phyir ldog ma 'gyur ba// thams cad mkhyen gyi yon tan dbang phyug grags chen pa dang de
dag 'jig rten dbang// nam mkha'i mkha'i dbyangs lta bur dngos dang rnam bral dmigs pa thams cad rnam bsal ba/ 'gro ba kun tu bya ba nyams len khyu mchog ci la'ang gnas pa yod
pa sta 'gro ba kun tu spyod pa dkar zhugs mkhas pa de dag rab tu mi gnas pa// de dang de dag ya ngashas dag zhing dag pa sanga shes rab nam mkha'i dbyings dang 'dra// de dang de dag shani/
tu rgya chen thabs ldan pa ltar 'gro ba kun gyi gsos// chu 'dra de dang de dag byams dang snying rdzas nyon mongs ma ni rab tu sel// de dang de dag ye nas mas ni nyon mongs sug cing bag chags
ba/ bcas pa bsal// ston pa de dag mi gnas rlung dang 'dra bar srid pa gsum na ri ba tu rgyu// de dang de dag rin chen 'dra pa shin tu dkon zhing 'gro bar dbul yang sol de dang de dag rdo
rje lta bur srid pa gsum n lha ba kun tu 'joms// de dang de dag yon tan kun gyi 'phreng ba sna tshogs 'jig rten bdasum mdzes byed// ston pa de dag nor bu rin chen mtshungs 'du spyod pa
kun gyi gtsug tu phyin/ de dang de dag me tog lta bur yon tan rab rgyas byang chub yan lag rtsi// 'phrang ba lta bur dudang de dag smon lam bcings shing 'jig rten mgo la gnas//
de dang de dag tshul khrims ma nyams skyon med rnam dag dri ni dro reb zhim// da dang de dag 'jig rten gsum na chos dang yo shes kyis ni bag chags dag/ gdugs 'du de dang de dag stobs kyi
bla ris nyon mongs rdul las skyob par byed// ya shas rgyal mtshan bsgreng pa'i thugs mnga' de dang de dag nga rgyal rgyal mtshan stsol// de dang de dag spyod pa'i ba dan sna tshogs yade 'ang yi
shes kun tu 'phags// gos 'drad dang de dag rdzu 'phrul yon tan 'gro ba kun la khobs par byed// theg pa dra ba khyu mchog mtha' yas de dang de dag 'dragi rten gsum las 'byin//
de dang de dag rab dul glang po lta bur yid kyis rtag tu dul la gnas// de dang de dag rdzu 'phrul rtasan khol chen khyer zhing 'jig rten gsum las 'da'// klu yi dbang po lta bu de dang de/
dag sems kyi yul du chos char 'bebs// de dag 'gro ba kun la ma tog u dum wa ra mtshungs 'du shin tu dkon// dpa' bo lta bu de dang de dag nyon mongs 'joms shing bdud/
kyi sde rnams 'khrug ma ldog 'khor la lta bu de dang de dag 'dren pa rnams kyis rab tu btsud// de dang de dag sgron ma lta bur mun pa sel cing sems can lam yang ston// da dang da dug chu
klung lta bur yon tan dad cing lam rgyun rjes su 'gro/ de dang de dgacam pa lta bur ngal ba med par rtag tu 'gro ba sgrol// rgyu dang chu chen lta bur smon lam rab btab yang shos gang chen mtsho thob
byed de dang de dag mnyan pa lta bur 'gro ba ye shes thang chen mchog 'a 'god// de dag skyed mos tshal gyi roga' ba skye zhing 'gro la yang dag spyod pa ston// de dag chos kyi rnam thar mngon
shes ma tog ye shes gzhal med khang dag pa// mkhas pa de dang de dag sman ltar nad zhi byed cing nyon mos rab tu sel// sman gyis rgyas pa'i gangs sne lta bur de dang de dag ya shis 'byung
gnas so// de dag sangs rgyas lta bur la shes kyis ni 'gro ba gnyid log mun pa sol// yang dag sangs rgyas lta bur gzhan min yid kyis 'gro ba yang dag rtogs par byed/ de dang
do dag rgyal ba ci 'dra de ltar 'ongs te mkhas pa de nyid gnas// de dag thams cad mkhyen pa lta bur ye shes 'byung gnas kun nas sgor yang zhugs// zhi ba skyed pa de dang de dag ston pas rab

bsngags 'gro ba kun la ston// de dang de dag snang gi yod shas yul dang thams cad mkhyen gyi spyod tshul shes// de dang de dag tshad med dpung dang 'dra bar 'gro ba kun na thub pa med// de dang ye shes mi
'jogs blo gas 'chang ba thams cad mkhyen pa'i chos kyang shes// gangan gang dag 'gro ba kun gyi gzugs dang ming rnams ji snyed snang yod pa// kun tu gzugs snyoms gzugs kyi rjes su song
zhing ming dbyangs rjes su song ba yin// gzugs rnams kun las 'das shing ming dang rnam par bal yang bya ba thams cad ston// de dag mthun 'gro ba rnams kyis rnam pa kun tu brjod par mi nus
so gang dag 'di 'dra'i yon tan thob cing dngos bral dngos po med pa'i chos gnas shing// yod dang med pa 'i mdud pa thams cad bul dang mkhas pa yang shas mngon sum can// thams cad nas
kyang ye shes rten pa ma yin ye shes de la gnas pa min// de dag spyod la 'jug pa yi do 'ong 'jig rten dga' bar byed pa bshad par bya// chos kyi tshul na sgyu ma'i rang bzhin dngos po dman pa/
lta bur rab rtogs nus// mkhas pa sangs rgyas byin gyi rlobs kyis smon lam thabs dang snying rje dag kyang byed// sprul pa'i ye shes sgo dang ldan pas khyu mchog bya ba sna tshogs rab ston
pa'i byang chub sems dpa' ma nor yid can rtsa gcig za 9 ma pa med pa lags/ nga ra grag lus gnobod la ni mtha' yos lus dang rgya chen lus rnams tha dad ra ba bya ston/ sems ma da
(yod med soms kyi yul mod 'on kyang 'gro ba kun tu de dag ston// khyu mchog brjod pa'i pha rol phyin pa de dag dbyangs gcig rnam rar rjod byed kyang// 'gro ba dag/
gis sgra skad ji snyed yod pa de dag thams cad rab tu brjod// nyon mongs rgyud byung lus dang bral yang sems can rnams kyi lus la dbang sgyur te/ brjod du med pa'i tshul gyis zhi ba rtogs
shing sgra rnams thams cad rab tu ston/ de dag sams kyi rang bzhin zhi zhing 'od gsal nam mkha' mtshungs par yang dag shes// 'gro ba kun la bya pa rnam pa sna tshogs sgo nas 'jig rten sna
tshogs ston// de dag lus rnams gang la'ang gnas pa med de lus kyang de dag ston pa byed// 'gro ba thams cad kyi ni skye ba dag dang rgyu mthu gnas pa ji snyed pa// thams cad kun tu skye
ba'i lus dang ldan yang skye ba dag la gnas pa med// rang gi lus la mkha' 'dra dngos bral soms can sems la sna tshogs rnam pa ste// mkhas pa kun la dbang sgyur de dag lus ni
mtha' yas kun ston byed cing// ma tog du ded byug pa phyi ma sel na gdugs dang ba dan rgyal mtshan rnams// thams cad mkhyen la mchod pas rkang gnyis gtse ba'ajig rten mchog
[f° ]la mchod byed cing// mkhas pa bsam pazag bas lus kyi 'dud byed mchod pa dam pa kun tu ston// mkhas pa da dag rgyal ba zhabs kyi drung 'khod rgyal ba thams cad kyi//

'khor rnams kun na snang zhing mtshungs med de dag zhu pa kun kyang zhu ga byed// chos kyi dam pa thos nas ting 'dzin pa ra mtha' yas sgo ldan thob gyur cing// blo gros ldan pa de snyad rnam par ldang ba ston pa
byed kyang srid pa med/ 'gro ba sgyu ma lta bur rtogs nas shes rab ye shes thabs kyi pha rol phyin// sgyu ma lta bu'i ches dang gzugs sbos mtha' yas dang ba 'gro ba kun la ston/ sna tshogs
gzugs dang sgyu rnams mtha' yas shin tu che sams kyang rab tu ston// 'gro ba thams cad la ni 'dunas dri ba 'jug pa ston kyang gnas bamed// 'gro don rjes 'gro de dag la la dag tu thog ma'i
sams su 'gro ba ston// la lar 'gro ba kun la byang chub spyod pa mtha' yas rgya chen dag kyang ston// malatsa sbyin dang tshul mkhas brjod pa brtson 'grus bsam gtan dang/ re shes rab rnams//
la lar tshangs pa'i lam sdud kha cig tun spyod pa mchog kyang rab tu ston// mkhas pa rtog med de dag la lar spyod pa rdzogs shing bzod pa thob pa ston/ la lar skye ba gcig gis theg pa'i
sa shing la las rgyal bas dbang bskur ba// la lar nyan thos gzugs su gyur cing 'a' dag tu rang rgyal gzugs su 'gyur// bye ba khrag khrig mang po'i shing du mya ngan 'da' bas spyod las
ldog pa med// de dag la lar lha rab ng brgya byin lha dang bcas pa la lar tshangs par 'gyur/[“]de dag la lor lha yi bu mo brgyas bskor la la gcig pa ston nga spyod// la lar dag slong
rab tu zhi zhing yid zha lo lar rgyal po dbang phyug 'gyur// la lar tshes kyi dra bar 'jug pa'i yang gs khyu mchog gzugs kyang rab tu ston// la lar bud med sgyu rtsal la
rolo rab phyin la lar dka' thub can du 'gyur// la lar 'dod pa'i longs spyod rgya chen ston cing la lar bsam gtan thub pa khyod// la lar mya ngan 'da' dang tsi yi sa dang la lar rgan dang byis par
ston da dgag spyod pa bsams na skya bo myos par 'gyur te yid gnyis red par 'gyur// la lar lha dang 'grogs shing la lang shi 'i pho la lar mnga' 'gro gnas pa ston// la lar mngal
zhugs la'ang rnam parnga sangs rgyas la lar 'khor la rob tu bskor// la lar skye ba la lardza mya ngan 'das pa la ma bsro yang dag rab tu slob// la lar bud med tshogs kyi dbung gnas la
lar ting 'dzin la lang mngon par 'byung// la lar khyu mchog byang chub dam par sangs rgyas byang chub shing gi drung na bzhugs// la lar 'khor lo rab tu skyo zhing las la sna tshogs mos
rnams yongs su tshol// la lar sangs rgyas gyur cing zhing+ge rnams bya ba brgyar khyab 'gro bar ston byed kyang// byang chub don du spyod pa dag gis tshogs rnams las kyang phyir ldog ma yin no//
! bskal pa'i gangs la 'jug pa'i pha rol phyin pas bskal pa bye ba phrag brgya dgo/ khyu mchog sems gcig zhung ston sems gcig bskal pa brgyar yang de bzhin ston pa byed// 'gro ba thams
cad 'a yang rtogadang mi rtog rtog pa'i yul rnams thams cad ston// sogs pa med cing phyogs la gnas mod spyod pa de dang/ kun kyang rab tu ston// gang phyir rgyal ba sa rgyal dra dag tsho'i phyog
med kun na bzhugs pas na// 'gro ba kun gyi rgyal ba je snyad pa dag thams cad rdul gcig steng du mthong// sangs rgyas zhing rnams bsgrubs dang sems can yul dang chos kyi rgyu tshul rnams
kyang mthong// de ltar brtson pas bskal pa khrag khrig brtson byed 'on kyang ma shas bad mi 'gyur// de ltar 'gro ba kun gyi sems can tshul rnams mtha' yas rgya chen rab tu shes//
sems can gcig 'a mtha' yas lus dang rgyu dang bya ba khrag khrig yod pa'i rnams// de dag 'gro ba gcig dang ma sa thams cad dag la rnam pa kun tu ston pa byed// bslab pa 'di
yi phyogs la ma la phyin te ma bslabs rnams ni ston pa byed// dbang po rnon po dang ni 'bring dang gang dag dbang po rtu'adu ba'ang ma shes nas/ 'gro bar skal pa med pa'i dbang po'i khor
'o skor ba byed// dam nga po re re la yang dbang po thams cad rnam pa phan tshun gnas pa dang/ dbang po'i dngos po phra ba'i tshul dang gang dag dbang po rtul pa dang rab tu shes da ltar khams
dang mos dang bsam pa spyod dang nyon mongs bag chags rnams kyang shes// sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha' yi sems spyod de ltar byung ba'ang de bzhin te// sems can kun gyi spyod pa'i
bad@#// pha rol phyin kyang 'ong dang 'gro ba yod ma yin// ma nor spyod pa shes nas 'gro ba kun la chos kyi dam pa ston pa byed// de ltar sems kyi sems spyod sna tshogs kun
nas nyon mongs med pa dag/ sems gcig la ni khong du chud nas byang chub mchog tu kun mkhyen rnam sangs rgya// sems kyi skad cig gcig gis 'gro ba rnam phyi rang gireshes pas rtogs
gyur nas// sems kyi tshul shes sams med rab tu gzhol bas ye shes mchog la kun kyang 'god// rdzu 'phrul mchog thob ye shes khyu mchog mngon par shes pa kun gyis rab tu 'phags//

soms brgyad gcig gis khag khrig mtha' yas zhing dang phyogs rnams thams cad bu'i nga 'gro// de ltar ye shes dbang sgyur 'gro zhing ba skal pa bye ba khrag khug zad byed kyang// sgra rgyu shin tu phra ba gcig
la zhugs par ba nas las gar yang 'pho ba med// 'tsho ba'i don du sgyu mkhan gzugs rnams sna tshogs 'gro ba kun la ston byed kyang// sgyu ma kun btsal gzugs su mi dmigs gzugs yod
ma yin pa yang dmigs pa med// de ltar mkhas pa ye shes thabs dang shes rab rgya chen sgyu mar zhugs pa rnams// sprul pa phun sum tshogs pas 'jig rten phal chan khyab par byas
!/ shing rab tu ston// nyi ma zla ba mkha' la rgyu zhing mdzes la shin tu 'phags pa'i rnams/ [“]ma rnyogs chu rnams ji snyed dag tu snang yang de ni chu dang 'dres ma yin// de ltar chos nyid do/
pa'i dkyil 'khor mchog la shes pas shin tu 'phagasar 'i rnams// 'gro ba dgar//soms kyi yu' la snang yang 'gro ba dag dang 'dres ma yin// la 'gag nyid leg rmi lam dag na bya ba rnam pa sna
tshogs tha dad khyad/ 'o na khyi ba khrag khrig mang po bod par rmis kyang mtshan mo de ma zad/ de ltar chos nyid rang bzhin mtshungs par rjes rtogs bya ba sna tshogs kun ston te// skad cig gcig la

bskal pa bye ba cad byed de dag pa zhes zad mi 'gyur// ji yo dbang po ri sul gnas pa 'jig rten dag dang mnyam du thos pa'i sgra// lta na sa sgra yi sgra brnyan de dang 'dra bar rnyed kyang rtog cing g.yo ba med[}]

da bzhi'i chos kyi rang bzhin shes pa'i khyu mchog byang chub sems dpa' mkhas pa dang// rtog pa med pa/ra sems can sgra rnams ji snyed par ni smos dar spyod pa ston/ dpyid zla dag gi smig rgyu ga yos la
ji ltar sems can la ni 'du shes nas// de nas chu red mi 'gyur bzung du med cing dra bsaji skom rnam 'a6la ba// de ltar mkhas pa thar la zhugs pa sems can dag gi nyon mongs g.yo ba'i
rnams// shes pas rtogs nas sems can 'du shes bya med phur zhing bya ba rnam par 'phal gzugs ni dbu ba lta bu khyu mchog ston te tshong ba chu yi chu bur 'ang/ 'du shes thams

cad smig rgyu lta bur rag las 'dus byas chu skyes shing dang 'dra// sems ni sgyu 'dra sgrub bya skyod byed de bzhin bya ba sna tshogs rab tu ston// de ltar phung po dgod pa ston kyang dbang sgyu ra dag ni de
gnas pa med// skye mched stong pa'i ring bzhin dbang med 'khrul 'khor bya ba kun tu 'byin byed dang// khams ni chos kyi dbyings mtshungs dngos po dag dang bral bar 'gro
rnams la ston// dam pa'i den tshul nye ba las ni bden pa sna tshogs rnams kyang rab tu ston// de ltar de dag tshe tshul rnam par dgod pa ston ra khyad kyang gnas pa med// 'ong ba med cing
phyogs su 'gro ba med la rgyud du gnas pa med pa yi// nyon mongs rgyu las byung ba'i las las sdug bsngal de ltarna lam gsum du// rkyen las ga las 'byung ba rnams dang yo da dang med
las rab tu 'das pa yi// yang dag don dam dbu ma'i lam ni de nges pa med na gnas pa rab tu ston// skad cig gcig la dus gsum khong du chud kyang skad cig sna tshogs rnams kyang ston//
'dod dang gzugs dang gzugs med khams kyi yul dang bya ba sna tshogs ston pa byed// sdom pa gsum gyi spyod dang rab tu ldan zhing thar pa gsum yang rab tu ston// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du
gcig la thag pa gsum du rnam par dgod pa da bzhin ston/// gnas dang gnas ma yin pa rab tudabya ba'i chos dang dbang po pha rol phyin// khams dang mos pa dag dang nyen mongs rnam 'byed kun
tu'agro ba thob gyur pa// mig gi yul gyur sngon gyi gnas pa dran zhing nyon mongs zhi bar mkhas pa dag/ sangs rgyas stobs bcu dag gis yang shes shin tu yangs kyang stobs la dmigs
ba0 pa mad// sangs rgyas thams cad rjes su dpog stong 'go pa kun tu mngon sum tshes bshad de// nyon mongs drug pa lhan cig skyes la me maba' byang ba'ang pa rnyas pa/zagyur pa med// 'byung
ba thugs su chud pa'i shes rgya chen des ni 'gro ba 'don pa mdzad// 'di yi gnas la rgya sus 'jigs pa med cing 'on kyang ki par sbyod pa mad// 'khrul pa mi mnga' lam las g.yo/
ba'ang ma mnga' dgongs pa nyams pa'i ng ma mnga' ste// mos dang brtson 'grus ting 'dzin shes rab rnam par 'byed pa ya4nyis gang du'ang nyams mad pa// thams cad mkhyen mdzad
sdom pa gsum mdzad dus gsum kun la mngon sum mkhyen mnga' ba/// 'gro ba kun gyis ma thob byams pa'i ches nyid ma 'phrogs chags pa med brnyes pa// chos sgo ba/nga dag gis ni spyod pa
'di dag rab tu thob par smra ba'i mchog de dag yon tan mang po den gyis brgyan pa'i phyogs tsam bdag gis brjod par bya/ da dag spyod pa bskal pa khrag khrig dag tu brjod kyang bdo pa
ma nus te// 'on kyang ji ltar sa las rdul 'dra ye shes spyod pa phyogs tsam brjod par bya// sangs rgyas ye shes rten ldan bsam pa thob pas ngo mtshar 'du shes gnas pa rnams//
spyod pa mchog dang ldan zhing byams pa'i rjes song brtson 'grus brtan pas rnam gnon cing// tshul khrims mi g.yod dbugs phyin de dag 'gro ba thams cad yongs su smin par byed/ lung
khostan rab tu thob nas rgyal sras rnams kyi spyod pa tshul bzhin thob par byed// sangs rgyas yon tan dag la zhugs kyang sems can sems dang zhing la sems pa khyod//
bskal pa'i dus la 'jug pa'i yi shes ldan zhing mkhas pa skyo ba'i 'du shes med// gzugs kyi tshul dang yang dag tha dad stobs rnams thob cing yang dag don gyis rgyal// bstan pa mtshu=
mad sems kyis mkhas pa byang rtsub zhi ba rnam par 'tshang yang rgyu// sems kyi spyod pa thams cad bzang po'i yon tan spyod pa'i mchog tu smon pa byed/ snying rje'i rkyen dang byams pa mchog rten

ga byang chub dam pa sbyong bar byed dang ldan// brtson pas pha rol phyin rtogs rab tu mkhas shing skyo ba'i pha rol phyin gyur pas// khyu mchog mos dang rab tu rtog gas pa'i stobs thob byang chub dam pa/
mngon 'tshang rgya mnyam pa nyid kyis mnyam pa thob cing yang shis tshul gyis chos mchog ston byed pa/ yon tan thog spyod spobs dang ldan pa de dag chos kyi dbang phyug mchog tu 'gyur//
dbang la gnas kyang gnas pa med pas mnyam pa med pa'i sems kyi 'brug sgra sgrog/ ya shis mchog dang de bzhin sprul pa sgrub cing byang chub lta bor bar 'gro// mkhas pa de dag
thabaskal pa 'byam klas byin rlabs shes pas dbugs phyin rab tu thob// thal gnas pas brtan par 'gro na gnas shing nam nur bsal bas mkhas pa'i rnams// ya shas bsam
gyis ma khyab chos kyi dgongs pa mkhas shing rnam phyi pha rol phyin// snyoms par 'jug pa'i ngang nas yul la zhugs nas thams cad mkhyen par 'tshang yang rgya// shes rnam thar/

kun gyi pha rol phyin cing mngon par shes pas rnam par rtse// rig pa'i snang ldan rnam gro la nyon mongs rdul bas 'gro la skyed mos tshal dang 'dra/ gang 'dakarma pa'i spyod pa'i gzhal med khang mdzes
sna tshogs spyod pa ston pa po// 'gro ba kun la rgyan rnams du ma rab tu ston kyang sems las g.yo ba mad// bsam pa shin tu shes pas bstan pa rab tu mkhas/shang po'o ni 'gyur bas//
mkhas pa dag ni dag cing sbyangs pa'i byang chub phyag rgya snang ba'i ringashas kyis// 'gro ba dag dang mi mtshungs zhum med khyu mchog lhug pa'i bsam pa ri bo 'dra// yi shes rgya mtsho 'du dang yon
tan ma khrod don du spyod pa chen po spyod// de dag rin chen 'dra ba'i gnas la rdo rje lta bu'i go cha bgos pas gnas// shin tu rgya chen rtsom 'a ra ba mganyeng 'gyo ba kun na yus pa med// byang
chub mchog tu lung bstan skyon med khong du chud pa'i rgya chen sems la gnas// sangs rgyas gtor mchog mkhod thob nas thams cad mkhyen pa bod du 'tshoTi rgyu/ rtag tu kun rdzob shes pas
dbang 'gyur rnam par 'phrul pa rnams la mkhas pas na// zhing rnams kun dang tshos kyi yul la rnam ra/ra 'phrul ra 'a ye shes rgyud 'dul nas/ (lus dang smon lam spyod yu' 581sa
rnam par 'phrul pa la yang de bzhin te// 'gro ba dag la rnam par rtsa ba bya ba khrag khrig dum mang po ston// mngon pa shes ra 'i 'phrul stobs kyis rnam par 'phrul zhing ngus
par rnam par rtse// khyu mchog de dag ga sangs rgyas yul la stobs thob 'a gro ba kun gyis thub pa med// mkhas pa 'gas pa med dang bag tsha med dang ma 'dres rnams kyis shin tu brgyan// sangs rgyas
sus dag las rnams thams cad byed cing shin tu mdzes ba'i 'os dang ldan// de dag lus kyi las kyi dngos po shin tu rgya che dag kyang dog cing dge 'du yang 'byin pa'i tshon rgyal bas byin gyis
brlabs shinge 'as ni mchog kyang byed// dam pa de dag sems bskyed gcig la sems rgyas byed pa'i sems kyang rab tu ston// rgyal ba'i dobang po thob pas rtag tu dbang po ting 'dzin dbang la
rab tu gnas/ bsam pa dag cing g.yo sgyu rnams dang bral te lhag pa'i bsam pa mngon sum gyur/ 3mos pa'i 'jug pa rnam pa sna tshogs tha dad 'go ba dag la rab tu ston// bag chags
thams cad sbyangs nas spyod pa dmar rab tu 'o no// nan tan bya ba 'grub pa'i yongashes mkhas pas thams cad mkhyen par 'tshang yang rgya// bsam pa rnam par spangs nas de dag skyon
med gnas pa zhi bo mchog kyang 'thob/ mkhas pa 'di lam shin tu bslabs pa de dag ming ni yon tan sgo nas grags// mtha' yas sems kyi yul ldan gnas pa med par lam rnamA
yang du sgom pa byed// shes tshul la gnas shing 'gro ba rnams la lam gyi rgyan rnams shin tu ston// spyod pa lag pa lta bu dag dang ldan pa la yin snying po ye shes mchog/ snying ni rdo rje lta bu
snying rje'i go bgos ye shes gdab pa'i mtshon cha yin/ shes rab mgo sa chos rtog meg yin byang chub spyod pa yang ni rnab yin// tshul khrims dag cing nyon mongs med la gtsang sku mun pa/
zhi byed sna yin te// skyobs pa lci yin lus ni rig pa yin te sems na yod shes dam pa yin// spyod pa rgyub yin te byang chub shing gnas seng ge 'i khri ni 'dug sa yin// tshangs pa'i ma
rnam sa dgan ma yen stong pa chags med dam pa spyod yul lo// gang gso de dag snang bar 'gyur ba'i snang ba bde bar gshegs kyi 54shis yul// sems can spyod la rnam par
lta ba ya shas maNig ste rnam pa sna tshogs bskyengs// sems can dben zhing chags dang bul ba'i sbyin pa bsams pa med pa'i tshul khrims dang// bzod pa me la thug brtson 'grus
mi ldeg dbang sgyur ba ni bsam gtan dam pa yin// rgyu ba med cing nam mkha' 'dab shes rab byams pa sems can rnam par 'dren// skyo med snying rje rnam dag chos ni dga' ba nyon mong
gnas las btang yang soms// don ni zhi ba chos kyi yul la 'bar 'gro ba bsod nams 'gro la bsngos// ye shes tshogs ni rnal rnon po lta bu snang ba chen po rig pa ste// 'gro
ba rnams la thos pa ston pas ma ngems ba skal par 'dren kyang 'jigs pa med/ba rnams la thas pa/ nan tan byed la gnas te bdud rnams btul nas bdud kyi lam yang rab tu bcad/
rgyal ba rnams kyi 'phrin las gang yin 'ashes spyod pa lhag pa'i bsam pas 'dzin// nga rgyal las rnams rnam par snang sa rtag tu ye shes kyi yang bya ba byed// bdud rnams byin gyi rlabs brtsom
mkhas pa de dag sangs rgyas byin gyi rlabs kyis 'phags// chos kyi bon gyi rlabs thob blo gros chen po 'chang ba lha yi gnas su 'dong// lha rnams byas te 'chi'o thos song nas mchog
gi mang la ni shin tu phra bar 'gro// bya ba mchog na nye bar bstan nas mchog gi gom pa bdun ni 'dor ba byed// mkhas pa de dag sems can kun la bso dang spyod dang btsun mo'i 'khor yang
ston[：]chags pa med par mngon par byung nas byang chub shing drung chos kyi rgyun kyang byed// stong pa'i ston las 'od zer dra ba yangs pa bkye zhing yang dag skul ba byed// bdud rnams
btul te byang chub go 'phang sangs rgyas chos kyi 'khordo 'arab tu bskor// sangs rgyas sa yang rab tu bstan nas 'dun pa de dag mtshungs pa med par bzhud// gang gis mkhas pad bskal pa
bya bar rnam par rtswa zhing yang dag sbyong 'gyur nas// sems can bye ba khrag khrig stong phrag du ma sangs rgyas yon tan rab 'gad kyang/ rnam pa kun tu sems can ma gnas chos la mi
mkhan spyod pa ma yin pa// de dag gi ni spyod pa 'di 'dra mtha' yas shin tu rgya chen mdor bstan to// de 'dra'i spyod dang ldan pa'i ye shes khyu mchog rdzu 'phrul dag gis rnam par rtse/ 3
zhing rnams bya pa stong yang sku rtsa gcig la bskal pa khrag khrig brgyad 'dzin te// lag tu khyer tezhing rnams bya bar 'gro yang lus la ngal dub gang yang med// mkhas pas khyer nas ji
lta'i gnas su bkod kyang 'gro ba dag la kha/nod pa med// 'jig rten mkhyen pa'i zhing gi rgyan rnams ji snyad rnam pa tha dad bstan pa dag/ kun kyang ba spu gcig gi pu gar khya mchog
de dag yang dag rab tu ston// mkhas pa pa 'i bu gar rgya mtsho tsha rnams ma lus khong da rab ston kyang/ 'phral shing 'grib med 'gro ba dag la gnod par 'gyur med bya ba du
yang ston// khor yug khrug khribag shin tu phra ba'i rdul byas lag gis bsdus khyer zhing// zhing rnams khrag khrig bya ma snyad du 'dir byed gcig tu gnyis kyang gzhig ma byed/
zhing rnams de dag rdul du byas te de bzhin gzhan yang rnam par 'jug byed de// de 'dra'i rjes su dang ba cad par gyur kyang 'jug pa de dag mi zad do// 'jig rten kun gyi nyi ma zla ba skar
ma gang dag stong rnams nge snyed dang// gang yang nor bu'i 'odo dang me yi 'od dang gang rnams lha dbang 'od// mang po de dag rab tu 'das pa'i 'od zer khrag khrig pa gcig khung nas
'gyod// 'jig rten kun gyi ngan song sdug bsngal zhi bar byed cing chos kyi dem pa ston// 'gro ba ma lus sgra ya rnam pa sna tshogs skad rnams thams cad ji snyadapa/
khyu mchog de dag tshig gcig rab tu brjod pas sgra rnams tham sa cad tshang bar brjod// sog chags bya ba rnams kyis yid du 'ong ba'i sgra thos dga' zhing mgu bar 'gyur// rgyal bas
bstan pa'i tshes kyi rnam pa ji snyed thams cad de las thos par 'gyur// gang yang ji snyed 'das pa'i bskal pa yod pa de dag ma 'ongs bskal par ston// gang yang ma 'ongs pa dang
da ltar byung ba ji snyad de dag 'das par ston// khyu mchog dpagani zhing rnams 'tshag dang gnas pa rnam pa tha dad ston pa byed// 'gro ba ji snyed thams cad mkhas pa de dang sku rtsa gcig
la rab tu 'god// 'das dang ma byon pa dang phyogs bcu kun na bzhugs pa'i rgyal ba ji snyed pa// de dag thams cad rang gi lus las ma nor dbang sgyur rnam par 'phrul pa ston/
sprul pa'i byin gyi rlabs la zhes pa'i mkhas pa de dag 'gro ba ji snyed sems// de snyad lus rnams rdul dang bral ba ston kyang lus la gnas pa gang yang med// lam rgyud drug
po gang rnams ji snyed yod pa'i 'go ba kun gyi lus bsdus shing// brgya byin tshangs pa'i 'jig rten mgon po rnams dang de bzhin lha dang mi ya rnams// gang yang nyan thos rang
bzhi rgyal rnams la dad cing sangs rgyas sku la mos pa la// sangs rgyas byang chub 'grub pa'i spyod pa dag dang thams cad mkhyen pa'i spyod pa ston// 'gro ba kun gyi 'du shes du ba rab dang
'bring dang tha mar 'jug pa rnams// thams cad shashing byin rlob byang chub 'tshang rgya zhing rnams kun kyang rab tu ston// 'du shes dra ba rnam bsgoms blo ldan 'jig rtan 'du shes
rnams la dbang sgyur ba// bya ba dang na sbyor ba ji snyed pa dang kun mchog byang chub spyod pa ston// de dag de dang rnam par 'phrul pa shin tu rgya chen dam ba gzhan yang ston// de dag gang
la 'jid rten sa men pa dang yul min de dag bya ba ston// ston kyang bya ba lhur len ma yin gzhan yang phyir zhing gong du ston pa byed// de dag sems can rnams kyi bsam pa ji bzhin/
spyod pa ci bzhin yang dag 'jug/ lus n nam mkha' lta bu ngag dang de la chags med 'jig rten gsum gyi gtso// tshul khrims sbos kyi khyog pa rab tu zhi ba ges yon yon tan sna tshog
rgyan chos kyi go 'phang skyon med thob cing thams cad mkhyen ba yid bzhin nor bu sku// bde ga shugs kun gyi ye shes dbang bskur thams cad mkhyen pa'i rgyal po'i thongs la gnas
pha rol phyin pa rtag 'byung 'khor lo yin te glang po mngon par shes pa mchog/ ye shes rdzu 'phrul rta skyo chags pa med 'gro shes rab nor bu dam pa yano/ spyod pa btsun mo bzang mo bsdu
ba rnam pa bzhi bo khyim bdag dam pa'o// thabs la shin tu mkhas pa blon po yon po yin te mkhas pa de dag 'khor los sgyur// stong pa khyim pa ting 'dzin grong
khyer mchog yin byams dang snying rje'i go cha'o// shas ra ba ral gi yin tedran pa gzhu mdzes dbang po rno ba mda' yang yin// 'jig rten mkhyen pa rnams kyi byin gyi rlabs ni gdugs te
anyis rgyal mtshan basgrung// de dang de dag bzod pa'i stobs kyis bdud kyi dpung dang sdo rnams 'dus pa 'joms// gzungs ni sa sku byang chub spyod pa chu klung yang shasal ma shas dag shing// ma tog

byang chub yan lag ting nge 'dzin ni rta pa rdzu 'phrul rgyal mtshan rgyan// stong pa rnam thar brgyan pa rdzing bu yin ti rnam par dpyod pa bzang po btsun mo yagi/ thor pa bdud rtsi bza' ba yin tachos ni btung
ba theg pa gsum gyi rtse// de dag spyod pa de 'dra yid 'ong khyad par 'phags te de bas gong du mang// gang gi bskal pa bye ba khrag khrug stod du skyo ba yongs su ma skyo bas// ston pa mchod
cing rnam dag zhing la brtson pas 'gro ba ye shes mchog la 'god// kha na ma tho kun med ye shes rab gnas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid rgyas byed// zhing rnams rdul gyi 'bur rlags re re nas
tsha kyang bgrang zhing brtse bar nus 'gyur la// bar snang mkha' chen 'di yang sku yis gzhal te zad par bya bar nus srid de// skad cig gcig la 'gro ba rnams kyi sems na bo grang tshul ngashes
tham par nus srid kyi// sangs rgyas sras rnams spyod pa dag ni bskal pa brgyar brjod zad par mi nus so// gang zhig yon tan rnam dag 'di dag 'thob par 'dod cing gong du gzhan 'dod dang/ ga
zhig sdug bsngal rnams las 'gro ba tha byas bad la dgod par 'dod pa dang// gang zhig bde bar gshags pa'i sku gsung thugs dang mnyam du bsgyur bar 'dod pa dag/ des na rdo rje lta
brtan pa'i sems su rgyas te yon tan bslab par byos// shin tu rgyas pa chen de ni mdo sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba las/ 'jig rten las 'das pa'i le'u ste bzhi bcu rtsa bzhi pa'o/
bam po brgyad cu drug pa///bcom ldan 'das mnyan du yod da 'i 'dze ta'i tshal// skyabs med pa la bus sbyin pa'i kun dga' ra ba'i nang/ pho brang brtsig
pa bkod pa rgya chen po can na/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po dang/ 'jam dpal la sogs pa 'di lta sta/ byang chub sems dpa' sems dpa' chen porashus pa dam pa'i ye shes dang da
bstan pa dam pa'i ye shes dang/ chags med dam pa'i yang shas dang/ me tog dam pa'i yo shas dang/ nyi ma dam pa'i ye shes dang/ zla ba dam pa'i yang shes dang/ dri med dam pa'i ye shes dang/
rdo rje dam pa'i ye shes dang/ rdul mad dam pa'i ye shes dang/ byang chub sems dpa' rnam par snang ba dam pa'i yang shas dang/ byang chub sems dpa' skar ma'i rgyal mtshan dang/ rirab rgyal
mtshan dang/ rin chen rgyal mtshan dang/ chags med rgyal mtshan dang/ ma tog rgyal mtshan dang/ demed rgyal ma tshan dang/ nyima'i rgyal maNAn dang/ mdzes pa'i rgyal mtshan/
dang / rdul med rgyal mtshan dang/ byang chub sems dpa' rnam par snang ba'i rgyal mtshan dang/ byang chub sems dpa' rin chen ba/sbi brjidadang/ blo gros chen po'i gzi brjid dang/ yaNashes
rdo rje'i gzi brjodro dang/ drim med pa'i gzi brjid dang/ chos kyi nyim gzi brjid dang/ bsod nams ri bo'i gzi brjide dang/ ye shes snang ba'i gzi brjod dang/ kun nas dpal gyi gzi
brjid dang/ kun nas 'od dpal gzi brjid dang/ byang chub sems dpa' phyogs bcu snang bas rgyas par 'gangs pa'i gzi brjid dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sa'i snying po dang/ nam mkha'i

snying po dang/ pa'i snying po dang/ na po che'i snying po dang/ nyi ma'i snying pa dang/ yon tan rnam dag snying po dang/ chos rgya mtsho'i snying po dang/ rnam par snang ba'i snying po dang/ gtsug gi snying po
dang / byang chub sems dpa' pa smed pa la gyi snying pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' bzang po'i mig dang/ rnam par dag pa'i mig dang/ dri ma med pa'i mgo dang/ chags pa med pa'i mig dang/
kun nas lta ba'i mig dang/ shin tu rnam par lta ba'i mig dang/ ut+pa la'i mig dang/ rdo rje'i mig dang/ rin po mi'i mig dang/ byang chub sems dpa' nam mkha'i mig dang/ byang chub sem
sa dpa' lha'i cod pan dang/ chos kyi dbyangs snang ba'i blo gros cod pan dang/ byang chub sems dpa' dam pa'i cod pan dang/ phyogs rnam par snang ba'i cod pan dang/ sangs rgyas thams cad yang dag par
byung ba'i snying po'i cod pan dang/'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa'i cod pan dang/ kun nas rnam par snang ba'i cod pan dang/ hril gyis non pa med pa'i cod pan dang/ de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad kyisong ga'i khri 'dzin pa'i cod pan dang/ byang chub sems dpar chos kyi dbyings nam mkha' kun nas snang ba'i cod pan dang byang chub sems dpa' tshangs ra ni dbang

po'i gtsug phud dang/ klu'i dbang po'i gtsug phud dang/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sprul pa snang ba'i ba gtsug phud dang/ byang chub dam pa'i gtsug phud dang/ smon lam rgya mtsho thams cad rab tu sgrig
ba'i rin chen rgyal po'i gtsug phud dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu 'gyed pa'i nor bu rin chen 'brug sgra'i gtsug phud dang/ nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad
thami dad pa rnam par dmigs pa'i rin chen rgyal bos brgyan pa'i gtsug phud dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rnam par 'phrul pa snang ba'i rgyal mtshan ni bo mi'i rgyal po'i dra bas kun nas
yog pa'i gtsug phud dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi tshes kyi 'khor log pa'i gtsug phud dang/ byang chub sems dpa' dus gsum gyi ming thams cad rab tu sgrog pa'i gtsug
bud dang/ byang chub sems dpa' rgya chen po'i 'od dang/ gzi bo rjod dri ma med pa'i 'od dang/ rin po che'i 'od dang/ rdul dang bral ba'i 'od dang/ skar ma'i 'od dang///
tshes kyi 'od dang/ zhi ba'i 'od dang/ nyi ma'i 'od dang/ rnam par 'phrul pa'i 'od dang/ byang chub sems dpa' lha 'od dang/ byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams dpal dang yang gs dpal
dang chos kyi dpal dang/ mngon par shes pa'i dpal dang/ 'od kyi dpal dang/ ma tog dpal dang/ rin po che'i dpal dang/ byang chub kyi dpal dang/ tshangs pa'i dpal dang/ byang chub sems
dpa' kun nas snang ba'i dpal dang/ byang chub sems dpa' tshangs pa'i dbyangs dang/ rgya mtsho'i do byangs dang/ sa sgra'i dbyangs dang/ 'jig rten dbang po'i dbyangs dang/ ri dbang rgyal po
'thab pa'i dbyangs dang/ chos kyi dbyings kun tu rgyas pa'i dbyangs dang/ chos rgya mtsho thams cad rab tu sgrog pa'i dbyangs dang/ bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rab tu 'dul ba'i dbyangs dang/
snying rje chen po'i tshul gyi sprin rab tu sgrog pa'i rdo byangs dang/ byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba thams cad sdug bsngal rab tu zhi bar bya bas dbugs 'byin pa'i dbyangs dang/ byang chub som
dnga' tshes kyi 'phags pa dang/ khyad par gyis 'phags ba dang/ ye shes kyis 'phags pa dang/ bsod nams ri bos 'a phags pa dang/ yon tan gyi tshogs kyis 'phags pa dang/
grags pas 'phags pa dang/ kun tu snang bas 'phags pa dang/ byams pa chen pos 'phags pa dang/ 14shes rgya mtshos 'phapa gas pa dang/ byang chub sems dang 'a ra bzhin ga shas
pa'i rgyud kyi gdung gis 'phags pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' 'od kyi dpal dang/ mchog gi dpal dang/ kun tu 'phags pa'i dpa' dang/ rnam par snang ba'i dang la dang cho
spyod pa la dang/ zla ba'i dpal dang/ nam mkha'i dpal dang/ rin po cha'i dpal dang/ dpal gyi dpal dang/ byang chub sems dung 'a ya shas kyi dpal dang/ byang chub sems
dpa' ri'i dbang po'i rgyal po dang/ chos kyi dbang po'i rgyal po dang/ 'gro ba'i dbang po'i rgyal po dang/ tshangs pa'i dbang po'i rgyal po dang/ tshogs kyi dbang po'i rgyal po dang lce'i
dbang po'i rgyal de dang/ zhi ba'i dbang po'i rgyal po dang/ mi g.yo ba'i debang po'i rgyal po dang/ khyu mchog dbang po'i rgyal po dang/ byang chub sems dang 'a mchog gi dbang po'i rgyal po dang/
byang chub sems dpa' rab tu zhi ba'i sgra dang/ chags pa med pa'i sgra dang/ sa'i dbyangs kyi sgra dang/ rgya mtsho'i 'brug gi sgra dang/ sngon gyi dbyangs kyi sgra dang/ chos snang ba'i sgra dang/
nam mkha'i dbyings kyi sgra dang/ sems can kun gyi dag ba'i rtsa ba rab tu sgrog pa'i sgra dang/ sngon gyi smon lam yongs su skulo pa'i sgra dang/ byang chub sems dpa' bdud kyi dkyil la
gsom med par byed pa'i sgra dang/ byang chub sems dpa' rin po cha'i blo dang/ yongashas ri bo'i blo dang/ nam mkha'i klodang/ rume mad pa'i blo dang/ chags pa med
pa'i blo dang/ rnam par sangs rgyas pa'i blo dang/ dus gsum snang ba'i blo dang/ yangs pa'i blo dang/ kun tu snang ba'i blo dang/ byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings su snang ba'i sgro dang/ de
dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' lnga stong tsam ste/ kun kyang byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang/ smon lam gyi byung ba dang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rgyas par
'gongs pas chags pa med pa'i spyod yul can/ de bzhin gshags pa thams cad kyi drung du 'dong bas lus mtha' yas pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang ldan pa// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi snom par
'phrul pa yongs su bstan pa/ rnam par dmigs par bya ba la bsgribs pa med pa'i mog gi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i tsho//
chab r 'dong ba rgyun mi gcod pas tshad med par phyin pa/ sa rgya mtsho'i la thams cad la ya shas snang ba rab tu thob pas snang ba mtha' yas pa dang ldan pa/ tha dad pa yang dag par
!/ shes pa rnam par dag pas bskal pa mtha' yas par shan tu ston pa mi zad pa// 'gro ba'i bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du gzugs kyi lus yongs su ston pas/ nam mkha'i dbyings kyis
klas pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul rnam par dag cing mi gnas pa// sems can gyi khams sems can med pa dang/ srog med pa yongs su shes pas rab rib med pa/ chos kyi dbyings thams
cad du 'od zer gyi dra bas rgyas rar 'gangs pas nam mkha' dang mnyam pa sha stag dang thabs cig tu bzhugs so/ nyan thos rdzu 'phrul chen podang ldan pa lnga brgya ste//
thams cad kyang bden pa'i tshul gyi rang bzhin mngon par khong du chud pa/ yang dag pa'i mtha' mngon sum du gyur pa/ chos kyi rang bzhin la zhugs pa/ srid pa'i rgya mtsho las rgyan du 'phags
pa/ de bzhin gshags pa'i tshogs su 'gyur ba'i spyod yul can kun nas sbyor ba dang/ bag la nyal ba dang/ bcings pa rnam par bzlog pa// chags pa med pa'i gnas la brten pa//
nam mkha' ltar zhi po u0f8bma par spyod pa// sangs rgyas ka tha tsem dang/ ma chung dang/ yido gnyis yongs su chad pa// sangs rgyas kyi ye shes rgya mtsho la mos pa'i lam du zhugs pa sha stag
dang 'jig rten gyi rtobang po sngon gyi rgyal ba la bya ba byas pa/'gro ba thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i don du zhugs pa// ga sol ba ma btab par dag ba'i bas gnyan du gyur ba/sams
can gzhan bsrung ba la zhugs pa/ 'jig rten thams cad las 'phags pa'i khyad par dang ldan pa'i yang shas kyi sgo la zhugs pa/ sems can thams cad yongs su mi gtong ba'i sems dang
[f/ ]// ldan pa// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bstan pa'i spyod yul las byung ba/ de bzhin gshags pa'i bstan pa yongs su bsrung ba la zhugs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi rigs
yang dag par gzung ba'i smon lam gyis yang dag par skyes pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung gi rgyud du 'byung ba mngon du gyur pa/thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la mngon bar mos pa sha stag
dang yang thabs cig go/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' 'khor dang bcas pa de dag dong/ nyan thos rdzu 'phrul chen pa dang ldan pa de dag dang/ 'jig rten gyi dbang po 'khor dang
bcas pa de dag 'di snyam du gyur te/ de bzhin gshags pa'i yul dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang/ de bzhin/
gangshegs pa'i stobs dang/ de bzhin gshags pa'i mo bsangs pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par spyod pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs
pa'i mnga' dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yang shas dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byon gyi rlabs dang/ de bzhin gshags pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang/ de bzhin gshags pa'i mthu dang//
de bzhin gshegs pa'i sngon gyi smon lam dang/ sngon legs par spyad pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba dang/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi skyabasadang/ dad pa'i mig yongs su dag pa dang/ rgya chen
po la mos pa'i snang ba rab tu thob pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i lcag pa'i bsam pa rnam par dag pa dang/ bsam pa thag pas thams cad mkhyen pa nyidadu smon cing/ yang dag par zhugs pa
ma gtogs par lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten kyis 'jug pa 'am/ khong du chud pa 'am/ yid chos pa 'am/ yongs su shes pa 'am ma par rtogs pa ma/ gzung ba 'am/ rnam par
dpyad pa 'am/ rnam par bsgom pa 'am/ rnam par dbya ba 'am/ rnam par dgrol pa 'am/ rab tu brjod pa 'am/ soms can pha rol gyi rgyud du phyin par bya bar niso nus na/ bcom ldan 'das
nyid kyis bdag cag byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi bsam pa'i tshul ji lta ba dang/ sems can bsam pa rnam pa tha dad pa dang/ mos pa sna tshogs dang/ shes pa sna tshogs kyi tshig dang
brda sna tshogs su gyur pa/ dbang sgyur ba'i sa gzhan dang gzhan la gnas pa/ dbang po sna tshogs su rnam par dag pa/ bsam pa dang sbyor ba rnam pa gzhan dang gzhan can/ sems dang bsam pa'i yul
gzhan dang gzhan can/ deb[︽]no gshogs pa'i yon tan gzhan dang gzhan la gnas pa// chos bstan pa gzhan dang gzhan la mos pa dag la/ sngon thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du zhugs pa lta'ang yang dag par
bstan grang/ sngon byang chub sems dpa smon lam mngon par bsgrubs pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang/ sngon gyi byang chub soms dpa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i dkyil 'khor yongs su dag pa lta'ang yang
dag par bstan gong/ sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i sa yongs su mnan pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa lta'ang yang dag pa ba stan gang/ sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i dkyil

'khor mngon par bsgrubs pa yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan rgang/ sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i tshul mngon par bsgrub pa rnam par phye ba'i snang ba lta'ang yang dag par bstan

gung/sngon byang chub sems dpa'i lam gyi bkod pa yongs su dag par mdzad pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang/ sngon byang chub sems dpa'i da myong ba'i tshul rgya mtsho mngon par bsgrubs pa lta'ang yang
rtswa/ dag par bstan srung/ sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i yang dag par bsgrub pa dang/ rnam par 'phrul pa'i bkod pa phun sum tshogs pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang/ byang chub sems dar 'i sngon
gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang/ mngon par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sgos rnam pa 'khrul pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan srung/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi 'khongol rab tu
rdza bskor ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang/ khyu mchog gi mthu lta'ang yang dag par bstan srung/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang/ rnam par 'phrul pa lta'ang yang dag
par bstan srung/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sems can gyi khams gdul ba'i thabs kyi sgo lta'ang yang dag par bstan srang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshes kyi grong khyer
la mnga' mdzad pa ltar ng yang dag par bstan grang/ de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi lam snang bar mdzad pa la'ang yang dag par bstan grang/ de bzhin gshegs pa sems can
thams cad kyi gnas su gshegs shing/ rnam par 'phrul pa mdzad pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan grang/ de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi yon bzhes pa mdzad pa lta'ang/
yang dag par bstan srung de de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad kyi bsod nams dang/ yon ston pa'i tsho'aphrul mdzad pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan gang/ de bzhin gshags pa sems
can thams cad kyisams kyi tshul la// sangs rgyas kyi gzugs brnyan dmigs pa mdzad pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan gang/ de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad la rnam par 'phrul
pa'i tsho 'phrul mdzad pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan gang/ de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad la yongs su bstan pa dang/ rjes su bstan pa'i tshe 'phrul mdzad pa lta'ang yang dag par M
bstan srung de bzhin gshegs pa sems can thams cad la sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul bsam gyis mi khyab pas rnam par 'phrul pa mdzad pa lta'ang yang dag par bstan rgyang snyam pa dang/
'donas bcom ldan 'das kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi sems kyis yongs su rtog pa thugs kyis mkhyen nas/ saMng gi rnam par bsgyings pa zhes bya ba'i ting de 'dzin nam
mkha' dang mnyam pas dpa med pa// 'gro ba thams cad du rnam par snang ba'i rgyan dang ldan pa// thugs rje chen po'i rang bzhin can/ thugs rje chen po'i sgo dang ldan pa/ thugs
rdzachen po'i sngon du 'gro ba/ thugs rje chen po'i tshes can la mnyam par gzhag go/ bcom ldan 'das kyis de ltar mnyam par bzhag ma thag tu/ pho brang brtsigs pa rgyun chen po

can yang mtha' dang dbus med par yangs shing/ rdo rje thub pa med pa'i rgyal mtshan gyis sa'i gzhi rab tu brgyan pa dang/ ro bu rin pa mi'i rgyal po thams cad kyi dra ba kun tu bkram pa/ na po che du ma'i
lcam tog gi 'o mas rgyal pa/ra gong ba/ ngo lu phan po che dam pa bkram pa dang/ ba zlarma ko bas mdzes par byas la// rin po'i rgyal po 'gro ba rnam par snang bas rgyan ta rnam ra dza bya ba dang/
ni po cha bzang po mang po dang ldan pa'i nor bu rin po che 'dzam bu'i chu klung gi phung pos shin tu brgyan pa dang/ ni po che thams cad las sgo khang dang/ rta babs dang/ pu shu dang/ skar khung
byas shing/ khri 'phang grangs med pa rnam ra/ra dag pas brgyan pa dang/ 'jig rten gyi dbang po thams cad dang 'du ba'i nor bu rini bo 'i rgyan dang ldan pa dang/ 'gro ba rgya mtsho'i nor bu ni go
tsho rnam par phye ba dang/ mo bu rin po che thams cad kyi dra bas kun nas yog pa gdugs dang rgyal mtshan rab tu bsgrung ba dang/ sgo dang rta babs thams cad las 'od zer a kyi dbyings su rgyas par
ca0 'gongs pa rab tu 'byung bas rnam par mdzes par byas pa dang/ phyi re la rgya 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi sa'i gzhi stegs bu brjod du med pas brgyan pa dang/ phyogs kun nas them skas kyi 'brang
banor bu rin po chos brtsigs shing/ shin tu rnam par phye bas rab tu mdzes par kun nas gnas par gyur to// 'dzi'i tshul thams cad kyang chu zheng gab bar shin tu yangs shing

rgyatsho par kun nas gnas par gyur te/ sangs rgyas kyi mthus sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa la shin tu phra ba skad kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnams kyang/ rtsazhing kun tu rgya che zhing yangs pa dang/

rin po che thams cad kyi rgyan sna tshogs dang ldan zhing/ sa'i gzhi nor bu bzhi pa chu sna tshogs brjod du med pas kun nas grub pa dang/ nor bu rin po che grangs med pa'i ser bas kun nas bskor ba dang/
ni po che sna tshogs kyi shing ta la'i 'phreng bas mas pas brgyan par kun nas gnas par gyur to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag na sbos chu'i chu klung tshad med pa klong mtha' yas par 'khyil ba'i/
sngos kyi chos yongs su gang ba na po tshosna tshogs kyi me tog mang po dang 'dres par gyur la g.yas phyogs su 'khyil zhing 'bab pa/ sangs rgyas kyi ngos thams cad dbyangs su sgrog pas rab tu
brgyan pa dag kyang kun nas gnas par gyur ti/ ni po che'i ma tog puN+Da ri ka'i 'phreng ba dang/ rin po che'i shing gam po rin po che thams cad kyi pad+mo rab tu rgyas shing shin tu 'phags pas mdzes
par bkod pa dang/ ni po che sna tshogs kyi khang pa brtsigs pa'i 'brang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa// nor bu rin po che thams cad kyi dra bas kun nas yog la/ nor bu ni
po che grangs med pa'i dri ba kun tu snang bas brgyan cing mdzes pa dang/ nor bu rin po che'i gzhal med khang nor bu ni po ti thams cad kyis brgyan pa grangs med pa/ spos thams cad kyi ngad kun

nas 'byung ba/ bdug spos kyi sprin gyi rgyan dang ldan pa rtag kyang kun nas gnas par gyur to// nga ni po che'i rgyal mtshan grangs med pa dang/ gos kyi rgyal mtshan dang/ ba dan gyi rgyal mtshan dang/

ni lo che'i snam bu'i rgyal mtshan dang/ ma tog gi rgyal mtshan dang/ rgyun gyi rgyal mtshan dang/ 'phreng ba'i rgyal mtshan dang/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi dril bu'i rgyal mtshan dang/ rin po che'i rgyal po'i gdugs
kyi rgyal mtshan dang/ nor bu rin po che snang bas kun tu rgyas par 'gongs pa'i rgyal mtshan dang/ ro khu rin po che'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mtshan gyi 'khor lo'i dbyangs rab tu

sgrog pa'i rgyal mtshan dang/ nor bu ni med tsho'i rgyal po seng ge yid du 'ong ba'i rgyal mtshan dang/ nor bu ni po che'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngon gyi sbyor ba rab chu sgrog pa'i rgyal

mtshan dang/ nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po tshes kyi dbyangs thams cad rab tu snang ba'i rgyal mtshan dang/ rgyal mtshan gyi rgyan rnam par phye ba thams cad phyogs kun nas rgyan du gyur pa dag kyang kun

ba/ nas gnas par gyur// 'dza?ta'i tshal gyi nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad kyang lha'i gzhal med khang gi sprin bsam gyis ma khyab pas brgyan par kun nas gnas par gyur te/ 'dzi ta'i tshal nyid kyang spos
sna tshogs kyi shing grangs med pa'i sngon gyis kun nas yog cing brgyan pa dang/ brjod du med pa'i rgyan sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i ri re la kyis kun nas 'khor cing bkod pa dang/ la mo rdung ba dang/
dkrol la brjod du med pa'i srin las/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la bstod pa'i dbyangs dang/nga tshosnyan pa 'byung bas kun nas brgyan pa dang/ na po che'i pa brjod du med pa'i sngon gyis kun
nas log cing brgyan pa dang/ ni po che'i sing po'i khri brjod du med pa'i steng/ lha rdzas kyi ni po che'i stan bting pa la byang chub sems dpa' 'khod cing/ de bzhin gshegs pa la bstod pa'i
sgra dbyangs snyan pa 'byon pa'i sprin gyis kun nas brgyan pa dang/ lha'i dbang po brjod du med pa'i gzugs brnyan mngon par 'khyung ba'i nor bu rin po che'i 'bu'i sprin gyis kun nas brgyan pa/
dang mu tig dkar po'i dra ba'i sngon brjod du med pas kun nas brgyan pa dang/ mu tig dmar po'i khang pa brtsigs pa'i sprin brjod du med pas kun nas yog cing brgyun pa dang/ rdo rje lta bur sra ba'i
mu tig gi sprin brjod du med pa'i char mngon par 'bab pas rab tu brgyan par kun nas gnas par gyur to// deco'i phyi'i zhin/ de na de bzhin gshags pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba bsam
bya/ gyis mi khyab ba'i phyir ro// de bzhin gshol/sa pa'is da kar po'i tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i khyu mchog gi mthu dang byin gyi
ha rlabs bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro// de bzhin gshags pa'i sku gcig gis 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rgyas par 'gengs pa rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i
phyir ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gcig tu zhugs pas/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par phye ba thams cad la yang dag par gzhol ba'i byin gyi rlabs yongs su ston pa
bsam gyis ma khyab pa'i phyir ro// de bzhin gangshegs pa rnams rngul shin tu phra ba gcig la chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan rnam par dmigs par yongs su ston pa mdzad pa/
bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ba spu'i bu ga gcig tu sngon gyi mtha' de bzhin gshegs pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa yongs su ston pa mdzad pa
bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyi 'od su gcig gi sgo nas 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa snang bar 'gyur ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro//
de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ba spu'i rtse mo gcig las sprul pa'i sngon 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyad kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rgyas par 'gangs pa bsam
ma/ gyis mi khyab pa'i phyir ro// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams ba sbya'i sgo gcig nas 'jig rten gyi khams 'du ba dang 'jig pa'i bskal pa yongs su ston pa bsam gyi mi khyab pa'i phyir ro// ji ltar 'dze
ta'i tshal de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pas yongs su dag par kun nas gnas par gyur pa de bzhin du/ phyogs bcu'i 'a jig rten gyi khams chos kyi dbyings kyis klas pa/ nam mkha'i mthas
gcugs pa thams cad kyang yongs su dag par kun nas gnagashing rab tu brgyan pa dang/ shin tu sdud pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i skus yongs su rgyas pa dang/ 'dzi ta'i tshal du yang dag par
gzhol ba dang/ byang chub sems dpas yongs su rgyas pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khe rgya mtshorashin tu rnam par gnas pa dang/ rgyan thams cad kyi sngon gyi char
mngon par 'bab pa dang/ ni po che thams cad kyi 'od kyis rab tu snang ba dang/ rin po che sna tshogs thams cad kyi sngon gyi char mngon par 'bab pas brgyan pa dang/ zhing thams cad kyi bkod
pa'i sngon gyis kun nas yog par brgyan pa dang lha rdzas kyi lus thams cad kyi sngon gyi chos ra pa tu 'bab pas brgyan pa dang/ ma tog sna tshogs thams cad kyi spyin shin tu rgyas pa'i lhun gyis
kun t+targyas shing brgyan pa dang/ gos thams cad kyi shing gi sbyin gyi mdzod nas gos kha dog sna tshogs su mdzes pa'i char rab tu 'bab pas brgyan pa dang/ 'phreng ba dang/ lnga lnga dang/ sa modi'i
rgyan thams cad kyi sprin gyi chos rgyun mi 'chad par mngon par 'bab pas brgyan pa dang/ spos sna tshogs kyi bdug smyos phyogs kun nas 'thul ba'i spren dang/ na bun gyi
char thams cad kyi lus kyi dbyibs ltar man par bab pas brgyan pa dang/ rin po che thams cad kyi me tog gi dra ba'i sprin las rin po cha'i rgyal bo'i phyi ma zhib bu'i char rgyun mi 'chad par rab
tu 'bab pa dang/ rin po che thams cad kyi rgyal mtshan dang ba dan gyi sngon lha'i bu mo'i lag na khyer ba/ nam mkha'i dbyings kun tu rgyu zhing 'khor bas brgyan pa dang/ ni bo thams cad kyi pad+mo

rin po che sna tshogs kyi 'dab ma'i dkyil 'khor can du chu ba mthon po dang ldan pa'i ze ba la la mo bkod pa// kun nas sgra 'byin cing dbyangs snyan par sgrog pas brgyan pa dang/ ban pa rma'i 'bru sna tshogs/
kyi dra ba dang/ rin po che sang ga'i dra ba sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pa'i 'phreng ba dang/ sa mo des brgyan par kun nas gnas shing snang bar gyur to// de ltar bcom ldan 'das de bzhin

gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin chen po seng gi rnam par bsgyings pa de la mnyam par bzhag ma thag tu/ de'i tshe shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin

chu phra ba skad kyi pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams gsar gyi sprin sgron ma'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad dpal gyi gzi brjid rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas//
byang chub sems dpa' rnam par snang ngi smon lam rgya gtsug gi redawar snang ba zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpar sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdulashin tu phra ba snyad dang lhan cig tu/
bcom ldan 'das rjes gnang nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'kher rgya mtsho de nas 'phags// nam mkha'i dbyings rgyan sna tshogs kyi sprin gyis brgyan pa dang/ lha rdzas kyi ma tog de sngon gyi char mngon par dbab

pa dang/ lha rdzas kyi spos kyi sprin gyi cha rab tu dgya ba dang/ lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i pad+mo'i sngon gyi char mngon par gtor ba dang/ lha rdzas kyi 'phreng ba'i sngon gyi char rab tu btang ba dang/ lha rdzas

kyi ni po 'i sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang/ lha rdzas kyi rgyan gyi sprin gyi char mngon par dgyi ba dang/ lha rdzas kyi don po che'i gdugs kyi sngon gyi char mngon par bsgrub pa dang/ kha dog sna

tshogs rnam pa tha dad cing shin tu phra ba'i lha rdzas kyi gos kyi sprin gyi ra mngon par dbab pa dang/ lha rdzas kyi don po che'i rgyal mtshan dang ba dan gyi sprin nam mkha'i dbyings las byin gyis brlab pa
dang rin po che sna tshogs kyi sngon gyi rgyan yid du 'ong bas nam mkha'i dbyings rgyas par 'gangs par spyod cing/ mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na ba der lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba

der dong ste 'khor dang bcas pas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas shar phyogs su brtan te/ 1 khang pa brtsigs pa rgyan kun dang ldan zhing nor bu rin po che'i dra bas kun nas khyab pa dang/ song ba'i khri
nor bu rin po che phyogs rab tu snang ba'i kha sgo'i snying bo can dag mngon par sprul nas 3ra bu rin po che yid bzhin gyi rgyal po'i dra ba'i rgyan gyis kun nas brgyan pa'i byang chub sems/
dpa'i lus su byin gyis brlabs nas/ skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod do// lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshosangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyad

kyi pha ma la gyi 'jig rten gyi khams rdo rje rgyal mtshan gyi snyirje po zhes bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa dpal gyi snying po kun nas snang ba'i rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/ byang chub sems dpa'
sams dang 'a chen po brtson 'grus kyi[︽]shugs thub par dka' ba'i rgyal po zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdu'9shin tu phra ba snyad dang lhan cig tu/
bcom ldan 'das des gnang nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho de nas 'phags te/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad spos kyi lnga lde dang dra bas kun tu 'brel bar kun gyis brlab pa dang/ sangs

rgyas kyi zhing 'byam klas pa thams cad rin po che sna tshogs kyi lta lce dang dra ba chen pos kun tu 'brel bar byin gyis brlab pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyud thams cad kyi mi tog thams cad kyi la lde dang
'thung ba'i du bas kun nas 'brel bar byin gyis brlab pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing ga 'khor thams cad 'phung ba dang/ lda ldi dang/ sa mo de'i dra bas kun nas 'brel bar byin gyis brlab pa dang//

kha sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi dkyil 'khor thams cad 'og gi gzhi rten rdo rje thams cad kyi 'phrang pas yongs su gzung bar byin gyis brlab pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi tshul thams cad nor bu ni po che sna/
tshogs kyi ra bas kun nas 'brel bar byin gyis brlab pa dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad gos sna tshogs kyi lnga rjes kun nas yongs su blangs shing bzung bar byin gyis brlab pa dang/
sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad ni po che sna tshogs kyi lus kyi 'phreng ba dang/ lnga lde mang po'i dra bas kun nas 'brel par mngon par bsgrub pa dang/ zhing thams cad ngo bu rin po che dpal gyi

'od zer lnga lnga dang 'phung ba'i da pas kun nas 'brel bar byin gyis brlab pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad ni po che rnam par snang bo'i lnga lce dang du bas kun tu 'bral bar byin gyis brlab
pa dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi gzhi nor bu ni po che sang gi yid du 'ong ba'i 'phreng ba dang lda ldi'i dra bas yongs su bzung bar byin gyis brlab pa byed cing/ mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi
khams gang na ba der lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong sta 'khor dang bcas pas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas lho phyogs brtan taM/ nor bu rin po che 'gro ba la rnam

par snang ba'i khang pa brtsigs pa da nga/ sang ge'i khri nil bu rin po che phyogs kun tu rnam par snang ba'i pad+mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul te/ rin po che thams cad kyi me tog gi dra ba'i rgyan gyis kun
0 1@#// nas brgyan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus su byin gyis brlabs nas/ skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod do// nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshosangs

rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba skad kyi lo la gyi 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'i ri rab rnam par snang ba'i rgyal mtshan mar me zhes bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings
kyi ye shes sgron ma'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i dpal kun nas 'phags pa'i gzi brjid ces bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho brjod du med
pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba skad dang lhan cig tu/ bcom ldan 'das des gnang nas 'khor gyi dkyile 'khor rgya mtsho de nas 'phags te/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad bdug spos kha dog sna tshogs dang

dri sna tshogs su ldan pa'i ri rab kyi sngone/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyad kyis rgyas par dgang ba dang/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad thos kha dog sna tshogs dang ldan
pa'i ra rob kyi sngon/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rngul shin tu phra ba nyid kyis rgyas par dgang ba dang/ tshosakyi dbyings thams cad bdug spos kha dog dang dri du mar ldan pa'i ri rab

kyi sngon/ sangs rgyas kyi khonge brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyid kyis rgyas par dgang ba dang/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad spos kha dog sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i ri rab kyi sprin/ sangs rgyas
