kyizhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu sbub snyad kyis rgyas par dgang ba dang/ chos kyi rabyings thams cad nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po mdangs 'byung ba sa thams cad kyi rdul gyi kha dog dang 'dra/

ba'i ri rab kyi sbyin/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyad kyis rgyas par dgang ba dang/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad nor bu rin po che skar ma'i rgyal mtshan 'od kyi dkyil
'khor sna tshogs kyi dkod pa dang ldan pa'i ri rab kyi sprin/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba stod kyis rgyas par dgang ba dang/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad rin po
che'i rgyal po rdo rje'i snying po kha dog sna tshogs can/ bkod pa rnam pa tha dad pa'i yul dang ldan pa'i ri rab kyi yin/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdulashan tu pha bsad kyis rgyas
par dgang ba dang/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad nor bu rin po che 'dzam khu'i chu klung/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du snang bat+tiyul dang ldan pa'i ri rab kyi spyin/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing
brjod du med pa'i rdul shan tu phru ba snyad kyis rgyas par dgang ba dang/ rnam mkha'i dbyangs thacan nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po chos kyi dbyings thams cad rab tu snang ba' rab kyi sprin/
sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis kun nas khyab par byin gyis ngarlab ma dar/ sems can gyi khams kyi yul thams cad nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po re
kya kha zhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mtshan rab tu smad ba ni ri rab kyi sprin/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shan tu phra ba snyad kyis rgyas par dgar ba dang/
sa kyi dbyings thams cad kyi nam mkha'i rin po che'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sngon gyi sbyor ba rab tu snang bar yongs su ston nying/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i sku'adun
pa'i ri rab kyi spune/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba skad kyis rgyas par dgang ba dang/ phyogs bcu thams cad rin po che'i rgyal po de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi srid

sgyu po byang chub rab tu snang ba'i 'od dang ldan pa'i ri rab kyi spyin/ sangs rgyas zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra pa snyad kyis rgyas par 'gangs pa byed cing mi mjed kyi 'jig rten khrams gang na ba der/
lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste 'khor dang bcas pas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshol nas nub phyogs su brtan te/ lar pa khartsegs pa spos kyi rgyal po zla mas cad kyi

lhan po dang ldan pa/ mu tig gi dra las kun nas khyab pa dang/ sang ge'i khri nor bu rin po che lha'i dbang po rab tu snang ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi pad+mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprulanas/ rin po che gser
tsha gyi dra bA kun nas brgyan pa dang/ yid bzhin gyi rgyal po'i cod pan bcangs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus su byin gyis brlabs nas/ skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod do//
phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshosangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa' rtul shAn tu phra ba snyad kyi pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che'agos yongs su snang ba zhes bya la/ de bzhin/
gshegs pa chos kyi dbyings nam mkha'i dpala rnam par snang ba'i sangs kyi nang nas/ byang chub sems dpa' chags pa med pa'i dpal gyi rgyal po zhes bya 'a/ byang chub sems dpa'
'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho brjod du med pa'i rdul gan tu phra ba stod dang lhan cig tu/ bcom ldan 'das des gnang nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho de nas 'phags te/ nam mkha'i
dbyangs rin po che'i snam bu'i sprin gyi rgyan gyis brgyan par byin gyis brlab pa dang/ nam mkha'i dbyings rin po che'i gos kha dog ser po dang mdog ser po'i sprin gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa

byin gyis brlab pa dang/ nam mkha'i dbyings rin po cha'i gos spos sna tshogs kyis dri zhim por byas pa'i sprin gyi char rab tu 'bab pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan par byin gyis brlab pa rangazhas mthob phying
rin po chu'i rgyal po nyi ma'i rgyal mtshan gyi spyin gyi rgyan gyis brgyan par byin gyis brlab pa dang/ nam mkha'i dbyings nor bu rin po mu gsar gyi mdog shin tu 'bar ba'i sprin gyi rgyan gyis
rgyan par byin gyis brlab pa dang/ nam mkha'i dbyings nor bu'i rgyal po 'di po che 'bar ba'i gos kyi sprin gyi rgyan gyis brgyan par byin gyis brlab pa dang/ nam mkha'i dbyings rin po
rma skar ma thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan gyis sna tshogs su gyur pa'i gosakyi sprin gyi rgyan gyis brgyan par byin gyisabarlab pa nam mkha'i dbyings phyogs bcu kun nas nor bu rin/

po che snam bu khra bo'i rdo ltar snang pa 'i smin gyis gong su rgyas par byin gyis brlab pa dang/ namaM mkha'i dbyings phyogs bcu kun nas rin po che'i rgyal po rnam par snang ba'i dpal rab tu 'bar ba'i 'od dang
ldan pa'i gos kyi sprin gyis yongs su rgyas par byin gyis brlab pa dang/ nam mkha' dbyings phyogs bcu kun nas nor bu'i rgyal po snang bkan tu gsal bas phyogs kyi dbyings rnam par snang
ba'i gos kyi sprin gyis yongs su rgyas par byin gyis brlab pa dang/ nam mkha'i dbyings rin po che'i rgyal po rgya mtsho'i rgyan gyi gos kyi sngon gyis kun nas yog par byin gyis brlab pa byed
cing mi mdzod kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na bdar lhags nas/ bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste 'khor dang bcas pas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas byang phyog
su brtan te/ rin po che'i rgyal po rgya mtsho yongs su 'byung ba'i khang pa btsugs pa dang/ seng ge 'i khri pi cha ma'i paroT snying po can rig mngon par sprul nas/ nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po song
ga mdzes pa'i dra las yongs su brgyan pa dang/ rin po che skar ma'i rgyal mtshan mgo la thogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus su byin gyis brlabs nas/ skyil mo krung bcas te/
byang dang shar gyi phyogs mchoms kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshosangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rtul shin tu phra ba snyan kyi pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams chen po
thams cad du mdzes pa'i rin po che'i 'od zer gyi dra 'a rab tu 'byed pa zhes byab/ de bzhin gshegs pa mi dmigs pa'i spyan gyi saMngs rgyas kyi zhing nas/ byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi
dbyingasasuk+kin tu 'khrul pa'i smon lam zla ba zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho brjod du med pa'i rdul gzhi tu phra ba snyad dang lhan cig tu/ bcom ldan 'do
des gnang nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho ra nas 'phags te/ 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'khyam thams cad rin po che'i khang pa 'dzugs pa'i sprin gyis kun nas 'bas par byin gyis
brlab pa dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad spos kyi khang pa brtsigs pa'i sprin gyis kun nas legs par byin gyis brlab pa dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam
thams cad bdug spos kyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin gyis kun nas khebs par byin gyis brlab pa dang/ 'jig rten gyi kams rab 'byam thams cad rtson ran gyi khang pa brtsegs pa/
sprin gyis kun nas khebs par byin gyis brlab pa dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad me tog gi khang pa brtsigs pa'i win gyis kun nas khebs par byin gyis brlab/
dpa dang / 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam shums cad rin po che'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i sngon gyis kun nas lebs par byin gyis brlab pa dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams rab
'byam thams cad rdo rje'i khang pa brtsigs pa'i sprin gyis kun nas khebs par byin gyis brlab pa dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byim thams cad gsar gyi khang pa brtsigs pa'i sprin gyis kun
nas khengs par byin gyis brlab pa dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams rab 'byam thams cad gos kyi lang pa btsugs pa'i sprin gyis kun nas legs par byin gyis brlab pa dar 'jig rten
gyi khams rab 'khyam thams cad paro'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i sbyin gyis kun nas khebs par kun gyis brlab pa byed rung/ mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na ba der lhags nas/ bcom
ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste 'khor dang bcas pas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas byang dang shar gyi phyogs mtshams su 'artan te/ nor bu rin po che'i khang pa 'dzugs pa sgo chos kyi
dbyings thams cad la mngon par lta ba dang/ seng ge 'i khri rin po che'i rgyal po sos mtshungs pa med pa'i ra rlo'i snying po can dag na ngon par sprul nas ri'i po che'i rgyal po'i sgom tog gi dra
yongs su brgyan pa dang/ rin po che'i rgyal po mdzod sna tshogs kyi dro kha'i cod pan bcings pa'ikhyong chub sems dpa'i lus su byin gyis brlabs nas/ skyil mo krung bcas te
'khod do// shar dang lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshosangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rtul shin tu phra ba stod kyi pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams sos kyi
sprin bkod pa'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa klu dbang rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/ byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi 'or 'phro ba dang ldan pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba/
byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyad dang lhan cig tu/ bcom ldan 'das des gnang nas 'khoragyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtshor nas
'phags ta/ nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gsar gyi kha dog lta bu'i sbyin gyis kun tu khyab pa bya ba dang/ nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad rin po tsho kha dog
mtha' yas pa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gyis kun tu khyab par bya ba dang/ nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzod spu'i kha dog gi 'od kyi rakyil 'khor
gya sen gyis kun tu khyab par bya ba dang/ nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad rin po che sna tshogs kyi kha dog lta bu'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi snyan gyis kun tu khyab par bya ba dang/ nam
mkha'i dbyings thams cad pad+mo'i snying po'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gyis kun tu khyab par bya ba rung/ nam mkha'i dbyings thams car nor bu'i rgyal po rin po che'i shing gi yal
tu// ga'i dkyil 'khor lta bu'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gyis rgyun tu khyab par bya ba dang/ nam mkha' dbyares thams cad de bzhin gshegs pa'i gtsug tor lta
bu'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gyis kun tu khyab par bya ba dang/ nam mkha'i dbyinges thoms cadra 'dzam bu'i chu klung gi gser gyi 'dog lta bu'i bod kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gyis kun
tu khyab par bya ba dang/ nam mkha'i dbyangs thams can nyi ma'i kha dog lta bu'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sman gyis kun tu khyab par bya ba dang/ nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad zla ba
dar [0f10 ]skar ma'i tshogs kyi kha dog lta bu'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin gyis kun tu khyab par byed cing/ mi mdzod kyi 'jig rten kyi khamam gang na ba der lhags nas/ ba com ldan
'das gang na ba der deng ste 'khor dngobacas pas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nasashar dang lho'i phyogs mtshams su brtan te/ rin po che rdul dang bral zhing rnam par snang ba phun
sum tshogs pa'i ma tog gi khang pa brtsegs pa dang/ sang grwa'i khri rin po che sang ge rdo rje'i paro'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul nas nor bu'i rgyal po rin po cha'i 'od zer rab tu 'bar/
ba'i rwa bas yong su brgyan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus su byin gyis brlabs nas/ skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod do/// lho dang nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig
rten gyi khams rgya ma tsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shan tu phra ba snyad kyi pha rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che' ma' rab tu snang pa'i snying po zhes bya ba/ da bzhin
gshegs pa chos kyi 'khor lo'i ye shes kun tu snang ba'i rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/ byang chub sems dpa' bdud kyi 'khor thams cad rnam par 'khyor ba'i ye shes rgyal mtshan
zhes bya kha/ byang chub sems dapa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho brjod du med pa'i rdul kon tu phra ba ba snyad dang lhan cig tu/ bcom ldan 'das des gnangunas 'khor gyi
dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho de nas 'babs te/ ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas me tog 'od 'phro ba'i snyan nam mkha'i dbyings ltar yangs pa rab tu dgye ba dang/ ba spu'i bu ga thams cad
nas rol mo 'od 'phro ba'i sprin nam mkha' ltar yangs pa rab tu dbye ba dang/ bsku'i bu ga thams cad nas nor bu rin po che 'od 'phro ba'i spyir nam mkha' dbyings ltar yangs
pa rab tu dgye ba dang/ ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas rin po che'i gas 'od 'phro la sos dang bdug spos sna tshogs kyis rnam par bdugs pa'i sprin nam mkha'i dbyings ltar
yangs pa rab tu dgye ba dang/ ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas rgyus rnam par sprul pa'i glog 'od 'phro ba'i sprin nam mkha'i dbyings ltar yangs pa rab tu dbye ba dang/ ba spu'i bu ga
[WT j]thams cad nas nor bu rin po che rnam par snang ba'od 'phro ba'i sprin nam mkha'i dbyings ltar yangs pa rab tu dgye ba dang/ bsku'i bu ga thams cad nas nor bu rin po

che gsar rab tu 'bar ba 'od 'phro ba'i sprin nam mkha'i dbyings ltar yangs pa rab tu dbye ba dang/ ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas rin po che'i rgyal po dpal gyi snying po 'khar ba 'od 'phro ba'i sprin nam

mkha' dbyings ltar yadra pa rab tu dbye ba dang/ ba spu'i bu ga thams can nas nor bu rin po che de bzhin gshegs pa'i dgongs ba rgya mtsho ltar dus gsum gyi rgyud rab tu snang ba'i tshul dang ldan pa 'od 'phro ba'i sprin nam

mkha'i na byings ltar yangs pa rab tu dbye ba byed cing/ mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi kham gang na ba der lhags nas/bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong sku 'khor dang bcas pas/ bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal

'a nas dang nub kyi phyogs mtshams su ba rtan te/ nor bu rin pa che chen po 'od zer gyi ra ba phyogs kun tu mngon par gzhol ba'i thig les chos kyi dbyings thams cad du rab tu snang ba' 'ang pa 'dzugs pa dang

seng ge 'i wa nor bu rin po che spos kyi sgron ma'i 'od 'phro ba'i pad+mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul nas/ rin po che'i rgyal po ra ma mar pa'i snying po'i rba bas yongs su brgyan pa dang/ rin po che'i rgyal po
sems can thamasar rab tu 'dzud pa'i dbyangs dang ldan pa'i cod pan bcings pa'i byang chub se mas dpa'ilus su byin gyis brlabs nas/skyol mo krung bcas te 'khod do/ nub dang byang gi phyogs

mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul in tu phra ba snyed kyi la rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par snang mdzad kyi snying po zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa dpal/
gyi ri bo kun rnam par snang ba'i rgyal bo'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/ byang chub sems dpa'o rnam par snang ba'i smon lam yes nas dpal zhes bya ba/byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rtan gyi khams rgya mtsho

brjod du med pa'i rdul shan tu phra ba snyad dang lhan cig tu/ bcom ldan 'das des gnang nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho de nas 'phags te mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po thams car dang/ laspu'i sgo thams
can dang/ lus thams cad nas dus gsum du gshegs pa'i ri bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku gzugs brnyan gyi sprin kun tu dbye ba dang/ mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po thams cad rang/ ba spu'i sgo
thams cad dang// lus thams cad nas nus gsum du byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi lus kyi gzugs brnyan gyi sprin kun tu dgye ba dang/ mtshan dang dpa byad bzang po thams can dang/ baspu'i
sgo thams can dang/ lus thams cad nas nus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor lus kyi gzugs brnyan gyi spen kun tu rabye ba dang/ mtshan dang dpa
byar bzang po thams cad dang/ ba spu'i sgo thams can dang/ lus thams cad nas dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sprul pa'i tshogs kyi gzugs brnyan mang po'i sprin
kun tu dbye ba dang/ mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po thams cad dang/ ba spu'i sgo thams cad dang/ lus thams cad nas nus gsum du gshegs ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams

cad kyi sngon gyi sbyor ba'i gzugs brnyan mang po'i sen kun tu dgye pa dang/ mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po thams cad dang/ ba spu'i sgo thams cad dang/ lus thams cad nas dus gsum du byung ba'i nyan thos
dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi lus kyi gzugs brnyan rab tu rakye ba dang/ mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po thams cad dang de kha rgyu ni sgo thams cad dang/ lus thams cad nas rus gsum du gshegs/

pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po byang chub dang/ byang chub kyi shing gi gzugs kyi gzugs brnyan kyi sprin kun tu dbye ba dang/ mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po thams cad dang/ ba spu'i sgo tham
rud dang/ lus thams cad nas dus gsum du gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i gzugs brnyan mang po'i sprin kun tu dgye ba dang/ mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po thams cad dab

ba spu'i sgo thams cad dang/ lus thams cad nas dus gsum du byung ba'i 'jig rten gyi dbang po zams cad kyi lus kyi gzugs brnyan gyi sman kun tu dbye ba dang/ mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po thams cad dang/

bsdu'i sgo thams cad dang/ lus thams cad nas dus gsum du khyung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dog pa thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan gyi sbyin kun tu dbye bsad cig skad cig tu nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad
rgyas par 'gangs shing/ mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na ba der lhags nas/bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste 'khor dang bcas pas bcom ldan 'das la phyag 'tshal nas nub dang byang gi phyog

mtshams su brtan te/ rin po che'i rgyal po phyog kun nas rnam par snang ba'i snying po'i sar ge khri rin po ma'agro ba rnam par snang ba'i pad+mo'i snying po can dag mngon par sprul nas/ mu tig 'od thug pa med pa'i dra bas
yongs su brgyan pa dang/ rini ba 'od kun tu snang ba'i cod pan bcings pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus su byin gyis brlabs nas/ skyil mo krung bcas te 'khod do// 'og gi phyogs

kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyad kyi la rol gyi 'jig rten gyi khams de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par snang ba zhes
bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes nam mkha' lta bur chags pa med pa'i dpal gyi rgyal mtshan rgyal po'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/ byang chub sems dpa' bsgribs pa thams cad rnam par 'thor ba'i
ma shas kyis rnam par gnon pa zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyad dang lhan cig tu/ bcom ldan 'das des gnang nas 'khor gyi

dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho de nas 'phags te/ ba spu'i khu ga thoms car nas 'gro ba thams cad kyi skad dang/ skadang/ rabyangs dang/ nges pa'i tshig mngon par bsgrubs pargya mtsho rab tu brjod pa dang/ dus gsum gyi
@#// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad 'byang ba'i tshul rgya mtsho'i sprin gyi 'brug sgra rab tu khasag pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam mngon par bslab pa'i tshul rgya mtshos/

dbyangs rab tu bsgug pa dang byang chub sems dpa' thams nyid kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa yongs su rdzogs par bya ba'i tshul rgya mtsho'i sprin gyis rab tu bsgrig pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'

thams cad kyi spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor zhing thams cad du rgyas par 'gangs pa'i tshul rgya mtsho'i dbyangs rab tu bsgrig pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi yang dag par bsgrub pa dang rnam par 'phrul pa'i

tshul rgya mtsho'i dbyangs rab tu bsgrig pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad byang chub pa'i snying por gshegs pa dang/ bdud kyi dkrug ma rnam par 'ther ba dang/ byang chub pa'i snying por rnam par 'tshang rgya

ba dang rnam par 'phrul pa mdzad pa'i dbyangs rgya mtsho rab tu bsgrig pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams can kyi chos kyi 'khorale bskor ba dang/ mdo sde'i tshul dang/ ming rgya mtsho'i dbyangs kyi sprin gyi 'brug sgra sgrag

padod 'gro ba 'dul ba thams cad dus la bab pa'i 'khor las 'dul ba'i chos kyi tshul dang thabs kyi sgra rab tu bsgrig pa dang/ ye shes thams cad khong du chud par bya ba'i phyir smon lam ji ltar btab pa dang
dge ba'i rtsa ba'i khyar par dang 2 nus rar/ thabs dang/ chos kyi tshul rgya mtsho'i dbyangs rab tu bsgrig pa byed cing/ mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na ba der lhags nas/bcom ldan 'das gang
0 ka kha der dong ste 'khor dang bcas pas/ bcom ldan 'dasal phyag 'tshal nas 'og gi phyogs su brtan to/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gzhal med khang gzugs brnyan du 'ab tu snang/

kha'i bzhi po che sna tshogs thams cad kyi mdzod kyi khang pa brtsegs kha dang/ sang ga' khri rin po chu thams cad kyi gzugs kyi pad+mo'i snying po can yongs su gzung ba dag mngon par sprul nas/rin po che'i snying
po byang chub thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan rnapo tu snang ba'i rgyal mtshan gyi cod banamago la bcings pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i lus su byin gyis brlabs nas/skyil mo krung bcas te 'khed do//

stang gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod ru chen pa'i rdulangashin tu phra ba snyad kyi la rol gyi 'jig rten gyi 'ams sangs rgyas kyi rigs mi zin pa shin tu ston pa zhes bya ba//

de bzhin gshegs pa ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor kun tu snang ba'i dbyangs kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing nas/ byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings kyi smon lam gyi gzhi rab tu rtag pa zhes chu ba/ byang chub sems dka'

'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho brjod du med pa'i rdul shan tu phra ba sen dang lhan cig tu/ bcom ldan 'das des gnang nas 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho de nas 'phags te/ mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po thams cad
dang/ ba spu'i sgo thams cad dang/ lus thams cad dang/ yan lag dang nying lag thams cad dang/ tshig gi lam thams can dang/ gos dang smad g.yogs thams cad nas/ byang chub sems pa'i
'khor thams cad dang/ bdag dang/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzod dang/ sngon gyi mtha'i mur thug pa'i da khazhin gshegs pa 'das pa thams cad dang/ phyi ma'i mtha'i mu
shug pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa lung bstan pa dang/ lung ma bstan pa ma byon pa thams cad dang/ da ltar byung ba phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rab 'byam thams cad n bzhugs pa rnams kyi sngon spyi

ba'i pha rol tu phyin pa mdzad pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho dang/ len pa dang/ sbyin pa'i dngos po thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan mtshan dang dpe byad bzung lo dang/ ba spu'i sgo dang lus thams
cad dang/ yan lag dang/ nying lag dang/ tshig gi lam dang/ gos dang/ smad g.yogs thams cad la rab tu snang bar gyur par rnam par bstan pa dang/ tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad dang

ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho dag kyang rab tu snang bar yongs su bstan pa dang/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa yano lag dang nying lag thams cad 'thub pa rab tu bstan pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor

ba rgya mtsho rab tu snang bar gyur pa yongs su bstan pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi brtson 'grus dang/ drag shul dang/ rnam par gnon pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor pa rgya mtsho rab tu srung

bar gyur pa yongs su bstan pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bsam gtan rgya mtsho yongs su tshol zhing rab tu bsgrub pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho rab tu snang bar gyur pa yongs su
bstan pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i tshul yongs su bsgrub cing chos yongs su tshol ba dang ldan pa dang/ bdog pa thams cad yongs su gtang zhange/ shin tu
zhi non pa'i lus dang/ ngo'i gzugs brnyan rnam par dmigs par bya bas sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho rab tu snang bar gyur pa yongasasu bstan pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong zhing dga' ba/

dang byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi lam la 'gro ba thams cad mngon par mos par byed pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho rab tu snang bar gyur pa yongs su bstan pa dang/ byang chub sems

dpa' thams cad kyi stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rab tu grub pa dang/ rnam par mnan pa dang/ rnam par dag par byas pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho rab tu snang bar gyur pa yongs su bstan

pa dang/ chos kyi dbyangs rgya mtsho chen po rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad kyi sbren gyis rgyas par bkang ste/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya
mtsho rab tu snang bar gyur pa yongs su bstan pa khyed rung/ mi mjed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams gang na ba der lhags nas/bcom ldan 'das gang na ba der dong ste 'khor dang bcas pas/ bcom ldan

'das la phyag 'tshal nas steng gi phyogs su khartan te/ rdo rje'i dbang po sna tshogs thams cad kyi rgyan gyi snying po can gyi khang pa brtsigs pa dang/ sang ga'i khri rdo rje dad in+d+ra nI la'i pad+mo'i snyed
po can dag mngon par sprul nas nor bu'i rgyal po rin po che thams cad rab tu 'bar ba'i kun nas brgyan pa dang/ zhe po che'i rgyal po nus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshan
dbyings su sgrog pa'i 'phreng ba rab tu 'phyur ba dang/ mgo la rin po che'i cod pan thogs pa'i khyad chub sems dpa' lus su byin gyis brlabs nas/ skye mo krung bcas te 'khor do/
bam po brgyud cu bdun pa/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag thams cad kyang 'khor dang bcas par/ byung chub sems dpa' kun tu
rgyu bzang po'i spyod pa dang/ smon lam gyis byung ba/ da pazhin gsheg pa thams cad kyi zhabs kyi drung nas nyal du lta ba/ ye bas yongs su dag pa'i mig dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams

cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo dang mdo sde'i tshul gyi gsung rgya mtsho la rna ba yongs su gzhol ba/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dbang rab tu thob par bya ba dang/ pha rol tu phyin pa'i mchog thob pa/
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cud kyi drung du 'dong ste/skadacig skad cig tu yongs su bstan par rnam par 'phrul pas byung kha/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad lus gcig gis rnam par dgang ba'i
yul dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du lus mngon par 'byung zhing rnam par snang bo/ rdul shin tu phra ba gcig la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi khams
ma gcig tu snang zhing khongs su chud par yang dag par ston pa'i yul dang ldan pa/ 'gro ba thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang/ gdul ba'i dus la sdod par gzhol ba/ de bzhin gshags pa/
thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo'i smin gyi 'jug smra ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas rab tu sgrog pa'i yul dang ldan pa/ sems can gyi khams thams cad sgyu ma lta bur yongs su shes pa rab
tu thol la/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mig yor lta bur khong du chud pa/ srid pa'i rgyud du skye ba thams cad rmi lam lta bur shes pas byung ba/ las dang+go rnam par smin pa thams cad gakhrugA
brnyan lta bur shes pas rnam par dag pa/ yo shes mngon par grub pa thams cad smig rgyu lta bu'i mngon par shes pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'byamags pa thams car sprul pa lta bur khong du chud pa
de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu dang ye shes kyi snang ba rab tu thob pa/ mi 'jigs pa'i khyu mchog dang seng ge 'i nga ros rnam par gnon pa/ tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa/ ma zad pa'i rgya mtsho
zhugs pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi skar rgya mtsho nang chos kyi nges ba'i tshig gi ye shes rab tu thob pa/ chos kyi dbyings dang nam mkha' ltar chags pa med pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul dang ldan la/
chos thams cad la bsgri'os pa med pa'i ye shes rab tu thob pa/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi mngon par shes pa la ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa/ bdud kyi dkyil
'khor thams cad rnam par dag pa'i brtson 'grus dang ldan pa/ dus gsum thams cad shes pa'i stobs la rab tu gnas pa/chos thams cad la ye shes bsgribs pa med pa rab tu thob/
ba gnas med pas nam mkha'i spyod yul dang ldan pa/ thams car mkhyen pa' sa len pa med pa/ nam mkha' lta bu'i brtson 'grus dang ldan pa/ srid pa thams cad ma dmigs pa'i ya
shes kyi spyod yul can chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi tshul rgya mtsho la rab tu zhugs pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad bla ma dar pa'i ye shes kyi sgor zhugs pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams thamA
cad gcig nas gcig tu gzud pa'i rnam par 'phrul pas byang ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud thams cad du skyes pa'i lus longs su ston pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams khyod kyi dbyibs

lnga ba dang/ rgya che ba dang/ yangs pa dang/ deg pa sna tshogs rab tu rtogs pa/ shin tu phra bar rgya chen po yang dag par gzud pa she ring du chud pa/ dmages pa rgya chen po shin tu phra bar shes pa dang
ldan pa// sangs rgyas thams cad dang sems kyi skad cig la 'grogs pa rab tu thob pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi mi 'osakyi lus dang ldan pa/ phyogs rgya mtsho thams cad du
mgo rmongs pa med pa'i ye shes rab tu thob pa/ sems kyi skad cig gis phyogs rgya mtsho thams cad du rnam par 'phrul pas rgyas par 'gengs pa sha stag ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i

byin gyi rlabs kyis de lta bu'i yon tan tshad med pa dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dma' sha stag gis 'dze ta'i tshal thams cad yongs su rgyas par gyur kyang/ nyan thos chen po shA ri'i bu dang/ mo'u 'gal
gyi bu dang/ 'od srungs chen po dang/ nam gru dang/ rab 'byor dang/ 'gag med dung/ mos pa dang/ ka ta'i bu dang/ byams gang gi bu la sogs pas 'dze ta'i tshal na 'khor bzhin du/ re bzhin gshegs
pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa de dag ma mthong ngo// sangs rgyas kyi bkon pa re rag dang/ sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog gi mthu dang/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par rol pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi cho 'phrul rar
sangs rgyas kyimanga' chen po dang sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa'i rnam par sprul pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs dang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa'i ng ma
mthong ngo/ byang chub sems pa'i yul lasam gyis mi khyab pa de dag dang/ byang chub sams dpa' kun nas 'ongs pa dang/ byang chub sams dpa' kun nas 'dus pa dang/
byang chub sems dpa' kun nas tshogs pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' nye bar 'ongs pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' rnam par 'phrul pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i cho 'phrul dang/ byang chub
sems dpa' 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i phyogs su 'khor pa rang/ byang chub sems dpau0f09sang ga'i khri bkod pa rang/ byang chub sa mas dpa'i khang pa dang byang chub
[7]@#// sams dpa'i rnam par spyod pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par rtsa ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par lta ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par blta/
pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par gnon pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa mchod pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i lung pa stan pa dang/ byang chub soms dpa' yongs su smib+he
bar gyur par ng/ byang chub sams dpa'i sngon du 'dor ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi lus rnam par dag pa rang/ byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi lus yongs su rdzogs pa rang/ byang chub
sems dpa'i smon lam gyi lus rnam par dmigs pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i gzugs kyi lus yongs su grub pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i mtshan phun sum tshig pa yongs su dag pa rang byang chub sems/

nupa'i 'od kyi dkyil 'khor kha dog ma tha' yas pa'i bkod pa rang/ byang chub sems dpa' 'od zer gyi dra ba rab tu 'gyur pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i sprul pa'i sprin kun tu 'gyed pa rang/ byang chub sems dpa'i
phyogs kyi ru ba rgyas par 'gengs pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rakyil 'khor rnam par sprul pa'i ng ma mthong nge/ de ci'i phyir zhe na/ rag ba'i rtswa ba mi mtshungs pa'i phyir te//
de dag gis ni sngon sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa mthong ba'i rgyur 'gyur ba'i dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bsags so// de dag la ni sngon sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'aras rnams kyis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten
gyi khams su gtogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi yon tan dang rgyan yongs su dag pa yang dag par bstan la ma mdzad do// de dag la ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams kyis sangs//

rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa yang dag par brjod pa ma mdzar ro// de dag gis ni sngon 'khor ba na 'khor ba'i tshe/ sems can rnams bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par basal
ba ma byas so// de dag gis ni gzhan gyi sams kyi rgyud la byang chub tu sams bskyed pa rab tu bzhag pa ma byas so/ de dag gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i gdung rgyun mi 'chad pa'i phyir
zhugs pa ma yin no// de dag gis ni sems can thams cad yongs su bsdu ba'i phyir brtson pa ma yin no/ de dag gis ni byang chub sams dpa' rnams pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par bskul
ba ma byas so// rta rag gis ni sngon 'khor ba na 'khor ba'i tsho/ 'gro ba thams cad las khyadapar du 'phags pa'i ye shes kyis la dmigs ma ma byas so// de dag du gas ni thams car mkhyen pa nyid du
'gyur ba'i rage ba'i rtsa ba nye bar bsags pa ma byas so// de dag gis ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su ma bsgrubs so// de rag gis ni sangs
rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa thams cad du rnam par 'phrul pa'i mngon par shes pa khong dum chur ro// de dag gis ni byang chub sems dang 'i mig galam gyis rnam par dmigs par bya ba 'jig rten/
las 'das pa thun mong ma yin pa'i byang chub tu dmags pa'i dag ba'i rtsa ba byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam chen pa las byung pa khong du chud do// nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kun
gyis ni byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzad pa ba ngashes kyi mig gi lam gyis rnam par dmigs pa thun mong ma yin pa/ de bzhin gshegs po'i byin gyi rlabs las byung pa'i sgyu ma'i rnam pa'i tshes
nyid kyis grub pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'du shes sna tshogs yongs su 'dzin pa byin gyis rlabs pa/ byang chub sems dpa' dab2 nga'i shul gas[︽]sha pa rnam par 'phel bar byed pa bod du mchud
de[;]de bas na nyan thos chen po mchog gi zung dang/ bklad de 'i zung la sogs pa de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pi rnam par 'phrul pa de ma mthong ngo// mi shes se/ mi shes so//
khed dum chud de// ma rtogs so// mi rag go/ dam chos so ma sems sa// rnam par ma lta'o// rtogs par me lta'o// des par mi lta'o// shu bar mi sems sa// de nyi'i
phyir zhe na/ de ni sangs rgyas kyi phyed yul te/ nyan thos kyi spyod yul ma yin na// da dasan nyan rjes chen po de dag 'dze ta'i tshal da nyade na ba khod kyang/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa
! de dag me mthong ste/ de dag la do dang mthun pa'i dge ba'i rdo ba yod do// de dag gas sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa de dag mthad du/ de lta bu'i ye shes kyi mig rnam par ma dag ge/
0/ dmigs pa chud dul rgya chen pa'i byon gyi rlabs kyis 'jug tu tang de 'dzani de lta bu med de// de dag shes pa dang lta ba 'am/ khong du chud par bya ba'am/ rtogs par bya ba 'am/ rgyas par dad bar/
bya ba 'am/ 'jug par bya ba 'am/ rnam par blta ba 'am/ nyams su myong bar bya ba bam/ gnan pa 'am/ rnam par gnon pa 'am/ gzhan gyis thes par bya ba 'am/bstan par bya po 'am
skyes par bya ba bam/ yang dag par bstan par bya ba dam/ bstabs par bya ba 'am// sbyin par bya ba kham/ de la sems can rnams yongs su bskul bar bya ba bam/ sbyar bar bya ba 'am

rab tudagod par bya ba 'am/sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i tshes nyade la sems can dged par bya bar yang de dag la de lta bu'i rnam par thar pa med do//de lta bu'i rdzu 'phrul med de//de lta bu'i
mchog gi mthu med de// de lta bu stobs med do// de lta bu'i dbang med do// de lta bu ba gnas med do/ de lta bu 'adu shes med do// de lta bu'i mig gi mthumed do// de lta bu'i ye shes med do//

da pa'i phyire zhin/ de dag ni de ltar nyan thos kyi thog pas byung ba la nyan thos kyi ldem se yongs su grub pa/nyan thos kyi spyod pa'i dkyile 'khyer yongs su rdzogs pa nyan thos kyi 'bras bu la gnas pa
bden pa snang ba shes pas des par rtogs pa// yang dag pad mtha' la gnas pa shan tu zhi ba'i mthar thug ngo/ sAde rje chen po'i bsam pa med pa/'jig rten thams cad la mi lta ma sded pa/
@#// rang gi don grub pa dag ste/de dag ni ba dze ta'i tshal de nyid du kun nas 'dus te la khod la/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga dang/ g.yas g.yon dang snaman/ bcom ldan 'das la mngosho du
lta bar gnas kyang/ 'dzota'i tshal der sa das rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa nge dag mthong bar ma gyur to// de ci'i phyir zhen/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes pa yang dag pa'i ma bsgrubs
ba dang/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yang dag par ma bsdus pa dang/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la yang dag par ma zhugs pa dang/ thams cad mkhyen nga ba ye shes la smon lam yang dag ba
ma btab pa dang/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mngon par ma bsgrubs pa dang/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes yongasasu ma bsgoms pa dang// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes ma sbyangs pa de

dag gisazhi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa de la 'jug cing rtogs par bya ba 'am/ blta zhing khong du chud par bya bar mi nus so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de'i byang chub sems
dbab rigs dang ldan pa rnams kyi mig gi lam gyis blta ba yin gyi/ nyan thosakyi mig gis blta ba ma yin no// de bas na nyan thos chen po de dag 'dze ta'i tshal de nyid na 'khod kyang/ de bzhin gshegs
! ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi skabs dang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' kun nas 'dus pa'i ng mthong ba'i ma gyur to/
yang 'di lta ste/ dpar na gang+gA'i chu klung chen po'i dogs pa rol tshurol tu yi dgas bkres pa dang skom pas rab tu mna' ba/ gcer ba/ gos med pa/ lus kyi mdog dang kha dog tshig cing 'chums pa

dang rlung dang rtims bskams pa// bya rog mang pos gtse// sbrang khyi dang zas mtho btsam pa brgya stong mang po kun nas 'dus kyang/ gang+ga'i chu klung chen po mi ma thong ste/ sgrib pa'i las kyis bsgribs/
ba'i phyir/ la lasa'i bskams te chu mad par mthong ngo// la lasazhi thal bas yongs su gang bar mthong ngo// de bzhin du nyan thos chen po gnas brtan de dag 'dze ta'i tshal de nyid na 'khod kyang/
thams cad mkhyen pa de dang ma mthun pa'i phyogs ma rig pa'i lange tog gis mig kun nas khebs pa dang/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba'i mthus yongs su ma bzung ba'i phyir/
de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam pa la 'phrul pa de dag ma mthong ma shes so// 'di ltaste/ dper na 'dun ma chen po 'dus ba'i skye bo mang po'i dbus su mi la la zhig gnyid kyis myos te log par gyur
nas dag nyid kyi sa log pa'i rmi lam du gnas de nyidan lca'i grong rdal brgya byin gyi gnas bstan mdzes pa dang/ 'dabakyi stong shing dang bcas pa/ bza' shing gi ra ba'i 'khor dang bcas pa//

lha'i bu mo bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gis gang ba/ lha'i bu khrag khrig brgya phrag stong snyed gnas pa/ lha'i me tog sna tshogs kyis yongs su gang ba dang/ yid bzhin gyi shing lha rdzas kyi gos dang/ mu
wa @#// tig gi 'phreng ba dang/ rin po che'i rgyan dang/ sa mo do sna tshogs mang bo 'byin pa dang/ lha rdzas kyi sil snyan rnam pa sna tshogs rlung gis yongs su bskyod cing/ sgra dbyangs yid du/

khong la snyan ba 'byin pa'i sil snyan gyi shing mang bo dang/ dga' ba'i rtsed mo'i bkod pa rnam pa stsatshogs mthong bar gyur la/ lha'i bu mo mang pos glu blangs pa dang/ lhardzas kyi rol mo byas pa'i sgra yid

( du 'ong zhing snyan pa thos par gyur to/ bdag nyid kyang de na 'dug pa snyam byed la/ lha rdzas kyi bkod pas klubs pa'i gnas de dag thams cad mthong bor gyur kyang// skye bo'i tshogs mang po de dag gis

gnas de nyid na ba khod bzhin du mi mthong mi shes khong du mi chud do// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ da na skyes bu gnyis kyis logapa de nyid kyi rmi lam gyis blta ba yin gyi/ gnas de nyid na 'khod kyar skye bo mang po de
dag gis blta ba ma yin no/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang/ 'jig rten gyi dbang po byang chub la mngon par mos pa de dgasangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabasargya chen po dang/ 'ang gi dag
ba'i rtsa ba'i stobasama'o bar shin tu bsags pa dang/ thams cad mkhyen panyid du smon lam shin tu mngon par bsgrubs pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan thams cad la shin tu zhugs pa dang/
byang chub sems dpa'i lam bkod pa chen po dang ldan pa la shine tu gnas pa dang/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shesakyi chos nyid dang/ yan lag rnam pa thams cad du shin tu rdzogs pa dang/ byang chub sems

bzhi/ dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i khyad par dang/ smon lam yongs su rdzogs par bya ba rnam par dag pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa thams cad kyi ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su non pa dang/ byang chub
sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par sbyod pa thams cad la rnam par rtse pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul thams cad la chags pa med par rnam par sbyong pas/ bsam gyis

mi khyabapa'i sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchogagi mthu phyung ba de dag dang/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par rol pa de dag mthong zhing khong du chud pa nyams su myor bar gyur kyang/ nyan thos chen po mchog gi gzung
dang bzang po'i zung la sogs pa de dag la byung chub sems dpa'i mig med pas mthong bar ma grub shes par ma gyur to// 'di lta ste/ dper na ri'i rgyal po khab can sman gyi 'byung gnas kyis

gang ba la/ sngags dang/ rig sngags dang/ sman gyi tshul dang/ blang ba'i rgyus shesangashing/ rig sngags grub pa'i skyes bu gnas pa/ sman gyi rnyog thams cad shes pa// smar blang ba'i las byed kyang/
ri bo'i dbang po de nyid la gnas pa'i phyugs dang/ ba glang dang/ ra lug 'tsho ba dang/ rngon pa dang/ de ma yin pa'i mi sman gyi tshul mi shes pa gzhan dag gis sman de dag gi cho ga dang/ snyan
gyi ro dang/ mthu dang/ yon tan dang/ byin dang/ thabs dang/ 'phrong pa mi shesaso// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes kyi yul la zhugs pa// byang chub sems
dpa'i rnam bar 'phrul pa'i yul gyis byung ba de dag gis/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi ma bar 'phrul pa'i yul de dag mthong yang/ nyan thos chen po mchog gi zung
dang bzang po'i zung la sogs ba rang gi dgos pas tshim par gyur pa/ gzhan gyi dgos pa yal bar gzhog ba/ btang snyoms can de dag 'dze ta'i tshal de nyid na gnas kyang// tshe 'di la bde ba
spyod pas bde zhing dga' bar gnas pa las/ phar de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i yul de dag khong du mi chud do// 'di lta ste/ dper nas chen po rin po che thams cad
kyi babyung gnas phun sum tshogs ba/ gter brgya stong du mas gang ba// rin po che sna tshogs rnamapa tha dad pas yongs su gang ba 'di la'ang rin po che'i 'byung gnas dang/ gter gyi rgyus la mkhas shi
byang ba'i mi/ rin po che brtag pa'i gtsug lag gi blo shan tu byang ba/ gter gyi gtsug lag dang/ rgyus dang/ dag rtags gya nom par khobs pa// bsod nams rgya chen po'i stobs kyis
zla brtan pa dag/ de las rin po che ci 'dod par blangs shing bdag kyang yongs su tshim par byed/ pha dang ma la'ang legs nga 'a rim gro byed/ bu pho sos kyang legs par gso bar byed cing/ de ma
yin pa'i sems can na ba dang/ na ba dang/ dbul ba dang/ nyam nyes pa dang/ kha zas dang/ gos kyis mi 'byor pa rnams la btud cing khyab par bgongasha'abyed pa/ nor gyi dga' ba sna tshogs
nyams su myong bar byed kyang/ sams cad rin po che'i 'byung gnas dang/ gter gyi rgyusami shes pa// bsod nams ma byas pa// rin po che la shes pa'i mig yongs su ma dag ba/ de dag de nyid

na 'khod kyang/ rin po che'i 'byung gnas de dag dang/ rin po che'i gter de dag khong du mi chud mi shes nga sa/ bzhi po che'ang blang du med do// rin po che'i don kyang byar zhe da do// de bzhin du byang chub
sems dang ba de bzhin gshegs pa 'i yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa la ye shes kyi mig shin tu rnam nga ra dag pa/ de nga zhin gshegs pa'i yi shes kyi yul ngas ma gyis mi khyab pa la zhugs pa de

dag 'dze ta'i tshal na 'khod cing/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam pa ra 'phrul pa de dag mthong la/ chos kyi tshul rgya ma tsho la 'jug cing/ ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya yongs su sgrubaste/ ngo bzhi'i gshegs pa'i mchod pa/

dang nim gro la brtson zhing/ dam pa'i chos yongs su gzung ba la mngon par ba rtsog te/ bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis sems can de dag yongs su snga da kyang/ nyan thos chen po de dag gis de nga zhin gshegs
pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa de dag dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po kun nas 'dus pa de lta bu 'ang ma mthong ma shes so// bde lta ste/ dper na skyes bu la la zhig mig gnyis ngo gos kyis bka'

ste zhi po che'i gling du phyin par gyur na/ des rin po che'i gling der phan tshun 'gro ba dang/ 'greng ba dang/ 'dug pa dang/ nyal ba byas kyang sngon bo che'i 'byung gnas de mi mthong ngo// ri'i po che'i shing dang/
[r] ]@#// gos kyi mi bo che dang/ spos kyi zhe po che dang rin po che thams cad kyang mi mthod la/ zhi bo che de dag gi spyod yul lam/ shi thang ma/ yongs su spyad nga 'i rgyus
kyang mi shes pas/ de ni rin po che de dag len kyang mi len la/ rin po che'i deb kyang nyams su myong bar mi byed do// gang gi mig la bsgribs pa mad pa de dag gis ni de dag thams cad mthong zhing
shes so// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa' chos rin po che'i gling chen por phyin pa de dag gis/ blan med pa'idi bzhin gshegs pa 'ge po che 'jig rten thams cad kyi rgyan du gyur ba mngon
du gyur to// 'dze ta'i tshal na bzhugs shing/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs suston pa mthong yang/ nyan thos chen po de dag de bzhin gshegs pa'i

zhabs kyi drung de nyid na gnas shing spyod kyang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi yul rnam par 'phrul pa'i cho 'phrul de dag ma mthong ngo// byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs mang po de lta bu'i ril

po che'i 'byung gnas chen po'ang mthong bar ma gyur to// de ci'i phyir zhen/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi khyu mchog ga mthu phyung ba dang/ cho 'phrul bsam gyis mi khyab pa de dag bltab thams
cad mkhyen pa nyid dang mi mthun pa'i phyogs kyi ma rig pa'i gos kyis ye shes kyi mig bkab pa de dag la/ byang chub sems dpa'i sengashes kyi mig yongs su dag pa de lta bu madado/ de dag gis chos kyi

bgyis gcig nas gcig tubargyad bal bajug ba de lta bu khong du ma chud do// 'di lta ste/ dper na mig khongs sudag pa rdul dang bral bas rab tu snang ba dang ldan pa zhes bya ba rab rib dang/ mun pa thams
cad dang mi 'grogs pa yod de/ de ma la la zhig gis thob par gyur na/ da rdul dang bral bas rab tu snang ba dang ldan pa'i mig yongs su dag pa dang ldan pas mtshan mo mun pa'i mun nag shin tu gnag

bar gyur pa'i nang// sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong kun nas 'dus pa dang/ chog dang/ spyod lam rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan zhing/ mun pa'i rab rib gyis mig yongasasu 'khrigs pa'i grub pa'i mi'i

khrod na 'dug cing rnam par rgyu la phan tshun 'gro ba dang/ 'greng ba dang/ spyod lama rnam pa sna tshogs kyis spyod kyang/ mi de dag gis skyes bu spyod lam sna tshogs kyis spyod pa de mi mthong mi shes so// skyes
khu des ni 'gro ba'i tshogs chen po spyod lam dang chog sna tshogs kyis rnam par sbyod pa/ phyogs tha dad du mngon par bltas ba/ dbyibs kyi rnam pa tha dad pa/ kha dog gi rnam pa lnga dang// dmigs
pa'i tshul tha dad pa rnams cad kyang mi mthong ba med do// de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa byang chung sems dpa'i tshogs kyi 'khob mnga' kha/ rnam par dag cing chags pa ma mnga' ba'i spyan dang
ldan pas 'jig rten thams cad mkhyen cing gzigs te/ sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang cho 'phrul chen po bstan pa mdzad kyang de nyan thos chen po de dag gis de wan+ti
gshegs pa'i ye shes dang/ ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par sprul pa'i cho 'phrul chen po de dag mthong bar ma gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' chen po'i tshogs chen po de lta bu 'ang
mthong bar ma gyur to// 'di lta ste/ dper na dge slong la la zhig skye bo mang po'i tshogs kyi dbus su sgras khyab pa'i ting nge 'dzi la snyoms par zhugs sam/chus khyab pa kham/ mas khyab pa 'am/
rlung gis khyab pa 'am/ sngon pos khyab pa 'am/ sor pos khyab pa'i m/ dmar pos khyab pa 'am/ dka' pos khyab pa 'am/ lhas khyab pa 'am/ sems can sna tshogs kyi lus kyis khyab pa'i m/

sgra dang dbyangs kun gyis khyab pa kham/ dmigs pa thams cad kyis khyab pa'i ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par zhugs na 'gro ba mang po'i tshogs de dag gis chu'i phung po de mi mthong ngo// me'i snang ba de'ang mi
mthong ngo// sems can sna tshogs kyi lus kyis khyab pa dang/ dmigs pa thams cad kyis khyab pa'i bar du'ang ma mthong ste/ ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs shiT rnam pa ba sbyod pa rnams ni ma
gtogasaso// de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pas sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi yul gyi rnam pa'i sbal pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa de dag yongs su bstan la mdzad na/ nyan thos chen po de dag gis mthong
zhing shes bar ma gyur te/ byang chub sems dapa' de bzhin gshegs pa'i lam la zhugs pa de dag gis ni ji bzhin gshegs pa'i yul de dag mthong ngo// khong du chud do// 'di lta ste/

[d]/ dper na sku ba grub pa'i mi ni mig gnyis bskas ma thagatu/ skye bo mang po thams cad kyis lus mi mthong ngo// des na 'gro kham/ 'dug gam/ 'grong yang rung ste/ skye bo mang po thams rur mthong ngo/
de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig rten las 'das pa// 'gro ba thams cad kyi yul sa yongs su 'dus pa// thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shesakyi yu la du zhugs pa// byang chub sems dpa'i
ye shes kyi mig gi shes nga 'bya ba des 'gro ba thams cad gzigs kyang/ nyan thos chen po de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam nga ba 'bral pa de dag mam thong ngo// 'di lta ste// rang ba ni
mi'i tshul khagrogs pa'i lha rtagatu rjes su 'brang bzhi des ma mthong yang/ mis lha de mi mthong ngo// de bzhin du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi yul la bzhugs pa/ byang chub
sems dpa'i tshogs kun nas 'dus pa chen po'i dbus susangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa chen po yongs sur stan pa mdzad kyang/ nyan thos chen po de dag gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul
pa dang/ cho 'phrul chen po dang/ byang chub goms par 'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi rnam pa la 'phrul pa de dag kyang ma mthong ma shes so// 'di lta sta/ dpar na ngag slong sems can thams
cad la dbang gi pa 'ol tu phyin pa'i mchog thob pa/ 'du shes dang tshor ba 'gog pa la snyoms par zhugs pa'i/ shes pa med la chos nga med ngas dang nga po drug gis kyang bya ba gang yang nyams su
mi myong ste mya ngan las 'das pa'i ng ma yin la/ 'jig rten gyi rnam par spyod pa thams cad gnas de na yod kyang/ snyoms par zhugs pa de nyid kyi byin gyi rlabs dang mthu des
gishes mi mthong ngo// de bzhin du nyan thos chen po de dag 'dze ta'i tshul de na'ang rnam par sbyor la/ do dag la dbang po drug kyang yod de/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin dang/ rnam par 'bul/
ba dang/ lca mchog gi mthu phyung ba dang/ cho 'phrul de dag mthong bar ma gyur/ khong du chud par ma gyur/ shes par ma gyur to// byang chub sems dpa'i cho 'phrulachen po de dag nga/ byang chub

sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa de dag kyang khong du ma chud ma mthong ma shes so// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ sangs rgyas kyi yulani zab cing ya ngas la tshad med de/ blta bar dka' zhing rtogs par dka' ste/
khong du chud par dka' la/ 'jig rten thams cad las yongs su 'das pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi yul ni bsam gyis mi khyab pa lta/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis ma 'dus pa'o// de

bsan nyan thos chen po de dag 'dze ta'i tshal de nyid sku 'khod cing/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabasakyi drung na spyod kyang/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa de dag dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs chen po re
dag kyang ma mthong ngo// 'dze ta'i tshal 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa rnam par dag pa'i yon tan dang/ bkod pa yongs su 'dus pa de'ang ma mthong ma shes te da de ni
snod du ma gyur pa'i phyir ro/// de nas byang chub sems dpa' rnam par snang mdzad kyi smon lam gyi gtsug gi cod rjes rab tu snang bas/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis de'i tshatshe//
su bcad pa 'ang ngag saso// ltos shikasems can dam pa yi// sangs rgyas byang chub bsam mi khyab// rgyal bas sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul pa// 'dze ta'i rgyal mtshan 'dir bstan to// rang byung
rnams kyi byin gyi rlabs bgrang du med par 'byung ba la// sangs rgyas chos tshul mi shes pa'i// 'jig rten kun kyang mgo rmongs so// chos kyi rgyal po'i cho 'phrul dag/ tshar med bsam
gyis mi khyab cing// shin tu zab pa 'byung ba ni// de la 'jig rten 'bab mi nus// rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kha jog mdog/ mtshan gyis shAn tu rnam par klubs// yang dag sangs rgyas bskyed
pa yi[;]chos rab de dag mtshon teng mong// rnam 'phrul mtha' dang dbus med pa// tshig gi lam gyis brjod dka' ba'i/ rnam 'phrul shin tu zab po dag/ rgyal bas 'dze'i tshul du bstan
rgyal srasabangag nyung che ba'i rnams// zhing rnams bsam yas bye bas// rgyal ba'i bal ltar mos dga' ste// kun nas 'dus pa'i tshogs la ltos// smon lam yongs su phun sum tshogs//
spyod lam spyod pa chags med pa// de dag bsam pa shes pas ni// 'jig rten kun gyis mi nus so// de dgasems dang rdzong yul dang// spyod pa dag kyang nyan thos dang// rang rgyal thams cad
yongs kyis kyang// rnam pa kun tu shes mi nus// rgyal sras shes rab chen po'i rnams// gzhan gyis thub dka' tham med la// dpa' ba'i rgyal mtshan ma 'dres shing//
yoshes sa la gzhol gyur pa// ting 'dzin dpag tu tshad med pa// grags chen mnyam par bzhag pa rnams// chos dbyings thams cad rgyas bkang zhing// rnam par 'phrul pa kun kyang ston//
de nas byang chub sems dpa' thub par dka' ba'i brtson 'grus kyi shugs kyi rgyal pos/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bam rnam par bltas sa/ de'i tshitshogs
klu subacad pa 'di dag nas so// bsod nams snying po shes rab che// byang chub spyod pa'i tshul rtogs shing// 'jig rten kun la bde byed pa'i// bde gshegs sku las skyes pa ltos//
yid gzhungs blo gros mtha' yas shing// shin tu mnyam gzhagasams ldan pa// mtho' dang dbus med zab pa yi// ye shes rgya chen spyod yul can// rgyan 'bamang pos mdzes byas pa'i//
zla 'dze ta'i nags tshal rgya che ba// byang chub sems dpa' kun rgyas shing// bde gshegs bzhugs pa'i gnas gyur pa'i// gnas mad mi gnas gyur ba'i rnams// phyogs rnams bcud kun 'dus
te[;]pad+mo'i stan la 'khod pa dag/ rgyu mtsho mang la lta bgyis// gnas mad len pa med pa'i rnams// spros pa med rung me rten la// rdul bral chags pa'i sems med pa// chos kyi dbyings la
ka zhol ba dang// ye shes rgyal mchon rab dpa' ba// rdo rje'isams ni mi g.yo zhing// sgrub pa med pa'i chos rnams la// mya ngan 'da' bar gang ston pa// phyogs bcu'i zhing mang bye ba'i rnams//
grangs kyis mi chod kun nas 'dus// yang dag sangs rgyas drung du lcags// gnyis kyi bdupags rnam par sbyangs// rang byung shAkya seng ge yi// rnam par 'phrul pa 'di dag mthong// de yi byin/
rlabs dam pa yis// byang chub sems dpa' 'di dag lhags/ sangs rgyas chos la 'byed pa mad// chos dbyings gzhi la'ang de bzhin te// stong pa tsam du yongs 'byed pa'i// pha bol
phyin pa rgyal ba'i sras// chos kyi dbyings la ngabyer med pa'i// mtha' la thug pa de dag gnas// tshig rnams yongs su zad mad pas// chos la dbye ba'ang rang tu byed/
degs byang chub sems dpa' dpal kun nas 'phags pa'igazi brjid rgyal pos/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshatshigasasu bcad pa 'di dag snasaso//
ltosashigasems can dam pa yi// yashes dkyil 'khor shin tu yangs// dus dang dus min mkhyen mdzad cing// sems can rnams la chos kyang ston// mustags ldan pa'i tshogs 'dus pa'i//
rgol ba thams cad rab tu 'joms// sems can bsam pa ji bzhin du// rnam par 'phrul pa yongs su ston// phyogs na mi bzhugs bde gshegs rnams// sangs rgyas yul gyi rjesame bzhung//
tshad med pa dang tshad yod las// thub pa chen po 'das pa mni// nyin mabab las 'gro ba ni// nyin par bgrangs pa skyes pa byed// de bzhin mkhyen pas mkhas sten pa///
dus gsum chags pa med pas brjod// zla ba nya ba'i mtshan ma la// zla ba'i dkyil 'khor 'phags par snang// de bzhin sa dkar yongs rdzogs pa'i// mgon po rnams kyang mthong ba yin//
bar snang nam mkha'i dbyings 'di las// khyim 'i dkyil 'khor ba ni// gar yang thegos pa med par 'gro// sangs rgyas rnam 'dul de bzhin no// ji ltar nam mkha' phyogs rnams kyi//
zhade rnanas kushul mi gnas pa// de bzhi 'jig rten sgron ma yi// sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul shes par bya// ji ltar sa ni 'juge ston na// lus can kun gyi gnas yin pas//'jig rten skrun
ma'i 'jig rten na// chos kyi 'khor la de ltar gnas// ji ltar rlung 'chags med par// mkha' la mgyogs par rab rgyu pa// de bzhin sangs rgyas tshes nyid kyang// 'jig rten khams su rab tu
rgyu ji ltar chu yi phung po la// zhudi rnams bgrungs pa kun gnas pa/ 'dra bzhi dus gsum sangs rgyas kyad// ya shas tshogs la rab tu gnas// danas byung chub bam
dpa' dpal gyi snyid po chags pa med pa'i rgyal pos/ sadas rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshigs su bcud 'di dag smras so// ji ltar rdo ri'i ri rab khragi/
brang yag shani tumathe yod pa// de ltar 'jig rten kun skyeb pa'i// sangs rgyas mngon par 'phags pas mtho// ji ltar rgya mtsho'i chuchan dag/ tshad med rog pa med pa ltar// sangs rgyas
mthed ba'ang de bzhin te// 'jig rten kun gyi sgem pa gcod/ mtsho'i chu las 'phags pa yi// ri bo ri rab kyi 'dra bar// de bzhin 'jig rten sgronam yang// chos kyi mtsho las ma par/
'phags/ rin chen kun gyi 'byung gnas kyis// rgya mtsho rgyas pa ji bzhin du// rang byung ma shes de bzhes te/ mi zad skad cig rab tu mkhyen// mgon po'i ja shes shin tu zab// tshad med de
bzhin bgrang du med// de bas sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul pa// bsam gyis mi khyab tshad med steno// skya ma'amtshan nyid spen pa yi// sgyu mkhan mkhas pa ci 'dra ba// de ltar sangs rgyas mkhyen
dbang yang// rnam par 'phrul pa rab tu sten/ yod bzhin nor bu rnam dag pa// bsam don rdzogs byed ji lta ba// de bzhin ngasam pa dag pa la/ rgyal ba smon lam rdzogs pa mdzad// 'od snang
gsal ba byed pa yi// rin chen rnam snang ji lta ba// de ltar thams cad mkhyen dag pa// 'gro pa'i bsam pa gsal bar mdzad// ji ltar phyogs la mngon lta ba'i// rin chen zur brgyad rab gas/
ba da pazhane chags med sgrib ma yang// chos dbyings rang tu snang ba mdzad/ chu'adang ran chen 'od gsal ba// ji ltar dri med chu 'dang byed// de bzhin sangs rgyus mdo bas kyang/ 'gro
[©]/ ba'i dbang po dag bar 'gyur/// de nas byang chub sems dpa' ches kyi dbudas su smon lam rab tu 'phrul pa'i zla dge rgyal pos/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi
rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ de'i rtsa tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras sa// phyogs 'di an nI la yis// kha deg mdeg gcig bus pa ltar// sangs rgyas magleng bas skye dgu
rnams// de bzhin byang chub na dag tu 'gyur// sangs rgyas rdul phran re re la/ rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs rnams// tshad kyis gzhal du med pa ston// byang chub sems dpa' rnam dag mdzad//
dan rmad byung shan tu thob// mtha' yas bsgrub pa dka' ba ste// blo ldan pa shas yul de la/ 'jig rten rnams ni 'bab mi nus// byang chub sems dpa' bsgrub don du// ngakod pa phun
sum tshogs pa dang// sangs rgyas tshul gyis rnam spungs pa'i// ches kyi dbyings la 'jug pa ston// sangs rgyas phung rnams bsam yas pa// blo ldan bstar ba'i sangs rgyas kyis// kun
nas gang bar gyur pa yang// rgyal ba de la ston pa mdzad// chos kun mnga' sgyur sten pa ste// shAkya'i khyu mchog skyes par gyur// de yi tsho 'phrul srid med pa// 'di dag rab tu byung ba yin//
brtan pa'i sred pa sna tshogs rnams// tshad med rnam par gzigs gyur nas/ rnam par 'phrul pa mtha' yas pa// tshad med gzi can sten pa mdzad// 'jig rten mgon po rgyal sras rnams// chos kyi
dbyangs la sleb pa mdzad// chos rnams thams cad yongs la yang// chags med mi shes spyod yul 'gyur// skyes bu'i dbang pa'i byin rlabs kyis// mo 'phrul brgya dang rab ldan zhang// 'jig
lta thams cad rnam sbyong ba'i// chos kyi 'khor lo rab tu bskyed// sems can gtse ngo bo de yul la yang// las dkyil 'khor yongs sbyangs shing// shes rab chen po'i klu chen rnams// 'jig
rten thams cad 'grel par 'gyur// de nas byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi don gyi blo gros gzi brjid rgyal pas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bunur rnam par/
bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag skyas sa// drad srid dam pa'i mchog rnams kyi// dus gsum nyan thos gang byung ba// da dag kun gyis bde gshegs kyi// gshegs thabs
'jog 'dags mi shes so// dus gsum ma lus thams cad kyi// mnor rang rgyal gad byed ba// de dag gas kyang mgon pa yi// gshags thabs 'jog 'a dgas mi rig go/ ma ragi mun
pas bsgribs pa rnams// mya ltar stod la brgyus pa yi// sems can de 'dra kun gyisani// man pa ma shes smos ma dges// rgyal ba tshad mas gzhal ba man// de shes par mi nus te// sangs
rgyas chags med ye shes can// tshig gi lam las shan tu 'das// zla ba nya rgyus 'od mang ba// brtan pa mtshan gyis rnam par bas// de ni de skal pa dpag yas par// rnam 'phrul bregs
/ @#// med spyod pa mdzad/ de tshul sger des sangs rgyas la// shin tu mnyam gzhag bsams byas kyang// bskal pa bye ba bsam pas pa// brjod du med pa zad 'gyur gyi/
rang byung rnams kyi yon tan las/ phyogs gcigecha pi mthar mi phyin// sangs rgyas de yi zhal bltas kyang// sangs rgyas chos n bsam mi khyab// gang zhig de la smon byed cing// gang zhige
yid kyis dga' mos pa// de dag kun kyang de 'dra ba'i// spyod yul blta dka' 'thob par 'gyur// bsod nams mi shes mtha' pasashang// tshogs chen pa des pas rnam gnon la// dri med
blo ldan sems gnas pa// de dag 'di yi tshul la 'jug/ de dag smon lam rgya che bas// sams dang sdom pa rgya chu ste// rgyal ba'i spyod yul thob gyur cing// byang chub rgya chan gnon par 'gyur/
de nas byang chub sems dang 'a bdud kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par 'thor ba'i yi shes rgyal mtshan gyi rgyal po/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te
glu de'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag skyas sa// chags med pa shes sku mnga' bas// bsam yas 'dis yul mnga' bas/ 'di dag bsam par ma nus so// 'phrin las dkar de bsam
yas pas// sangs rgyas sku rang bskyabs pa'i phyir// de la 'jig rten gsum me 'go/ mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos mdzes// chos kyi dbyings kyis ma sbyangs pas// 'jig
na kun tu snang ba mdzad// sangs rgyas byang chub sgo yin te// ka shes kun gyi gnas chen ni// chags pa thams cad rnam spungs pas1 ]jul da spres pa mu mnga' 'o/ shes 'od zer rab
brgyad pas/ 'jig rten na tu nyi ma 'dra// khams gsum thams cad rnam spyod pas// srid pa'i 'jigs pa rnam par gcod/ byang chub sems dpa' sgrub pa mdzad// byang chub
'byung gnas de bzhin no// kha dgo mtha' yas stan mdzad kyang// kha dog kun la gnas pa med// sems can kun gyis bsam yas pa'o// kha dag tshad med yongs su ston// skad cig
gtsage la sangs rgyus kyis// byang chub bsam ya/sa sbyangs pas na// de yi ye shes mthar phyin par// brtag par sus kyang ma nus so// zhishes brtan pa zad nashes// rang bzhin
rnam par 'gyur ba med// de la dus gsum rgyal ba kun M// skad cig gcig gis rab tu brjod// rtag par las gzhan yongs btang ste// shes ldan byang chub don gnyer bas// sems
la las shes bya bar yang// de la sems skye med par bsam// gang gis sangs rgyas bskyed pa yi// sangs rgyas chos rnams bsam mi khyab// dadag brjod pa'i yul ma yin//
ka'an tuzab nga sa tshig lam spangs// de nas byang chub sems dpa' rnam par snang mdzad kyi snyan lam dpal gyi rgyal mtshan gyis// sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs/
[c]// banur rnam par bltas te/ da ni tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag snas ste// dran pa rmongs med dag pa'i rnams// rjes 'dzin shin tu nges rtogs shing// blo gros bsam
gyis mi khyab la// byang chub rgyalatshomi zad pa// de dag yid ni 'di la nges// de dag srid pa'i sdud yul dang ni// de dag shes pa 'dir ma ga so// de dag 'di la thatsam 'chad// de dag skye bar/
dam 'gyur te// de dag yid kyang zhum ma'agyur// ga ngas rgyas chos la rab gzhol bar// de dag sems kyang rab tu 'byang// da dag dad pa rtang tshugs shang// yang dag 'phags pa rab tu
skya dmigs med gnas pa med pa yi// yashes 'di la de dag dga'// bskal pa bye bar bsags pa yi// rongs su rdzogs pa dag ba'i ches/ 'phashes 'di 'dod mtshungs med pa//dadag
thugs nyid yongs su bsde// 'khor ba'i nang na rnam rgyu dang// 'khor ba dag la gnas pa yi// sangs rgyas sa rnams rab rtogs pas// sangs rgyas yul la rab tu nye// sems can khams
sgyu na ji snyed du/ 'jig rten phun sum tshogs rgyung// de dag thams cad partan pas sngangs// sangs rgyas phun sum tshogs la gnas// sa ngas rgyas rtag tu 'byung gyur kyang// 'jig rten don med
a rab tu gnas// chags med spyod pa de dag ni// rtag tu sems can don la gnas// de dag spyod pa mtshungs med de// lus can kun gyis bsam mi khyab//'jig rten ngad pa kun gnas pas/
de dag sdug bsngal rnam par bzlog/ 'jig rten kun la snyid brtse zhang// byang chub pa shes rnam dag pas// de dag 'jig rten snang bar gyur// 'jig rten thams cad rab tu 'grel/
da nas byang chub san sa dang 'a sgrub pa mas cad rnam par 'thor pa rgyal pas/ ga ngas rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis phyogs bskur rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshatshigs su bcad pa 'di
dag smras so// bskal pa bye ba phrag brgyar yang// sangs rgyas sgra na rab dken/ rtsom thams cad gcod pa yi// dam pa mthong ba ci zhig skyes// chos kun thugs su chud rtog pa// 'jig rten
gsum pa'i bsed nas stegs// sems can thams cad rnam sbyong ba'i// 'jig rten sgron ma mdzad gses dga'// sems can gtso bo mi smad pa'i// gzugs kyi sku na mthed gyur na//
bskal pa bye ba khrag khrag tu// ngems shade tsham pa skyer ma btub dmi yi dbang po'i sku gzugs la// rgyal ba'i sras rnams lta lta zhade// rang ga dag ba chags med pa// gzhan don brtson
pa byang chub bsngo// thub pa chen po'i gzugs kyi sku// de las tha dad yang dag shes// chags med shes 'byung 'gyur bas// de ni sangs rgyas byang chub se// sems can bsam yas tshad med pa//

snang bar mdzad de theg chen la// btsud nas thub pa chen po'i mchog/ byang nub dam par lud yang ste/// bsod nams chen pa'i rang bzhin zhing// yashas dkyil 'khor shar nyid byang//'jig rten tshad med kun
tu snang// bsed nams phud pa rnam 'phel mdzad// sdug bsngal du ba rab tu gcod// ye shes phung po rnam par sbyong// gang gis rgyal ba bsnyen bkur ba// de dag don
sado 'jigs pa med// rkangaganyis dam pa mthod gyur na// shan tu yangs pa'i sems skye ste// 'od snang gsal ba'i shes ba mthu/ /grangs med pa yang skye bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas skyes bu'i
mchog mthong zhing// byang chub dam par nges par 'gyur// de bzhin gshegs par 'gyur bya zhes// de dag kun kyang nges par sems// de nas byang chub sems dpa' ches kyi dpyad
kyi smon lam gyi gzhi rab tu rtogs pas/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis de ba tsha tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so// yon tan mtha' yas phun ldan pa// shAkya'i khyu mchog thub mgrod nas//
yodas su sde ba byed pa'i sems// theg pa rtsa la rnam par dag/ sems can kun gyi don gyi phyir// thugs rjechamanga' brtan pa'i rnams// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ni dzad pa// de bzhin gsheg
pa 'byung bar 'gyur// bskal pa khrag khrig phrag brgyar yang// sems can don la brtson mdzad pa'i// sangs rgyas rnams la lus can rnams// kun gyis lan bran cis kyang nus// ngan sod
gsume po ma ba zad par// bskal pa bye bar bcos bla yi// chags pa thams cad zlog mdzad pa'i/ ston pa mi mthong ma yin// sems can kun gyi rgyud rnams na// sdug bsngal phud po ca
yod pa// ma lus nyams su bzod nus kyi// sangs rgyas ma mthong ma yin no// 'jig rten 'di dag thams cad na// tha dad ngan sad rgyud yod pa// de dag yun ring gnas bla yi// sangs
rgyas mi shes ma yin no// sems can dma' ba re re dang// bskal pa tshad med bdunas bla yi// mthun pas rgyal bas brtas pa yi byang chub mchog las rang gnas na ni// ci zhig phur
dan sa da du// yun ring gnas pas 'dod don// rgyal ba'i dbang po mthong ba ni// yoshes 'phel ba'i rgyur 'gyur phyir// rgyal ba 'jig rtena mchog mthong na// sdug bsngal thams cad 'chad par
'gyur// rtogs pa'i sangs rgyas spyod yul gyi// ya shas khod du chud pa 'byung//sa ngas rgyas m yomarnyog mthong zhing// sgrub pa thams cad zad par 'gyur// byang chub gang gis 'thob pa
yi bsod nams tshad med 'phel bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas mthong bas sems can rnams// the tshom yid gnyis chad par 'gyur// 'jig rten 'das dang 'a jage rten gyi// bsam pa'i ng
yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur// de nas byang chub sems dang ba sums dang ba chen de kun tu bzung ngas// byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs nas cad la rnam par bltas te// de
bzhin gshegs pa'i ting nge 'dzin sa nga ga rnam par bsgrungs pa 'di nyed de bas kyang rnam par dbye ba dang/ rgyatshar brjod pa dang/ gsal bar bya ba dang/ rab tu brjod pa dang/ yang dag par
bstan pa dang/ shan tu snad bar bya ba dang/ rab tu gsal bar bya ba dang/ man ngag bstan pa'i phyir/ chos kyi dbyangs kyi tshul nam ma kha'i dbyangs dang mnyam pas dus gsum
mnyam pa nyid dang/ chos kyi dbyangs mnyam pa nyid dang/ sems can gyi khams mnyam pa nyid dang/ 'jage rten thams cad mnyam pa nyid dang/ las kyi rgyud thams cad mnyam pa nyid dang/ sems can gyi
bsam pa mnyam pa nyid dang/ mas can gyi mes pa mnyam pa nyade dang/ chos kyi snang ba mnyam pa3de dang/ sems can yongs su sman par bya pa'i dus mnyam pa nyid dang/ 'gro ba thams cad
dbang pa mnyam pa nyid kyi/da bzhan gshegs pa'i tang de 'dzin seng ge nas dar ba skyengs pa 'di nyid/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag la bstan pa'i tshul banus yang dag par rad tu ston
bcu gang zhen/ 'di lta ste/ chos kyi dpyades thams cad du gtegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shan tu phra ba rnams la/ sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa bstan pa dang/
'di lta ste/ nam mkha'i dbyangs kyis klas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du phyi ma'i mthub mur thug pa'i bskul par/ de bzhin gshags pa'i yon tan rjes su brjod pa bstan pa dang/
lo 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du de bzhan gshegs pa yongs su skye ba dang/ mtha' dang dbus med pa'i mngon par rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sgo rgya mtsho yongs su brjod de bstan
pa dang/ 'di lta ste/ rnam mkha'i dpunges kyis klas pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing ga de bzhin gshegs pa 'ben gyi dkyil 'khor kyi byang nub sems dpa'i dge 'dun snying po byang chub mngon du/
gyur pa'i gnas bstan pa dang/ 'di lta ste/ dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas kyi sku dang 'dra bar sprul pa/ ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas sems skad cig la rab tudagye zhing chos kyi dbyings rgyas par
dgang ba bstan pa dang/ 'di lta ste/ phyogs rgya mtsho thams cad du sangs rgyas kyi zhedirgya mtsho gzhi mnyam por byan gyis brlab cing/ lus gcig gis rgyas par dgang ba bstan pa dang/ 'di
lta ste/ dmas pa'i gzhi thams cad la sangs rgyas kyis rnam par sbal pa dus gsum thams cad yang dag par gzhol bar 'gyur ba'i byin gyi rlabs pad dag par bstan pa dang/ 'di lta ste/
zhade thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba rnams la dus gsum gyi zhing gcig nasaM gnag tu brgyud pa'i sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang/ bskal pa rgya mtsho yongs su bshad nadi bstan pa dang/
'di lta ste/ dus gsum gyi sangs rlus kyi smon lam rgya mtsho thams cad ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas rab tu brjod pa phyi ma'i mthar byan gyis brlab pas/ byang chub sems dpa' yang dag par
'byung ba bstan pa dang/ 'di lta ste/ rjes kyi dbyangs dang mnyam pa' seng ge 'i khri dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i bakhor gyi dkyil 'khor dad/ byang chub pa'i snyade po'i rgyan thami dad pa dang/
chos kyi 'khor le rnam pa tha dad pa rab tu bskor ba phyi ma'i mthar byin gyis brlab pa bstan pa'o// kyi rgyal ba'i sras de ltar seng ge rnam par bsgyunges pa'i tid de 'dzin 'di/
ma la bstan pa banu pa 'di dag la sogs pa ni tu bstan pa gangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed yod da/kyirgyal ba'i sras dang// dmed bzhin gshegs pa'i5 shes kyi spyod
yul 'a// de nas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzad pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa btang de 'dzin chen po seng ge rnam par baskyengs pa 'di nyid kyi den gyi phyogs bstan pa'i phyi'i
sangs rgyas kyi byan gyi rlabs kyis de bzhin gshags pa'i zhal du lta zhing/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtshothams cad la rnam par bltas nas/ sangs rgyus kyi yul bsam gyis mi khyab
pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i de de 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa mtha' dang dbus med pa la rnam par bltas te/ 'jig rtan gyi khams bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ra gzhal ba la
rnam par bltas nas/ phashas bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'i sgyu ma'i tshes nyade la rnam par bltas te/ dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas mnyan pa nyid bsam gyis mi khyab pa la rnam par bltas
nas mtha' dang dbus med pa'i ngag gi lam dang/ des pa'i tshig dong/ chos kyi tshul thams cad la rnam par bltas te/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras sa// ba spu gcig la
[. ]rgya mtsho rgyal ba'i zhing// zhad kun shani tu phra ba'i rdul dang mnyam// dan sangs rgyas byang chub sems dpa'i 'khar// kun gyis yongs bskor sangs rgyas gdan la bzhugs//
myu gcig rtse la zhing mang rgya mtsho rnams// snyade po byang chub pa'i gdan gnas pas/ tshes dbyangs rgya chen yongs su rgyus bkang zhing// shing drud dam pa kun n mgon po snang/ zhing
rnams kun gyi rdul phran rab mang skyed// rgyal ba snga rtsa gnyis la yongs bzhugs pa// byang chub sems dang ba 'khor gyis yongs su bskor// kun kyang bzung pa'i spyod pa ston pa mdzad//
zhade mchog gcig na rgyal ba bzhugs gyur kyang// byang chub sems dpa'i sngon mang ma khrid pa// de dag phyogs banu ma lus thams cad nas// rab 'byam zhing kun bkang zhing kun kyang 'ong//
zhing rnams bya ba'i rdul phran mnyam pa yi// byang chub sems dpa' yon tan rgya mtsho'od// phyogs bcu'i chos dbyangs rgyas par kun bkang zhing// sten pa de la kun kyang 'khor nas ldango/ [）]
zhing rnams kun tu gzugs brnyan rab tu sten// chos kyi rgyal po rgyal ba'i yishes mtsho// de dag kun kyang bzung pa'i spyod la gnas// sangs rgyas kun gyi 'khor du nye bar 'dang// rang
'byam zhang+ge rnams kun na dbed spyod cing// byang chub sems dpa'i dga' ba rab gnas te// chos kyi spra namanyan dpa' bo de dag ni// zhing gcig tu'ang bskal ba bye bar spyod byang chub
[©7 ]/sams dang ba sprad pa sred pa byed// chos kyi gang chen mtshospyod rnam par snang// sman lam rgya mtsho kun la rab tu'ajug/ de dag sangs rgyas sa yi spyod yul gnas/
rgyal ba'i chos rnams gzhan dang gzhan byang ba'o// de dag kun tu bazad pa'i sred pa nyes// sangs rgyas yon tan legs pa rgya mtsho dang// rnam par 'phrul pa rgya chen yangs la 'jug/ bder
gshegs chos dbyings kun tu rgyas bkang zhing/ dazhing rnams kun gyi rdul phran ji snyed pa// sku yi sngon rnams rtag tu 'byed mdzad rung// chos kyi myur gyis byang chub rab la 'god//
bam po brgyad cu rtsa brgyud pa// de nas bcom ldan 'das kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag sangs rgyas kyi ting nge 'dzan seng ge rnam par bskyed
pa 'di nyid la da ngas kyang brnan te dgad par mdzad pa'i don du skye mtshams kyamadzod pa'i nang nas/ chos kyi dbyings sgo kun nas rnam par dmigs pas dus gsum snang ba zhes bya ba'i 'od

zer chen po/ 'od zer gyi 'khor sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shan tu bu nga snyid dang ldan pa bkya ste/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtshothams cad kyi sa ngasargyas kyi zhing
'khyam klas pa thams cad snang bar mdzad de/ danas byang chub sems dpa' 'dze ta'i tshal du tshogs pa de dag gis/chos kyi dbyings thams cad du gtogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhinganam

mkha'i dbyings kyi mthas klas pa thams cad dang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra nga' khongs su chud pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba dag la/ sangs rgyas

kyi zhang gi ming du bya ba kha dog sna tshogs dang rnam pa sna tshogs su rnam par dag pa dang/ gzhi sna tshogs dang dbyibs sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing dag na/ byang chub sems dpa' snying pa
byang chub tu phyin teseng ge 'i khri la 'dug pa/ 'jig rten gyi dbang po thams cad kyis shin tu mchod pa// byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs kyis kun nas bskor ba/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i byang chub tu mngon par 'tshang rgya bar mthong ste/ la la nani sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa tsam du shin tu yangs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor na/ ches kyi dbyings rgyas par khyab pa'i
dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor gyis chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar mthong de// la la na lha'i gnas na 'dug/ la la na ni klu'i gnas na 'dug/ la lan ni gnod sbyin gyi gnas na 'dug/ la la na
ni lha yin gyi gnas na 'dug/ la la na nam mkha' lding gi gnas ni 'dug/ la la na ni ma 'am ru'i gnas na 'dug/ la la na na lto 'phye chen po'i gnas na 'dug/ la la nan
dbang po'i gnas na 'dug/ la la na ni mi'i 'jig rtan gyi gleng dang/ grong khyer dang/ grong rdal dad/ ljongs dad/ khams dang/ rgyal de'i pe blang 'khor dag rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs
gtam gyi skyes bu'i gaN+DisAn+tagyis 'jig rten gyi khams chos kyi dbyangs kyis klung ldan s/ phyogs kyi med du bya ba sna tshogs/ shar phyog
gcug// dang [0f10 ]smad las sna tshogs dang/ lus sna tshogs dang/ tade de 'dzan gyi sgo rnam par dmigs pa sna tshogs dang/ tidade ba dzazhe gyi mngon par shes pa sna tshogs dang/ rigs dang/

ma rgyud sna tshegs su byung ba dang/ kha dog rnam par dmigs pa sna tshogs dang/ bod kyi dkyil 'khor sna tshogs dang 1 'od zer gyi dra ba dgya ba sna tshogs dang/ dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor sna tshogs dang/

gotam gyi skyes bu'i gzhi sna tshogs dang/ bstan pa'i gzhi sna tshogs dang/ tshig dang/ yi ga dang/ nges pa'i tshig sna tshogs kyis 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor sna tshegs na chos ston pa mthod bar gyur to//
byang chub sems dpa' ji snyed kyis 'jig rtan gyi khams nyes kyi dbyangs kyis klas pa// nam mkha'i mthas gtugs pa// phyogs bdun rnam par gnas pa// phyogs kyi rgyud mtha' yas pa sa
'dus pa/ phyogs rgya mtsho thams cad du gtegs pa// chos sna tshogs kyi ske dang ldan pa/ phyogs kyi mde du bya ba sna tshogs su gtogs pa/ phyogs sna tshogs kun tu gzhol do//

phyogs cha rnam pa tha dad par gtogs pa/ phyogs sna tshogs kyi rjes su song ba/ phyogs rgya mtsho sna tshogs su gtogs pa// 'di lta ste/ shar phyogs dang/ lho phyogs dang nub phyogs dang / byang phyogs dang/ byang dang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang/ shar dang lho'i phyogs mtshams ra [） ]lho dang nub kyi phyogs mtshams dad/ nub dang byang gi phyogs mtshams dang/ ga dang

[z/ ]steng gi phyogs kyi zhade gi lhun gyi phyogs dang/ sems can gyi lus kyi phyogs dang/ sams nan rgya rkang du bya ba'i phyogs dang/ sngon gyi mtha'i mur thug pa'i phyogs dang/ phyogs bcud ltar byung
ba'i phyogs dang/ mamakha'i khedas thams cad du skra tsa lo shan tu phra ba dgod pas dmigs pa'i phyogs dang/ zhang thams cad kyi rdul la tu phra ba gtsa gnas gtsug tubargyud pa'i phyogs
la 'jug pa khod du chud par bya ba'i phyogs dang/ las kyi 'du byed sna tshogs kyis yongs su grub pa'i phyogs dang/ sku'i rtse mo gcig la mtha' dang dbus med pa'i nomamakha'i
dbyangs kyi mang du bya bar gtogs pa'i phyogs kyi khed duchud pa'i dus gsum gyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid du gzhol bas kun tu gatogs pa'i 'gro ba thams cad tha mi dad pas/ sen sa/
can thams cad kyi 'dur shes kyi rnam pa la mnyam pa'i sgra dbyangs su gyur pa sha 'gro ba thams cad thu ma dad pas/ sems can thums cad kyi 'du shes kyi rnam pa la mnyam pa'i sgra dbyangs su
gyur pa'i 'gro ba thams cad kyi sems la gzugs brnyan rab snang bar gyur pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sangs rgyas kyi de de 'dzani rnam par 'phrul pa/ sems can thams cad kyi lus la/
mgo par lta ba dmigs par bya bas 'khor gyi dkya'i 'khor thams cad du 'gro ba'i rdul dang ldan pa/bskal pa thams cad la yi shes thame dad pa zhade thams cad la kun tu snyoms pas/ gnas ni
[©]// gyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du gzugs mngon sum du bstan pa// rnam par dmags pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi ches thams
cad yang dag par bstan pas/ sems can thams cad dadul brgyun ma chad pa mthong bar gyur pa de dag thams cad ni/ sngon bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyis dge ba'i spyod ra skal ba
mnyam pa dang 2 bsdu ba'i dngos po gzhis yongs su bsdus pa mthong ba dang man pa dad rjes su dran pa dang/ bsnyen bkur bas yongs su sman par byas pa dag go/ sngon blo na med pa yang
dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed du btsud de dag go/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dang de dag gi drung du gshegs pa'i tshe/ dge ba'i rtsa bas yongs su bsdus pa/
tha dag ste/ de ltar dag ba'i rtsa ba skal ba mnyam pas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su smin par 'gyur ba'i thabs kyis shin tu bzung ba'i da re/ bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi tid
nga 'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa chos kyi dbyangs ltar yangs shade/nam mkha'i dbyings kyi na thas gtugs par gyur pa dag kyang mthud zhing khod du chud par gyur pa yin te/la la ni chos kyi sku la
'jug go/ la la ni gzugs kyi sku la 'jug go/ la lan sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa' yongs su bsgrub pa la 'jug go/ la lan pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs pa la 'jug go/ la lan spyod
pa'i dkyil 'khor yongs su dag pa'i rgyun la 'jug go/ la la ni byang chub sems dpa ba sa'i rnam par 'phrul pa la 'jug go/ la lan mAngan par byang chub pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa la 'jug go/ la la ni
sangs rgyas rnam par spyod pa'i ting nge 'dzin thami dad pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa la 'jug go/ la ldani de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs dang ma bstengs pa la 'jug go/ la la ni sangs rgyus kyi tha dadapa
yang dag par mkhyen pa rgya mtshe la 'jug ga/ de dag la sogs pa sangs rgyus kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtshosangs rgyas kyi zhade brjod du mad pa phrag banu'i rdul shan tu phra ba snyed
la 'jug ste/mes pa sna tshogs dang/ lam sna tshogs dang/ sgo sna tshogs dad/ 'jug pa sna tshogs dang/ 'bab pa sna tshogs dang/ tshul sna tshogs dang/ rjes su 'bad
ba sna tshogs dang/ phyogs sna tshogs dang/ snyedasna tshogs dang/ yul sna tshogs dang/ 'jig rten sna tshogs dang/ bod du chud pa sna tshogs dang/ tshogs sna tshogs dang/
rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs dang/ thabs sna tshogs dang/ tang 'dzani sna tshogs kyis sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho de dag la 'jug ge/ ting nge 'dzi sna
gos kyis 'jug pa 'di lta ste/byang chub sems dpa'i ting de 'dzin chos kyi dbyangs kun nas brgyan pa dang byang chub sems dpa'i tod de 'dzani dus gsum thams cad la thegos
pa med bar yul snang bar byed pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' de de 'dzani ches kyi dbyangs kyi gzhi tha dad pa'i sa shas snang ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i
tade de 'dzan de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul gyi dbyangs la 'jug pa dang/ byang chub sems dang ba ting nge 'dzani nam mkha'i dbyings su snang ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i ted de
'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu'atheb pas rnam par 'byed pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting de 'dzin sangs rgyas kyi bsnyangs pa ma mnga' ba'i rgyan gyis rnam par gnon/
cing rnam par bsgyings pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' dang de 'di chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul thams cad kyi glod gi snyad pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i tade de 'dzin chos kyi dbyades
thams cad du thegs pa med par sgra sgrog pas rgyas par 'gengs pa'i zla ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin ches kyi dbyingsum nyam pa nyid kyis rgyan pab byed kyis/ byang chub sems/
dpab de dag bcom ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho de dag la rab tu 'jug go/ byang chub sems dang da ting nge 'dzazhi chos kyi rgyal po'i thabs
chags pa med pa'i rgyal mtshan dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i tidi de 'dzan dmigs pa thams cad la sangs rgyas rgya mtsho rnam par lta ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'jig rten
gyi rgyud thams cad du thami dad pa'i lus snang ba rgyal mtshan dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku tha dad pa'i yul la 'jug pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i

tade de'adzan 'jig rtan thams cad kyi rgyud kyi rjes su 'jug pa snying rje'i stod pa can dang/ byang chub sems dang 'a ted de 'dzani ches thams cad kyi gnas la skyon pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang / byang chub
sems dang/ da de de 'dzin shin tuzhi la rab tu zha bas kun tu snang ba'i dkyil 'khor dang/ byang chub sems dpa' de de 'dzin sprul pa bzang po dmags su med pas kun tu 'phrul pa ba gzug
brnyan dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i tede de badzan khang thams cad yongs su 'du ba byin gyi rlabs dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i tad de 'dzani zhang thams cad du mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i rnam pa
ma'o par bsgrub pa dang/ byang chub sems dang ba de de 'dzan 'gro ba thams cad du dbang pa'i kha dog gas ma bar spyod pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i tang de 'dzin 'gro ba thams cad
