du khyad par du rigs pags pa'i dkyil 'khor chags pa med pas rnam par byed pa dang/ byang chub sams da pa'i re nge 'dzan da ba'an gshags pa thams cad skyed pa las byung pa'i byin gyi rlabs
dang / byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin yon tan rgya mtsho thams cad la zhon tan gyis 'jug pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dmags pa ma lus pa thams tsad du rnam par 'kha
pa mngon par bsgrubs pas phyi ma'i mthar phyin gyis rlob pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i tade de 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sten gyi sbyin brgya mtshol/

'jug pa dang/ byang chung sems dang 'i ting nge 'dzan ma ba mthar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs yang dag par 'dzad pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang/ byang chub sen sa dar di tang 'dzazhi phyogs nga nu'i

'ang rgya mtshe da ltar byung ba thams cad rengs su dag par mes nga'i byan gyin bs dang/ byang chub gnas dang pa tid de 'di sems kyi skad rug gcig la sangs rgyas thams cad dang rnam par spyod cade 'gro
pa dang/ byang chub sems dang setade de 'dzin dmigs pa thams cad la chags pa med pa'i mthar 'jug pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i tade de 'dzani 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing

gcig tu byan gyis slob ba dang/ byang chung sems dang da teng de 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad kyi skur 'khrul pa mngon par bsgrub pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dbang po rgya mtsho rdo rje'i dbang po lta bu

thams cad khed du chud pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting de 'dzan dang zhan gshegs pa thams cad sku gcig pa skung po'i byin gyin bs dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sems kyi skad cig gcig gi
cha la tshes kyi dbyangs kyi tshul thams cad khong du chud pas khom par gnas pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i tade de'adzani ches kyi dbanges thams cad du zhing 'byam klas pa bsgrub pa yongs su ston

pa' byan gyi rlabs dang/ byang chub sems dpa' dang de 'dzan spyi'u tshugs gzhi la rnam par sbed pa'i byin gyi rlabs dang/ byang chub sems dang 'o ted de 'dzan sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi sems/
na gyi 'u tha mi dad par byin gyis rlob pa dang/ byang chub sems dang 'i tad de'adzan yo shes kyi gleng thams cad la mngon sum duyang dag par g.yel ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin
chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin dang mtshan nyid yongs su shes pas rab tu 'byed pa drang/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzani dus gsum sems kyi skad nug la thum dad pa'i dkyil 'khor dang/
byang chub sems dar 'i tang de 'dzin sems kyi skad cig thams cad chos kyi dbyangs kyi tshul gyi rang bzhin dam pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzan de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
rigs kyi rjes su 'brang ba'iyishas kyis rnam par gan pa'i seng ge dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dmigs pa thams cad skyes kyi dbyings su shes pa'i lag gi dkyil 'khor dang/ byang nub
sems dang 'i tod de 'dzin stebs bsu'i rna la gyisa rnam par gnon pas yang dag par rtsom pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dmigs pa thams cud kun nas mthod bab mag gi dkyil
'kher dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting 'dza'i kha dog thams cad kyi dkya le 'kher gyis 'gro ba shani dumadzes pa mngon par bsgrub pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzan gong ma g.yo
ba' skade pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i tade de 'dzani chos gcig la chos thams cad yongs su 'du bar ston pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin tshes gcig gi tshig/
gi lam la nges pa'i deb gas tshag rab tu 'byed pas byang chub sems dpa' ra dag/ btsem ldan 'das rnam par snang mdzad kyi sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho dadag la
rab tu 'jug go/ byang chub sems dpa'i tade de 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rgyal mtshan gyi byin gyi rlabs kyis chos ston pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i tod de 'dzin dus gsum gyi tshul
mthar thug pa med pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' tade de 'dzin bskal pa thams cad khong du chud pas tha mi dad pa'i yaMshes dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i tade nge 'dzad tshul shin tu
ngas stabs dan khong du chud pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzan ma 'phrogs pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa bskral pa thams cad du mngon par bsgrub pa dang/ byang chub
sems dpa'i ting 'dzin phyogs thams cad kun tu shugs kyis mngon du 'char ba'i sprin dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzan mngon par 'tshang rgya ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa rnam
par bsgrub pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzani tshor ba thams cad kyis reg pa med pas bde ba'i rgyal mtshan dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzani rgya thams cad du mamakha'i
rgyanamaden par bsgrub pa dang/ byang chub sems dang ba de de 'dzin skadazhig la 'gro ba snyad kyi sprul pa'i gzugs brnyan gyi sngan mngon par bsgrub pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i tade nga
'dzan de bzhin gtogs pa'i zla ba'i 'od nam mkha' ltar rdul dang bral ba dang/ byang chub semase dpa'i ting nge 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad nam mkhar byin gyis rlob pa dang/ byang
chub sems dpa'i de de 'dzin ches thams cad la dbang po'i rgyun rab tu snang pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting de 'dzin chos thams cad kyi don rnam par 'byed pa'i sngon ma dang/ byang chub/
sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzan stabs bcu dkyil 'khor snang ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting de 'dzade dus gsum gyi sangs rgyas dpa' gyi rgyal mtshan dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i tade de
'dzani sangs rgyas thams cad gcig tung dres pa'i snying po dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzani skad cig skad cig la brtsams pa thams cad mthar phyin par byed pa dang/ byang chub sems
dpa'i ted de 'dzazhi bsod nams ma zad pa snyade po dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i tade de 'dzin sangs rgyas mtha' yas pa ma byed bab yul rab tu snang ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting de
'dza'i tshes thams cad la rdo rje'i seng ge ltar rab tu gnas pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzan de bzhi gshegs pa thams cad kyi sprul pa yongang su bstan pas kun tu rnam par dmagrwa
pa mngon par bsgrub pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' ted de 'dzin dpan gshegs pa thams cad kyis mnan pa'i nyi ma gnon pa dang/ byang nub sems dpa'i deng de
'dzani dus gsum gtsug tu sbyang ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' dang de 'dzani chos thams cad rang bzhin gyis rab tu zhi bar sgra dbyangs kun tu sgrogs pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge
'dzan sangs rgyas thams cad mthed de mtshams 'dzan pa dang [”]byung chub sa nas dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyangs ma lus pa thams cad kyi gnas kyi pad+mo'i tshal rab tu rgyas pa dang byang chub
pa sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gnas med pa'i tshes kyi nam mkha' la rnam par lta ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' u0f7a tade de 'dzin phyogs gtsaseg tu phugs bsu rgya mtsho yongs su sdud pa'i gling dang/
byang chub sems dpa'i tade de 'dzani ches kyi dbyings kyi gzhi thams cad kyi sgor 'jug pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i tade de 'dzani ches rgyu mtshe thams cad dang ldan pa dang/ byang chub sems
rang 'od de de 'dzin sems can thams cad 'od rab tu 'gyed pas rab tu zhi ba'i lus su 'a gyur ba dang 1 byang chub sems dang 'a tare de 'dzin sems kyi skad cig gcig la mngon par shes
pa dang/ smon lam thams cad mngon par bsgrub pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i todi nga 'dzani rtag par thams cad du kun nas mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i byin gyi rlungs dang/

byang chub sems dpa'i ting de 'dzani ches kyi dbyanges thams cad rgyan gcig tu khong du chud par 'jug pa dang/ byang chub sems dang 'a dang de 'dzani sangs rgyas thams cad dran pa'i rang bzhin gyis rab
tu snang ba dang/ byang chub sems dang 'a tade de ba dzan 'gro ba thams cad du khyad par chen po dang ldan pa u0f7a saangon par shes pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' dang de 'dzin sems kyi skad
cig gas rjes kyi dbyings kyi tshul mtha' yas pa rad ga lus kyase rgyas par 'gengs pa dang/ byang chub sams dpa'i ting nge 'dzin chos kyi dbyangs tshul gdug pas chos thams cad tshul
gcig par rnam par dgod pa'i 'od dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i tade de 'dzani sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi dkyil 'khor gyi ngo bor logazi brjid byin gyi rlabs dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i dang//

du 'dzazhi sems can gyi khams mga'aphrul lta bu yongs su bsdu ba' smon lam dang spyod pa byin gyis rlob pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' dang de 'dzani ches kyi gzhi thams cad tha mi dad ba dang/ byang chub
sems dpa'i tade nge 'dzan pad+mo'i byin rnam par 'phrul bas kun rnam par ganon pa dang byang chub sems dar 'i ting nge 'dzane ge mas can thams cad kyi lus kyi rgyud khed duchud pas mngon par shes pa
dang / byang chub sems dpa'i nyid de 'dzani lus sems can thams cad la mngon du byan gyis rlob pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzan sems can thams cad kyi dbyangs kyi
@// yan lag mtshor 'gro ba thams cad kyi skad yodas su 'byed pa'i tshul mdon par shes pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'gro ba'i gzhi tha dad pa thams cad khong du/

rnyed pas mngon par shes pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i tade de 'dza'i snying rje chen pa'i mdzod tha mi dad pa'i snying po dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas thams cad de da cha de nyid du
rtog sa pa'i maN+Dal la 'jug pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting de 'dzin de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par thar pa'i pho brad la rnam par lta bas seng ge rnam par bskyangs pa dang/
de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi lam la 'jug pa sangs rgyas kyi zhange brjod du med pa'i rdul shAn tu phra ba snyed kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' de dag de nga zhin
sa/ gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad kyi sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho de dag la rab tu 'jug go/ sems kyi skad cig re re la chos kyi dbyings thams cad du rgyas par
'gangs par 'jug pa'i tshul gyis sngon skal ba mnyam par spyad pa'i ng rjes su dran no// de ltar byang chub sems dpa' de dag 'dze ta'i tshal du phyin cang/ nganam

ba ldan 'das kyi spyan snga na 'khod pa/ seng ge 'i khri rin po che sna tshogs kyi pad+mo'i snying po can/ 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi 'di banu'i rdul shane tu phra ba snyed dang mnyam par yangs
pa 'khed pa// yashes dang mngon par shes pa chen po'i rnam par 'phrul pas byung ba/ yoshes dang mngon par shes pa rno ba dang ldan pa'i sa rjes su thob pa/ yi shes kyi kun tu rnam par
spyod pa// shes rab kyi 'byung gnas kyi rogs su byung// thams cad mkhyen pa'i yi shes la mngon du gyur pa/ yi shes kyi mag rab rib med pa dang ldan pa/ sems can gyi kha lo sgyur ba'i rang
bzhani thob pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam pa nyid kyi rjes su song ba/ rtag tu rnam par rtog pa med par chos la spyod pa// chos kyi dmigs pa thams cad rab tu rtogs pa// ches thams
cad rang bzhin gyis zhi bar dmigs pa/ 'jig rten thams cad ni tu zhi bas gnas tha dad pa med pa la rab tu gzhol ba/ 'jig rten tha dad pa thams cad du rab tu zhugs pa// gnas med par
zhade thams cad du 'dong ba/ chos kyi gnas thams cad la rtan pa med par chos thams cad byang du med pa'i gzhal med khang du phyin pa// 'gro ba thams chud yongs su smin par bya ba dang gdul ba la
zhugs pa/ sems can thams cad la bde ba'i lam ston pa// ye shes dang rnam par thar pa shan tu 'phags pa'i gnas kyi spyod yul can/ 'dod chags dang bral ba'i mthar phyin pa'i yashes
kyi lus dang ldan pa/ srid pa'i rgya mtsho thams cad las can du 'phags pa/ 'gro ba thams cad la yang dag pa'i mtha' rnam par ston pa/ chos rgya mtsho'i shes rab snang ba'i dkyil
'khor nyan/ tad de 'dzan gang chen mtsho dang ldan pa'i dbyangs la shan tu mnyam par bzhag cing snying rje chen porapa dus nus pa// chos kyi tshul sgyu ma'i rnam pa lta burab tu
rtags pa/'jig rten gyi khams thams cad la rmi lam lta bur zhugs pa// de bzhin bshegs pa mthong ba thams nadamag yor lta bur ngeng du chud pa/ sgra skad dang dbyangs thams cad sgra
brnyan lta bur rnam par rig pa/ chos thams cad mngon par sgrub pa'i yi shes sprul pa lta bur rab tu rtogs pa// khyad par du 'phags pa'i smon lam shin tu bsags pa/ ye shes kyi dkyil
ba 'bar kun nas rnam par dag pa'i mkhas pa dang ldan pa// sems shan tu zhi zhing rab tu zhi ba dang ldan pa/ gzungs kyi rgyud thams cad kyi rna shes kyi yul dang ldan pa// ting de'adzin gyi stebs
kyis degs pa med par kun nas rab tuganon pa/ chos kyi dbyangs kyi gnas kyi mthar phyin pa'i mig dang ldan pa/ chos thams cad la dmigs pa med par rnam par sbyod pa rab tu theb pa/
shes rab rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa la rnam par spyod pa/ ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i pha rol tu sad ba/ shas rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i stobs dang shugs thob pa// rdzu 'phrul gyi pha rol

tu phyin pas 'gro ba thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa// ting nge 'dzin gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang da du gyur pa// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi don mkhas pa la phyin na log med pa'i ye shes dang
ldan pa/ ches kyi mdzod dbye ba'i cho ga la mkhas pa/ nges pa'i tshig shes pa la mngon par mkhas pa// spobs pa'i stobs dang chos kyi ni zad ma shes pa dang ldan pa// 'jigs pas khyu glu
mchog dang seng ge 'i nga ro 'byin pa/ gnas med pa'i ches kyi dga' ba la dga' bsams pa// chos thams cad la rab rib med pa'i mge gas lta ba/ 'jig rten thams cad kyi 'byung ba dang 'jig
pa shes pa'i zla bar gyur pa'i shes rab kyi dkyil 'kher gyis bden pa'i tshul thams cad la rnam par spyod pa'i 'od zer can/ yoshes kyi rdo rje bsod nams kyi khor yug tu gyur pa/ dper bya ba
thams cad las ni tu 'das pa// chos thams cad la dbang po dang yo shes kyi myu gu rab tu skyes pa/ dpa' pa'i rgyal mtshan dang ldan pa/ bdud thams cad kyi rgyal mtshan rab tu sel
ba la dpa' ba/ ye shes mtha' yas pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi gzi brjidican/ 'gro ba thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa'i lus dang ldan pa/chos thams cad la shes rab sgrib ra
med pa/ bod pa dang ma zad pa'i mtha' yi shes kyis rnam par sangs rgyas pa/ yang dag pa'i mtha' kun gyi mthar phyin pa la gnas pa mtshan ma med pa la ma par lta ba'i yi shes kyi
yi ge mngon sum can/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad mngon par bsgrub pa'i rgyul mkhas pa/ mi gnyis pa'i yi shes kyi spyod yul dang ldan pa/'jig rten gyi rgyud thams cad la rnam
[r/ ]@#// par lta ba/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rgyud gnas med pa thams cad du gzugs brnyan snang bar gyur pa/ chos thams cad la mun pa dang rnam par bral ba/ yi shes kyi
dkyil 'kher mun pa la rab tu zhugs pa// phyogs kun tu chos kyi snang ba rab tu bkye ba/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi bsod nams kyi zhing mchog tugyurang/ thos pa dang/ mthed ba dang/
smon lam dan yod pa'i zla ba/ bsod nams kyi ri rab 'jig rten thams cad las mngon par 'phags pa/ phas kyi rgol ba'i tshogs thams cad tshar gcad pa la shan tudapa' ba//

sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du sgra skad dang dbyangs kyi nga ro 'byin pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku mthong bas mi ngoms pa/ sangs rgyas kyi sku'i gzugs brnyan gyi dbang sgyur ba dang ldan pa//
'gre ba gdul ba dang mthun pa'i lus su byin gyis rlob pa/ nad 'byam lus pa thams cad du lus gtsug gis rgyas par 'gengs pa/ mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rdzu 'phulaM gyi dkyil 'khor
yodas su dag pa// thogs pa med par 'gro ba'i yi shes chen po'i theg pa'i gru dad ldan pa/ ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyis tshes kyi dbyangs thams cad du lus rab tu snang ba yi shes kyi
nyam 'gro ba thams cad du shar ba/ 'gro ba thams cad bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du dga' ba'i kha dog dang ldan pa// 'gro ba thams cad kyi bsam pa dang dbang po rab tu rtogs pa'i mA shes na/
chos thams cad bsgribs pa med pa'i yul du khong du chud pa/ chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin skye ba med pa rnam par rag pa/ phra ba dang yangs dang phan tshun du yongs su bsdu ba la dngang sgyun ba/
sangs rgyas kyi sa bab ma'i tshul nges par rtogs pa// dan zab ma'i tshig dang yi ge' lha snyad la mkhas pa// tshig dang/ yi ge dang/ don mi zad pa rab tu brjod pa/ mdo sde rgya mtshothachos cad
tshig gtsag tu chud par rab tu sten pa// gzungs dang ya shes kyi lus rgya chen pa byin gyis rnyeka pa/ bskal pa mtha' yas par yongs su badzan pa'i gzungs dang ldan pa'i ban gyi rlabs can/
sems kyi skad cig gcig gsebaskal pa brjod du med par gnas pa rab tu rtogs pa'i ye shes can/ sems kyi skad cig gcag gas dus gsum shes pas 'jig rten thams cad mngon
par shes pa// chos kyi gzungs kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos rgya mtshomatha' yas pa dron zhad sdebs pa// 'gro ba thams cad kyis shes par 'gyur pa'i thangs kyis chos kyi 'dor lo bskor
ba las phyir mi ldog pa// sangs rgyas kyi yul la yashes snang ba rab tu theb pa/ gya nom par snang nga'i de de 'dzanil rtag tu mnyam par bzhag pa/chags pa med pa'i mtha'i chos thams cad
rab tudabye ba'i yi shes la mngon par mkhas pa// chos thams cad las khyad par du bsags pab rnam par 'phrul pa'i yul la yo shes kyis rnam par rtsa bdamigs pa thams cad rgyan 'khrung
[p]// par byin gyis rub pa// chos kyi dbyangs phyogs med pa la phyogs kyi rjes su 'brang bas rab tu zhugs pa// phyogs thams cad rnag par dbye bas res kyi dbyings las yod
dag par gzhal ba/ shan tu dra ste yangs pa'i rdul shan tu phra ba la byang chub tu rnam par 'tshang rgyag/ rang bzhani kha dog med pa las kha dag thams cad yongs su ston pa/ phyogs gcig la yod
dag par gzhol ba de lta bu'i yon tan dang yo shes mtha' yas pas yang dag par bskyed de/ bsad nams dang ye shes kyi snang pa dang ldan par gyur pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis bstod pa/
bsngags nga// bkur ba/ tshig dung ya ga ma zad nga sa yon tan dad 'gas pa brjod du yod pa'i byang chub sems dpa' 'dze ta'i tshal du 'dus te 'khod pa// de bzhin gshegs pa'i
yon tan rgya mtsho la 'jug pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od zer gyis rab tu snang bar gyur pa de dag gi lus thams rud dang/ khang pa brtsigs pa de dag dang/ byang chub sems
!/ dang ba 'dos spyod de dag dar/ byang chub sems dpa'i stan de dag dang/ 'dze ta'i tshal thams cad nas kyang dga' ba chen pa'i shugs rab tu thob pa'i ches nyid dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i
chas snad pa bsam gyis ma khyab pa rab tu thob pas/ dga' ba'i shugs las byung ba rnam par ba phrul pa chen po rgyun mngon par 'thenanas/chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par khyab par
gyur to// 'di lta ste sems kyi skad cig re re la 'od zer gyi dranga' u0f7a pAnashin tu yangs pa 'gro ba thams cad yongs su tshim par byed pa na ngon par 'then te/ phyogs bcu
rgyas par khyab par gyur to// rin po che sna tshogs kyi dril bu'i spron mngon par 'thon te/ dus gsum gyi de pan gshegs pa thams cad kyi yon tan dang legs pa rab tu brjod pa'i sngan gyi
nga re rjes su bsgrugs pas phyogs bcurgyas par khyab par gyur to// dmags pa thams cad las 'gro ba thams cad kyi rol mo'i sngon mngon par 'then te/ sems can thams cad kyi las
dang rnam par sman pa rol mo'i sgra snyan par blad bus rjes su sgrog cing/ phyogs bcu rgyas bar khyab par gyur to// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam dang/ byang chub sems
dpa' spyod pa sna tshogs yang dag par ston pa'i tshul gyi sngonemad pa mngon par 'thon nas/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam gyi sa dpyad sa rab tu sgrig pas phyogs bdurgyas
par khyab par gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sprul pa dang rnam par 'phrul pa'i spren mang po mngon par 'then nas// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi gsung gi dbyangs rjes su
brjod cad/ phyogs bcu rgyas par khyab bar gyur to// byang chub sems dpa'i lus mtshon dang dpe byad bzang pos rnam par brgyan pa'i sprin mang po mngon par 'then nas zhing thams nyid dang
'am/ @#// gdab sadas sa skye pa gtsa gnas gcig tu brgyud ba ra da tubarjod cing/ phyogs bcu rgyas par khyab par gyur te/ dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams
cad dang mnyam pa'i snying po byang chub kyi sngon mang po mngon par 'thononas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon par byang chub nga 'o rgyan byung ba yodas su stan cing/ phyogs su rgyas par khyab
par gyur to// dmigs pa thams cad las klu'i dbang po'i lus kyi sngon mang po mngon par 'thon nas pos sna tshogs kyi char rab tu 'bebs shing phyogs bcu rgyas pa khyab par gyur te//
'gro ba thams cad kyi dbang pa'i lus dad 'dra ba'i lngamang po mngon par 'thon nas// byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa yongs su rjod pa byed cing/ phyogs nganurgyus bar khyab
par gyur to// zhade yongs su dag pa ni po che thams cad kyi rang bzhin yongs kyi gzugs brnyan gyi sngon mang po mngon par 'thon nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khan lo
ngaskor ba mngon par ston ched/ phyogs bcu rgyas par khyab par gyur to// de dag la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' de dag gi byan gyi rlangs dang/ chos kyi snadabargya mtsho bsam gyis mi
khyad ba rab tu thob pa'i ches nyid kyi rgyan chen po rnam par sprul pa'i sngon sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shan tu phra ba snyed byung bar gyur to// danas byang chub sems dbang
'jam dpal gyis sangs rgyus kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis/ rnam par 'phrul pa de dag yongs su ston pa byed rung phyogs bcur rnam par bltas nas/dge tshatshigs su bcad pa 'di dag skyas sa//
'dzita'i tshal du sangs rgyas byin gyi rlabs// mtha' yas rgya chen yongs su byung la ltos// dmigs pa kun las lus kyi sprin chen rnams// mngon par 'then ning phyogs rnams kun tu khyab/
bde gshegs sras po rnams kyi sna tshogs rgyan/ kha deg mthu' yas rgya chen rnam dag pa// stan dang dmigs pa yongs su bcas pa la// de dag thams cad gzugs brnyan byung
snang// rgyan rnams sna tshog saratshan 'od 'phro'o ne// bde gshags sras pa rnams kyi snga rtsa las// sangs rgyas gsung rnams rab tu sgrig byed rung// zhing rnams kun gyi dbyings
su khyab par 'phro// tshangs pa'i dbang pa'i gzugs 'dra lus rnams dang// spyod lam rab tu shi ba dag pa'i gzugs// zhade gami ga kun las mngon 'then pa// bsam gtan yan lag/
brjod bde kun tu 'dong/ kun tu bzad de 'dra dbargyal ba'i sras// mtshan rab dpa byad bzad de sa brtan pa'i lus// grangs med pa sam 5sa bde gshags nga sdu las// sprul pa de
'dra thogs pa med par 'byung// bde gshegs sas pa dus gsum byed ba'i rnams// yon tan rgya mtsho'i legs pa brjod pa dag/ rgya mtsho tshamanyamargyan spren de dag kun// 'dze ta'i tshil
na gnas shing rab tu brjod// phyogs rnams kun gyi sems can yongs kyi las/ rgya mtsho chen po sna tshogs ma lus par// 'dze ta'i tshul gyi drung gi gzugs rna
la kyi gsab nas byang bar gyur pa kun tu gug/ dus gsum 'byung ba'i rgyal ba thams cad kyi// zhing rnams kun gyi ma lus rnam 'phrul ba// zhing rnams rgya mtsho'i rdul snyed de dag kyang/ de
so so dmags kyis dmigs par gyur pa snang// sangs rgyas phyogs kyi zhing+ge nams rgya mtsho'i sde// spu rtsa re ran sna tshogs rnam phye bgo/ sangasargyus gnas rnams skad cig re rer snang//
sgyu de dag la yang sangs rgyas spran mad bzhugs// 'gro dang mnyam par phyogs rnams kun bkang zhing// sems can thabs kyis yongs su smin par byed// de dag 'od las sdes kyi 'od
'phro dad/ ma teg pa'i chen rgya mtsho sprin kyang 'byung/ mkha' ltar tshad med rin chen gzhal med khang// ma lus rgyan rab kun gyis rnam mdzes pa// de dag thams cad phyogs rnams kun
lta khyab byed// zhing dang snying po byang chub de bzhin/ dus gsum byung ba'irgyal ba'i sras rnams kyis// kun tu bzang po spyod pa'i rnamatshul du// zhing rnams rgya mtsho rnam bar dag byas pa'i
rgyan rab sna tshogs 'gro ltor tshad med pa// phyogs rnams dus gsum kun tu gang byung rnams// ngaskal pa mtsho chen por rnam sbyongs pa// de dag kun kyang 'dze ta'i nags tshal gyi/ dbor
snang mkha' la gzugs brnyananul du snang// de nas byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi tang de 'dzan gyis rgyud shan tu snang bar byas pa de dag las/ byang sgrub sems dpa' re/

res kyang snyang rje chen pa'i sgo sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shan tu thu ba nyid du zhugs par gyur nas/ de dag de bas kyang 'gro ba thams cad la kun pa dang yongs su bsdu ba'i don du zhugs/

par gyur te/de ltar mnyam par bzhag pa de dag gi ba sbyab sgo rar nas kyang 'od zer sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shAn tu phra ba snyed mngon bar 'then par gyur te/ 'od zer de dag gi sger
ri nas kyang byang chub sems dpa' 'phrul pa'i sprin 'jig rten gyi dbang po thams cad 'dra ba'i lus dang/ 'gro ba thams cud la mngon par lta ba'i lus dang/ sems na thams cad yongs su smi/
par bya ba dang 'brod pa'i lus dang ldan pa mngon par 'thon te/ mngon par 'then nas kyang phyogs thams cad kyi chos kyi dbyings rgyas par bkang nas/ sems can thams cad yang dag par bskul de
yongs su smane par bya ba dang gdul ba byed do// lha'i gnas nas shi 'alas pa yongs su bstan pa'i sa dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du skye ba yongs su bstan pa'i sgo dang/ byang chub sems/
dba'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'apar yongs su bstan pa'i sgo dang/ rmi lam yongs su bstan pa'i sgo dang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhi de brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed kyis sems can yongs su skul
ba byed de// byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam rgyas 'byung ba'i sge dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su bskyed pa'i sgo dang/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i/
da pa yongs su bstan pa'i sgo dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yon tan dang nan tan du bya ba dang rab tu bsgrub pa'i sgo dang/ yan lag dang nying lag gcod pa'i bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa/
yongs su bstan pa' sgo dang/ byang chub sems dpa' rnam par 'phrul pa chen pos brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yongs su bstan pa'i sgo dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i bsam gtan
dang rnam par thar pa dang/ tade nga 'dzan dang/ snyoms par 'jug pa thams cad dang/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi lam gyi dkyil 'kher snang ba rab tu brjod pa'i sgo dang/ sangs rgyas kyi
tshes thams cad yongs su btsal ba'i phyir/ chos kyi tshig dang yi ge re ra'i phyir lus grangs med pa yongs su gtong ba yongs su bstan pa'i sgo dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
drud du 'gro zhange chos thams cad yongs su dra ba'i sgo dang/ dus la ji ltar 'bab pa dang bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'gro ba'i drud du'agro 'di thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su snyan par
'gyur ba theb par bya ba'i tshulargya mtsho snang ba rnam par dmigs par bya ba'i sgo dang/ byang chu
mtshatshugs pa'i stobs kyi rgyal mtshan yongs su bstan pa'i sgo dang/ bzo thams cad shes shing makhas pa dad ldan pa'ishes pa'i sa yongs su bstan pa'i sgrudang/ 'gro nga thams cad las khyad/
par du 'phags par shes shing mkhas pa dang ldan pa/ de yi shes kyi sa yongs su bstan pa'i sgo dang/ sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa'i khyad par shes shing mkhas pa dang ldan pa'i yashes
kyi sa yongs su bstan pa'i sgo dang/ sems can thams cad kyi dang da pa la 'jug pa'i thabs kyi sa nyen mangs pa dang bag chags sna tshogs yang dag par gzhom pa la shas gshang ma khas pa dang ldan
pa' shas kyi sa yongs su bstan pa'i ded dang/ de dag la sogs pa'i sems can yongs su smin par bya ba dang/ gdul ba'i thabs dang/ bsdu ba'i sgo sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i jul
gnyani tu bra ba snyad kyis byang chub sems dpa' de dag sems can thams cad kyi gnas su phyin par snang ste/ la la ni lha'i gnas su phyin par snang ngo// la lani klu'i gnas su phyin par snang dro/
la la gnod sbyin gyi gnas su phyin par snang ngo// la la ni dri za'i gnas su phyin par snang ngo la la ni lha ayan gyi gnas su phyin par snang ngo// la la ni nam mkha' lding gi gnas su phyin par
snad de do// la la ni mi 'am ci'i gnas su thun bar snang ngo// la la na lto 'phye chen po'i gnas su phyin par snang ngo// la la ni tshangs pa'i dbang po'i gnas su phyin par snang ngo// la la ni
ma'i gnas su phyin par snang ngo// la la ni gshen rje'i gnas su phyin par snang ngo// la la yi dgas kyi gnas thams cad du phyin par snang ngo// la la ni sems can/
dmyal ba'i 'jig rten thams cad du phyin par snang ngo// la la yi dgas kyi skye gnas kyi rgyud thams cad du phyin par snang ste/ mtheng ngas 'dul ba'i sems can dad/ thes pas 'dul ba dang/
rjes su dran pa/sa 'dul ba dang/ dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khar gyis 'dul ba dang/ mang gi chu klung gi sgyus 'dul ba dang/ 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyis 'dul ba dang/ 'ad zer gyi dra ba rab tu dgye
bas 'dul bdad/ sems can rnams kyi bsam pa'i tshul ji lta ba bzhin du yongs su smin par bya ba dang/ gdul ba'i phyir snyang rdzachen po tha mi dad pa dang/ smon lam bla ma dad pa dang/ ya
shes tha mi dad pa dang ( sems can yongs su bsdu ba tham ded pa'i tshul du byang chung soms da pab de dag 'dze ta'i tshal nas rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs kyis/ 'jig rten
gyi khams 'byam klas pa thams cad dang/ sems can gyi khams 'byam klas pa thams cad rgyas par 'gangs pa byed par snang yang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs kyi drung nas mi g.yo
ste la la ni rang gi gnas dang/ khang pa brtsigs pa dang/ stan dang/ 'khor dubanus pas phyogs bcu rgyas par byed par snang yang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhabs kyi drung nas mi
'am/ ga yo'o/ la la nil pa'i sngon rab tu 'byed par snang/ la la na sems can yongs su smin par bya ba'i don du gcig pu gnyis su med par 'gro bar snang la/ de bzhin ga[︽]shegs
pa'i 'a khor gyi dkyil 'khor nas mi g.yogo/ kani dag spyod gi gzugs/ la lan tshangs pa'i gzugs/ la lan badzul zhugs can thams cad kyi cha byad dang/ tshe ga dang/ chu zheng gi
gzugs/ la la ni sman pa'i gzugs/ la la na tshod pa'i gzugs/ la la ni snyan pas 'tsho ba'i gzugs/ la ni gar mkhan gyi gzugs// la la ni lha khyer ba'i gzugs/ la la ni
bzo thams cad dang ldan bar gzugs su grong dang/ gred khyen dang/ grong rdal dang/ ljongs dang/ khams dang/ rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor du phyin par snang ste/ dus kyi dbang gis dus kyi rjes
su 'brang zhing/ mde dad/ gzugs dang/ lus mgo bar bsgrub ba tha dad pa dang/ lus kyi kha dog dang dbyibs tshul dang 'dra ba dang/ dbyangs rnam pa tha dad pa dang/ skada rnam pa tha dad pa dang/
spyod lam rnam pa tha dad pa dang/ gnas rnam dag tha dad pas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 'gro ba thams cad dag 'phul lta bur shes pa dang/ bzo'i 'khyer thams cad rab tu brjod pa dang/
'akrib thams cad kyi shes pa brjod pas snod ba'i sgrom dang/ bde ba thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis brgyan pa dang/ las thams cad snad bar byed pa'i 'od dang ldan pa dang/ phyogs/
nyid/ @#// thams cad theg pa la gnas pas rab tu sbyong ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa chos thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor rab tu snang ba la byed cing sems can yongs su smin
bar bya ba dang/ gdul ba'i don du sreng dang/ grong khyer dang/ grong rdal dang/ ljongs dang/ khams dang/ rgyal po'i gnas dag tu phyin par snang ngo// de nas 'jam dang la
gzhanonur gyur pa gnas pa med pa'i khang pa brtsegs ban 'dug 'dug pa las/ skal ba mthun pa'i byang chub sems dpa' de dag dang/ rtag tu phyi ba 'brang ba'i lag na rdo rje dag dang/
'jig rten thams cad kyi nyam brtab la brtson zhing/ sangs rgyas thams cad bsnyen bkur bar smon pa'i sems dang ldan pa'i lus kyi regs su gtogs pa'i lha dag dang/ sngon gyi
sman lan gyis rjes su 'brang ba'i rkang gas 'gro ba'i sa su gaNogs pa'i lha dag dang/ chos mnyan pa la mngon par mos pa'i sa'i lha dag dang/ snying rjechen pel brtson pa'i lu ma dang/
mtshodang/ mtshe'u dang/ rdzid bu dang/ khren pa dang/ chu klung gi lha dag dang/ shes rab kyi 'od snang bas rab tu gsal ba'i me'i lha dag dang/ ni pe mi'i cod pan thogs pa'i rlung gi lha dag
dang / chos kyi phyogs snang bar bod du chud pa'i phyogs kyi lha dag dang/ ma rig pa'i mun pa bsal ba la brtson pa'i mtshan me'i lha dag dang/ de dazhan gshegs pa'i nyin mngon par bsgrub pa la/
brtson pa'i nyi ma lha dag dang/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi nam mkha' brgyan pa la nga rtson pa'i nam mkhaki dag dang/ 'gro ba thams cad srid pa'i rgya mtsho las bskul bar brtson pa'i gang che//
mtsho'i lha dag dang/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du tshogs yang dag par bsags pa la brtson zhade/ dag nga'i rtsa bab ste mngon par 'phags pa'i sems dad ldan pa'i ri'i lha dag dad/ 'gro ba

thams cad kyi lus brgyan par brtson zhing sangs rgyas thams cad kyi kha dog dad sbyin gyi rlungs la smin cangabartson pa'i chu klung gi lha dag dang/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi sems kyi grong rdal yongs su
bskyad par brtson pa'i grod ga lha dag dang ]thams cad mkhyen pa'i chos kyi grong khyer du smanatsadems pa'i klu'i dbang po dag dang/ dems can thams cud yongs su bsrud pa la zhugs pa'4 do
sbyashe gya dbad pa dag dang Dasems can thams cad kyi dga' ba'i shugs rnam par 'phel bar bya ba la brtson pa'i dri b+ha'i dbang po dag dang/ yi dgas kyi rgyud thams cad rnam par bzlog pa la brtson
pa'i grul bum gyi dbang po dag dang/ sems can thams cad srid pa'i rgya mtshonas gden pa'i smon lam gyis zhugs pa'i nam mkha' lding gi dbad po dpa dang/ 'jig rten thams cad las
'phags pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku dang stebs yongs su bsgrub par smon lam yongs su bskyed pa'i lha ma yin gyi dbang po dag dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa mthong bas dga' bar gyur cing lus
[6]@#/// rab tu 'dud pa'i lto 'phye chen po'i debad pa dag dang/ 'khor ba las skyo ba'i yid dang ldan zhing der lta ba'i lha'i dbang pa dag dang/ rim gro chen po rab tu byed cade lus rab tu 'dud

pa'i tshadas pa'i dbang pa dag dang lhan cig tu de dag gis rim gro tshan pas mngon par bstod de mched rtsed/ de lta bu'i byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par gnon pa'i rgyan phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan par rad
nad de gnas nas byung ste/ bcom ldan 'das lagayas phyogs su bskor ba lan brgyaphrag dumazhag tu byas nas/ mchod pa rnam pa du mas mchod de/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan snga nas phyir byung nas/
lho phyogs 'gas su yul rgyu zhade sang de// bam pa brgyad cu rtsa dgu pa// da nas sangs rgyas kyi zhade byan gyis/ tshe dang ldan pa shA rirAti'i bus/
'jam dbal gzhen nur gyur pa byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyan phun sum tshogs pa de 'dra bas 'dze ta'i tshal nas byung ste/ lho phyogs legs su 'gro ba mthong nas/ de 'di snyam du
gyur te/ bdag kyang 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa dang lhan cig tu yul rgyu zhang 'gro'o snyam nas/ de dag slong drug cu tsam gyis bskor cing mdun du byas te rang gi gnas nias byung nas/bcom
ldan 'das gang na ba der sod ste/ bcom ldan 'das kyi zhabs gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ bcom ldan 'das la zhus te/ bcom ldan 'das kyis gnang ba dang/ bcom ldan 'das la
lan gsum bskor ba byas nas/ bcom ldan 'das kyi spyan sn gnas phyir byung ste/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gang na ba der/ dge slong lhan cig tu spyod pa rab tu byung nas ring po ma len pags8/
du zhugs pa sha stag ste/ 'di ltar dag slong rgya mtsho'i blo dang/ legs bar bzhi pa chen pa dang/ baspyod nams kyi 'od dang/ bu chen pa dang/ kun khyab sbyin pa dang/ rnam dag spyod pa dang/ lta'i

dpal dang/ dbang pa'i blo gros dang/ tshangs pa'i dam pa dang/ dag slong zhi ba'i blo gros dang/ de dag la sogs pa dag slong drug cu tsam kun kyang sngon gyi rgyal nga la bya ba byas pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba
bskyed pa/ mas pa zab mar gyur pa// dad pa'i mag yongs su dag pa/ sems rgya chen pas yongs su spyod pa// sangs rgyas kyi tshesaM rnam par lta ba la mthu yod pa// 4u0f7csa kya do ba nyid dang rang
nges par rtogs pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ gzhan la ban par gyur ba'i bye na/ de bzhan gshegs pa'i yon tan la mngon par mos pa/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rjes bstan pas
'dul ba sha stag dang 'grogs shang mdun du byas te sden du bdar nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gang na ba der ded de/ Nanas tshe dang ldan par shAri'i bus de ltar lam

! duzhugs te 'dod ba'i tshe/ dag snying de dag kun la bltas nas/ dag srung rgya mtsho'i blo la smras pa// rgya mtsho'i blo byang chub sems dpa' 'jam dpal gyi lus na tshan dang dpe byad bzang pos rnam par
@#/ dbargyan nang dongs su dag pa/ lha dang mar bcas pas bsam gyis ma khyab pa dang/ bod kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su dag nyang sems can tshad med pa'i dga' ba yongs su
wa/ skyed pa dang/ 'od zer gyi drab ' na sems can dpag tu med pa'i sdug bsngal rab tu zhi bar byed pa dang/ 'khor phun sum tshogs pa sngon gyi dag pa'i rtsa bas yongs su bzung ba dang/ lam gyi rgyan/
'gron lam mig mangs ras su gnas pa dang/ 'am rnam par gan pa'i rgyan phyogs kyi dkyal ba kher thams cad la mngon par lta bar gnas pa dang/ bsadanams phun sum tshogs pa'i/
g.yas g.yon nas gter chen po mngon par 'thon pa dang/ sngon gyi sangs rgyas la ram gre byas pa'i dag ba'i rtsa ba dang rgyu mthun pas shang gi gseb thams cad nas rgyan mang po 'byung ba dang/
'jig rten gyi dbang po thams cad mchod pa'i sngan gyi chara mngon par 'bebs shang btud de phyag 'tshal ba dang/ phyogs bcu nas de bzhan gshegs pa thams cad kyis 'od zer gyi dra ba'i dkyil
'khor mang po bkye ba sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad rab tu sgrig nang spyi bar 'char la ltos shag nyes/ de dag la sogs pa tshe dang ldan pa shA ri'i bus 'jam dpal gshen nur gyur pa lam du
zhugs pa'i yon tan gyi rgyan tshad med pa dag dag slong de dag la yongs su bstan te// brjod de// bshad de// skyes sa// bkrel la// rab tu brjod de// rnam par phye'o//gsal bar byas sa/
de ltar gnas brtan shA ri'i bus/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i yon tan ji tsam ji tsam du brjod pa de tsam de tsam du dag spong de dag gi sems rnam par dag bar gyur te// rab tu
dang bar gyur te// dga' ba'i shugs rnam par 'phel bar gyur to// mos pa skyed par gyur to// de dag gi sems kyirgyud las su rung bar gyur te// dbang po rab tu dang bar gyur to//yid dad pa
rnam par 'phel bar gyur te// yid mi bde ba rab tu byang bar gyur te// sems kyi skyon dang bral bar gyur to// sgrub pa thams cad phyir ldog par gyur to/sangs rgyas blta ba la mngon par mos par
gyur to// sangs rgyas kyi rjes la sems rab tu galabar gyur te// byang chub sems dpa'i dbang po yongs su dag par gyur to//byang chub sems dpa'i dad pa'i shugs skye bar gyur te//snying rje chen po

'byud bar gyur te//pha rol tu phyin pa'i dkyil 'khor gnon par gyur to//snying rje chen po yongs su skye bar gyur to// phyogs banu'i sangs rgyas rgya mtsho yongs su snang ngar gyur to// de ltar de dag thams cad
mkhyen pa nyid du mes pa'i shugs thob par gyur nas 'di skad 'dzer te/mkhan po bdag cag kyang skyes bu dam pa de'i drung du phyin par mdzad du gsal zhes nas da nas tshe dang ldan
pa shA ri'i bu dge slong de dag dad 'grogs te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gang na ba der song nas 'di skad ces smras so// 'jam dpal dag slad 'di dag ni khyod la blta bar 'dod pa dag
go de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas dag spyod de dag dang/ 'khor gyi dkyila 'khor gyi sa'i phyogs de tsam dang bcas par/ glang po'i lta stangs kyis gzi
dang ldan par khyab par bltas pa dang/ de'i rjes la dag spyod de dag gis/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas// thal mo sbyar ta 'di skad ces//
smras so// skyes bu dam pa khyod mdzod ba dang/ khyod la phyag 'tshal ba'i dag pa'i rtsa ba 'di dang/ bdag cag gi dag bra'i rtsa ba gzhan khyod kyis mkhyen pa dang/ mkhan pas thugs su chud pa dang//
gang yad bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa shAkya thub pas mngon du gany+dzigs pa'i dag ba'i rtsa ba des khyad cu 'dra ba de 'dra bar gyur te/ rnam pa 'di 'dra ba'i lus thob par shog chug/

rnam pa 'di 'dra ba'i dbyangs dang/ rnam pa 'di 'dra ba'i mtshan dang/ 'di lta bu'i rnam par 'phrul pa dag kyang khyad ji lta ba bzhin du thob par sheg dug skyes/ dag slad de dag gis de skad du smras pa dang/
'jam dpal gzhon nuragyur pas/ deg slong de dag la 'di skad ces smras sa// dag srung dag yongs su mi skye ba'i sems bskyed pa bcu dang ldan pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo thag pa/
chen pa la zhugs pa ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa lta skyes kyang na skyes kyi/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa'ang gnon par 'gyur ro// bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshags
pa thams cad blta ba dang/ bsnyen bkur ba dang/ mched pa dang/ ram gyi bya ba la yongs su mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa dang/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad bsags pa las phyir maldeb
cade yongs su ma skye ba'i sems bskyed pa dang/ chos thams cad btsal ba la yongs su mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa dang/ byang chub sems dang 'a ya rel tu phyin pa thams cad sbyor ba la
yongs su mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i tade de 'dzin thams cad yongs su bsgrub pa la yongs su ma skye nga'i sems bskyed pa dang/ dus gcig nas gcig tu
brgyud pa thams cad du 'jug pa la yongs su mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed ba dang/ phyogs banu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhade rgya mtsho rgyas par dgang zhang yongs su dag par bya ba la yongs su mi skye ba'i sems
bskyod pa dad/ sems can gyi khams thams cad yongs su snyan par bya ba dang/ gdul ba la yongs su ma skye ba'i gdams bskyed pa dang/zhung dang bskal pa thams cad du byang chub sems
dpa'i spyod pa mngon par bsgrub pa la yongs su ma skye ba'i sems bskyed pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shani tuphra ba snyed kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sbyar bas/ sems can gcig yongs
su smin par bya ba'i tshul du/ sems can thams cad yongs su sman par bya bas/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stebs gcig yongs su bsgrub pa la yongs su mi skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa'o//
[79]@#// dag speng dag yongs su ma skyo ba'i sems bskyed pa panu pa 'di dag dang ldan pa'i rigs kyi bu 'am/ rigs kyi bu mo dad pa dang ldan pa ni/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad la yongs
su 'grub par 'gyur ro// 'khor nga' rgyud thams cad las phyir ldog par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten gyi rgyud thams cad las gyen du 'phags par 'gyur ro// nyan sa dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa
thams cad las yongs su 'da' bar 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rigs dang rgyud du 'byung bar 'gyur ro// byang chung sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam la yang
dag par 'grub par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yon tan gyi nan tan la rnam par dag par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad la yongs su dag par
'gyur ro// ra bzhade gshegs pa thams cad kyi stobs la yang dag par 'byung bar 'gyur ro// bdud dang phas kyi rgol ba thams cad rab tu 'dul bar 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa' sa
yongs su gnon par 'gyur ro// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa dang shin tu nye bar 'gyur ro// de nas dag slong dag gis ches kyi tshul 'di thos nas/ sangs rgyas thams cad
lo rnam par mthong ba la chags pa med pa'i mig gi yul zhes bya ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob par gyur to// de'i mthus phyogs bcumatha' yas mu med pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs pa'i de nga shin
gshegs pa'i 'a khor gyi dkyil 'khor mthed bar gyur to//'jig rten gyi khams de dag gi 'gro ba'i rgyud duskyes pa'i sems can de dag kyang ma lus par mthod par gyur te//'jig rten gyi khams de dag/
ga sems rnams kyang ma lus pa/na mthong bar gyur to// 'jig rten gyi khams de dag kyang rnam par phye ba sna tshogs sumathed par gyur te// 'jig rten gyi khams de dag la shin tu phra ba ji snyed
yod pa de dag kyang bgrod pa'i tshul gyis rab tu shes par gyur te// sems can de dag gi rin po che'i gnas dang longs spyod de dag kyang mthed par gyur te// da ngazhan gnyags pa de dag gi
dbyangs kyi yan lag rgya mtshebang thos par gyur to// chos bstan pa de dag kyang tshag dang 1 yi ge dang/ nges pa'i tshig dngo/ skad dang/ mang dang/ pardas rongs su shes bar gyur to// sems/
can de dag gi sems dang/ dpang po dang/ bsam pa la'ang rnam par lta bar gyur to// sngon gyi mtha' dang phyi ma'i mtha'atshar ngs banubang rjes su dran par gyur te/de nga zhar gshigs pa de
dag gi ches kyi 'khor le banu'i nges pa'i rtogi mngon par bsgrub pa 'a 'ang rab tu zhugs par gyur te// rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam par 'phrul ba na ngan par bsgrub pa bcu la'ang rab tu zhugs par

gyur te// bstan pa'i tshula mngon par bsgrub pa banu la'ad rab tu zhugs par gyur to// rjes su bstan pa ba tshagi/mngon par bsgrub pa ban la 'ad rab tu zhugs par gyur yodang zhin gshegs pa de dag gi tha dad pa yang
[©/ ]/dag par mkhyen pa'i tshul mngon par bsgrub pa bcu la'ang rab tu zhugs par gyur to// tade nga 'dzan datheb ma thag tu byang chub kyi sems kyi yan lag sted phrug banu'ang yongs su/
rdzogs par gyur te// tade deng 'dzan steng phrag bau'ang yongs sunan par gyur to// pha rol tuphyin pa'i yan lag sted phrag banu'ang rnam par dag par gyur te/ snang ba chen par ba tu thob cade shes
rab chen pa'i dkyil 'khor 'khor gyis snang bar gyur pa de dag gis// byang chub sems dpa' mngon par shes pa banu rab tutheb par gyur to// da ltar mngon parogs pa'i myu gu gzhonashad na
phra ba theg ste/ byang chub tu sems bskyed pa brtan pa la gnas pa de dag 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas// byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bazang po'i spyod pa la yang dag par bskul nas rab tu
bkod do// da ltar byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzad pabo spyod pa la rab tu gnas pas de dag smon lam chen po rgyamatshel zhugs 1de mngon par bsgrub par gyur te// de ltar smon lam chen po rgya
mtshos mngon par bsgrubs pa'i sems rnam par dag pas lus yongs su dag pa rab tu theb par gyur te// lus rnam par dag pas lus yang ba rab tu thob par gyur to// da ltar lus rnam par
dag pa dang/ lus yang bas mngon par shes pa'i sgo de dag shanit+tayangs par byed pas/mi mas shade rjes su 'brang ba'i mngon par shes pa rab tuthob par gyur to//mngon par shes pa thob pas/
'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rkang pa'i drung nas kyang ma g.yol/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su bsgrub pa'i phyir phyogs bcur yang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i 'phrin/
las kyi sprina mngon par ba sgrub par gyur to// de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur bas/ dge slong de dag bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chud khubakod nas/mthar gyig

yul rgyu zhing lho phyogs logs skyod pa'i 'byung gnas zhes bya ba'i grong rdal chen po gang na ba der logs su seng lta phyin nas/ grong rdal chen po skyid pa'i 'byung gnas kyi shar phyogs legasan nags
tshal chen po sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyal mtshan gyi rgyan ces bya ba sngon gyi sangs rgyus bzhugs bzhugs pa'i mchod rten/ sems can smin par mdzad pa'i don du da sazhan gshegs pas byin gyis
brlabs pa/ zhing mtha' yas par mang gi sgra rjes su grags pa/ sngonachadabcom ldan 'das byang chub sems dang 'i spyod pa mdzad pa'i/ yongs su gtang bar dka' ba du ma yongs su btang ste/
sa'i phyogs de na lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lte 'opachen pa dad dam ded/ mum yon pa rnams rtag tu nam 'chad par mchod pa
la brtson pa'i gnas yod pa der 'khor dang bcas te phyin nas/ der 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas mdo sde chos kyi dbyangs kyi tshul rab tusnang ba zhes bya ba mdo sde bye ba khrag khrag nga steng phrag
bcu ba byung ba bstan to// de bstan pa'i tshe/ rgya mtsho chen po nas klu bye ba khrag khragi brgya skyed du mnye bar lhags te/ de dag gse chos kyi tshul de thes nas/ klu'i rgyud la rnam
par spyod cade de bzhin gshegs pa'i yon tan la mes par gyur nas klu'i rgyud rnam par bzlog stelha dang mare skye ba yongs su 'dzan pa gyur nas/ der klu stong phrag bcu bla na med pa yong dag/
ba rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir ma ldog par gyur to// des de bstan pa'i tshe/ sems can gyi khams mtha' dang dbus med pa thag ba gsum gyis dus gzhan dang gzhan du rnam par dul/
bar gyur te// da nas skyod pa/'i 'byung gnas kyi ma rnams kyis/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i skyid pa'i 'byung gnas kyi grong rdul du phyin te/ sA la sna tshogs kyi rgyan gyi yod
rtan gyi gzhi 'di nyid na rnam par spyod de zhus thas nas/dag bsnyenAtshong dpon shes rab chen po la sogs pa dag bsnyen pha dang/ dag bsnyenam dang/ khyabu dang/ bume mang po dag sa nas
'kher lnga brgya lnga brgyadang bcas taskyed pa'i 'byung gnas kyi grong rdal nas byung nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gang na ba der dang ngo// da la dge bsnyen shes rab chen po na/ dag bsnyen
bzang pas byin dang/ lhas byin dang/ bsod nams 'od dang/ grags pa'i lha dang/ grags pas byan dang/ zla nga' dang la dang/ zla ba dga' bo dang/ blo gros bzang po dang/ blo gros chen po dang/
[z/ ]sgra gnyan bzang pa dang/ dag bsnyen babrang po'i dpal dang/ de dag la segs pa dag bsun lnga brgyas bskor cing mdun du byas te/ 'jam dang 'a gzhon nur gyur pa gang na ba der deng nas/ 'jam dpal/
gzhon nur gyur pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'atsal te/ 'jamadapal gzhen nur gyur pa la lan gsum du bskor ba byas nas phyags gtug tu 'khod de// rta la dge bsnyen shes rab can ma'i/
dge bsnyen ma bed bzang mi dang/ lus bzang mo dang/nag ba yod pa dang/ dag 'a dang la dang/ bla ba'i ded dad/dpal gyi 'od dang/ dpal bzang ma dang/ dge bsnyan ma mgi bzang mo dang/
de dag la sogs pa dag bstan ma lnga brgyas bskor cing mdun dubyas te/ 'jam dang la gaganur gyurang gang na ba dar dang nus/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rkang pa ba zhus la spyi bos
phyag 'tshal te/ 'jam dang la gzhon nur gyur pa la lan gsum du bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu 'khod de// de la tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs ni/ tshong dang don gyi bu brtul
zhugs bzang pe dang/ tshul khrims bzang pa dang/ dang tshul bzang pa dang/ rnam par gnon pa jazad pa dang/ bsam pa bzang pa dang/ blo gros bzang po dang blo bzang po
dang mag bzang po dang/ lag pa bzang po dang/ tshong dpon gyi bu 'od nga khrang pa dang de dag la sogs pa tshod dpen gyi bu lta nga rgyas bskor cude mdun du byas te/ 'jam dpal gan nur
[e]/ dgyur pa gang na ba der deng nas/ 'jam dang la gzhon nur gyur pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la lan gsum du bskor ba/
ma byas nas phyogs gcig tu bkod do// de la khyim bdag shes rab chen po'i bu mo dag ba bzang mo ni/ bu mo bzang ma dang/ yid du 'ong ba'i bzhin dang/ ban pa'i blo gros dang/ dpal
bzang mo dang/ tshangs pas byas pa dang/ dpal gyi 'od dang/ bu ma 'od bzung me la sogs pa bu mo lnga brgyas bskor nang mdun du byas ta/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa gang na ba der deng nas/
'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rkad pa gnyis la sbya bas phyag 'tshal te/'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la lan gsum du bskor ba byas nas phyogs gcig tu'amed de/
nas 'dam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas skyid pa'i 'byung gnas kyi grong rdal nas skyes pa dang/ bud med dang/ khye'u dang/ bu mo de dag 'dus 'khod par shes nas/ bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin
du bstan pa'i byin gyis zil gyasemanan/ byams pa nyin pa'i byin gyasesam par byas nas/ snying rjechen pa'i byin gyis ches bstan pa mngon par sgrub ste/pha shes kyi byin gyis sags dang
bsam pa rnam par byanas tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa chen pos chos bstan bar dga' ste/tshong dpon gyi bu nor bsdadas la bltas so//tshong dpon gyi bunor bzangs zhes bya ba/ci'i phyir nor bzad
zhes byazhan/tshod dpon gyi bu nor bzungs zhes bya ba de/ thegam na 'i mngal du zhugs ma thag tu khyim de'i ka ber kun s rnam par phye nga ran po che sna bdun gyi sdong pa 'then par gyur te
'di po chu'i sdod pa de dag gi 'og na ran pe che'i gter bdun yod de/ gsar dang/ dadul dang/ boDUrmadang/ 'gal dang/ mu tig dmar po dang/ a gar ba dang mu sa ragal ba dang/
ni po che da bdun gyi rin po che'i sdod pa de dag kyang/ gter de dag nas skyes te sa'i gzhi brtol nas mngon par 'thon par gyur te//de yan lag dang nyid lag thams cad yongs su rdzogs te/ zla ba bu

lano nas btsas pa dang/ da'i tshi gtar chen po bdun pa de dag kyang chu zheng dang/ rdzogs su khru bdun tsam dusa'i steng nas mngon par 'phags te/snang bar byung nas rnam par snang zhing mdzes par gyur to//

khyim der ran pa cha sna tshogs kyi snod lnga brgya'ad byung bar gyur te/'doltar mar gyi snod dang/ til mar gyi snod dang/ sbrang rtsi'i snod dang/ mar gsar gyi snod dang/ gzhan dag kyang so so nas yo byad
sna tshogs thams cad kyis yongs su gang ba dag ste/ 'di ltar rdo rje'i snod spes sna tshogs kyis yongs su gang ba dang/ sbes kyi snod gos sna tshogs kyis yongs su gang ba dang/ man ngashal gyi snyed
kha dras dang spyan gzigs sna tshogs ro mchog tu zhim pas yongs su gang ba dang nor bu'i snod rin po che sna tshogs kyis yongs su gang ba dang/ gser gyi snyed dngul sil mas yongs su gang ba dang/
dadul gyi snod gser phyes yongs su gang ba dang phamen gyi snyed nor bu rin po chab i DUrlas yongs su gang ba dang/ shel gyi snod mu sa ra gal bas yongs su gang ba dang/ mu
sa ra gal ba'i snyed rin po che shel rgyas yongs su gang ba dang/ sa gar ba'i skyed mu tig dmar pos yongs su gad pa dang/ mu tig dmar po'i snyed askyagar bas yongs su gang ba dang/ nor

bu ran po che skar ma rgyal mtshan gyi snyedar bu rin pa cha chu'adad gas yongs su gad ba dang/ nor bu rin pacha chu 'dang gi snodanor bu ran ba tsho skar ma'i rgyal mtshan gyi yongs su gang bu dang/ de
dag la sogs pa rin po che'i snod lnga brgya 'then par gyur te// tshed dpon gyi bunar ba'angs de btsas ma thag tukhyim dang/ bar ba dang/ mdzodathams cad du nor dang/ 'bru dang/ dbyeg dang/
gser dang/ rani de chesna tshogs kyi char mngon par dab par gyur te// da la bram ze'i ltas pa dang/ pha dang/ ma dang/ gnyen gyi tshogs kyis 'di btsas ma thag tu nor mang pa phun sum tshogs
pa byung bar gyur pas na/ nor bzungs nyer bzungs zhes da ltar ming du btags taM/tshong dpon gyi bu nar bzangs de ni sngon gyirgyal ba la bya ba byas pa'i// dag pa'i rtsa ba bskyed pa'o// mas pa rgya
chen pa dad ldan pa de// dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi rjes su 'brang ba'i bsam pa mno// lus dad/ ngag dang/ yid kyi spyod pa kha na ma tho ba med pa'i go/ byang chub sems dpa'i lam yongs su
sbyang ba la rab tu brtson pa'o// thams cad mkhyen pa la mngon par mes pa'o/ sangs rgyas kyi ches kyi snyed du gyur pa'i// bsam pa'i nam mkha' yongs su dag pa 'o// byang chub kyi sems/
chags pa med pa yongs su rdzogs pa'o// de nas 'jam dpal gzhen nur gyur bas/ tshed dpan gyi bu nor bzad s la bltas te dga' da'i gtam byas nas/ de la 'di lta ste/
sangs rgyas kyi ches thams cad las kyang brtsams/ sangs rgyas kyi ches thams cad yang dag par bsdu zhang 'thob par bya ba las kyang ngartsams/sangs rgyas thams cad gcig zhus gcig tu brgyud
pa las kyang nga rnams ]sangs rgyas gnag nas gtsaleg tu brgyud pa thams cad shes par bya ba las kyang brtsams/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'kher rnam par dag pa las kyang nga rtsa//
sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo dang sprul pa'i rgyan las kyang dartsams/sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gzugs kyi sku'i mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po rnam par dag pa las kyang brtsams
sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ches kyi sku yongs su grub pa las kyang brtsams/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsung rnam par phye ba las kyang brtsams ( sa das rgyas thams cad kya 'od kyi dkyil 'khor gyi
rgyan rnam par dag pa las kyang brtsams/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid las kyang brtsamasataM/ chos kyang bstan par gyur te/ de nas 'jam dar la gzhon nur gyur pas
tshong dpon gyi bu ner bzangs dang/ skye bo'i tshogs chen po de dag ches dang mthun pa'i gtam gyis bstan ta/ yang dag par bskul nas smra ba bskyed da dga' bar byas nas/
sman med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed du btsud de/ sngon gyi dag pa'i rtsa ba yongs su dran par byas nas/ skyid pa 'byung gnas kyi grong rdal de'i sems can rnams kyi
bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rjes bstan pas byin gyis brlabs te/ bde bar byas nas de nas song ngo// de nas tshong dpan gyi bu nor bzungs kyis/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa/
las rnam pa de lta bu'i sangs rgyas kyi yon tan dang/ che ba nyid thos nas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mes shade brtson pas phyi bzhin du 'brang ste/ 'jam dpal gzho nur
gyur ba lags su bcad de mngon par bstod do// blo gros chen pa mtha' yas spyod yul can// khyed kyi mthus na sems can sman skad du// bdag cad byang chub mchog tu zhugs par gyur// de
la des pa gang na chos bdag la gson// dga' ba'i chus bkang 'obs kyis kun nas bskor// nga rgyal dregs pa'i re ba mtho bar brtsigs//gams can lam brgyud ske rnams btsud nyid gdad/
de 'dra'i khyamani srid gsum med ldan cho// da ni gti mug ma rage gzings pas khebs/ 'dod chags zhe sdang me lces rab tugadungs// rtag par bdud kyi dbang po'i dbang du gyur// de la byis
pa na rig rten khyad 'cha'// sred pa'i sgrig dang zhugs pas shani glugs// g.yo dang skya ya skyen gyis mtho btsums shing// thatsom yid gnyis dag gas mag mdangos pa// leg pa phun
phyegs lam la rab tu zhugs// phrag dog ser sna'i thag pas btags shing btsangs/ yi dgas byol seng sems dmyal mkhomargyu// na gnad dang skye bas rab tu mnar// mgo
rmongs lam rgyud 'khor la kun du 'khor// de la khyod ni thugs rje rnam dag bge/ rakyil 'khor la shes 'od zer snang ba mdzad// nyon mongs rgya mtsho skam par shar to 'phags//nyim 'dra ba
nga dag la snang ba mdzod// byams pa nga sems ra sa dkyil 'khor rdzogs hade nya// bsad nags zla 'od bad ba'i zer 'byed pa// sems can kun gyi gnas su shar gyur gyis/zla ba nya ba
lta bu s bdag snang mdzod// dkar mthu thams cad yongs bsags bskor na nga' zhang// chos dbyings mkha' la chags pa mi mnga' ba//chos kyi 'o kher ler chen sngon 'dron pas/rgyal por
gyur pas bdag la bstan du gsal// byang chub theg pa'i smon lam mthu mnga'aste// bsod nan g.yo shas/shAn tu yang dgags shang// sems can kun la phan pa'i denang zhugs pa ba//dad dang cha/
pas bdag kyang bskyang du gsal/ brjod pa brtan shade sra ba'i go mnabs ta// yi shas bshan mnga' thugs rje'i phyag 'de bas// bdud kyi dmag dpung tshogs rnams mngon 'gyur bar/ dpa' bo chen pos
bdag gi se la yang mdzod// chos kyi re reb po la bstan bzhugs shing// ting 'dzan mag ga lha mes kun nas bskor// nyon mongs sgra gcan lha ma 'dul mdzad pa//
ma brgya byin gyur bas bdag kyang gzigs su gsal// byis pa'i gnas gyur khams gsum khang panas// nyon mongs las rnams rnam par bsal bam khyen// rgyu yi sa dang lam rgyud 'khor rmongs par/ mar badra bas
bdag kyang shul bstan gsal//ngan 'gro'i lam rnams rnam par zlog mdzad de// bde bar 'gro ba'i lam rnams rnam spyod ba// 'jig rtan kun gyi 'a ma gyi rgyud las 'das// bdag la'ang ra ba'i sgo ni bstan du
gsal//rtag dang bdag dang bad bar 'dugs ldan//leg 'dzan sgo la'i skyabs kyis bcad gyuragyis//bden pa'i ye shes sngana rna mchog mnga' bas//thar sgo bdag la'ang sbyar du dbye par gsal//yang dag leg
ba'i lam la mkhas gyur cing//lam gyi rgyus dang tshul la bstengs mnga'//lam rnams kun gyis 'dul ba thugs chud pa//bdag la byang chub shul ni bstan du gsol//yang dag lta ba'i sa ya thang la bzhugs//

sangs rgyas kun gyi yon tan chab kyis bstan//sangs rgyas chos legs me tog char 'bebs pa//byang chub shul ni bdag la bstan du gsal rgyal ba gang 'das ma byon gang rnams dang//da ltar byung ba'irgyal ba snang mdzad
sems can gso'i legs par g.yogs pa'i phyogs//de yang lam ston mdzad pas bdag bstan gsol/las kyi 'khrul 'khor tshul la ma bstengs pa//chos thog gung rta'i bakhrul 'khoramkhyen gyur cing/ shes

theg pa'i tshul la rnam nges ba// byang chub theg pa bdag la bshad du gsol//zhes shing smon pa'i 'khor lo'i mu khyad can//bzod pa rdo rjesAng rje srog shing rten la dad pa'i gnya' shaderanichen legs spras pa'i// byang
chub theg la bdag kyang bskyon dugasal// gzungs rnams kun gyis ma dag dkyil 'khar na// byams pa btsugs pa'i dgab pas rab brgyan pa//tha dad yang dag shes ba'i drel 'phred na//theg mchog

bzad pas bdag la kha skad du gas la/tshas pa'i spyod pa'i lam gyis mngon par brgyan// ting 'dzin bud med khrag khrig kun nas rgyu ches kyi rdza ya dbyangs nyin rab bsgrags pa// theg pa'i dam pas bdag la bsngag

su gsal//bsdu ba bzhi yi mi zad mdzod ldan ba//ye shes rin chen yon tan baphreng gas brgyan/khrel med dul ba'i 'bring rasamatsheg bsdoms pa ba theg pa'i dam pa bdag la bstan du gsalo//spyi pa'i 'od zer dkyil

b.len bzang po/tshul khrims tsan dan steng rje'i byug ldan zhing bzod pa'i zur gyase mtshams rnams dam sbyar ba'i//theg pa'i mtsheg la mur du bdag gzhag gsel//sems can thams cad 'dul las mi ldog pa//bsam

gtan ting 'dzin la khyer mthor sgreg cing// shes rab thabs gnyasi 'byor mthun 'grosgruba'i mos kyi rjeg pa mchog la bdag gshag gsol smon lam 'kher les lam gyi 'khor sbyong pa//chos kyigazungs dam mthu brtas che ldan

zhade[;]yi shes bakhrul 'khor legs sbyangs legs byas pa'i// res kyi thig pa de la bdag bskyon gsol// kun tu bzang po'i spyod pas rab spungs shad//sems can lta bas la thegs med pa// kun tu bzang po'i spyod
@#// pas gzhan 'gyur pa'i// mi shes theg pas bdag la bstad du gsal// da ni bam pas rdo rje bzhake gnas pa//yi shes sgyu mas legs sbyangs 'degs byas shidesgrub dang rtags pa/
thams cad gcod pa ya ]/bzod po'i thog la bdag kyang bskyon par gsal//'gro mnyam dri med shan tu yangs gyur pa/sems can thams cad skyob pas bde sgrub nyid ches dbyangs 'ditu chen rnam snang
ba'i// byang chub thog la bdag kyang bskyon du gsal/sdug bsngal phung pa rab 'gyur gcod byed pa/nyon mdos las kyi rdul mang sbyod la song//bdud dang phas kyi rgol ba kun 'dem pa'i chos kyi theg la

bdag kyang bskyen du gsal// phyogs rnams kun tu ye shes rang snang ba chos dbyings nam mkha' rnam par krub byed rung//sems can kun gyi bsam pa rdzogs byed pa'i// chos kyi theg la bdag kyang bskyo dug sel//

rnam dag kha' ltar tshad med mi zad pa//srid dang ma rage lta ba'i skyen med rung//sems ma dul phan pa rab gnas pa'i//tshes kyi theg la ngadag kyang bskyen du gsal/rlud rten langs pa'i shugs kyi shugs ldan

tshu bas/smon lamamathu yis 'jig rten kun badzan cing// zhi ba'i gnas rag kun sar skyel byed ba/ches kyi thog la bdag kyang bskyon du gsol// sa chen gzhi yi stengs kyi stebs ldan pa//snying rje'i mthu dang

shugs kyis khur khyer zhing/ ye shes lo tog 'gro ba nyer 'tsho ba'i//theg pa'i mchog la bdag kyang bskyon du gsal/nyi ma lta bur 'gro ba nyer 'tsho zhade//bsdu bo rab yangs 'khor gyi dkyil 'khan zha/gzudA
kyi stobs mchog dag pa'i 'od bzang ba'i// ye shes nyi ma bdag la bstan du gsol//bskal pa mang po dumararab bslabs pas// rgyuyi tshul dang sa kun mkhas gyur pa// gang gis 'dus bu sa grong khyer
gzhom 'gyur ba'i// shes brtan rdo rje 'phags pas bdag la stsal du gsol// sangs rgyas lags kun bslab pa phun sum gyis// yi shes rgya mtsho yangs pa gang zhig la//tshad med rgya mtsho'i blo mangs bslab
gyur ba// de legs nyi 'dra 'phags pas bka' stsal gsal// gangan yang dag snganamanga' khyod bzhugs shing// ye shes rgyal pa'i rnyed pan legs brgyan te//chos kyi mthu thed dam pas dbu bcings pa'i//
chos kyi rgyal po'i pe phrad bdag kyang ston// dunas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas glang po'i lta stangs kyis bltas te/tsheng dpan gyi bu nor bzangs la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi dud

ltar khyod kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdo gas pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ dag ba'i bshes gnyen gyi rjes su 'brang zhing/ byang chub sems dpa la lam yongs su rje gas par bya bar 'dod de byang chub semA
dpa'i skyed pa yodas su dri bar bsam pa legs so legs sa//rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste/dag ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la bsnyen cing bstan pa dang/ rim gror bya ba 'di'i thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yongs su grub

par 'gyur ba'i gzhi yin te// 'di ni mthun pa'i rgyu yin gyis/ rigs kyi bu de bas na khyod kyis dag ba'i bshes gnyen bkur bas yongs su ma skye bar gyis shig/ nor bzangs kyis smras pa/'apags pa ji lta byad tshud
sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bstab par bgyi/ ji ltar nyan tan du bgyi/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod la brtsam par bgyi
ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa' sed pa la sbyang par bgyi/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yong sa su rdzogs par bgyi/ ji ltar byang chub
sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su sbyang bar bgyi/ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sAms dpa'i spyod pa la 'jug par bgyi/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub
'a/ sa mas dpa'i spyod po mngon par bgrub par bgyi/ ji ltar byang chub sems da pas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rjes su 'brang bar 'gyi/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sams dpa'i

spyod pa la lhag por dmigs pa ra bgyi/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i sbyor pa rgyas par bgyi/ ltar byang chub sems dpA kun tu bzang mo'i spyod pa'i rekyil 'khor yangs su rdzo gApar
de nas 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la tshigs su bcad de sbas pa// dge ba'i bsor nams gang rgyun mtsho/

da ltar khyed ni nga' rdung ra phyin te// snying rje snying ba tshu rgya chen gyi/ yid ldan byang chub dam patshol ba legs/ 'gro ba thams cad dgrol don du/ spyod pa mtshungs mar don du smon lam rob[}]
'debs shing// 'gro ba kun gyi skyabs 'gyur ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i tshul 'di yin/ byang chub sems dpa' brtan pa'i rnams// 'khor ba'i nang nas mar yid kyis spyod byed pa//
de dag kun tu bzang po yi// spyod pa thub mar chagasamad 'thob par 'gyur// bsod nams 'od can bsod nams dpal/ 'ad lha ra khyong na kun tu bar ng pa'i phyir pa la// 'gro la phan phyir son/
byed pa// bsod nams rgya mtsho dag gzhi ngag pa'i mchin// mtha' dang dbus mang tshad mad pa'i// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten sangs rgyas kun kyang mthong bar 'gyur dran pa'i mthu dang stobA/
kyis kyang/ da dag chos kyi na kyang yongs su 'dzin par 'gyur da ltar khyod kyis phyogs bcu sa ]sangs rgyas zhing rnams kun tu rgyal ba mthong nas kyang/ byang chub spyod pa'i rin gyi phyir/ ka
nga dag kun la so na lam rgya mtsho dag bye da 'gyur// 'jig rten gtso la slob byed cing //gang rnams sangs rgyas sa la gnas na bca' byas shing/ 'di tshul rgya mtshor zhugs gyural// de dag kun kyang
thams cad gzigs par 'gyur/ khyod ni 'byam klas zhing kun tu // bskal mang zhing rdul snyed du kun tu bzang po yi// spyod pa'i dam pa sbyad byas shing/ byang chub dam pa zhi ba 'thob par 'gyur//
zhing rnams mtha' dang dbus med pa// ma lus kun tu bskal pa rgya mtshor spyad par gyis// kun tu bzang po'i spyod mchog phyir/ smon lam rgya chen yongs su rdzogs par byos khyod kyi smon lam
gos gyur nas/ sems nyamakhrag khrig dga' ba yongs su skyes gyur cing// kun tu bzang po'i ye shes kyi// byang chub mag tu son pa khyed la ltos// de nas
'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pos tshogs su bcad pa de dag slas nas// tshong dpon gyi bu nor ba brangs la 'di skad ces bsgo'o// rigs kyi bu de ltar khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byar
chub tu sems kha skyed cing/ byang chub sems dpa'i sman pa yongs su btsal bar sems pa legs so legs so// ri'is kyi bu 'di ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems
bskyed pa de lta bu'i sems can yong rab tu dkon te/ de bas kyang gang gis bla na mad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byung chub tu sems bskyang nas/ byang chub sems rapa' sbyong pa yongs su tshol ba
de lta bu'i sams tun ni chos dkon no/ rigs kyi bur bas na byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mkhyen pa'i yu shes thob par bya ba'i phyir/ yang drag pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyan las
gdon mi za bar rtogs pa thob par gyis shig/ dag ba'i bshas gnyin yongs su btsal ba la yongs su skyo ba'i yid mar par gyis shig/ dag ba'i bshes gnyen blta ba la ngoms pa ma
par gyis shig/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis bstan pa la mthun ba la 'dzin par gyis shog dge ba'i bshes gnyan gyi thabs mkhas pa'i sbyar pa la khong khro ba med par gyis shig rigs kyi
[d/]bu lho phyogs kyi rgyad 'di nyid na/ yul ma mo gya nom mchog ces bya ba yod de/ ra na mgul legasapa zhes bya ba'i ri zhig yod pa dra la dag slong sun gyi dpal zhes bya ba 'dug gis de'agan/
du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab pa ra bya ba dang/ ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dang/ ji ltar byang chub sams dpas byang chub sams dpa'i sdud pa bcur
par bya ba dang/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa 'i spyod pa la spyad par bya ba dang/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa longs su rdzogs par bya ba da/ ji ltar yongs su dag par bya ba dang/ ji ltar
'jug par bya ba dang/ ji ltar mngon par bsgrub par bya ba dang/ ji ltar rjes su 'brang bar bya ba rang ji ltar lhag par dumigs par bya ba dang/ ji ltar rgyas par bya ba dang/ ji ltar byang chub saA
dpa' kun tu bzang po'i su da pa'i rakyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur ba dris pa'ig rung/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen da khyed la kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor ston to//
de nas chod pa' gyi bu nor ba'angs de 'a rangs rta/ mkhu zhing nyams bde la/ tshim zhing yid bde ba skyes nas/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/
'jam dbal gzhon nur gyur pa la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ lan brgya stong du mar phyir bltas te/ dag ba'i bshes gnyen yid du 'ong ba'i sems dang ldan pas/
dag pa'i bshes gnyen mi mthong ba mi bzod du gdung mchims gang bar du zhing/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'i drung nas song ngo/
nor bzangs mthar gyis yul mi mo gya nom mchog ces bya ba der song su phyin nas/ yul mi mo gya nAm mchog nas rnam par brgyus te/ sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa bas byung zhing las rgya chen pos byin gyis
brlabs pa'i longs spyod yid du 'ong ba la yongs su spyod cing/ ri mgul legs pa gang na ba der phyin nas/ mgul legaso pa'i ri la 'dzegs te/ dag slong sprin gyi dpal mol tshol zhing sha
phyogs logs su byung ngo// de bzhin du lho dang/ zhub dang/ byang ngad/ byang shar gyi phyogs ma naMms dang/ shar lho'i phyogs ma[︽]mas dang lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang/ nub byang

gi phyogs chu maM saM su'ang byung ste// bla 'og tu'ang lta zhing/ dag slong sbyin gyi dpa' tshol tshol pa las/ des zhag bdun len pa dang dge slong sin gyi dpal ri su gcig cig gi san ljongs na 'chag cing

rtsa'adug pa ma thong nas/ dge slong sngon gyi dpal gang na ba der song ste/ dag slong sbyin gyi dpal gyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshol nas/ dge slong spyin gyi dpal la g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas te/
mdun du 'dug nas thal mo sbyar te 'di skad ces smras so/ lo phags pa'i thugs su chud par mdzad du gsol/ bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sams bskyar na/ ji ltar byang

chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslu ba par bgyi ba dang/ ji ltar nyan tun du bgyi ba dang/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa brtsam pa dang/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la
sad par bgyi ba dang ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba dang 'a ji ltar yongs su dag par bgyi ba dang/ ji ltar 'jug par bgyi ba dang/ ji ltar rjes su 'brang bar bgyis
ltar mngon par bsgrub par bgyi ba dang/ ji ltar lhag par dmigs par gyi ba dang/ ji ltar rgyas par bgyi ba dang/ ji ltar byang chub sams dpas kun tu bzang po'i sbyor pa'i dkyil 'khor yongs su
rdzogs par 'gyur bi ma 'tshal te/ 'phags pa khyod ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la garams ngag dang rjes su ston pa mdzad ces thos/ 'phags pa ji ltar byang chub sems dpa' bla na/
med pa yang dag par rdzogs par byang chub tu 'byung bar 'gyur ba bdag la bstan du gsol/ de skad ces smras pa dang// gaslong spyin gyi dpal gyis/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs
la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu de ltar khyod kyis blo na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyar cing/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su dri ba legs so legs so// rigs
kyi khu la da lta sku/ byang chub sams dpa'i spyod pa yongs su btsal ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul yongs su btsal ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'byang ba rnam par dag pa yongs su btsal
pa dang/ byang chub sams dpa'i lam rnam par dag pa yongs su btsal ba dang// byang chub sams pa'i sbyor pa rgyu rnam pa rnam par dag pa yongs su bal pa dang 'chub sel/
dpa'i mngon par shes pa sgrub pa rnam par dag pa yongs su btsal ba dang/ byang chub sems da pa'i rnam par thaM ra pa yongs su bstan pa dang/ byang chub sas ra pa'i snang ba'i snying rje'i rgyar yong
su bstan pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'gro ba'i bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rjes su 'brang ba dang/ byang chub sems dwapas 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'dus pa'i sgo yongs su nam
dang byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi 'dus byas dang/ 'dus ma byas kyi skyon dang/ 'jigs pas ma gos pa'i rgyan yangs su kha tshul ba 'di ni dka' 'o// shin tu rakal sogs legs/
kyi bu kha ba ni mos pa'i stobs kyi dbang gi sa mig gi blo gros dang/ dad pa'i mig rnam par dag pas/ kun tu mngon pa ra lta ba'i ye shes kyi 'od snang ba phyir phyogs med pa dang/ yul kun la
thogs pa mad cing bsgrubs pa thams cad dang bul ba'i lhag mthong la mkhas pa dang/ mig bag sprul kun nas yongs su dag pa'i lus rnam par dag pa dang/ phyogs kyi rgyang 'byams pa tho mA
cad du na ngon par 'dud pa'i lus kyi 'dud pa mkhas pa dang/ sangs rgyas thams rud kyi chos kyi spri na yongs su 'dzin pa'i gzungs kyi stobs kyis phyogs kyi rgyur thams cad kun nas
mngon du gzigs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa rnams mthong sde/ 'di ltar shar phyogs kyi de bzhin gshags pa gcig kyang mthong ngo// sangs rgyas gnyis dang bcu dang/ sangs rgyas brgya dang/

sangs rgyas stong dang/ sangs rgyas brgya phyag stong dang/ sangs rgyas bya ba dang/ sangs rgyas bya ba brgya dang/ sangs rgyas khyab stong dang sangs rgyas bye ba brgya phrag stong dang/ sangs rgyas bye
ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa tshad med pa/ dpag tu med pa/ grangs mang pa/ bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ mtshungs pa mad pa/ kun tu thu' yas pa/ sa mchims

madra pa ga zhal du med pa/ brjod du med pa' yang brjod du med pa dag kyang mthong ngo// de bzhin gshegs pa 'dzam bu'i gling gi rdul na tu phra ba snyad kyang mthong ngo// de bzhin gshegs pa gling bzhi

pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rdul shin tu thu ba snyad dad/ stong dang/ stong gnyis pa dang/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams na sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba ster kyang mthong ngo///

de bzhin gshegs pa saNas rgyas kyi zhange bcu'i rdul gin tu phra kha snyad kyang mthong ngo// ra bzhin gshags pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya'i rdul shin tu phra ba skad dang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing stong gi rdulagi//

chu phra ba skor rang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya phrag stong gi tshul shin tu phra pa snyad dang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba stod dang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing bya ba phrag brgya'i rdul shin tu pA ra sku
dang/sangs rgyas kyi zhing bye ba stong gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyan dang/ sangs rgyas kyi nang bya ba brgya phyag stong gi rdul shin tu phul skad dung/ sangs rgyas kyi nang bye ba khrag khrig

[“ ]brgya stong gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyad// sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du mar pa'i bang mdzodadu med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyad dag kyang mthong ste/ shar phyogs legs su ji lta ba de bzhin du/ lho phyogs dang/ nub phyogs/
dung byang phyogs dang/ byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang/ shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang/ lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang/ nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang/ 'og dang gru'i phyogs kyi

de bzhin gshegs pa gcig kyang mthor bu nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'arjod du med pa'i yang 5 rjod du mar pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyad dag kyang mthong ba'i bar du sku/ phyogs re rer/
rnam par bltas kyang/ de bzhin gshegs pa kha dog sna tshogs mang 'a ba dang/ dbyibs sna tshogs mnga' ba dang/ rnam par 'phrul pa sna tshogs mnga' ba dang/ khyu mchog gi mthu dang rnam

zla par rol pa sna tshogs mnga' ba dang/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi rgyan rnam pa sna tshogs mnga' ba dang/ 'od zer gyi dra ba snang ba kha dog du ma can dang/ kha dog mtha' yas pa rab tu 'gyed pa dang/

[– ]sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa dang/ pho brang dang rgyan sna tshogs mnga' ba dang/ sku tshe'i tshad rnam par dag pa rnam pa sba tshogs mnga' ba dang/ 'gro ba'i bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par/

dmigs par mdzad pa dang/ mngon par 'tshang rgya ba rnam par dag pa'i sgos rnam pa ra 'phrul pa rnam pa stsa tshogs mngar ba dang/ sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog dang sang ge'i nga re / ma par grog pa mang po mthong
ngo de ltar rigs kyi bu kho bos ni sgo kun nas dmigs pa thams cad rnam par rig pa la yang dag par gzhol ba'i sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa 'di thob par brad na/ byang chub sems dpa' ye shes
kyi dkyil 'khor rnam pa ra dag pa gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor dang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang/ pho brang rnam par dag pa'i rgyana mngon par mthong bas/ sangs rgyas
rjes su dran pa'i sgo kun nas sAr ba'i dkyil 'khor rab tu grub la dad/ bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par dmigs par de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba rnam par dag pas/ sangs rgyas rjes su
dran pa'i sgo 'gro ba thams cad du sgro btar pa rab tu thob pa dang/ gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu tshad med pa'i rjes su 'brang bas/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran par M sgo bas kyis bdas+sa
ba rab tu thob pa dang/ gang gis chos mnyan pa'i rnam pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sku'i pin la blta khas/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo chos kyis sgro btags pa rab tu thob pa dang/ gang

gis phyogs rgya mtsho thams cud kyi sangs rgyas rgya mtsho tha mi dad pa la 'jug pas/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo phyogs rnam par snang ba'i snying po rab tu thob pa dang/ gang gis re bzhin gshegs pa'i
rnam par 'phrul pa dang khyu mchog gi mthu phyang ba la rab tu phra bar dmigs shing 'jug pas/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo phyogs thams cad du 'jug pa rab tu thob pa dang/
bskal pa thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa mthong zhing rnam par dmigs pa dang ma 'brel bas/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo bskal par sgo btags la rab tu thob pa dang/ gang gis dus
thams cad du re bzhin gshegs pa mthong zhing 'grogs pa dang mi 'bral bas/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo dus su sgro btags pa rab tu thob pa dang/ gang gis sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams
cad nas mngon par 'phags gang bril gyis mi non pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku yongs su mthong zhing rnam par rig pas/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo zhing du sgro btags pa rab tu thob pa dang/
gang gis dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshags pa'i dkyil 'khor rang gi sam dang bsam par yang dag par gzhol bas/ sangs rgyas rjes dran pa'i sgo dus gsum du sgro btags pa rab tu thob pa dang/
gang gis dmigs pa thams cud la de bzhin gshegs pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa yang dag par rtogs pa mthong zhing dmigs pas/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo dmigs par sgo
btags pa rab tu thob pa dang/ gang gis skad cig gcig la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du re bzhin gshegs pa thams cad yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba rnam par dmigs pas/ sangs
0/ rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo zhi bas sgro btags pa rab tu thob pa dang/ gang gis nyin gcig tu gnas thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad gshegs par rnam par dmigs pas/ sangs rgyas rjes
su dran pa'i sgo 'bral bas sgro btags pa rab tu thob pa dang/ gang gis re bzhin gshegs pa re re skyil mo krung du bzhugs pas kyang/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad du rgyas par khyab pa'i sangs
rgyas kyi sku rnam par dmigs pas/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo shin tu yangs pas sgro btags pa rab tu thob pa dang/ gang gis sgra'i rtswa mo gcig la sangs rgyas brjod du mad pa byung ba
mnyes par bya ba la 'jug pas/ sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo shin tu phra bas sgro btags pa rab tu grub pa dang/ skad cig gcig la 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du mngon par 'char-i rgyu
zhing rnam par 'phrul pa ston pa rnam par dmigs pas/ gang gis sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo rgyun du sgro btags pa rab tu thob pa dang 2 sangs rgyas byung ba thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo dang/
rnam par 'phrul po dang/ ye shes snang ba rab tu thob pas/ gang gis sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo dgos par sgro btags pa rab tu thob pa dang/ rang gi sems dang bsam pa la bltas na de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad rab tu snang ba thob pas ka sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo sems kyis sgro btags pa rab tu thob pa dang/ 'gro ba thams cad kyis las rnam pa ji lta bur bsags pa'i
gzugs brnyan yongs su ston pas/ gang gis sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo las kyi sgro btags pa rab tu thob pa dang/ chos kyi dbyinges ma lus pa thams cad pad+mo'i rtsol gyis
rgyas par sangs rgyas rnam par 'phrul pa rgya chen po ston pa/ phyogs kun tu mngon sum du dmigs pa gang gis sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo rnam par 'phrul pas sbe btags pa rab tu thob pa dang/
de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs brnyan gyi sde na rabyangs sgrogs pas chos kyi dbyings dang nam mkha' kun tu snang bas/ gang gis sangs rgyas rjes su dran pa'i sgo nam mkhas sgro btags pa

rab tu thob pa de dag gi spyod pa shes pa'i m/ yon tan brjod par nus re skan/ song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyuda'adi nyid na/ phyogs kyi ljongs rgya mtsho'i sgo zhes bya ba yod pa de na dag slong rgyu
mtsho'i nA ces bya ba 'dug gas/ de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sams rapa'i sbyor pa la 'asung par bya ba dang/ ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig dang/ rigs kyi bu

dag pa'i bshes gnyen da khyod la dge ba'i rtswa sa'i tshogs dang rgyu yongs su ston par 'gyur ro// tshogs kyis rgya chen po'ang khong du chud par byed de/ rag pa'i rtsa ba'i stobs dang shugs rgya chen po'ang

yongs su skyed par byed do// byang chub kyi sams kyi tshogs dang rgyu rgya chen po'ang yong su rjod par 'gyur ro// thog pa chen po rab tu 'thob pa dang snang bar 'gyur ba'i rgyu rgya chen po'angaskyod par byed do/

pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshogs kyi stobs rgya chen po'ang rab tu rton par byed do// spyod pa rgya mtshol 'jug pa'i tshul rgya chen po'ang rab tu rjod pa ra 'gyur ro// smon lam gyi dkyil 'khor rgya chen po'ang yongs
su sbyong bar 'gyur ro/ sgo kun 'byung ba'i rgyan rgya chen pa'i ng rnam par sbyong bar 'gyur ro// snyingarje chen po'i stobs rgya chen po'ang yongs su 'phal bar byed do// de nas tshong dpon

gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/ dge slong sbyin gyi dpal gyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ dag slong sbyin dpal la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas te/ lan brgya stong du ma
phyir bltas nas dge slong sbyin gyi dpal gyi drung nas song ngo// tsa [”]bam po ragu bcu tham pa// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu 'or bzad s dge ba'i

gnyen gyi gdams dag de rjes su bsam pa dang/ ya shes snang ba ru rjes su dran par bya ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa de rnam par dpyad pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi

tshul de rjes su sbyang ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' rgya mtsho'i tshul de blta ba dang/ sangs rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor de la mngon par mos par bya ba dang/ sangs rgyas blta ba'i phyogs la mngon par sngo bar bya ba

dang sangs rgyas rgya mtsho ri la rjes su bsam pa dang/ sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu brgyad ra de rjes su dran par bya ba dang/ sangs rgyas kyi tshul rtogs par bya ba de lo nga du chud par bya ra dang/
sangs rgyas kyi nam mkha' ro la rjes su blta bar bya ba byed cing mthar gyis phyogs kyi ljongs rgya mcho'i sgo gang na ba dang/ dge slong rgya mtsho'i smin gang na ba der phyin nas/ dge slong rgyu
mtsho'i sprin gyi rkang pa gnyis la sa bos phyag 'tshal te/ dge slong rgya mtsho'i mal lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ dge slong rgya mtshor sbyin gyi mdun du 'dug ste/ thal
mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa bdag ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par zhugs te/ bla na med pa'i ye shes rgya mtsho la 'jug par 'chil na/ ji ltar
byang chub sams dpa' rnams 'jig rten gyi rgyud las phyir ldog cing/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su 'grub par 'gyur ba dang/ 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las sgrol zhing/ thams cad na khyenang ra/
