mtshor 'jug par 'gyur ba dang/ byis pa so so'i skye bo'i sa las gyen du 'phags par 'gyur zhing/ de la zhin gshegs pa'i rigs su 'grub par 'gyur ba dang/ 'khor ba'i rgyun las ldog par 'gyur

zhing byang chub sems dwapa'i spyod pa'i rgyur du 'jugapar 'gyur ba dang/ 'khor ba rgya mtsho'i rgyud kyi 'khor le las phyir ldog de/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang smon lam gyi 'khor gyi 'khor lor
'jug khar 'gyur kha par/ bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad ra'atu 'dzom zhing/ sangs rgyas kyi dkyil 'khor 'byung ba thams cad rab tu ston pa dang/ sred pa'i rgya mtsho yongs su skams shing snying rje
da chen po'i mtsho rnam par 'phel bar byed pa dang/ mi khom pa dang/ ngan song dang/ ngun 'gro dang/ log par ltung ba thams cad kyi sgo gcod cing mtho ris dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgo 'byor pa//

dang khams gsum gyi grong khyer gyi sgo rnam par gcod cing brams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi pho brang gi sgo rnam par 'byed pa dang/ yo byad thams cad kyi sngar pa rnam pa' sbyor zhing 'gro ba thams cad da snga
kha'i smon lam yongs su skyed par 'gyur ba ma 'tshal te// de skad ces smras pa dang/ dge slong rgya mtsho'i sprin gyis/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la 'di skad ces sus
so rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa legs so legs so// rigs kyi bu dge ba'i rtsa ba ma bskyed pa'i sems can rnams ni byang chub

tu sems kyang mi skye'i/ dge ba'i rtsa ba sgo kun tu snang ba rab tu thob pa dang/ thabs kyi snying po dang ldan pa'i lam gyi ting nge 'dzin gyi yid shes snang bas rab tu snang bar gyur pa dang/ bsod nams
rgya mtsho'i tshogs rgya chen po bsags pa dang/ dkar po'i tshogs thams cad kyi rgyun mi 'chad pa dang/ dag pa bshas gtan thams nyan bkur bas yongs su skyo ba ra pa dang/ lus dang
srog la 'phangs par mi spyi ba dang/ dngos po ra 'dzin pa thams cad dang bral lo dang/ mtho dman lon pa sa ltar sems mnyam pa dang 2 rang bzhin gyis snying rje zhing byams par nyi mas
pa dang ldan pa dang/ srid pa'i lam gyi rgyud thams cad du gnas par 'dun pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul la mngon par mos pa'i sems can rnams byang chub tu sems skye/
ste/ 'di ltar sems can thams cad yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir snying rje chen po'i sems rung/ 'gro ba thams cad la snyoms par nan tan du bya ba'i phyir byams pa chen po'i soms dang/ 'gro
ba thams cad kyi sdug bsngal gyi phung po zhi bar bya ba'i phyir bde ba'i soms dang/ mi dge ba'i chos thams cad las rnam par bzlog pa'i tshu wan pa'i soms dang/ 'jigs pa thams cad las/

sgyur yongs su bsrung ba'i phyir snying brtse ba'i sums dang/ sgrib pa thams cad rnam par bzlog pa'i phyir chags pa mang pa'i sems dar/ chos kyi dbyangs thams cad rgyas par dgang ba'i phyir rgya chen po//

sa mas dang 'gazhal ba'i phyi nas kun tu gzhol zhing kun tu 'gro bar bya ba'i phyir mtha' yas pa'i sems dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mthong zhing rnam par dmigs par bya ba'i phyir dri ma med pa'i sems/
dung dus gsum gyi dmigs pa ma lus par ye shes kyis rgyas par dbang ba'i phyi rnam par dag pa'i sems dang/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes rgya mtsho la la 'jug par bya ba'i phyir ye

shes kyi sems kyang skye bar 'khyar ro// rigs kyi bu kho bos ni phyogs kyi ljongs rgya mtshoT sgo 'dir lo bcu gnyis su rgya mtsho chen po 'di la dmigs te ]mngon du byas nas 'di ltar rgya mtsho rgya che
00shing tshad med pa la rjes subasam ba dang/ ri ma med chur dang ba dad/ zab cing gting dpag dka' ba dang/ bags kyis gzhol zhing legs ra ra gnas pa dang/ rin po che'i 'byung
gnas du mas rnam par brgyan ma nar/ chu'i phung po tshun med pa dang/ 'a dag rnam pa tha dad pa mang zhing bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang/ 'byang re ma 'a 5 pa'i gnas su gyur pa
rung srog chags mang po sna tshogs kyi rten du gyur pa dang/ sprin chen ro d+hI char yongs su 'dzin pa dang/ gang zhing 'bri ngar 'gyur ba mang pa la rjes su sems pa byed
rung gnas gnas te/ rigs kyi bu de la kho bos 'di snyam du bsams so// 'jig rten gyi khams 'di na rgya mtsho chen po 'di bas kyang 'phags par rgya che la/
sa 'di bas kya nga yangs shing/ 'di las kyang tshad med la/ 'di ngas kyang ngo mtsho ra dang/ na pa la la zhig yod dam snyam ste/ de de ltar kho bo tshul
bzhin du bsam pa yid la byed pa la ba rtson pa ra gnas pa'i tshe/ rgya mtsho chen po' 'og gi gzhi las pa/ chen po nor bu rin po che i/ nI la grub pa med cing/

rdo rje lta bur sra ba'i rtsub can/ nor bu rin po che bo rtung dam pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa/ 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser ltar dri ma med pa'i lo ma rgya chen po can/ dus dang mthun pa'i tsan dan gyi snying po'i
rgyan gyis brgyan pa/ rin po chesas gar ba'i rtsa ba can/ rgya mtsho tsam du yangs shing rgya che ba/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po brgya stong phrag bcus sdod pa'i sa nas ka= nga ra/ rin po
che sna tshogs brgya phrag stong gi dra bas kun nas yogs pa/ klu'i dbang po brgya stong phrag bcus sbos chu'achar mngon par phab pa/ nam mkha' lding gi dbang po brgya stong phrag bcus dar dang/ rin
pa rab lda ldi dang/ son mo de mang po mchus gzung zhing rab tu sbyangs pa// mi 'am ci'i dbang po brgya stong phrag b.rus phan pa'i sams kyis kun nas blta ba/ lte 'don po ni dbang po brgya
pa stong phrag bcu 'khor nas mngon par 'dud pa// srin po'i dbang po brgya stong phrug bcus lus btud cing mngon par mchod pa/ dri za'i dbang po brgya stong phrag bcus rol mo dang gu sna tshogs
snyan pas bstod cing mchod pa/ lha'i dbang po brgya stong phrag bcus lha rdzas kyi ma tog dang/ spos dang/ 'phreng ba dang/ bdug spos dang/ byug pa dang/ phyi ma dang/ gos dang/ gdugs

rgyudang rgyal mtshan dang/ lha'i ba dan gyi spyin gyi char mngon par phab pa/ rmongs pa'i dbang po brgya stong phrag bcus sa byos gtugs te phyag 'tshal zhing mchod pa/ gnam gtsang ma'i ris kyi lha brgya stong

phrag bcus thal mo sbyar cing phyag bya ba/ mi'i rebang po 'khor los sgyur ba brgya stong phrag bcus rin po che bdun gyiso bsu zhing mngon par mchod pa/ rgya mtsho'i lha brgya stong phrag bcus mngon par 'khro

[f ]cing phyag bya ba/ nor bu rin po che skur ma' ngad brgya stopaphrag bcu'i 'od zer gyis rab tu snang bar byas pa nor bu rin po che bsod nams kyis dag pa brgya stong phrag kas 'khos su 'bas par 'phel/

bas rab tu brgyan pa/ nor bu rin po rnam par snang ba brgya stong phrag bcus snying po rab tu gsal bar byas pa/ nor bu rin po che dpal gyi snying po brgya stong phrag bcusadapal chen po shan tu 'ab rngabar
gyur pa// nor bu rin po che mdzod sna tshogs rgya stong phrag bcus mthur bas par snang bar byas pa/ nor bu rin po che 'dzam bu'i chu klung brgya stong phrag bcus yongs su ston par gnas pas rab tu

brgyan pa nor bu rin po che rdo rje'i sang ge brgya stong phrag bcus thub pa med par brgyan pa/ nor bu rin po mnyi ma'i snying po brgya stong phrag bcus rgya cher gsal bar bgrubs pa nar bu rinapo che'abar

ba brgya stong phrag bcus kha dog sna tshogs su brgyan pa/ nor bu rin po che yi nga bzhin gyi rgyal po brgya stong phrag bcus mi brad pa'i rgyan rang 'od 'bar por byas pa byung ste pad+mochan pa de ni de bzhin
gzhigs pa'i 'jig rten las 'das pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba las byung ba'o/ byang chub sems dang 'a bsam ras yongs su brtan pa'o// phyogs thams cad mngon par dmigs su yod pa'o//
sgyu ma'i rnam pa'i chos kyi byeng ba'o// rjen pa'i dri mar pa'i las kyis byung ba'o// nyon mongs pa mar pa'i chos kyi tshul gyis brgyan ra 'o// rmi lam lta bu'i chos 9re kyis yongs su 'byung ba'o/
mngon par 'du bya ba man pa'i chos kyi tshul gyis rgyas btab pa'o// chags pa mad pa'i chos kyi rgyal dang ldan pa'o// phyogs kyi khams kun tu chos kyi dbus rgyas pa 'gag/
pa'o sangs rgyas kyi yul brjod pa dang mthun pa ste/ de'i rnam pa dang/ yon tan dang/ dbyibs dang 2 kha dog dang/ rgyan gyi mthar phyin par ni bskal pa brgya stong grangs med par sa pa khong du
chud par nus te/ pad+motsan po de'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku skyil mo krung du bzhugs pas khyab cing/ yongs su rgyas par mthong ngo// de bzhin gshags pa'i sa re'ang 'di nas bzung ba nas/

sade pa'i rtse mo'abar gyi mtha' klas par mthong ngo// de bzhin gshegs pa de'i gdan gyi rgyan bsam gyis ma khyab pa'i ng mthong ngo// 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi rkyen bsam gyis mi khyab pa na bod kyi dkyil 'khor gyi
rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang/ mchon phun sum tshogs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang/ dpe byad brlang po sna tshogs bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog gi mthu dang/ sangs
rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis ma khyab pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mdog rnam par dag pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang/ spyi gtsug bltar mi mthong ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa rang//
lcags yangs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ngamak+kong ngo// sangs rgyas kyi gsung gi rgyan bsam gyis ma khyab pa dang/ dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ng thos so// stobs rnyed
mdu pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang/ mi bsangs pa'i rgyan rnam par dag pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang/ tha dad pa yang dag par mkhyen pa'i stobs mngon par bsgrubs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ng rjes
chu shes so// sngon byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa yang dag par bsgrubs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ng rjes su dran no// mngon par rdzogs par byang chub pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab
pa'i ng mthong ngo// chos kyi spyin gyi 'brug snu mngon par bsgrags pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang/ yongs su bstan pa rnam par ramigs pa'i gnas dang/ rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ng thos
sa g.yas g.yon gyi sku'i rnam par tshang man pa bsam gyis ma khyab pa dang 2 sems can gyi ren dang dgos pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su grub par gyur pa'i ng mthong ngo// de bzhin gshegs pa
rjes kyang phyag g.yas pa brkyang zhing kho bo'i mgo la byugs nas chos kyi rnam grangs kun nas mig ces bya ba/ de bzhin shags pa thams cad kyi yul byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rab tu brjod pa/ chos
kyi dbyangs kyi gzhi dang rnam pa tha nad pa thams cad rab tu snang ba/ chos thams cad kyi rakyil 'khor la yang dag par gzhol zhing snang bar khyen pa 'a zhing ga rakyil 'khor dang rnam pa thams cad
rnam par dag pas yongs su snang ba/ phas kyi rgol ba'i dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'thor ba/ bdud kyi rakrugs ma'i dkyil 'khor thams cad rab tu 'joms pa/ sems can gyi
khams thams cad shin tu tshim par byed pa/ sems can thams cad kyi sde mas thibs po rab tu snang bar byed pa// sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin/
du rnam par dmigs pa sems can thums cad kyi dbang po 'khor lo'i rgyan dang many+ha snyang bar byed pa yang dag par bstan to// kho bos kyang kun nas mig gi chos kyi rnam grangs re blangs so/

ba byung ngo/ sprul to// bsams so// de ltar bzung ba de la'ang bla na na sAg tsho rgya mtsho chen po'i chu'i phung po tsus dang/ sI/gu re phung po'i ba ri'i rgyal po tsam zad par gyur kyang chos kyi rnam grangs de
a las le'u re re dang/ sgo re re dang/ chos kyi tshul ra ra dang/ chos kyi mig rnam par phye ba re re las kyang brang pa 'am/ 'grub pa 'am/ 'byung ba 'am/ mthar thug pa 'am/ mtha' khrir par
'gyur ba dmigs par mi rung ngo// rigs kyi bu de ltar bdag gis lo bcu gnyis tshang bar chos kyi rnam grangs kun nas mig ces bya ba 'di la nyi ma gcig cing yang shes pa 'dzin pa'i gzungs kyi 'od
tshesnang bas le'u grangs med pa zhig khong du chud do// zhi ba'i sgo'i gzungs kyi 'od snang bas le'u grangs med pa zhig la zhugs so// gong mtha' yas pa'i gzungs kyi 'od snang bas le'u grangs
]]mar pa zhig la yang dag par 'dug go/ sa la rnam par dpyad cing rjes su rtogs par byed pa'i gzungs kyi 'od snang bas le'u grangs mar pa zhig rnam par bsgoms ta rnam par dbye bcasaso/
gzi brjid dang ldan pa'i gzungs kyi 'od snang bas le'u grangs med pa zhig yongs su bungs so// pad+mo'i rgyan gyi gzungs kyi 'od snang bas le'u grangs med pa zhig mngon par bgrubs so// dbyangs
kyi tshul gyi gzungs kyi 'od srung bas le'u grangs med pa zhig yang dag par kha shad do/ nam mkha'i snying po'i gzungs kyi 'od snang bas le'u grangs med pa zhige rab tu phye'o// skar ma brtsegs pa'i
gzhung sa kyi 'od snang bas le'u grangs med pa zhageshIn tu rgyas par byas so/ rgya mtsho dang po'i gzungs kyi 'od snang bas le'u grangs med pa zhig yongs su bkod do// kho bo'i drung du shar phyogs
lags nas lha dar lha'i dbang po 'am/ klu dang klu'i dbang po 'am/ gnod sbyin dang gnod sbyin dbang po 'am/ ji bla dang dri bra'i rebang po 'am/ lha ma yin dang lha ma yin gyi dbang po 'am/ nam
mkha ba stong dang nam mkha' lding ga dbang po'am mi 'am ci dang mi 'am cu'i dbang po 'am/ lta 'phye chen po dang lto 'phye chen po'i debang po 'al/ mi dang mi'i dbang po 'am/ tshongs pa dang
tshangs pa'i dbang po 'am/ sems can gang su 'ongs kyang rung ste/ re dag thams cad da kazhin gshegs pa dang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa snang ba'i chos kyi rnam grangs kun nas mig ces bya
ba 'di nyid la rab tu bkod cing bcud do// de dag kun kyang kun nas mig gi chos kyi rnam grangs 'di nyid la mos par byas so// rtog tu btsud do// yongs su bstan to// yang dag par brjor ro//
kuny+tsa/ yongs su gsal bar byas so// rnam par bya 'o// rgyas bar byas so// mngon par bstan to// rnam par bkrol lo// rab tu phye'o/ shin tu snang bar byas so// de ltar
shar phyogs kyi la ji lta ba de bzhin du/ lho phyogs dang/ nub phyogs dang/ byang phyogs dang/ byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang/ shar lho'i phyogs mnaMms dang/ lho nub kyi phyogasaan
dang/ nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang/ 'og dang zla'i phyogs nas sems can gang su 'ongs kyang rung ste/ kun la'ang snga mabazhin no// rigs kyi bu de ltar kho bos ni chos kyi rnam grangs
nag cig gtsugashes par dran na/ byang chub saas dpa' smon lam yongs su dag pa dang ldan pas/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rgya mtsho thams cad la zhugs pa dang/ bskal pa thams cad

du gnas pa rgyan ma gcun pa'i phyir smo na lam rgya mtsho thams cud la zhugs pa dang/ bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rjes su 'brang bar bya ba'i phyir sems can rgya mtsho thams cad la zhugs pa dang/ stobs
bcu'i la shasaMchags pa med pa'isnang ba yongs su bsnyad pa'i phyir 'gro ba thams cad kyi sams rgya mtsho la zhugs pa dang/ yongs su sin par bya ba dang gdul ba'i dus las mi 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir
sems can thams cad kyi dbang po rgya mtsho la zhugs pa dang/ zhing thams cad rnam par dag par bya ba'i smon lam mngon par bsgrub pas zhing rgya mtsho thams cad la zhugs pa dang/ de bzhin
gshegs pa la mchod cing rnam gro byed pa'i stobs kyi sangs rgyas rgya mtsho thams cad la zhugs pa dang/ ye shes rnam par rig pas chos rgya mtsho thams cad la zhugs pa dang/ nonatananang ldan l
yon tan rgya mtsho thams cad la zhugs pa dang/ brjod pa thams cad du chos kyi 'khor lo bsor ba mngon par bsgrub pa'i phyir/ 'gro ba'iskar rgya mtsho thams cad la zhugs pa rnams kyi med pa shesal
'am yon tan brjod par nus re skan/ song rigs gyi bu 'di nas dpag tshar drug cu 'das pa lho phyogs kyi gnas 'danyide na/ lang ka'i gnas rgya mtsho'i ngogs shes bya ba yod de (de na dag slong
shin tu bton pa zhes bya ba 'dug gis/ de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sams dpa'i spyod pa yongs su sbyang bar bya ba dris shig/ de nas tshong
dpon gyi bu nor 'azangs kyis/ dag song myamacho'i sngon gyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshol te/ dge slong rgya mtsho'i sIn la la brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas yang
dang yang bltas te/ dag slong rgya mtshortsin kyi drung nas song ngo// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag de dang/ kun nas mig gi chos
kyi rnam grangs de'ang rjes su dran par byed cing/ de bzhin gshags pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa de'ang rjes su bsam pa dang/ chos kyi tshig dang yi ga'i sprin de dag kyang yongs su bzung ba dang/
chos kyi sgo rgya mtsho'i tshul de dag la'ang 'jug par bya ba dang/ chos kyi tshul de la 'ang rjes su rnam par blta ba dang/ sa kyi le'u dang glong gi tshul de dag la 'jug par bya ba dang/ chos

kyi nam mkha' de la yang drag par gzhol bar bya ba dang/ chos kyi dkyil 'khor de'ang rjes su sbyang bar bya ba dang/ chos rin po che'i gang de'ang rjes su sams shing mthar gyis lang ka'a gnas rgya mtsho'i rdzogs
shes bya ba gang na ba der phyin nas/ dag slong shin tu brtan pa mthong bar dga' zhing shar phyogs su bltas so// de bzhin du lho phyogs dang/ nub phyogs dang/ byang phyogs dang/ byang shar
gyi phyogs mnaMms rung/ shar lho'i phyogs mchoms dang/ lho nub gyi phyogs mtshams dang/ nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang/ bla dang 'og tu'ang dag slong shin tu brtan pa mthor bar dga' ste kun

tu bltas pa dang/ des dge slong shin tu brtan pa nam mkha'i rubyings la lha brgya stong grangs med pas yongs su bskor cing phan tshun 'chag pa mthong ngo// nam mkha'i dbyings na'ang lha'i dbang po rnams kyis

dge slongashin tu brtan pa la mchod pa'i las su bya ba'i phyir/ lha rdzas kyi ma tog sil ma'i sprin gyis yog pa dang/ lha rdzas kyi rol mo'i smin gyi sgra dang/ daragyi ba dan grangs med pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan par/
mthong nga// klu'i dbang po rnams kyis nam mkha' ni la a ka ru nag po'i spos mngon par 'thul ba'i sprin shin tu mtho ba las 'brug sgra bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'byung bar byas pa mthong ngo//
mi 'am ci'i dbang po rnams kyis nam mkhab dal lha rdzas kyi ngag snyan po rgyud kyis bstod pa'i la mo brdung ba dang/ bkral ba dang/ glur blang pa'i rdubyangs thams cad sbyar cing zungs pa thos par/
gyur to// lto 'phye chen de'i dbang po rnams kyis nam mkha' rdo la gos shin tu phra zhing mdog 'brang ba'i na lasam gyis mi khyab pa dag yode dga' ba bkye ste/ dge slong shin tu brtan pa la dad cung
mos pa'i gzugs su phyung ba mthong ngo// lha ma yin gyi dbang po rnams kyis kyang nam mkha' de la nor bu rin po che'i spyin bsam gyis mi khyab pa byin gyis brlabs te/ yon tan bsam gyis mi
khyab pa'i rgyan snang ba dang ston par byas pa ma shor/ nam mkha' lding gi dbang po mang po'ang mi'i gadrugs dang/ kha dog dang dbyibs su 'khod cing/ nam mkha' lding gi dbang po'i bu mos
kun nas bskor te/ gsod pa med pa la dga' zhing nyul mo sbyar te gnas pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa mkhrong ngo// gnod sbyin gyi dbang po brgya stong 'khor dang bcas pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag kyang
nam mkha' de la shin tu mi sdug pa'i gzugs su/ dge slongashin tu brtan pa la byams pa'i mthu dang ldan pa 'khod pa mtho da nga/ srin po'i rab ng po brgya stong 'khor dang bcas pa bsamagyig

mi khyab pa dag kyang/ nam mkha' de la dag slong kun tu brtan pa yongs su srung ba byed cing kun tu rgyu ba mthong ngo// tshangs pa'i dbang po brgya stong bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag kyang nam mkha' rdul
'thal mo sbyar nyid dga' ba dang yid du 'ong ba'i tshig gi rgyad kyis bstod pa rab tu brjod pa mthong ngo// gnas gtsang ma'i lha brgya stong bsam gyis mi khyab pa dag kyang nam mkha' de la/
dgo slong shin tu brtan pa la mchod pa'i las su bya ba'i phyir/ thal mo sbyar cing gzhal med khang nas gnas pa mag+hong ngo// de nas chong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/ dge slong kun tu
'a ba rtan pa de ltar nam mkha'i dbyings la 'chag cing 'dug pa mthong nas dga' rangs te mgu zhing nyams bde la tshim zhing yid bde ba skyes nas/ dge slong shin tu brtan pa la thal mo sbyar te phyag
'tshol nas 'di skad ces sus so// 'phags pa bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyar na/ ji ltar byang chub sams dpas sangs rgyas kyi chos btsal bar

brgya ba dang/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su bsgrub par bgyi ba dang/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su bsdu khar bgyi ba dang/ ji ltar byang chub
sams dpas sangs rgyas kyi chos bsten par bgyi ba dang/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpasasangs rgyas kyi sa bsgom par bgyi ba dang ji ltar byang chub sems dpos sangs rgyas kyi chos
tsho kyirjes su 'brang bar bgyi ba dang/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas sangs rgyas Mkyi chos yongs su brtul bar bgyi ba dang ji ltar byang chub sems dpas sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su bsgom par bgyi
ba dad/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas sangs rgyas kyi chos rnam par dag par bgyi ba dang/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su sbyang bar bgyi ba dang/ ji ltar byang chub sems
dpas sangs rgyas kyi chos khong du chud par bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la garams ngag dang rjes su bstan ba mdzad do zhes bdag gis thos na/ 'phags pa rje

ltar byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi chos la nan ton du bgyi/ ji ltar nan tan du bgyis na yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin dang sol bar mi 'gyur ba'i slar du/ sangs rgyas mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba dang/
byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba dang tshul gcig tu 'gyur ba'i slad du/ byang chub sems dpa'i mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba dang/ yi shes rtogs par 'gyur ba'i snyan du/ sangs rgyas
kyi chos rang mi 'bral ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi don yongs su thob par bgyi ba'i slad du/ byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam thams cad dang mi 'bralopa dang/ bskal pa thams
nyid du gnas pas yongs su mi skyo bar bgyi ba'i slad du/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang mi 'bul ba dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad yongs su dag par bgyi ba'i smad du sangs rgyas
kyi zhing thams cad rgyas par dgang ba dang ma 'bral ba dang/ ra bzhin gshegs pa tham sa cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad rnam par dmigs par bgyi ba'i smad du/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par
'phrul pa mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa stsal pa lta bu s sred pa'i rgyud thams cad du skye zhing shi 'pho ba'i skye mched rang gi lus kyis nyams su/
myong bar bgyi ba'i slad du/ 'dus byas kyi gnas dang mi 'bral ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams taMr kyi chos kyi spyin yongs su gzung ba'i slad du/ chos mnyan pa rang mi 'bral ba ngang dus
gsum gyi ye shes khong du chud cing rjes su 'brang bar bgyi ba'i sar du/ yi shes snang ba rangami 'bral bar 'gyur bar bdag la bstan du gsol/ de skad ces sas pa dang// dge slong
shin tu brtan pas/ tshong dpon gyi du zhor bslangs la 'di skad ces saso/ de ltar khyod kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sams bskyer de/ sangs rgyas kyi chos dang/ thams cad
mkhyen pa'i chos dang/ rang byung gi chos 'dri ba lags so legs so// rigs kyi bu kho ba ni byang chub sams dpa'i rnam par thar pa thogs pa med pa'i sgo thob pa ste/ rigs kyi bu byang chub sems
dpa'i rnam par thar pa thogs pa med pa'i sgo de kho bos blangs te/ yongs su bzung nas rjes su 'brang zhing rnam par dbye ba dang/ rnam par dpyad pa dang/ rnam par brgyus pa dang snang bar
bya ba dang/ rab tu snang bar byas pas thogs pa med pa'i mtha' zhes bya ba'i shes snang ba thob bo/ de thob pas kho bos risems can thams cad kyi sems dang spyod pa khong du chud par bya ba la
00 thogs pa mad do// sems can thams cad kyi skya ba dang shi 'phos yongs su shes par bya ba la thog pa mad do// sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran par bya ba'i sgor 'jug pa la thogs pa mad do// phyi ma'i
mtha'i bskal par 'gro ba thams cad dang 'grogs par bya ba la thogs pa med do// da ltar byung ba'i dus kyi 'gro ba thams cad rnam par rig par bya ba la thogs pa med do// sems can thams cad kyi

sgra skad dang kun rdzob yongs su shes par bya ba la thogs pa mad do// sems can thams kyi tho rtsom gnyan par bya ba la thogs pa mad do/ sems can thams cad kyi dbang po tha dad pa 'od du chud par bya ba
la thogs pa med do// sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang gdul ba'i dus su 'gro par bya ba la thogs pa med do// nyin mtshan dang/ skad cig dang/ yur ma dang thang cig dang/

dus kyi ming du bya ba khong du chud par bya ba la thogs pa med do// dus gsum rgya mtsho'i rgyur du 'jug par bya ba la thogs pa mad do// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing rang gis lus kyis rgyas par rab ng ba pa

bya ba la thogs pa med do/ de ni de ltar dngos po med pa la gnas shang mngon par 'du bya ba mad pa'i rdzu 'phrul thob pa'i phyir te/ rigs kyi bu dngos po med pa la gnas shing mngon par 'du bya ba mad pa'i rdzu
'phrul de'i byin gyis/ kho bo nam mkha'i dbyings 'di las phan tshun du 'gro zhing 'dug pa dang/ sAs pa dang/ sbyor lam sna tshogs su sbyar ro// mi snang ba byed de// snang bar 'byungango tu ba
'khrul bar byed do// ma lce 'bar bar byed do// gcig tu byas shing mang por bas+sar ro// mang por byas shing gcig tu bsgyur ro// snang ba dang mi snang ba'ang nyams su myong bar byer/
bo rtsig pa la'ang thags thogs mar pa dang/ ra ba la thags thogs med par 'gro ste/ raparanaM nam mkha' la bya ba bzhin no// zham tshakha' la'ang skyil mo krung gis 'go ste/ dpar na 'dab

ba chags bya bzhin no// sa la'ang bye'u zul dang stong du 'byang ba byed de/ dpar na chu la bya ba bzhin no// tshul 'ang bying ba med par 'gro ste/ dpar na sa la bya ba bzhin no// du ba 'khrul ba rang 'a

'bar bar byed ro// dper na ma'i phung po chen po bzhin no/ sa'ang yongs su g.yo bar bur do/ nyim dang zla ba 'di gnyis re ltar rdzu 'phrul che zhing de ltar mthu chal/ de ltar gza bang cha'od lag pas kun

nas yongs su khyug go/ tshangs pa'i 'jig rtan gyi bar dag tu'ang lus kyis dbang sgyur ro// 'jig rten na sngos kyi dud pan bun du chags pa'i sngon gyis kun nas khebs par byas shing rab tu 'bar bar byed

do[;]rin po che thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi smin gyi dra bas 'jig rten kun nas khebs par byas shing 'gro ba thams cad dang 'dra ba'i spul pa'i smin rab tu 'gyur do// kha rog mtha' yas pa'i 'od kyi dra ba'i sprin
rab tu bkye zhing phyogs kun tu 'ang 'gro ste/ 'di ltar shar phyogs su'ang 'gro'o// lho phyogs rang nub phyogs dang/ byang phyogs dang/ byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang shar lho'i phyogs
mchims dang/ lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang/ nub byang gi phyogs mnaMms dang/ 'og dang bla'i phyogs su'ang 'gro'o// sems kyi skad cig ra shing yang shar phyogs legs su 'jig rten/
gyi khams gcig kyang 'da' 'o// 'jig rten gyi khams gnyis dang bcu'ang 'da' 'o// 'jig rten gyi khams brgya dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams stong dang/ 'jig rten gyi khal brgya phrag stong dang

'jig rten gyi khams bya ba dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba phrag brgyu dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba phrag stong dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba brgya phrag stong dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams bya ba khrag
khrig brgya phrag stong dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams tshad med pa dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams dpag tu med pa dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams bsam gyis mi khyab pa
dang 'jig rten gyi khams mtshungs pa med pa dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams gzhal du mar pa dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams kun tu mtha' yas pa dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams mu med pa dang/ 'ji/
rten gyi khams mtshams med pa dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa dag kyang 'dul bar byed de/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag ni sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyad cig
bzhugs shing 'tsho gzhas la/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de dang de dag dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas pa de dang de dag dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi phyogs de dang de dag dang/ 'jig
[2， ]/rtan gyi khams kyi rgyud de dang de dag dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su 'du ba de rang de rag dung/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'byang ba de dang de dag rang/ 'jig rten gyi khams su bya ba

nga dang de dag dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sa de dang reg dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi bskal par bya ba de dang de dag rang/ 'jig rten gyi khams su 'jub pa de dang de dgadang/ 'jig rtan gyi khams kyi

snying po byang chub rnam par bkod pa de dang de dag dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dang da rag na/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rje snyad cig chos ston pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de

dag las/ de bzhin gshegs pa re re zhing ya nga sangs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyad kyi lus sna tshogs dang/ lus po zhing yang saMngs rgyas kyi zhing mtha' yas pa'i rdul shi'i tu
phra ba snyad kyi mchod pa'i sprin gyi char 'babs shing spyan sngar 'gro'o// de dag tu phyin nas kyang ma rtog thams cad dang/ rtsos thams car dang 'phrang ba thams cad dang/ phyi ma thams cad dang/
cug pa thams khur dang/ na bza' thams zur dang/ rgyal mtshan thams cad dang/ lha'i ba dan thams cad dang/ bla re thams cad ngang/ dra ba thams cad dang/ gzugs thams cad kyi mtshon
pa rgyun ma chad par byed do// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis gang ji sar du gsungs pa dang/ bstan pa dang/ brjod pa dang/ yang dag par bshad pa dang/ yang dag par sos padar
yongs su brjod pa dang man ngag tu gsungs pa dang/ shin tu bstan pa dang/ rab tu brjod pa de dag thams cad kyang shes shing 'dzin to// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag ga sangs rgyas kyi zhing
yongs su dag pa ji snyar pa de dag thams can kyang rjes su dran no// shar phyogs su ji lta ba de bzhin du lho phyogs dang/ chub phyogs dang/ byang phyogs dang/ byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang/
shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang/ lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang/ nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang/ 'og dang stong gi phyogs su'ang 'jig rten gyi khams gcig kyang 'da' 'o// 'jig rten gyi

khams gnyis dang brtsa' nga 'da' lo// 'jig rten gyi khams brgya nas 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i se yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed dag kyang 'ja' 'o// 'jig

rten gyi khams de dag na sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das ji snyad cig bzhugs shing 'tsho skyong la/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho de dang de dag dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dag pa re dang re dag nas/
'jig rten gyi khams kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor de dang de dag na chos ston pa de dag kun kyang mthong ngo// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la'ang ma tog thams car nas 1 gzugs thams car kyi bar gyis mchod
pa byed de// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis gang ji snyed du gsungs pa nas/ rab tu brjod pa'i bar re ngag thams cad kyang yongs su shes shing 'dzin to// sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'dra
de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa gang ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang rjes su dran no// sems can gang gis kho bo mthong bar gyur pa dang/ gang dang 'grogs par gyur/
ba de dag kun kyang bla named pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ro// sems na phra mo 'am/ rags pa 'am/ ngan pa 'am/ bzang ba 'am/ bde ba 'am/ mi bde ba gang ji snyed
cig kho bos mthong bar gyur pa de dag kun la'ang yongs su sa na par bya ba rang/ 'du ba'i dus las mi 'da' bar bya ba'i phyir/ khong ta de dag gi lus kyi tshod dang mnyam par lus byin gyis rlob bo//

sems can ji snyed cig kho bo'i drung du 'ong ba de dag thams cad kyang/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa kun tu 'gro ba 'di dang/ byang chub sams dpa'i rnam par thar pa rnam par gnon pa don yod pa
la rab tu gzhog go/ rigs kyi bu kho bos ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa thogs pa med pa'i sgo kun tu 'gro ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod pa dang rim gro rab tu sbyor ba/ sems can thams

cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang 'thun pa 'di shes par brad na/ kho bos byang chub sems dpa' snying rje chen po'i ngang tshul can theg pa chen po'i ngang tshul can/ byang chub sems dpa'i la ma rtang mi

'bral pa'i ngang tshul can/ thogs pa med pa'i ngang tshul can/ byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa'i snying pa chung mi gson pa'i ngang tshul can/ byang chub kyi sems yongs su mi gtong pa'i ngang tshul can/
sangs rgyas kyi chos la lhag par dmigs pa'i ngang tshul dun/ thams cad mkhyen pa yid la bya ba dang mi 'bral ba'i ngang tshul can/ nam mkha' dang mnyam pa'i ngang tshul can/ 'jig rten thams cad
la mi gnas pa'i ngang tshul can/ chur mi gson pa'i ngang tshul can/ ma nyams pa'i ngang tshul can/ ma gong pa'i ngang tshul can/ zlags med pa' dang rtul na/ ma 'dres pa'i dung rgyal can
rtog pa mar pa'i ngang tshul can/ 'gyod pa med pa 'i ngang tshulaM can/ rnam par dag pa'i ngang tshul can/ byang chub sems dpa' rdul dang bral ba de dag gi spyod pa shes pa 'am/ yon tan brjod

pa nus re skan/ song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyur 'di skyode na/ dra byi la'i grong rdal rdo rje'i grong khyer ces bya ba yod de/ de na ra bya la smin ces bya ba 'dug gas/ de'i gnan song la ji ltar byung
gsoms dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod la bslab par bya ba dang/ ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bcangs kyis/ rag song shin tu brtan pa'i rkang pa
gnyis pa spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ lan brgya stong du ma g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas te yang dang yang du bltas nas/ dge slong shin tu brtan pa'i drung nas song ngo/// de nas
tshong dbon gyi bu nor bzangs tshes kyi dad pa'i shugs dang byin gyis non pa/ sangs rgyas yid la bya ba'i 'du shes dang ldan pa// dkon mchog gsum gyi gdung mi gtud pa la rag tu brtson pa//
dus gsum snang bas sams snang bar gyur pa// smon lam chen po yid la byed pa dang ldan// sems can gyi khams thams cad yongs su bskyab pa'i thabs la zhugs pa/
'dus byas kyi dga' ba thams cad la mi gnas pa'i sems rang ldan pa/ chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin nges par rtogs par bya ba la brtson pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad yongs su
sbyang ba'i smon lam las mi g.yo ba/ sangs rgyas thams cud kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor na gnas pa med par gnas pa// chos kyi snang ba rjes su dran par bya ba dang/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen rjes
su dran par bya ba dang/ 'dod chags dang bral ba'i rigs yongs su rjod pa khyer cing/ mthar gyis dra byi la'i grong rdul rdo rje'i grong khyer ru phyin nas/ dra bya la sun yongs su tshol tshol ba las/

grong khyer gyi khyams shig na chos bstan pa'i don du sang ga'i khri la 'dug rung/ srog chags stong phrag bcu tsam zhage la/ chos kyi rnam grangs yi ge'i 'khor lo'i rgyud kyi rgyan ces bya ba yongs su ston
cing 'dug pa mthong ngo/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzungs kyis/ dra la sprin gyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'al te/ ru khyi la/ ni la lan brgya stong du mar g.yasaM
a phyogs su bskor ba byas nas mdun du 'dug ste/ thal mo sbyar nas 'di sa ces smras so// 'phags pa bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyer na/
ji ltar byang chub sams dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang/ ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba dang/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i byang chub kyisams srid pa 'i lam rgyang thams
car du chab ma 'tshol ba dang/ ji ltar yongs su skyo ba ma mchis shing bsam pa brtan par 'gyur ba dang/ ji ltar thub pa ma mchisapa'ing lhag pa'i bsam pa yongs su rag par 'gyur ba dang
ji ltar yongs su skyo ba ma mchis nagashing snying rjes chen po'i stobs yang dag par skye bar 'gyur ba dang/ ji ltar sgo kun nas zlum par dag cing gzungs kyi stobs gnon par 'gyur ba dang ji
ltar ma rig pa'i rab rib dang sgrib pa rnam par 'thor zhing shes rab kyi 'od chos thams cado la rab rib ma mchis pa'i snang ba skye bar 'gyur ba dang/ ji ltar ren rang chos dang/ nges pa'i
tshig dang/ spobs pa la mkhas pa'i dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs shing bden pa yang dag par shes pa'i stobs gzhon par 'gyur ba dang/ ji ltar sangs rgyas thams car kyi 'khor
la tha mi dadam yang dag par 'dzin nyung dran pa'i stobs yongs su gnon par 'gyur ba dang/ ji ltar chos thams cad kyi phyogs rig pa'i snang brjes su rtogs shing rig pa'i stobs rnam par
dag par 'gyur ba dang/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi stobs chos thams cad kyi don rnam par gdon mi za bar rab tu rabya ba la btsun pa 'jub par 'gyur ba ma 'tshal te/
de nas rnga bye la srin gyis byang chub sems dpa' la rim gror bya ba'i phyir seng ge 'i khri de las langs te babs nas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la lus thams cad kyis phyag
byas nas/ tshong dbon gyi bu nor bzungs la gsar gyi me tog gi phung pos mngon par gtor te// nor bu rin po che rin thang med pa mang po dang/ rtson ran gyi rtsa mdam pas kyang mngon par gtor to

tshe gos chon sna tshogs rnam pa tha dad pas kha dog bsgyur ba brgya stong phrag du mas kyang mngon par bkab bo// spos kyi ma tog kha dog rnam pa tha rar cing yid du 'ong la blta na sdug pa mang pos kyang mngon par
gtor nas/ mchod pa rnam pa sna tshogs gzhan dag gis kyang mchod pa rang/ rim gro dang/ bkur sti dang/ bsti stang cher byas te/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangasaM la 'di skad ces smras so/

rigs kyi bu khyor kyis re ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa legs so legs so// rigs kyi bu gang gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed
lce pa da ni/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gdung mi gcad pa'i phyir zhugs pa yin/ 'dod chags dang bral ba'i rigs yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par rig par bya ba la brtson pa yane/ zhing gi
rgyad thams cad yongs su dag par bya ba la zhugApa yin/ sems can gyi rigs thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang gdul ba la sta gon du gnas pa yin/ chos kyi rigs thams cad yang dag par ji
lta ba bzhin du brtags pa la brtson pa yin/ las kyi rigs thams cad rang mi 'gal bar gnas pa yin/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rigs thams cad yongs su rdzogs par bya ba la rab tu brtson
pa yin/ smon lam gyi rigs thams car rgyun mi gtur pa'i phyir yang dag par zhugs pa yin/ rus gsum gyi rgyud thams cad yi shes kyi khong du chud par bya ba la zhugs pa yin/ mos pa'i rigA
shin tu brtan par bya ba'i phyir brtson pa yin te/ nga ni de bzhin gshegs pa mang po thams cad kyis byin gyis brlabs pa yin/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yang dag par dgongs pa yin//
byang chub sems dpa' thums cad dang mnyam pa nyid du gyur pa yin/ 'phags pa thams cad kyis rjes su dgyes par bya ba yazhe tshongs pa'i dbang po thams cad kyis mngon par dga' bar/
bya ba yin/ lha'i dbang po thams cad kyis yang dag par mchod pa yin/ gnod sbyin gyi rab ng po thams cad kyis yongs su bsrungs pa yin/ srin po'i dbang po thams cad kyis rim gyur byas
pa yin/ rgyu'i dbang po thams cad kyis bsu ba yin/ mi 'am ru'i dbang po thams cad kyis mngon par bskor pa yin/ 'jig rten gyi dbang po thams cad kyis yang dag par bsngags pa yin/
des na sems can gyi khams thams cad kyang ngan song gi lam rgyud gsum po yongs su gcad pa dang mi khom pa dang/ ngan 'gro'i lam thams cad bzlog pa dang/ dbul ba'i lam thams cad
[# ]@#// las yang dag kha 'da' ba dang/ lha dang mi'i phun sum tshogs nga thob par bya ba dang/ dgo ba'ab shas gnyas mthong ba dngam 'brel ba dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos rgya chen po
mnyan pa dang 'bral bar mi 'gyur ba dang/ byang chub sems kyi yan lag yongs su dag par bya ba dang/ byang chub kyi sams 'byung ba'i rgya yongs su bsgrub pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i lam snang ba
thob par bya ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i ya shis khong du chud par bya ba dang/ byang chub sams dang 'i sa la gnas par byi bas dbugs phyin par bya ba yin/ rigs kyi bu de la bdag 'di snyam du
sems te/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni deka' ba byed pa ste/ 'byung bar dka'azhing mthong bar dka' ba'o/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sems can rnams la bag dro bar byed pas pa
rang ma lta bu 'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten gyi rgyan du gyur pa'o/ khyung chub sems dpa' rnams ni sdug bsngal gyis mnar ba rnams la skyabs su gyur pa'o//
byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni 'gro ba thams cad yongs su bsrung ba'i phyir gnas su gyur pa'o/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni 'jigs pa sna tshogs kyis ga tsos pa rnams la dpung gter du gyur pa'o
byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni 'gro ba thams cad ngan song gsum du ltung ba las yongs su ston pa'i phyir rlung gi 'khor le lta bu 'o/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i

rtswa ba rnam par 'phal bar byed pas sa lta bu 'o/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni bsod nams rin po che'i mdzod mi zad pa'i gtos dang ldan pas rgya mtsho lta bu 'o/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams zhi ye shu

kyi 'od kyis snang bar byed pa'i phyir te ma lta bu 'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni dge ba'i rtsa ba shin tu mtho bas ra ba lta bu 'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni snying po byang chub tu ye shes kyi zla ba

'char bar 'gyur ba'i phyir zla ba lta bu 'o/ byang chub sems dang 'a rnams ni bdud kyi sde thams cad rab tu 'joms pas dpa' bor gyur pa'o/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni rang byung gi chos kyi grong khyer
du phyin par byed pas rtul phod pa lta bu 'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sems can thams cad kyi bdag la byams pa'i rlun yongs su snyams pas ma lta bu 'o/ byang chub samaMs dpa' rnams ni
chos kyi sbyin rgya chen po'i char mngon par 'babs pas sprin lta bu 'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sems can gyi dbang po dad pa la sogs pa'i myu gu rnam par 'phel bar byed pas char palta bu 'o//
byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni chos rgya mtsho'i 'gram yongs su ston pas mnyan pa lta bu 'o/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sems can thams cad 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las yang dag par sgrol ba'i phyir

tham pa lta bu 'o// byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni sems can thams cad kyis mngon par bgrod par bya ba'i phyir mu stags lta bu 'o// de ltar na dra spyi la srin gyis tshong dpon gyi bu nor bar ngs kyi mdun du
'dug ste/ tshig gi rgyad de dag gis byang chub sems dpa' rnams la yongs su bsngags pa byas nas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la legs so zhe ba snga grwa so

de ltar des byang chub sems dpa' yang dag pa ra dga' bar bya ba'i tshogis brjod pa'i/ kha'i sgo nas 'od 'phro ba'i phung po rnam pa 'di lta bu byung ste/ 'od 'phro ba'i phung po des stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i
'tshe 'jig rten gyi khams rgyas par gang bar gyur nas/ lha dang/ lha rdzu 'phrul chen po 'am/ klu dang/ chu rdzu 'phrul chen po 'am/ gnod sbyin dang/ gnod sbyin rdzu 'phrul chen po 'am/ dri za dang/
dri za rdzu 'phrul chen po 'am/ lha ma yin dang/ lha ma yin rdzu 'phrul chen po 'am/ nam mkha' lding dang/ nam mkha' ldang rdzu 'phrul chen po 'am/ mi 'am ci dang/ mi 'am ci rdzu 'phrul chen po
'am lho 'phye chen po dang/ lce 'phya chen po rdzu 'phrul chen po dang / mi dang/ mi rdzu 'phrul chen po 'am/ mi ma yin pa dang/ mi ma yin pa rdzu 'phrul chen po 'am/ tshangs pa dang/ tshangs

pa rdzu 'phrul chen po 'am/ sems can gang sus mthong yang rung ste// snang ba des yongs su snang bar byas pa de dag du phyi la sngon gyi drung du 'ongs so// de nas de ltar dra bu la sprin gyis bsam pa byin gyis
brlabs shing thal mo sbyarate gnasal/ lus dang sems sim par gyur paM/ dga' ba rgya chen po skyes pa/ sri zhu chen po la gas pa/ nga rgyal gyi rgyal mchinabcom pa/ g.yo sgyu dang bral ba/ dbang/

po rnam par dang bar gyur pa de dag la du bya la sprin gyis chos kyi rnam grangs yi ge'i 'khor lo'i rgyud gyi rgyan ces bya ba de nyid rgya cher yang dag par bstan to/ khong du chun pa dang/ rtogs pa dang/ shes/
pa dang/ rig par byas so// de thos nas kyang de dag thams cad bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog par gyur to// de nas de'i phyir chos kyi stan la 'dug/
nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu kho bo ni dbyangs dang ldan pa'i gzungs thob pa dag/ de'i mthus kho bos stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khamA
'di'i lha rnams kyi lha'i skad kyang shes so// de bzhin du klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po dang/ ma dang/ mi ma
yin pa dang tshangs pa rnams kyi tshangs pa'i skad kyang shes so// lha rnams kyi lha'i skad sna tshogs kyang shes so// de bzhin du klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ rnga rba rang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam
mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang lto 'phye chen po dang/ mi dang/ mi ma yin pa dang/ tshangs pa rnams kyi tshongs pa'i skad sna tshogs kyang shes so// lha rnams kyi lta'i skar gcig pa'i ng shes
so 3re bzhin du klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po dang/ mi dang/ mi ma yin pa dang/ rmongs pa rnams kyi
tshangs pa'i skad gcig pa'i ng shes so// lha rnams kyi lha'i skad bar d pa'i ng shes so/ de bzhin du klu dang/ gzhon srin dang/ dri za dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding
dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lho 'phye chen bo dang/ mi dang/ mi ma yin pa dang tshangs pa rnams kyi tshangs pa'i skad tha dad pa'i ng shes so/ byol song gi skye gnas su skyes pa'i sems can rnams kyi
brda dar skad dang/ ming tha dad pa'i ng shes so// sems can dmyal ba pa'i sems can rnams kyi skad rang ming rnams kyang shes so// gshin rje'i 'jig rtan pa'i sems can rnams kyi skad
dang ming rnams kyang shes so// 'phags pa'i skad dang ming rnams kyang 'os so// 'phags pa ma yin nga 'i skar dang ming rnams kyang shes so// byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi tshig dang/ brda
dang nges pa'i ngag soms can gyi bsam pa bzhin du 'byung ba'ang shes so// sems kyi skad cig re re la'ang dus gsum du gshegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs po rnams kyi rab kyi yan lag dang/

gsung rgyu mtsho sems can thams cad kyi ming dang gtam gyi sgra dang tshig tu ldan pa'i ng rtogs shing khod du chun do// ji ltar stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i sems can rnams kyi rnga

dang/ nges pa'i tshig dang skad dang/ ming rgya mtshol 'jug rung shasapa de bzhin du shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshar mar pa/ grangs mang ba/ bsam gyis mi khyab
pa mtshungs pa med pa/ kun tu m thol yas pa/ mu med pa sa mtshams mar kha/ gzhal du med pa// brjod du mad pa'i yang brjod du med pa dang/ de bzhin du lho phyogs dang/ nub phyogs//
dar/ byang phyogs dang/ byang bar gyi khyogs mtshams dang/ shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang/ lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang/ nub byang gi phyogs mtshams dang/ 'og rang stang gi phyogs kyi

'jig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong tshod med pa nas/ brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar gyi sems can rnams kyi brda dang/ ngos pa'i tshig dang/ skad dang/ ming rgya mtshonyams
cad la 'ang 'jug cing shes rta 1 ji ltar lha rnams kyi lha'i skad kyang shes so// tshangs pa nams kyi tshangs pa'i skad kyi bar du'ang shesaso// rigs kyi bu kho bos ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi

gzugs snang ba dbyangs dang ldan pa 'di shes par zar na/ kho bos byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba sna tshogs kyi brda'i rnam pa rgya mtsho la zhugs pa de dug dang/ 'gro ba so tshogs kyi skad dang ming rgya

mamol zhugag pa de dang/ 'gro ba sna tshogs kyi ming shin tu bstan pa rgya mtsho la zhugs pa de dag dang/ 'gro ba sna tshogs kyi brjod pa rab tu bkor pa dang/ rnam par sbyod pa rgya mtsho la zhugs pa de
rag dang/ tshig thams cad kyi mtshams sbyar ba rgya mtsho la zhugs pa de dag dang/ tshig lhur blangs te bstan pa rgya mtsho la zhugs pa de dag dang/ dus gsum gyi dmigs pa thams can dmigs gcig
tu rnam par sbyod pa rgya mtsho gang chen mtsho la zhugs pa de dag dang/ tshig gis btsugs te bstan pa rgya mtshol zhugs pa de dag dang/ tshig gnyis nas brtsigs tebastan/

pa rgya mtsho la zhugs pa de dag nang/ tshig rab tu phye ste bstan pa rgya mtsho la zhugs pa de dag dang/ chos thams cad rab tu dbye bas 'dul ba'i tshul bstan pa rgya mtshol zhugs pa de dag dang/ 'gro
ga thams cad kyi skad rgya mtshos zhugs pa de dag dad/ dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa'i rgyan thoms cad la khugs pa de dag dang/ yiki'i 'khor lo'i maran par bya bas rab tu dbye ba la
byung ba de dag gi spyod pa shes pa 'am/ yon tan brjod par nus re skan/ song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na/ yul nags tshal na gnas pa zhes bya ba yod de/ re na tshong dang ma btang
brjed ces bya ba 'dug gis/ de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sams dpa'i spyod pa la brtson par bya ba dang/ ji ltar 'byung bar bya ba dang/ ji ltar sems nges par
gzhag par bya ba dris shig/ de nas tshong dbon gyi bu nor bzungs kyis/ du bya la srin gyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bas phyag 'tshal te/ chos kyi rim gro byas nas/ dad pa'i
mtshan nyid rtsa ba tshugs pa la rab tu brtag pa dang/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen las 'ongs pa'i thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la yang dag par lta zhing gdong mchi mas gang bar dus te/ dra byi la sprin
ba[z]/la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas yang dang yang du bltas te phyag 'tshal zhing/ dra bya la sprin gyi drung nas song ngo/// bam po ragu bcu rtsa
gcig pa// nga//de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la byang chub sems dpa'i gzungs snang ba 'byed dang ldan pa'i rgyan de nyid la rjes su bsam pa dang/ byang chub se mas dpa'i skad kyi
tshul rgya mtsho de nyid la 'jug par bya ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshul phra mo la 'jug pa de ted rjes su dran par bya ba dang byang chub sems dpa'i sems rnam par byang bas rnam lar rag pa
de nyid kyi rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' dge ba'i rtsa ba'i bag chags bsdu zhing bsgrub pa mngon par bsgrub pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i yodasu smin par bya ba'i sgo de
khyed rnam par sbyang ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sems can bsdu ba'i ya shes de nyid shin tu byang bar bya ba dang/ byang chub sams dpa'i bsam pa'i stobs rnam par dag par
bya ba de nyid brtan par bya ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i lhag pa'i bsam pa'i stobs de zhe bar brtan par bya ba rang/ byang chub sems dpa'i mos pa'i rgyud de'ang yongs su sbyang ba dang
byang chub sems dpa'i sems de nyid gdon mi sra bar dag bar bsam pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' yi ram chen po de nyid mthar phyin par byed cing tshong dpon gyi du nor bzangs yi ramal
'bartan cing smon lam gyi sams kyis yongs su skyo ba med pa'i rgyud kyi rgyan dang ldan pa phyir ma ldeg pas rnam par gnon pa'i brtson 'grus casha/ yid kyis brtul ba las mi
[“ ]zlogs pa/ dar pa mi 'phrogs pa'i stobs dang ldan pa/ rdo rje'i mthu bo ches mi phyed pa'isams dang ldan pa/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen thams cad kyi garams ngag bskrun par yin pa//
shes rab ma bab pa'i yul dang ldan pa/ sgo kun nas rnam par dag pa la mngon du gyur pa/ yi shes rnam par dag pa'i spyod yul thogs pa med pa/ kun tu lhakha' ya shos kyi tshul snang ba dang ldan pa/
sa'i gzungs kun nas snang ba rab tu thob pa/ chos kyi rabyings kyi gzhi'i bye brag la mngon sum du gyur pa'i sa mas dang ldan pa/ gzhi kun la rten pa'i rgyan rnam par dag pa'i rang bzhin rnam pa
dmigs pa gnas mar pa dang/ bdag gi med pa dang gnyis su med pa skyed yul la rab tu brtson pa 'du shes thams cad las 'da' bar byed pa'i ye shes kyi sgo rnam par dag pa// chos
kyi phyags dang gzhi zhwa dad pa 'a phyogs la so sor rtog pa med pa// 'jig rten gyi gzhi dang phyogs kyi bye brag las phyir mi ldog pa/ chos kyi gzhi dang phyogs kyi bya drag las phyir ldeg pa/ sadA
rgyus kyi phyogs dang gzhi tha dad pa mthong ba dang rnam par rig par bya ba la gzhol ba/ dus kyi phyogs dang gzhi'i khyo brag khong du chud pa'i ya shes can/ chos kyi 'khor la yid du 'ong bas yang
dag par bsgrubs pa'i blo dang ldan pa// ya shas kun nas snang ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par snang bas sems gsal bar byas pa/ yid kyi lus yul kun dang ldan pa'i sa la zhugs pa//
de bzhin gshegs pa'i ye shes snang bas rgyud shin tu snang bar byas pa/ thams cad mkhyen panyid du dud pa'i rab ' rlabs kyi shugs kyis rab tu slob pa/ sangs rgyas kyis la mo pa'i
shugs dang 'bral ba med pa// de bzhin gshags pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis byin du brlabs pa/ sangs rgyas rnams car rang gi sams kyi rgyud du khong du chud pa'i 'od kyis snang bar gyur
nga 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rba ba thams cad rang gi lus kyis rgyas par dgang ba'i sen lam dang/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad rang gi lus su yang dag par bsdu ba rad/ mngon par
bsgrub ba la brtson pa de mthar gyis so song ste/ le bcu gnyis kyis yul nags tshal na gnas par phyin nas/ des tshong dpon ba tang rjod na btsal bcol te mthong ngo//
mthong nas kyang lus thams cad kyis phab ste/ phyag 'tshal nas mdun du 'dug ste/ thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces sus so// 'phags pa bdag re ring rag ba'i bshes gnyen dang
mjul bar gyur pa ni/ bdag gis 'thob par bgyi ba legs par thob bo// de ci'i slad du nan/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams na mashang bar dka' ba'o// 'byung bar dka' ba'o
'jal bar dka' ba'o// bgrod par dka' ba'o// bsnyen bkur bgyi bar dka' ba'o// mnyes par bgyi ba dka' ba'o// 'grogs par dka' ba'o// ma bon
bgyi ba dka' ba'o// dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams ni rjes su 'brang bar dka' ba lags na de lta bu'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang 'grogs pa de ring bdag gis thob par gyur te// 'phagA
pa bdag gis 'di lta ste sangs rgyas thams cad la bstan bkur ba dang/ sangs rgyas thams cud la rim gror bgyi ba dang/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhal blta ba dang/ saMngs rgyas thamA
cad rnam par dmigs pa ra bgyi ba dang/ sangs rgyas thams cad dang markos pa nyer klong par bgyi ba dang/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi smon lam khong du chud par bgyi ba rang/ sangs rgyas
thams cad kyi snyan lam yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba dang/ sangs rgyu thams cad kyi yang dag par bgrub par yang shes sbyar bar bgyi ba dang/ sangs rgyas thams cad rang ga lus su mngon par sgrub
pa dang/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis yang dag par bsgrubs pa rang gi skyed par bsgrub par bgyi ba dang/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa mngon sum du rtogs par bgyi ba dang
sangs rgyas thams cad kyi stabs rang mi bstadas pa yongs su dag par bgyi ba dang/ sangs rgyas thams rgyud kyis chos bstan pa min pas mi ngoms par bgyi ba dang/ sangs rgyas thamA
cad kyis chos bstan pa mnyan cing blang bar bgyi ba dang/ sangs rgyas rdams cad kyis chos bstan pa yang dag par gzung bar bgyi ba dang/ sangs rgyas skrams cad kyis chos ban+dan pa
rnam par rabya bar bgyi ba dang/ sangs rgyas thams car kyis bstan pa yongs su gzung ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad dang tshul gcig tu 'gyur bar bgyi ba rang/ byang chub
sams dpa' thams cad dang skal ba mnyam bar bgyi ba dang/ byang chub sems dang 'a thams cad kyi spyod pa yongs su dag par bgyi ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyisaM
rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par bgyi ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam mngon par sgrub pa rnam par dag par bgyi ba dang/ byang chub sams dpa' thams cad
kyi sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi mdzad rab tu thob par kyi ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi chos kyi gter dang mdzor mi zur pa'i ye shes snang ba 'thob par bgyi ba dong
byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi ting nge 'dzan gyi gtor dang ma dzod khong du chud par bgyi ba dang/ byang chub sams dpa' thams cad kyi mdzod tshad med pa mngon par bsgrub pa dang/ byang
chub saMms dpa' thams cad kyi snying rje chen po 'a gtar dang mdzod sems can 'dul ba'i mthar phyin par bgyi ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i
gtar dang mdzod rnam par dmigs par bgyi ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi dbang gi gter dang mdzad rang gi las dbang du d+ha na la/ byang chung
sams dpa' thams cad kyi rnam par dag pa'i gter dang mdzod rnam pa thams cad du brgyan par bgyi ba'i slad du/ bla na mad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems spyad nas/ 'phags
tsha pa da lta bu'i sam sa kyis bdag 'di'i mchis so// 'as pa de lta bu dang/ yid la smon pa de lta bu dang/ mngon par dga' ba de lta bu dang mas po da lta gu rang sa donamika
bar bsgrub par bsams pa de lta bu dang/ spyod yul mngon du bgyi ba de lta bu dang/ tshul khong du chud par bgyi ba la mos pa de lta bu dang/ rnam par dag pa la gzhol pa de lta bu dang/ rnam
par dpyod pa'i bsam pa de lta bu dang/ rob tu gzhol ba'i sems de lta bu dang/ dge ba'i sbyor ba de lta bu dang/ mngon du gyur pa'i dbang po da lta bu s bdag 'dir mas/ 'dzag
pa na byang chub sams dpa' rnams la garams ngag dang rjes su ston pa mdzad cing tshul ni nye bar ston pa mdzad/ rtags par bgyi ba na snang bar ma dzar lam na bsdus par mdzad
mu stags la mi 'jog par mdzadu chos kyi sgra ni rnam par 'byed par mdzad/ the tsom 'a yongs su gcod par mdzad chem zhur sal bar mdzar ying gtis kyi zug rngu ni 'byin par
mdzad/ dogs pa'i dri ma ni sbyong bar mdzad/ sems kyi thobs po ni snang bar mdzad/ sems kyi dri ma ni yongs su sal bar mdzod/ sams kyi rgyan ni rab tu dang bar mdzod//
sems kyi g.yo rgyu ni yongs su sil bar mdzad/ sems kyi dung pa ni yongs su sim par mdzadu/ 'khor ba las na sams rnam par bzlog par mdza mi dge ba las na phyir zlog
par mdzad/ soms can dmyal ba las mi ldog par mdzad/ gnas dang na dbral bar mdzad/ mngon par zhen pa las na gyin du bskyon pa mdzod/ chags pa mas cad las ni yongs
su 'grel pa mdzad/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du ni bsgrub pa mdzad/ chos kyi grong khyar du 'jug par bgyi ba'i slad du na mngon du gyur pa mdzad/ snying rje chen po la ni rab tu bsgrub pa mdzad/
byams pa chen po la ni rab tu gzhol pa mdzad byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la ni rab tu sbyor ba mdzad/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo bsgom pa la ni 'dzud pa mdzad/ rtogasapar 'gyur ba'i sgo la
ba gnas par mdzar/ rang bzhin nges par rtogs pa la ni gzhug pa mdzad/ stobs dang ldan pas na khyab par mdzad/ 'gro ba thams car mnyam pa nyir du 'i sems rnam par dbye ba mdzad
nga zhes thos na/ 'phags pa ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la brtson par bgyi/ ji ltar sbyar bar bgyi/ ji ltar brtson par bgyis na byang chub sems
00// dpa'i dkyil 'khor rnam par dag par 'gyur ba bdag la bstan du gsol/// de nas tshong dpon btang brjod kyis de'i tshe byang chub sams dpa'i ting nge 'dzin
gyi sgo sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yang dag par 'du ba zhes bya ba gzungs kyi sgo byang mtha' yas pa sngon du 'gro ba la sngon gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i shugs dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin
'tsha gyi rlabs/ 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pas yang dag par bsams shing/ ye shes snang ba lte bar bsgrubs pas snyoms par zhugs so// tshong dpon bang brjod da ltar snyoms pa ra
zhugs ma thag tu gzugs kyi lus yongs su dag pa rnam pa 'di lta bu gnas par gyur te/ lus yongs su dag pa de'i mthus phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i
rdul shan tu phra ba sAd masany+tsas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa dang bcas/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor dang bcas/ 'od rnam par dag pa dang bas/ sngon gyi spyod pa la bzhugs pa dang bcas/ sangs
rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang bcas/ son lam gyi tshogs dang bas/ stod pa dang 'byung ba'i rgyan rnam par dag kha dang bcas/ mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba yongs su ston pa dang
bcas/ chos kyi 'khor lo shin tu ston pa dang bcas/ sems can yongs su smin par mdzad pa dang bcas/ chos kyi chu 'i mthar thug pa dang bcas par kun kyang lus kyi khongs su chud cing

[j]'dus pa ra snang// de dag kyang phan tshunam 'dras pa dang/ phan tshun ma chod pa dang/ lan tshunashin tu rnam par phye ba dang/ phan tshun shin tu rnam par gnas pa dang/ tshul sna tshogs su khazhug
pa dang/ yang dag pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par dmigs pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhiri rgyan sna tshogs can mnga' ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor sna tshogs kyi rgyan dang ldan r
dang sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa sba tshogs su yongs su ston par snang ngo// theg pa sna tshogs rnam par dgod pa mdzad pa dang/ smonalam gyi sgo sna tshogs yongs su brjod pa dang/

'jig rten gyi khams la la na na dga' ldan gyi pho brang du skyes shing/ sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las thams cad mdzad par snang ngo// la la na ni dga' ldan gyi phro brang nas 'pho ba dang/ la la na ni yum

gyi sku na bzhugs shing rnam par 'phrul ba sna tshogrwa yong su ston pa dang/ la la na ni skye ba dang/ la la na ni byis pa'i rtsod mo ston pa mdzad pa dang/ la la na ni btsun mo'i 'khor kyi nang na bzhugs pa dang/
la la na ni mngon par 'byung ba dang/ la la na ni/ de po byang chub tu gshegs te rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyanachen pos bdud kyi lnga lam par mdzad pa dang/ la la na ni lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin
dang dri zas yongs su bskor cing/ tshangs pa'i dbang pos chos kyi 'khor lo bskor bar gsol ba gdab pa dang/ la la na ni chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba mdzad pa dang/ la la na ni sems can thams
nyid kyi gnas na bzhugs pa dang/ la la na ni yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar snang ngo/ 'jig rten gyi khams la la na ni de bzhin ga shags pa mya ngan las 'das ba rnams kyi/
ring bsrel rnam par 'god par snang ngo/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing la la na na lha dang mi rnams de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten la rgyan gyis grub pa byed bar snang sku/ sangs bcom ldan 'das de dag gis
sems can gyi ris rnamapa tha dad pa dang/ sems can gyi 'jig rten rnam pa rba dad pa dang/ sems can gyi lam rnam pa zhwa dad pa dang/ sems can gyi skye gnas rnam pa tha dad pa dang des nas

can gyi tshogs rnam pa grwa dad pa dang/ sems can gyi dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rgyu ra rnam pa tha dad pa dang/ sems can gyi lam gyi rgyud rnam pa tha dad pa dang sems can gyi bsam pa'i rgyud rnam pa tha dad pa
pa dang/ sems can gyi mos pa'irgyuda rnam pa tha dad pa dang/ sems nyon gyi dbang pa'i rgyud rnam pa bdad pa dang/ dus kyi rgyur rnam pa tha dad pa dang/ sems can gyi las kyi bya khrag rnamar/
tha dad pa dang/ sems can gyi lAmi mthun pa rnam pa tha dad pa dang/ sems can gyi 'jig rten rnam par dbye ba rnam pasmad r ba dang/ sems can gyi tshul lam dang sngonapa rnam pa tha dad pa la rnam par
sbyon pa dang/ sems can rgya mtsho bsam pa dang sbyor ba'i rnam pa rba dad pa dang/ dbang po mi mthun pa sna tshogs rnam par dag pa dar/ nyon mongs pa dang bag chags sna tshogs bag la nyal bar

gyur pa 'a sems can 'khyag klus pa rnams la sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'khrul pa rnamasna tshogs yongs su bstan pa dang/ yul sna tshogs kyi nges pa'i tshig dang/ dbyangs kyi yan lag dang/ gsung rnam pa sa/

tshogs su bsgrub pa dang/ mdo sde sna tshogs kyi tshul rab tu 'arjod pa dang/ gzungs kyi sgo rnam pa tha dad pa'i sa rgyud dang/ bdad pa yang dag par mkhyen pa'i tshul kyi gzhung sna tshogs dang 'phags
pa'i bden pa'i ming rgya mtsho'i rgyud rnam pa sna tshogs dang/ sangs rgyas kyi khyu mchog dang/ sang ge'i nga ro rab tu bsgrig pa dang sems can gyi rig ba'i rtsa ba sna tshogs bstan pa'i cho 'phrul
yongs su bstan pa dang/ rngon pa sgo tshogs can shin tu bstan pa'i rnamaNor 'phrul pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i lung bstan pa'i srang ga'i nga ro sna tshogs dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
chos kyi 'khor lo'i mthu byung ba rnam pa sna tshogs kyis 'khor gyi dkyil khor mtha' dang dbus med pa mtha' yas par rnam pa tha dad pa phan tshun ma chod pa dang/ rnam par dag pa'i 'khor gyi
dkyil 'khor sna tshogs mos pa dang/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor shin tu phra bar 'dus pa dang/ dpag tshan gcig gi tshad tsam dang/ dpag tshad bcu'i tshad tsam dang/ dpag tshad brgya'i naM da tsam
nas/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba stod kyi tshad tsam du songs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gis/
de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung dbyangs kyi yan lag dang/ sgra skad thams cad kyi rjes su 'gro bas/ chos ji snyad du bstan pa de dag thams cad kyang tshong dubon gyi bu zhon/
pazangs kyis zos so// blangs so/ yang dag par bzung ngo// bsams so// sangs rgyas kyis rnam par 'phrul pa de dag kyang mthong/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi
khyu mchog gamathu phyung ba de dag kyang mthong nga/ de nas tshong dpon btang rjod dran zhing shes bzhin du ting nge 'dzin de las langs zhus/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la 'di skad
tsos smras so/ rigs kyi bu kho bo ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par thar pa thogs pa med pa'i rgyan ces bya ba yongs su blangs shing 'dzin pa te/ rigs kyi'u de ltar kho bo de bzhin gsheg
pa rnam par thar pa thog pa med pa'i rgyan de la rtog cing dpyod pa'i rma/ shar phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'dzam bu chu klung gi mdog dang ldan pa nA/ de bzhin gshegs pa la bcom pa yang
tug par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas skar ma'i dbar phyag rgyal po zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' rnam par snang ba'i snying po la sogs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams
cad dang/ thabs cig tu bzhugs pa'i ng mig lam du snang ngo// lho phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams stobs thams cad kyashugs dang ldan pa na/ ro bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas spos kun tu rnam par yangs pa zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' bas ma pa'i rgyal po la sogs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad/
dang thabs cig tu bzhugs pa 'ang mig lam du snang ngo// nub phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams spos thams cad kyi 'od dang ldan pa na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogA
nga sangs rgyas mar mapa'i sangs rgyas ri rab mar ma'i rgyal po zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' chags pa med pa 'i sems la sogs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang thabs

cig tu bzhugs pa'i ng mig lam du snang ngo// byang phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams dur smrig rgyal mtshan na/ de bzhin gshob [= ]'gazar che khams pa ga la ma na/de ba'i tshogs pa dgu bcug pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangasazla
rdo rje rab du 'dul ba zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' rdo rje'i gom pas rnam par gnon pa la sogs pa// byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang thabs cig tu bzhug
pa'i ng mig lam du snang ngo// byang bar gyi phyogs mnaMms kyi 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che thams cad rab tu 'bar ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogasaM
pa'i sangs rgyas mi dmigs pa'i spyan rnam par dmigs pa zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' dmigs pa med par shin tu sprul pa la sogs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil
'khor thams cad dang thabs cig tu bzhugs pa' da mig lam du snang ngo// shar lho'i phyogs mtshams kyi 'dzig rten gyi khams spos kyi 'od zer rab tu sbang kha na/ de
bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i ngas rgyas sbyos kyi mar ma zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhi thu nang pa'i dpal gyi rgyal po la sogs pa/
byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang thabs cig tu bzhugs pa dang mig lam du snang ngo// lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams kyi 'jig rten gyi khams nyi ma'i zer ltar snang ba na/
de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sgo kun nas ye shes rnam par snang ba'i dbyangs shes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' ma rtog gi 'od kun nas 'phro/
bar gtsug phud rab tu 'phyang ba la sogs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams car dang blubs cig tu bzhugs pa'i ng mig lam du snang ngo// nub byang gi phyogs
mchims kyi 'jig rten gyi khams sbos kyi rgyan yid du 'ong ba dge ba'i snying po na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon tan rgya mtsho tshad med pa'i
'od ces bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' lus kyi 'od zer klogs pa med pa'i gzi brjid rgyal po blo gros la sogs pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang sgribs/
cig tu bzhugs pa'i ng mig lam du snang ngo// 'og gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi 'ams rin po che'i seng ge srung zhing 'bar ba na/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs/
pa'i sangs rgyas 'od zer chos kyi dbyings su snang ba zhes bya ba/ byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyings 'or 'phro zhing rnam par snyang bar byung ba'i blo gros la sogs pa/ byang chub sems
dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang thabs cig tu bzhugs pa'i ngamig lam du snang ngo// steng gi phyogs kyi 'jig rten gyi khams mtshon gyi 'od rnam par snang ba na/ de bzhin gshegs
pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas yon tan grags pa thogs pa med pa'i rnam par thar pa'i 'od kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba/ byang chub sams pa' stobs dang brtson 'grus thog sa
pa mar pa'i blo gros la sogs la/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang thabs cig tu bzhugs pa'i ng mig lam du snang ngo// rigs kyi bu re ltar re bzhin gsheg
pa 'di dag la sogs pa/ phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa ragra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sangs rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba med mthong yang/ de bzhin
gshegs pa de dag kyang 'dir ma byon/ kho bo'ang der 'gro ba me re/ nam 'dod pa de na bde ba yong pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'or snang mtha' yas bzhugs
ba'ang mthor ngodo tsananan yod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od sang rdo rje bzhugs pa'i ng mthong ngo// spos dri yod pa'i 'jig rten/
gyi khams na/ de bzhin gshegs pa'od snang rin chen bzhugs ba'ang mthong ngo// pad+mo yod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od sAr rin chen pad+mo bzhugs pa'i ng
'tsha ma klong ngo// gsar yod pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ de bzhin gshegs pa 'od snang zhi ba bzhugs pa'i ng mkhrong ngo// mngon par dga' ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ da ba'i
gshegs pa mi bskal ba bzhugs pa'i ng mthong ngo// shin tu brtan pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ de bzhin gshegs pa sang ga bzhugs pa'i ng mthong ngo// me long
thog dkyil 'khor ltar snang ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams na/ da bzhan gshegs pa blo gros zla po bzhugs pa'i ng mthong nga/ rin chen dpal gyi ngang pas brgyan pa'i 'jig rten gyi
khams na/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnam par snang mdzad bzhugs pa'i r mthong ngo// rigs kyi bu de ltar kho bos ni phyogs gang dang gang du/ 'jig rten gyi khams gang dang gang gi
ra bzhin gshegs pa gang dang gang mthong bar 'dod pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa de dang de dag kyang mthong ngo// dus gang dang gang du dmigs pa gang dang gang la sngon gyi spyod pa gang dang
wazhi/ gang gis de bzhin gshegs pa ma zong bar 'dod pa dang/ rnam par 'phrul pa gang dang gang gi don dang/ sems can 'dul ba gang dang gang gi don du de bzhin gshegs pa gang dang
gang mthong ba 'dod pa'i de bzhin gshog pa de dang de dag kyang mthong ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag kyang 'dir gshegs pa ma yin/ bdag kyang der phyin pa ma yin no// rig
kyi bu de ltar kho bos de bzhin gshogs pa rnams ga las kyang byon pa mang par shes la/ rang gi lus kyang gar yang 'gro ba mad par shes pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams rnam
pa' dmigs pa'i ng rmi lam lta bur shes lu/ rang gi rma mas rnam par dmigs pa'i ng rmi lam dang 'dra bar rgyu ba rangashes pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams rnam par dmigs pa'i ng
gzugs brnyan lta bur shes la/ rang gi sems rnam par dmigs pa'i ng chu'i snod gsal ba lta bur shes po dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams rnam par dmigs pa'i ngasgra mas
byas pa'i gzugs lta bur shes la/ rang gyi sams rnam par dmigs po'ang sgyu ma lta bur shes pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsur yang sgra brnyan ri'i brag cha lta khyorarjod
parags la/ rang gi sems rnam par dmigs pa'i ng sgra brnyan lta bur shes pas u0f38/ byang chub sems dpa'o rnams kyisangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad ni rang gi sems kyi byin gyi rlabs
[p/ ]@#// las byang ngo zhes bya bar rjes su rtogs shing khong du chud de// sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa thams cad kyang rang gi sams kyi nyin gyi rlabu so// byang chub
sams dpa'i spyod pa'i ng rang gi sems kyi byin gyi rlabs so// sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang gdul ba'ang rang gi sems kyi byin gyi rlabs so// byang chub sems
dpa'i son la ma mngon par bsgrub par nga rang gsesams kyi byin gyi rlabs sa// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi grong khyer du phyin par bya ba'ang rang gi sems kyi byin gyi rlabs so// rnam
par thar pa bsam gyis mi khyab pos rnam par rtsa ba'ang rang gi sems kyi byin gyi rlabs so// sangs rgyus kyi byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par tshong rgya ba'ang rang gi sems kyi byin gyi
[-]/ rlabs so// chos kyi dbyings kun lus 'dus par khyu mchog gi mthu 'byang zhing rnam par 'phrul pa'i ng rang gi sems kyi byin gyi rlabs so// bskal pa thums cad shin tu phra ba pa
sdu ba'i yi shes kyang rang gi sems kyi phyi na gyi rlobs si zhes bya bar khong du chud rung rjes su rtogs so// rigs kyi bu de la kho bos 'di snyam du sems to/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad
kyis na rang gi sems nyid nye bar brtan par bya'o// chos kyi sprin gyis ni rang gi sems rtsod yongs su dran par bya'o// sgrab pa'i chos rnams las ni rang gi sa mas nyin yo ngas su
sbyang bar bya'o// brtson 'grus kyis ni na nga gi sems nyid brtan par bya'o// zod pas na rang gi sems nyid mnyam par bya'o// ye shes khong du chud par bya ba la ni rang gi sems
nyid gzhol bar bya'o/ shes rab kyis ni zerang gi sems skyid yongs su sbyang bar bya'o// dbang rnams la ni rang gi sams nyid mngon par bsgrub par bya'o/ sangs rgyas drang mnyam pa
rkyen la ni rangag sems skyid rgyas par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcus rang gi sams nyir snang bar bya'o snyam mo// rigs kyi bu kho bo ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i
rnam par thar pa thogs pa med pa'i gyon 'di shes te/ bungs shang yongs su 'dzin par zar na/ kho bos byang chub sems dang ba chags pa med pa'i sems dang ldan pa chags pa
man par rnam par spyod pa'i spyod yul rang ldan pa/ dra ltar byung ba'i sangs rgyas thams cad mngon sum du bzhugs pa'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob pa/ mya nga bya las 'da' ba med pa'i mtha'
la gnas pa'i rdzogs pa'i byang chub kyi sgo'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob pa/ nus gsum mnyam pa nyid du gyur pa/ gzhi kun nas phur pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sbyor yul gyi tshul shes pa/
sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du lus rnam par bkram pa/ sangs rgyas kyi sbyor yul tha mi dad pa la rnam par sbyod pa/ phyogs thams cad du mngon par phyogs pa'i sbyor yul rang snonapa
phyin phyogs med pa'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor gyis rnam par lta ba de dag gi lus la 'ad+hig rten gyi khams thams cad 'jig cing 'du bar snang yang/ re dag la bdag rang 'jig
rten gyi khams su gnyis kyi 'du shes med pa de dug gi spyod pa shes pa 'am/ yon tan brjod par nus re skan/ song 'khogs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyur 'di nyid kyi 'dzam bu gling ga mgo 'gab/

tshe pas rgyas par 'gangs pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de nas dge slong rgya mtsho'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba 'dug gi// de'i gca ru song la ji ltar byang chub sazhu ralA byang chub semA daN gi nyi na pa la chas/
ba bya ba dang ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dus shig/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/ tshong dpon btang brjod kyi rkang pa gnyis la skye bas phyag 'tshal te/ tshong dpo za
btang brjod la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas yang dang yang bltas to/ tshong dpon btang 'arjod kyi yon tan grangs mar pa la snyan par rjod de brtag pa dang/
mos par bya ba dang/ mi gtang bar bya ba sams shing ngu lta/ smra sngags bton nas/ dag ba'i bshes ga'on sdug par sems shing dge ba'i bshes gten gyi rdzas su 'brang ba dang/ dag
ba'i bshes gnyen bsnyen bkur bar mos pa dang/ rag ba'i bshes gnyen gyis bsgo ba dang mi 'gul bar byed po dang/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rag lus pa 2
0 rjes su lta ba dang/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rjes su bsam pa dang/ dge ba'i she sa gnyen la g.yo sgyu med par spyod pa dung/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi sams kyi dbang du 'gro bar
bya ba dang ldan pas dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams gnod pa thams cad yongs su sbyong bar byed pas ma tsamaM du soms/ dge ba'i rtsa ba h+phams cad yongs su spyod pas tsam du sems
shang tshong dpon btang brjod kyi drung nas song ngo/// de nas tshong dbon gyi bu nor bzangs/ tshong dpon btang brjod kyis bstan pa de la rjes su sems shing/ tshong
dpon pa dang brjod kyi gdams ngag la non na bya ba dang 1 byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rjesasu 'brang bar bya ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i ye shes snang
ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa rjes su dran par bya ba dang/ chos kyi dbyangs la 'jug cing ba la pa 'osam gyis mi khyab pa khong du chud par bya ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi yongs su 'du bar
bya ba'i tshul bsam gyis mi khyab pa la 'jug par bya ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i snum par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa rjes su blta bar bya ba dang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su bsdu

ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mos par bya ba dang/ sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyi rgyan rje su sbyang ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin dang ma ba ra thar pa'i rnam par dgod pa dang/ tshu
@#// mchog gi mashu phyung ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa la yongs su brtag pa dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams grwa dad pa la bslebs pa med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa la 'jug pa dang/
la byang chub sems dpa'i las la bsame pagan tu brtan pa de la nan tan du bya ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i las dang smon lam gyi rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pa de'i rjes su snyan cing/ maShar
gyis 'dzam bu gling gi mgo 'gabs pas rgyas pa la 'gangs pa zhes bya ba gang na ba der phyi nas/ rage slong rgya mtsho'i rgyal mtshan s tshol rtsol ba las 'chag pa'i gnas shing gi 'chagasa'i
na nyar 'dug ste/ ting nge 'dzin la snyoms par gzhag nas/ dbugs phyi nang du rgya ba mo da rung mi g.yo la/ byed pa mod cing lus drang por bsrangs te dran pa mngon du byas nas/ ting nge
'dzin gyi rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pas rnam par 'phrul zhing/ g.yas g.yon dang seng logs su lus mnya' yas la/ tshor mad cing bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ si ga nug
dbaltar mi mgrong ba/ kha dog ru ma'i lus dang ldan pa/ sams kyi skad cig re re la kha dog rnam pa tha dad pa tshad med pa yongs su ston pa de/de ltar mnyam par bzhag cing zab la ste/
g.yo ba mad cing dmigs pa med la/ dga' bas lus mtho bar gyur pa de'i ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas/ byang chub sams dpa'i rnam par thar pas rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab/
0 la rab tu 'gyod pa byed cing 'dug pa mthong ngo// rnam par gyur pas rnam par 'phrul pa de'i mthus/ sems kyi skad cig re re lasems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang/
de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mchod pa sbyang pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yongs su dag par bya ba dang/ sems can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal gyi phung po rnam par bzlog/
pa dang/ ngan song gyi lam thams cad yongs su gcad pa dang/ sems can thams cad kyi bde ba'i lam gyi sgo dbye ba dang/ sems can thamasaM cud kyi nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba
rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang/ sems can thams cad kyi mi shes pa'i slob pa rnam par gtor ba dang/ sems can thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la dgon pa'i phyir/ rnam par 'phrul
pa'i bye brag rnam pa sna tshogs mthar mas pas chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par 'gengasashing/ de'i rkang pa'i mthil gnyis nas tshong dpon gyi tshogs bkur sa dang rim gro sna tshog M
bye dpa/ 'jig rten gyi khams k+Shams cad du gtogs pa'i tshong dpon dang 'dra ba'i gzugs dang ldan pa/ lhag pa'i yul sod pa/ rgyan sna tshogs kyis lus shin tu klubs pa/ thor
tshugs dang/ gtsug gi rin po che dang/ cod panasA tshogs thogs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyan byis pa bye ba 'phyos pa'i 'khor dang ldan po ra 'byung ba
mthong ngo// bram ze dung khyim bdag mang po bza' btung rnam pa mang po dang/ ro'i yan lag sna tshogs su sngar ba thams cad dang/ rgyan thums cad dang/ gos thams
[A• ]/cad dang/ me tog thams can dang/ 'phreng ba thams cad dang/ spos thams can dang/ byag pa thams cad dang/ 'dod pa'i yo byad thams cad dang/ rin po che thams cu dang//
gnas thams cad dang/ rtsod rnam pa sna tshogs thams cad dang/ yo byad rnam pa sna tshogs thams cad kyis sems can dbul po rnams yongs su myur cing/ 'gro ba sdug losngal ba rnams
dbugs dbyung ba dang/ sems can gyi sams ches par bya ba dang/ sems can gyi bsam pa rnam par dag par bya ba dang/ sems can rnams byang chub tu yongs su sAn par byed cing/ phyogs
bcu bkong ste 'dong ba mthong ngo// pus mo'i lha nga gnye sa nas rgyal rigs mkhas pa'i gzugs dang/ bram ze mkhas pa'i gzugs dang/ 'jig rten na mkhas pa'i gzugs dang badzra
sna tshogs la mkhas pa'i gzugs dang/ mi'i 'gro ba'i rgyung na mkhas pa'i gzugs dang/ 'jig rten pa dang 'jig rten las 'das pa'i las kyi tshul dang/ rgyus la gas lazhing mkhas pa'i
gzugs dang/ 'jig rten gyi slob dpon du bya bar mkhas po'i gzugs cha byad rnam pa du ma dang ldan pa/ dbyibs dang rgyan rnam pa du ma dang ldan pa/ yid du 'ong ba'i tshig mang po brjod pas
yid mi bde ba'i sems can rab tu dga' bar byar rung/ chos kyi nor gyis dbul ba'i sems can rnams la phan gdags pa dang/ sdug bsngal ba'i sas snyan rnams bde bar bya ba nad
log par lhung ba'i sems can rnams mngon par gnon pa dang/ theg pa'i gru la nyam nyes su gyur pa'i sems can rnams dbugs dbyung ba dang/ 'jigs pa'i sems can rnams yongs
su ba skyab pa dang/ dge ba'i rtswa ba'i sgra kun tu grag par bya ba ngang/ sdig pa las bzlog pa'i sa yongs su bsgrag pa dad/ ngag nga'i chos yang dag par rlung bu la sems can gzung pa dang/
dan sad pa la sems can dgod pa dang dga' bat+ti zhugs yongs su bskyon pa dang/ snyan pa ra ba'i bsdu ba'i dngos po yongs su ba rjod pa da nga/ 'jig rgyun la don mthun par kha sgyu ba
pa ston par byed cing/ phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste 'dong ba mthong ngo/ lta ba'i dkyil 'khor nas drang srong mang po 'gro ba thams cad kyi lus dbyibasasu 'khod pa/ pags pa dang/ thun
pa'i gos gyon pa/ la ba thogs pa/ gzugs dang cha byad dang/ dbyibs sna tshogs can/ spyod lam rab tu zhi ba dag byung nas/ stong gi bar snang las sangs rgyas kyi yon tan/
rjod ma byed cing/ chos kyi sgra yongs su bsgrag pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi sgra brjod pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i rige 'dun yongs su bstan pa rang/ tshangs pa'i sbyor pa yongs su brjod
pa dang/ dbang po rabon pal sems can dgod pa dang/ rang bzhin med pa'i don rab tu brtag pa dang/ ye shes kyi don la 'jig rten rang du dgod pa dang/ 'ji ga
rten gyi gtsug lag gi rnam pa yongs su brjod pa dang/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyis 'byung ba'i lam gyi tshul rab tu bstan pa dang/ mthar gyis bya ba'i las la sems can rab tu
tsho dgod pa byed cing/ phyogs bcu bkang sa 'dong ba mthong ngo/ rtsib logs gnyis nas klu'i bu mo 'jig rten rgya ba thams cad kyi grangs dang mnyam pa/ lus kyi dbyib sa bsam gyis mi khyab
pa du ma dang ldan pa byung ste/ klu'i rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa yongs su bstan pa dang/ spos kyi san gyi rgyan bsam gyis ma khyab pa nam mkha'i rabyings la byin gyis brlab dang
me tog ga sprin gyi rgyun bsam gyis mi khyab pas nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad brgyan pa dang/ 'phreng ba'i sprin bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan gyis nam mkha'i dbyings thams zur rnam par grub

pa dad/ rin po che'i gdugs kyi spyin basamagyis mi khyab pa'i rgyanagyis chos kyi dbyings thams cad yongs su khebs par bya ba dang rin po che'i rgyal mtshan gyi sprin bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyun der/

sbyo rin po che'i lha'i ba dan gyi spyin bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan dad/ rin po che'i byang phrul sA chogs kyi sin dang char bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan dang/ nor bu rin po che dam pa'i skyen gyi char

'bab pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan dang/ rin po che'i se mo do sna tshogs dang ma dag gi sbren gyi char bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan dang/ rin po che'i khri la sgo mo krung du 'khod pa'i byang chub

sams dba'asangs rgyas kyi chos kyi sngon gyi char bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'bebs pa'i rgyan dang/ lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i rgyan sA tshogs dang ldan pa'i lha'i bu mo mang po chos kyi klo snyan pa'i sgra dbyangs
kyi sman gyi char 'bebs pa bsam gyis ma khyab pa dang/ rin po che'i pad+mo ba ba mtho ba mu tig gi dra bas brgyan pa// rin po che'i rgyal po thams cad kyi 'bu'i sbyin gyi chur rnam par 'thor ba bsam
