gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan nang/ rin po che'i cod panagyi sprin nor bu rin po thams cad kyis rab tu brgyan pa/ 'od zer gyi spyi'i many+dza' yas pa'i char 'bebs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan dang/ lha'i
lus kyi sngon gyi ma tog dang/ 'phreng ba dang/ gduges dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ lha'i ba dan bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan nang/ lha'i bu mo mang po'i lus kyi sprin h+phal mo sbyar ta gsar gyi ma
tog snyim pas 'thor/ de bzhin gshegs pa la yon tan dang legs pa thams can du bskor pa'i sprin gyi 'brug sgra 'byin cing char 'bebs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rgyan nam mkha7dbyings
la byin gyis rlob cing/ spos kyi phung po'i sbyin rin po che thams cad kyi kha dog tu 'dug pa dang/ bdug spos kyi na bun dang/ sprin shin tu rgya che bas re bzhin gshegs pa shams rud kyi dkyil
[@]// 'khor la 'khor mngon par khebs par bya ba dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam gus pa thams cad rab tu brgyan pa dang/ mas can thams cud rab tu dga' bar
bya ba dang/ sangs rgyas thoms kur mchod pas skad cig tu sa kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pa/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis mkhong ngo// thong ka'i dpal gyi be'u nas

waM lha ma yin gyi dbang po sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyad byung ste/ lha ma yin gyi skyas rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa rab tu ston cing/ chu 'dzin chen po yongs
subaskyam pa dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams brgya stong rab tu bskyod pa dang/ ri'i rgyalaM po chen po thams cad thub par bya ba dang/ lha'i gnas thams cad yongs su bskyod pa dang/ bdud kyi dkyil
'khor thams cad zil gyis gnon pa rang/ bdud kyis thams cad rab tu gdul ba dang/ nga rgyal dang/ rlom pa dang/ dregs pa thams cad rab tu gzhom pa rang/ gnod par sems pa'i
sems bzlog cing dga' bar bya ba dang/ mtho 'tsham pa'i sams phyi'i bzlog par bya ba dang/ sems can rnams kyi mi dge ba'i chos rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang/ nyon mongs pa'i ri rjes
par gtor ba dang/ nyon mongs pa'i 'thab mo ba'i tu zhi bar bya ba dang/ lha ma yin gyi sgyus rnam par 'phrul pa dang rnam par rtsa ba sna tshogs kyis sems can rnams skyo bar bya ba dang//
sdig pa las gyen du bskyod pa dang/ 'khor bas 'jigs par bya ba dang/ srid pa'i lam gyi rgyud thams cad nas gyen du bskyod de gnas mad pa la rab tu gnas par bya ba dang/ byang chub kyi sam/
la sems can rnams rab tu 'god pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi byang chub snyams dpa'i spyor pa rnam par dag par bya ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams pha rol tu phyin pa la
rab tu dgod par bya ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa la rab tu gzud pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi tshul swAng ba yongs su bskyed pa dang/ chos kyi tshul
rnam par dgod pa sna tshogs kyi sems kyi skad cig re re zhing chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs par byed pa/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis mthong ngo// rgyab kyi gzhung nas nyin
thos dang rang sangs rgyas mang po sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyad byung nas/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis 'dul ba'i sems can bdag tu mngon par zhen pa rnamA
la bdag med pa dang/ sems can med pa yongs su rjod pa byed cing/ rtag par mngon par zhen pa rnams la 'du byed thams cad mi rtag par yongs su bstan pa dang/ 'dod chags kyi sbyor
pacan rnams la mi sdug pa dang/ zhe sdang gi spyod pa can rnams la byams pa dang/ gti mug gi spyod pa can rnams la rgyun las 'byung ba'i rtan cing 'brel par 'byung ba rjod pa dang/ cha mnyam
pa'i spyod pa can rnams la ye shes kyi yul dang ldan pa'i chos kyi tshul mngon par bstan pa dang/ yul la mngon par dga' ba rnams la gnas mad pa rab tu ba rjod
pa dang/ zhi ba la nas su sams pa rnams la smon lam gyi khyad par gyis spro ba bskyed pa dang/ phyogs kyi rgyud dang sgo thams cad du chos kyi tshul rgya mtsho'i rgyud dang sgo thams cad sa mas can
thams cad kyi don du rjod pa byad nyid chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzungs kyis mthong ngo/ phug pa'i lhan gnyis las gnod sbyin dang srin pa'i dbang po dbyigI
sU rtogs dang ldan zhing lus mi sdug pa dang/ kha dog dang chu zheng sna tshogs can/ spyod lam gyi rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa/ bzhon pa sne tshogs la zhen pa/ 'khor sna tshogs kyis yongs
su ngaskor ba sems can gyi khems yongs su bskyang ba la brtson pa/ 'or sna tshogs kyis sang bar bya ba la brtson pa/ rabyangs sna tshogs rab tu slog pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs
mar pa'i rdul shan tu pha ba snyed byung nas krabs mngon par bsgrub pa sna tshogs ma 'dris pas phyogs dang phyogs mchims kun gyi nam mkha' rgyas par 'gongs dang/ dge ba'i spyod pa thamA
cad yongs su bsrung ba dang/ 'phags pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad yongs su bsrung ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad yongs su gzung ba dang/ lag na rdo rje'i las kyis yang
dag par song ba dang/ yang dag par zhugs pa thams cad yongs su bsrung ba dang/ sangs rgyas thams cad la mchod pa dang rim gro bya ba dang/ sems can log par lhung ba rnams kyi ngan
song ga lam gyi rgyud bralas cad rnam par bzlog pa dang/ 'jig rten thams cad kyi nad dang/ gnod pa dang/ 'jigs pa thams car zhi bar bya ba'i don du brtson pa sems can gyi de na
byabs 'jig rten yongs su bskyang ba la brtson pa rnams bsod nams dang ye shes kyi 'khor lo yongs su rdzogs par bya ba dud/ chos kyi 'khor le'i rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang/
pas kyi rgol ba'i kher rkor gcod pa byed cade/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par 'gangs pa ra byar pa/ tshong dpon gyi bu no ra ba cungs kyis mthong ngo// mdun gyi lta nas mi 'am

ci dbang po sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phu tha snyad ma 'am ci'i dbang po'i bu mo'i 'khe ra brgya stong grungs med pa can dang/ dri rwa'i dbang po sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs rmad pa'i
rdul shin tu phra ba stod du lnga'i dbang po'i bu mo'i 'khor brgya stong grangs med pa run re ga cung nas lha'i rol mo brgya stong gangs mad pa'i sgra snyan pa dang/ kA'i dbyangs kyis chos
kyi rang bzhin dang ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi 'osto da parjod pa byed cing/ byang chub kyi sems yid su bsngags pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i sbyin pa yongs su'arjod pa der bsangon
par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i sgo Thams cad la mngon par bstod pa dang/ chos kyi 'khor le'i sgo thams cad du 'jug pa dang/ rnam par 'phrul pa'i sgo/
la thams cad la mngon par spro bar bya ba dang/ yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba'i sgo thams cad yongs su brjod pa rang/ sangs rgyas kyi bstan pa'i sgo thams cad yongs su gzungs ba dang/
sems can gyi sgo thams nyid rab du dga' bar bya ba dang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi sgo thams cad yongs su dag par bya ba dang/ chos kyi sgo thams cad mngon par bstan par bya ba dang/
sgrib pa'i sgo thams cud rnam par bzlog pa ra bya ba dang/ dag ba'i rtsa ba'i sgo thams cad yongs su skyed pa byed cing chos kyi dbyings rgyas pa'i gangs pa/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor badrangs kyis
mthong ngo// kha'i sgo nas 'khor lo'i sgyur ba'i rgyal po rin pa che bdun dang ldan zhing/ stobs kyi yan lag bzhi'i tshogs kyi 'khor dang ldan pa byung nas/ sbyin pa chen po 'od zer gyi
rgyun rab tu 'gyed cing rin po che'i 'byung goms thams cad yongs su gtang ba dang// nor bu rin po che'i tshogs thams cad sbyin pa dud/ dbul po rnams nor dang ldan par bya ba
dang srog gcod pa la sa 'jig rten rnam par bzlog pa dang/ byams pa'i sams la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang/ ma byin par len pa dang rab tu dbul ba dang/
0 rgyun gyis gzhe tu brgyan pa'i bu mo bye ba khrag khrig brgya song yongs su gtang ba dang/ 'dod pas log par g.yem pa las rnam par bzlog pa dang/ tshangs pa'i spyod pa la rab tu dgod
pa dang/ brdzun du smra ba las rnam par bzlog pa dang/ bsub med pa la gzhol bar rab tu dgod pa dang/ pha ma'i tshig las rnam par bzlog pa dang/ gzhan 'dum par brtson
pa'i tshig rab tu brjod pa dang/ zhe gcod pa'i tshig las 'jig rten rnam par bzlog pa dang/ 'jam zhing yid du 'ong ba'i tshig rab tu brjod pa dang/ gzhed pa'i chos dang ldan pa'i
byung rgyal du sa ba las sams cun rnam par bzlog pa dang/ don brab mo'i tshig rab tu dbye ba gnon mi za ba la yang dag par da kod pa dang/ ngag gi nyes pa thams cad las 'jig rten
rnam par bzlog pa dang/ snying rje dang ldan pa'i tshig rab tu brjod par bya ba dang/ 'jig rten gyi sang gi dri ma yongs su sel cing 'dod pa chung ba dang/ chogashes pa la brtson par
sems can rab tu dgod pa dang/ chags sems las 'jig rtan rnam par bzlog pa dang/ gzhan gyi sems kyi rgyud dga' bar byed pa la rab tu dgod pa dang/ lta ba'i dra ba thams
cad las 'jig rten rab tu gdon pa dang/ yid gnyis kyi ra ba thams cad rnam par gtor ba dang/ the tshom gyi so thams cad rab tu gzhom pa dang/ zhem nur dang som nye'i
rab rib yongs su bsal ba dang/ chos rnam par dbye ba 'jig rten du rab tu dbye ba dang/ rkyen las byung ba rab tu rjed pa dang/ rang bzhin gyis bden pa'i
tshul la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang/ sgrib pa thams cad rnam par bzlog pa dang/ sgrib pa mad pa'i tshul la gzud pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi don gyi tshul sna tshogs rjod pa byed/
dung/ phyogs bcu'i chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gangs pa/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis mthong nga// mag gnyis nas nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor brgya stong sangs rgyas kyi zhing//
gyangs mad pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba sad byung ste/ sems can dmyal ba chen po thams cad yongs su snang bar byed cing 'jig rten gyi mun pa chen po sel ba dang/ sems can rnams kyi gtso
mug gi rab ribasal ba dang/ grang ba'i sems can dmyal ba na 'khod partasems can rnams kyi grang ba'i sdug bsngal rab tu zhi bar byed pa dang/ sa'i rang bzhin gyizhing rnams su 'od kha dog
dkar po can rab tu 'gyod pa dad/ gsar gyi rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'od sa rma'i kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang/ ba zla chu'i rang bzhin gyi nang rgyu mus su 'or gser gyi kha dog can
rab tu 'gyed pa dang/ dngul gyi rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'od gsar gyi kha dog can rib tu 'gyar pa dang/ gsar gyi rang bzhin gyi zhang rnams sa 'od shel gyi kha dog can rab tu 'gyur pa dang
tig sa ragyi rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'od mu tig dmar po' kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang/ askya gar ba'i rang bzhin gyi cha de rnams su 'od gsar gyi kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang/
gsar gyi rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'od a gar ba'i kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang/ rtswa nI la'i rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'od rin po che'i rgyal po nyi ma'i snying po' 'a rog

can rab tu 'gyur pa dang/ rin patsho'argyal pa nyi ma'i snyid pa'irang bzhin gyi zhing+ge rnams su 'ad ren po che in+d+ra nI la'i deb dgo can rab tu 'gyed pa dang/ mu tig dmar po'i rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams

su bod rin po che'i rgyal po zla ba'i 'od zer gyi dra ba dang dkyil 'khor gyi snying pa'i kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang/ rin po che'i rgyal po zla ba'i 'od zer gyi dra ba dang dkyil 'khor gyi snying po'i rang bzhin gyi zhing

rnams su 'od mu tig dmar pa'i kha dog can rab tu 'gyed pa dang/ rin po che gcig gi rang bzhin gyi zhing rnams su 'od rin po che sna tshogs kyi kha dog can rab tu brgyud pa dang/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi rang bzhin

gyi zhing rnams su 'od rin po che gcig gi ba dag na rab tu 'gyed pa dang/ de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i da khor gyi da kyal ba kher thams cad du sems can gyi don tshad med pa la brtson zhang nyes kyi

dbyings rgyas par 'gangs pa/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis mthod do// smin mtshams kyi mdzod spu nas zla ba mad pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shan tu phra ba snyed byung nas// lha'i
dang/nga po thams cad sbal gyis gnon nud/ 'jig rten thams cad kyi 'dod pa'i dga' ba rnam par bzlog pa dang 2 sangs rgyas blta bar dga' ba la rjes su bsngags par byed rung//

sems can tshad med pa 'dul ba la brtson par phyogs banub chos kyi dbyingasargyas par 'gengs pa mthong ngo// dpral ba nas tshangs pa chen pa spyod lam rab tu zhi ba sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs mod pa'i rdul
shan tu phra ba snyed byung nas/ tshangs pa'i dbyangs su brjod de sangs rgyas thams cad la gsol ba gdab pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad rab tu dga' ba bya ba byed dung sems can gyi don tshan
mar ma la brtson par phyogs bcu'i chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa/ tshor dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis mthong ngo// mgo nas byang chub sems pa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs mar pa'i
rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung nas/ kha dog dbyibs sna tshogs kyi brgyan pa'i lus yongs su ston cing/ dpe byad bzang pos rnam par bres pa'i lus rab tu btsun pa dang/ 'od kyi dkyil 'khor
rgyalcan mtho' dang dbus med pa 'bcu dgye ba dang/ ba spu'i bu ga thoms cad nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sngon gyi byang chub sams dpa'i spyod pa nas bzung ste gtong ba dang/ len pa
dang dngos po yongs su gtang ba'i rnam pa'i sprin mang po rab tu dag ba dang/ pha rol tu phyin pa sna tshogs dang ldan po'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho yongs su bstan pa dang/ sbyin pa'i
spyod pa 'jig rten du yongs su brjod pa dang/ sar sA'i dri ma rnam par bzlog pa dang/ chags pa thams cad sngang ba la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang/ 'jig rten rin po che sna tshogs thams
cad kyi rgyan gyisabargyan par byin gyis brlab pa dang/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa la sems can rab tu dgad pa dang/ mtshan thams cad kyi yon tan yongs su yang dag par brjod pa dang/
sangs rgyas kyi mtshan 'byung pa'i rgya ston pa byed pa maN+Dong ngo/ skad byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs mang pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba sAd byung nas tshul khrims kyi pha rtol tu
phyin pa yongs su brjod cing/ ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas sangs rgyas thams cad kyi tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho yongs su bstan pa dang//
sems can thams cud lam gyi rgyud dang yul las phyir phyogs par byas te de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul la mngon du phyogs par bya ba dang/ 'ojig rten gyi 'dod pa la rnam par sad pa dang/
'jig rten gyi phyin ci log gi ling dog rnam par bsal ba dang/ log pa'i rnam par rtog pa rab tu zhi bar byas nas byang chub sems dpa'i tshul khrims la yang dag par ragor pa dang/ snying rje chen
po'i tshul khrims yongs su brjod cing/ de bzhin gshegs pa tshul khrims rab tu thob par bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi lam nan tan du bya ba'i tshul khrims la sams run rab du dgod pa
dang srid pa'i lam gyi rgyud rmi lam lta bur sems can rnams la rab tu brjod cing/ miam gyi tshul dang mnyam par yongs su gzhol bar bya ba'i phyir yul yongs su 'dzin pa dang//
nyon mongs pa la dbang sgyur ba soms can rnams rab tu dgod pa byed la mthong ngo// yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdula'an tu phra ba snyad byung nas/ 'jig
rgyun rnams la mdog gser gyi kha dog lta bu mngon pa 'a so na cing khro ba med pa dang/ 'khrug pa yod pa dang/ shar gnyer ba med pa dang/ zhe sdang ba med pa dang/ rgyud gson pa mar pa dang/
khong khro ba med pa ba soms la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang/ byol song gi sa gnas kyi lam gyi rgyud thams cad yongs su gcod pa'i phyir/ ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas brtsod pa'i pha rol
tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i de bzhin gshags pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba'i sprin rab tu 'gyed cing bzod pa'i stobs lasems can rab tu dgod pa dang/ chos la dbang sgyur ba la sems can rab tu snang
bar byed pa makong ngo// yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs mang pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyad byung// byang chub sems dpa' brtson 'grus kyi snyibs mtha' yas pa shin tu
ston cing/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du brtsams pa las phyir ma ldog pa'i stobs kyis thos pa rgya mtsho yongs su btsal bas ma skyo bar bya ba yongs su brjod pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs
pa thams cad mchod nyid rim gro bya ba la sems can rang shugatsud pa dang/ sdug bsngal gyi phung po thams cad rnam par bzlog pa'i brtson 'grus chen po la sems can rnab tu dgod pa dang/
brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba mang po'i sngon lus thams cadu las rab tu 'gyed cing/ byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod
pa yongs su bstan pa dang/ sems can rnams kyi 'de 'i ra rnam par gtor ba dang/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la sams kun rab tu dgod pa dang/ las la dbang
sgrar ba la 'jig rten rab tu gzud pa dang rgyun mi 'chad pa brtson par byed pa ma byed ngo// yang byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing grongs med pa'i rdulangashan tu sde ba snyad byung
nasaM byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi rjes su dran pa la ma bsams cun shAms shud rab tu dgod cing sgrib pa dang/ bar du gcod pa dang rab rib thams cad rnam par bas
ba dang/ rlom pa dang bag med pa rnams cad las sems can rnam par bzlog pa dang/ bag yod pa'i chos la rab tu dgod pa dang/ khangs pa 'gying ba dang nga rgyal gyi rgyal mtshan
rab tu gzhom pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi bsam gtan gyi yan lag rgya mtsho ba rjod pa dang/ 'jig rtan rnams la bsam gtan gyi ma rol tu phyin pa yongs su bsngags pa dang/
ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi tshul mang po'i sminu rab tu dbye ba dang/ sems can la dbang sgyur ba la samA
can rab tu dgod pa khyed rung/ skad cig re las kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa mthong ngo// yang byung chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba sIr
byung ste/ ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas sangs rgyas kyi chos yongs su tshol ba dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba mang po'i sprin rab tu dbye ba dang/ dbyangs kyi yan lag rgya mtsho'i skad
thams cad kyis shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sman gyi 'brug sgra sgrog pa dang/ yang dag par lta ba'i glog rab tu 'gyed pa dang/ chos kyi rang bzhin gyi sgra dbyangs rab tu bsgrag
pa dang/ sems can rnams kyi bdag tu lta ba'i ri'i lhun rab tu gzhig pa dang 2 lta ba thams cadu zug rngu 'bying ba dang/ the tsom dang/ yid gaNes dang/ nem nur gyi rab rib
rnam par gsal ba dang/ shes kyi dbang yang dag par bsngags pa byed cing sams kyi skad cig re re la chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa mthong ngo// yang byang chub sem
dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba stod byung nas/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi thabs mkhas pa'i tshul gyi dkyil 'khor rab tu rjod pa sbyad nying/ ba spu'i bu ga thamA
car nas thabs mkhas pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba mang po'i sprin rab tu dbye ba dang/ 'jig rta rnams la thabs mkhas pa'i spyod pa rab tu brjod pa dang/ theg pa chen po'i
'byung ba mngon par bstan pa dang/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dkyil 'khor yang dag par bsngags pa dang/ 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa klu ma nad pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i
sbyod pa yongs su bstan pa dang/ byung chung sems dpa' rnams kyi shubs mkhasapa'i rab rol tu phyin pa la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang 'jig rten rnamA la byang chub sam dpa'i dbang gi
dkyil 'khor rab tu bstan pa byed cing sems bskyed pa re re la chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa mthong ngo// yang byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs mang pa'i rnal
hin tu phra ba stor byung ste/ ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi mtshan rgya mtsho'i spun gyi 'brug sgra sgrog cing/ ba spu'i bu ga thAmA car nas byang chub sems
dang 'aThams cad kyi smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su dag pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba mang po'i sprin rab tu bgyi ba dang smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yang dag par
bsngags pa nang/ bya chub sems dpa'i dbang thams cad la sems can rab tu dgad pa dang/ son lam chen po'i shing rta'i 'khor lo phyi ma'i mtha'i mur thug par 'dril ba dang/ chos
thams cad kyi rjes su 'brang ba/ nyon mongs pa thams cad rnam par zlog pa/ mingashes pa'i ri rnam par 'thor ba 'jig ton du rab tu rjod pa byar cing smon lam sna
tshogs kyi rnam par 'phrul pas/ sems kyi skadatsug re re la chos kyi dbyings rgyas la ra 'gengs pa mthong ngo// yang byang chub sems dpa'i sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rtul shin tu
phra bsnyad byung// byang chub sems dpa'i stobs rab tu snang bar bya ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i stobs yongs su bsgrub pa'i sa rab tu byung ba dang/ ba spu'i bu ga thams cad
nas stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa sgrub ring 'byin pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba mang po'i sprin rab tu dbye ba dang/ bdun dang phas kyi rgol ba thoms cad kyis ma thub pa'i stobs yongos su bstan pa dang
khor yug dang rdo rje'i rithoms cad lus kyi steng du rjib kyang mi 3ma pa'i stobs rab tu brjod pa dang/ bskol pas 'tshig pa thams cad kyi ma rgya mtsho'i nang na gnas kyang lus la gnod pa
mer pa'i stobs yongs su bstan pa dang 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klus pa thams cad lag pa'i mthil gyis nam mkha'i dbyings su ston pa'i stobasayongs su ston pa byed cing
sems kyi skad cig re re la chos kyi dbyings 'gangs pa rgyun ma gcod pa mthong ngo// yang byang chub sems dpa' sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du min pa'i rdulashin tu phra ba snyan byung nas
sams nyan rnams la ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor ston rung/ ba spu'i bu ga zlums rung nas ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rag pa dang ldan pa'i son gyi sbyor ba nad pa'i sprin rab tu 'gyir/
ra dang/ 'jig rten rnams la sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yon tan ra nga yashis mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i ya shas kyis rab tu brjod pa dang/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyis tshan
ngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyis mngon par bstan pa dang/ smon lam thams cad ma derar bsgrub pa'i ye shes mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i a shas kyi sa yongs su
brjod pa dang/ sems can thams cad yongs su bsdu ba'i so na lam mngon par 'grub pa'i ye shes mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyi sa shin tu yangs par bya kha rdung/
sems can thams cadu bdag med parti rang bzhin lo gzud pa mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyi sa rnam par bstan pa dang sems rten thams cad kyisams rgya mtsho rnam
ma[“]la la mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i yi shes kyi sa rab tu brjod pa dang/ sems can thams cad kyi dbang po rnam par dbye ba'i ye shes mngon pa Shas pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes
kyi rab tu dbye ba dang/ sems can thams cad kyi bsams pa dang mos pa rnam par blta ba'i yazhes mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i yi las kyi sa yang nga ba par ba rdzong pa ngang
sems can thams cad kyi las rgya mnol 'jug pa'i ye shes mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyis rnam par dgrol ba dang/ sems can thams
cad kyi smon lam rgya mtshol 'jug pat+ta ya shas mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa'i yo shes kyi sa yongs su bstan pa byed cing/ sems kyi skad cig re re la chos kyi dbyangs rgyas par
patsho 'gengs pa// tshong dpon gyi bu nor buzungs kyis mthong ngo// spyi bo'i gtsug tor gyi gsab nas de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul ban du phra ba ste
mtshan dam pa dang/ dpa byad bzang po rnam par dag pas brgyan pa/ 'dzam bu chu klung gi gsar gyi ri bo shin tu 'bar ba ltar snang ba/ 'od kyi dkyil 'khor phyogs bcur spa zhing tsan
med par 'bar ba dang/ chos kyi dbyangs tshul gyis rgyas par 'gangs pa'i dbyangs mnga' ba/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa mthub dang dbus med pa yongs su ston pa/
dwang D+ha 'gro ba thams cad la h+pha mi dad par chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par 'bobs pa ste/ 'ji ltar snying po byang chub mchog tu phyin pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la chos
kyi dbyings kyi gzhi'i byi bragi mngon sum du shes pa'i sprin ces bya ba'i chos kyi sbyin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang/ bya nga chub sems dpa' dbang bskur ba thob pa rnams la gzhi
khab kun tu snyan pa'i sprin ces bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang/ byang chub sems pa' chos chen po'i rgyal tshab tu dbang bskur ba rnams la sgo kun nas 'jug pa zhes bya
kha'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang/ byur chub sems dpa' gzhon nur gyur pa rnams la kun nas brgyan pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi char mngon par dbab pa dang/ byang chub
sems dpa'i phyir mi ldog pa rnams la snying rje chen po'i tshogs shin tu brtan pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' lhag palaM
bsam pa dag pa rnams la chos thums can kyi rang bzhin gyi bya brag shes pa'i rdo rje zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' sngon
gyi sbyor ba dang ldan pa rnams la 'gro ba yong sa su snyad pas kun nas brgyan pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sngon gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' cher skyes pa rnal
la rus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i dkyil 'khor mngon sum du dmigs pa'i sprin ces bya ba'i chos kyi sbren gyi chara mngon par dbab pa dang/ byang chub sems dang 'a
rnal 'byor la spyod pa rnams la chos khams cad kyi rang bzhin dang gzhi rab tu sgrog pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi spen rgyanar mngon par dbab pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' las
@#// dung po pa rnams la snying rje chen po'i tshul dang thugs kyi snying po'i sprin kun tu 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sbyin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang byang chub sems/
dpa' samasaradabo bskyed pa rnams la dga' bar bya ba'i mdzod shin tu bsags pa'i snying po zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'/
yangs pa la mos pa rnams la rnam par thar pa mi ldan pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i smon lam gyis dga' bar byed pa'i mdzod ces bya ba'i chos kyi sprinagyi chara mngon pa
dbab pa dang/ gzugs la spyod pa'i som sa can rnams la gzhi kun tu mi 'dra pa'i mdzod ces bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang/ tshangs pa'i ris kyi
lha rnams la tshul rgyu mtsho tshad med pa'i 'brug snga'i rabyangs shes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi chur mngon par dbab pa dang/ du'ang sgyur gyi lha rnams la stobs 'byang ba'i chos kyi yo byad
ma zad pa'i mdzod ces bya ba'i chos kyi sbyin gyi skur mngon par dbab pa dang/ bdud kyi ris kyi lha rnams la thams rud mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshogs rgyal mtshan sna tshogs can yang dag par
bsgrub pa'i dbyangs shes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par rab ba pa dang/ 'phrul dga' lha rnams la ye shes kyi rin po che sna tshogs la brtson pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi man
mngon par dbab pa dang/ dga' ldan gyi lha rnams la byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyal smtshan zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang//
mtshe ma'i lha rnams la de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad rdzusu dran pa'i mdzod ces bya ba'i chos kyi sbyin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang/ lha'i dbang po brgya byin gyi gnas su de bzhin
gshegs l mthong bas dga' ba'i shugs 'byung ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang/ gnod sbyin gyi dbang po'i gnas su chos kyi dbyings kyi nam
mkha' la re bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pas rgyas par 'gengs pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang/ dri za'i dbang po'i gnas su de bzhin
gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos yang dag par 'gro ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyichar mngon par dbab pa dang/ lha ma yin gyi gnas su ye shes kyi tshul rdo rje'i dkyil 'khor sa
bya kha'i chos kyi sbyin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang/ nam mkha' lding ga dbang mo'i gnas su de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad 'byung ba'i thabs kyi spenA ces bya ba'i chos
kyi smin gyichar mngon par dbab pa dang/ mi 'am ci'i dbang po'i gnas su chos kyi smin yang dag par 'gro ba thams cad kyi dbyang sashes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon
par dbab pa dang/ klu'i dbang po'i gnas su byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par 'phrul pa sgrog cing srid pa'i lam gyi rgyud las skyo ba skyed pa zhes bya ba'i chos
kyi sprin gyi nar mngon par dbab pa dang/ lto 'phye chen po'i gnas su dga' ba rgya mtsho rnam par 'phel bar byed pa'i shugs shes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbang pa dung/
mi'i gnas su 'gro ba thams chun las khyad par 'phags pa'i ye shes rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sbyin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang/ sems can ramyal ba'i 'jig rten
cu 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal thums cad las rab tu zhi ba'i dbyangs dang 'phags pa'i lam gyi tshig gi rgyud kyis brgyan pa zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang/ byol
song gi skye gnas su las kyi lam kha na ma tho ba med pa la nan tan du bya ba'i dbyangs dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa rjes su dran pa'i sprin gyi dkyil 'khor gyi lhan ces bya ba'i chos kyi sprin
gyi char mngon par dbab pa dang/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten du de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgrags pas/ sems can thams cad kyi gtong ba'i sems
'byung ba zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon pa ra dbab pa dang/ sems can log par lhung ba rnams la sdug bsngal thams cad zhi ba rab tu 'thob pas dbugs dbyung ba'i dbyang
[d]kyi nga ro zhes bya ba'i chos kyi sprin gyi char mngon par dbab pa mdzad cing/ chos kyi dbyangs rgyas par 'gangs pa/ rmong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis mthong ngo// kha spu'i bu ga thams
cad las ba spu'i sgo re re nas kyang/ 'od zer gyi dra ba dang dkyil 'khorakha dog dang gabrugs kyi klong dang rgyun grangs med pa can/ dgos pa sna chogs grangs med pa la sgo gon du gnas pa
sangs rgyas kyi zhing grangs med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba sur byung nas phyogs bcu'i chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pa mthong ste 'ji ltar ba spun+d+ri sgo'i 'od zer gyi dra ba dang dkyil 'khor
la la las ni/ sbyin pa'i sbyor pa skyon med pas bdog po thams rur yongs su gtong bar rnam par 'phrul pa mgror ngeng/ ba spu'i sgo'i dra ba dang dkyil 'khor la la las ni/ dus gsum gyi
byang chub sams dpa' thams cad kyi tshul khrims dang/ ba rtul zhugs dang/ yi dam dang/ tshul gyi dkyil 'khor du rnam par 'thul pa mthong ngo// ba spu'i sgo'i 'or khrir
gyi dra ba dang dkyil 'khor la la las ni/ byang chub sems dpa'i thams cad bazod pa lisbyor pa rnam pa dus gsum du byang ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams rkang lag dang yan lag
gi ram la bcad kyang/ nyams su bzod pa byed pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa rang/ khu tshur rang dbyig pas bsAn te mtsho gyis lus la btab kyang/ 1mas su bzod par byar pa'i
rnam par 'phrul pa dang/ lus thams cad gshags sam snying dang mig phyung yang/ nyams su bzod pa byed pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa mkhrong ngo// byang chub
sams dpa' dus gsum du byung ba rnam par brtags pa'i lus dang ldan pa gzhan dag gis thams cad mkhyen pa'i chos nyid yongs su btsul ba'i ched du/ lus dang sems la gnod
pa thams cad dang/ yan lag dang nying lag bcad pa thams cad kyang sang rje chen pos dbang du byas pa'i phyir nyams su bzod par byas pa dang/ bag la zha bar byas pa dang/ btang
rgyu snyoms su bzhag pa'i byang chub sems dpa' brjod pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i gzugs brnyan gyi gzugs de lta bu dag kyang mthong ngo/ ba spu'i sgo'i 'od zer gyi rtsa ba dang dkyil 'khor la la las
ni byang chub sems dpa' thoms cad kyi brtson 'grus kyi spyod pa rnam pa tha dad pa rnam par phye ba'i gzugs dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'das pa dang/ ma 'ongs pa dang/ ra lta bu byung
ba'i brtson 'grus kyi rnamalar 'phrul pa 'jig rten yongs su bskyod pa dang/ rgya mtsho yongs su bskyab pa dang/ sems can yongs su skyo bar bya ba dang/ mu stags can shAms cad
yongs su tshar gcad pa dang/ 'dung thams cad sa bkong ba dang/ chos kyi phyogs snang bar bya ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i ma'u chen lo rnam par 'phrul pa mthong ngo// ba spu'i sgo'i 'od zer
gyi dra ba dang dkyil 'khor la la las ni/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi spyod pa rnam par rgyu ba'i rnam grangs ji snyan pa dang/ lus nye bar len pa ji snyed pa dang/ rigs su skye ba/
yongs su gzung ba je sad pa dang/ gzugs kyi lus yongs su grub pa ji snyed pa dang/ dag ba'i bshes gnyen gyis rjes su bstan pa yongs su gzung ba ji snyad dang/ dag
ba'i bshes gnyen gyi man ngag la nan tan du bya ba'i gnas ji sAd pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i bsam gtan gyi yan lag yongs su bsgrub pa dang mthun pa'i gtsug lag dang/
gnas dang/ gzhal med khang dang/ yul dang ri'i sul ji snyed pa dang bsam gtan gyi yan lag de dag sus yongs su bsgrubs pa'i rdung srong gi lus ji snyed pa dang/
rgyal po'i thabs ji snyed pa dang/ 'byung ba la mngon par mos pa ji snyed pa dang/ brtul zhugs dang/ yi dam dang/ tshul dang/ spyod lam ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang/
tshong dbon gyi bu nor bzungos kyis mthong ngo// ba spu'i sgo'i 'od zer gyi dra ba dang dkyil 'khor la la las ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol du phyin pa'i spyod pa la rnam par spyod cing/ chos
thams cad yongs su tshol ba dang ldan pa'i lus yongs su bzung mthong ste/ lus gang gis chos kyi tshig gcig gi don du'ang bdog pa thams cad yod su btang ste/ sems can
mas cad las yongs su btsal ba dang/ rim gro dang bkur sti thams cad kyis dag 'a'i bshen gnyen thams cad las yongs su btsal ba dang/ dad pa dang sri
zhus lus rab tu btud de/ de bzhin gshegs pa rnams las yongs su btsal ba dang/ chos kyi tshig gcig la ji lta ba de bzhin du shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i chos kyi tshig
thams cad la'ang de bzhin te/ 'gro ba thams cad du gzugs brnyan byang ba'i lus thams cad kyis yongs su bal ba de dag thams cad kyang/ tshopon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis
pasu'i sgo gcig gi 'od zer gyi dra ba dang dkyil 'khor la mthong ngo/ ba spu'i sgo'i 'od zer gyi dra ba dang dkyil 'khor la la las ni/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi sems can yod
su smin par bya ba'i thabs 'gro ba'i rgyud rgya mtsho thams cad du 'byam kus pas sems can thams cad yongs su bsdu ba'i sbyor ba mag+hong ngo// sems can re re la'ang lus dang spyod
pa'i tshul gyi so sngon gyi lus nye bar blangs pa/ thabs mkhas pa'i spyod pa la brtson pa/ sems can thams cad kyi lus dang 'dra bas yongs su sdud pa'i ng ba spu'i sgo'i 'od zer gyi
dra ba'i dkyil 'khor gcig las mthong ngo// ba spu'i sgo'i 'od zer gyi dra ba'i dkyil 'khor la la las na/ sngon bcom ldan 'das kyis bskal pa khroms cad du smon lam mngon par
[4/]bsgrubs pa'i spyod pa dang/ sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba'i smon lam mngon par bsgrubs pa'i spyod pa dang/ zhing thams cad yongs su dag par bya ba'i smon/
latsho mngon pa re bsgrub pa mdzad pa ji snyed pa dang/ smon lam thams cad mngon pa na bsgrubs pa'i rakyil 'khor ji snyed cig de bzhin gshegs pa de dang de dag gi zhabs kyi rung du 'khor
skyon thams cad la so 'khor ba'i skyon so so mi ra'i gnyan por mngon par bsgrub pa mdzad pa de dag thams cad kyang/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bcas kyis ba snga'i ma'i 'od zer gyi dra ba'i//
dkyil 'khor gcig las mthong ngo// ba spu'i sgo'i 'od zer gyi dra ba'i dkyil 'khor la las ni/ stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa kams cad dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sog
ba rgya mtsho mthong ngo// ba sa'i slo'i 'od ze ra gyi dra ba'i dkyil 'khor lal las ni/ ye shes kyi spyod pa rnam par rgya ba thams cad dang ldan pa mi shes pa'i gnyid kyis leg pa
sems can sad par byed pa'i gong bzhin dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba rgya mtsho mthong bar gyur to// rdo nas tshong dpon gyi bunor bgrangs dge slong rgya mtsho'i rgyal mtshan du
ltar mnyam par bzhag pa la sams shing rtog pa dang/ ting nge 'dzin gyi rnam par thar pa'i dkyil 'khor de rjes su dran par bya ba dang/ byang chub sams dpa'i ting nge 'dzin
gyi khyu mchog gi ma phyung ba de la rjes su rnam par bsam pa dang/ sems can gyi don gyi tshul rgya mtsho de la 'jug par bya ba dang/ mngon par 'du bya ba'i sgo rgyung kun l/
mngon du gnas pa'i rgyan de'i rjes su 'brang zhing khong du chud par bya ba dang/ chos kyi dbyings kyi rgyan rnam par rag pa'i ye shes kyi sgo de la 'jug par bya ba dang/ sangs rgyas kyi byin
gyi rlabs yang dag par mnon pa'i ya shas de la rab tu brtag pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i dbang gi stobs de yongs su bskyod pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam gyi na bas/
de brtan par bya ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i sbyod pa'i stobs de shin tu rgyas par bya ba byed cing/ dge slong rgya mtsho'i rgyal mtshan gyi mdun du nyin zhag gcig kyang lon no/ nyin zhag
gnyis dang bdun yang len no/ zla ba phyed dang/ zla ba gcige dang/ zla ba gnyis dang/ zla ba rdug gi bar dang/ nyin zhag kyang dug tu/ dag slong rgya mtsho'i rgyal mtshan gyi mdun
rdu lon te/ de ltar zla ba drug dang nyin zhag drug 'das nas/ dag song rgya mtsho'i rgyul mtshan ting nge 'dzin de las langs so// de nas nor ba grangs kyis sbas pa//
'phags pa ting nge 'dzan 'di de ltar zab la da ltar rgya che zhing de ltar tshad ma mchis pa'i yul dang ldan pa dang/ de ltar bsam gyis ma khyab pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa dang/ de ltar snang ba/
mtshungs pa ma mchis pa dang/ de ltar grangs ma mchis pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa dang/ de ltar ma 'thog pa'i sbyor yul dang ldan pa dang/ de ltar ma 'dres pa'i yul dang ldan pa//
dang re ltar phyogs kun tu rnam par snang ba dwang/ ting nge 'dzin 'di de ltar sems can gyi don chedu ma mas pa rab tu sgrub par gyur pa ni ngo mtshar te/ de nas ms can
thums cad kyi sdug bsngal gyi phung po tshad ma mchis pa rnam par zhi bar bgyi ba la sta gon du gnas pa ste/ 'di ltar dbul paNosdug bas+saMl zhi bar bgyi ba la sa gon du gnas so
sems can dmyal ba'i lam gyi rgyud rgyu na gcan pa dang/ byol song gi skyo gzhas kyi lam gyi rgyud las yongs su bskyab pa dang/ mi khom pa'i lam gyi rgyud kyi sgo thamA can gnyan pa dang/
mtho ris kyi lam gyi rgyud du phyin paMr tsakyi ba dang/ lha dang mi'i dga' ba dang bde ba 'byung bar bgyi ba dang/ bsam gtan gyi yul gyi dga' ba nyams su myong bar bgyi ba dang/ 'dus
byas l spyod pa'i bde bo yongs su 'phal bar bgyi ba dang/ khams gsum pa las 'byung ba'i so yongs su bstan pa la sta gon ru gnas pa'o// byang chub kyi sems yang dag par/
skye pa 'i rgyud yongs su brjod pa la sta gon du gnas pa'o// bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs yang dag par skye ba'i rgyu rnam par 'phel bar 'gyil dang/ snying rje chen po'i shugs
@#// rgya chen po rnam par 'phel bar bgyi ba dang/ smon lam chen po'i stobs yongs bskyed par bgyi ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i lam snang ba rab tu thob par/
bgyi ba dang/ pha rol du phyin pa chen po'i theg pa rnam par dgod pa dang/ theg pa chen po'i khyad par la 'jug pa mngon par bsgrub pa dang/ kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa shes shing
snyang bar bgyi ba dang byang chub sems dpa'is shes shing snang ba thob par bgyi ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smon lam dang/ spyod pa dang/ 'byung ba'i
rgyan rnam par dag pa yongs su bsgrub pa dang/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i sa gnon pa la thogs pa ma mas par bgyi ba la sta gon du gnas pa'o// 'phags pa ting nge 'dzin tsamang
ci zhes bgyi/ ga so pa/ rigs kyi bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa kun nas lta ba'i btang snyoms yodwasu thob pa zhes bya ba yod de/ ting nge 'dzin 'di ni de'i snang
ba skye sgo kun nas rnam par dag pa'i rgyan ces bya ba'o// rigs kyi bu shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa kun nas lta ba'i btang snyoms rab tu thong pa'isang ba las skyes pa'i ting
'dzin sgo kun nas rnam par dag pa'i rgyan ces bya ba 'dishen tu bsgoms na/ sgo kun nas rnam par dag pa'i rgyan la sogs pa rting nge 'dzin brgya stong grangs med pa phrag bcu tshang ba yongs
su ba grub par 'gyur ro// snyas pa/ 'phags pa'i ting nge 'dzin 'di'i yul der bas sam ma bas/ smras pa// rigs kyi bu ting nge 'dzin 'di la snyoms par zhugs pa la ni 'jig
rten gyi khams rnam par dmigs pa la thogs pa med de// 'jig rten gyi khams su 'jug par bya ba la thogs pa med do// 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par gnon pa la zlogs pa med
do 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su brgyan pa la thogs pa med do// 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su sbyang ba la thogs pa med do// 'jig rten gyi khams yongs su dag par bya
kha la thogs pa mad do// sangs rgyas blta zhing rnam par dmigs par bya ba la thogs pa med do// sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid chub brtag pa la thogs pa med do// sangs rgyas
kyi rnam par 'phrul pa yongs su shes par bya ba la thogs pa med do// sangs rgyas kyi stobs la 'jug snying khong du chud par bya ba la klogs pa med do// sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rgya
mtshor 'jug pa la thogs pa med do/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi spyin gyi char yongs su gzung ba la thogs pa med do// sangs rgyas kyichos kyi 'khor lo 'khor ba ma 'dres pa gshid khong du
chud par bya ba la klogs pa med do sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho la 'jug cing khong du chud par bya ba la glekas pa med do// phyogs bcur 'jug snying rjes su 'grad/
bar bya ba la thogs pa med do// sangs rgyas kyi chos bstan pa rjes su rtag par bya ba la thogs pa med do// sangs rgyas kyi phyogs rjes su brtag par bya ba
la thogs pa med do/ Ang rje chen po' phyogs rnam par mi snang ba la thogs pa med de/ byams pas phyogs rgyas par ragong ba la thogs pa mang ngo// sangs rgyas blta 'i/
phyogs la 'jug pas mi ngoms par bya ba la thogs pa med do// sems can rgya mtsho thams nyidadu 'jug cing khong du chud par bya ba la thogs pa med do// sems can gyi dbang
po rgya mtsho thams cad shes shing khong du chud par bya ba la thogs pa mad do/ sems can gyi dbang po bla dang pa thams cad shes par bya ba la thogs pa med do// rigs kyi bu kho bos
ni shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par spyod pa 'di shes su zad na/ byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par spyod pa rgya mtsho la zhugs pa/ chos kyi
dbyangs kyi yul la blo gros rnam par rag pa/ chos thams cad la rig pa rjes su 'brang ba'i ya zhes nyan/ blo+in tu yangs pas tshad med pa'i yul rgyas par 'gengs pa/ gzung
chen po'i snang ba la dbang sgyur ba/ ting nge 'dzin gyi dkyil 'khor snang ba skrams cad ng na tu dag pa/ mngon par shes pas rnam par 'phrul pa dang khyu mi mchog gi ma 'byin pa lagi tu
[poR]byung 'a/ tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa mi zad pa'i rgya mtsho la zhugs pa/ ngag snyan pas sa'i snying po dang ldan pa brjod pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi rten du gyur pa rnams kyi spyod pa
ba 'am/ yon tan brjod pa 'am/ spyod yul bstan pa 'am/ yul rab tu brjod pa 'am/ smon lam chen po'i stobs yang dag par bsngags pa 'am/ 'byung ba'i sgo yongs su
snang bar byakha 'am/ yang du par sgrubs pa mngon par brjod pa 'am/ lam yongs su bstan pa 'am ting nge 'dzini gyi rgyun kyi sa su 'brang bar bya ba 'am/ sams kyi yul
shes par bya ba 'am/ ye shes mnyam pa nyid khong du chud par bya ba nus re skan/ song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di ched ni/ phyogs kyi gnas rgya mtsho rnam par rlob pa zhes bya ba yod
de de na bza' shing gser ba kun nas rnam par brgyan pa zhes bya ba zhig/ grong khyer 'od chen po zhes bya ba lde skor phyogs legs na yod re de na shed las skyes pa'i rgyal po 'od
bzangs kyi chung ma dge bsnyen ma yid bzhin zhes bya ba yod kyis/ de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang/
ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs dga' rangs taM/ mgu zhing nyams bde la tshim zhing yar bde ba skyes nas/ dag slong rgya mtsho/
rgyal mtshan las snying bo yongs su blangs te/ chos kyis nye bar 'tsho bar byas pa/ ting nge 'dzin gyi yul la zhugs pa/ sang la shob ba/ ye shes snang bar gyur
pa ting nge 'dzin gyi snang ba rab tu thob pa/ mos pa rnam par dag pas khong du chud pa// soms can chos kyi tshul gyi snang ba'i rjes su song ba/ rnamapar dag pa'i sgos snang ba dang
'tsha/ ldan par gyur pa// phyogs su ye shes kyi snang ba rab tu 'dul ba de// dge slong rgya mtsho rgyal mtshan gyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te// lan brgya stong du mar g.yos
phyogs su bskor ba byas nas dge slong rgya mtsho'i rgyal mtshan la btud de phyag 'tshal nas yang dang yang lta zhing/ yang dang yang mngon par bltakha dang/ phyag bya ba dang/ rab tu
gdud pa dang/ gus par bya ba dang/ rim gror bya ba dang/ yid la bya ba dang/ bsam pa dang/ bsgom pa dang/ yongs su bsgom pa dang/ legs par brjod pa dang/ doms
du bya ba dang/ yon tan mngon du bya ba dang/ rjes su bsngags pa dang/ rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang/ rjes su dran par bya pa dang/ brtan par bya ba dang/ mi gtang ba dang/
yid la bsam pa dang/ rjes su 'brang bar bya kho dang/ smon lam gyi rjes su 'jug par bya ba dang/ mthong bar dka' ba dang/ dbyangs kyi mtshan ma gzung ba dang/ gzungs/
kyi rjes su bsam pa dang/ ming yongs su gzung ba'i rjes su yong ba'i soms dang ldan par bya ba dang/ kha dog dang dbyibs rjes su dran par bya ba dang/ ma shes kyi yul rjes su bsam pa
dang ting nge 'adzran gyi yul la rjes 'jug par bya ba dang smon lam gyi yul la rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang/ sbyor yul gyi yul rnam par dpyad par bya ba dang/ ya shas kyi snang ba yongs
su gzung ba byar nying dug slong rgya mtsho rgyal mtshan gyi drung nas song ngo// kham pa dgu bcu gnyis pa/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu non
bzangs rag ba'i bshes gnyen gyi yon ngan gyis ni ma gu/ dag pa'i babs gnyan gyis ni yang dag par bsngags te btang/ dag ba'i bshes gnyan mthong ba'i byin gyis ni byin du brlabI
dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag la na nan tan du byad dge ba'i bshes gnyen yid du 'od ba ni rjes su sems dge ba'i bshes gnyen la ni sangs rgyas kyi chos kyi 'byung gnas
rtsom ru lta/ dag ba'i bshes gnyasha ni sangs rgyas kyi chos ston pa yin par yang dag par lta/ dge ba'i bshes gtan na thams car mkhyenapa ster kyi tshes la rjes su lta/ dag ba'i bshes gnyen/
nas nigs rgyas nam mkha' blta ba la mig tsam ru lta zhid mthar gyis phyogs kyi gnas rgya mtsho rnam par rlob pa'i bza' shing gi ra ba kun nas rnam par brgyan ba ga rnab der phyin nas rwa mthong ba/
@#// bza' shing gi ra ba kun nas rnam par brgyan pa rin po che thams cad kyi ra bas kun nas bskor ba/ rin po che'i shing gi 'phrang ba spel legs pas yongs su brgyan
pa/ rin po che thams cad kyi shing gi 'phreng ba'i ma tog srad bu yid du 'ong sprin rab tu 'phrul pas gzhi rgyas pa/ rin po che thams cad kyi shing gis yang dag par brgyan pa// shing
thams cad kyi ma tog shin tu rgyas pa sna tshogs kyis yongs su gang ba/ spos sna tshogs kyi shing gi 'byung ba las phyogs kun tu spos kyi ngad zhim pa/ rin po che'i 'phrang ba'i shing
sna tshogs kyi lhan las rin po che sna tshogs kyi 'phung ba 'phyang ba rab tu 'dung zhing char ltar mngon par 'bab pa/ rin po che'i rgyal po thams cad kyi zhing dang/ nor bu rin po
resna tshogs kyis mdzes shing spyi la rgya cher brgyan pa'i gzhi can// yid bzhin gyis gos kyi shang dmas cud las kha dog sna tshogs kyi gos 'byung bas gam mo chabs gang mdzes
par brgyan pa sel snyan gyi shing thams cad las lha rdzas las kyang 'phags pa'i sil snyan rlung gis bskyod cing sgra 'byin pa'i rubyangs snyan pa 'byung ba/ sa'i gzhi mtho dman/
[>med par gnas la/ rgyan gyi shing sna tshogs kyi gseb nas rgyan du 'byung zhing 'phyang bas rab tshu brgyan pa'orgyan dang ldan ba mthong ste bza' shing gi ra ba chen po kun nas
rnam par brgyan pa de'i nang na khang pa bya ba brgya stong phrag bcu kun kyang nor bu rin po che dam pa sna tshogs kyi ba gam gyis rnam par brgyan pa dang/ khang pa brtsegs pa brgya stong phrag
bcu 'dzam bu chu klung gi gsar las brnags pa'i bad dang ldan pa dang/ gzhal med khang brgya stong phrag bcu ka gdung rin pa che rnam par snang ba las bros pa dang/ rdzing bu brgya stong phrag ba
rin po che thams cade las gzhi blangs tor n po che sna tshogs kyi pha gus mu khyud byas pa rin po chu thams cad kyi them skas btag pa/ rin po sna tshogs kyi rtags bus bskor ba/
lha rdzas kyi tsan dan gyi dri dang ldan pa'i chus gang ba/ gsar gyi bye ma kun tu gramapa/ gzhi nor bu rin po che chu'angang kun tu bkram pa/ phyogs bzhi nas them skas rnam par bris pa//
yan lag brgyud dang ldan pa'i chus gang ba/ ngang dur dang/ rma bya dang/ khu byug dang khrung khrung dang/ ka la bang ku dang/ kun la'i sgra skad snyan pa'i dbyangs dang ldanu pa rin
po che'i ta la'i 'phreng bas kun nas khargyan pa/ gser gyi rnal bu'i dra bas kun nas yog pa/ rlu gas bskyod pa'i sgra yid du 'ong ba 'byung ba/ stong nas rin po che'i sku ri chen po bris
ma/ rin po che snatshogs kyi shing gi ra bas yongs bskor ba/ rinapo che'i dra bas brgyan pa'i gdugos dang rgyal mtshan legs par bsgreng ba/ lu ma ba rgya stong phrag bcu dus dang 'thun
pa'i hU~Mn don gyi 'dum gyis mtha' 'khor ba/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi kha dog tu 'dug pa'i pad+mos yongs su khyab pa/ rin po che'i pad+mo'i 'od chen pos snang
bar gyur pa'i chu dri ma med pa dang ldan pa yod pa ste/ bza' shing gi ra ba de'i dbus na gzhal med khang chen po rgyal mtshan sna tshogs shes bya ba sa'i gzhi rin kho che rgya mtsho'i snying po las
blangasaM pa/ nor bu rin po chung ka kha bkye ba/ 'dzam bu chu klung ga gser gyi lhan mngon par 'a lags pa/ nor bu rin po che 'gro bar rnam par snang ba'i spang leb bkye bas
brgyan pa// gzhi nor bu rin po che 'bar ba grangs med pa'i dra bas khros pa/ rin po che rgyal po mi 'tham pa spos kyi dris gam yo kun nas bdugs pa/ rin po che'i
rgyal po sgra snyan pa 'byin pa'i dri'i ngad kun tu lcang ba da rin po che'i rgyal po dri rnam par gsal bar byed pas dbang po rno ba'i bag chags rnam par bsgrubs pa dang ldan zhing//
gzhal med khang chen po rgyal mchin sna tshogs der snyan grangs med cing tshad med pa bting bar gyur ma 'di lta ste// pad+mo'i snying po can dang/ nor bu rin po che phyogs snang bar byed

pa'i pad+mo'i snying po can dang/ nor bu rin po che rnam par snang ba'i pad+mo'i snying po can dang/ nor bu rin po che 'gro ba yid du 'ong ba'i pad+mo'i snying po can dang/ nor bu rin po che mdzod sna
tshogs kyi pad+mo'i snying po can dang/ nor bu rin po cha seng ge 'i shing thags kyi pad+mo'i snying po can dang/ nor bu ri'i po che dri ma med pa'i pad+mo'i snying po can dang/ nor bu rin po ches

brgyan pa'i pad+mo'i snyar po can dang/ nor bu rin po che sgo kun nas brgyan pa'i pad+mo'i snyid pa nyan dang/ nor bu rin po che 'du ku rgyan gyi pad+mo' snying po can dang/ ni tu rin po che rgya nats+tsha
gnas rnam par dag pa'i ran po ches rnam par brgyan pa'i bod zer kun tu 'byung ba'i pad+ma'i snying po can dang/ nor bu rin po che rdo rje'isang gis gnon pa'i pad+mo'o snying mo can rag
bshams shir bting bo ste/ gzhal med khang chen po rgyal mtshan sna tshogs de'i pa gam mang po'ang re'apa chu bsam gyi mi khyab pa las byas pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyis rnamakhar
brgyan pa// kha dog bsam gyis mi khyab pa ra mdzes shing gcugs yid du 'ong ba dag go/ bza' shing gi ra ba kun nas brgyan pa de steng nas bla re chen po brgya stong phrag brnyas
kun nas khebs pa// 'di ltar gos kyi bla ra dang/ 'khri'ang gu na re dang/ ma rtog gi bu re rang/ 'phrang ba'i zla re dang/ spos kyi bu re dang nor bu rin po che'i
zla re dang/ gsar gyi bla re dang/ rgyan gyi bla re dang/ rin po che'i rdo rje snang ba'i bla re dang/ glang po shugs dang ldan pas sprul pa'i lha mo'i bla re dang/ nor bu ri'i
po che brgya byin mngon par dga' ba'i nga ra dang/ de dag la sogs pa bu re brgya stong phrag bcur kun nas khebs pa ru lu e ba brgya stong
phrag bcu kun nas lag pa ste/ 'ang ltar rin po che dam pa'i dril bu dra ba dang/ rin po che'i gdugs kyi dra ba dang/ rin po cha' 'i dra ba dang/ chu tib rgya mtsho'i snying po
dra ba dang/ nor bu rin po che ba rta sngon po'i dra ba dang/ seng ge 'i khri shing gi dra ba dang/ nor bu rin po che chu shel gyi dra ba dang sos kyi ka sa kyi ra ba dang ran po
cha'i cod pan dung/ 'an po ma'i 'phung ba'i dra ba rung/ de dag la sogs pa rin po chu'i dra ba brgya stong phrag bcu kun nas yog pa'o// snang ba chen po brgya stong phrag bcus
kyang kun nas yog pa ste/ 'di ltar nor bu rin po che skar ma' 'od zer gyi snang ba dang/ nor bu ri'i po na nyi ma'i snying po'i snang ba dang/ nor bu rin po che zla ba'i rgyal ma
gyi snang ba dang/ nor bu rin po ra spos kyi dung pa 'od 'phro ba'i snang ba rang nor bu rin po che dang la rgya snying pa'i snang ba dang nor bu rin po che pad+mo' nga po ri sgang la dad
nor bu rin po che skar ma'i rgyal mtshan gyi snang ba dang/ nor bu rin po che sgron ma chen po'i snang ba dang/ nor bu rin po che phyogs kun tu rnamalar snang ba'i snang ba dang/ nor
bu rin po che sbos kyi sprin chen po'i snang ba dang/ glog gi 'phreng ba 'byung ba'i snang ba dang/ de dag la sogs pa nor bu rin po che'i snang ba chen po brgya stong thug bcus rtag
tu snang bar byas pa'o// bza' shing gi ra ba ri ni rgyan chen po'i sbyin brgya stong phrag bcu'achar 'bab pa'i rgyan dang ldan pa ste/ dus rang 'thun pa'i tsan dan gyi spyin brgya stong
phrug bcu 'i 'brug sgra rab tu 'byung ba/ lha rdzas las 'das pa'i 'phreng ba dar lha lnga'i sbyin chen po kun tu mcher pas rab chu khargyan pa/ lha rdzas las 'das pa'i gos
tshon sna tshogs dang ldan pa'i sbyin brgya stong phrag bcu'i sprin mngon par 'ab ba pa lha rdzas las 'das pa'i rgyan gyi spyin brgya stong phrag bcus rnam par klubs pa//
lha'i bu brgya stong phrag bcu mthong bar dga' ste 'og tu lta zhing rab tu 'dud pa'i phyag char bzhin du 'bab pa/ lha mo'i spyin brgya stong phrag bcu sngon gyi spyod pa'i skul ba
mnyam pas rang rang gyi lus 'bul ba'achar mngon par 'bab pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i sprin brgya stong phrug bcu chos mnyan pas skomazhing 'ong ba'i char mngon lar
par 'bab pa ste/ ra na dag bstan ma yid bzhin gsar gyi snying po' khri chen po la 'dug rung mu tig rgya mtsho'i snying po'i dra bas brgyan pa'i cod pan thogs pa/
{ ]/lag pa la lha rdzas las 'dus pa'i gsar gyi dpung rgyan dang gdu bu klogs pa/ lag pa nor bu rin po che dpal gyi rang bzhin gyi 'od zer gyis rnam par
mdzes par gyur pa/ rna ma na pa tsamathon mthing du ma med pa rab tu 'phyang ba/ mgo nor bu rin po che'i du bas mdzes par brgyan pa/ nor bu rin po che seng ge 'i gdong gi
rna ba'i gong rgyan thogs pa/ nor bu rin po che yid bzhin gyi nor bu rgyal po'i mgul 'khor thogs pa/ lus rin po che thams cad kyi dra bas yo ga ting 'od rab tu 'bar ba//
srog chags bya ba khrag khrig gis lus rab tubatud de phyag bya ba zhig 'dug ste/ dag bstan ma med khazhan dang drung du shar phyogs nas tshangs pa chen po 'am/ chongs lha chu phan
nam/ tshangs pa'i ris su gtogs pa'i m/ dbang byar dam/ gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi ris su gtogs pa 'am/ rab 'phrul dga' 'am// 'phrul dga' ris su gtog/
zla pa 'am/ rab dga' ldan ma/ dga' ldan gyi ris su gtogs pa 'am/ rab 'tshom 'am/ 'tsho ma'i ris su gtogs pa 'cha/ lha'i dbang po 'am/ sum cu rtsa gsum/
[– ]gyi ris su gtogs pa 'am/ gnod sbyin gyi dbang po 'am/ gnod sbyin nam/ dri za'i dbang po 'am/ dri za 'am/ grul bum gyi dbang po 'am/ grul bum mam/ klu'i dbang
po 'am/ glu 'am/ lha ma yin gyi dbang po 'am/ lha ma yin nam/ nam mkha' lding gi dbang po ma/ nam mkha' lding ngam/ mi 'am bu'i dbang po 'am/ mi 'am ci 'am lto
'phya chen po'i dbang po 'am/ lto 'phye chen po 'am/ gan rje 'am/ gshin rje'i bu mo 'am/ yi dgas rdzu 'phrul chen po 'am/ la dgas sam/ mi'i dbang po 'am/
mi 'ang rung ste// sems can tshad med grangs med pa dag 'ong pa dang/ de bzhin du lho phyogs dang/ nub phyogs dang/ byang phyogs dang/ byang shar gyi phyogs mtshams dar/
shar lho'i phyogs mchoms dang/ lho nub kyi phyogs mtshams dang/ nub byang ga phyogs mtshams dang/ 'og dang steng gi phyogs nas kyang/ tshangs pa chen po 'am tshongs
lha nye sman nam/ tshangs pa'i ris su gtogs pa 'cha/ dbang byed dam/ dbang byed kyi ris su gtogs pa nas/ mi'i dbang po 'am/ mi'i bar gyi sems can mang po 'ong
ba de dag nad sna tshogs shig gis btab bam/ nyon mongs pa sna tshogs kyis kun nas 'khor tam/ lta ba'i rnam pa sna tshogs la mngon par zhen tam/ las kyi sgrib pas
bsgribs pa zhig yod na'ang/ de dag gis dge bsnyan ma yid bzhin de ma thong ma thag tu nar thams cad kyang rab tu zhi bar 'gyur/ sems kyi nyon mongs pa'i dri ma dang bral bar
'gyur lta ba'i gsal zhing yang phyin par 'gyur/ sgrib pa'i ri thams cad kyang rnam par shes pa ra 'gyur/ rnam par rig pa'i dkyil 'khor bsgribs pa
mar pa'i ng khong du chur pa ra 'gyur te/ rnam par dag pa' dkyil 'khor de yod pas na dge ba'i rtsa ba thums cad kyang rab tu byang bar 'gyur/ dbang po'i myu gu thams cad kyang
rnam par 'phal bar 'gyur/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi tshul rgya mtsho la'ang yang dag par gzhel bar 'gyur/ gzungs kyi sgo rgya mtsho thams cad la'ang 'jug par
'gyur/ ting nga 'dzin gyi sgo dang tshul rgya mtsho thams cad kyang mngon sum du 'gyur/ son lam gyi so Thams can kyang yang dag par skye bar 'gyur/ sbyor pa'i sgo skrums
cad kyang rab tu 'byang bar 'gyur/ yon tan mngon par bsgrub pa'i sgo khroms cad kyang rnam par dag par 'gyur/ sems rgya chen po'ang mngon par shes pa thams cad dang ldan
pa'i tshul du 'byung laMr 'gyur/ lus thogs pa med pas kyang thams car du rjes su 'gro bar 'gyur ro// sanas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzungs bza' shing gi ra ba
kun nas rnam par brgyan pa'i nang du phyin te bltas na/ rag bstan ma yid zhin khri bzang po la 'dug pa mthong nas// ra rag zastanam yin bzhin gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/
dag bstan ma yid bzhin gyi rkang ba gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ dag bstan ma yid bzhin la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas 'di skad ces sbas/
so/ 'phags ma bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i cung nyu tu sems bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dar sa byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab pa
bgyi ba dang/ ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags ma ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la garatshwa ngag dang rjes su bstan pa mdzad do zhes shos na/ 'phags
ma ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sa mas dpa'i spyod pa la bsub par bgyi ba dang/ rje ltar nan tan du brgya kha bdag la bshad du gsol/ ris
smras pa/ rigs kyi bu lo mo nu byang chub sems rapa' rnam par thar ba mya ngan nyer pa bde ba'i rgyal mtshan thob pa ste/ rigs kyi khu kho mo ni de'i mthus maklong na don yod
pa'i[;]ma na na don yod pa'o// rim gror byas pa don yong pa'o// gnas gcig na 'grogs pa ren yod pa'o// rjes su dran par byas pa de na yod pa'o// rig
kyi bu kho ma na sems can dag pa'i tshu ba ma bskyed pa/ dge ba'i bshes gnyan gyis yongs su ma zin pa/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas kyis ma dgongs pa rnams
[a99 ]/kyis mthong zhing rnam par dmigs par mig lam du 'ong bar mi 'gyur te/ rigs kyi khu kho mo mthong ba tsam gyis ni/ sems can rnams kyang bla na med/
pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir ma ldog par 'gyur ro// gzhan yang rigs kyi bu kho me'i drung du shar phyogs nas de bzhin gshags pa dag byon cing gnas/
tshe rin po che'i khri 'di la bzhugs nas chos ston to// shar phyogs nas ji lta ba bzhin du/ phyogs bcu nas kyang de bzhin te/ rigs kyi bu de lta bas na kho mo ni
de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang mi 'bral ba'o// chos mnyanapa dang mi 'bral ba'o// byang chub sems dpa' dang 'grogs pa mi 'bral ba'o// rigs kyi bu kho mo rang
N+NaM spyod pa'i skal ba mnyam pa'i srog chags bye ba khrag khrig brgyastong phrag brgyad cu rtsa bzhi po bkra shing gi ri ba kun nas rnam par brgyan pa 'di na gnas pa de dag thams cad kyang/
! bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir ma ldog pa sha stag go/ rab kyi bu sems can gzhan gang 'de na gnas pa de dag kyang ba na mar pa yang dag pa na
rdzogs pa'i byung chung la phyir mi ldog pa'i dge 'dun du gtogs pa sha stag ste/ kho mo dang spyod pa'i skal ba mnyam pa dag go gas pa/ 'phags ma khyod kyis blo na med pa/
thatha'i yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yul ji srid cig nas thugs bskyed/ smras pa// rigs kyi khu khomos ni sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran te/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom//
yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mar mer mdzad ces bya ba byung ba ra bzhin gshegs pa de'i drung du kho mos tshangs pa'i spyod pa spyad do// de bzhin gshegs pa de kho mos/
mchor ro// de bzhin gshegs kha de las chos bstan pa kho mo yongs su bzung ngo/ de'i snga rol tu de bzhin gshegs pa dri ma med pa zhes bya ba byung ste/ re'i bstan pa
la'ang kho mo rab tu byung ngo// chos kyi 'khor le'ang kho mos thung ngo/ de'i snga rol tu de bzhin gshegs pa dpal zhes bya ba byung ste/ re'ang kho mos bsnyen bkur te//
de 'i snga rol tu de bzhin gshegs pa ri rab pal zhes bya ba byung ngo// de'i snga rol tu de bzhin gshegs pa pad+mo'i ser po zhes bya ba byung ngo// de'i snga rol chu de bzhin gshag
pa rnam par snang mdzad ces bya ba byung ngo/ de'i snga rol tu de bzhin gshegs pa kun tu gtsugs pa zhes bya ba byung ngo// re'i snga rol tu re bzhin gshegs pa tshangs pa dag pa zhes
bya ba byung ngo// ri'i snga rol tu de bzhin gshegs pa rdo rje'i gtsug ces bya ba byung ngo// de'i snga rol tu de bzhin gshegs pa chu bo'i lha zhes bya ba byung ste/ rigs kyi bu gzhung de
ltar cho gcig tu brgyud pa dang/ bskal pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu brgyad pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i mtshams 'dab chagA
su bsams te dran par byas nas/ gang kho mo'i rim gror byas te bsnyen bkur ba dang/ mchod pa dang/ bsti stang du byas pa dang/ gang gi spyan sngar kho mos thob par gyur pa dang/
gang gi bstan pa la kho mo'atshang pa'i spyod pa spyan pa'i di bzhin gshegs pa chu klung gang+gA sum cu rtsa drug gi bye ma snyed rjes su dron te/ rigs kyi bu da lan cad du kho mos de bzhin
gshogs pa ji snyad cig bstan bkur ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa rnams kyis mkhyen to/ rigs kyi bu sems dang po bskyod ma thu'og tu chos kyi dbyings rgyas par 'gengs pas/
byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni chod mad pa'o// rigs kyi bu snying rje chen po'i khongs su 'gro ba thams cad chud pas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni tshad med pa'o//rigs kyi
bu smon lam chen pos phyogs bcu'i chos kyi dbyings kyi gzhi zad zad du 'gro ba su/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnams ni tshod med pa'o// rigs kyi tu byams pa chen po'i 'gro ba bams
cad rgyas par 'gengs pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dang 'a rnams ni tshor med pa'o// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pas zhing thams cad du kha skal pa thamA cad yongs su
sdud pas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams natsad med pa'o// rigs kyi bu ting 'dzin gyi stobs kyis byang chub sems dpa'i lam las phyir mi ldog pas/ byang chub sems dpa'
rnams ni tshad med pa'o// rigs kyi bu gzungs kyi stobs kyis 'gro ba thams cad yongs su 'dzin pa'i gzungs kyi tshul khong du chud par byed pas/ byang chub sems dpa'
rnams ni tshad mad pa'o// rigs kyi bu yi shes snang ba'i stobs kyis dus gsum gyi ye shes kyi tshul khong du chud par byed cing yang dag par 'dzin pas/ byang chub sems/
dpa' rnams ni chodaman pa'o// rigs kyi bu mngon par shes pa'i stobs kyis zhing thams cad du sems can rnamA kyi bsam pa dang/ mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'od kyi dri ba'i
'khor lo mngon par bsgrub pas// byang chub sams dpa' rnams ni tshar mer pa'o// rigs kyi 'u tho ran pa yang dag par shes pa'i stobs kyis tshig brjod kyang/ 'gro ba
thams cad shan tu tshim por byed pas/ byang chub sau dpa' rnams na tshor med pa'o// rigs kyi bu lus rnam ra/ ra dag pas sangs rgyas kyi zhing mas cad rang gi lus kyis/
rgyus par 'gangs pas/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni tshad mar pa'o// nor bzlangs kyisasnas pa/ 'phags ma khyod rnga med cig na bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs
pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar 'gyur slas pa/ rigs kyi bu 'di lta ste sems can gcig cig la dmigs shing gdul bar bya ba dang smin par bya ba'i
phyir byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sams byang chub tu skye ba ma yin te/ sems can brgya'i phyir ma yin/ sems can stong gi phyi'i mayin/ sems can brgya phrag stong gi phyir ma yin/ samA can
bya ba'i phyir ma yin/ sems can bye ba brgya'i phyir ma yin/ sems can bye ba stong gi phyir ma yin/ sems can bye ba brgya phrag stong gi phyir ma yin te/ sems can bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong
ga don du byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi sams byang chub tu skye ba ma yin// sems can thams cad kyi phyir ma yin/ sams tun khrag khrig gi phyir ma yin/ sems can gang a'i phyiram ane/
sems can ban bun gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can phyir phyur gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can byang sbyong gi phyir ma yin/ sems can ster 'jal gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can phyal tshul gyi
phyir ma yin/ sems can yal yol kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can ljad ljod kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can phyin zim gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can phyad phyed kyi phyi ma yin/ sams
can ma ldem gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can ya gangs kyi phyir ma yine/ soms ca na cho ma'i phyir ma yin/ sems can khram wim gyi phyir ma yin/ sams nyan ba/
nub kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can brgyud yas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can btang yas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can bkra yar gyi phyir ma yin/ sems can ba
yas kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can gzhal brtag gi phyir ma yin/ sems can mtshungs med kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can lam lum gyi phyir ma yin sems can
rab rib kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can thapa theb kyi phyir ma yin/ sems can 'grib yol gyi phyir ma yin/ soms nyan than 'phye'i phyir ma yin/ sa mas can

nam mkha'i dbyings rnam par dag pa'i mtha' gang du zug pa da'i mthas klas par shog cig/ bdag gi smon lam 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par dag pa'i mtha' gang du

dbyangs zhes bya ba 'dug gis/ de'i gan du song la dris shig/ des rigs kyi bu khyod la byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa ston par 'gyur ro/
de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/ dge bsnyen ma yid bzhin gyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshwal te/ dge bsnyen ma yidi bzhin la lan brgya stong du ma
g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ yang dang yang bltas te phyag 'tshal nas ngo mchims gang bar ngus te/ byang chub mchog tu dkon pa rjes su sams shing dag pa'i bshes

bsam pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa yongs su dag pa dkon par rjes su bsam pa dang/ skal ba mnyam pa'i gshes gnyen dang 'phrad pa dkon par rjes su

chos kyi tshul rjes su bstan pa'i sbyor ba dkon par rjes su bsam pa dang/ sems dri ma med cing ma 'phrog pa'i sbyor ba yang dag par bsgrub pa dka' bar rjes su bsam
ba pa dang thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du shugs drag po rnam par skyed pa'i chos kyi snang ba dkon par rjes su bsam pa byed cung/ dge bsnyen ma yid bzhin gyi drung nas song ngo/

pa yongs su dag par bya ba'i rjes su song ba'i sems dang ldan paM/ byang chub sems dpa'i bsod nams kyi stobs rnam par 'phel bar bya ba'i saMm sa dang ldan pa/
sangs rgyas blta ba'i shugs drag pos dab tu snang bar byas pa'i ngesams dang ldan pa/ chos kyi gter 'thob par bya ba la shugs drag po skyes pa'i sams dang ldan pa/ smon
lam chen po mngon par bsgrub pa'i shugs drag po rab tu 'phal ba'i sems dang ldan pa// chos thams cad kyi phyogs la mngon du lta ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ chos kyi rang bzhin
gyi 'od kyis snang bar byas pa' sams dang ldan pa sgrib pa thams cad rnam par 'thor ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ chos kyi rabyings la mun pa mad par rnam par lta ba'asamA
dang ldan pa/ rdo rje rin po che mazu bo chas mi chogs pa ltar dri ma med pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ bdud thams cad kyi dpung gis brgal bar dka' zhing thub par dka' ba'i
sems dang ldan pa de mthar gyis yul chu ba gtsang ma ga la ba der phyin nas/ drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs tshol tshol ba las/ de'i tshe drang srong
'jigs mchog dbyangs duge ba sbyangs pa'i gnas gang dang gang phranas rtogs grangs med pa'i nags tshal mdangs dga' ba/ la mas rgyas pa'i shang gis kun nas
'grigs pa/ rtag tu ma tog rgyas pa dang ldan pa shing sna tshogs can/ rtag tu shang thog mang po dang ldan pa'i shing thog gi shing dang ldan pa/ nor bu rin po che sna tshog
kyi shing drung nor bu rin po cha'i spang leb kyis rtag tu gshibs pa dang ldan pa/ tsan dan dam pa'i shing kun nas rnam par bres la/ a ka ru yid du 'ong ba'i shing los spos
kyi dri rtag tu 'byung bas rab tu brgyan pa// phyogs bzhi nas shing pa ta la rnam par mdzes par skyes pas yongs su brgyan pa/ n+ya gro d+ha'i shing rabyangs yid du 'ong ba dang
ldan pa 'dzom bu'i shing las rtag tu shing thog snyan pa 'thul kha/ ma tog gi tshal pad+ma dang ut+pa la gsar du skyes pas rab tu brgyan pa zhig nu 'dug 'dug ste/ tshong
dpanagyi bu nor bzung kyis/ drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyang so drang srong stong phrag bcus bskor cing/ tsan dan gyi yal ga shin du 'brel ba'i bya skyibs shig na/ thor tshugs
kyi cod pan can/ pags pa dang myu'i gos gyon pa/ shing kun gyi smad g.yogs can/ rtsa'i stan la 'dug pa mthong ngo/// mazlong nas kyang drang srong 'jig
mchog dbyangs ga la ba der song ste phyin nas/ yang dag pa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang phrad pa'i bsam pas/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen na yang dag pa'i lam ston pas/
thams cad mkhyen pa nyid 'byung ba'i sgo yin par yang dag par lta/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i sa la gzhog pas/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid na dge ba'i bshes gnyan gyi gdan/
ngag la rag lus par yang dgo par lta/ stobs bcu'i ya shes rin po che'i gling du skyol bas/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid na dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi mnyan pa la rag lus
par yang dag par lta/ stobs bcu'i ye shes snang ba yang dag par skyed pas/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi sgron mas snang bar bya ba yin par
yang dag par lha/ nyam nyos med par shams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi grong du phyin par byed pas/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin pa ra yang
dag par lta/ mnyan pa dang mi mnyam pa yongs su ston pas/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi mar me ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen yin par yang dag par ltagayang sa'i
'jigs pa thams cad med par byed pas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi stegs ni dag ba'i bshes gnyen yin par yang dag par lta byams pa chen
po'i stobs kyis sim pa yongs su skyed pa'i phyir/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi gdugs ni dag ba'i bshes gnyenAyin par yang dag par lta/ snying rje chen po yid su skye da pas/
thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi shugs drag po na dag ba'i bshes gnyen yin par yang dag par lta zhing/ chos kyi rang bzhin gyi tshul rab tu snang bar byed pas// kums cad mkhyen pa
nyid gsal bar mthong ba ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rag las par mthong nas/ lus thums rud kyis phab ste phyag byas nas langs te/ drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs/
lanakhargya stong du mar bskor ba byas nas mdun du 'dug ste/ la mo sbyar nas yid du 'ong ba'i tshul gyis/ yid du 'ong ba'i tshog brjod de 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags
zla pa bdag gas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang/
ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshol te/ 'phags pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la nga dmas ngag dang rjes su bstan pa mdzod do zhes thos na 'phag pa ji ltar byang chub semA dpA byang chub
sams dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang/ ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba bdag la bshad du gsol/ de nas drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs kyis/ bram ze'i
byis pa stong phrag bcu po de dag labaltas te/ 'di skad nyes sbas so// byis pa rtag rugs kyi bu 'dis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/
sems can khrums rtsod 'jigs pa med pa la mgron du gnyer to// rigs kyi bu 'di na sems can thums cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i don du sta gon du gnas pa ste/ yashes
rgya mtsho la mngon du gyur pa'o/ de bzhin gshegs pa klams cud kyi chos kyi spyin gyi char btung bar 'dod pa'o// chos kyi tshul rgya mtsho thams cad la 'jug par 'dod pa'o//
ye shes kyi snang ban po la gnas par 'dod pa'o// snying rje chen po'i sprin bsdu bar 'dod pa'o// chos kyi char chen po mngon par dbab par 'dod pa'o// ya shes chen
po'i zla ba 'jig rten du shar bar byas te/ nyon mongs pa'i gdung ba thams cad rab tu gzhil bar 'dod pa'o// sems can thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par rgyal bar
'dod pa'o// de nas bram ze'i byas pa stong phrag bcu po de dag gis mi rtog dra zhig la yid du 'ong zhing kha dog sna tshogs dang ldan pa mang pos/ [0f00]da dpon
gyi bu nor bzang la gtor to// mngon par gtor te// rab tu gtor te// mngon par phyag 'tshal to// de ltar btud de phyag 'tshal nas g.yas phyogrwa
su bskor ba byas te tshig 'di skad du brjod do// 'di ni sems can thams cad yongs su skyob par 'gyur ro// sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal thams cad rab tu zhi bar bgyide
bar 'gyur ro// byol song ga skye gnas kyi lam gyi rgyud thams cad rnam par gcod par 'gyur ro// gshin rje' 'jil chen gyi lam gyi rgyud thams cad rnam par zlog par 'gyur ro//
mi khom pa'i sgo thams cad gcod par 'gyur ro/ srid pa'i rgya mtsho yongs su skyems par 'gyur ro// srid pa'i 'ching ba gcod par 'gyur ro// sdug bsngal gyi phung po rnam par
zlog par 'gyur ro// ma rig pa'i mun po sal bar 'gyur ro// bsod nams kyi khor yug gis 'jig rten yongs su skor bar 'gyur ro// ye shes rin po che'i 'byung gnas yongs
su ston par 'gyur ro// ye shes kyi nyi ma 'char brjod bgyid par 'gyur ro// chos kyi mig rnam par spyod par 'gyur ro// 'jig rten rnamAl mnyamakha dngami mnyam pa yang dag par ston
par 'gyur ro// de nas drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs kyis/ byis pa de dag la 'di skad ces smras so// byis pa dag gang gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub
tu sems bskyed pa de ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tshi/ sems can thams cad kyi bde ba rab tu skyed de/ rim gyis thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyang thob par 'gyur ro//
byas pa dag rigs kyi bu 'dis ni bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa ste/ da bas na 'di nas ngas rgyas kyi yon tan thums rud kyis yongs su sbyong
bar 'gyur ro// de nas drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs kyis/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor ba brang la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi 'u khe bo na byang chub sem
dpa'i rnam par thar ba gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rgyal mtshan thob pa'o// nor bzang gyis smras pa// byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa 'di'i yul ji lta bu
zhig mchis/ de nas drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs kyis lag pa g.yas pa brkyang// tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzung gi mgo la byugs nas lag pa g.yas pas bzung ngo/ tshod
dpon gyi bu nor bzang la drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs kyis lag pa g.yas pas bzung ma thag tu/ ra'i mod la tshong dpon gyi khyo nor babrang gis phyogs bcur sangs rgyas kyi zhing

brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra kha snyed kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing mthong bar gyur te/ de dag gi de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brgya stong phrag bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyad/
@#// kyi zhabs kyi drung na bdag nyid 'dug pa shes par gyur to// sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag kyang rnam pa grangs med par rnam par dag pa'i rgyun dang ldan par mthong
ngo de dag na'ang de bzhin gshegs pa 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho kha dog sna tshogs can rgyan rnam pa tha dad pa dang ldan pa dag 'khod par mthong ngo/ 'khor gyi dkyil
ma 'khor rgya mtsho de dag na'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po 'bar bas brgyan pa dag bzhugs pa mthong ngo/ de dag las kyang tshig dang yi ge gcig
las kyang phyir phyogs pa med par chos bstan pa kun to// de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos kyi 'khor lo de dag kyang phan tshun ma 'dres par yang dag par 'dzin to//
chos kyi sprin gyi char sems can gyi bsam pa sna tshogs la 'bab pa de dag kyang yang dag par 'dzin to// de bzhin gshog pa de dag gi sngon gyi smon lam mos pa sA chog
kyi stobs kyis rnam par sbyangs pa rgya mtsho la'ang zhugs so// sangs rgyas kyi yang dag par bsdu ba smon lam sna tshogs rgya mtshos rnam par dag pa rgya mtsho de dag la'ang zhugA
so/ sangs rgyas kyi sku mdog sems can gyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du tshom par 'gyur bor rnam par dmigs pa de dag kyang mthong ngo// sangs rgyas kyi 'od zer gyi
kha 'dod chags dang bral ba swA tshogs kyis rnam pa ra dag pa'i rgyan gyi dkyil 'khor de dag kyang mthong ngo/ sangs rgyas kyi stobs de dag la'ang ye shes snang ra bskabs
pa med pa dang ldan pas zhugs so/ de ltar na byang chub sems dpa' rnam par skur pa gzhan gyis mi zub pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi ye shes kyi 'od kyis snang bar gyur pa/
ting nge 'dzin rnam par snang mdzad kyi sung po snang ba rab tu thob pa/ ting nge 'dzin ye shes mi zad pa'i rnam par gyur pa dang ldan pa// gzungs kyi sgo snang ba/ phyogs kun
gyi dra ba rab tu thob pa/ gzungs kyi so rdo rje'i snying pos sams rab tu gsal bar byas pa/ ting nge 'dzin gyi yi shes btsugs pa rnam par phye ba'i yul la rnam par phye ba
rab tu thob pa/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par spyod pa/ gzhi kun nas rnam par brgyan pa'i snying po'i yul du gyur pa/ ting nge 'dzin gyi snang ba sangs rgyas nam
nal snying po'i dkyil 'khor la rab tu zhugs pa/ ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas skrums cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo'i mu khyud kyis sems rab tu snang bar byas pa/ ting nge 'dzin
gyi snang ba dus gsum gyi yanas rin po che mi zad pa'i dkyil 'khor la rab tu brtson pa des/ de bzhin gshegs pa la la'i zhabs kyi drung du ni nyin zhag gcig len par
shes so// la lar ni nyin zhag bdun lon pa snyam/ la la ni zla ba phyed len pa snyam/ la lar na zla ba gcig len pa snyam/ la lar ni lo gtsug len
pa snyam/ la lar ni lo brgya lon pa snyam/ la lar na 'o stong len pa snyam/ la lar ni lo brgya phrag stong len pa snyam/ la lar na la bya ba len pa snyam/ la lar na le bya
kha brgya len pa snyam/ la lar ni la bya ba stong len pa snyam/ la lar na lo bye ba brgya phrag stong len pa snyam/ la lar ni lo bye ba khrag khrug lon pa snyam/ la lar ni bskal
pa phyed lon pa snyam/ la lar ni bskal pa gcig len pa snyam/ la lar ni bskal pa brgya lon pa snyam/ la lar ni u0f8bskal pa stong len pa snyam/ la lar ni bskal pa
brgya phrag stong le no pa snyam/ la lar ni bskal pa bye ba len pa snyam/ la lar ni bskal pa bye ba phrag brgya lon pa snyam/ la lar ni bskal pa bye ba phrag stong len pa snyam/ la la
na ba skal pa bye ba brgya phrag stong len pa snyam/ la lar nibaskal pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong lan pa stam byed pa nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa la la'i zhabs kyi drung du
bskal pa brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du sman pa stod len par gyur pa snyam byed pa nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa la la'i zhabs kyi drung du ni bskal pa 'a dzam bu'i gling gi rdul shon
tu khra ba sed len kha snyam byed pa nas/ bskal pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed len pa snyam byed par gyur to//
de nas drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs kyis/ tshong dpon gyi bu zho'i bzadu btang ba dang/ des yang bdag drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs kyi mdun na 'dug par shes
par gyur to/ de la drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs kyis sas pa/ rig kyi bu dran mod/ sgas pa/ 'phags pa dag ba'i bshes gnyen gyi byin gyi rlabs kyis dran
zhe smra sa pa/ rigs kyi bu kho bos ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa gzhan gyis mi sgrub pa'i rgyal mtshan 'di shes par zad na/ byang chub sems dpa' 'gro
ba thams cad las khyad par du 'alags par yashis mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa' u0f7a ting nge 'dzin thob pa/ rus khams cad du 'khor la skor ba/ sangs rgyas gyi
smatsan dang ye shes mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas pa// de bzhin gshegs pa byang ba'i ma la rnam par dmigs pa'i rgyun rab tu 'god pa dus gsum gyi yul skad cig
gcig gis ye shes su yang dag par sdur la/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du lus shin tu rnam par bkra ma pa/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad la ya las snang
ba'i rang bzhin dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du mngon sum du mngon par langs pa/ sems can gyi bsam pa/
ji lta ba bzhin du spyod pas rnam par dpyod pa dang 'thun pa'i tshul dang ldan pa/ 'dod pa bzhin du kun snang zhing du ma mad la 'od dang ldan pa'i ye shes kyi dkyil 'khor
rnam par dag pa de dag gi spyod pa shes pa 'am/ yon tan brjod pa 'am/ smon lam gyi khyad par sos pa 'am/ zhing gi mngon par 'du bya bshes pa 'am/ ye shes kyi
yul la 'jug par bya ba 'om/ ting nge 'dzin gyi spyod yul gyi rjes su 'brang bar bya ba 'am/ rdzu 'phrul dang rnam par 'phrul pa la 'jug par bya ba 'am/ rnam par thar
pa'i khyu mchog gi mgru phyung ba dang rnam par rtse ba'i rjes su 'brang bar bya ba 'am/ lus rnam par phye ba'i mtshan ma gzung bar bya ba 'am/ dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par
dag paM brjod pa 'am/ ye shes kyi snang ba rab tu brtan par zhus re skan/ song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di stod zhu/ yul yongs su tshol ba zhes bya ba yod de//
de na bram ze rgyal kha'i drod kyi skye mched cis bya ba 'dug gis/ de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpasaM byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang/ ji ltar
zhan tan du bya ba dris shig/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzang dga' rangs te/ mgu zhing nyams bde la tshim zhing yid bde ba skyes nas/ drang srong 'jigs mchog/
dbyangs kyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su kha skor ba byas nas yang dang
yang bltas te/ drang srong 'jigs mchog dbyangs kyi drung nas song de/// bam po dgu bcu rtsa gsum pa// de nas
tshong dpon gyi khu nor bzang byang chub re mas dpa'i rnam pa re thar pa gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rgyal mtshon gyi ye shes kyis snang bar byas pa/ sangs rgyas kyi yul gyi rnam
par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa la mngon sum du rnam par spyod pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par shar pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa/ mngon sum gyi ye shes
kyis mngon par shes pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting ngo 'dzin bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i phashes kyis sems snang bar gyur pa/ dus thams cad du yang dag par 'jug pa'i
ting nge 'dzin gyi ye shes snang ba rab tu thob pa/ 'du shes kyi rnam pa thams cad la yang dag par 'jug pa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi yul gyis snang bar gyur pa/ 'gro ba thams
cad las khyad par du 'phags pa dang ldan pa'i ye shes snang ba thob pa thams cad kyi rjes su song ba'i spyod yul la rnam par spyod pa mngon du gyur pa/ gnyis
su rnam par rtog pa med pas mnyam pa nyid du bstan pa'i ye shes lhur len pa dmigs pa thams cad la rab tu 'dul ba'i ya shes snang ba dang ldan pa/ mnyan pa khams cud la mngon
du gyur pa'i bzod pa rnam par dag pa la mos pa'i mdzod la mkhas pa/ rang bzhin gyi chos la bzod pa khong du chud pa'i ye shes mngon par shes pa dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i
spyod pa'i rang bzhin bsgom pa dang mi 'bral ba'i sems dang ldan pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi shugs drag po las phyir mi ldog pa'i soms dang ldan pa/ stobs bcu'i ye shes
tsha1 snang ba'i 'od zab tu thob pa/ chos kyi dbyangs brjod pa la mngon par mos pa/ ngoms pa med pa'isams dang ldan pa// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la rnam par spyod pa'i spyod yul du/
'jug pa khong du chud pasams dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i rgyun mtha' yas pa mngon par bsgrub pa'i sems dang ldan pa// byang chub sems dpa'i smon

lam gyi dkyil 'khor maskra' yas pa rnam par sbyar ba'i sems dang ldan pa// 'jig rten gyi khams kyi dra pa mi zad pa khong du chud pa'i yi shes mtha' dang dbung med pa mngon du gyur paN+DisaMms dang ldan pa
sems can rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa yongs su snyan par bya ba dang gdul bar bya ba la zhum pa med pa'i sems dang ldan pa des/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i yul mtha' yas pa la yang dag par blta

ba dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud rnam pa tha dad pa mtha' yas pa la yang dag par blta ba dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par phye ba sna tshogs mtha' yas pa la yang dag par blta ba dang/ 'jig rten

gyi khams mtha' yas pa dmigs pa phra ba dang yangs pa'i khongs su chud par bya ba yang dag par blta ba dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi gzhi mtha' yas pa'i ming gi dra ba sna tshogs yang dag par blta ba dang/
