ba0 ba'i dbyangs rnam par dag pa tshad med pa'i yon tan brjod du yod pas rnam par sbyod pa// thoms cad la skal ba mnyam par yon tan rnam par dag pa/ las kyi rnam pas smon pa la bzha ma tho ba medacing/ rnam par dag pas

skal ba mnyam pa'i las kyi rnam par smin pa rnam par dag pa/'gro ba thams cad yongs su skyob pa skal bamanyam par byan sa pa chen pos rgyas pa'i 'gongs ba/ 'gro ba rnams chud yongs susmin par byed pas na skyo ba'i

phyi' skal ba mnyam par snying rje chen pos rgyas par 'gangs ra rasam pa ji lta ba bzhin du sems cas thams cad tshim pa' byed pa'i lus yongs su ston pas skal ba mnyam pa la lus kyi las rnam bcad g pa/ chos kyi

dbyings kyi nges pa'i tshig tha snyad la skal ba mnyam par ngag gi las rnam par dag pa// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi 'a khor gyi dkyil 'khob du skal ba mnyam par 'dong ba sasargyaga' mchod cing rim gror bya ba'i phyir/ sangs

rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du skal ba mnyam pa'i rgyu ba/chos thams cad kyi tshul khong du tshud pa ba bya ba la skal ba ma tam par mngon sumadugyur pa'i ye shes dang ldan pa byang chub sems dpa'i sa thams cad thob par bya ba la

skal ba mnyam pa'i spyod pa rnam par dag pa sha stag gcig kyang yod de/ rigs kyi bu bud medastong phrag bcu po 'di dag kyang skad cig gcig tu 'di lta ste// byang chub sems dpa'i sku tshe gcig gis zlog pa rnams la zhal zas yod/

sudasu ba'i phyir phyogs bcu'i rgyas par 'dod do phrub 'ditaMd nas kha zas blangs shing srid pa tha ma pa dang/ nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas kyi thig ba pa rnams la bsod snyoms dbul ba'i phyi'i phyogs b.rul rgyas par 'dong ngo//
sdu ba bde nyid nas kha bras blangs shing phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste/yi dgas kyi tshogs rnams cad kha zas kyis yongasasu tshim par byed do// rigs kyi bu de ltar kho mo ni bru pa 'di nyid

nas lha rnams ni lha'i ra zas kyis yongs su tshim par byed do// ku rnams ni klu'i kha zas kyis/gnod sbyin cha mas ni gnod sbyin gyi kha zas kyis dri za rnaman dri za'i kha zas kyis/ lham yazhe mAni lha ma yin gyi 'bras/

kyis/nam mkha' lding rnams nam mkha' lding gi kha zas kyis// me khams rnams ni mi 'am ci'i kha zas kyis lto 'phye chen po rnams na re lto 'phye chen po 'i kha zas kyis/ma rnams 'i mi'i kha zas kyis/mi ma yin pa rnamA

ni mi ma yin pa'i kha zasakyis yongs su tshim par byed do// rigs kyi bu yud tsam zhig sdong dang de'u de mngon du 'gyur go/ dge bsnyen ma phul du byung ba des rtog de brjod ma thag tu de'i mod la 'di lta

ste dge bsnyen ma phul du byung bas sngon gyi smon lam gyis bos pas/ sems can grangs med pa zhigashar phyogs kyi sgo nas nang du 'ongs par gyur to// de bzhin du 'di lta ste/ dge bsnyen ma phul du byung

! ba'i sngon gyi smon lam gyis bos bas/ sems can grangasamadapa zhig lho phyogs dang/ nuba phyogs dang/ byang phyogs kyi sgonus nang du 'ongs par gyur to/ de ltar 'ongs pa de dag dge bsnyen ma phul du byung bos
stan de dag la bkod de/ so so nas ci dga' ba'i kha zas tshod ma sna tshogs dang/ 'os tshogs dang/ kha dog sna tshogs dang/ dri sna tshogs dang ldan pas yongs su tshim par byas so// yongs su bstabs
pa byas so// yongs su dga' bar byas so// yongs sumagu bar byas so// yongs suspro bar byas so// shin tu tshim par byas so/ yid bde bar byas so// kha zas sna tshogs kyis ji lta ba de bzhin du

btung ba rnam pa sna tshogs dang/ ro dam pa sna tshogs dang/ stan sna tshogs dang/ mal cha sna tshogs dang/ bzhon pa sna tshogs dang/ gos h+pha tshogs dang/ ma togasna tshogs dang/ 'phreng ba sna tshogs dang/

sngos sna tshogs dang/ bdug spos sna tshogs dang/ byug pa sna tshogs dang/ phyi ma sna tshogs dang/ rin po che sna tshogs dang/ rgyan sna tshogs dang/ rin po che shing rta sU tshogs dang/ gdugs sba tshogs

dang rgyal mtshan sna tshogs dang/ lta'i ba dan sna tshegos dang/ yo byad kyi yul rnam pa sna tshogs kyis yongs su tshim par byas nas/ yid dga' bar 'gyur ba'i bar du byas so// lha rnams ni lha'i kha zas

kyis yongs su tshim par byas so// klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po dang/ mi dang mi ma yin pa rnams kyang mi ma yin pa'i
kha zas kyis yongs su tshim par byas pa nas/ yi da bde bar 'gyur ba'i bar du byas so/ 'on kyang grwa ba de las god pa gyur pa med/ 'gribs pa mad/ dmas pa mang/ zang pa la rgyus pa med/ sa mtshams

su gyur pa med/ mthar thug pamed/ mur thug pa mang do// de nas dge bsnyen ma phul du byung ba des tshong dngo sha gyi bu shor babras la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu kho mos ni byang chub sems dpa'i
[f/ rnam par thar pa bsod nams kyi mdzod mi zad pa'i rgyan ces bya ba 'a shes pa zad na/ byang chub sems dpa' bsod nams chen po'i rgya mtshomi zad ngas ma zad pa'i de sod nams dang

ldan pa// bsod nams kyi tshogs rgya che bo shin tu bsags pas nam mkha' lta bur gyur// 'gro ba thams cad kyi smon lam yongs su rdzogs par byed pas nor bu rin po che yid bzhin gyi rgyal po lta bu/ 'gro ba thams cad

kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su srung bas bsod nams chen po'i khor yug dang ldan pa/'gro ba thams cad du zhi po snyim pa nas char ltar 'thor bas bsod nams chen po'i sprin du gyur pa/ chos kyi grong khyer gyi sgo 'byed

pas nagasod nams chen po'i mdzod la mngon sumadu lta ba/ 'gro bathams cad kyi 'phongs pa'i mun pa sel bsar sodazhams chesha bo'i sgron mar gyur pa de dag gi spyod pa shes pa kham/ yon tan brjod par zhus te

skasha song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na/ grong khyer 'byung ba chen po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na khyim bdag mkhas pa zhes bya ba'ajug gis/ de'i gan du song la ji ltar byung chub sems dang/ sa
byang chub sems dang 'i spyod ba la bslab par bya ba dang/ ji ltar nan tan du bya badris shig/ de nas tshong dbon gyi bu shor bzangs/ dge bsnyen ma phul du byung ba'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos

phyag 'tshal te/ dge bsnyen ma phul du byung ba la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas zhas yang dang yang bltas te/ dge bsnyen ma phul du byung bu'i drung nas blta bsam ngoms bzhin du song
dzade nas tshong dpon gyi bu shor ba zangs bsod nams kyi mdzod mi zad pa'i rgyan gyi rnam par thar pa'i snang ba rab tu thob ra ste/ bsod nams rgya ma tsho de las rjes sus mas/bsod nams kyi rnam

mkha' de la zhi kun tu lta/ bsod nams kyi phung po de'i yo sa su 'dzi6 bsod nams kyi ri bo de la zhi mngon par 'dzeg/ bsod nams kyi tshogs de'i yang dag par sdud/ bsod nam kyi chu bo de la zhi yongs su 'bog/ bsod nams

kyi mu stegs de la zhi rab tu 'bab/bsod nams kyi dkyil 'khor de yongs su sbyong/ thasod thamasakyi gter de la ki yang dag par lta/bsod nams kyi tshul de la'i rjesaM su dran par byed/bsod nyams kyi chos de ni yongs su 'a

bsod nams kyi rgyud de ni yongasasu sbyong ba byed cing// mthar gyis grong khyer 'byung ba chen po gang na bder phyin nas dge ba'i bshes gnyen 'dod cing/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen la blta bas bsgos pa'i sams kyi

rgyud dang/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis byin gyisabarlabs pa'i bsam pa dang/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen la thogs pamed pa'i sbyor ba dang/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen la'i 'gro bya bas skyo bamed pa'i brtson 'grus dang/

dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rag lus pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dang/ dge ba'i bshesaganyen gyis nges par gyur pa'i bsod rnams tshog thams cad dang/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyisa rnam par spel ba'i thabs mkhas pa'i

spyod pa dang/ gzhan gyi dring me 'jog par dge ba'i bshes gnyeb zim gro bya ba la mkhas pa dang/ rnam nga na 'phal ba'i dag ba'i rtsa ba thams cad dang/ rnam par dag par 'gyur ba'i byang chub sems ngang 'i lhag pa'i bsam pa
@#// dang yang dag par 'phel ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i dbang po dang/ yongs su smin par 'gyur ba'i dag tha'i rtsa ba thams cad dang// yang dag par 'bal ba'i smon lam chen po mngon par

bsgrub pa dang/ shin tu yangs par 'gyur ba'i snying rje chen pos bdag nyid thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'bar gyur par yang drag par mthong nas// sangs rgyas thams cad las byang chub sems dpa'i kun tu bzad bo'i

sbod pas chos kyi snang ba yang dag par blang ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu snang ba rnam par 'phel bar byed cing/ khyim bdag mkhas pa yongs su tshol tshol ba las/grong khyer gyi dbus/ lam gyi bzhi mdo

zhigan rin po che sna bdun gyi stegs bu zhig la rin po che grangasamed pa las byas pa'i khri/ nor bu rin po che'i rkang pa rdo rjedung/ in+d+ra nI lasna tshogs kyis spras pa bkye ba/ gsar gyi lcags pod kyi dra bas
legs par blas pa/ nor bu rin po che dri ma med pa'i snying po cag rin po che lcabargya tsam gyis gzugs legs par brgyan pa/ lha rdzas kyi stan sna tshogs pang ba/ gam yokas lha rdzas kyi gos kyi rgyal

mtshan dang ba dan mang po bsgrung ba/ rin po che du ma'i dra bas kun nas yog pa// rin po che'i bla'e chen po bres pa/ bla mas gser dang rin po che'i ma tog gi lda lding mang po bkye ba zhig la 'dug cing/

'dzam bu chu klung gi gsar gyi gdugs yu badri ma med pa be shun las byas pa ni drung nas bsgreng zhing bzung/ g.ya ga dzadri ma med pa'i rdul yab da pa'i rgyal po lta bu s na legs pa g.yab/ spos kyi ri

[./ ]gro yo byad sna tshogs kyis ni bdugs shing bsangs/ rol mo brdung bar ng dkrol ba lha rdzas kyi byangs las 'das par sgra 'byin pa lnga brgya tsaman g.yas g.yon nas brdungs shing dkrol/ grong khyer
'byung ba chen bon 'khod pa'i sems can rnams shin tu dga' bar bya ba'i don du/ lha rdzas kyi me tog gi sprin gyi chas lho kun nas 'bab par gyur pa/ g.yog srog chags stong phrag bcu tsam sngon gyi

dge ba'i rtsa ba skal ba mnyam par sbyong sprod pa/ ngag nyan cing ci dga' bar byed pa/ lha rdzas las 'das pa'i rgyan gyis shin tu brgyan pa// byang chub sems dang ba bsam pa yongs su grub pa lnga dang
mi'i gzugs las shin tu bangs pa sha stag gis kun nas bskor cing 'dug pa mthong nas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nog bslangs/ khyim bdag mkhas pa gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ khyim bdag mkhas/
pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ khyim bdag mkhas pa la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas mdun du 'dug ste/ thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags
pa bdag u0f7a/ 'di lta sta/ sems can rngams cad kyi sdug bsngal zhi bar bgyi ba dang/ sems can thams cad shin tu bde ba la dgod pa dang/ sems can thams cad 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho nas mngon par
gdon pa dang/ sams nu'athams cad chos rin po che'i gling du ya nga rtag par bskyal ba dang/ sems can thams cad kyi srid pa'i rlan shin tu bsam pa dang/ sems can thams cad kyi snying rje'i rlan yang
dag par bskyed pa dang/ sems can thams cad kyi 'dod pa'i nga' ba dang srid pa rnam par bzlog pa dang/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi ye shes la mos zhi
bsgrub par bgyi ba dang/ sems can thams cad 'khor ba'i bas mtha' dgon pa las yang dag par bzla ba dang/ sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi yon tan dang chos la dga' zhing mos pa/
yang dag par skyed pa dang/ sems can thams cad khams gsum grong rdal nas gdon pa dang/ sems can thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa'i pho brang du gzung ba sems can thamasacad kyi des
du bla na med pa yang dag par rdo gas pa'i byang chub tu zhugs kyis kyang/ ji ltar byang chub sems dar sa byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang/ ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba
ma 'tshal te/ 'phags pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa mdzad do zhes bdag gis thosan/ 'phags pa ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems
dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang/ ji ltar bslabs na byang chub sems dpa' rnams sems can thams cad kyi rten du 'gyur pa bdag la bshad du gsol/ de skad ces smras pa dang/
khyim bdag mkhas pas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu de ltar khyod kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems
bskyed pa legs so legs so// rigs kyi bu sems can gang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed cing/ byang chub sems dpa'i sbyod pa yongs su tshol ba dang da
dge ba'i bshes gnyen la blta bas mi ngoms pa dang/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro bsami skyo ba dang/ dge ba'i bshes nyen la rim gro bya bas sgyid lug pa mad pa dang/ dge
ba'i bshes gnyen btsal bas yid mi bde ba mi skyid pa dang dge ba'i bshes gnyen btsal ba las phyir mi ldog pa dang/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen la mos zhing dad pa'i yid las rnam par
mi ldog pa dang/ dge ba'i bshes gnyan gyi ngor blta ba las phyir mi zlog pa dang/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams dag gi tshul la zhum pa med pa dang/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rim gro dang
bsnyen bkur bya bas mi skyo ba de lta bu ni shin tu dkon no// rigasakyi bu khyod kyis kho bo'i 'khor 'di dag mthong mod/ sas pa/ 'phags pa mthong ngo// smras pa/ rigs kyi bu 'dri dag kun
kyang kho bos bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa dag ste/ 'di dag ni kho bos de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs su bskyed pa'o// 'di dag ni kho bos pha rol tu phyin pas/
bstad de gsos pa'o// 'di dag ni khos bos chos dkar po thams cad kyis bskyed pa'o// 'di dag ni kho bos de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs bcu la rnam par bskyod pa'o// 'di dag ni kho bos
'jig rten gyi rigs las gyen du bskyod pa'o// 'di dag ni kho bos de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs la bkod pa'o// 'di dag ni kho bos 'jig rten gyi lam gyi 'khor lo las bzlog

pa'o 'di dag ni kho bos chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba labatsud pa'o// 'di dag ni kho bos ngan song gsum gyi rgyud du ltung ba las yongasasur byung bgo/ 'di dag ni kho bos chos nyid khong du chud par bya ba la
bkod de/ rigs kyi bu de ltar na byang chub sems dapa' rnams sems can thams cad kyi skyabs su gyur pa yin no// rigs kyi bu kho bo'i yid kyi mdzod nas byung ba'i bsod nams mang bo thob pa ste
de'i mthus kho bo ni zas 'dod pa rnams la zas kyi sbyin pa byed do// btung ba 'dod pa rnams la btung ba dang/ ro'i dam pa 'dod pa rnams la de'i dam pa dang/ bza' ba 'dod pa rnams la bza'
ba dang/ bca' ba 'dod pa rnams la bca' ba dang/ blag pa 'dod pa rnams la blag pa dar/ mur ba 'dod pa rnams la mur ba dang/ gos 'dod pa rnams la gos dang/ me tog 'dod pa rnams
bam tog dang/ 'phror ba 'dod ba rnams la 'phrang ba dad/ spos 'dod pa rnams la smos dang/ bdug pa 'dod pa rnams la bdug pa dang/ byug pa 'dod pa rnams la byug pa dang/ phyi ma 'dod pa
rnams la phye ma dang/ rgyan dang lhab lhub 'dod pa rnams la rgyan dang lhab lhub dang/ rin po che 'dod pa rnams la rin po che dang/ sor 'dod pa rnams la gsar dang dngul 'dod pa rnams dngul dang/
0nyi/ mu tig 'dod pa rnams la mu tig dang/ rten 'dod pa rnams la rten dang/ stan 'dod pa rnams la stan dang/ mal cha'adod pa rnams la mal cha dang/ na ba'i gsos sman dang yo byang 'dod pa rnams/
lan ba'i gsosasman dang yo byad dang/ bzhon pa 'dod pa rnams la bzhon pa dang/ dgal ba 'dod pa rnams la dgal ba dang/ glang po dang/ rta dang/ shing rta dang/ ba glang dang/ bong bu
dang [0f10 ]ma he dang/ ra lug 'dod pa rnams la/ glang po dang/ rta dang/ shing rta dang/ ba glang dang/ bong budang/ ma he dang/ ra lug dang/ rgyal mtshan dang/ gdugs dang/ ba dan 'dod pa rnams
la rgyal mtshan dang/ gdugs dang/ bstan dang/ bran po dang bran mo 'dod pa rnams la bran po dang bran mo dang/ 'khor gyi byis pa 'dod pa rnams la 'khor gyi phyis pa dang/ bud med 'dod pa
rnams la bud med dang/ bu mo gzhon nu ma 'dod pa rnams la bu mo gzhon nu dang/ cod pan dang gtsug gi rin po che 'dod pa rnams la cod pan dang gtsugag zhe bo che dang/ thor pag dang bcas ba'i
gtsug gi rin po che 'dod ba rnams la thor pag dang bcas pa'i gtsug gi rin po che dang/ skra mthon mthing dri ma med pa'i dkyil 'khor 'dod pa rnams la skra mthon mthing dri ma med pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi
sbyin pa byed pa nas/ yo byad sna tshogs thams cad 'dod pa rnams la'ang yo byad sna tshogs thams cad kyi sbyin pa byed do// rigs kyi bu yud tsam zhig sdod dang de'u re mngon sum du mthong bar
/ 'gyur ro// de skad du khyim bdag mkhas pa des tshig de brjod ma thag tu de'i mod la/ sems can grangs med pa zhig khyim bdag mkhas pa'i sngon gyi smon lam

gyis bos pas/ phyogs tha dad pa dang/ yul dang gnas tha dad pa dang/ grong khyer tha dad pa dang/ grong rdal tha dad pa dang/ tshong dus tha dad pa dang/ ljongs tha dad ba dang/ khor gyi grong tha dad pa dang/
khyim tha dad pa dang/ sems can gyi rgyud tha dad pa dang/ sems can gyi rigs tha dad pa dang/ sems can rnam pa mi mthun pa tha dad pa dang/ lam gyi rgyud tha dad pa dang/ gnas kyi rnam pa dang mar

du bya ba tha dad pa nas/ sems can skye mched rnam par dag pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa la rdzas sna tshogs don du gnyer ba/ kha zas sna tshogs 'dod pa// bsam pa tha dad pa bza' ba dang btung ba gtsang ba 'dod

bdad/ sha 'dod pa dang/ lazas rnam pa tha dad pa sna tshogs don du gnyer ba/ lam gyi rgyud rnam pa sna tshogs kyi khyad par du skyes pa'i skye mched la gnas pa 'di lta ste/ mi'i nang nas 'bras chan dang/
la sra chan dang/ 'khur ba dang/ skyo ma dang/ nyang ng/ sha la sogs pa lam gyis bza' ba'i kha zas sna tshogs don du gnyer ba dang/ mi'i nang nas ji lta ba bzhin du'agro ba'i rgyur thams cad na rnam

par spyod pa dag las kyang/ bzas dang btung ba sna tshogs don du gnyer ba dag de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i mthu dang byang chub sems dpa'i spyin pa thogs pa med par gtong ba'i rnga'i sgra dang/ byang
0zhi/ chub sems dpa'i sngon gyi smon lam gyis bos pas kun kyang 'ongs par gyur to/ 'ongs nas kyang khyim bdag mkhas pa la slongs mo 'debs so// gdong du lta'o// sdod do// gsol ba
'debs so// de nas khyim bdag mkhas pas slong ba de dag kun nas 'dus par shes nas yud tsam du bsams te nam mkha' la bltas pa dang/ nam mkha'i dbyas nas kha zas dang btung ba rnam

pa sna tshog saro sna tshogs dang ldan pa/ kha dog sna tshogs dang ldan pa/ dri sna tshogs dang ldan pa mang po 'thon te/ lag mthil du 'ong bar gyur to/ des de dag yongasasu blangs shing de ltar kun nas 'dus

pa'i slongs mo pa mos pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa de dag ci 'dod pa'i bras dang/ btung ba'i rnam pa dang/ yo byad kyi khyad ba'i thams cad kyis yongs su tshim par byas so// ci 'dod pa yongs subyin no//
rab tu dga' bar byas so// shin tu tshim par byas so// dga' ba shin tu skye bar byas so// nyams shin tu bde bar byas so// yid rab tu dga' bar byas so// de ltar de dag shin tu tshim par byas
nas niges kyang ma chog ste/ de'i 'og tu chos bstan pa 'di lta ste/ ye shes kyi tshogs rgya chen po bsags pa'i rgyud yongs su brjod de chos bstan to// 'phongs pa thams rud 'byung mi srid pa'i rgyu
yongs su brjod pa dang/ skyid pa chen po yongs su 'khrub pa'i rgyu yongs su brjod pa dang/ chos kyi ye shes kyi tshul 'thob pa 'byung ba'i rgyu yongs su brjod pa dang/ bsod nams kyi tshogs rgyu tshon
[r/ ]@#// po bsags ba'i rgyu yongs su brjod pa dang/ dga' ba bza' ba'i zas rab tu 'thob pa 'byung ba'i rgyu yos su brjod pa dang/ mchon dang ngab byang bzang pos shAn tu brgyan
pa'i lus 'athob pa 'byung ba'i rgyu yongs su brjod pa dang/ thub pa med pa'i stobs rnam par dag pa 'thob pa 'byung ba'i rgyu yongs su brjod pa dang/ bran med pa'i kha zas yongs su shis pa 'thob
pa 'byung ba'i rgya yongs su brjod pa dang/ bdud kyi dpung thams cad rab tu 'jom pa'i bsod nams kyi stobs mi zad nga rab tu la thob pa 'byung ba'i rgyu yongs su brjod pa bya sta chos bstan to//
ngas kha zas don du gnyer cing 'ongs pa rnams la nam mkha'i dbyings nas kha sbasa rnam pa sna tshogs blangs shing tshim par byas te/ de dag la tshe dang/ mdog dang/ stobs drang/ bde ba dang/

spobs pa phun sum tshogs pa thob par bya ba'i phyir chos bstan to// des btung ba don du gnyer cing 'ongs pa rnams la btung ba mang po zhim pa kha na ma tho ba med pa/ sa da the tu dga' bar byed pa de/
dag gis tshom par byas nas/ dedag la 'khor bas skom zhing 'khor ba 'a dga' ba las rnam par bzlog pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos la dga' zhing sangs rgyas kyi chos la mos pa yongs su bskyod
pa'i phyir chos bastan to// des ro'i mchog don du gnyer zhing 'ongs pa rnams la ro'i mchog sna tshogs dngar ba dang/ skyur ba dang/ lan tshwa dang tshab dang/ kha bo rong/ bas ba rnam pa tha dad

0ni/ bas yongs su tshim par byas te/ de'i 'og tu skyes bu chen po'i mtshan ro bro ba'i mchog thob par bya ba'i phyi'i chos bstan to// de bzhon pa don du gnyer zhing phyogs kyi rgyud sna tshogs nas 'ongs pa
rnams la bzhon pa sna tshog sakyi sbyin pas yongs su bstud de/ de dag theg pa chen po la gnas par bya ba'i phyire chos bstan to// dus gos don du gnyer zhing phyogs sna tshogs nas 'ongs pa kun nas
'dus par shes nas yud tsam du bsams te nam mkha'i dbyings la bltas pa dang/ nam mkha'i dbyings las gos sna tshogs sngon po dang/ ser po dang dmar po dang/ dkar po dang/ le brgan dang/ shel
gyi 'dog tu 'dug pa kha dog sna tshogs bsha/ kha dog du mar rnam bar dga' thon cing lag pa'i mthil du 'ongs pas/ des de dag gse slongs mo pa de dag la yongasu bstud nas/ de bzhin gshegs
pa'i ngo ma shes pa dang/ khrel yod pa bla na med pa dang/ mdog gsar gyi kha dog lta bu thob par 'gyur ba rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir chos bstan to// de bzhin du yo byad sna tshogs thams cad kyis
ji ltar 'ongs pa'i slongs mo pa rnams la bstang pa byas nas ni rigs su chos bstan to// de ltar khyim bdag mkhas pas byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar ba bsam gyis mi khyab
pa'i yul bstan pa byas nas/ tshongs dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu kho bos ni yid kyi mdzod nas byung ba'i bsod nams kyi rnam par thar pa 'di shes par zang na/kho bos
byang chub sems dpa'i yo byad la dbang thob pa/ rin po che'i lag pa thob par gyur pa/ 'jig rten gyi khams ma lus pa thams cad lag pas yongs su khebs par byas
shing sangs rgyas kyi mchod pa snatshogs bsgrub pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du rin po che kha dog sna tshogs kyi sprin gyi char rab tu 'babs pa// de bzhin du

rgyan kha dog sna tshogs kyi sprin dang/ rtsod pan kha dog sna tshogs kyi sngon dang/ khang pa brtsa gas ba kha dogasna tshogs kyi sprin dang/ na bza' kha dog sna tshogs kyi sngon dang/ lha rdzas kyis rol mobardung

ba dang/ dkrol ba dang/ gla yid du 'ong ba'i dbyang sasnyan pa sna tshogs kyi sngon dang/ me tog kha dog sna tshogs kyi sprin dang/ spos kha dog sna tshogs kyi sprin dang/ bdugasngos dang/ 'phreng ba dang/
byug pa dang/ phyam dang/ chos gos dang/ gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan dang ba dan kha dog sna tshogs dang/ rnam pa thams cad du sangs rgyas thams cad la mchod pa'i sen gyi char dang//
bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang/ sems can thams cad kyi gnas su sangs rgyas thams cad mchod cing bsnyen bkur ba dang/ sems can thams cad yongs susmazhi
pa dang/ gdul bar bya ba'i phyir yo byad thams cad kyi sngon gyi char 'bebs pa de dag gi spyod pa shes pa 'am/ yon tan brjod pa 'am rnam par 'phrul pa bstan par nus re skan/ song rigs

mkhakyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid// grong khyer seng ge 'i gzugs shes bya ba yod de/ don chos kyi tshong dpon rin chen gtsugs sud ces bya ba 'dug gis/ de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems
pas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang/ ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bawangs dga' rangs te/ mgu zhing nyams bde la/
tshim zhing yid bde ba skyes nas/ khyim bdag mkhas pa la chos kyi rim gros slob ma'i tshulabastan te/ de'i byin gyi rlabs kyis sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad thob par 'gyur bar yongs su lta zhing/
thams cad mkhyen panyid kyang de la rag lug pa 'balta ba dang dge ba'i bshes gnyen dpes par soms rgyun mi'achad par bstan pa dang/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi bka' shin tu nyan pa'i sems/
dang ldan par bstan pa dang/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi dbang du 'gyur ba'i rjesasu 'brang bar bya ba dang/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag dang tshig mnyan par bya ba dang/ dge ba'i bshes
gnyen las byung ba'i dad pa'i dbang po la bsam pa byed cing/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi btams te btang bas dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsnyen cing bkur ba dang/ rjesasu 'brang bar bya ba'i sems kyis
khyim bdag mkhas pa'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ khyim bdag mkhas pa la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas yang dang yang bltas te/ khyim bdog mkhas
pa'i drung nasasong ngo/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bkras bsod nams kyi bo da lan yid ches par sems/ bsod nams kyi zhing de la na yang dag bar lta//
bsod nams kyi 'i lo de ni yongs su sbyong bsod nams kyi mu stegs de la ni yang dag par 'dzeg/ bsod nams kyimadzod de'i rnam par 'byed/ bsod nams kyi gtam de la ni shin tu lta/ bsod nam
kyi dkyil 'khor de ni yongs su sbyong/ bsod naMms kyi phung po des yang dag par len/ bsod nams kyi stobs dag yongs su skyod/ bsod nams kyi shugs de na rnam par 'phel bar byed cing/ mthar gyis

zhi grong khyer song che'i gzugs gang na ba der phyin te/ chos kyi tshor dpon risha chen gtsug phud yongs su tshol tshol ba las/ tshong dus kyi srang zhig zhu 'dug pa mthong nas/ sa de'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag

'tshalato/ g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas mdun du 'dug ste/ thal mo sbyaranas 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogasapa'i byang chub tu sems bskyedan/ ji ltar

byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang/ ji ltar shar tun dubagyi bam 'tshalan/ 'phags pa lam gang gis bdag thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur bde lta bu'i
byar bsams dpa'i lamagyi man ngag legs par mi stsal tam// de nas chos kyi tshong dpon 'azhe chen gtsug phud kyis/ tshong dpon gyi bu zher bzas gyi lag nas bzung ste/ rang gi
gyi sa gang na ba der khrid de/ khyim de bstan nas 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu kho bo'i khyim la ltos shig ces nas/ de bltasan khyim de dag cing 'od gsal la/ 'dzam bu chu klung gi gsar

las byas ba ste/ yangs shing matho la dngul gyi ra bas bskor ba/ shel gyi rtsig pas shin tu legs par brtsigs te mdzes par byas pa// ba cha ma'i phung po brgya phrag stong gis rtag tu brgyan pa// chu sa

ragal ba'i ka ba bkye ba/ mu tig dmar po las byas pa'i seng ge 'i khrishin tubashams pa/ nor bu rin po che rang bzhin sbyang ba'i seng ge 'i rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba/ nor bu rin po che rnam par snang ba'i
zla re bres pa/ gser gyi dra ba yid bzhi'i gyi nor bus brgyan pas kun nas yog pa/ nor bu rin po che sna tshogs grangs med pas rab tu brgyan pa// as+yAgar ba las brtsigs pa'i rdzing bu chu bsil bas
gang ba dang ldan pa/ rin po che thams cad kyi shing gis bskor ba/ rgya che zhing yangs pa/ rim pa bcur brtse gas pa// shin tu mtho ba/ sgo brgyad dang ldan par 'dug pa mthong nas/ nges

khyim re'i nang du phyin te/ kun tu bltasam rim khang tha ma'i nang na bza' ba dang btung ba'i rnam pa yongs su gtong ba mthong ngo// dam khang gnyis pa'i nang na gos kyi rnam pa thams cad yongs su gtong ba

mthong ngo// rim khang gsum pa'i zhing na rin po che thams cad kyi rgyun dang lhab lhub yongasu gtor ba mthong ngo// rim khang bzhi ba'i nang na btsun mo'i 'khor dga' ba'i yo byad du bya ba bud med rin po che sa
ma @#// chen po'i steng na bzangadu bya ba yongs su gtong ba mthong ngo// rim khang lnga pa'i nang nas lnga pa la gnas pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i chos yang dag par bzo ba'i dga' ba la mos ba/

[& ]/'jig rten la phan pa dang bde ba'i sems kyi spyod pa dang ldan pa/ gtsug lag thams cad mngon par sgrub pa// gzungs kyi tshul dang/ ting nge 'dzin gyi phyag rgya dang/ ting nge 'dzin las rnam par ldang ba dang/

teng nge 'dzin la rnam par sbyad pa dang/ ye shes kyi snang ba mngon par sgrub pa 'dus shing ba bod par mthong ngo// ma khang drug pa'i nang na byang chub sems dpa' shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la rnam par
'tshe da ba rab tu thob pa/ shes rab shin tu zab pa/ rab tu zhi ba'i chos thams cad mngon par shes pa// ting nge 'dzin dang/ gzungs kyi sgo dang/ snying po mang pos sgo kun nas 'gyur ba/ bslebs pa

med ba'i spyod yul ca de mi gnyis pa la yang dag par spyod pa/ chos yang dag par bgrob la rnam par 'phrul ba/ shes rab kyi ba rol tu phyin ba'i rgyud kyi rjes su 'brang zhing rnam par dbye ba dang bab tu gsal/

za bar byed pa// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo mang po yang dag par bgro ba byed pa rnams kun nas 'dus shing 'khod pa mthong ste/ 'di ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo zhi ba'i snying po zhes bya ba dang/

shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo 'gro ba thams cad du ye shes rnam par phye ba zhes bya ba dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo mi g.yo ba'i gling zhes bya ba dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo

'ab rdul dang bral ba'i bod ces bya ba dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo thub par dka' ba zhes bya ba dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo 'gro ba thams cad mos par byed chung rjes su 'brang

ba'i dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo phye bzhin 'brang ba'i tshul gyi dkyil 'khor zhes bya ba dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo rgya mtsho'i snying po zhes bya ba dang/

shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo kun tu lta ba'i btang snyoms thob pa zhes bya ba dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo mi zad pa'i mdzod dang ldan pa zhes bya ba dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin

pa'i sgo chos thams cad kyi tshul rgya mtsho zhes bya ba dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo 'gro ba rgya mtsho'i rjes su song ba zhes bya ba dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo thogs pa med pa'i spobs
ba zhes bya ba dang/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo chos kyi sprin la dmigs pas rim pas mdamigs pa'i gnas zhes bya ba dang/ de ltar shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo de dag la sogs pa/

shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa grangasamed pa brgya stong phrag bcu tshang bar yang dag par bgro ba byed rung/ rgyan brjod du med pa shin tu rnam par phye ba'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor na 'khod pa mthong bar gyur to//
rim khang bdun pa'i nang na byang chub sems dpa' sku brnyan lta bu'i bzod pa rab tu thob pa// thabs dang ye shes rnam par gdon mi za ba la shin tu byung ba/ de bzhin gshegs po thams cad kyi chos kyi
smin yang dag par 'dzin pa sha stag 'dus shing 'khod par mthong ngo// rim khang brgyad pa'i nang na byang chub sems dpa' mnyams par 'gro ba'i mngon par shes pa rab tu thob pa
'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du rnam par rgyu ba/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du gzugs brnyan rab tu 'byung ba/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad du lus shin tu rnam par phye ba/ de bzhin gshegrwa
pa thams cad kyi zhabs kyi drung nas gud du mi'aphags pa'i yul dang ldan pa// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku la yang dag par gzhol ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor
du sngon du brjod pa'i gtam gyi skyes bur gyur pa sha stag kun nas 'dus shing 'khod pa mthong ngo// rim khang dgu pa'i nang na byang chub sems dpa' tsho gcig gis thogs pa sha stag 'dus shing 'khod
( tsa mthong ngo// rim khang bcupa'i nang na de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad theg ma byang chub tu thugs bskyed pa dang/ spyod pa dang/ 'byung ba dang/ smon lam rgya mtsho dang/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam
par 'phrul pa'i yul ra/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing dang/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad dang bcas pa dang/ chos kyi 'khor lor bo tu sgog pa dang bcas pa dang/ sems can 'dul ba mdzad
ba'i byin gyi rlabs dang bcas par mthong ngo// mthong nasakyang chos kyi tshong dpon bde chen gtsug phud la 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa khyod la 'di lta bu'i phun sum tshogs
'bazhib mang ba na/ phun sum tshogs pa'i rnam ba de ji lta bu zhig tu sbyang ba mdzad mdzad/ dge ba'i rtsa ba ni su zhig la yongs su bskrun bskrun/ sa sbas pa/ rigs kyi bu kho bos dran te 'dus ba'i
dus kyi bskal pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdulashAn tu phra tha snyad 'as pa'i yang pha rol gcig na// 'jig rten gyi khams 'khor lo sna tshogs shes bya bar/ de bzhin gshegs pa chos kyi dbyis 'od
zer mtha' yas pas yongs su brgyan ba'i chos kyi rgyal po zhes bya ba mkhyen pa dang zhabs su ldan pa// bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ bla na med pa// skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo
sgyur ba/ lha dang mi rnams kyi ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'jig rten du byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa de ye shes rnam par snang ba la sogs pa nyan thos bye ba phrag brgya dang/ ye shes

nyima'i gzi brjid la sogs pa byang chub sems dpa' bye ba brgya phrag stong dang thabs phyog tu rgyal po chos kyi dbang phyug rgyal pos spyan drangs nas/ bza' shing gi rab chen po rin chen rgyal mtshan rgyun
gyis mdzes pa zhes bya bar gshegs to/ de bzhin gshegs ba de grong khyer du gshegs nas/ tshong dus kyi srang nas bzhud pa'i tsha/ kho bos de bzhin gshegs pa de dang/ byang chub sems
dpa' dang/ nyan thos kyidage 'dun dang bcas pa la mchod pa bya ba'i phyi'i/ sil snyan dang rol mo'i sgra zhig kyang byung/ sbos kyi ra lu gcig cig kyang bsralags te/ bdug spos kyis
bsangasaso// sposakyi nga lu gcig pu de de ltar bsregs pas/ zhag bdun du 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad kyang spos kyi na bun gyi spu kha dog spu tshogs dang ldan po// sems can thams/
cad kyi lus dang 'dra bas yongs su khengs par gyur to// spos kyi na bun gyi sprin de dag las kyang sgra 'di skad brjod de/ de bzhin gshegs pa ni bsam gyis mi khyab ste/ dus gsum du dri ma med pa'i
ye shes kyi phung po dang ldan pa'o// thams cad mkhyen pa ste/ sgrib pa thams cad mi mnga' ba'o// nyon mongs pa'i bag chags thams cad yongs su byang ba ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa la yon phul ba

tshe/ thams cad kyang/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ba chen po tshad med pa bsgrub par 'gyur ro// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yang dag par gzhol bar 'gyur ro zhes de skad du kho bos dge ba'i rtsa ba yongs su smiM
par bya ba dang/ sems can thams cad ge ba'i rtsa ba la shugs yang dag par bskyed pa'i phyir/ sngos kyi na bun gyi spreg de las sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs kyis sgra'i rnam pa de lta bu byung ngo//
rigs kyi bu de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis bstan pa'i cho 'phrul gyi jog ba'i rtsa ba de'ang/ kho bos gnas gsum du yos su bsngos te/ gsum pa dang zhe na/ 'di ltar 'phongs
rdzu ba thams cad shin tu rgyun gcod pa dang/ dam pa'i chos mnyan pa dang mi 'bral ba dang/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dang 'a thams cad mthong ba yongs su rdzogs par
na/ 'gyur bar bya ba'i phyir yongs su bsngosaso// rigs kyi bu kho bos ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa smon lam gyi dkyil 'khor thogs pa mang pa'i rgyan ces bya ba 'direshes par zad na/
kho bos byang chub sems dpa' yon tan rige bo chatshad med pa'i 'byung gnas su gyur pa// sangs rgyas kyi sku rgya mtsho dang thami da pa la zhugs pa// thami dad pa'i chos kyi sprin gyi cha
yang dag par 'dzin pa// tha mi dad pa'i yon tan rgya mtsho la zhugs M ba/ kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa'i dra ba rnam par rgyas par gyur pa/ ting nge 'dzin thami dad pa'i yul la zhugs pa/ byang chub
sems dpa' thams cad tha mi dad pas dge ba'i rtsa ba'i rgyun gcig tu gyur pa// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang tha mi dad cing rnam par mi rtog par sbyod pa/ dus gsum tha mi dad pas mnyam
pa nyid la zhugs pa// bskal ba thams cad tha mi dad par yongasasu gnas pasam skyo ba/ kun tu lta ba tha mi da pa' yul gyis la gnas pa de dag gi spyod pa shes pa bam/ yon tan brjod pa

nus re skan/ song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyidan yul lnga'i rtsa ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de'i grong khyer kun nas sgo zhes bya ba na/ tshong dpon sngos batshong kun tu lta ba zhes bya ba 'dug gis
de'i gan du song la ji lta byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod ba la bslab par bya ba dang/ ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bum bzangs kyis
kya@#// chos kyi tshong dpon ban+de chen gtsug phud kyi nang pags la spyi bos phyag 'tshal// chos kyi tshong dpon zhe chen gtsug phud la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba
byas nas yang dang yang bltas te/ chos kyi tshong dngos zin chen gtsug dud kyi drung nas song ngo// dbam po dgu bcu lnga pa////de nas tshong dpon gyi
bu nor bzangasasangs rgyas mtha' yas pa mthong ba la zhugs pa/ byang chub sems dba' mtha' yas pa dang 'grogs pa rab tu thob pa// byang chub sems dpa'i lam mtha' yas pa'i
tshul gyis snang bar gyur pa/ chos kyi tshul mtha' yas pas mngon par brnan pas shin tu rtogs pa'i sems dang ldan pa// byang chub sems dpa' mos pa mthab yas pa'i lam gyi
rnam par dag pa// byang chub sems dang ba dbang po mtha' yas pa'i snang ba rab tu thob pa// byang chub sems dpa'i bsam pa mtha' yas pa'i stobs la gnas pa// byang chub sems dpa'i
spyod pa mtha' yas pa'i rjes su song ba'i sems dang ldan pa// byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam mtha' yas pa'i stobs yongs su skyes pa/ byang chub sems pa'i gzhan gyis thub pa med pa
! mtha' yas pa'i rgyalamtshan can/ byang chub sems dpa' yongashes snang ba mtha' yas pa'i rgyud dang ldan pa// byang chub sems dpa'i chos mtha' yas pa'i snang ba rab tu thob pa de/ mtha'
sa[gyis yul lnga'i rtsa ba gang na ba der phyin nas/ grong khyer kun nas sgo yongasasu tshol zhing phyogs dang/ phyogs mtshams dang/ yul phyogs nyen kor kun dang/ sgang dang/ gshod dang/
mnyam pa dang mi mnyam pa thams cad du yongs su skyo bsad pa'i bsam pa dang/ 'jigs pa med pa'i sems dang/ ldog pa med pa'i brtson 'grus dang/ thub pa med pa'i sems
kyis dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdam ngag ma brjod pa dang/ rtag tu dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi spyod pa ma nor ngasasems rab tu bsgos pa dang/ sgo kun nas rnam par dmigs pa'i dbang po
dang ldan pa/ bag med pa thams cad rkur bral ba dang/ mig dang rna ba g.yeng ba med par tshol tshol nas/ yul sa'i rtsa ba'i dbus shig na/ grong khyer kun nas sgo tshong dus kyi rdal stong phrag/
bcu'i gnas su gyur pa de shin tu bzang por grub pa// rab brtan pas bskor ba shin tu mtho ba/ bzhi mdo brgyad kyis brgyan pa 'dug par mthong sta/ de'i nang na sbos 'tshong kun tu lta ba'ang
pos 'tshong gi khyamasashig na 'dug pa mthong nas/ sos 'tshong kun tu lta ba gang na ba der phyin te/ sbos 'tshong kun tu lta ba'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ mdun du 'dug ste thal
mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa spyod pa/
ba ku@#// la bslab par bgyi ba dang/ ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal to// smas pa// rigs kyi bu de ltar khyod kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzo gas pa'i
byang chub tu sems bskyed pa legs so legs so// rigs kyi bu kho bosan samasacan thams cad kyi nad shes te rlung las gyur pa dang/ mkhris pa las gyur pa dang/ bad kan las gyur ba/
nga chamanyam bar 'khrugs pa dang/ gzhan gyis gnon par byas pa dang/ mi ma yin pa las gyur pa dang/ dug 'thungs pa dang/ sngags dang/ mtshon dang/ colangs pa'i sbyor ba
sna tshogs dang/ ma las gyur pa dang/ chusabaskyod pa las gyur pa dang/ sngangs pa dang/ 'jigs pa sna tshogs las gyur pa thams cad kyang shes so// nad de dag thams cad zhi bar bya/
ba'ang shes te/ 'di ltar snum par bya ba'ang rab tu shes so// skyug par bya ba dang/ bkru ba dang/ borta ba dang/ gtar ba dang/ sna'i cho ga dang/ nyan dang/ dugs dang/ lums
dang byag pa dang/ dug gso ba dang/ 'byung po'i gdon med pa bya ba dang/ bcud dang/ khrus dang/ gzhag pa dang/ bskyed pa dang/ kha dog sbyang ba dang/ nyam bstod pa'i ng rab

tushes te/ rigs kyi bu phyogs bsunas samasaM can gang ji snyid kho bo'i drung du 'ong ba de dag smras+sad kyi da thosmra cad kyang 'ab tu zhi bar byed de/ nad sos nas kyang legs par bkru ba dang/ lus la byag pas
ba byug pa byas nas ci tshul gyi rgyan gyis yin 'dug shin tu brgyan te/ ci rigs pa'i gos lus la bskon nas/ kha zas bro ba'i mchog dang ldan pa sna tshogs kyis yongs su tshim par
bya ste/ nor dpag tu med pas kyang phun sum par byed do// de'i 'og tu'ang de dag la mi gtsang babastan cing 'dod chags spangaba'i phyir chos ston to// byams pa chen po yongs su bsngags

shing zhe sdang spang ba'i phyir chos ston to// chos rnam par dbye ba'i bye brag bstan cir gti mug spang pa'i phyi'i chos ston to// khyad par khong du chud pa'i tshul gyi sgo yang dag par bstan cing chamanyam

pa'i spyod pa dang nyon mongs pa spang ba'i phyir chos ston to// sangs rgyas kyi yon tan gyi chos dang ldan pa'i gtam thams cad yongs su brjod cing byang chub kyi sems 'byung ba'i rgyu yongs su ston to//
'khor ba'i sdug bsngal tshad gzung du med pa yongs su bstan cing snying rje chen po 'byung ba'i rgyu yongs su ston to// bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs rgya chen po bsags pa yang dag par bsngags
shing yon tan tshad med pa 'thob pa dang/ 'byung ba'i rgyu yongasasuston to// sems can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang gdul bar bya ba yongs su bstan cing/ theg pa chen po'i
smon lam 'byung ba'i rgyu yongs su ston to// sas rgyas kyi zhing thams cad dang bskal pa thams cad du gnas par bya ba'i spyod pa'i dra ba shin tu rgyas par bshad cing/ byang chub sems dar kha kun tu
sa ga/ bzang po'i spyod pa ba thob pa dang/ 'byung ba'i rgyu yongs su ston to// sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs subasngags shing mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos brgyan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi
sku 'thob pa dang/ 'byung ba'i rgyu yosu ston to// tshul khrims kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su brjod rung/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yongs su dag pa thams cad du 'gro ba 'thob pa dang/ 'byung ba'i
rgyu yongs su ston to/ bzod pa'i pha rol tu phyin ba yongs su brjod cing/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku gzugs dang sku mdog rnam par dag pa bsam gyis ma khyab pa'i rgyu yongs su ston to// brtson 'grus
kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yos su brjod cing/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku thub par dkab pa yongs su stor to// bsam gtan gyi pha lob tu phyin pa yongs su brjod cing/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku sgril
gyis mtshon la/ bal gyis gzhon pa rnam par dag pa yongs su ston to// shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su brjod cing/ chos kyi sku yongs su dag pa yongs su ston to// thabs mkhas/
pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su brjod cing/ 'gro ba thams cad la mngon du gyur ba'i sku gtsang zhing rnam par dag pa yongs su ston to// smon lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su brjod cing/ bskal
zla ba thams cad kyi dus su 'gro ba thams cad kyi sams dang 'grogs pa'i sku rnam par dag pa yongs su ston to/ stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su brjod cing/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams du mngon
par 'byung ba'i sku rnam par dag pa yongs su ston to// ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su brjod cing/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi bsam pa ji lta bu bzhin du tshim par mdzad pa'i sku rnam par dag pa
yongs su ston to// mdage ba'i chos thams cad las rnam bar ldog ba yongs su brjod cing/ bltan phul du bzang ba'i sku rnam par dag pa yongs su ston to// de ltar de dag chos kyi sbyin pas yongs su
bsdus te//nor dang rin po che mtha' yas pa'i tshogs kyis nye bar brtan po byas shing so sor 'gyed do// yang rigs kyi bu lo bo ni stos dang/ bdug spos dang/ bsgo ba dang/ bsku ba sbyor shes te/ 'di

ltar spos kyi rgyal po gzhal du med pa la sogs pa dang/ spos kyi rgyal po sin dub ba la sogs pa dang/ sngos kyi rgyal po ma'apham pa la sogs ba dang/ sbosakyi rgyal bo rnam par gsal byed la sogs ba dang/

spos kyi rgyal po nyi ma yod pa la sogs pa dang/ sbosakyi rgyal bo dus dang 'thun pa sogs pa dang/ spos kyi rgyal po sbrul gyi snying po'i tsan dan la sogs pa dang/ sbos kyi rgyal po sprin gyi a ka ru la sogs

pa dang/ spos kyi rgyal po dbang po mi 'khrugs pa la sogs pa sbosany+tsal ba thams cad kyang rab tu shes so// yang rigs kyi bu kho bos ni sems can thamasacad yongs su tshim par byed ba dang/ sgo thams
cad sasangs rgyas blta zhing mchod pa dang/ bsnyen bkur pa'i spos kyi gzugs shes te/ rigs kyi busems can thams cad yongs su tshim par byed pa dang/ sgothams cad nas sangs rgyas blta zhing mchod
tha @#/ ba dang/ bsazhabakur ba'i spos kyi gzugs 'dis kho bo'i bsam pa thams cad kyang yongs su rdzogs par 'gyur te/ de'i mthus kho bo sems can thams cad yongs su skyob pa'i rgyan gyi/

sprin byin gyis rlob pa byed de/ 'di ltar smos kyi khang pa brtsegs ba'i sprin gyi rgyunanas/ rnam pa thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa mchod cing rim gror bya ba'i rgyun gyi sprin gyi bar du byin gyis rlob pa byed do//

rigs kyi bu kho bo ni de bzhin gshegs ba la mchod par bya bar 'dod par gyur ba de'i tshe/ kho bo sems can thams cad yongs su tshimabar byed pa dang/ sgo thams cad nas sangs rgyas blta zhing mchod pa dang/

bsnyen bkur ba'i spos kyi mdzod kyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i sprin tshod gzung dumod pa bton cing/ phyogs bcu'i chos kyi dbyings thams cad na bzhugs pa'i debakazhe gshegs pa'i chos kyi dkyil 'khor gyi chos

kyi dbyings thams cad du sbos thams cad kyi mdzod kyi khang pa brtse gas ba'i sprin gyi rgyun byin gyis slob pa byed do// chos kyi dbyings thams cad du/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'i sprin gyi rgyan

dang sros kyi khang pa'i sngon gyi rgyan dang/ spos kyi ra ba'i sprin gyi rgyan dang/ spos kyi ba gam phyi sngon gyi rgyan dang/ sbos kyi rta babs kyi sprin gyi rgyan dang/ spos kyi skar khung gi sprin gyi rgyan dang/ sngos kyi

bu shu'i sprin gyi rgyan dang/ sngos kyi zla gam gyi sngon gyi rgyan dang/ sbos kyi gdugs kyi sngon gyi rgyan dang/ sngos kyi rgyal mtshan bsgreng ba'i sprin gyi rgyan dang/ sbos kyi lha'i ba dan gyi sprin gyi rgyan dang/ spos kyi

ba bu re'i sbren gyi rgyan dang/ sngos kyi gzugs kyi dra ba'i sprin gyi rgyan dang/ sngos kyi 'od kyi sprin gyi rgyan dang/ spos kyi snang ba dri ma med pa'i sprin gyi rgyan dang/ sbos thams cad kyi sgrib gyi mnar
'bab pa'i rgyan byin gyis rlob ste/ rigs kyi bu kho bosan sems can thams cad yongs su tshim par byed pa dang/ sgo thams cad zhes sangs rgyas blta zhing mchod pa dang/ bsnyen bkur pa'i sbos kyi/
gzugs kyi chos kyi sgo 'di shes par zar na/ kho bos byang chub sems dpa' sman gyi rgyal po lta bur gyur ba/ bstan don yod pa// 'grogs na don yod pa// rjes su dran na don yod ba/
brtul zhugs rjes su byas na don yod pa/ mang thos na don yod pa/ mthong ba tsam gyis soms can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa zhi bar 'gyur ba/ mthong ba tsam gyis sems can rnams ngan song
gi rgyud las ldog par 'gyur ba/ mthong ba tsam gyis sems can thams cad sangs rgyas kyi chos la skabs phye ba thob par 'gyur ba/ mthong ba tsam gyis sems can rnams kyi sdug bsngal gyi phung bo
thams cad zhi bar 'gyur ba/ mthong ba tsam gyis sems can rnams 'jigs ba dang/ 'khor ba'i lam gyi rgyud thams cud kyi 'jigs pa dang bral bar 'gyur ba/ mthong ba tsam gyisasems
can rnams thams cad mkhyen pa'i phyogs la rten bar 'agyur ba'i phyi'i mi 'jigs pa thob par 'gyur ba/ mthong ba tsam gyis sems can rnams rgashi'i grog po dang g.yang sar mi ltung ba/ mthong b
tsam gyis sems can rnams chos kyi dbyings mnyam pa nyid la gnas pas mya ngan las 'das pa'i bde ba 'thob bar 'gyur ba de dag gi sbyod pa shes ba bam/ yon tan brjod pa zhus re

skan song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid// grong khyer ta la'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba yod de/ de na rgyal po ma zhes bya ba 'dug gis/ de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub
sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang/ ji ltazhan tan du bya ba drisashig/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs/ tshong dpon sngos 'tshod kun tu lta ba'i rkang ba gnyis la sbyibs phyag
'tshal te/ tshong dpon pos 'tshong kun tu lta ba la lan brgya stong dumar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas yang dang yang bltas te// tshong dpon pos 'tshong kun tu lta ba'i drung nas song ngo/
de nas tshong dpon gyi bunor bzangs dge ba'i bshes gnyen gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa de dag rjes su dran par byed cing/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag gi sgo de dag rjes su dran par bya ba dang
bdagan dgaba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su bzung ngo zhes rang gi sems yongs su tshim par bya ba dang/ bdag ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su bsrungs pas dabla na med pa yang dag par
tshardzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir ldog par yang mi 'gyur ro snyam du rnam par sems shing sems dga' ba rab tu thob sems dang ba dang/ soms rab tu dga' ba dang/ sems drangs pa dang 3
ba sams mgu ba dang/ soms mos pa dang/ soms kyi shugs dang/ sems rnam par zhi ba dang/ sams rgya chen bo dang/ sems rgyan dang/ sems la thogs pa med pa dang/ soms ]
la sgrib pa med pa dang/ sems rnam par phye ba dang/ sams yang dag par gzhol ba dang/ soms kyi dbang dang/ soms dbang sgyur ba dang/ sems kyi chos khong du chud pa dang/ sems kyis
zhing rgyas par dgang ba dang/ sems sangs rgyas mthong bas brgyan pa dang/ sams stobs bcu'i yid labyab dang mi 'bralababang thobanas de mthal gyis ljongs nas ljongs dang/ grong nas grong dang/
yul nas yul du tshol zhing grong khyer ta la'i rgyal mtshan gang na ba der phyin te/ rgyal po ma gang na bzhugs shes drisan/ de la 'gro ba gzhan dag gis 'di skad du bstan te/ rigs kyi bu 'di re//

rgyalapo me ni rgyal po'i don bsgrub pa'i phyir seng ge 'i gdan la bzhugs shing rgyal po'i 'phrishe 'asa mdzad do// khams rab tu skyong ngo// chad pas gcad par 'os pa ni chad pas gcod do// bya dgas bsdu
bar 'os pa'i bya dgas sdud do// g.yon yod pa'i rnams lan gyod rmad do// rtsod pa rnams kyi zhalache ni yongs su gcod do// dma' ba rnams dbugs 'byin to// dregs pa rnams 'dul ba
mdzad ro// srog gcod po lasan rnam par zlogago/ ma byin par len pa dang ni rnam par 'byed pa mdzad do// gzhan gyis yongs su bzung ba la mngon bar zhen pa'i rnam par zhi bar mdzad do/
brdzun du smra ba las ni phyi'i zlog pa mdzad do// phrama'i tshig dang ni rnam par dbral bar na/dzadodo//zhe gcod pa'i ngag ni rgyan gcod pa mdzad de// tshig bkyal pa lasan yongs su rlon
no chags sems dang nimi 'dra bar mdzad do// gnod sems dang ni rgyang bsring ngo// log par lta ba dang na 'drab med par mdzad do// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs/

ts+tsa rgyal po mo gang na ba der phyin na des mthong ba/ rgyal po me de rin po che'i seng ge 'i khri chen po rdo rje mthu bo che'i nor bu sna tshogs kyis spras pa// zhi po che 'od gsal ba rnam pa sna tshogs grangs med pa
las byas pa'i rkang pa bkye ba/ zhe po che gcig ma yin pas legs par spras shing brgyan pas yid du 'ong ba'i sman dang ldan pa/ gser gyi lcag pod kyi dra bas legs par byas shing chub par btags

ba nor bu rin po che du ma'i sgron mas shin tu snang bar byas pa/ nor bu rin po che dbang gi rgyal po las byas pa'i paro'i snying po can/ lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i stan rim pa du mar gting ba/ gam yo/

nas lha rdzas kyi spos sna tshog sakyi bdug spos kyis shin tu bdugs pa/ rin po che'i rgyalamtshan bsgrung ba brgya phrag stong gis mdzes par byas pa/ rin po che'i ba dan brgya phrag stong rnam par bres pas

brgyan pa/ rin po che'i me tog gi chun po sna tshogs kyi lnga lde zab tubakye bas shin tu mdzes par byas pa/ stong nas lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i bla re sna tshogs bres pa zhig la 'dug rung/ de ni gzhon zhing dar la
bab pa/ gzugs mdzes shing blta na yid du 'ong ba/ skra mthon mthing g.yas phyogs su 'khyil ba dang ldan nga/ mgo gdugs ltar 'dug pa// gtsug tor gyi spyi bo can/ dpral ba yangs pa/

mig dkar nag 'byesashing range la/ rdzi ma ba'i rje'i ma ltar 'dug nga/ sna'i dbyibs legs shing bzang la phan par mdzes ba dang ldan pa/ mnumatshal ltar mdog bzang zhing shin tu legs pa dang ldan pa//
somanyam zhing thags bzang shin tu dkar ba bzhi bcu tshang bdang ldan pa// 'gram pa'i lha nga se nga ge'i 'gram pa ltar 'dug pa// mkhur bshas rgyas pa smin tshugs gzhu ltar 'du cing ring la/

tu mdzes pa/ mdzod zla ba'i kha dog ltar 'dug pa'i thege le can/ rna shal ring zhing lhod par 'phyang ba/ zla ba nya ba ltar bzhin mdangs dang ldan zhing bzang ba/ mgul zlum zhing dung ltar mdzes pa//
snying kha dpal gyi be'usabargyan pa/ ro stod seng ga'i ri stod ltar 'dug pa/ thal go shin tu rgyas pa// dpung mgo'i lcan legasashing zlum pa/ lag pa ring ba/ dra bar 'brel ba'i sor mo can/ rkang
lag 'khob les brgyan pa/ rkang lag 'jam zhing gzhon lashas rgyas pa/ bdun shin tu mtho ba/ sked pa rdo rje ltar 'dug pa// lus mi zhing drang ba/ bar zlum pa bo mtshon gsang ba'i sgrubs na
'dug pa/ byin pa ri dgas o rgya ya'i byin pa ltar 'dug pa/ sor mo ring ba/ rkang pa'i rtong pa yangs pa// 'od 'dom gang ba dang ldan pa// mdog gser gyi kha dog ltar 'dug pa// ba spu'i re nas g.yas
@#// phyogs su gyen du 'khyil ba/ shing n+ya gro da'i rgyal po ltar chu zheng gab pa// lus mchon dang dpe byad bzang pos shin tu brgyan pa// mgo lanor bu rin po che yid bzhin gyi cod pan

thogs pa// 'dzam bu chu klung gi gsar las byas pa'i dbral ba'i rgyun zla gam gyis mdzes par brgyan pa/ rna ba las zhi bo che in+d+ra nA la'i rna cha dris med pa 'phyang ba// nor bu rin po che rin thang med pa'i sa

mo de'i 'od kyisasnang bar byas pas dri ma med pa'i ro stod rgyas pa dang ldan pa// lha rdzas kyi nor bu dam pa'i dpung rgyan dang/ gdu bus lag pa mdzes par brgyan pa zhig ste/ zhe po che'i gdugs chen po

rin po che be cha dri ma med pa'i yu ba casha bzhi po che'i shar bu brgya phrag bcusa rnam par phye ba/ 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi bla gab can/ nor bu'i zhi po che sgra snang ba rnam par dag pa'i snying po can/ rin po che'i

dril gyi 'phrang ba las sgra snyan cing yid du 'ong ba 'byung ba/ nor bu rin po che'i bod phyogs kun tu 'phro ba can drung nas bzung zhing bsgrung ba/ rgyal po'i gzi dang dbang chen po la gnas pa/ srid la gzhan gyi 'kho

gyis gtse ba med ba/ dgra'i 'jigs pa dang bral ba'i dbang phyug dar ldag pa 'dug pa mthong ngo// de'i 'khor kun nas kyang blon po stong phrag bcu tshogs shing rgyal po'i dgos pa sgrub pa la brtson pa mthong
ngo [;]de'i mdun na chad pas gcod pa'i mi sems can dmyal ba'i srungasam lta bu/ gshi'i rje'i g.yog 'khor lta bu 'jigs 'jigs lta'i gos gyon pa/ gtumazhing mi bzed la 'jigs pa chen po
wa skyed pa// mig dmar ba/ so gtsags pa// gdong gi gnyer ma gsum khro gnyer du bsdus pa/ ral gri dang/ sta re dang/ lcagasakyi chamadung dang/ mda' dang/ ber gdang/ mdung la sogs pa'i
mtshon cha dang lag cha thogs pa// lus dngabazhin gyi byanges ma snagacare 'jigs su rung ba/ sprin nag poltar 'dug ba// masnyan cing brlung la sdadra pa'i sladrag po 'byin pa// gzi blta ba
dka' ba/ 'jigs pa chen po skyed// srog chags brgya phrag stong gi snying 'gas par byed pa de lta bu dgachad pas gcad nga la 'os pa'i sems can chad pas gcod pa la brtson pa mthong ngo//
don srog chags zhu bo/ gzhan gyi skor la 'phrog pa// sems can gyi longs spyod chud gson pa/ lam bsgrugs shing 'phrog pa// grong dang/ grong khyer dang/ grong rdal dang/ lhas la mas gtong
ba grong du chom po byed pa/ khyim phugs 'dabs pa/ sdeg sdig ltar byed pa// dug rdzud pa/ dkrugs ma byed pa// thong ma byed pa/ bya ba byed pa// log par zhugs pa// gnod

par sems pa/ 'dod chen che ba/ sdig pa sna tshogs kyi las mabazad pa byed pa brgya stong mang po bcingab dam po lngas bcingasashing/ rgyal po me'i drung du khrid pa dag kyang mthong ngo// de dag la'ang
rgyal bo mes ci rigs par chad pas gcad par gyur pa mthong ngo// des de na rgyal bo mes bsgo zhing la la ni rkang lag bcad/ la la'i rna ba ngang sna bcad/ la la mig phyung/ la la ni yan lag dang
nying lag dang mgo bcad/ la la ni lus thams cad mas btang/ la la ni ba tshwa'i chu khol mas lus la g.yo cing/ pags pa snyil ba la sogs pa de lta bu'i chad pa sna tshogs
dumami bzad pa// drag pa// bsrung ba/ yid du ma 'ong ba/ srog 'phrog pa dag kyang byed par mthong ngo// bsad pa'i sa de na'ang bsad pa'i rkang lag dang/ rna mgo dang/ sna dang/ mgo dang/

yan lag dang/ nying lag gi phung po ri tsam du spungs pa mthong ngo// khrug gimatshodang ga tshad gsum tsam du gzabs su zab la chu zheng du dpag tshod du ma yod pa'i ng mthong ngo// de na 'babi ker rus yin

lag dang/ nga lag dang/ mgo dang bral ba brgya stong du ma la/ spyang ki dang/ wa dang/ khyi dang/ bya rgod dang/ lnga dang/ bya ku la ra mang pos gang sde/ 'drad cing 'thog pa mthong ngo// de la yang la la ni
khadog gyur te sdog por gyur pa tsam/ la la'i rnags pa tsam/ la la'i bam pa tsam/ la la ni khabu zhugs pa tsam du gyur te/ shin tu skye g.ya' zhing 'jigs 'jigs ltar 'dug pa mthong ngo// bsadang

dedag gsod pa'i tsho/ mi sdug tshodagur byas pas na 'jigs 'jigs skud dang/ snying rje rje skud du sgra 'byin cing/ cho nges 'debs pa'i sgra chen po thosanas/ skyi g.ya' zhing mi dga' ba chen po skyang pa//
sems can dmyal ba chen po ris gzhom pa'i sgra lta bu 'ang thos so// des de ltar kha btags te btungs pa dang/ shin tu 'jigs pa'i drag shul mthong nas 'di snyam du gyur to/

saTha ba dga'i sems can thams cad la phan pa dang bde ba'i phyir/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon pa la zhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su tshol zhing 'bad de//
dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams la dge ba ni ci zhig bgyi mi dge ba ni gang zhig spang zhes 'dri 'drin/ rgyal bo me 'di lan dge ba'i chos kyang med de/ khan mtho ba chen po'i las la spyod pa//
yid kyi yongs su rtog pa shin tu gtum pa dang ldan pa// soms can pha rol gyi srog gcad pa la zhugs pa// soms can pha la shIn tu mnar ba la brtson pa// tshe phyi ma la lta ba med pa// ngan song gi
g.yangs sa'i gad kha na 'dug pa zhigan/ 'di las ci ga byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i ng thob pa 'gyur ram snyam ste/ re de ltar soms shing yid la byed de/ sems can thams cad yongs su

bskyab pa la mngon bar brtson pa/ snying rje rgya chen po skyes pa'i soms dang ldan pa de la/ stong gi nam mkha'i dbyes las lha mang pos bos pa// rigs kyi bu drang srong rgyal pa'i drod kyi skyemachod la dge
ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag tu bya ba mi dran nam/ des gyen du nam mkha'i dbyings la bltas nas dran no zhes brjod do// lha rnams kyis snas ngo// rigs kyi bu khyod dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyig ma/
ngag la de ltar the tsom ma skyed cig/ gas kyi bu dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams ni yang dag pa ma nor bar ston gyi/ log pa ma yi// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi thabs mkhas pas spyod pa'i
ye shes ni bsam gyisami khyab bo// sems can yongs su sdud pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sems can la phan 'dogs pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab bo//
sems can tshar gcod pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sems can gzengasabastod pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sems can yongs su sbyong ba yi shes bsam gyis mi khyab bo//
sems can yongasasuskyong ba'i yi shes bsam gyis mi thub bo// sems can badzud pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sems can yongs su smi'i par byed pa'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab bo// sems
ca'adul ba'i ye shes bsam gyis mi khyab bo// song rigs kyi bu de la byang chub sems dapa'i spyod pa shig ces nas/ tshong dpon gyi bunor bzangs kyis lha'i dag mnyan te/ rgyal po ma gang na bde

song ste phyogs/ rgyal po ma'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ rgyal po me la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ mdun du 'dug ste thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras
so 'phags ba bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzo gas pa'i byang chub sems bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang/ ji ltar gne
tan du bgyi bam 'tshal te/ 'phags pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang rjesasu bstan pa mdzad do zhes bdag gis thos na/ 'phags pa ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub
sams dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang/ ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba bdag la bka' stsal du gsol// de nas rgyal po mes rgyal po'i bya ba byas te/ seng ga'i khra las las nas

tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyi lag pa g.yas pa nas bzung ste/ rgyal po'i pho brang ta la'i rgyal mtshan du khrid do// de mthar gyis rang gi gnas su phyashe nas/ tshong dpon gyi bu zhes bzangs btsun mo'i 'khor
gyi nang du khrid de/ khri la bzhub das nas 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi buba'i khyim dang 'angs spyod la ltos shes nas/ des bltas na/ khyim de rgya che zhing yangs la rin po che bdun gyi ra bas

po/ngas su bskor ba/ ma bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi khang pas shin tu mdzes par byas nga/ rin po che'i khang pa brtsegs pa brgya stong du mas tshab tu brgyan pa// nor bu rin po che bsam gyis mi khyab

pa'i 'od pashin tu 'bar bas gzi brjid rab tu 'bar bar byas pa// nor bu ni po che sna tshogs kyis rnam pa tha dad pa'i rnam par phye zhing bres nga sa rnam par mdzes par byas pa/ mu tig dmar po'ika ba bkyi

ba nang du seng ge 'i khri mu sar gal ba las byas pa// rin po che brgya stong du mas rnam pa sna tshogs su brgyan pa zhig tu ngo shams pa/ nor bu'i zhi bo chesgra snang ba'i seng ge 'i rgyal mtshan shin tu

bsgrang ba/ stong nas nor bu rin po che rnam par snang ba'i bla re bres pa yid bzhin gyi nor bu rin po che sna tshogs kyi dra bas kun s yog nga// nor bu rin po ches tshogs grangs med pas log tu brgyan pa'i
bgam gyi rgyan dang ldan pa/ a gar ba las byas pa'i rdzing chungasal bas gang ba dang ldan pa// zhi bo che sna tshogs kyi shing gis bakhor bar 'jug par mthong ngo// de'i 'khon

gyi budamed bzang zhing mdzes la bstan sdug pa 'dog rgyas b/ bzang ba'i phul du bya ba dang ldan pa// sgyu rtswa la thams cad kyi tshul la mkhas pa// sngon du ldang ba/ phyi nas nyal/byams pa'i sems dang

ba ldan pa/ 8 rtsi bslob bzhin du byed cing ngag nyan pa bye ba phrag bcu'ang 'bod par mthong ngo// de nas rgyal po mas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu ji snyam du sems

maM ci ga sde 'og pa byed pa rnams la las kyi rnam pa smin pa mngon par grub pa 'di lta bu yod dam/ lus phun sum tshogs pa 'di lta bu yod dam/ 'khor phun sumatshogs pa 'di lta bu yod dam/ skyid pa chen
bophun sumatshogs pa 'di lta bu yod dum/ dbang phyug dang dbang chen po phun sum tshogs pa bad lta bu yod dam/ smras pa 'phagasapa de lta bu nA ma mchis so// des smas pa// rigs kyi bu ngan byang
chub somasadapa'o rnam par thar pa sgyu ma'i rnam pa thob pa ste/ rigs kyi bunga' yul na gnas pa'i ams can 'di dag kyang/ bal chab srag gcad par bya
zlabar g.yem pa/ brdzun du smra ba/ phram can/ tshig brlang po'i smra ba/ byung rgyal du brjod pa/ chags sems dang ldan pa/ gnod sems casha/ lag pas lta ba/ sdig pa'i las byed pa// khro

d+ha zhing gtum pa/ bab rgyal can mi dge ba'i las kyi bya ba sna tshogs dang ldan pa dag sta/ de dga'i rnam pa gzhan gyis sdig pa'i spyod pa las bzlog pa dang/ dgag ba drang/ bstan par mi nus te/ de ltar/
rigs kyi bu nga ni sems can 'di dag gdul ba dang/ yongs su smin par bya ba dang/ shin tu dul bar bya ba dang/ phan pa la dgod par bya ba'i phyir/ snying rje chen po mdun du byas te/ gsong
pa'i gshed ma sprul pa rnams bsad pa'i mir sbrul pa rnams la gsod du gzud pa dang/ chad pas gcod ba'i ma sprul pa rnams mi dge ba'i las kyi lam la spyod pa'i sprul pa'i mi rnams la chad pa sna tshogs
kyis gcod du gzud pa dang/ rkang lag dar/ sne dang/ rna ba dang/ yan lag dang/ nying lag dang/ mgobacad pa las byung ba'i sdug bsngal mi bzad pa nyams su tshor bar gyur pa lta bu dag kyang
yongs su ston par byed de/ d mthong nas nga'i khamasan gnas pa'i sems can de dag nyes pa gtong zhing skyo ba'i shugs thob par 'gyur ro// 'jigs pa skye zhing bag tsha ba skyo bar 'gyur ro// de ngago
sdig pa'i las byed pa rnams gtong zhinge bag byed par 'gyur ro/ rigs kyi bu de ltar nga ni sems can 'di dag thabs rjes nyes pa gtong lhang/ 'jigs pa'i sems dang ldan pa dang/ skyo ba'i yid dang
ldan par shes nas/ ma dag babcu'i las kyi lam las bzlog ste/ dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan par byas nas/ dga' shing bde ba'i mthar phyisha pa sdug bsngal thams cad rgyun chad pa'i thams
ba/ @#// cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi bde ba la dgod ba byed kyi/ rigs kyi bu ngani lus dang ngag gam/ yid kyis kyang sems can su la'ang co mi ba dri mtho ma ba tshol mo// rigs kyi bu nga' phyi ma'i
mtha'i mnar med pa'i sdug bsngal gyis bgrongs shesab ste/ byol song gi skye gnas blon bzhi khams su gtogs pa las kyang/ chungadun rtswa 'i rtse mos blta ba'i srog chags bra'u 'ga' la'ong//

sams bskyed pa gcig tsam du'ang sdugabasngalabar bya bar mi dga' na// zhing du gyur cing dge ba'i las kyi lam bskyed par nus pa'i mi lta zhig la rtsi smos/ rigs kyi bu nga ni rmi lam na'ang mi dge ba'i

tshe chos yongs su rgyu ba ma sbyang na/ ched du bsams te lta smosare skan/ rigs kyi bu de ltar ngas ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa sgyu ma'i rnam pa 'di shes par thadan/ ngas byang chub sems dpa'i

mi skyo ba'i chos kyi bzod pa thob pa/ srid pa dang lam gyi rgyud thams cad sgyu ma'i rnam par khong du chud pa// sprul ba lta bu'i byang chub sems dang 'i spyod pas byung ba'i gzugs brnyan lta bu'i 'jig rten

thams cad rnam par rig pa/ rmi lam lta bu'i chos nyid khong du chud pa// thogs pa med pa'i sgo'i chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul la rjes su zhugs pa/ mag 'phrul lta bu'i spyod nga 'dra ba rtogs par gyur pa/

N+NaM ye shes bsgribs pa med pa'i spyod yul gyi yul dang ldan pa/ kun tu yang dag par gzhol ba'i ting nge 'dzin gyi lam gyi byung ba/ gling kun tu 'khyol ba'i rgyud kyi gzungs la dbang sgyur pa// sas rgyas kyi spyod yul

rna gyi yul khong du chud pa rnams kyi spyod yulashes pa 'am/ yon tan brjod par nus re skan/ song rigs kyi bu lce phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na/grong khyer 'od bazang po zhes bya ba yod de/den rgyal po 'od chen po zhes bya ba
'dug gis/ de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang/ ji ltar tshan tan du bya ba dris shig/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bunor
bzangs kyis/ rgyal po me'arkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ rgyal po mel lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas te/ yang dang yang bltas nas/ rgyal po me'i drung nas song
de nas tshong dpon gyi bunor babrangs ye shes skyam de rjes su dran par byed cing/ byang chub sems dang khi rnam par thar ba sgyu ma'i rnam pa de la bsam pa dang/ chos nyid sgyu ma'i rnam

pa de la rab tu brtag pa dang/ las kyi sgyu mamanyam pa de khong du chud par bya ba dang/ chos kyi sgyu ma mnyam pa de la rjes su bsam pa dang// chos kyis yongs su smin par bya ba'i sprul pa mnyam ro de 'od du

chud par bya ba dang/ ye shes las byung ba'i snang ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa de'i rjes su 'brang ba'i bya ba dang/ smon lam gyi sgyu ma'i rnam pa mtha' yas pa mngon par bsgrub ra de mngon par bsgrub pa la bya ba dang/

spyod ba sprul pa'i chos nyid chags pa med ba de rnam par sbyang bar bya ba dang/ dus gsum sgyu ma'i rnam pa'i mtshan nyid de'ang rnam da ra bye ba byed cing/ mthar gyis yul nas yu la du rngub dang 1 kun tu batsal
ba dang/ rjes su rnam par lta ba byed cing/ phyogs dang phyogs mtshams dang/ lam dang/ sman ljongs dang/ thang dung/ thag thug dang/ kha' gol dang/ ra dang/ za sul dang/ grong dang//

grong khyer dang/ grong rdal dang/ ljongs dang/ khoms dang/ rgyal po'i gnas thams cad du yongs su skyo ba med pa'i las dang/ lus la dub pa med par mol tshol te/ grong khyer chen po 'od ng zang po'i nyin kon

du phyin nas/ rgyal po 'od chen po gang na bzhugs shes dris na/ del 'gro ba mang pos bstan pa/ rigs kyi bu 'di'i 'di na grong khyer 'od bzang po zhes bya ba yin te/'di na rgyal po 'od chen po bzhugs so zhes
de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs grong khyer chen po 'od bzang po gang na bder phyin nas/ grong khyer chen po 'od bzang po mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang dga' bas te/mgu zhing nyams bde
la tshim zhing yid bde ba skyes nas/ 'di snyam du bsams so// 'di na bdag gis dge ba'i bshes gnyen bzhugs pa lta ste/ de ring na dge ba'i bshes gnyen de 'ang mthong bar 'gyur// de las byang chubu
sams dpa'i spyod pa'i ng thos par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i 'byung ba'i sgo dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos red bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan bsam gyis mi khyab
pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i rgyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzi la rnam par
spyod pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang/ byang chub sems pa'i rnam par thar nga sa rnam par rol pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i brtsams pa chen po mthar 'byung ba rnam par dag pa//

bsam gyis ma khyab pa 'di thos par 'gyur ro zhes de ltar bsam pa yid la byed myong/ grong khyer chen po bod bzang po gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ grong khyer chen po 'od bawang do de la bltas3/gas/
dang dngul dang/ bzhu dang/ shel dang mu tig dmar po dang/ a gar ba dung/ mus na gal ba dang/ rin po che 'di bdun gyis shin tu bzang zhing blta na mdzes pa// rin po che'i
'obs thabs suzab po chus gang ba// gzhi gser gyi gram pas gang ba/ lha rdzas kyi ut+pal dang/ pad+modang/ ku mu dang buts+tshari kas kun nas yog pa// dus dang 'thun pa'i tsan dan gyi 'dam
dang lums 'khor ba bdun gyis kun nas yongs su bskor ba/ zhi po che snabadun gyi ta la'i 'phreng ba'i rim pa bdun gyis kun nas yongs su bskor ba/ rdo rje rin po che'i ra ba bdun gyis kun

nas yongs su bskor ba 'di lta ste/ song ga yid du 'ong ba'i rdo rje'i ra ba dang/ rdo rje gzhan gyis grub pa med pa'i ra ba dang/ 'dug pa'i ngang tshul gyi rdo rje'i ra ba dang// sgrub par dga' ba'i nga tshul gyi rdo

rje'i ra ba dang/ rdo rje brtan pa chags pa med pa'i ra bo dang rdo rje'i 'od zer dra ba'i snying po'i ra ba dang/ rdul dang bral ba'i kha dog gi rgyan gyi rdo rje'i ra bas yongs su bskor ba sta/ rdo rje rin po che'i ra ba de dag
thams cad kyang nor bu rin po che grangs med pas yongs su spras pa// 'dzam bu chu klung gi gsar gyi lan kan dang/ ba so mdzes par bkye ba/dngula'an po babaso'i 'phreng ba//

mdzes pas brgyan pa/bzhi po che bzhum+ma'i bso'i 'phreng ba mdzes pas brgyan pa/rin po che shel gyi ba so'i 'phrang pa mdzes pas brgyan pa rin po che'i byi ru'i phaso'i 'phreng ba mdzes pas brgyan pa/mu tig

garabo'ib so'i 'phrang ba medzes bas brgyan pa/ mu tige rgani po che'i rgya mtsho'i snying po'i ba so'i 'phreng ba mdzes pas brgyan pa stathagrong khyab chen bo de'i sgo chen po brgyad kyi ngar ngar na bang da ga tshod bcu bcu yod do

sgo de dag kyang rin po che sna bdun las sna tshogs mdzes par byas pa ste/ bltan yid du 'ong ba'o// grong khyer chen po de 'di ltar rgya chehare yangs la yan lag rnam pa brgyad du rnam par phye ba/bo chu sngon po'os la/

ba khas pa sta/bong khyer chen po de'i nang na'ang sang chen po bye ba phrag btsuyod de/ srang re re'i glag nayes nas kyang/ khyim chen po brgya phrag stong stong mkhas legs bar 'grigs pa ste/kun kyang rin po chu sna
tshogs las byas pa dag go/ rin po che'i rgyan sna tshogs kyis bu chu brgyan pa dag go rin po che'i gdugs dang/ rgyal mtshan bsgrung ba dang/ bdun che phru ngag dang ldan pa dag go da yo byad
thams cad phun sum tshogs pa dag go/ sems can khrag khrig du ma gnas pa dag go/ grong khyer chen po de'ang gong bu rin po che 'jog gras med pa'i khang pas mdzes pa ba byas pa ste/ 'dzam

wa0 ]bu chu klung gi gsar gyi khang pa brtsegs pa la rin po chebi cha chu'i dra bas kun nas khengs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rin po che'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa grangs med pa dang ldan pa'o// dngul gyi khang pa brtsegs pa la

mu tig dmar po'i dra bas kun nas khebs pa bsam gyis mi khyab ba'i na po che'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa grangs med pa dang ldan pa'o// ba cha ma'i khang pa brtsigs pa lazhi po re mdzod sna tshogs kyi dra bas kun

nas khebs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'in po che'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa grangs ma du nga dang ldan pa'o// shel gyi khang pa brtsegs pa la rin po che'i rgyal po snying po ya ngas nga 'i dra bas kun nas len pa bsam

gyis mi khyab pa'irin po che'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa grangs med pa dang ldan pa'o// nor bu ba po ma'agro ba'i yid du 'ong ba'i khang pa brtsegs pa la ni po che'inyi ma'i snying po'idrebs ku'u salebupa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i

zhe po che'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa grangasamang pa dang lta shu pa'o// zhi po che in+danAla'i khang pa brtsigs pa la bzhi po che dang la rgya'od zer gyi dra bas kun nas khengs pa bsam gyisami khyab pa 'phrin boche'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa

grangs mad pa dang ldan pa'o// rin po che'i rgyal po 'grob rgya mtsho'i khang pa brtsegs pa la rin po che'i rgyal po skar ma'i 'od zer gyi dra bas kun nas khebs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rin po che'i rgyan gyis
brgyan pa grangs med pa dang ldan pa'o// win po che rdo rje'i khang pa brtsegs pa la rin po che'i rgyal po gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i drabs kun s rebs pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rin po che'i rgyan gyis
(@#/// brgyan pa grangs med pa dang ldan pa'o// dus dang mthun pa'i tsan dan gyi khang pa brtsigs pa la lha rdzas kyi me togaman nga ra ba'i dra bas kun nas leb pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa bas po che'i/

[© ]rgyan gyis brgyan pa grangs med pa dang ldan pa'o// sposakyi rgyal bo mtshungs pa med pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa la lha rdzas kyi me togasna tshogs kyi dri bas kun nas khengs pa bsam gyis ma khyab ba'i bon po'i

rgyan gyis brgyan pa grangs med pa dang ldan pa'o// min po che'i khang pa brtsegs pa de dag re re zhing yang ba po che'i lan kan du mas brgyan pa// she po che'i stegs bu rim bdun gyis bskor ba/[à]po che'i ta la'i brangab rin/

'tsho bdunagyis bskor ba'adakrigs pa'o// rin po che'i lag kazhade dag dang/ rin po che'i ta lade dag thams cad du'ang phan tshun zhi po che'i srad bus smral ba'o// na po che'i srad bu de dag thams cad kyang gsar gyi dril gyi 'phrad

bas brgyan pa'o// gsar gyi dril gyi 'phreng ba de dag thams cad kyang rin po che'i chun po'i lta sde snatshogs kyis rnam par bres shing sngal ba'o// zhi bo che'i chun po'i lnga lnga dedag thams cad las kyang

rin po che'i dril bu g.yer ka'i dra ba mngon par sbyangs pa de dag ste/ de lta grong khyer chen pore thams cad ni/ nor bu rin po che'i dra ba grangs med pas kun s lobs so// bzhi po che'i dril bu g.yar ka'i dra bo grangs
mad pas kun nas khebs pa'o// lha rdzas kyi sngos kyi drab grangs med pas kun nas rengs nga go/ lha dzis kyi ma rtogs tshogs kyi drang gangs med pas kun nas rengs pa'o// na po che'i 'bru'i dra ba/

ba/ grangs med pas kun nas khebs pa'o// rdo rje'i bla re grangs med pas kun nas khebs pa'o// na po che'i bla re grangs med pas kun nas rengs pa'o// jin po che'i gdugs kyi bla ba grangs med pas kun nas/
khebs pa'o// na po che'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i bu re grangs med pas kun nas legs pa'o// gos gin po che'i bla re grangs med pas kun nas rebasang 'o// me tog gi 'phrang ba gu re grangs med pas kun nas
khobs pa'o// na po che'i gdugs dang rgyal mtshan sna tshogs btsugs shing bsgrang bsta/ grong khyer chen po 'od bzang po de'i dbus su rgyal po 'od chen po bzhugs pa'i phobrang brtsegs pa 'khor kun tu

dpag tshad bzhi yod pa ste/ rin po che sna bdun las byas pa'o// rin po che sna tshogs kyi stegs bu rimabadun gyis yongs su rnga skor ba'o// ne portse'i dril bu yid du 'ong ba'i sgra snyan par 'grol ba'i drab mi

bdun gyi sgra kun nas 'byung ngo// zhi po che sna bdun gyi ta la'i 'phrang ba rim pa bdun gyis kun nas bskor ba'o// bzhi po che stsatshogs kyi khang pa brtsegs pa'i rgyan brgya stong bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan pago/

rdzong rin po che sna tshogs du ma las byas pa gsar gyi gram pa kun tu bkram pa/ yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus yongs su gang ba/ lha rdzas kyi u0f7a ut+pal dang/ pad+mo dang/ kumu dang/ ma tog puN+Da ri
kas chu'i steng kun tu yog pa// rin po che'i ma tog dang 'bras bu'i shing sna tshogs kyis rab tu brgyan pa/ phyogs bzhi nas nye po che'i sha gus brtsegs pa'i thim skas rnam par bkye ba/ tsan dan gyis

shin tu mdzes par byas pa dang ldan pa/ lha rdzas kyis snyan cing yid du 'ong ba 'byin pa'i bya branasna tshogs kyi sgra yi tu 'byung ba yod pa// lha'i dbang po'i pho brang dang 'gran pa lta/ de'i dngug/

na ni po che 'gro ba la snang ba'i khang pa brtse gas pa shin tubazang la mdzes shing yid du 'ong ba/ si po che grangs med pa'i rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pas gya nom par brgyan pa yod de/ de'i nang na rgyal
bo 'od chen po'i dam pa'i chos gces pa'i dbyig tu bya ba bzhugs so// de nas tshong dbon gyi bu slob bzangs rin po che'i 'obs de dag la ni chags pa'i soms med/ rin po che'i bde rag la/

ngo mtshar du 'dzin pa'i pad med/ rin po che ta la'i 'phreng ba de dag la ni 'dod cing chags pa med/ rin po che'i drel gyi dra ba'i sku la ni ri myong bag byed pa med/ lha rdzas kyi ril mo'i sgra dang glu bro snyasha pa'i

dbyangs la ni chags pa'i somasamad/ rin po che rnam pa tha dad pa'i gzhal med khang dang/ khang pa brtsegs bsna tshogs kyi longs spyod na yid la bya ba mdang pashin tu dga' bar gyur pa'i skyes pa dang/
bud med kyi tshogs kyi chos kyi ngaga' ba'i mos pas shin tu dga' zhing/ gzugs dang/ sku rang/ dri dang/ 'odrang/ reg la dga' bas dban pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ chos nges par brtag pa

la shin tumos pas sems can gang dang phrad kyang/ dge ba'ir shes gnyen rtag tu 'dra zhing mthar gyis grong khyer gyi lam gyi sum mdo'i drung zhig tu phyin nas kun tu bltas na/ grong khyer gyi lam gyi sum mdo'i dbus

kyi mchod rten gyi khang pa nas phacang yadang mi 'ange ba zhig na/ rgyan chen po dang ldan pa'i khri ri po che bskrun son po'i rkang pa bkye ba/ ba nu dkar po'i song gis blangs pa/'dzam bu chu klung ge gsar gyi lcag pod kyis dra ba

legs par btags pa/ lha rdzas las kyang 'das pa'i rin po che'astan sna tshogs bting ba/ rin po che'i 'dra grangs med pas rnam par brgyan pa/nor bu mi bo che'i rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab nga 'i drab kun nas

babs pa// 'dzamadu chu klung gi gsar gyi snam bu la lha rdzas kyi rin po che sna tshogs kyi grub pa'i tu smra bar bkye ba'i gnam yol bres pa/ nor bu ne po che yid bzhin gyi rgyal bo'i papo'i snying bo dang lnga pa/ de lta bu'i

chos kyi khriman po largyal po bod chen pom chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis lus shin tu brgyan ba/ dpe byad bzangapo sna tshogs brgyad cu tham pas lus shig tur dzes pa/gser gyi'i bo ltar din pong sna tshogs

rnamapar bkod pas rnam par mdzes pa/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ltar gabribarjid rab tu 'bar ba/ zla ba nya zhing rgyas pa'i dkyil 'khor ltar blta na bzang ba/ tshangs pa ltar ngas ba'i 'khor gyi nang na rnam par mdzes

pa rgya mtsho ltab zab pa'i chos dang yon tan mtha' yas pa'i rin poche'i tshogs dang ldan pa// sprin chen po las chos kyi rang bzhin gyi 'brag sgra sgrog pa/ nam mkha' ltar chos kyi tshul gyi skar ma'i tshogs kyis
brgyan pa/ ra'ab ltar kha dog bzhipo'i sems can rgya mtshorasams la gzugs brnyan rab tu snang ba/ rin po che'i gling ltar gzi yang shosasna tshogs rin po ches yongs su gang ba de skyel mo krud du
'dug pa mthong ngo// de'i mdun ma'ang gser dang/ nor bu dang/ mu tig dang/ bi chu dang/ dung dang/ man shel dang/ byu ru dang/ sa le sbram dang/ dngul zhe po che'i/

phung po dang// lha rdzas kyi gos kha dog sna tshogs kyi phung po dang/ lha rdzas kyi zhe po che'i rgyan sna tshog sakyi phung po dang/ kha zas dang spyan gzigs sna tshogs kyi phung po dang/ zhim pa'i mchog khyad par du

'phags pa rnam pa sna tshogs kyi phung po dgod pa dang/ dngar ba'i thabs sna tshogs kyi yul du bkod pa mthong ngo// lha rdzas kyi[︽]shing rta rin po che bye ba brgya stong du ma dang/ lha rdzas kyisil snyan bye ba brgya stod du mang/

lha rdzas kyi spos kyi rnam pa bye ba brgya stong du ma dang/ nad kyi rkyen sman dang yo byad kyi phung po du ma dang/ yo byad kyi khyad par thams cad kyi phung po spyad duzung zhing/ kha na ma tho ba med pa mang po sems can rnams ci
dga' bar spyod du gzud pa'i e bshams tebakod pa dang/ babazhon gser gyi ru mig cag stong phrag du ma 'o mas 'jal ba mang po'ang sems can 'phos pa rnams yongs su bsduba'i phyi'i bkod pa mthong

ngo bu mo rin po che bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong bzhin bslang nga shin tu mdzes pa/ bltas sdug pa/ rgyan thams cad kyis rnam par klubs pa/ lha rdzas kyi gos rin poche gyog pa/lha rdzas kyi tsan ma sbrul gyi snying

ngos lus byug pa/ sgyu rtsal drug cu rtsa bzhi'i tshul shes pa// 'dod pa'i spyod pa dang/ chog thams cad la mkhas pa dag kyang thasogs shing bkod par mthong ngo// de'i mdunan ji lta ba de bzhis du sems can rnams
yogasu bsdu ba dang/ soms can rnams yongs su gzud pa dang/ sems can rnams dga' babaskyod ba dang/ sems can rnams spro ba bskyed pa dang/ sems can rnams kyi yong dang bar bya ba dang/ sems

can rnams kyi sems shin tu bde ba'i bya ba dang/ sems can rnams kyi nyin mongs pa rnam ra zhi bar bya ba dang/ sems can rnams chos kyi rang bzhis gyi don la yongs dgod pa dang/ sems can rnams thams cad

mkhyen pa nyid du don mnyam pa'i bya ba dang/ sems can rnams gtan la 'khu ba rnam par bzlog par bya ba dang/ lus dang ngag gis ngan du sdod pa thams cad rnam par bzlog pa dang/ sems can rnams kyi lta ba'i sgug
ju yang dag par dbyung ba dang/ sems can rnams kyi lam yongs su sbyangs pa'i phyir srang dang mgyi bzhi mdodang lam gyi sum mdo dang/ sgo dang/ khyams dag na'ang de bzhin te/ srang re re'i dos
g.yas g.yon nas kyang/ stags bu bye ba nyi shu nyi shu tsam la yo byang thams cad yongs su spangs te bkod pa mthong ngo// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu'ar bzangasakyis/ rgyal po 'ong sha po la
lus thams cad kyis phapa nas phyag byas te/ rgyal bo 'od chen po la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ mdun du bdug ste thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa/

bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyer na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang/ ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/
baphags pa'i byang chub sems dapa' rnams la gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa mdzad de zhes bdag gis thos na/ 'phags paji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i
spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang/ ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba padag la bka' stsal du gsol// lcas pa/ rigs kyi bung ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa byams pa chen po'i rgyal
mtshan yongs su dag pa dang yongs su rdzo gas par byed pa ste/ rigs kyi bu ngas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa byams pa chen po'i rgyalamtshan 'ding sangs rgyas brgya phrag du ma dang/ sangs rgyas

stong phrag du ma dang/ sangs rgyas brgya stong phrag du ma dang/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong dum nas/ brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar gyi sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das rnams la yongs su
dris so// yongs su zhus so// rnam par sbyang saso// yongs su sbyangs so// rnam par bkodad// rnam par bltasaso// rnam par spyad do// rjes su btsal to// yongs su brtagaso// rnam par bris so//

rgya cher byas so// rigs kyi bu de ltar nga ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa byams pachen po'i rgyal mtshan 'di la gnas shing/ chos dang 'thun par khams skyong zhing ston to// chos dang 'thun par 'jig rten la phan par byed
