/ ]do[;]chos dang 'thun par 'jig rten na rjes su spyod do// chos dang 'thun par sems can bcos par byed do// chos dang 'thun par sems can rnams la nan tan byed do// chos kyi dkyil 'khor la sems can
rnams yongs su 'dzung do// chos kyi tshul sems can rnams la zhu bar sgrub bo// chos dang 'thun par sems can rnams la yongs su bsko ba byed po// chos kyi man tan la sems can rnams yos su spyor ro//

chos kyi rang bzhin nges par rtogs pa lasems can rnams rab tu 'god do// byamos pa'isams dang/ byams pa la po'i dbang dang/ byams pa'i stobs dang/ phan pa'i sems dang/ bde ba'i soms dang/ snying rje'i sems
dang phan 'dogs pa'i sams dang/ yongs su bsrung ba'i soms dang/ sems can yongs su 'dzin pa mi gtong ba'i sa mas dang/ sdug bsngal thams cad rnam par bzlog pa'i smon lamargyas mi gcod pa'i

san sa dang/ bde ba'i mthar phyin pa la nga tu 'god par ya nga dag par sdod pa rgyun mi gcod pa sems can rnams ba tu 'god de// bag yangs kyi bde ba yang dag par bskyed pas/sems can de dag gi lus kyang shin tu

bde bar byed do// de dag gi 'khor ba'i bde ba la zhen pa'i sems kyi rgyud kyang rnam par zlog par byed do// da dgagasems kyi rgyun kyang chos kyi dga' ba dang mos pa la yongs su gzhol bar byed do// nyon mos pa'i

drim thams cad las rnam par sbyong bar byed de// ma dag pa'i chos tham sacad 'a sa yos su sbyang babyang ngo// 'khor ba'i rgyun las rnam par zlog par byed ngo// chos kyi dbyanges kyi tshul rgya mtsho la yongs sugazung

ba byed do// dedag gi srid nga 'i 'a ma gyi rgyud du skye ba thams cad rgyu gcad pa'i phyir sems kyim rig pa yongs su srag nga 'a byed do// thams cang mkhyen pa nyid kyi 'bras bu thob par byapa'i phyir de dag gisoms kyi myu gu

mawa ga/ yongs su skyed do// mi 'phrogs pa'i dad pa'i stobs yang dag par bskyed pa'i phyir de dag gi sems kyi rgya mtsho'ang zab tu dang bar byed do// rigs kyi bu de ltar nga ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyod

pa byams pa chen po'i rgyal mtshan la gnas te/ chos dang 'thun par 'jig rten skyong zhing ston to/ jigs kyi bu nga'i khamasan gnas pa'i sems can rnams// ngas 'jigs shing sngang ba 'am/ bag tsha zhing skye
g.ya' ba mded/ rigs kyi busems can gang 'phongs shing yo byad sna tshogs kyis brel ba/ bza' ba 'dod pa 'am/bltung ba 'dod pa 'am/ gos 'dod pa nas/ yo byad sna tshogs thams cang gang 'dod

kyang rung ste// de dag thams cad nga'i drung du 'ong ngo// de dag la'ang ngas sngags bsham pa'i mdzod sgo phye zhing ci 'drong pa khyer cig ces bstabs te/ gang gi don du khyod sdig pa'i las la spyod par gyur cing/ srog gcod pa'i m/
ma byin par len pa 'am/ 'dod pas log par g.yem pa 'am/ rdzun du smra ba 'am/ phram 'am/ngag rtsub po 'am/tshig bkyal pa 'am/chags sems sam/ gnong sems sam/log par lta ba 'am/nge ma yin pa'i lta ba'i

rnam pa sna tshogs la mngon par zhen par gyur pa de thams cad kyang grong khyer chen po 'od bzang po 'di'i sgo dang/ srang dang/ khyams dang/ lam gyi sum mdo dang/ bzhes do kun tu spungs te/sdanas byin pa yin gyis// su

ts+tshA tsa'adod pa kun kyang khyer cig ces bstabasashing byas na// rigs kyi bu grong khyer 'od bzang po 'di sems can ji snyed cig gnas pa dedag thams cad na byang chub sems dpa' ste/ theg pa chen po la zhugs pa'o//

mam/ de bas na grong khyer chen po 'od bzang po 'di'ang de dag la bsam pa rnam pa ji lta bur dgo pa'i tshul bzhin du snang ste/ la la la ni rig par snang ngo// la la las yangs par snang ngo// la la lan ga zhe sa la gnas par snang ngo

la la la ni gzhi rin po che be cha las blangs par snang ngo// la la lan sa'i ra bas bskor bar snang ngo// la la lan na po che rdo rje gzhan gyis mi thub pa'i rgyal mtshan gyi ra bas bskor bar snang ngo//la la lan gsas

mdang gyo mos gang zhing thag thug rang/ grog po dang/ g.yas mang po can du snang ngo// la la la ni nor bu rin po che dam pa grangs med pas gzhi brgyan rung yos su bkram pa dang/ lag mthe'i bkani du gzhim3sa par

snang ngo// la la la'i sa las byas par snang ngo// la la ni rin po che grangs med pa'i khang pa dang/ gzhal med khang dang/ khang bzhag dang/ khang pa brtsegs pa dang/ khang stangs dang/ ba gam dang/ skar khung gi shar bu dang/

zla gam rin po che sang ga'i dra bas brgyan pa ra snang ngo// grong khyer gyi phyi zol na gnas pa'i sems can sngon sa byang chub sems dpa'i spyad pa spyod pa'i tsho/ bsdu ba'i dngos po bzhis yongs su bsdus pa//
bsam pa dag pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed pa/ sangs rgyas mang po bsnya' ba 'ur ba/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyade la mngon par mos pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du rab tu gzhol ba de dag
la'ang rin po che las byas par snang ngo// de ma yin pa gzhan dag la ni sa las byas par snang ste/ rigs kyi bu nga' khamasan gnas pa'i sar sa can yul dang/ phyogs dang/ grong khyer dang//
grong rdal dang/ ljongs dang/ khams dang/ rgyal po'i pho brang dgon/rtog pa lnga dang ldan nga 'i 'jig rten gyi dus kyi rang bzhi gyis dkrug to/ midage ba bcu'i las kyi lam zhig byed par/

'dod par gyur na'ang/ de'i tshe de dag la phan par bya pa'i gnas kyis byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'jig rten gyi dbang po'i gling zhes bya ba// byams pa chen po sngon du 'gro ba la snyoms par 'jugs/

rigasakyi bu de ltar nga ting nge 'dzin de la snyoms par zhugs pa dang/ de nyid kyi mod la soms can de dag gi 'jigs pa de dag dang/ mi bdeb de dag dang/ shar gnyer ba de dag dang/ 'thab mo dang rtsod pa de rag dang/

sems kyi 'khrug pa de ngag dang/ 'tsho ba'isamasade dag kyang byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin 'jig rten gyi dbang po'i grong byams pa chen po sngon du 'grob de'i chos nyid thob pas rab tu bar 'gyur ro//
lta nga' zhi bar 'gyur ro// rnam par ldog par 'gyur ro// 'gag par 'gyur 'o/ 'gosakyi bu yud tsam zhig sdod dang/ de'u'i mngon sum du 'gyur ro// de nas rgyal po bod tsheb ngos de'i

byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin byams pa chen po sngon du 'gro ba 'jig rten gyi dbang po'i gling la mnyam par gshug go/ de ltargyal po 'od chen pos byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'pho byams pa chen po so

rgyu du bgrob 'jig rten gyi khang po'i grong la mnyam par gzhag ma thag tu/ de'i mod la grong khyer chen po 'od bzang po'i yul dang phyogs su bcas pa/ grong khyer dang/ grong rdal dang/ ljongs rang/ khams dang/ rgyal

mthapo'i pho brang 'khor dang bcas bar rnam pa drug tu g.yos so// de g.yos pa'i tshe ri bo che'i ra bde dag dang rin po che'i khang pa dang/ zhe po che'i snying po dang/ rin po che'i khyim dang/ rin po che'i gnas dang/

rini bo che'i gzhal med khang dang/rin po che'i khang pa brtse gas pa dang/ rin po che'i ba gam dang/ rin po che'i pu shu dang/ ni po che'i skar khung dang/ bzhi po che'i stags budang/ rin po che'i rta babs dang 1 na po/

che'i zla gam dang/ bzhi po che'i sang ge'i dra ba dang/ rin po che'i lan kan dang/ rin po che'i 'bru dang/ rin po che'i bla re dang/ rin po che'i srad bus brgyus pa'i dril bu g.yer kha'i dra ba dang/ rin po che'i

dril bu dang/ rin po che'i rgyal mtshan dang/ bzhi po che'i ba dan dang/ rin po che'i ta la de dag kyang rab tu g.yos te sgra 'byazhe to// rab tu la khrol lo// de dag de lta'i sgra 'byin cing yid du khong la snyan pa dang/ mnyan na

dga' ba'i dbyangs brjod cing da rgyal po bong chen po gang na ba der 'dud de phyag 'tshal lo// grong khyer chen po 'od bzang po 'i nang na sems can ji snyed cig gnas pa de dag thams cad kyang dga' pa dang rangs pa'i sems
kyis yongs su sazhas/ rgyal po 'od chen po gang na bde legs su mngon du bltas te/ lus thams cad kyis nga bcing phyag 'tshal lo// pa'i khams kyi grong khyer dang ljongs dang yul dang/ khams dang/

rgyal po'i pho brang 'khor na gnas pa de dag thams cad kyang lus dang sems bde bar gyur te/ dga' zhing rangs pa skyes nas/ rgyal po khong chen po gang na ba de logs su phyag 'tshal lo// byol song gi skye gnas su
gtogs pa'i sems can de dgathams cad kyang gcig la gcig byams pa'i soms dang phan ba'i somasasu ldan par gyur nas/ rgyal po 'od chen po gang na ba der logs su lta zhid mngon/

par 'dud do// ba dang sgang mthon po'i sa'i phyogs thams cad kyang/ rgyal po 'od chen po gang na ba der mngon pas 'dud do// ma rtog gi shing dang/ 'bras bu'i shing dang/ lo ma'i shing dang/ sa bon gyi tshogs
dang 'byung po'i tshogs dang/ ma tog dang/ ldam bu dang/ rtswa dang/ gel ba dang/ sman dang/ nags tshal thams cad kyang/ rgyal po 'od chen po gang na ba de logs su mngon par 'dud par gyur to/

de'i khams na mtshodang/ mtsho'u dang/ lu ma dang/ lteng ka dang/ 'bab chu dang/ chu klung dang/ rje nga dang/ khros pa ji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang/ rgyal po bod chen po gang na ba de logs su mngon par gzhel/

zhing rlabs kyi sgra 'byin par gyur to// klu'i rgyal po stong phrag bcu'ang a ka ru nag po'i bdug spos kyi dud pan bun du 'grigs pa'i spos kyi sprin las glog sna tshogs 'gyu ba'i 'od kyis snang bar byed cing/

'brug sgra sgrogs pa dang/ spos chu'i char gyi rgyun shin tu phra ba mngon par 'bebs par gyur to// brgya byin dang/ rab mtshem dang/ rab dga' ldan dang/ rab 'phrul dga' dang/ dbang sgyur gyi lha'i rgyal po/

lasogs pa lha'i bu stong phrag bcus kyang steng gi bar snang la 'khod do/ nam mkha'i dbyings thams cad lha rdzas kyi rol mo'i sil snyan gyi sngon bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong gi sgra phyung bas/ dbyangos snyan pa rgya che

wa bsgrags pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang/ lha'i bu mo grangs med pa lha'i glu snyan pa len pa'i sprin gyi skyabasgrugs pa'i dbyangs snyan cing yid du 'ong ba'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang/ lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i rtse tog snatshog

kyi sprin gras med ra'i char bab tu 'bab pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang/ lha rdzas kyi spos kyi sprin kha dog sna tshogs kyi sprin grangs med pa'i cha rab tu 'bab pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang/ lha rdzas kyi zhi bo che'i 'phreng ba sna

tshogs kyi sprin grangasamad pa'i chas rab tu 'bab pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang/ lha rdzas kyi phye ma kha dog sna tshogs kyi sprin grangs med pa'i char 'ab tu 'bab pa'i rgyan gyis ngargyan ba dang/ lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i lcab

lhub sna tshogs kyi sngon grongs med pa'i rgyun rab tu 'bab pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan ba dang/ lha rdzas kyi gos sna tshogs dri ma med cing 'jam pa kha dog rnam pa tha dad pa'i sprin grangs med pa'i rgyal rab tu 'bab pa'i rgyan gyis

brgyan pa dang/ lha rdzas kyi rizhi bo che'i gdugs rnam par phye ba sna tshogs kyi sngob grangs med pa'i char rab tu 'bab pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang/ lha rdzas kyi the bo tshe'i seng ge yid du 'ong ba'irgyal mtshan gyi sprub grangs med

pa'i char rab tu 'bab pa'i rgyan gyis brgyab pa dang/ lha rdzas kyi rin po che'abaranga'i lce shin tu 'phro ba'i rin po che'i ba dan gyi sprin grangs med pa'i cham rab tu 'bab pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang/ rgyal po 'od chen po lamachod pa bya ba'i

sa byin gyisabarlabs so// glang po'i dbang po'i khyu mchog gi mgru phyung ba dang/ rnam par 'phrul pa'i mthus nam mkha'i dbyas thams cad lha rdzas kyi ni po che sna tshogs kyi pad+mo'i sngo'agrongs med pas kun nas

mtha @#// yog par byin gyis brlabs so// lha rdzas kyi nor bu ri'i po tis mo do grangs med pa rab tu 'phyang ba dang/ lha rdzas kyi rin po che'i snam bu'i sna lde dang chun po gras med pa rab tu 'phyang ba dang

lha rdzas kyi zhi po che sna tshogs kyi 'phrang ba'i rgyud grangs med pa mngon par 'phyang ba'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang/ lha rdzas kyi rin po che sna tshogs kyi lhab lhub dang/ 'phreng ba grangs med pa mngon par 'phyang ba'i rgyan

gyisabargyan pa dang/ lha rdzas kyi bzhi bo chesna tshogs kyim rtog gi lngalde grangs med pa mngon par bres pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang lha rdzas kyi smos kyi rgyal po 'dogasna tshogs phyogs thams cad du dri zhim pos

rgyas par 'gangs pa'i sprin grangs med pas kun nas khebs pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang/ lha rdzas kyi zhe po che'i gos kha dog sna tshogs kyi sngon gras med pa'i char rab tu 'bab pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan ba dang lha rdzas

kyi bdug spos kyidun pa na bun du 'khrigs pa'i spron gras med pa 'i chas rab tu 'bab pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan pa dang/ lha rdzas kyi phye ma kha dog sna tshogs kyi sprin grangs med pa'i char phramo rab tu 'bab pa 'argyan gyis

brgyan pa dang/ lha'i bu mo'i tshogs lha rdzas kyi rilamo byed pa dang/ glu snyan pa'i dbyangs yid du 'ong bar len rung/ bstod pa'i sprin gyis kun nas yog pa'i char mngon par 'babs pa'i rgyan gyis brgyan par nam mkha'i

dbyis byin gyis brlabasaso// srin po'i dbang po brgya stong grangs med ba rgya mtshol gnasapa dang/ glang bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rten gyi 'i gzhi la gnas pa// kho zas su shadang khrag 'thung zhing ba la/ chu la spyod

ma ba dang/ ri dgas dang/ phyugs dang/ bya dang/ ba glang dang/ rta dang/ glang bo dang/ bong bu dang/ skyes pa dang/ bud med kyi tshogs kyi mdangs 'phrog pa zhe sdang ba'i yid kyi rnam par rtog pa dang ldan pa/rtag tu 'gro

ba 'tsho zhi'i mtho 'atsam pa la zhugs pa rnams kyang/ byams pa dang phan pa'i sems dam pa dang ldan zhing/ bzhen gyi mdog shin tu dngang dang/ 'gro ba thams cad la mi 'tshe zhing mtho 'tsham pa med pa la zhug te/

'jig rten pha rol la lta bar gyur nas thal mo sbyar cing shin tu dga' ba'i sems kyis/ rgyal po 'od chen po gang na ba de logs su btud nas phyag 'tshal bar gyur te// lus dang sen sa kyi bde ba rgya chen po mtshungs pa med

pa yang myong bar gyur to// gnod sbyin dang/ grul bum dang/ sha za dang/ 'byung po'i dbang po brgya stong du ma yang byams pa dang/ phan pa'i sems dam pa dang ldan zhing bzhin gyi mdog shin tu dar ba dang/ 'gro ba thams

cad lam 'tshozhing mtho'atsham pa med pa la zhugs te// 'jig rten pha rol la lta bar gyur nas thal mo sbyar cing shin tu dga' ba'i sems kyis rgyal po 'od chen po gangan ba der 'dud cing phyag 'tshal bar gyur to/ lus dang

sems kyi bde ba rgya chen po mtshungs pa med babang myong bar gyur to// de ltar glingabazhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sems can kun gyi 'jigs pa dang// gnod pa dang/ mo bde ba dang/ shar gnyer ba dang/ 'thab

modang/ rtsod pa dang/ sems kyi 'khrug pa dang/ 'tsho ba'i soms thams cad rab tu zhi bar gyur to// rnam bar zhi bar gyur to// rnam pas log par gyur to// 'gags par gyur to// phyi log par gyur to// glang ban/
ba'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'di'i ji lta bdebagane du/ stong gsum gyi stong chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad nas/ phyogs bcur bajig rten gyi khams bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag

bcu'i bar gyi sems can kun gyi 'jigs pa dang/ gnod pa dar/ ma bde ba dang/ shar gnyer ba dang/ bathab mo dang/ rtsod pa dang/ sams kyi 'khrug pa dang/ 'tshe ba'i sems thams cad kyang/ byang chub semA/

! dba'i ting nge 'dzin byams pa chen po sngon du 'gro ba 'jig rten gyi dbang po'i gling gi chos nyid thob pa'i phyir rab tu zhi bar gyur to// rnam par zhi bar gyur to// rnam par ldog par gyur to// 'gags par gyur to//
phyir 'khog par gyur to// de nas rgyal po 'od chen po ting nge 'dzin de las langs te/ tshong dpon gyi bu'or babras la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bus byang chub sems dpa'i sdong pa'i ye/
g.yos snang ba'i sgo byams pa chen po'i rgyal mtshan 'di shes par bad na/ ngas byang chub sems dpa' 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad bde ba'i bsam pas rgyas par 'gengs pas byams pa chen po'i gdugs 8

mad pa dang ldan pa// 'khor mi phyed pa dang ldan pas 'gro ba thams cad 'khor dgyur pa// rab 'bring dang bla ma'i sbyor bas 'gro ba thams cad yongs su bskyab pa la zhugs pa/ 'gro ba thams cad yongs su gzung ba la

zhugs pas byams pa'i sems lta bu dang ldan pa/ bsod namasadang ye shes kyi 'od zer 'gro ba thams cad du 'byung bas zla ba nya zhing rgyas pa lta bur gyur pa// shes bya thams cad ye shes kyi bod kyis snang bar byed

wa pa'i phyir nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor lta bur gyur pa// sems can thams cad kyi sams kyi mun pa thibs po rab tu dal bas sgon ma chen po lta bur gyur pa/sems can thams cad kyi sems kyi rgya mtsho'i g.yo sgyu'i rtog pa

dang bar byed pas nor bu'an po che chu 'dang dang 'dra ba/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi bsam pa dang smon lam yongasasu rdzogs par byed pas nor bu rin po che yid bzhin gyi rgyal po dang 'dra ba/'gro ba thams cad teng nge 'dzin dang//

snyoms par 'jug ba'i khang pa dang/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi pho brang chen por gzhog pas/ rlung dmar chen po dang 'dra ba de dag gi spyod pa shes pa 'am/yon tan brjod pa ba ma/ bsod nams kyi ze bo gzhal
ba lam/ yon tan gyi skar ma'i tshogs kyis brgyan pa'i nam mkha' la blta ba 'am/ smon lam chen po'i rlung gyi dkyil 'khor las mtshams gcad pa kham/ chos mnyam pa nyid kyi stobs la tshod

gzung ba 'am/ theg pa chen po'i rgyan gyis bsngags pa yongs su brjod pa 'am/ kun tu bzangapo'i spyod pa'i tshul gyi khyad par brjod pa 'am/ byang chub sems dapa'i ting nge 'dzin chen po bsgoms pa'i sgo dbye ba

lam[0f10 ]snying rje chen po 'i sprin yongs su smos par nus re skan/ song rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na/ rgyal po'i gnas brtan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de na dag bsten ma mi g.yo ba zhes bya ba 'dug gs/
de ba gan dusong la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dang 'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang/ ji ltar nan tan du bya ba drisashig/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/
de rgyal po 'od chen po'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag byas nas/ rgyal po 'od chen po la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas te/ yang dang yang bltas nas/ rgyal po 'ong che
po'i drung nas song ngo//bam po dgu bcu drug pa// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bas grong khyer chen po 'ong bzang po nas byang sta yud tsam du lam

gyi mgo btsal nas/ rgyal bo 'od chen po'i gdams ngag de la rjes su bsam pa byed cing/ byang chub sems dang ba spyod pa 'i tshul byams pa chen po'i rgyal mtshan de rjes su dran par bya ba dong ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo 'jig

'a/ rtan gyi dbang po'i grong gi snang ba chen po de yongs su bsgom pa dang/ byang chub samasadapa'i lus rnam par dag pa bsam gyisame khyab pas brgyan pa'i seng ge 'i khri'i rgyan rnamapar phye ba rnam pa sna tshogs de dag mngon par
bsgrub pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam dang/ bsod nams kyi dbang dang/ stobs bsam gyis mi khyab pa de dag rjes su stsal ba dang/ byang chub sems dang bsems can yongs su smin par bya

ba'i yo shes kyi tshul bsam gyis ma khyab pa de shin tu brtan par bya ba dang 1 byang chub sems dang longs spyod kyi bdag nyid che ba thun mong du gyur pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa de la rjes su bsam pa dang/ byang bsamA

dba'i gnas rnam pa tha dad pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa de dag kyang mtshan mar bya ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnams kyi sems can yongs susmin par bya ba rnam pa dag pa bsam gyis mi khyang pa de rjes su dran

pa ra bya ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'khor phun sum tshogs pa yang yongs su dag pa de la brtag pa dang byang chub sems dpa' sems can gyi do' nga so ma pa snang ba'i tshulangasamagyis mi khyab pa de la yid/
ches par byed byed pas/ sems dga' zhing mos pa'i shugs dang/ samasakyi rnams bde ba dang/ sems shin tu tshim pa dang/ sams khong nas dga' ba dang/ sems rnyog pa med pa dang/ soms 'od dang

ba dang/ sems brtan pa dang/ sems rgya che ba dang/ saMms mi zad pa thob ste/ de de ltar dge pa'i nga ngashes gnyen rjes su dran zhing yid la byed pa la brtson pas gdong mchi mas gang nas rjes su sems pa//

kyi hud kye dge ba'i bshes gnyen mthong ba 'di yon tan rin po che thams cad kyi 'byung gnas su gyur pa'o// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa thams cad yongasu dag pa dang yongs su rdzog par 'gyur ba'i rgyur gyur pa'o//

byang chub sems dpa'i dran ba thams cad rnam par dag par byed pa'o// byang chub sems dpa'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad yongs su sbyong ba'o// byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi snang ba thams cad
yongs su skyed pa'o// sangs rgyas thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ba yongs su bsgrubs pa'o// sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad kyi sprin gyi char rab tu 'babs pa'o// byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam

gyi tshul thams cad rab tu brjod pa'o// shes rab dang ye shes kyi snang ba bsam gyi mi khyab pa yang dag par skyod pa'o// byang chub sems dpa'i dbang po brtan pa'i myu gu skyed par byed pa'o// dag pa'i bshes
dganyen rnams ni de dag ngan sad gi g.yung sa thams cad nas skyob pa// dag ba'i bshes gnyen nam sa'i bdag ches mnyam pa nyad tshul khong du chud par bya ba la gzhog pa'o//
dag pa'i bshes gnyen rnams ni bdag la lam bde ba dang mi bde pa ston pa'o// dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams na bdag la theg pa chen po yongs su ston pa'o// dag pa'i bshes gnyen rnams ni de dag la byung
chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa' gdams ngag gso 'dems pa'o// dag pa'i bshes gnyen rnams na bdag la thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi grong khyer gyi lam ston pa'o//dge ba'i bshes gnyen
rnams na bdag thams cad mkhyen pa'i gzhus su ni par skyel ba'o// dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams ni bdag chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul rgya mtsho la 'jug par byed pa'o// dag ba'i bshes gnyen rnams ni
bdag la dus gsum gyi shes bya rgya mtsho'i tshul rab tu ston pa'o// dge ba' bshes gnyen rnams na bdag la 'phags pa'i tshigs kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rab tu ston pa'o//dag pa'i bshes gnyen

rnams ni bdag gi dkar po'i chos thams cad rnam par 'phel bar byed pa'o//zhes de de ltar du zhing sde sngags 'don pa'i tshe nam mkha'i dbyings la 'bod pa'i lha'i tshogs dang/ rtag tu phyi bzhin 'brang zhing da

dag par bskul ba dang/ sangs rgyas kyi phonya ltar gyur pa'i bya chub sems dpa' rnams 'di skad ces 'dzar to// rigs kyi bu dag ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag la zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpas nai/ sangs rgyas
bcom ldan 'das rnams kyang thugs shun tu dgyes par 'gyur ba yin/ dag pa'i bshes gnyen gyi tshage dang mi 'gal bar gnas pa'i byang chub sems dang su ni/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du'ang shan tu bsnyen

pa yin/ dag pa'i gshes gnyen gyi tshig la the tsom me za ba'i byang chub sems dang ba la ni dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams kyang nye bar bsnyen pa ni/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen mde la bya ba dang ma 'bral ba'i byang

chub sems da pal la na don thams cad kyang mngon du 'gyur ba yin gyis/ rigs kyi brgyal pa'i bye brang brtan par dag bsnyen ma ma gegayo ba gang na ba der sang zhage dang/ de 'as byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa//
sa ra 'gyur ro// de nas tshong dpan gyi bu nor bzangs ting de 'dzin gyi yoshes snang ba las langs nas[？ ]mthar gyis rgyal po'i pho brang brtan par dge bsnyen ma ma g.yo ba gang na

ba der song nas/ dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba yongs su tshol zhing rmad rmad pa las/de la 'gro ba mang pos bstan pa// rigs kyi bu dag bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba de ni rang gi khyim na pha ma dang 'grogs shing gzhon nur

gyur pa ste/rang gi gshen pa shes kyi tshig sa kyis yongs su bskor cing skye bo'i tshogs chen pa la chos ston to//de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor ba grangs dga' ba chen po dar mes/shang spro bas yongs su rgyas pa'i sems dad ldan pa de dag/

bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba'i khyim gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo pa'i khyim gyi sgo na sdod pa ni che des khyim de thams cad 'od lus dad sems shin tu bde bar byed pa// gser gyi kha dog tu 'dug pa zhig gis khyab song

gsal bar gyur nas/'od des tshod da pan gyi bu zher bzangs la pheg par gyur ma thag tu/tshor ba thams cad la dbang sgyur ba'i do de de 'dzin gyi sgo mang po dang/ zhi ba'i gnas kyi dang de 'dzin gyi sgo mang pa dang da

'gro ba thams cad dor bral ba'i re de 'dzan gyi sgra sad pa dang/ kun tu lta ba'i btang snyoms dang ldan pa'i nying de 'dzin gyi ske mad pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mdzod kyi ting nge 'dzin gyi sgem pa la segs pa ting nge

'dzin gyi sgo lnga brgya tsam la zhugs par gyur te yongs su skyes sa// de dag kyang shin tu phra zhing gzhon pa ste/ 'di ltar dper na thog ma mngal du zhugs pa'i rnam par shes pa lta bu ste/ tang de 'dzani de dag kyang shin

phra zhing gzhan par skyes par gyur to// des dri zhim pa zhige tsher nang da de na lha la'ang med/lha'i bu me 'bad med/ klu la'ang med/klu'i bu ma la'ang med/gnod sbyin la'ang med/gnod sbyin gyi bu mo la'ang med/

dra zla la'ang med/ dri za'i bu me 'bad med/ lha ma yin la'ad med/lha ma yin gyi bu me 'bad med/nam mkha' lded 'bad med/ nam mkha' ldang gi bu mo la'ang mad/ ma 'o ma cu la'ang med/ mi 'am ci'i bu mo la'ang/

med lte 'bye tshan pa 'a 'ang med/ lto 'phye chen pa'i bu mo'ang med/ mi la'ang med/ mi'i bu mo la'ang med cing mi srid pa de lta bu'i dri zhim pa tshor bar gyur to// bud med de'i gzugs dang mnyam pa'i ng bye gas/
bcu'i 'jig rten na mi na lhag pa lta ga las 'od/ kha dog dang mdog de lta bu 'ang de bzhin gshegs pa sku mdog dad/ kha dog dang/ byang chub sems dpa' dpad bskur ba'i kha dag dang mdeg ma gtogs

kha'/ de'i kha dog dar mdog tu mnyam pa phyogs bcu 'a yig rten na med na lhag pa lta ga las 'od/ lus kyi chu zheng dang dbyibs de lta'ang de bzhazhe gshegs pa'i sku khrun chu zheng dang/ dbyibs dang/ byang chub

sems dar ba da pod bskur ba thob pa'i lus kyi chu ser dang dbyibs ma gtogs par/de'i lus kyi nu zhed dad dbyings sumanyam pa phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na med na lhag pa lta ga las 'od/ 'od kyi rgyan do lta

gu'ang de bzhan gshegs pa'i bod kyi rgyan dang/ byang chub sems dpa' dbang bskur ba thob pa'i 'od kyi rgyan ma gtogs par/de'i bod kyi rgyan dang mnyam pa phyogs bcu'i 'jig rtenan med na lhag pa lta ga las

'od de'i kha'i ngad kyi dri zhim pa dang mnya pa'i dri de ltabu'ang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi lha'i gnas sam/klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lha ma yin dad namam la lding dang/ mi 'am ci dang/ lte
chen so dar/ mi dang/ mig yun pa'i gnas na mda' lhag pa lta ga las 'ong/ khyim gyi rgyan dang longs spyod de lta bu 'ang de bzhin gshegs rab longs spyod dad/ byang chub sems dpa' dbang bskur ba thob

pa'i 'das spyod ma gtogs khar/ de'i khyim gyi rgyan dar 'phengs spyod du mnyam babang phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten na min na lhag pa lta ba las 'od/ g.yog 'khor phun sum tshogs pa de lta bu 'ad de bzhin gshegs pa'i
'khor phun sum tshogs pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' 'khor phun sum tshogs pa ma gtogs par/ de'i g.yog 'khor phun sum tshogs pa dang mnyam pabad phyogs bcu'i 'jig rtegan med na lhag ba lta
sa @#// ga las 'od ste/ dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba de la 'dod chags dang ldan pa'i sems kyis blta bar nus pa'i sems can de lta bu bad phyag sa bcu'i 'jig rten gyi sems can gyi lasan med de//

dag bsnyenaa mi g.yo ba de mthong ma thag tu/nyon medas pa zhi bar mi 'gyur ba de lta bu'i sems can yad phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi sems can gyi rasin med de/ 'di lta ste// dper na tshangs pa chen po steng brgya

phrag bcu la dbang sgyur ba la 'ded pa la spyod pa'i nyon mongs pa rnams ma rgyu// de bzhin du dag bsten ma ma g.yo ba'ang mthong ma thag tu/ sems can rnams kyi nyin mdas pa mi rgyu'o/ dge bsnyen ma mi
g.yo ba de la blta bas ngoms par 'gyur ba'i sems can de lta bu 'ang/ shes rab kyis ngoms pa ma gtogs par phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams kyi sems can gyi ris na med de/
de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/ dag bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba'i lus kyi byin bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang 2 gzugs dang/ kha dog dang/ dbyibs dang/ du zheng pa sam gyis

ge khyab pa dang/ sab 'gazhi dang/ grong khyer dang/ rin po che chen po thams cad la thogs pa med pa'i 'od zer gyi dra ba'i rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab ba dang/ sems can gyi don bsam gyis mi khyab sgrub pa

mthong ste/ ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas byung ba'i dri zhim pa tshor nas/ 'khor rgya mtsho phun sum tshogs pa mtha' yas pa mthong ste/ khyis dad gzhal med khang gi rgyan phun sum tshogs pa mi 'phrogs pa mthong

bas nas yon tan rgya mtshotshad med pa bod duchud de/ dge bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba lags su bcad pa 'dis bstod de// khyod kyis rtag tu tshul khrims yod medas bsud sa te//bzod pa shan tu yangs pa'i ng yongs su
bsgomo mdzad cing// brtson 'grus brtan pa rdo rje lta bu bsgrubs lasan// ri bo'i rgyal pa lta bur 'gro ba 'bags shang 'bar// den tshe'i dpan gyi bu non bzangs kyis dag bsnyen ma mi

g.yo ba la tshags su bcad pa des mngon par bstod de 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags ma bdag gis bla na med pa 5/nga dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub
sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dad/ ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags ma ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa mdzad do zhes bdag gis thos na/
'bags ma ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub lams dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang/ ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba bdag la bshad du gsol/ de nas dag bsnyen ma mi
g.yo bas/ byang chub sems dpa'i dag 'jam zhing yid du 'od lo nyams su bde bas/ tshong da ren gyi bu nor bzangs la dga' bar 'gyur pa'i tshig tu brjod nas 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi
bu de ltar khyod kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tusems bskyed pa legs so legs so// rigs kyi bu kho mo ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa thub par dka' ba'i ye shes
kyi skad pa thob pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i sgo yi dam brtan pa la slob pa/ chos thamasamanyam pa nyid kyi sa'i gzungs kyi sme rdeb pa'o// khom na slebs pa'i
shes snang ba/ chos kyi gzhi thams cad snang bar brjod pa theb pa'o/ khamo ni chos thams cad yongs su btsal bas mi skyo ba'i rgyan gyi tade de 'dzan gyi sde thob pa'o// smras pa// 'phags ma pad chub
sprul sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa thub par dka' ba'i yishes kyi sId pa de'i yul ni ji lta bu zhage mchis/ yi dam la brtan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i sgo dad/ chos thams cad mnyam pa

wa 'di lasa'i gzungs kyi sgo dang/ chos kyi lag zhi thams cad snang bar brjod pa'i spobs pa snang ba'i sgo dang/ chos yongs su btsal bas ma skyo pa'i rgyan gyi ting de 'dzan gyi sgo'i yul ji lta bu zhig mchis
smras pa// rigs kyi bu gnas 'di ni yade ches par bka' 'o// smras pa/ 'phags ma bstan du gsol (sangs rgyas kyi byin dang dag pa'i bshes gnyen gyis yongs su bzung na yode lta ches par mchi grang/ rtogs
ba dang/ tshal ba dang/ rnam par rtogs pa dang/ rjes su rtogs pa dang/ rig pa dang/ dmigs su phebs pa dang/ gams pa dang/ ma 'gal ba dang/ rnam par ma rtogs pa dang 2 sgro 'dogs
zlo bgamachis pa dang/ mnyam par bgyid pa'i ya nga mangs gang// de nas dge bsAn ma ma g.yo las/ tshong dpan gyi bu nor bzangs la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu sngon 'das

ma pa'i dus shagan dri ma med pa 'a 'od kyi bskal pa la de bzhin gshegs la phyag rab tu brkyang ba zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ kho ma yang de ni tshargyal pagog gis byan pa'i bu gcig ma zhig tu gyur nas de'i tshinub

ma mnal tsam zhig na/ rgyal po'i sgol da bcad/ ba dang ma 'ad nyal/ skyes pa dang bud med dag kyang gnyid kyuse log/ rol mo brdud ba dang dkrol ba'i sgra'ang zhi/lhan tsage spyod pa'i bud med lnga brgya tsam dag

kyang nyal bar gyur pa zhagan/ khamo malagyi steng na 'dug cing/ nam mkha'i dbyings la rgyu ba'i skar ma'i tshogs kyi 'greng ba rnam par 'khod pa la lta lta bu las/ steng gi bar snang la bcom ldan 'das de bzhin
gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas phyi rab tu brkyang ba ri'i dbang po ri rab ltar/lha dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lham yin dang nam mkha' lding dang
pa ba ma tsa da ra lto 'phye chen po'i ring khor mad pa sa bskor ba/ byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs grongs med pas yongs su bskor ba/ phyogs thams cad du 'od zer gyi dra ba thogs pa med pas rgyas par
khyab pa'i sku bzhugs pa mthong ngo/ de bzhin gshegs pa de'i ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas kyang dri zhim rnam pa 'di lta bu byung ste/des kho mo'i lus dar sems tu bde bar na yodashin tu dga' ba

gyur te/ mal gyi steng nas langs nas sor ma bcu'i thal mo sbyar te sa la babs nas/ bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs la phyag 'tha tu bskyod ba de la phyag 'tshal te/ re'i spyi gtsug la bltas na'ang mtha'
thug par ma rung/ g.yas g.yon gyi tshad kyang zin par ma rung/ mtshan dang dpe byad phun sum tshogs pa la bsams na'ang ngoms par ma rung ste// 'i tshokho mos 'di snyam du bsams
la se las ji lta bu zhig byas na lus phun sum tshogs pa 'di lta bu ni 'thob par 'gyur/ mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pa phun sum tshogs pa ni skye bar 'gyur/ bod kyi rgyan phun sum tshogs pa ni 'byung
bar 'gyur/ 'khor phun sum tshogs pa ni 'grub par 'gyur/ yado kyi rang bzhin gyi gnas dang longs skyed phun sum tshogs pa ni 'byung bar 'gyur/ bsad nams phun sum tshogs pa na skye bar 'gyur/

'a ya shes phun sum tshogs pa ni rnam par dag par 'gyur/ tang de 'dzan gyi rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa phun sum tshogs pa ni yang dag par 'grub par 'gyur/ gzungs phun sum tshogs pa na yodas
su rdzogs par 'gyur/ spobs pa phun sum rtogs pa ni dbang du 'gyur snyam pa dang/ rigs kyi bu de nas bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa phyag rab tu bskyang ba des/ kho mo'i bsam pa thugs su chud nas
'di skad ces bka' stsal to// bu mo khyod kyis nyon mongs pa thams cad gzhes pa'i phyir thub pa med pa'i sems skyed nuge/ mngon par zhen pa thams cad bsal ba'i phyi'i 'pham pa med pa'i sems

bskyed cig/ chos zab mo tshul khad du chud par bya ba'i phyir zhum pa med pa'i sems skyed cig/ sems can bsam pa ma bzad pa dad ldan pa'i rgya mtsho'i klong dultung ngas ma bskul pa'i sems skyed cig/ srung/

'a0 pa'i lam gyi rgyud thams cad du skye ba'i skye mched du mgo rmongs pa med pa'i sems skyed cig/ sangs rgyas thams cad blta bar mos pa rgyun mi gcad pa'i phyir dems mi shes pa'i sems skyed cig/ sangs rgyas

thams cad kyi chos kyi spune yodas su gzung ba'i phu de chog mi shes pa'i sems skyed cig/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi tshul snang ba rtogs par bya ba'i phyire nges par rtogs pa'i sems skyed cig/ da btsan

gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor lo gzung pa'i phyir yang dag par gzung ba'i sems skyed nug/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal nas byung ba shes par bya ba lta la ca skyes kyi/ chud dun brdar byas pa tsam

la'ang 'khrul pa med pa'i ses skyed cag/ bu mo khyed kyis sems can rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du ches rin pa che rnam par dbye ba'i phyir/ rnam par dbye ba'i sems skyed med ces byung ste de lta

rigs kyi bu kho mos bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas phyag rab tung rkyang ba las chos kyi tshul gyi gdams ngag gi sgo rnam pa de lta bu dag thos nas

thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes la ni mngon par mos par gyur/stobs bcu'i rang bzhane la na mngon par smon par gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi gsung la ni mngon par dad pa ra gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi 'od kyi rgyan ni yongs su sbyang bar

dga'/ sangs rgyas kyi sku phun sum tshogs pa ni yongs su bsgrub par dga'/ sangs rgyas kyi mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po rnam par dag pa la ni mdon par mos par gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi 'khor gyi dkyilo gakhor
phun sum tshogs pa la ni mngon par snyan par gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag pa la ni mngon par dad par gyur/ sangs rgyas kyi spyod lam phun sum tshogs pa la ni mngon par

ma mos par gyur/ sang sa rgyas kyi sku tshe'i tshad phun su tshogs pa la ni mngon par dga' nas/ rdo rje ltar ri dang mtshon cha thams cad kyi mthus thub par dka' ba'i sems nyon mongs pa thams nyid dang/ nyan shes dang

sbyo rang sangs rgyas thams cad kyis ma phyed mi tshugs pa skyed de/ rigs kyi bu de nas nye bar bzud ba tshun chad du sems bskyed pa de'i mthus/ bskal pa 'a dzam bu'i glade gi rdul shan tu phra ba snyed cig tu yod kyi dgul

mtsho kyang 'dod pa la spyad par ma dran na/ gnyis kyi gnyis 'du ba lta ci snyes/ rigs kyi bu de nas nye bar bzung ba tshun chad du rang gi gnyen bshes la'ang bod bro ba'i sems cig ma bskyed na/ de ma yin pa'i sems can

nyes pa gzhan lta la ci smos/ de nas nye bar bzung ba tshun chad du bdag tu lta ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa gage tsal yang bskyed par ma dran na/ de ma ra ne pa'i yo byad gzhan la bdag gir byas te mde'o par
chags lta ci smos/ shi bo dang dpal na gnas pa'i tshel da nams rmongs pa 'am/ 'du shes sna tshogs sam/ lung du ma bstan pa' sems kyang spyad du sa dran//legs par bsanas shang lha ni skyes/ bskal

pa de snyed nug tu sangs rgyas gcig kyang rnyed du na rmi lam du mthong ba'i rnam par dmigs par yang rjes sum dran na/ byang chub sems dpa'i mag bcus mthong bar gyur pa lta ci smos/ de nas nye bar bzung ba tshun chad du

mtshab/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi swa'i yang dag par 'dzin kyang chud dun med du bya ba'i rnam pa tsam gyi chos kyi tshig dang yi ga gcig kyang brjen par mi dwanan/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i zhal gyi

mdzod nas byung ba lta ci smos/ de nas lte bar bzud pa tshun chad du chos kyi rgya mtsho'i snyed rdug 'thung 'thung yang rlung dun 'jig rten pa'i chos rnams 'tshig 'ga' yang ma bsams ma brtags par mi dran no/

nas nye bar bzung ba tshun chad du de snyed cag gas chos kyi tshulargya mtsho las kyang chung dun 'jig rten pa'i bzo'i rgyus dad tshul yod rung ste/ chos kyi tshul gyi sgo gang la'ang kho mos ting de 'dzani mngon par ma bsgrubs

pa de lta bu medad// de nas nye bar bzung ba tshun chad du de bzhin gshegs pa de snyed kyi chos kyi 'kher la bzung yang/ ji ltar yongs su bzung ba las/ sems na 'dul ba'i dbang du bya ba ma gtogs par chung du

na rjes su brgyud pa'i rgyu tsam gyi tshig dang yi ge 'ga' yang bor bar mi dran no// de nas nye bar bzung ba tshun chad du sangs rgyas rgya mtsho de snyed cig mthong yang/ chung du na sbrul pa'i sangs rgyas kyi smon lam gyi rgyud kyang rung ste/ smon

lama'aga'/ da kho mes sems can rgya mtsho thams cad rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir mngon par ma bsgrubs pa med do// de nas nye bar bzung ba tshun chad du sangs rgyas rgya mtsho de snyed cig gi sngon gyi byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa

rgya mtsho las byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa 'ga' tsam yang kho mos bdag gi spyod pa yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyir mngon par ma bsgrubs pa de lta bu mi tran no// de nas nye bar bzung ba tshun chad du sems can gang

btsal bya@#// kho mos ba med pa yang dag par rdzogs pab byang nub tu ma bskyal ba de lta bu gcig kyang mgeg lam du 'ongs par mi dran no// de nas nye bar bzung ba tshun chad du nyan thos dang rang rgyus yod

la bya ba dang ldan pa'i sems bskyed pa gcig kyang mngon par bsgrubs su ma dron no/rigs kyi bu de nas nye bar bzung ba tshun chad du bskal pa 'dzam bu'i gling gi rdulashan tu phra ba snyed cige len dang/ tshig dang yi ge 'ga'

la'ang the tsam bskyed pa'i m/ gnyis kyi 'du shes sam/ rnam par rtog pa'i 'du shes sam/ sna tshogs kyi 'du shes sam/ rab kyi 'du shes sam/ badrang ngan gyi 'du shes sam/ sdug mi sdug gi 'du shes bskyed du

mi dran/ (rigegs kyi bu kho me na de phyin chad du sangs rgyas byung ba dang ma bral la// sangs rgyas bam ldan 'dasa rnams dang ma bral la// byang chub sems dpa' rnams dang ma bral la// yang dag pa'i dag ba'i bshes//

gnyen rnams dang ma bral la// sangs rgyas kyi smon lam thes pa dang ma bral la// byang chub sems dang ba spyod pa thos pa dang ma la la// byang chub sems dpa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul thos pa dud ma bral la//

byang chub sems dpa'i sa yi shes snang ba'i tshul thos pa dang ma bral la// byang chub sems dang la gzungs dang tange de 'dzan ma brad pa'i mdzod dang gter thes pa thob pa dang ma bral le/ma' dang dbus med pa'i

'jig rten gyi khams kyi tre ba la 'jug cing khed du rnyed par bya ba'i tshul thos pa dang ma bral la// mtha' dang dbus med pa'i sems can gyi khams 'byung ba'i rgyu thos pa thob pa dang ma bralal//'gro ba thams cad

sa kyi nyon mongs pa'i dra ba'i dkyil 'khor yongs su zad par bya ba'i mi shes snyad bu dang ma bral lo// sems can thams cad kyi dag ba'i rtsa ba 'byed pa'i rgya'i sa shes thob pa dang ma bral la/sems na bums cad kyi

bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du lus yongs su ston pa dang ma bral lo// sems can thams cad shes par byed pa'i dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dang ba dang ma bral 'a// rigs kyi bu khe me byang nub sems dpa'i

rnam par thar pa'i sgro thub par dka' ba'i yid shes kyi snying po 'di dang/ chos thams cad yongs su btsal bas ma skyo ba'i rgyan gyi tade nga 'dzan gyi sgo 'di la snyoms par zhugs te/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa dpa'i sgo yi

dam la brtan pa 'di rnam par phye ba dang/ gzungs kyis chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyis bde dang/ stobs pa'i yo shes snang ba'i sgo ches kyi gan thams cad snad par brjed pa 'di rnamapar phye ba dang/ cho 'phrul
bsam gyis mi khyab pa yod na/ ragesakyi bu khyed mngon sum du blta bar 'dod dam/ smras pa/'phags ma batshal lo// de nas dge bsnyenaami g.yo ba ri ka de ltar 'dug bzhin du/ byang chub

gdams dpa'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo thub par dka' ba'i mi shes kyi snying ra la spegs pa dang/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad yod sa su btsal bas mi skyo ba'i rgyan la sogs pa dang/ rtache de 'dzin gyi sde den yod

pa'i dkyil 'khor gyi rgyan la segs pa dang/ ta'e de 'dzan gyi skye stobs bcu'i da shes kyi dkyil ga ler mngon du 'gyur ba la sogs pa dang/ tang de 'dzan gyi sgo sadas rgyas kyi rigs mi zad pa'i mdzod la sogs
pa tid de 'dzan gyi sgo brgya dastod phrag bcu la rnam par blta ba dang/ rnam par spyad pa dang/ rjes su 'jug pa dang/ nges par rtogs par byas so// de ltar dge bsnyen mam g.yo ba snyams par/

ya zhugs ma thag tu/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/ phyogs bcur 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa phrag banu'i rdul shan tu phra ba snyed pa drug tugayos pa dang/ bo zlum yongs su dag pa'i

sbyo rgyu las gyur par gnas par mtheng ngo// 'jig rten gyi khams re re'i klong bzhi pa bye ba phrag brgyabargyan/ de bzhi gshegs pa bye ba phrag brgya brgya bzhugs par mthong ste la la ni dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs

pa nas/ la la ni yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba mdzad pa'i bar du'ang mthong ngo// dbang 'jig rten gyi khams bai DUsla'i rang bzhin de dag yodongs su dag cing sgrub pa med pa'i phyir te/ de bde gshegs pa de dag so se

nas 'od zer dang/ 'od kyi de kyil bakhor ches kyi dpyangs thams cad durgyus par khyab par mnga' ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag so so'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'kher shan du rnam par phye ba rgya mtsho'ang mtheng ban
gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag re ra'i gsung gi dkyil 'khor chos kyi 'khor la thams cad rjod pa// sems can thams cad kyi rna lam du rnam par grog pa'id shes par gyur to// de nas dag

bsnyen mami g.yo ba tang de 'dzin de las langs nas/ tshod dpon gyi bu nerab 'das la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis mthong ngam/thos sa//shes sam/ smras pa/ 'a phag sa ma mthod de (thes so//

sa rig go/ rigs kyi bu kho mon de ltar byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yi dam brtan pa la slob cing/ chos thams cad yongs su btsal bas ma skye ba'i rgyan gyi ting de 'dzani la mnyam par gzhag ste/byang chub sems/

dpa'i rnam par thar pa'i sde thub par bka' bab de shes kyi sAde pa la gnas nas/ chos thams cad mnyam pa nyid kyi sa'i gzungs led du rgyud pa dang/ slogs pa ma shes snang ba chos kyi gzhi thams cad snang bar
brjod pa la mkhas pa'i legs par bshad pas/ sems can thams cad yongs su tshim par byed par zad na/khams byang chub sems dpa' yon tan tshad med pa bsam gyi mi khyab pa dang ldan pa rnamakha'i dbyings

la 'dab chags khyu mchog 'khod pa ltar gnas med par spyod pa// nam mkha' lding ga dbad pa chen po ltar yongs su snyan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' gdon pa'i phyir/ sems can thams cad kyi rgya mtsho la 'jug pa/

tshod pa ltar stobs bcu yi shes rin po che mngon par 'dod cing/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rin po che'i glod du rgyu ba/ mthu dang ldan pa'i rta pa ltar yad du 'od pa'i chos kyi dkyil 'khor gyi rgya dang ldan pa'i

lag pas srid pa'i chu las byung ba'i sems can yongs su snyane par mngon par gden pa'i phyir chos kyi rgya mtsho la rnam par sgrub/ lha'i dbad pa ltar nyon mongs pa'i lha ma yin gyi g.yul chen po gdul ba bslog

pa'i phyir khams gsum gyi gnas yongs su bkang zhing rnam par rgyab/ nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor ltar sems can gyi srid pa'i chu dang nyon mongs pa'i 'dam shani tu bsam pa'i phyir chos kyi de byings kyi namakha'i dpunges
la yang dag par 'phags pa// zla ba nya zhing rgyas pa ltar 'dul ba'i yid kyi me tog ku mud rnam par kha dbye ba'i phyir ye shes kyi nam mkha la mngon par shar ba/ sa'i gzhi ltar 'gro ba/
thams cad kyi dag ba'i dbod pa'i myu gu bskyed cing rnam par spel ba'i phyir byams mi byams dang/ mtho dman med par 'jig rten na mnyam par gnas pa rlung dmar ltar sems can thams cad kyi rten med//
pa dang/ lta ba'i shing dang/ shade dran gyi nags tshal dud kun dga' rtsa ba nas gnon pa'i phyir chags pa med par phyogs thams cad du rnam par rgyu khaM/ 'khor los sgyur ba ltar bsdu ba'i dngos pa'i

byad dang rkyen gyis 'gro ba thams cad yodas su bsdu bar phyir 'jab rtenan rnam par phyed pa de dgag spyod pa shes pa 'am/ yonan brjod par nus re skan/ sed rigs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid kyi shu la dga'/

'dzani tshad med pa na/ grong khyer dga' ba 'dzan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ den kun tu rgyuthams cad du bgro ba zhes bya ba 'dug gas/de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dang sa byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa
la bslab par bya ba dang/ jiltar nan tan du bya ba dris shage/ danas tshod dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/dag bsnyen ma ma g.yo ba'i nad pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ dag bsnyen ma mi ga lo la
lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas yang dang yang bltas te/dag bsnyen mami g.yo ba'i drung nas sad ngo// de nas tshong dpan gyi bu mo'i bzangs/ dag bsnyen ma ma g.yo ba mngon du

bka byas te/ dag bsnyen ma mi g.yo ba'i gdams ngag rjes su dran par byed cing/ dag bsnyenam ma g.yo bas bstan pa dang/ yang dag par bstan pa dad de bsgrags pa dang/ bshad pa dang/ brjod pa dang/ yang dag

par brjod pa dang/ bzhag pa dang/ rnam par phye ba dang smos pa dang/ rgya cher bstan pa de dag la thams cad gdon mi za bar yid ches shing rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang/ rjes su bsam pa dad/ khong du chun par
bya ba dang/ bsgom pa dang/ yongs su bsgom pa dang/ gzhan du mi 'gyur ba dang/ rtogs par bya ba dang/ snang bar bya ba dang/ mnyam par bya ba byed cing mthar gyis gnas nas gnas dad [7 ]yul nas yul du

brgyus rgyu zhade sod song nas/ yul dga' 'dzani tshad med pa gang na ba der phyin nas/ grong khyer dga' ba 'dzin pa rmad cung tshol tsho pa te/ shAm nub tu chapa zhage na grong khyen dag 'a ba 'dzin par phyin nas/

grong khyer dga' ba 'dzin pa'i nad du song ste/grong khyer gyi lam gyi bzhi mde'i dgus shag tu phyin nas// srang gi sgo nas srad gi sgo dad/ lam gyi bzhi mdo nas lam gyi bzhi mdo dang/ grong phra gnas grong phrug

tu kun du rgya thams cad du 'gro ba tshol zhade rmad rmod pa dad/ mtshan ma ma nyal tsam zhag na/grod khyer dga' ba 'dzazhi pa'i byang phyogs logs na ri shan tu med pa zhes bya ba zhig yod pa/ de'i rtse mo rtswa dang gal

dad sman sna tshogs dga' ltar skyes pas brgyan pa/'od chen po dang ldan pa nyi ma shar ba lta bur gnas pa mthong ngo// des snang ba de mthong nas dga' ba'i shugs chen pa skyes te/'di snyam du bsams so//
tha @#// bdag gis dge ba'i bshes gnyen ri'i rtse mo 'di la gdon mi za bar mthong bar 'gyur ba lta zhig snyam nas/grong khyer de nas byung ste rishani tu med pa ba/da na pa der phyin pa dang/ ri shin

ma tu med pa de la 'dzegs nas/ri'i rtse ma snang ba chen pa nun gang na ba der phyin pa dang/ rgyar yang ring po zhig nas/ kun tu skya thams cad du 'gro ba tshangs pa chen po las kyang lhag pa'i kha dog dang ldan pa/ dpal gyis/

shin tu 'bar ba zhage tshangs pa sted phrag bcus kun nas bskor tu 'chag sa na 'chag cing 'dug pa mthong nas/pa'i drung du phyin te/rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/de la lan brgya stod dumar ga yas

phyogs su bskor ba byas te/mdun du 'dug nas thal mo sbyar te 'di skad ces smras go/'ang ba gas pa bdag gis sla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byed chub tu sems bskyed na/ji ltar byed chub sems dpas

byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang/ ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'atsalAte/ 'phags pa ni byang chub sems s dpa' rnams la gdams dag dang rjes su bstan pa mdzad do zhes bdag gso the
na 'phags pa ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang/ ji ltar na tan du bgyi ba bdag la bshad du gsal/ smras parigs kyi bu de ltar khyed bla na

N+NaM med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang nub tu zhugs pa legs so legs so//rags kyi bu kho bo ni thams cad du 'gro ba ste/thams cad kyi rjes su seng ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la gnas pa'o//sge thams

bka cad du rnam par phyed pas snang ba'i tod de 'dzan gyi ske dang/ dngos po med pa la gnas pas mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rdzu 'phrul dang/ chos kyi dbyings kun gyi gzhir thug par thal ba'i shes rab kyi pha rol

tugyin pa'i yi shes snang ba'i sgo dang ldan pa'o//dges kyi bu de ltar kho bo ni sems can gyi snod kyi 'jig rten gyi rgyud thams cad dang/ sems can gyi lam gyi rgyud thams cad dang/ sems can gyi shi 'apa'i sgo

thams na dar/ gangs can gyi skye ba'i sgo thams cad dang/ srid pa'i lam gyi rgyud tha dad pa thams cad dang/ skye ba'i skye mched sna tshogs kyi 'jig rten gyi gnas rnam pa tha dad pa dag gi sems can kha dag dang/

dbyal sa dang chu zheng rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa/skye ba kun tu 'brel pa rnam pa sna tshogs dad ldan pa/ sbyor ba sna tshogs dang ldan pa//mos pa sna tshogs na 'di lta ste/lha'i lam gyi rgyud du gtogs pa dang/

klu lam gyi rgyud du gtogs pa dang/ gnod sbyin gyi lam gyi rgyud du ga togs pa dang/ driza'i lam gyi rgyud du gtogs pa dang/ lha ma yin gyi lam gyi rgyud du gtogs pa dang/ nam mkha' 'de gi lam rtsa rgyud du

gtogs pa dang mi 'am rtsa'i lam gyi rgyud du gtogs pa dang/ lto 'phye chen pa'i lam gyi rgyud du gtogs pa dang/ sems can dmyal ba'i lam gyi rgyud du gtogs pa dang/ byol song gi skye gnas kyi lam gyi rgyud du

gtogs pa dang/ gshin rje'i 'jig rten gyi lam gyi rgyud du gtogs pa dang/ mi'i lam gyi rgyud du gtogs pa dang/ mi ma yin pa'i lam gyi rgyud du gtogs pa dang/ lta ba'i rnam pa sna tshogs la gnas pa dang/ nyan thos/
gyi theg pa la mos pa dang//rang sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la mos pa dang/ theg pa chen po la mos pa'i sems can rnams kyi don thabs sna tshogs dang/ yid shes kyi tshul dang/ sbyor ba sna
tshogs kyis byed de/ 'di ltar sems can la la la na bze'irgyud tha dad pa thams cad dang ldan pa'i gzungs snang bas 'jig rten gyi bzo sna tshogs bslabs shadi don byed do// sems can la la la ni/ 'di
lta ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes bstabs pa'i phyir pasdu ba'i dngos pa bzhas yongs su bsdu ba'i thabs kyis don byed do// sems can la la la gi 'di lta ste/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du
'gyur ba'i shes kyi sga snang ba yongs su bskyed pas pha rol tu phyin pa yad dag par brjod cid don byed do// sems can la la la ni/ 'di lta ste/ byang chu ba kyi sa 'o chud ma za bar brtan zhing yongs
su bskyed pas byang chub sems dpa' sems yongs su brjod cade don byed do// sems can la la la ni/ 'di lta ste/ sangs rgyas gyi zhing thams cad yongs su dag par bya ba dang sems can thams cad
yongs su sma na par bya ba'i smon lam yodas su bskyed pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa rnam pa thams cad du yang dag par brjod pas don byed do// sems can la la lani/ 'di lta ste/ dan du

spyad pa'i rnam par sman pa dang 'thun pa'irgyus sems can dmyal ba'i lam gyi rgyud kyi sdug bsngal gyi tshor ba myod par 'gyur ba yongs su bstan pas skyo ba yongs su bskyed cade rten byed de// sems can la la

lan 'di lta ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa la bskyed pa'i yon tan thams cad ni gdon mi za bar thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi 'bras bu'i mthar thug par 'gyur ba brjod pas dga' ba chen pa bskyed tsadi don byed do//
sems can l la la ni/ 'di lta ste// sangs rgyas kyi yon tan dad sku la mdon par mos pas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du smon lam 'debs par bya ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yon tan dad
bsngags pa yang dag par brjod pas don byed de// sems can la la la ni/ 'di lta ste mi zugs de lhun gyis grub pa dang rgyun chad pa med par sangs rgyas kyi 'brazhi las nan tan du mdzad pa'i mthu dang
ldan pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku 'thob par mes pa bskyed pa'i ra/ sangs rgyas kyi bdag nyid che ba brjod pas don byed do// sems can la la la ni/ 'di lta ste/ rkus zal gyis gnon la phas sbal rgyas mi

non pa'i sangs rgyas kyi sku phun sum tshogs pa 'thob par mos pa bskyed pa'i phyir/ sangs rgyas kyi mnga' chen pa yongs su brjod cade den byed de// rigs kyi bu gzhan yang kho bo ni grong khyer dga' ba 'dzan pa
di'i bzhi mdo'i phongs thams cad dad/ srung thams can dang/ lam gyi sum mdo thams cad dang/ grong mtshams thams cad dad/ khyim thams cad dang// mthun par 'dus pa'i rdal thams cad dang/
grod thams cad dang/ grong gi rgyud thams cad du rnam pa ji ltar tshogs shade 'dus pa'i bud med dang/ skyes pa dang/ khyashu dad bu ma rnams kyi bsam pa ji lta ba dad/ sbyor ba ji lta ba dad mthu ji
lta ba dang/ rnam par spyod pa ji lta ba bzhi du de dag dang mthun pa'i lus kyi chu zheng dang dbyibs mngon par bsgrubs shade chos ston kyang sems can de dag gis de sus bstan pa

ma dad [0f10 ]de ga las 'ongs pa mi shes te/ gzhan du na thos nas ma nor bar nan tan du byed pa ni med pa'i ng ma yin no// gzhan yang rigs kyi bu 'dzam bu'i glang 'dran zhags pa 'a thub pa lta ba rnam pa sna tshog l
mngon par zhen pa dgu bcu rtsa drug bamed pa de dag thams cad kyi nad du'ad sems can lta ba'i rnam pa sna tshogs la chags pa rnams yongs su sman par bya ba'i phyir thams cad dang mthun par gnas te/

rigs kyi bu ji ltar kho bo grong khyer dga' ba 'dzan pa 'di na sems can gyi don byed cad 'dug pa de bzhin du/ 'dzam bu'i gling ga gleng dang/ grong khyer dang/ ldedas dang/ yul dang/ khams dang/ rgyal

pa'i pho brad 'khor thams cad na'ang sems can gyi don byed do// 'dzam bu'i glingan ji lta ba de bzhan du gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad dang/ de bzhin du steng dad/ steng gnyis pa dang/
stong gsum gyi stod chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams dad/ de bzhin du phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams sems can gyi rten du bya ba thams cad dang sems can gyi gnas su bya ba thams cad dang 1 sems
can gyi gzhi'i bya ba thams cad dang ( sems can gyi khams su bya ba'amod du gtogs pa thams cad dang/ sems can yodas su rgyu ba thams cad dang/ sems can yongs su 'du ba thams cad dang/
sems can rgya mtsho gnas pa thams cad dang/ sems can gyi rgyud gnas pa thams cad dad sems can gyi phyogs su bya ba thams cad dod/ sems can gyi phyogs mtshams su bya pa tham cad dang/
sems can spyod pa'i gnas thams cad du'ang thabs sna tshogs dang/ tshul sna tshogs dang/ sgo sna tshogs dang/ rigs pa sna tshogs dang/ phrad pa sna tshogs dang/ thabs kyi tshul sna tshogs dang/
bya pa sna tshogs kyis sems can rnams kyi don byed do// gzugs dang kha dog sna tshogs yongs su bstan cid mes par bya ba dang/ tshig gi lam sna tshogs brjod pas kyang sems can rnams kyi don byed do//

rigs kyi bu kho bos na byang chub sems dang ba spyod pa thams cad du 'gro ba thams cad kyi rjes su sad pa 'di shes par zad na/ kho bas byang chub sems dpa' 'gro ba thams cad dang mnyam pa'i lus dang ldan
pa bdag dad sems can gyi lus su tha mi dad pa'i ting nge 'dzani theb pa/ 'phrul pa'i 'khor lo rgya chen pos srid pa lam gyi rgyud thams cad du khyab pa// 'jig rten gyi skye ba thams cad rang gi lus
la rjes su byed pa// 'gro ba thams cad kyis bstan dga' zhing yid du 'ong ba'i sprul pa'i 'khor la la brtson pa// 'gro ba thams cad kyi roge sa dad/ rgyud dang/ rtsor skye ba rab tu ston pa bskal
da thams cad du gnas pa la thogs pa med pa'i smon lam gyi 'a khor 'bo dar ldan pa/ mag 'phrul lta bu'i sred pa rnam par phye ba'i snang ba rab tu thob pa// 'gro ba thams cad kyi den byed kyang gos pa
med par gnas pa la brtson pa// dus gsum gyi 'gro ba'i dbyings mnyam pa nyid du khong du chud pa/ yashis kyi dbyinges bdag med pa dang ldan pas snang bar byas pa'i sAde rje chen po/
mtha' yas pa'i sAd pa dang ldan pa// 'gro ba thams cad kyi dag pa'i rtsa ba yongs su bskyed pa la mngon par brtson pa de dag gi spyod pa shes pa 'am/ yon tan brjod par nus re skan/ sod rigs kyi bu

lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'de nyid na/ yul khams chen po zhes bya ba yod de/ de na spos 'tshong gi tshod dang na ledas spyod ut+pal zhes bya ba 'dug gis/ 'i gan du sad la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang
chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang/ ji ltar nan tan du bya ba drase shig/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nen bzad s kyis kun tu rgyu thams cad du 'gro ba'i rkang pa gnyis la snga bas
phyag 'tshal te/ kun tu rgyu thams cad du 'gro ba la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas yang dang yang bltas te/ kun tu rgyu thams cad du 'gro ba'i drung nas gdod do/
nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs lus dang srog la mi lta/ srid pa'i legs byed dang/ yodas su brin pa dang/ chupar blangs pa mngon par chags pa'i gnas thams cad la mi lta/ sems can
zla gyi yul gyi dga' ba thams cad la ni mi lta/ gzugs dang/ sgra dang/ dri dang/ re dang/ reg bya thams cad la ni mi lta/ g.yog 'khor dang/ 'das spyod dad/ nye bar spyad pa thams cad la mi

ba[p]lta ste/ rgyal srid dad dbang phyag gi dbad ga bde ba thams cad la ni mi lta 3/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing bla na med par medangs su dag pa mngon par bsgrubs pas// sems can thams cad yongs su smin par
bya ba dang gdul ba dang 1 yongs su dag par bya ba la lta ba/ mchod pa dang/ bsnyen bkur dang/ rim gror bya bas mi ngoms pas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la lta ba dang/ rang bzhin med

pa yongs su shes pa'i yid shes khod du chud par bya pa'i phyir chos thams cad la lta ba/ so na tan rgya mtsho thams cad kyi den dunan tan bya ba las nyams pa med par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dang/
yon tan thams cad la lta ba dang/ bskal pa thams cad du byed chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la yang dag par gnas par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyi smo na lam chen po
la lta ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho thams cad du 'jug par bya ba la lta ba/ tade de 'dzin gyi sgor rer byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzani grangs med pa thams cad
gzud pa la rnam par 'phrul par bya ba'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad la lta ba/ de bzhin gshags pa thams cud kyi chos kyi 'khor la yang dag par gzud pas/
mi dems par bya ba'i phyir chos kyi yi shes snad pa'i 'khor lo thams cad la lta ba de/ sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i yon tan 'di dag dad ba zhan dag kyang dag ba'i bshes gnyin las
mtha @#// byang ba ste/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni de dag thams cad kyi 'byung gnas su gyur pa yin par yang dag par lta zhing/ mthar gyis yul khams chen pa gang na ba der phyin nas//

ma skyes 'tshod ga tshod dpan longs srid ut+pal yongs su smad cing tshol tshel ba las mtheng nas spos 'tshong gi tshong dpon 'dis spyod sud+ma la gang na ba der phyin te/ drung du song nas skyes 'tshod ga tshod dpano

phyi1 ledas spyod ut+pala'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te// sdus 'tshong gi tshong dpon longs spyod sut+pal la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ spyos 'tshod ga tshod dpan
longs spyad ut+pala'i mdun du 'jug ste thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa bdag sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam pa'i yid shes kha tshal Sha/ sangs rgyas thams cud kyi sde
gyi smon lam gyi dkyil 'khor yongs su rdzogs par bgyi bar yang dga'/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi sku yodas su grub par bya bar yod dga'/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi yi/ shes
rgyu kyi sku yongs su btsal bar bgyi bar yang dga'/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor thams cad yongs su dag par bgyi bar yang dga'/ khyad chub sems dpa' de de 'dzin gyi dkyil
'khor thams cad snyad bar bgyi bar yang dga'/ byang chub sems dpa'i gzungs kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad yongs su brtan par yad dga' sgrib pa'i dkyile 'khor thams cad a par
mtha gtod bar yod dag2/ zhang gi dkyil 'khor thams cad du rnam par rgyu bar yang 'tshal nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs nga 'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs na/ ji ltar byang chub sems
dngas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang/ ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba dang/ ji ltar nan tan du bgyis na byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'byung bar 'gyur bam
tshal te// smras pa// rigs kyi bu de ltar khyod kyis blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa legaso legs so// rtags kyi bu khe bas na skyes
thams cad shes te// skyes sbyar ba thams cad dang/ bdug spos thams cad dang/ bdug spos sbyar ba thams cad dang/ byug pa thams cad dang [7 ]byug pa sbyar ba thams cad dang/ phyi ma thams
cad dad/ bye ma sbyar ba thams cad dad/ spos dang/ byug pa dang/ phye ma'i rnam pa thams cad kyang shes rta lha'i spos kyadangashas so// klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lham yan dang/
nam mkha' ldade dang / ma 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po dang/ mi dad/ mi ma yin pa'i spus kyang shes sa/ nad gso ba'i spos dang/ yi dam bde ba bsal ba'i spos dang/ 'jig rten gyi
dga' po yodas su bskyed pa'i spus dang/ nyon mdas pa 'bar bar bya ba'i spos dang/ nyon mongs pa bzhi bar bya ba'i spos dang/ 'dus byas kyi dga' ba dad bde ba sna tshogs yongs su bskyod/
dpa'i spos dang/ 'dus byas thams cad las skyo ba yongs su bskyod pa'i sposadad/ bag bya ba'i gnas thams cad yodadasasu sel ba'i spus dang/ sangs rgyas yid la
bya ba'i rgyud yang dag par 'byung ba'i spos dang/ chos kyi tshul bod du chud par bya ba'i spos dad/ 'phags pas spyad pa'i spos dang/ byang chub sems dpa' spros rnam pa tha dad pa dang/ byad
lci chub sems dpa'i sa thams cad rnam par dgod pa'i skyes kyang shes taM/ kho bos spros de dag thams cad rnam pa ji lta bu 'od rab tunyis so// 'byung ba dang/ skye ba dad/ 'grub pa dang/ yongs
su rdzogs pa dang/ yongs su dag pa dang/ yongs su spang ba dang/ rab tu sbyar ba dang// dongs su spyad pa dang/ yul dang mthu dang/ las dang/ rgyu'ad rab tushes sa/ rigs kyi bu mi

'jig rtenan spes glang po'i snyade pe'i zhes bya ba klu yodas su 'khrug par byed pa yod de/ de'i ro lu la kyi 'bru tsam gyis kyang yul khams chen pa thams cad spos kyi spyan gyi dra ba shan tu sdug pas
@# kun nas khebs par gyur te/ zhag bdun duspos chu'i rgyun shin tuphra ba'i char mngon par 'bab bo// de'i tshe sems can su'i lus sam/ gos la spos chu'irgyun de dag gis bab par gyur pa de rag
thams cad kyang/ me tog gser gyi kha dog tu 'dug pas rnam par brgyan pad gas dang lus su 'gyur ro// khad pa dang/ gzhal med dang/ khang pa brtsigs pa gang du bab par gyur pa de dag thams

ma007 cad kyang/ me tog gser gyi kha dog lta bu s rnam par brgyan par gnas so// sems can khyae gyi nang na gnas par gang gis/ spos kyi sprin gyi dra ba de la rlung gis mngad pa'i dri tshor bar gyur pa de dag
thams cad kyang zhag bdun du dga' ba dang/ mos ra chen pos yongs su rgyus par 'gyur te/ lus dang sems la bde ba dang dga' ba sna tshogs kyang rab tu skyed bar 'gyur ro// de dag gi lus/
'bad khams 'khrugs pa las gyur pa 'am/ gzhan gyis gnod par byas pa las gyur pa'i nad kyang 'byung bar 'gyur ba med de/ sems kyi sdug bsngal dang mi bde ba'ang mi 'byung ngo// 'jig
pa bas/ sdad ba 'am/ bag tsha ba 'am/ yi de 'khrug pa 'am/ gnod sems kyang mi rgyu ste/ de dag thams cad zhag bdun du dga' ba dang bde ba skyes te gcig la gcig byams pa'i sems su
'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu kho bo ni de dag de ltar dga' ba dang nyams bde ba skyes pa rnams la bsam pa dag par bya ba'i phyir/ can s kyang bla na med pa yad dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu des par
'gyur ba de ltar chos ston te// gzhan yang rags kyi pu ra ma la ya las byung ba'i tsan dan sa stengs dam pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de lus la bskusan/ me'i 'obs su mchongs kyang tshag pa med de/
rigs kyi bu rgya mtsho'i mtha' nas 'byung ba'i spres gzhan gyis thub pa med pa zhis bya ba yod de/ 2sa rda'am dung la bskus na de'i sgyus gzhan gyi khor thams cad pham par 'gyur// rigs kyi bu
[7/]mtsho ma dros pa'i dogs nas 'apyad ba'i a ka ru nag pe pad+meb snyade pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de'i ri lu til gyi 'bru tsam gcig gi dras kyang 'dzam bu'i gling thams cad rgyas par gang

bar gyur te[？ ]sems can gad gas skyes kyi dri de tshor ba de dag thams cad kyang sdig pa la skyed cing sdem pa'i sems rab tu 'thob par 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu ri'i rgyal dang kha ba can las 'byung ba'i
skyes kyi rnam pa 'od dang ldan pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de'i dri rtsor na sems sa de dag 'dod chags dang bral ba'i sems su 'gyur te/ kho ban de dag la ci nas kyang rdul dang bral ba'i dkyil 'khor nus

bya ba'i tid de 'dzin thob par 'gyur ba de ltar chos sten te// rages kyi bu sun par 'jig rten nas 'byang ba'i spes kyi rnam pa rgya mtsho'i snyade pa zhes bya ba yod de/ de ni 'khor las sbyar ba'i ledas
spyod kyi den du 'byung ste/ des po dugs ma thag tu 'khor los sgyur pa'i rgyal po'i dang da ge tshegs yan lag bzhi pa'i ng nas mkha' dbyings la gnas so// rigs kyi bu lha'i 'khor chos bzad
pa nas 'byud pa'i sres kyi nus pa rnam par 'byed pa zhes bya pa yod da/ des bdugs pa thag tu lha rnams sangs rgyas kyi dri zhim po dran par 'gyur ro// gas kyi bu lca'i rgyal par ba mtshama'i
gnas ni spos kyi rnam par dag pa'i mdzod ces bya pa med dedes bdugs ma thag tu sa me lha'i bu thams cad/ lha'i rgyal po rab mtsho ma'i drung du 'dod de// de dag der phyin nas kyang lha'i
rgyal pa rab mtshams chos kyi gtam bya'o// rigs kyi bu dga' ldan gyi gnas na spes kyi rnam pa sa 'du ba ra zhes bya ba yod de/ dar spes kyi dud pa byang chub sems dpa' tshog tsug gis thag
pa chos kyi stan la 'dug pa'i mdun du spyad na/ skyes kyi sprin chen pas ches kyi dbyangs thams cad rgyas par gang zhade de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor thams cad du rgyan rnam
pa sna tshogs dad ldan pa'i spos kyi sprin chen pa'i char rab tu nga ba pa// rigs kyi bu lha'i rgyal po rab 'phrul dga'i gnas na spes kyi rnam pa de 'brog ra zhes bya ba yod de/ sa lha'i rgyal
pa rab 'phrul dga'i gnas su bdugs na/ zhag bdun du chos kyi sprin gyi char bsam gyis mi khyab pa 'bab par 'gyur ro// dge sa kyi bu (kho bsan sres sbyar pa de shes su zad na/ kho bos byang chub
sems dpo' skyon gyi dri ma med pa 'dod pa'i 'jig rten thams cad nas rgyan du 'phags pa// nyin mangs pa'i bdud kyi zhags pa dad bral ba/ srid pa'i lam gyi rgyud thams cad las shin tu 'das pa/
yi shes sgyuma'i rnam pa dang gzugs kyis rnam par spyod pa/ 2 'jig rten thams cad kyis gos pa med pa// chags pa med pa'i dang tshul can sgrub pa med pa'i yi shes kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa/
thogs pa med pa'i yid shes kyi spyod yul dang yul du ldan pa// kun gzhi'i gnas thams cad la ma gnas par srid pa'i kun gzhi dang gnas thams cad du rgyu ba rnams kyi spyod pa shes pa 'am/ yon tan
brjod pa 'am/ tshul khrims kyi spyod pa rnam par dag pa'i sgo yongs su smos pa'i m/ kha na ma tho ba med pa'i spyod pa brjod pa bam/ gnod par spyod pa med pa'i lus dang/

dag dang/ yid kyi rgyud bstan pa/ra nus re skan/ sad rags kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na/ grong khyer khad pa brtsi gas pa zhes bya ba yod de/ da namanyan pa dpa' bo zhes bya ba 'dug gas/ dkaM
drud du gtod la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang/ ji ltar nan tan du bya badris shog/ de nas tshong dpan gyi bu nor bgrangs kyis
sngos 'dod gi tshod dpan longs spyod ku la'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ spos 'tshong gi tshong dpon longs spyod ut+pal la lan brgya skyed dumar g.yas phyogs su bskur ba byas nas
yang dang yang bltas te/ skyes 'tshong gi tshong dpon 'angs spyod ut+pa la'i drung nas gang de de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzadus grong khyer khang pa brtsi gas pa ra 'gro ba'i lam du 'jug
pab tsho lam gyi gyen thur dang/ 'am mnyam pa dang/ lam gyi theg thub dang/ lam rdul yod pa dang/ lam rdul med pa dang/ lam bde ba dang/ lam mi bde ba dang lam deb pa dang/ lam
pa bgegs med pa dang/ lam 'khrug pa dang/ lam 'khrug pa med pa la rnam par spyad de bltas nas 'di snyam du bsams so// 'di ltar bdag dag ba'i bshes gnyen de'i drung du 'gro ba 'di ni byad ba
sams dpa' lam gya nan tan gyi rgyur 'gyur ro// pha rol tu phyin pa'i lam gyi nan tan gyi rgyur 'gyur re/ sems can la phan gdags pa'i lam gyi nan tan gyi rgyur 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad byamA
sdang dang mtho dman du gyur pa'i g.yang sa las rnam par bzlog pa dang/ sems can thams cad mi mnyam nga 'a nan tan las bsgyur ba dang/ sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa rdul rab tu zhi bar
bya ba dang/ sems can thams cad kyi mi dag ba'i lta ba sna tshogs kyi sded dus dang/ tsher ma dang/ gyo ma dang/ gseg ma bsal ba dang/ chos kyi dbyangs bsgrubs pa med pa la gzhol bar bya ba/
dad thams cad mkhyen pa'i pho brang du thogs pa med par bskyal ba'i rgyun 'gyur ro// de nyid de phyir zhe na/ dag ba'i bshes gnyen na dag ba'i chos thams cad kyi 'byung gnas sa// dge ba'i
bshes gnyen la ni thums cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rig lus so zhes/ de de ltar sems shing yid la byed pas spyod pa thub par dka' ba de mthar gyis sred khyer khang pa brtsigs pa der phyin nas/ mnyan

pa dpa' bo yodas su ched 'di tshol tshol ba las/ grong khyer chen po zhig gi sgergya mtsho chen pa'i ngogs na mnyan pa dpa' bo de tshod pa brgya phrag stod tsam dang/ srog chags brgya stod du ma gas sna tshegs
tan dpar 'dod pa sha stag gcig gas kun nas bskor cade rgya mtsho'i gtam yongs su brjod pas 2 sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rgya mtsho sems can rnams la sten cing 'dug pa mthong ngo/ mthong nas kyang
mnyan pa dpa' bo gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/mnyan pa dang 'a bo'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ mnyan pa dpa' bo la lan brgya stod du mar g.yas phyogs su/
bskor ba byas nas/ mnyan pa dpa' bo'i mdun du bdug ste thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras sa// 'phags pa bdag gso bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu bsems bskyed/
jiltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang/ jaltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma'atsal te/ 'phags pa na byad nub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang
rjes su bstan pa mdzad do zhes bdag gas thos na/ 'phags pa ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang/ ji ltar nan tan du brgya la bdag la
bka' stsal du gsa'o/// smras pa// rigs kyi bu khyod kyis de ltar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ yi shes chen pa 'thob pa 'byud bi rgyu'i

dra ba dang/ 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal sna tshogs kyi rgyud 'byung ba'i rgyu dang/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi slong gi gnas su 'gro ba 'byung ba'i rgyu dad/ dbyer med pakhrig pa'i theg pa chen pa 'byung ba'irgyu dang/

nyan thos dad rad sangs rgyas kyi sar ltung bas 'jigs pa dang bralaM bar 'gyur ba'i lam gyi nan tan 'byung ba'i rgyu dang/ zhi ba'i [“]tod de 'dzin gyi sgo dang rgyud sna tshogs khong du chud par bya ba'i

[pF]shes kyi lam 'byung ba'i rgyu dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod spyod pa thams cad du 'gro bas rnam par spyad pa'i smon lam gyi shang rta'i 'khor le thogs pa med pa'i lam 'byung ba dang/ rnam par dag
par 'gyur ba'i rgyud da/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i gzi brjid kyi dba' rlabs kyis rnam par brgyan pa thams cad kyi rang bzhin dang tshul gyi lam 'byung ba dang/ rnam par dag par 'gyur ba'i
rgyu dang/ chos kyi phyogs dang sgo thams cad kyi phyi ma'i mtha' lam 'byud ba dang/ rnam par dag par 'gyur ba'i rgyu dang/ thams cad mkhyen pa ti rgya mtshor 'jug pab lam 'byung ba dad/ rnam par dag
par 'gyur ba'i rgyu 'dri ba legs so legs so// rigs kyi bu kha ba ni mtsho'i ngogs kyi grong khyer khang pa brtsigs pa 'di na/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa snying rje chen po'i rgyal mtshan yongs su
sbyong zhing gnas to/ rigs kyi bu kho bo ni 'dzam bu'i gling gi sems can 'phangs pa rnams mthong nas/ de dag gi den du dka' ba spyad de/ da dag gi bsam pa yongs su rdzogs par bya'o// 'jig
na gyi thad bde gas yongs su bsdu bar bya'o// chos kyi 'das spyod kyis de dag yongs su nad par pu'o// de dag la bsod nams kyi tshigs kyi lamaman ngag tu bstan par bya'o// se shis kyi
tshogs rnam par spel bar bya// dag ba'i rtsa ba'i stobs yongs su spel bar byago/ byang chub kyi sems bskyed par bya'o// byang chub kyi bsam pa rnam par dag par bya'o// snyade rje chen
pa'i stobs nye bar brtan par bya'o// 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal rnam par zhi bar bya'o// 'khor ba'i spyod pas yongs su ma skye ba'i stobs hani tu bstan par bya'o// san/sa/

can rgya mtsho bsdub 'a 'dag sbyar bar bya'o// yon tanargya mtsho'i nan tan gyi skye la dgod par bya'o// 'di dag la chos rgya mtsho'i ye shes snang ba nye bar bsgrub par bya'o// sangs rgyas rgya mtsho thams cad

kyang 'di dag gis mngon par mthong par bya'o/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rgya mtsho la'ang 'ad dag gzud par bya'o zhes de lta bu'i bsam pa dang ya de la byed pa la brtson par kho bo rgya mtsho'i ngogs kyi gleng

khyer khang pa brtsegs pa 'di na gnas so// dges kyi bu lo po ni de ltar 'a gro ba la phan pa dang bde bar brtson pas rgya mtsho chen pa'i rin po che'i gling thams cad kyad shes sa// rin pa'i 'byung gnas
thams cad dad/ ran pa ma'i rigs thams cad dang/ rin pa ma gtos thams cad kyang rab tu shes sa// klu'i gnas thams cad dwang/ glu 'khrug pa thams cad dang/ gnod sbyin gyi gnas
thams cad dang/ gnod spyan 'brug pa thams cad dang/ sAn pa'i gnas thams cad dang/ sun pa'i 'jigs pa thams cad rab tu zhi bar bya ba dang/ 'byung pa'i gnas thams cad dang/ 'byung
pa'i bar chad rnam par zhi bar bya ba'ang rab tu zhes te/ gled yod pa thams cad dang/ gleng thams cad bkol ba dang/ dpa' rabs chen po yongs su spangs pa dang/ nub kha dag rnam pa tha dad pa'i ng
[#]rab tugs sa// nyi zla dang gza' skar gyi tshogs yongs su 'khor ba dang/ nyin zhag dang/ skad cage dang yud tsam dad/ thad gcig kyang rab tu shes sa// phan tshun du 'gro ba'i shol 'dums
dang bde ma bad dang/ grub 'khrul 'kher brtan par bya ba dang/ gru bzurab dang/ gru phul ba dang/ rlung brdzob dang/ rlung bskyed pa dang/ gru bsgyur zhing bzlog pa dang/ gru brjod pa dang/ gru
gtad ba'ang rab tu shes sa// rigs kyi bu de ltar kha ba ni nges pa de lta bu dad ldan pas/ rtag tusems can gyi don dang dgos pa byed de/ tshong pa'i tshogs gru brtan pas lam bde zhad che kor mi
'gyur la/ ma 'jigs pa nas chos kyi gtam gyis dga' ba dang/ spyob bskyed rung bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rin pa nas gling du phyin par byas nas/ de dag rin po che thams cad kyis chog sta phun
sum tshogs par 'gyur ba dang/ phyir yang 'dzam bu'i ging du 'gyer 'gyed kyang/ rigs kyi bu kheng ba kun nam yang bub pa 'am/ nye zhor gyur ma myong ste/ sems can gang gas khe bo mthong bar gyur pa
dang sems can gang gis kho ba'i chos bstan pa thos pa de dag kyang 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho thams cad du nye zhir 'gyur ba'i 'jigs pa dang bral bar 'gyur ro// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi mtshon
'jug pa'i yi shes kyang mngon sum du 'gyur ro// sred pa'i rgya mtsho bskam pa'i don du'ang rab tu 'jug par 'gyur ta/ dus gsum rgya mtsho'i ya shes snad pa 'ang rab tu 'thob bo// sems
ge ]can thams cad kyi sdug bsngal rgya mtsho zad par bya ba'i phyir yang mngon par mos par 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad kyi sems rgya mtsho'i rtog pa dad bar bya ba'i phyir
yad rab tu brtson par 'gyur ro// zhing rgya mtsho thams cad rnam par dag par bya ba'i phyir yang brtson 'grus rtsom par 'gyur ro// phyogs mtsho thams cad rgyas par dgad pa las khyad phyir mi
ldog par 'gyur ro// 'gro ba thams cad kyi dbad pa rgya mtsho tha dad pa'i ng khod du chud par 'gyur ro// sems can thams cad kyi spyod pa rgya mtsho'i rjes su'ang 'bad bar 'gyur ro// 'gro ba'i
bsam pa rgya mtsho ji lta ba bzhan dubang gzugs brnyan 'byung bar 'gyur ro// rigs kyi bu kho bo ni byang chub sems dang ba rnam par thar pa mthong ba dang/ thos pa dang/ 'grogs pa dang/ rjes
su dran pa'i chu klung gi dbyangs shes bya pa thob par zad na kho bos byang chub sems dpa' 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho thams cad du rnam par spyod pa// nyon mdos pa'i rgya mtsho thams cad kyis gos pa med

pa lta ba'i rnam pa'i rgya mtsho thams cad kyi chags pa'i chu sun gyi 'a jigs pa dang bral ba chos rgya mtsho thams cad kyi rang bzhane dang gzhi las rnam par rgyu ba/ 'gro ba rgya mtsho thams cad bsdu
ba'i dngos pos yongs su sdud pa'i rgya mtsho dang ldan pa// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi rgya mtsho dang 'grogs pa// sems can gyi mngon par chags pa btsumatsho thams cad rab tu grub pa//
sam dus rgya mtsho thams cad tha mi dad par rnam par spyod pa/ 'gro brgya mtsho thams cad yongs su snyan par bya ba'i dmigs shes pa// 'gro ba rgya mtsho thams cad kyi 'dul ba'i dbus las mi 'da'/

ba de dag gi spyod pa shes pa 'am/ yon tan brjod par nus re skan/ sed rags kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid na/ grong khyer dga' ba'i 'phreng ba zhes bya ba yod de/ de na tshong dpon rgyal ba dam pa/
zhes bya ba 'dug gas/ de'i gan du song la ji ltar byed chub sems dang/sa byang chub dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang/ ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig/ de nas tshong dpon
gyi bu nor bzangs kyis// mnyan pa dang/ ba sogs nang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag byas nas/ mnyan pa dpa' bo la lan brgya steng du mas g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas te/ yang dang yang bltas nas
gdongamanyis bkang ste du zhang dag pa'i bshes gnyen blta bas mi ngoms bzhin du/ mnyan pa dpa' bo'i drung nas sang nga/ bam pa dgu bcu bdun pa//
de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzungs byams pa chen pos sems can gyi khams tshad med pa rgyas par dgang ba'i sems dang ldan pa// snyade rje chen po'i rgyan gyis mngon par brgyan pa'i/
rgyud can/ bsod nams dang ye shes kyi tshogs rgya chen po'i rgyan shani tu bsags pa// nyon mdas pa'i rdul dang/ mun pa dang/ dri ma dad/ 'dam thams cad dang bral ba[7 ]chos mnyam
[q ] pa nyid bod du chud pas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi las gyen thur med pa la zhugs pa/ dag ba'i ches tshad med pa la 'jug pa'i sgor zhugs pa/ ]me da ga ba thams cad
la kyis ma shags pa'i brtson 'grus brtan pab mthu ldan du 'dor ba dang ldan pa// byang chub sems dpa'i tang de 'dzani bsam gyis ma khyab pa rab tu byad ba/ rgya chen po'i bde ba thob pa/ shes rab
kyi nye ma'i 'od zer snang bas ma rigar ba mun pa ma lus par bsal ba/ thabs kyi ser bu bde zhade bsal bas blugs pa'i ye shes me tog gso rgyas pa/ sman lam chen de'i rgya mtshor 'byung ba'i

TathaM yashes kyi tshul dang mthun pa// chos kyidabyanges thams cad du thogs pa med par rgyas par bgangs pa'i yongashas dang ldan pa// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi pho brad du thogs pamed par 'gro ba le mngon

du gyur pa// byang chub sems dpa'i lam la mngon par mos pa de grong khyen dga' ba'i 'phred ba gang na ba der phyin te/ tshod dpon rgyal ba dam pa yongs su rmed cade tshol tshol ba las/ grong khyer dga'
ba'i 'phred ba'i shar phyogs legs kyi 'dab gtsag na/ shang a sho ka'i nags tshal rgyal mtshan sna tshogs shes bya ba 'dug pa de'i nang na/ khyim bdag stong phrag dum zhag gis bskor te/ grong
khyer gyi bya ba sna tshogs yongs su bgro zhing de las brten te/ bdag tu bya ba thams cad yang dag par gzhom pa dang/ yongs su 'dzan pa thams cad yongs su gtang ba dang/ dngos par 'dza'i pa
0 thams cad rab tu sdang ba dang/ mngon par zhen pa thams cad shin tu gzhag pa dang/ srid pa'i 'chad ba thams cad gcad par bya ba dang/ lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad kyi sgo glegs gcag pa dang/
thu tsam dang/ yid gnyis dang/ nem nur gyi rab rab thams cad rnam par bsal ba dang/ g.yo sgyu'i rtog pa shan tu 'dang ba dang/ phrag dog dad ser sna'i drim yongs su sbyangs pa dang/ sems
kyi mtsho shan tu gsal bar bya ba dang/ sems rnyog pa med pa la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang/ dad pa rnyog pa med pa'i stobs bskyed de sangs rgyas blta bar mes pa skyed pa dang/ byang chub sems
dba'i stobs bsngags shing sangs rgyas kyi chos yang dag par blang pa dang 2 byang chub sems dang 'i spyod pa smos te/ byang chub sems dang 'i tade de 'dzin gyi stobs yongs su bskyed pa dang/ byang
chub sems dpa'i shes rab kyi stobs yang dag par bstan cade/ byang chub sems dpa' dran pa'i stobs rnam par dag pa'i mthar phyin par bya ba'i phyir/ chos kyi gtam byed cing 'di lta ste/
byang chub tu sems bskyed pa la mngon par mos par bya ba'i phyir chos ston tsade 'dug pa mthong ngo// da nus tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzad s kyis gtam de'i rjes chad chad du bsdad
nas tshod dpon rgyal ba dam pa'i rkang pa gnyis la skye bos phyag 'tshal te/ red ma zhig tu bdud nas/ chos la shin tu gus pa'i bsam pas tshig 'di skad du brjod do// 'phags pa/
ba// bdag ni nor bzangs nor bzangs shes bgyi pa ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa yongs su tshol na/ ci nas kyang bdag byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la slob par
'gyur ba dang/ bslabs nas kyad kyi zhes soms can thams cad yongs su sman par bgyi ba dang/ gdul ba'i don la mngon du mas par 'gyur ba dang/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi zhal blta ba
las ma bapad ba dang/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ches thos par 'gyur ba dang/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi sprin gyi char yongs su gzungs ba dang/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi
tsho tshul la nan tan du bgyi ba dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa spyad pa dang/ bskal pa thams cad du gnas kyang byang chub sems dpa' spyod pas yongs su mi skye
ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul ba stodas su 'dzul bar 'gyur ba dang/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi byin gyi rlabs yang dag par mnon pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa
thams cad kyi stobs rnams la snang ba thob par 'gyur ba de ltar 'phags pas bdag la bshad du gsal// de nas tshong dpon rgyal ba dam pas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la 'de
skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu de ltar khyod kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed pa legs sa lags so// rags kyi bu kho bo na'idi lta ste/ dngos po med pa la
gnas pas mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rdzu 'phrul thob pa'i mthus/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i sgo thams cad du 'gro ba yongs su sbyong ste/ da ltar kho bo byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa
yongs su dag pa' sgo thams cad du 'gro ba 'di la gnas shade ( stong gsum gyi steng chen po'i 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i 'jase rgyun thams cad dang/ mtshema'i
lha' gnas thams cad dang/ dga' ldan gyi lha 'jig rten thams cad dang/ 'phrul dga' lha'i 'jig rten thams cad dang/ gzhan 'phrul dang da byed kyi lha'i 'jig rten thams cad dang/ bdud
kyi gnas thams cad dang/ 'dod pa'i khams kyi lha'i ris su gtogasad pa thams cad dang/ lha'i gnas thams cad dang/ klu'i 'jigarten thams cad dang/ klu'i gnas thams cad dang/ gnod
sbyan gyi 'jig rten thams cad dang/ gnod sbyin gyi gnas thams cad dang/ srin pa'i 'jig rten thams cad dad srin pa'i gnas thams cad dang/ grul bum gyi 'jig rten thams cad dang/
