grul bum gyi gnas thams cad dang/ yi dgas kyi 'jig rten thams cad dang/ yi dgas kyi gnas thams cad dang/ dri bra'i 'jig rten thams cad dang/ dri za'i gnas thams cad dang/
lha ma yon gyi 'jig rten thams cad dang/ lha ma yan gyi gnas thams cad dang/ nam mkha' lding gi 'jig rten thams cad dang/ nam mkha' lding gi gnas thams cad dang/ mi bas che'o
'jig rten thams cad dang/ mi'am ci'i gnas thams cad dang/ lto 'phye chen po'i 'jig rten thams cad dang/ lto 'phye chen pa'i gnas thams cad dang/ mi'i 'jig rten
thams cad dad mi'i gnas thams cad dang/ grang dang/ grong khyer dang/ grong rdal dang/ ldedas dang/ khams dad/ rgyal pa'i pho brang 'khor dang/ 'dod pa'i khams su gtogs pa'i sems can
gyi rgyud thams cad du chos ni ston to// chos ma yin pa ni zug go/ rtsod pa na zhi bar byed do// 'thab pa'i rnam par zlog go/ khrug pa na nye bar zhi bar byed do// gzu la du lhags pa ni rnam par zlog
ga gshags 'byed pa ni zhi bar byed do// mdud par 'dzin pa ni rab tu sel to// bcing ba thams cad ni yongs su gcod de// brtson ra thams cad ni mngon par 'dral la// 'jigs pa ni ma
par zlog go/ ma dag ba'i las kyi 'du byed ni rgyun gcod do// srog gcod pa las ni sems can rnam par zlog go/ ma byin par len pa dang/ 'dod pas lag par g.yem pa dang/ brdzun du
sma ba dad phram dang/ zhe gcod pa dang/ tshig bkyal pa dang/ chags sems dang/ gnod sems dang/ lag par lta ba las ni sems can rnam par zlog go/ mi bya ba thams cad ni byed
du mo 'jug ge/ dag pa'i chos bya ba thams cad ni byed du 'jug go/ sems can thams cad ni bzo thams cad la slob tu 'dzud de/ 'jig rten rnams rab tu dga' bar bya ba dang/ sems can yongs su
sman par bya ba dang/ zhags pa 'grub pa thams cad la gang mgi shas khyad par du ba thags pa brjod pa'i phyir rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang/ lta ba'i rnam pa thams cad rnam par bzlog pa dang/ sangs

rgyas kyi chos thams cad brjod snyade bstan pa/'i phyir/'jig rten la phan par 'gyur ba'i gtsug lag thams cad kyang ston to// rnam par 'god do// rab tu gsal bar byed do//brjod do//de bzhin du tshangs pa'i
'jig rten gyi bar du gzugs kyi khams kyi lha thams cad bril gyis mnan te chos ston to// stong gsum gyi stong chen pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'den ji lta ba de bzhin du phyogs bcur yang 'jig

rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhade bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong brjod dumed pa yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shan tu phra ba snyed dag tu chos ston te/ sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang ston to//byang chub sems dpa'i
chos dang/ nyan thos kyi chos dang/ rang sangs rgyas kyi chos kyang ston to// sems can dmyal ba'ang ston to// sems can dmyal bar 'gro ba'i lam dang/ sems can dmyal ba'i sems
can gyi mi bde ba'ang ston to// byol song gi skye gnas kyang ston to// byel med ga skye gnas kyi lan gyi rgyud tha dad pa dang/ byol song gi skye gnas gyi lam du 'gro ba'i lam dang/ byol song gi skye

gnas su skyes pa'i sdug bsngal yang ston to// gshane rje'i 'jig rtan yang ston to// gshin rje 'jig rten du 'gro ba'i lam dang/ gsha'i rje'i 'jig rten gyi sdug bsngal yang ston to//mtho ris kyi 'jig rta/
[1]@#// yang ston te/ mtho ris kyi 'jig rten du 'gro ba'i lam dang/ mtho ris kyi 'jig rten gyi dga' bar byed pa dang/ lengs stod kyang ston to// mi'i 'jig rten yang ston te//

mi'i 'jig rten gyi lam rgyun du 'gro ba'i lam dang/ mi'i 'jig rten gyi bde ba dang sdug bsngal nyams su myong ba sna tshogs kyang ston te/ de ltar rigs kyi bu khe bo ni 'jig rten gyi chos kyang ston te//
'jig rten kun 'byung ba dang/ 'jig rten na nub par 'gyur ba dang/ 'jag chen gyi khan ma tho ba dang/ 'jig rtenanas 'byung ba'ang sten te/ de yang 'di ltar byang chub sems dpa'i lam yang dag par
bstan pa dang/ 'khor ba'i skyon rnam par bzlog pa dang/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid yon tan yang dag par brjod pa dang/ srid pa'i lam gyi rgyud du mgo 'khor ba dang/ sdug bsngal du gyur pa yang dag

par bstan pa dang/ sgrib pa med pa'i chos nyid brjod pa dang/ 'jig rten rgyu ba'i bya ba yongs su bstan pa dang/ 'jig rten 'byung ba dang ldog pa'i bde ba dang/ sdug bsngal thams cad skyes pa dang/ 'gro ba thams

cad kyi gnas kyi mang du bya ba rnam par bsgom pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i chos gnas pa med pa mngon par bstan pa dang/ las dang nyon mongs pa'i 'kha le thams cad rnam par bzlog pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i

chos kyi 'khor lo 'khor ba shani tu brjod pa'i phyire chos ston to// rigs kyi bu kho bo ni byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa rnam par dag pa'i sgo thams cad du bgro ba/ dngos po med pa la gnas pa/sam ngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i

[a]rdzu 'phrul gyi mthus brgyan pa 'di shes par zar na/ lo bas byang chub sems dpa' thams cad mngon par shes pa/nang gi dbyings thams cad du sgyu ma lta bu'i ye shes kyi lus kyis rgyus par 'gengs pa// kun tu

lta ba'i ye shes kyis rab tu thob pa/tshig gi lam dang sgra thams cad rnam par dmigs pa la shan tu gzhe'o pa'i rna ba dang ldan pa// dus gsum rgyas par 'gangs pa'i chos kyi sgo snang ba la dbang rab tuthob ra/
chos thams cad la yang dag par gzhol ba'i yi shes la dbang sgyur ba'i skyes bu dpab bo sems can tshad med pa bsam gyis ma khyab pa'i bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par dmags par bya ba la ma 'dres

pa'i dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa'i lce yangs shang srab la yid du 'ong ba dang ldan pa// bsam pa tha dad pa'i sems can rgya mtsho'i yid du 'ong ba'i kha dog dang dbyibs su ldan pa'i byang chub sems
dpa' thams cad dang mnyam pa'i lus sbyam lta bu dang ldan ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dang mi gnyis pa'i spyod lam gyis da lta gyis khyab pa'i lus la gzhol ba/ dus gsum thams cad du

rjes su 'brangs pa 'a ya shas kyi lus dang ldan pa/ nam mkha'i dbyangs ltar tshad med pa'i spyod yul dang/ tu med pa'i yul dang ldan pa de dag gi spyod pa shes pa 'am/ yon tan brjod par nus re skan/ sang

rabs kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid kyi yul shum phyi ma'i mtha' na/ grong khyer na lang ka'i nags tshal zhes bya ba yod de/ de na dag slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa zhes bya ba 'dug gas/ de'i gan du seng
la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dad/ ji ltar na tan du bya ba dris/shag/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs
kyis/ tshong dpon rgyal ba dam pa'i nad pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te 1tshong dpon rgyal pa dam pa la lan brgya stod du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor pa byas nas yang dang yang bltas te/tshod
dben rgyal bo dam pa 'i drung nas seng nga/// de nas tshong dpon gyi bun bzos mthar gyis yul shum phyi ma'i mtha'i grong khyer ka li ka'i nags tshal gang na ba der song ste phyin nas/ dag

slad ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa yongs su tshol zhange sems can kun la rmid pa'i tshe/gang nas gad du sad ba de dang der rogs pa brgya phrag du ma dang/ bu mo brgya phrag dum zhag srung dang/ lam gyi bzhi mdo dad

lam gyi sum mdo dag nas tshogs te rjes su 'brang ngo// skyes pa brgya phrag du ma dang/ bud med brgyaphrag du ma zhig gis kyang 'gegs kyi bu 'di redag spyod ma seng ge rnam par bskyangs pa ni grong khyer ka 'di ka'i
nags tshal ba de nyid kyi bza' shing gi ra pa chen pa rgyal ba'i 'od kyis byan panyima'i mdog na sems can tshad med pa'i don du ches sten cing 'dug go zhes bstan to// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu

nor bzungs bza' shade gi rab nyi ma'i mdog der phyin nas kun tu btsal te bltas na/ bza' shang gir ba de na ngashade zla ba shar ba zhes bya ba khang pa brtsi ba/sa pa 'i dbyibs ltar 'dug pa/bod sna tshogs

0 kyi kha dog can/bod kyi mdog dang ldan pa// 'khor kun tu dpag tshad kyi khyen tsam du 'od kyis rgyas par 'gangs pa mang pa dang/ lo ma'i shing yod+masu gang bzhes grub gdug kyi rnam pa dang/ dbyis su dug pa 'i 'dab mas//
kun nas khebs pa/ bi num+maston pa kib dog ltar 'dug pa'i sprin kyi mdog dang ldan pa'i ng pa dang ]me tog gi shang me tog gi mdzod ces bya ba ri'i rgyal po kha ba can ltar mdangs dga' ba'i dbyibs

sna tshog sa dang ldan pa/ kha dog sna tshogs kyi me tog me zad pa'i rab tu 'bebs pa/ sum cu rtsa sum gyi lha'i pho brang gi rgyan gyis kun nas 'du ba dang/ sus kyang mi shigs pa lta bu mang po dad 3shade

thog gi shang rtag tu snyan pa'i ro dang med pa'i 'bras bu'i tshog sashes bya ba gser gyi ri boroskrun ltar 'dug pa ]rtag tu de thog phun sum tshogs par gnas pamad pa dang/ rin po che'i rgyal pa'i ngashing rnam

par snang ba'i mdzod ces bya ba ni po che'i rgyal po dpe med pa'i dbyibs ltar bdug pa/ lha rdzas kyi rin po cha'i 'phrod ba dang/ si mo de dang/ rgyan rin po che yid bzhin gyi rgyal po'i mdzod nas byung ba ltar phun

sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa/ ri'i po ti kha dog grangs med pa 'byung gnas su gyur pa mang po dang/ gos kyi shang dga' bar byed pa zhes bya ba/ lha rdzas kyi gos ni po che kha dog sna tshogs rab tu 'gyed cade 'phyang

bsashin tu brgyan pa mang po dang/ rol mo'i shing dga' ba skyed pa zhes bya ba lha rdzas las kyang lhag pa'i rol mo yid du 'ong ba'i sgra snyan pa 'byin pa mad pa dang/ spos kyi shade kun du zhim pas brgyan pa zhes bya ba
@#// phyogs thams cad duthogs pa med par/ rnam pa thams cad duyid du 'od pa'i skyes kyi dad 'byung ba mad pa dag kyang yod par mthong/ mtshe'u dang/ lumadang/ lteng ka dang/ rjed du

ni po ti bdun gyi pha dus mtha' brtsigs pa// phyogs bzhi nas rin po che'i them skas btsugs pa/rin po che sna tshogs kyi khri 'phang dus dang mthun pa'i tsan dan gyi dri zhim pas ba skus pas kun nas bskor ba/

gzhi rin po che'i rgyal po be rlasngon pa las legs par blangs pa/'dzam bu nuklung gi gser gyi bye ma bdal ba/yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chu lha rdzas kyi dri yid du 'ong pa can gyis lho ngos su gang ba/ni po che'i pad+mo

dang ut+pal dang dkumo dang me tog puts+tshari ka kha dog sna tshogs lha rdzas kyi bsung dang ldan pas kun nas yog pa/bya bran sna tshogs kyi khyu lha rdzas las kyang 'das pa'i gzugs yod du bde ba dang ldan pa sgra nyan pa

'gyin cing brjod pas gang ba/ lha rdzas kyi don po che sna tshogs kyi shade gi 'phred ba legs par bkye bas yodongs su bskor cing brgyan pa dang ldan pa/ shade sna tshegs de dag gi drung thams cad du'ang rin po che'i seng

ga'i phra sna tshogs yid du 'ong pa'i gzugs dang ldan pa/rin po che sna tshogs kyi rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pa du mas rgyan pa/ lha rdzas kyi skanaran po che sna tshogs 'brel bar btang ba/ lha rdzas kyi spos dang bdug spos/

kyi rnam pa thams cad kyis bdugs pa/lha rdzas las kyang 'das pa'i dar rin pa che mngon par spyangs pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi blo ra bkye ba/rin po che sna tshogs dang 'dzam bunuklung gi gsar gyi dra ba sna tshogs kun nasakhrel ba

[ps ]rin po che'i dril gyi dra ba yod du 'od zhing snyan pa'i sgra 'byin pa mang pas brgyan pa/'khor du lha rdzas rin po cha'i stan brgya stod phrag du ma btang zhade bshams pa mthod ngo//ran po cha'ishade drud la lar ni med ge'i khri

ran po cha'i pad+mo stod pa can bshams pa mthong ngo// la lar na seng ge khri nor bu rin po chesngos kyi rgyal po'i pad+mes snying po byas pa bshams pa mthong ngo// la laran seng ge 'i khri'onepa tshu'i rgyal po klu'i rgyan gyi

paNos snyade po byas pa bshams pa mthong ngo// la lar ni seng ge 'i khri nor bu rin po che'i rgyal po sad ga'i bya la'i ngos snyed pa byas pa bshams pa mthong ngo//la lar seng ge 'i wa ren po che'i rgyal po rnam par

snang ba'i ri ngos snyade pa byas pa bshams pa mthong ngo//la lar naseng ge 'i khri rin po che'i rgyal po phyogs rnam par snang ba'i pad+mos snying po byas pa bshams pa mthong ngo//la lar ni seng ge 'i khririn po che'i rgyal po dbang po'i

rdordza'i pad+mos snyade po byas par bshams pa mthong ngo//la lar shi seng ge 'i khri rin po che'i rgyal po 'gro ba'i yid du 'ong ba'i pad+mos snyed pa byas pa bshams pa mthong ngo// ni po che'i shing drung la lar seng ge 'i khri tsa'i

po tsha rgyal pomadog dkar po'i pad+mos snying po byas pa bshams pa mthong ngo//bza' shing gi ba de'i gzhi thams cad kyang ra'i po che sna tshogs kyis yongs su gang zhade rgya mtsho chen po ltar bzhi po na'i gling gas/

yongs su gang ba mthad do be zlumasngon pa'o dem pas spyas te/rin po che thams cad kyis brgyan pa'i sa'i phyogs ka na lan da ltar reg na bde zhing 'jam yang gom pa bor zhing bteg pa ba tshamatho dman med pa/ rdo rje rin po

[zi/ p]// che'i mchog gi pad+modri yid du 'ong bar zham zhang reg na bde ba'i sa'am kun tu bam pa dang dur dang rma bya dang/ khrung khrung dang/ kun l dang/ ka la bde ka dang/ ke kal dang/ 'dziba'adze

ba ka sgra snyan cing yid du 'ong ba'i nga ro 'byin ba mang pos gdab lha rdzas kya rin po che'i tsan dan gyi shing mang po'i nags tshal shani tulegs par 'grig sa bas mdzes par brgyan pa/rin po che sna tshogs kyi

pad+mo'i sngon gyi char dang/ rin po che'i me tog sna tshogs mi zad nga 'i char rgyun du 'bab pa//'dres pa'i nags tshalalas kyang khyad par du 'phags pa/rani po che sna tshogs kyi khang bu brtsegs ma rgyun par bkod pa

nang nas/ spos kyi rgyal po'i bdug skyes rin thang med pa rtag tu 'thul zhing zhim pa 1 lha'i bdunas chos bzang po'igyi las kyang lhag pas brgyan pa/ lha rdzas las khyad 'das pa'i rin po che'i dra ba sna

tshogs kyase kun du bris pa/mu tagi'an po che'i me tog gi 'phreng pa dang lda ldi kun nas bres pas rab tu brgyan pa/ni po che'i dril bu rnam pa sna tshogs su rnam par bkye ba'i gsar gyi dra ba 'barabs kun

nas dkrages pa/rol mo'i shing dang rin po che'i ta la las dal bu'i dra ba rlung gis legs par bskyod pas yid du 'od pa'i sgra snyan pa'i dbyangs 'byudab dad ldan pa dbang sgyur gyi lha'i rgyal pa'i lha mo dpe tshul

rgyu shan tu bzang ba rnams kyis klu snyan pa'i sgra rab tu yid du 'ong ba byung ba/lha rdzas kyi yode bzhin gyi gos ba deg sna tshogs kyi sprin gyi char rab du 'bab pas rnam par mdzesal/rgya mtsho chen po ltar kha dog dang/

[s/]mdog sna tshogs ldan pas blta kagatang mi bra ba/ khang pa brtsegs pa rin po che'i rgyan dang ldan pa brgya stod grangs med pas rab tu brgyan pa/sum cu rtsa gsum gyi lha'i pho brang ltar ba lta na bzang ba/ rin po che
sna tshogs rnam par phye bas rnam pa thams cad du ngo rgyan pa'i gdugs nan tulegs pa rnam par sgreng zhing bkram pas kun nas blta na mdzes pa/ dbang po chen po'i 'jig rten lhar shan du mdzes pa'i

rta'u sna tshogs kyis brgyan pa/ 5da du 'ong ba'i byed snang ba chen po rtag par 'byung ba/ tshangs pa chen po'i gzhal med khang ltar nor bu rin po che'i sprul pa 'gro ba'i yid du 'ong pa'i 'od kyis 'bar ba ste bza'

shade gar ba chen po nyi ma'i mdog ces bya ba de/ dag slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa'i rdzu 'phrul gyi mthu stobs dang/ byin gyi rlabs che zhing bsam gyis ma khyab bas/'jig rten gyi khams grangs med pa'i gnas

su gyur pa'i nam mkha'i dbyings ltar yangs shange tshadamed de/ rgya chen po dang ldan par mthong ngo// de nas tshong ba dang na gyi bu nor bzangs kyis de ltar yon tanatshad med pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa

tshogs pa'i bzashang gis ba'i rgyan byang chub sems dang las kyi rnam par snyan pas yongs su grub pa/'jig rten las 'das pa'i dag pa'i rtsa ba chen po las skyes pa/ sangs rgyas la mchod cinge 'am gror byas

pa'i rgyu mthun pa bsam gyis ma khyab pa las byung ba/'jig rten gyi khamasathams cad yod pa'i dag pa'i rtse ba ma lus pas mi 'phrogs pa/chos kyi rang bzhin sgyu ma'i rnam pa lta bu s grub pa/ dag pa'i bsod nams
trima med pa rgya chen pos grub nyid byung ba/ dag slong ma seng ge nam bar bsgyings pa'i sngon gyi spyod pa bzang po legs par byas pa dang rgyumathun pa'i stobs dang shugs kyis byung ba//
nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang thun med ma yin pa/ mu stegs can dad pas kyi rgol ba thams cad kyis mo 'phrogs pa/bdud kyi lam yongs su rgyu ba thams cad kyis mi tshugs pa/ phyis pa so

so'i skye bo thams cad kyis bltar med par mthong ste/ shade sna tshogs de dag ba drung gi seng ga'i khri chen po de dag la'ang/ dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa lus shan tumadzes pa// spyod lam zhi ba/

mtsho dbang dang zhi ba/ yade zhi ba 2 shan tu dben pa// dbad pa thul ba/ glang po ltar shani tu dul ba/ mtsholtar dngas shange gnyal la rtog pa med pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ rin pa che'i rgyal po yid bzhin gyi nor bu
ltar 'dod pa thams cad sgrub pa/ pad+mo la chus mi chags pa ltar 'jig rten gyi chos kyis ma gos pa// seng ge ltar 'jigs pa dang skya g.ya' bo med pa// mi 'jigs pa rnam par dag pas ni'i dbang
pa chan pa ltar mi bskule ba/ tshul khrims rnam par dag pas yid du 'od ba'i spos kyi rgyal po ltar 'gro ba'i sems tsam par byed pa/ kha ba'i tsan dan ltar nyon medas pa'i gdung ba rab tu zhi
bar byed pa// sman gyi rgyal po blta na bzang ba ltar 'gro ba thams cad kyi sdug bsngal rnam par zhi bar byed pa// chu'i lha'i zhags pa ltar bltan don yod pa// de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od ltar lus dad
sems kyi bag yangs pa bde ba skyed pa// tshangs pa chen po ltar 'dod chags dang/ zhe sdang dang/ gti mug gi kun nas ldang pa dad bral ba/ ran pa nu'i rgyal po nor bu chu 'dang ltar nyin mes pas rnyog
pa can du gyur pa'i sems can gyi sems rab tu dang bar byed pa/ zhangagashane pa ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba rnam par 'phel bar byed pa la dug par mthong ngo// khor gyi stan de dag la'ang 'khor sna tshogs
'khod par mthong ngo/ 'khar gyi stan la la la ni lha'i bu dbang po nan po la sogs pa gtsang ma'i gnas kyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha'i bu rnams 'khod cing/ dag slong ma seng ge rnam par bskyangs
pas chos kyi sge rnam par thar pa ma zad pa yang dag par 'byed pa zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo// 'khor gyi sta la la la ni tshangs pa yid du 'ong pa la sogs pa tshangs pa'i ris su gto
pa'i lha'i bu rnams 'bod dang ]dag slad ma seng ge rnam par bskyangs pas dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa gzhi kun s 'byed pa zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo// 'khor gyi

stan la lal na lha'i rgyal po dbang sgyur la sogs pa gzhan 'phrul dbang byed kyi lha'i bu mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa dag 'khor nang/ dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyinges pas chos kyi sgo byang chub sems
dpa'i bsam pa rnam par dag pa'i dbang gis rnam par brgyan pa zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthod do// 'khor gyi stan la la la ni lha'i rgyal po rab 'phrul dga' la sogs pa 'phrul dga'i lha'i
su lha'i bu mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa rnams 'khod rung/ dag slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas rjes kyi sku chos thams cad dge bas rnam par brgyan pa zhes bya ba yod
dag par bstan pa mthong ngo// 'khon gyi stan la la la ni lha'i rgyal po rab dga' ldan la sogs pa dga' ldan gyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha'i bu lha'i bu mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa rnams ba khod cade/

dag slad ma seng ge rnam par bskyangs pas chos kyi se rang gi sems kyi mdzod kyi gleng zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo// 'khor gyi stanal la lan lha'i rgyal po rab mtshe ma la sogs pa lta'i

bu lha'i bu mo'i 'khor dang bcas pa rnams 'khod cing/ dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas chos kyi sgo rgyan mtha' yas pa zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mtheng ngo//'khor gyi skal la la na lha'i rgyal
po brgyabyan la sogs pa sum cu rtsa gsum gyi ris su gtogs pa'i lha'i bu lha'i bu mo'i 'khar dang bcas pa rnams 'khod rung/ dag slong ma seng gi rnam par bskyangs pas chos kyi sgo skya pa'i sgo zhes

bya g.yang dag par bstan pa mthod ngo// 'khor gyi stan la la lan klu'i rgyal po gang chen mtsho la sogs pa klu'i rgyal po 'ad brgyab dang/ dga' bo dang/ bsnyen dga' ba dang/ yid du 'ong pa dang/ shugs/
ldan dang/ ma dros pa la sogs pa klu'i bumo'i 'khor dang bcas pa/ klu'i byis pa'i 'khor dang bcas pa rnams 'khod cing/ dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas chos kyi sgo sangs rgyas kyi rdzu
'phrul dang/ yul gyi 'od rgyan ces bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo// 'khor gyi stan la la la ni rgyal po chen po dal bas pa la sogs pa gnod sbyin gyi dbang po gnod sbyin gyi bu mo dang gnod
sbyin gyi byis pa'i 'khor dang bcas pa rnams 'khod rung/ dag slad ma seng ge rnam par bskyongs pas chos kyi sgo 'gro ba thams cad yongs su skyob pa'i mdzod ces bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mtheb

ngo 'khor gyi stan la la la ni dri za'i rgyal po gnas sud pa la sogs pa dri bra mang po dAmo'i bu mo dang driza'i byis pa'i 'khor dang bcas pa rnams 'khod rtsod/ dag slad ma seng ge rnam par bskyidas ngas ches

kyi spyi dga' ba mazad pa'i char rab tu 'bab pa zhes bya ba yod dag par bstan pa mthong ngo// 'khor gyi stan la la la ni lha ma yade gyi dbang po sgra gcan la sogs pa lha ma yin gyi bumo dang lha ma yin gyi
byas pa'i 'khor dang bcas pa rnams 'khod tsang/ dag slong ma sang ge rnam par bskyangs pas chos kyi sde chos kyi dbyings shes pa'i tshul gyi shugs kyis brgyan pa zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa/
mthong ngo// 'khor gyi stan la la la na nam mkha' lding ga dpang po shugs 'dzan chen po la sogs pa nam mkha' lding ga de bang pa nam mkha' ldade gi bu ma dang nam mkha' ldang gi byis pa'i 'khor dang
bcas ba rnams 'khod cing/ dag slang ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas rjes kyi sgo sud pa'i rgyan tshos 'jigs pa'i yul zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthad do/ 'khor gyi stan la la la ni ma
'am ci'i rgyal po sdod pa lags pa ma 'am ci'i dbang po mi 'am ci'i bu mo dang ma'am ca'i byas pa'i 'khor dang bcas pa rnams 'khod cing/ dag spang ma seng ge rnam par/

ma basbyangs pas chos kyi sde sangs rgyas kyi spyod pa snang ba zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo// 'khor gyi stan la la la ni lto 'phye chen pe'i dbang po khro gnyer gded la sogs pa lto 'phye chen po'i
bum dang lto 'phye chen po'i byas pa'i 'khor dang bcas pa rnams 'khod cade dag slad ma seng ge rnam par bskyangs pas chos kyi sgo sangs rgyas la dga' pa skyed pa zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa

mthong ngo// 'khor gyi stan la la la ni skyes pa dang/ bud med dang/ khye'u dang/ bu mo brgya stong mang dang 'khod cing/ dag skyed ma sengag rnam par bskyangs pas chos kyi sge khyad par du 'gro ba zhes bya ba
yad dag par bstan pa mthong ngo//'khor gyi stan la la la ni sun pa'i dbang po rtag tumadangs 'phrog sded pa'i rgyal po la sogs pa srin po'i dbang po srin po'i bu mo dang sAn pe'i byis pa'i 'khor dang

bcas pa rnams 'khod cing/ dge slong ma song gi rnam par bskyangs pas chos kyi sgo sAng rje'abyung ba zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo//'khor gyi stan la la la ni nges masacan nyan thos kyi
theg pa la mes pa rnams 'khod cing/ dag slong ma sang ga rnam par bsgyings pas chos kyi sgo yi gshis khyad par du 'phags pa'i mthu zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong de//'kher gyi stan la la
rtsa la ni sems can rang sadas rgyas kyi theg pa la mos pa rnams 'khod rung/ dag skyed ma seng gi rnam par bskyangs pas chos kyi sge sangs rgyas kyi yon tan rgyachen po'i 'od ces bya ba yang dag par
bstan pa mthong ngo// 'khor gyi stan la la lan sems can theg pa chen po la mes pa rnams 'khod lung/ dag slong ma seng ge rnam par bskyangs pas tid de 'dzan gyi yi shes nAba'i sne kun tu sgozhas
bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo// 'khor gyi stan la la lan byang chub sems dpa' thog mar sems bskyed pa rnams 'khod rung shudag slang ma seng ge rnam par bskyangs pas ting nge 'dzan gyi sgo
sangs rgyas thams cad kyi smon lam gyi phud pa zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo// 'khor gyi stan la la la ni byang chub sems dpa' sa gnyis pa la gnas pa rnams 'khod tshud
dag spyod ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas tang de 'dzan gyi skye rdul dad bral ba'i dkyil 'bar ces bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthod ngo// 'khor gyi stan la la la ni byang chub sems dpa' sa
gsum pa la gnas pa rnams 'khod tsang/ dag slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyud+de pas ting nge 'dzan gyi sgo rab tu zhi ba'i rgyan ces bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo// 'khor gyi stan la la la ni
byang chub sems dpa' sa bzhi pa la gnas pa rnams 'khod cing/ dag slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo thams cad mkhyen pa'i shugs kyi yul 'byung ba zhes bya ba yang
dag par bstan pa mthong ngo// 'khor gyi stan la la la ni byang chub sems dpa' sa lnga pa la gnas pa rnams 'khod cing/ dge slong ma sang ge rnam par bsgyings
pas ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo sems kyi rgyud ma tog gi snying po zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo// 'khor gyi stan la la la ni byang chub sams dpa' sa drug pa la gnas pa rnams
'khod rung/ dge slong ma sang ge rnam par bsgyings pas ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rnam bar snang ba'i snying po zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo// 'khor gyi stan la la la ni byang chub sems
dpa' sa bdun pa la gnas pa rnams 'khor cing dag slong ma sang ge rnam par bskyed sa pas ting nge 'dzin gyi sos kun nas brgyanapa zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo/ bakhor gyi stan la la la

na byang chub sems dpa' s brgyad pa la gnas pa rnams 'khod cade/ dge slong masang go rnam khar bskyengs bas ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo chos kyi dbyings su lus shin tu rnam par phye ba'i yul zhes bya ba yang dag par

bstan pa mthong ngo// 'khor gyi stan la la la ni byang chub sems dpa' sa dgu pa la gnas pa rnams 'bod cing/ dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bskyangs pas chos kyi sgo ma dmigs pa'i stobs kyi gnas kyis bas/

pa zhes bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo// 'khor gyi stan la la la ni byang chub sems dpa las bcu pa la gnas pa rnams 'khod cing/ dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pas ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo
[sgrib pa med pa'i dkyil 'khor ces bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mthong ngo// 'khor gyi stan la la la lha lag na rdo rje'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'khon cing/ dge slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings

pas chos kyi sgo ye shes rdo rje mthu bo che'i rgyan ces bya ba yang dag par bstan pa mkhrong ngo// de ltar skye ba'i skye mched rnam pa pa tha dad pa thams can kyi sems can du gdags pa dang/ sems can
gyi lam gyi rgyud ji snyad pa de dag gi sems can yongs smin pa rnam par 'dul ba/ snod du gyur pa med cig bza' shang gi ra ba der 'ongs shing 'khor gyi snyan la so sor 'khod pa/ bsam pa lha
dad pa/ mos pa mi mtshungs pa/ bsam pa shin tu gzhol bar gyur pa// dad pa'i ro rngams chen po dang ldan pa rnams la/ dge slong ma seng gi zlum par bsgyings pas tshegs kyang thams cad phyi na

mad pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu re par 'gyur ba de lta de ltar chos bstan pa mthong ngo// de ci'i phyir zhe na/ de ni dge slong ma song ga rnam par bskyed pa de kun tu lta ba'i btang snyoms dang ldan pa la sog pa dang/
sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad shin tu bstan pa la sogs pa dang/ chos kyi dbyangs kyi gzhi khri nad pa la sogs pa dang/ sgrib pa'i dkyil lor thams cad rnam par 'thor ba la sogs pa dang/ 'gro ba thamA
cur kyi dge ba'i sems yang dag par 'byung ba la sogs pa dang/ khyad par yod pa'i rgyan la sogs pa dang chags pa med pa'i tshul gyi bang po la sogs pa dang chos kyi dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor la
segs pa dang/ sems kyi mdzod la sogs pa dang/ kun tu mes pa mngon par sgrub pa'i snod pa la sogs pa shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sgo brgya stong grangs med pa no ]
pa'i phyir te/ bza' shang gi ra ba nyi ma'i mdag der byang chub sems dpa' m/ sems can gzhan ji snyed cig/ dug slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa la blta ba dang/ chos mnyan pa'i phyir 'od de

dag thams cad kyang/ sngon dag slad ma sang ga rnam par bskyangs pas dag pa'i chos yang dag par blang ba'ashani tu bkod pa nas/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub las phyir mi ldog pa'i
bar du byas pa sha stag ge/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu chen bsrings kyis/ dag slad ma seng ge rnam par bskyangs pa'i baba bshade gir ba phun sum tshogs pa dang/ nags tshal phun/
sum tshogs pa dang/ gtsug lag khang phun sum tshogs pa dang/ 'chag sa phun sumatshogs pa dang/ ledas spyod phun sum tshogs pa dang/ mal cha phun sum tshogs pa dang/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor

phun sum tshog sA pa dang/ dbang chen po phun sum tshogs pa dang/ rdzu 'phrul dang rnam par 'phrul pa phun sumatshogs pa dang/ dbyangs kyi rgyan phun sum tshogs pa de lta bu mthong ste/ chos kyi tshul
bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i ng thos nas/ chos kyi sngon gyi char chen pos sems mngon par brgyan la de'i yid la/ dag slong ma sed ga rnam par bsgyings pas bsam pa rnam par dag pa phun sum tshogs
par byas kyis/ da ni g.yas phyog su bskor ba lan brgya sted du ma zhig tu bya'o snyam pa dang/ de'i mod la dag slong ma seng ge rnam par bsgyings pa bslab shang gi ra ba dar/ 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor du
banus pa de dag thams cad kyang snang ba chen pos khyab par byas sa// de ltar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba bya'o snyam du bsams nas skor ba byed pa'i tshe 'khor thams cad na'ang dag sred ma seng ge
rnam par bsgyid pa 'dug pa mthong nas/ mdun du 'dug ste thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags ma bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ ji
ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi pa dang/ ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags ma na byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams dag dang rjes
su bstan pa mdzad do zhes bdag gis thes nas/ 'phags ma ji ltar byang chub sems dang sa byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang/ ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba bdag la bshad du
gsal// des skyas ba/ rigs kyi bu be mo ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa rlom sems thams cad yongs su bcom pa zhes bya ba theb pa'o// skyes pa/ 'phags ma
byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa rtsom sems shums cad yongs su bcom pa de'i yul ji lta bu zhig mchis/ smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de ni yi shes snang ba ste/ dus gsum du byung ba'i rgyan
sems skad cig gi cha shas la rnam par dmags pa'i rang bzhin no// smras pa/ 'phags ma ye shes snang ba de'i yul yang ji lta bu zhig mchis// smras pa/ rigs kyi bu ba

mon pashes sbyad pa 'a di la sgrub pa dang yongs su sgrub pa'i tsa/ chos thams cad rab tu 'thad pa zhes bya ba'i de de 'dzazhi skyes te/ ting nge 'dzin de thob ma thag tu ya de kyi rang bzhin rgya lus kyis phyogs/

thams cad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du byang chub sems dpa' sku tshegacig gis thogs pa 2 dga' ldan gyi pho brang na bzhugs pa thams cad re re la'ang lus sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i

rdul shan tu phra ba snyed kyis mchod pa rnam pa tha dad pa// sangs rgyas kyi zhid brjod du med pa'i rdul shan tu phra kha snyed kyi mtshon pa sbyar ba'i phyir 'gro ste/ 'di ltar lha'i lus dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin
dang dri za dang/ lham yin dang nam mkha' ldadi nang/ mi'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen pa dang/ mi dang/ mi ma yazhi pa'i dbad pa lus me tog gi snga'i yongs su 'dzani pa dang/ sngos kyi sprin/
yodas su 'dzin pa dang/ bdug spos kyi spranayongs su 'dzanipa dang ]'phreng ba'i sngun yongs su 'dzan pa dang/ byug pa'i sngan yongs su 'dzin pa dang/ phyi ma'i sngon yongs su 'dzan pa dang/

na bza'i spron yongs su 'dzan pa dang gdugs kyi spron yongs su 'dzin ba dang/ rgyal mtshan gyi sprani yongs su 'dzazhi ba dang/ ba dan gyi spron yongs su badzazhi pa dang/ rin po che'i u0f7a lhab lhub kyi

spun yongs su 'dzan pa dang/ rin po'i dra ba'i rgyan gyi spran ya sa su 'dzan pa dang/ ne po tsha'i gnam yol gyi rgyan gyi spun yodas su 'dzan pa dang/ rin po che'i rgyan rnam par phye ba'i sngan yodas su 'dzin
pa dang/ni po che'i sgron ma'i rgyun gyi spran yodas su 'dzin pa dang rin po che'i gdan gyi sprane yongs su 'dzin pa mang pos mchod pa sbyar ba'i phyare 'gro'o// dga' ldan gyi gnas na bzhugs pa'i
byang chub sems dpa' sku tsheg/cig kas theg pa rnams la mchod pa bya ba'i phyir ji ltar 'gro ba de bzhin du/ yum gyi skur gshegs pa dad/ bltam pa dang/ btsunamo'i 'khor gyi nang na bzhugs/

pa dad/ mngon par 'byung ba dang snying po byang chub tu gshegs pa dang/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par sangs rgyas shang snying po byang chub la bzhugs pa dang/ chos kyi
'kher lo rab tu skor ba'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad dad de bzhin du lha'i gnas na bzhugs pa dang/ klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dri za dang/ lha ma yin dad/ nam mkha' lding dang/ mi 'am
tu deng/ lto 'phye chen pa dang mi dang/ mam yin pa'i gnas na bzhugs pa nas 'gre ba thams cad kyi gzims dang bsam pa yongs su tsham par mdzad nas/ yongs su mya ngan las 'da' pa'i
bar de dag thams cad la'ang/ yid kyi rang bzhin gyi lus rnam pa de lta bu dag gas rnam pa de lta bu'i mchod pa byed cing/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi drung du 'gro// sems can gang gse/
kho ma sangs rgyas mchod pa dang/ me gro byed pa las 'di shes par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyang bla na med pa yang dag par rdzo gas pa'i byang chub tu nges par 'gyur ro///

sems can gang kho mo'i drung du 'ong ba de dag thams cad la'ang kho mo ni/ shes rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa gdam ga dang rjes su bstan pa 'di nyid ston te/ rigs kyi bu kho ma ya shes kyi mag gas sems/
can thams cad la lta'ang sems can gyi 'du shes kyang mi skyod la rtsom sems kyang ma byed de// 'gro ba thams cad kyi skad rgya mtsho'ang nyan te/ tshig gi lam thams cad mngon par zhan pa med pas
rlom sems su byed pa med do// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang mthong ste/ chos kyi lus yongs su shes pas rlom sems su byed pa'i ng med do// de bzhin gshegs pa thams
cad kyi chos kyi 'khor la yongs su 'dzag cung ches kyi rang bzhun khad du chud pas rlom sems su byed pa med do// sems kyi skad cig re re la chos kyi dbyings thams cad rgyas par bgangs kyang chos
nyade sgyu ma'i rang bzhin khed duchud bsarlom sems su byed pa med do// rigs kyi bu kha mes na byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa rlom sems thams rlud yongs su bcom pa 'di shes par
zad no/ khemes byang chub sems dpa' chos kyi dbyangs mtha' dang dbus med pa la zhugs pa/ chos thams cad la rlom sems med par gnas kyang skyil ma krung gtsag gas chos kyi dbyings
thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pa// sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad rang gi lus su 'dus par ston kyang/ skad cig gcig gis de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi drung du 'dod pa// lus la/
sangs rgyas kyi rje thams cad byang zhade rgyu ba/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjed du med pa spru'i nyag ma gcig kase sbyams shade mdon par 'phen pa/ rang gi ba spu'i bu gar/
'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i 'du ba dang 'jig pa'i bskal pa yongs su ston pa/ skad cig gcig la bskal pa brjod du med pa yang brjod du med par gnas
pa mnyam pa nyid kyis yang dag par 'dzud pa// skad cage gcig gis brjod du med pa'i yang brjod dumed pa'i bskal par 'khod pa de dag gi spyod pa shes pa kham/ yon tan brjod par nus
re skan/ sod rags kyi bu lha phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyid kyi sa la bgrod dka' ba na/ grong khyer rin po che'i rgyan ces bya ba yod de/ de na bcom pa ma lha'i bshes gnyen ma zhes bya ba 'dug
gas de'i gan du sod la ji ltar byung chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang/ ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig/ de nas tshong dpon gyi
bu nor bzangs kyis/ dge spyod ma sang gi rnam par bskyangs pa sked pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal ta/ dge slong ma song ba rnam par bskyangs pa la lan ba stod du mar/
[g ]g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas yod dang yod paltas te/ dag slong ma seng ge rnam par bskyangs pa'i drung nas sed do/ danasatshod da pan gyi bu nor
bzad s shes rab kyi snang ba chen po dus sems snang bar gyur pa de thams cad mkhyen pa yi shes snang pa de la ni sems/ chos nyid kyi rang bzhan gyi stabs snyad ba de la ni ya/nga dag par rjes su lta/
sems can thams cad kyi skad rnam pa kadage/sa pa'i mdzod kyi gzungs kyi tshul de ni brtan par byed/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi 'khor le dza da dag par 'dzan pa'i gzungs[”]tshul

da ni turgya chab r byed/ snying rje chen po 'gro ba thams cad kyi skyabs su gyur pa'i stabs da na nye bar rte/ chos thams cad kyi tshul snang ba'i sgo nas yang dag par byung ba'i thams cad mkhyen pa nyid
kyi shugs de la ni rab tu rtog/ chos kyi dbyangs rgyatshan ro'i dkyil 'khor rgyas par 'gangs pa'i smon lam yongs su dag pa de'i rjes su ni 'brad/ chos tham sa cad kyi phyogs snang bar byed pa'i
yiganyis kyi 'od de ni shin tu gsal bar byed/ chos thams cad kyis phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par phye ba rgyas pa/ra bgongs pa'i mdon par shes pa'i stobs de ni mngon par sgrub/
byang chub sems dang ba las dang dran pa thams cad nye bar blangs pas brtsams pa mthar dbyung ba'i smon lam dan yongs su rdzogs par byed cade mthar gyis yul bgrod dka' ba'i grong khyer
na po che'i rgyan gang na ba der phyin te/ bcom pa ma lha'i bshes gnyen ma yongs su tshol tshol ba dang/ de la bcom pa ma lha'i bshes gnyen gyi yon tan mngon par mi shes la/ ye shes spyod yul

gyi tshul la mamakhas pa'i ma ji snyed pa de dag 'di snyam du sems te/ ma 'di de ltar zhi zhing dul ba'i dbang po dang ldan pa// de ltar shesabazhin dang ldan te/ de ltar 'khrul pa med cud/ de ltar yid
khakhrug pa med la/ de ltar gnya' shade gang tsam du lta ste/ de ltar gnod pas ma tshugs shing/ de ltar mtshan mar ma 'dzan la gzugs kyi rnam pa thams cad la gamed ba med pa'i mgo dang ldan te yid
la brel pa med rung/ bsam pa zang la mngon par mdzes te/ rgya mtsho ltar dug rung/ sems mi nyam ma 'khrug pa de la/ bcom pa ma lha'i bshes gnyen mas ko ci zhig bya/ 'di lta bu dag na 'dod
chags la dga' ba med de/ sems phyin nu leg dang ldan yang mi srid do// 'di lta bu dag ni sdug cad gtsad ba'i 'du shes yongs su rgyab med de/ 'di lta bu dag ni 'dod pas 'gal yang ma srid do//

'di lta bu dag na bud med kyi dbang du 'gyur ba med de/ 'di lta bu dag ni bdun kyi spyod yul la spyod kyang mi srid do// 'di lta bu dag ni bdud kyi yul la chags pa med de/ 'di lta bu dag ni 'dod pa'i 'dam du
byang yang mi srid de// 'di lta bu dag ni bdud kyi zhags pas bcings par 'gyur ba med de/ mi dgos pa byed kyang mi srid do snyam ma// gang yang bcom pa ma lha'i bshes gnyen mab yon tan gyi
khyad par mdon par shesashade/ phashes kyi spyod yul mngon du gyur ba de dag na 'di skad ces 'dzer te// rags kyi bu de ltar khyod nga com pa ma lha'i bshes gnyen ma la mangs/
la su sde bar sems pa ni/ khyod kyang thob par bya ba legs par thob pa ste legs so legasas// khyed na nges par sangs rgyas su smon pa'o// khyod ni bdag nges par sems can thams cad kyi gnas su
sats+tsa bsgyur bar 'dod pa'o// khyed ni nges par sems can thams cad kyi 'dod chags kyi zug rngu dbyung bar 'dod pa'o// khyed ni nges par sdug cing gtsang ba'i 'du shes rnam par gter bar 'dod pa'o//
rigs kyi bu 'di re/ bcom pas lha'i bshes gnyenam nasrid khyer gyi lam gyi sum mdo'i byang phyogs legs shag na rang gi khyim na 'dug go/ de nas tshod dpan gyi bu nor bzad s
kyis tshig de shes nas/ dga' rangs te mgu zhang nyams bde la tsham zhade/ yid bde ba skyes nas bcom pa ma lhab bshes gnyin ma'i khyim gang na ba der phyin nas/ de'akhyam che zhing yangs 'di'i
po che'i ra ba rim pa bcus bskor ba/rin po che'i ta la'i 'phreng ba rim pa bcus kun nas bskor ba/ 'bas sbos chus gang la/ lha rdzas kyi rin po tsho'i pad+mo dang ut+pa la dang/ kumu da dang// ma
pa tog put+tA ri kas cha yongs su khebs pa/ yan lag brgyad dang ldan pa'i chus yongs su gang ba/ gzhi gser gyi bye ma bdal ba// sbas yid du 'od pa dang 'dres pa'i chudri zhim pas gang ba/ rin po
[4. ]chasal ma mad pas [“]shani tu brgyan pa rim pa banus kun nas bskor ba/ rin po chathams cad las byas pa'i khang pa dang/ gzhal med khang dang/ khad pa brtsigs pas rnam par da krags/
shang ba gam dar/ rta babs dang/ skar khung gi shar bu dang/ zla gam dang/ seng ge 'ashange thags dang/ sdud pa'i rgyal mtshan la sogs par n po che sna tshogs kyi 'od kyis 'bar ba ni
po che rnam pa sna tshogs grangs med pa'i 'byung gnas kyis brgyan pa rin po che'i dag ra bi cha nus spras pa'i gzhi dang ldan pa/ lha rdzas kyi sbos zhim po thams cad kyis 'khor thams cad
nas bdugs shade bsangs pa// a ka ru nag po mchog gi bdug spos kyis dri zhim par bedugs pa/ smos kyi phyug pas 'khor kun nas byugs pa/ ran po ches tshogs kyi lan kan gyis

tshu ga des kun tu bres pa/ steng 'dzam bu chu klung gi gsar gyi dra ba rin po che sna tshogs kyis rab tu spras pas kun nas bkab pa/ gser gyi dril gyi dra ba brgya stong rlung gis bskyod nyidi ba khrol

ba'i sgra yod du 'ong zhing snyan par 'byung ba/ rin pa thams cad kyi me tog gi sngon sa'o ma kun tu bkram pas rin po che'i me tog gi rgyan dang ldan pa// rinapo che sna tshogs thams cad kyi rgyal mtshan bsgyur
bas sgashan tu brgyan pa/ nor bu rin po chesna tshogs kyi 'od kyi dra ba snang ba mu med par brjod du yod pa/ rin po chesbyaru' sded po dang/ rdo rjed/ man shelal sogs pa'i gter bcastod kun gyis
shes pa phun sum tshogs pas mdzod mi zad pa dang ldan pa// brdab shang gi ra ba chen po banus brgyan pa mthong ste/ da ni btsem ra ma lha'i bshes gnyen ma gzugs mdzes shang

bzang la blta na sdug pa// gya nom pa la kha dam pa rgyas pa dang ldan pa/ gsar kyi kha dog ltar 'dug pa nga mdog can/ skra mthon mthing du 'dug pa/ lus kyi yan lag dang/ nying lag tshul dang 'dra bar rnam
par grub ra/ 'dod pa'i khams kyi lhadang ma thams cad las 'phags pa kha dog dang/ gzugs dang/ dbyibs mdzes pa dang ldan pa/ tshadas pa las kyang 'das pa'i dbyangs kyi yan lag dang ldan pa/

gams can thams cad kyi sgra skad kyi tshul la mkhas pa// rgyan thams cad dang ldan zhing yid du 'ong pa'i dbyangs can/ rnam par thar pa yi ge'i 'khor lo'i rgyan la mkhas pa dang ldan pa/ bzo dang gtsug
pa lag thams cad la mkhas par byung ba/ chos kyi yi shes sgyum la mkhas par bslabs pa// byang chub sems dpa'i thabs dang tshul rnam pa thams cad du thob pa// rin po che'i lhab lhub sna tshogs kyis

rnam par brgyan pa'i lus yid du 'ong ba dang ldan pa/ rAni pa ni thams cad las byas pa'i dra ba bod shan tu gsal bas lus rab tu brgyan pa/ lha rdzas kyi nor bu rin po che'i rgyan dang lhab lhub grangs med pas/

rab tu brgyan pas lus shan tu 'bar ba/ nor bu rin po che dam pa yid bzhin gyi rgyal po'i cod pan thogs pa/ ran po che bo m+ma'i 'phreng ba mdo zungs rdo rjer po che sna tshogs dang/ nor bu rin po che seng

ga mdzes pa sna tshogs bkye ba mgul na thogs pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba spyad pa la skal ba mthun pa dang smon lam gcig pa'i 'khoramang po gzhan gyis ma byed cing 2de dud pa dang ldan pa/ bsad nams nang yi/
shis kyi tshigs chen po'i gter ma zad pa'i mdzod dang ldan pa 'dug pa mthong ste/ des khyim de dag thams cad dang/ rin po che'i gnas dang bzhal med khang gi rgyan de dag thams cad khyad rang gi lus
las byung ba'i 'od dga' bar byed pa/ lus bde ba dang sam pa skyed pa// sams khong nas dga' bar byed pas gsal zhing snang bar byas pa mthong ngo// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu
nor bzad s kyis/ bcom pa ma lha'i bshes gnyen mabargyad pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ mdun du bdug nas thal mo sbyarate 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags ma bdag gis bla na med
pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems bskyed na ji ltar byang chub sems dang/sa byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dad ji ltar nan tan du bgyi bam 'tshal te/'phags
man byang chub sems dpa' rnams l gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa mdzad do zhes bdag gis thosan/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang/
ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba la phags mas bdag la bstan du gsol// des smras pa/ ]rags kyi bu kho mos ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa 'dod chags dang bral ba'i mthar
phyin pa zhes bya ba theg ste/ rags kyi bu de ltar kho mo ni lha rnams la lha mo'i gzugs dang/ kha dog dang/ dbubs dang/ chu zheng las kyang lhag par kha dog gsal ba dang/
ma rnam par dag pas ni la mos pa bzhin du da bar byed do// de bzhin du klu dad/ gnod sbyin dang/ drir dang/ lham yan dang/ nam mkha' ldade dad/ mi 'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po dang/ ma dang
na mi ma yin pa rnams labad bud med kyi gzugs dang/ kha deg dang/ dbyibs dang/ chu zheng lhag par 'od gsal zhing rnam par dag pas rtsi la mos pa bzhin du snyadabar byed de// sems can gad 'dod

chags kyis kun nas 'khor ba'i sems dang ldan pa dag khomi'i drung du 'ongos na'ang/ de dag thams cad la kho mo ni 'dod chags dang bral bar 'gyur ba'i phyir chos ston te/ dadag gis chos da thos nas kyang

pa 'dod chags dang bral ba thob par 'gyur ro// byang chub sems dpa'i ti de 'dzazhi chags pa med pa zhes bya ba da rab tu 'thob bo/ la la ni bo ma mthadam thag tu'adod chags dang bral bar 'gyur te/ byang
chub sems dpa'i tade de 'dzin dga' ba dang ldan pa zhes bya ba'od rab tu'athob bo/ la la ni gtam byas pa tsam gyis 'dod chags dang bral ba thob par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i tid dbadza'i
chags pa med pa'i dbyangs shes bya ba'ang rab tu 'thob bo/ la la nila gnas bzung ba tsam gyis 'dod chags dang bral ba thob par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i tod de 'dzan sangs rgyas
kyi zhing thams cad du rjes su 'gro zhing gnas pa zhes bya ba 'ad rab tu bsleb bo// la lan gcig tu 'grogs pa tsam gyis bded chugadang bral ba thob da ra bgyur te/ rgyar nub sems dpa'i tid de
'dzazhi pral pos snang ba zhes bya ba'id rab tu 'thob bo// la la na ba ltas pa tsam gyis 'dod chags dang bral ba thob par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rab tu zhi ba rnam pa'i rgyan
ces bya ba 'ad rab tu ba theng ba/ la lan glal pa tsam gyis 'dod chags da la ba thob par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i tang 'dzani phas kyi rgol ba rnam par 'thor ba zhes bya ba'ang rab
tu 'thob po/// la la na mog btsums pa tsam gyis 'dod chags dang phral du thob par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i tade de 'dzazhi sangs rgyas kyi yul snang ba zhes bya ba'ang rab tu 'thob bo//

la la ni pad du 'khyud pa tsam gyi se 'dod chags dang bral ba thob par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i tang de 'dzan 'gro ba thams cad yodas su sdud rung mi gtong ba'i snying po zhes bya ba'ang rab tu
thob bo// la la ni bo byas pa tsam gyis 'dod chags dang bral ba thob par 'gyur te/ byang chub sems dpa'i tade de 'dzan 'gro ba thams cad bsod nams kyi mdzod la ldog par byed pa zhes bya babad

rab tu 'thob po// de ltar kho mo ni sems can gang ji snyed cag kho me'i drud du 'ong ba de dag thams cad kyang/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa 'dod chags dang bral ba'i mthar phyin pa/ thams cad
bya// mkhyen ragis chugs pa med pa la mngon du gyur pa 'di nyid la rab tu 'god do/// skyas ra// 'phags ma khyod ni lta bu'i phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan pa de
khyed kyi dag pa'i rtsa ba ni gang du bskyed/ 'phrani 'as na jilta bu zhage bsags/ smas pa// rigs kyi bu kho mos dran na 'das pa'i dus shagen/ de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas mkhyen pa dang zhabs su ldan pa/ bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa// bla na med pa// skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo sgyur ba/ lta dang mi'i sten pa sangs rgyas
bcom ldan 'das shani tumatho bar gshegs pa zhes bya ba 'jag rten du byung ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa shan tu mtho bar gshegs pa de sems can rnams la thugs brtse ba'i sa don du/ rgyal po'i
gnas sgo bzang po zhes bya bar gshegs nas sgo thim pa la zhabs kyis non pa'i tshe/ grong khyer du thams cad kyang rab tu g.yos nas yangs shadirgya che la/ ra pa cha du ma las byas par yodas su

grub dar gyur te/ steng gi bar snang yang rin po cha mad pa'i 'od kyis rnam par brgyan pa dang/ rin po che'i me tog sna tshogs kyis yongs su gang ba dang/ lha rdzas kyi rol mo sna tshogs kyi sgrarab tu 'byud

ba dang/ lha'i lus kyi sprin tshad med par rgya che bas khebs par gyur to// rigs kyi bu kho mo yang de'i tshe/ tshong dpon gyi nud ma zhag tu gyur te blo gros bzang mo zhes bya'o// de nas kho mo che 'phrul
gyis yad dag par bskul nas khyim thabs dang lhan cig tu dad ded ste/ de ba'an gshegs pa grang bar gyi srid du gshegs pa la dang pa rgya chen po skyes te/ kho mos ra'i pa ba la bu gcige yul
la/ de'i tshe 'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa'od 1 bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa sha'i dumatho bar gshegs pa'i zhabs 'brang na 'dug ste/ des kho mos bla na med pa yang dag par
rdzogs pa'i byang chung dusems pa skyed do// rigs kyi bu kho mes byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa 'dod chags dang phrul ba'i mthar phyin pa 'di shes par khrad na/ kho mos byang chub sems
da pa'i thabs dar yi shes mtha' yas pa la gnas pa/ bsadanams rgyache zhing yangs pa'i mdzod dang ldan pa/ yabashes kyi yul la thug pa med pa de dag gi spyod pa shes pa bam/ yon tan brjod/
par nus re skan/ seng rags kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyidin/ grong khyer dag ba'i pa re la tu phyin pa zhes bya ba yod da Da de na khyim bdag zhan khugs shes bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod
rtan tsan dan gyi khri 'phad can la mchod pa byed pa zhig 'dug gas/ de'i gan du sod la ji ltar byang chub sems dang/ sa byang chub sems dpa' byed pa la bslab par bya ba dang/ ji ltar nan tan
nas tshong dpon gyi bunor bzangs kyis/ bcom pa la lha'i bshes gnyenama'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ bcom pa ma lha'i bshes gnyen
ma la lan brgyastod du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas yang dang yang bltas te/ bcon pa ma lha'i bshes gnyen ma'i drung nas song ngo// de nas/

tshong da pon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/ grong khyer dag ba'i pha rol tu phyin par khyim bdag nan khugs kyi khyim gan ba der phyin nas/ khyim bdag nan khugs kyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/
mdun du 'dug nas thal mo sbyar tu 'di skad ces smras sa// 'phags pa bdag gis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ ji ltar bya dachub sems dpas byang chub sems
dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang/ ji ltar nan tan du brgya bam 'tshal te/ 'phags pa ni byung chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa mdzad d zhes bdag gis
thes na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang/ jiltaronan tan du bgyi ba 'apags pas bdag la bshad du gsalo/ des smras pa//
rabs kyi bu khe bo no byang chub sems dpa' rnam par thar pa yongs su mi zad pa thob pa ste/ rigs kyi bu kha ba'i sems kyi rgyud las na 'jage rten gyi khams thams cad nas rgyad/ sems can/
'dul ba'i dbang du mdzad pa ma gtogs par/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad nas kyang shan tu mya ngan las 'da' ba'i tshul du de bzhin gshegs pa yongs su mya ngan las 'das dmed do//
[.l]yongs su mya ngan las 'da' ba med de// yongs su mya ngan las 'da' bar 'gyur ba med do// rigs kyi bu de ltar kho ba ni de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod rten tsan dan gyi khri 'phang ba sgo 'byed pa/
ste kho be mchod rten gyi sgo 'byed 'bad pas byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin sangs rgyas kyi dgis mi zad pa'i rgyan ces bya ba thob bo// rigs kyi bu kho bo ni tide de 'dzin 'di nyid la sems
kyi skad cig skad cag tu mnyam par gzhog sta/ sems kyi skad nuge thams cad la'ang khyad par gyi rnam pa du ma rab tu 'thed bo// smras pa// 'phags pa nyid de 'dzan de'i yul ji lta bu zhige mchas/
smras pa// rigs kyi bu khe bo ting nge 'dzin 'a di la snyoms par zhugs pa'i tshe/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud 'di sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa bsod skyabs la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs
pa thams cad dang/ gser thub dang/ lag par dad la dad/ thams cad mnga' ba dang/ gtsug ter dang/ rnam par gzigs dang/ rgyal dang rdzogs mdzad dang/ grags mchog dang
pad+mo'i bla la sogs pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyang sangs rgyas mthong ba'i mtshams 'brel bas/ sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa rgyan ma 'chad pa'i tshul gyis mngon sum du
mthong ste// sems kyi skad cige gcig la sangs rgyas brgya'ada mthong ngo// de'i 'og ma'i sems kyis sangs rgyas stong yang mthong ngo// de'i 'og ma'i sems kyis sangs rgyas brgya phrag steng
[s/ ]@#// yang mthad nga// de bzhin du sangs rgyas bye ba dang/ sangs rgyas bye ba phrag brgya dang/ sangs rgyas bye ba phrag stod dang/ sangs rgyas bya brgya phrag stong dang/ sangs
rgyas bye ba khrag khrig dang/ sangs rgyas bye ba dung phyur dang/ sangs rgyas bya ba thams thams dang/ sangs rgyas bye ba khrigs khrags dang/ de'i 'og ma'i sems kyis sangs rgyas 'byung ba
gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa brjod dumed pa yang brjod du med pa dag kyang mthod do// de'i 'og ma'i sems kyis de bzhin gshegs pa 'dzam bu'i gling gi rdul shan tuphru ba snyad kyang mthong ngo//

de'i 'og ma'i sems kyis de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i bar gyi rdul shani'uphra ba snyed kyang mthong ste/ de ba ni gshegs pa de dag gis thugs dang po
bskyed pa'i tshogs gtsage nas gtsug tu brgyud pa la 'jug go/ thugs dang po bskyed pas thob pa'i rnam par 'phrul pala'ang 'jug go/ smon lam rnam pa tha dad pa mngon par 'asgrub pa mngon par dag
'a@#pa la'ang 'jug go/ spyod pa rnam par dag pa la'ang 'jug go/ pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su rdzogs par mdzad pa la'ang 'jug go/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa thams cad yongs su bsgrub
la'ang 'jug go/ bklad pa brnyes pa rnam par dag pa la'ang 'jug go/ bdud kyi dkrugs ma rnam par 'thor ba khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba la'od 'jug go/ mngon par rdzogs par
'tshang rgya ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyan la'ang 'jug go/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing rnam par dag par mdzad pa rnam pa tha dad pa la'ang 'jug go/ sems can yongs su sman par mdzad pa rnam pa tha
dad pa la'ang 'jug go/ 'kher kun nas 'dus pa rnam pa tha dad pa la'ang 'jug ba// bod kyi dkyil 'khor rnam pa tha dad pa la'ang 'jug go/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i khyu mchog gi
mthu phyud ba 'du'ad 'jug go/ sangs rgyas kyi rdzu 'phrul dang/ rnam par 'phrul pa dang/ cho'aphrul 'khabang 'jug go/ de bzhin gshags pa de dag gis chos bstan pa'i ng natsAn tu rnam par
gsa' ba dad ma 'dres par dran te yad dag par 'a to// dran pas yongs su bcangs so// rig pas rab tu shes par byed do// blo gros kyis shin tu rnam par 'byed de// blos/
rtags par byed do// shes rab kyis snang bar byed do// ma byon pa'i sangs rgyas gcig nas gtsug tu brgyud pa byams pa la sogs pa dag kyang mthong zhinge shes te/ sems kyi skad cig
gcig la sangs rgyas brgya'ang mgrod do// de'i 'og mab sems kyis sangs rgyas steng yang mthong ba na// de'i 'og ma'i sems kyis de bzhi gshegs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med
pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shan tu phra ba snyed dag kyang mthod ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis thugs dang pa bskyed pa'i tshogs gcig nas gtub chu brgyud pa la'ang 'jug go/ de ba//
@#// gshags pa de dag gas ches bstan pa' da shani tu gsal ba dang ma 'dres pa rjes su dran te yang dag par 'dzin te// dran pas yongs su gsungs so// rig pas rab tu
shes par byed do// blo gros kyis rnam par 'byed de// byis rtogs par byed do// shes rab kyis snang bar byed de// ji ltar 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud 'di sngon gyi mtha' dang/ phyi
ma'i 'thab rtogs pa'i sangs rgyas garlag nas gcig tu brgyud pa mthong zhashes pa de bzhin du phyogs banu 'jig rten gyi khams kyi rgyud 'das pa dang/ ma 'ongs pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod
Ta/ du med pa 'i yang brjod du med pa snyed kyi de bzhin gshegs pa gcig nas gtsug tubargyud pa thams cad kyang shes shade ma shod de/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gis thugs dang po bskyed pa'i
tshogs gtsug nas gcig tu brgyud pa la'ang 'jug gi/ sangs rgyas gnag nas gcig tu brgyud pa de la bad rgyun mi 'chad pa dang/ mi zad pa dang/ dad pas shes par bya ba dang//
byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus dang/ zhesgo pas khed du chud par bya ba dang 2 byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grus kyi shugs rnam par 'phel bar byed pa dang/ 'jig rten thams
rud dang/ nyan thos dad rang sangs rgyas thams cad dang/ de'i yul la ma zhugs pa'i byang chub sems dpa' thams cad kyis mi 'bregs par shes de khed du chud par byed de// rnam
par snang mdzad la sogs pa da ltar byang ba' de pa zhazhe gshags pa phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams na bzhugs pa gtsug nas gcig tu brgyad pa thams cad kyang mthong zhade shes te[） ]sems/
kyi skad rtsog gtsag la sa da/rgyas brgya'ang mthong zhadeshas sa// de'i 'og ma'i sems kyis sangs rgyas steng yang mthong ba nas/ de'i 'og ma'i sems kyis de bzhin gshegs pa sangs rgyas
kyi nang brjod du med pa 'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shani tu dra ba spyod kyi bar du'ang mthong// nam na de bzhin gshegs pa gang gi zhal blta bar dga' ba de'i tshul ng de bzhin du mthong ste/
sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag gas bstan pa dang/ bstan pa mdzad pa dang/ bstan par 'gyur ba de dag nas skud kyang thos sa// thos nas kyang 'dzani to/ dran pas
yongs su bcangs sa// rag pas rab tungashas par byed do// blo gros kyis rnam par 'byed do// blos rtogs par byed de// shes rab kyis snang bar byed de// rigs kyi bu khe
bas ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa mdongs su mya ngan las ma 'da' ba'i mthar phyin pa 'di shes par zad na/ lo nges byang chub sems dpa' dus gsum skad cig gcig tushes
pa rab tu thob pa/ skad cig gi cha shas la teng nge 'dzin rnam par phye ba la spyod pa// de bzhin gshegs pa'i nyi ma las byung ba/ rtog pa dang rnam par rtog pa thams cad mnyam pa nyid du
[pe]// khong du chud pa// sangs rgyas thams cad dang mnyam pa'i ting nga ba'i rjes su rtogs pa// bdag dad/ sems can dang/ sa des rgyas mi gnyes par spyod pa/ rang bzhi/
gyis 'od gsal ba'i tshes kyis rgyan gyi dkyil 'khor dang ldan pa// ye shes kyi 'khrul 'khor gyis 'jig rten gyi dra ba 'gangs pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho thams cad dang mi 'gal bar rnam
par byed pa// chos kyi dbyings thams cad du rnam par rtogs par byed pa'i yi shes kyi yul dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis ches bstan pa rnam par rig par byed pa'i shes
kyi yul can de dag gi spyod pa shes pa 'am/ yon tan brjod par nus re skan/ seng ge s kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyidi nani gru 'dzad ces bya ba yod de/ de na byang chub sems dpa' spyananas
gzigs kyi dbang po zhes bya ba 'dug gas// de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang/ jiltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig
ces nas/ de'itshatshigs su bcad pa 'di gnyis sa so// sang zhig nor bzang dpal gyi chu rkyal dbung zhagAn// mkhas pa rnams kyi re la chu 'dzagi mdzes pa yod// rin chen rgyus
byas shade dang nags tshal me tog mang// bza' shing ra ba rje de dang chu bran 'bab par ldan// ri mchog de la brtan pa spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang// 'gro ba rnams la phan pa'i don du rnamaM
[of ]par spyod// de gan seng dang nor bzangs khyen la mgon po yi// yon tanargya chen tshul la 'jug pa ston par byed// de nas tshod dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyas 2 khyim/
bdag nan khugs kyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bas phyag 'tshal nas/ khyim bdag nan khugs la lan brgya stong du mas g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas te/ yang dang yang bltas nas/ khyim
bdag nan khugs kyi drung nas do ngo// ]/bam po dgu bcu rtsa brgyad pa// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs khyim bdag nan khugs kyi gdams
ngag rjes su sems shing/ byang chub sems dang 'i mos pa'i mdzod de ni shes par byed/ byang chub sems dpa'i rjes su dran pa'i stobs de ni rjes su dran par byed/ sangasargyus kyi tshul/
gcig nas gtsug tu brgyud pa'i stabs ni yang dag par 'dzin/ sangs rgyas gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i mtshams ni khed du chud par byed/ rnas shes pa'i sangs rgyas kyi mtshan de
dag gi ni rjes su 'brang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos bstan pa'i tshul de dang ni 'thun par byed/ sangs rgyas kyi yang dag par bsgrub pa'i rgyan de ni khong du chud par byed/ sangs rgyas
mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya ba'i khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba de la ni yid ches par byed/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'phrin las bsam gyis mi khyab pa de ni mngon du byed cing/ mthar
@#/ gyis ni gru 'dzan gang na ba der 'ongs nas ra gru 'dzan gyi steng du phyin te byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzugs kyi dbang po yongs su rmad cade tshol tshol pa las/ nub
phyogs legs kyi ri'i sman ljadas mtsho dang/ mtshe'u dang/ 'bab chus mdzes par gyur pa de DUr+ya sngon po'i dkyil 'khor ltar sngo zhing 'jam la gzhon pa'i spang nags tshul chen 'i
mthongs na 'dug pa zhige na/ rAsi bo che rdo rje'i rdo stegs shage la skyil mo krung bcas te 'dug cang/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi rdo stegs la 'bod pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i tshogs dpag tu med

tshe rabs kun nas bsten cing chos ston te/ chos kyi rnam grangs 'ge ba thams cad yongs su sdud pa'i yul byams pa chen pa dang [0f10 ]snying rje chen po'i sgo gsal bar ston pa zhes bya ba yang dag par ston
cing 'dug pa mthong ngo// mthong nas kyang dga' rangs te/ na gu zhing nyams bde latshim zhing yid bde ba skyes nas dga' bas rgyas shade mi 'dzums pa'i mig gis thal mo sbyar nas/ dag ba'i
gshes gnyen la dad pa'i shugs dad ldan pas sems med khrugs pa// dag pa'i bshes gnyen mthong na sangs rgyas thams cad mthod bar 'dzin ba ]dge ba'i bshes gnyen las byung ba'i
chos kyi snga ni thams cad yad dag par gzung ba'i 'du shes dang ldan pa/ yon tan dang nan tan thams cad dag ba'i bshes gnyen la rag lus pa'i 'du shes can/ dag pa'i bshes
gnyen dang phrad pa shani tu dga' bar sems ba/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen las stobs bcur ye shes rin po che'abyung zhade 'thob par 'gyur ba 'du shes dang ldan pa/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen
las ye shes snang ba mi zad pa 'byung ba'i 'du shes can/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi rten gyis bsod nams kyi rgyud rnam par 'phel bar 'gyur ba'i 'du shes dang ldan pa// dge ba'i bshes gnyin
ni thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi sgo yod dag nga/ra ston ra ba 'du shes/ dang ldan pa// dge ba'i bshes gnyen ni ye shes kyi na tshochan po la 'jug pa yongs su ston par 'du shes pa/ dka ba'i
bshes gnyen ni thams cad mkhyan pa nyid kyi tshogs yang dag par 'dus pa yodas su skyed pa'i 'du shes dang ldan pa de/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzags kyi dbang po gang na ba der lan ta
de nas byang chub sems da pa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang pos/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs range zhage nas tshur 'ong ba mthong nas smras pa// tshur sheg/ dpe med pa'i
theg pa chen po yangs shing bsam gyis ma khyab pa la zhugs pa/ skye ba las byung ba'i sdug bsngal sna tshogs kyis gtsesashang skyabs med par gyur pa'i 'gro ba thams cad yongs su bskyab pa'i
bsam pa dang ldan pa// sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad mngon sum du gyur pa// 'jig rten thams cad las 'das te dpe med tshad med pa la mngon par mos pa/ snying rje chen pos byin gyis brlabs
pas 'gro ba thams cad yongs su bskyab pa'i blo gros can/ blta na kun tu bzang pag skyed pa la mngon du bltas pa/ smon lam chen po'i dkyil 'khor yongs su spang
ba sems dang ldan pa// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi pan yongs su gzung bar ms pa// dge ba'i rtsa ba bsags pas ngoms mdeshes pa'i bsam pa dang ldan pa// dgo bo'i
bshes gnyen gyi gdams dag la yang dag par zhugs pa/ 'jam dpal gyi ye shes rgya mtsho las byud ba'i yon tan gyi 'byung gnas sangs rgyas kyi byin gyi rlabs thub par bya ba la man du
bltas pa/ tade de 'dzan gyi snang ba dadabugs/rab tu thob pa// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi ches kyi sngan gyi nar yang dag par gzung ba la mngon par mes pa'i sems dang ldan pa// sad/
rgyas mthong bas dga' ba dang mos pa'i shugos kyis de rab tu bde bar gyur pa// legs par spyod pa tshad med cing bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i shugs kyis man par brlan pa'i sems dang ldan pa/
yon tan la na tan du bya ba'i shugs kyis rnam par dag pa'i bsod nams dang ye shes kyi mdzod bdag la mngon du gyur pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes mthong ba'i lam gyi shugs gzhan yongs
subastan pa'i bsam pa can/ snying rje chen po'i shugs ma nyams pa'i rtsa ba dang ldan pa// de bzhin gshags pa'i mishes snang ba'i shugs yang dag par gzung ba'i blo gros can khyod 'ongos/

ba ba'ags se// de nas tshong dpan gyi bu nor bzangs/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzuges kyi dbang po gang na ba der song nas/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzags// de nas tshong dpon gyi ba nor bzangs/ bang
kyi dbang pa'i nad pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ byang chub sems dpa' sbyan ras gzigs la lan bcasteng du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas mdun du bdug ste thal mo sbyar/
nas 'di skad ces skyas sa// 'phags pa bdag gso bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la
bslab par bgyi ba dang/ ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa mdzad de zhes bdag gis thos na/ ji ltar byung
chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang/ ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ba lags pas bdag la bshad du gsal/ de nas byang chub sems dpa' spyan

ras gzigs kyi dbad pos/ mdog 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi kha dog tu 'dug pa/ 'od kyi dra ba rnam pa sna tshogs tshad med pa 'phro ba'i rgyan gyi sprin rab tu 'gyed pa'i lag pa g.yas pa brkyang ste/

mtshan dang dpe byad bzang po las byung ba'i 'od zer sna tshogs dri ma med pa/ lus dang sems kyi bde ba tshad med pa rab tu skyed pa'i tshogs kyis shin tu rgyas pa'i lag pa tshod dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyi spyi bo laM/
gzhag ste 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu de ltar khyed kyis bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tusems bskyed pa legs so legs so// rigs kyi bu ngan

byang chub sems dpa' spyod pa'i sgo snying rje chen po'i sgo thogs pa med pa zhes bya ba shes te/ gas kyi bu nga'i byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i sgo snying rje chen po'i sgo thogs pa med pa de ni 'gro ba thams cad la

dbye ba med par sems can yongs su snyan par bya ba dang 'dul pa la zhugs pa// sgo kun nas thos shade rnam par rig par 'gyur pas// sems can yongs su bsdu ba dang gdul ba la nye bar gnas pa ste/ rags kyi bu

rgyu de ltar da byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i sgo snying rje theg pa'i sgo thegs pa med pa la gnas pas(de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhabs kyi drung nas kyang mi g.yo la/sems can thams cad kyi dgos ba'ang sta gon/
ru gnas te/ sbyin pas kyang sems can yongs su sdud de// dag snyan pa dang/ don bya ba dang/ don 'thun pas kyan sems can yongs su sdud do// gzugs kyi lus rnam par bstan pas kyang sems can yongs su

N+NaM smapar byed do// kha drag dang/ dbyibs dang/ gzugs bsam gyis ma khyab pa bstan te/ rnam par dmigs par bya ba dang 'od zer gyi dra ba dbye bas kyang sems nyakarab tu sam par byed cing yongs su sma'i

par byed do// bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du dbyangs brjod pa dang/ rtsa la dga' bab spyod lam yongs su bstan pa dang/ mos pa sna tshogs dang tshul 'thun par chos bstan pa dang/ rdzu 'phrul dang rnam par baphrul pa rnam
byas/ bsna tshogs dang/ dge ba'i chos bsags par bag med pa'i sems can gyi sems yongs su bskul ba dang bsam pa dang 'thun par sprul pa sAtshogs tshad med pa yongs su bstan pa dang/ rages sku
tshogs su skyes pa'i sems can rnams dang skal ba bathun pa'i gzugs yongs su bstan pa dang/ gnas kha cig 'grogs pas kyang sems can yongs su bsdus shang yongs su smin par byed do//
rigs kyi bu de ltar ngas byang chub bams dpa'i spyod pa'i sgo sAdi rjechen po'i sgo thogs pa med pa 'di yongs su sbyangs pas/ gro ba thams cad rab tu rten pa'i smon lam bskyed de 'di ltar sems
sha thams cad kyi gzhad sa'i 'jigs pa dang sams na thams cad kyi rgyud kyi 'jigs pa zhibar bya ba dang/ sems can thams cad kyi mgo rmongs pa'i 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang/ sems
na thams cad kyi bcadis da ba'ajigs pa yongs su gcad pa dang/ sems can thams cad kyi srog la bab par mi bde ba'i 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang/ sems can thams cad kyi yo byad kyis/
'das pa ba jigs pa bsal ba dang/ sems can thams cad kyi 'tshob med pa de 'jigs pa zhi bar bya ba dang/ las can thams cad kyi grags pa med pa'i 'jigs pa las yongs su bzla ba dang// sems can thamA
thad kyi 'khor pa'i 'jigs pa rab tu 'bar bya ba dang/ sems can thams cad kyi 'a khod du bag tshang gi 'jigs pa med par bya ba dang/ sems mas nang rtsiba'i 'jig sa pa las rnam par bzlog pa dang/
sems can thams cad kyi ngan song gi 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang/ sems can thams cad kyi lam mun pas nyam nga ba phyir ma ldog pa'i snang bas gsal bar bya ba dang/ sems/

ma can thams cad kyi skal ba ma mnyan pa dang 'grogs pa'i 'jig pa kun tu bsal ba dang/ sems can thams cad kyi sdug pa dang bral ba 'jags pa dgag par bya ba dang/ sems can thams cad kyi mi sdug pa dang
'grogs pa'i jigs pa med par bya ba dang/ sems can thams cad lus la ma bde ba'i 'jigs pa dang bral bar bya ba dang/ sems can thams cad sems la mi bde ba'i 'jigs pa las dgrol ba dad/sams

nga can thams cad sdug bsngal ba dang/ de ma bde ba dang/ 'khrug po las yongs su bzla ba'i phyir/'gro ba thams cad rab tu rten pa'i smon lamaman par bsgrub pa 'di byas so// sems can thams cad kyi 'jigs

pa rnam par zhi bar bya ba'i phyir yang 'jab rten du rjes su dran pa'i sgo byan gyis brlabs nas//sems can thams cad 'jags pa dang bral bar bya ba'i phyir/rang gi mang gi 'khor 'bad 'jig rten du rnam par dmigs

par bya sa//dus ji lta ba bzhin du 'gro bas rnam par dmog/sa par bya ba'i phyir 'gro ba thams cad rnam pa'i bye brag mtha' yas pa dang mnyam par nga'ilus kyang byin gyis brlabs sog rigs kyi bu de ltar da ni thabs sa

gams can thams cad 'jigs pa las yongs su bkrel zhade sangs rgyas kyi tshes thams cad thob par bya ba'i phyir/bla na med pa yang dag pa rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed cing phyir mi ldog par byed do//rigs kyi

bu ngas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i sge snying rje chen po'i sgo thogs pa med pa 'di thob par zad na/ngas byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po rnams sangs rgyas thams cad kyi smon lam gyi de kyal ka khor la rnamakhar

dag pa/byang chub sams dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa khod du da bar rtogs kha/dag ba'i chos mngon par 'du bya ba rgyun mi gcod pa brgya dang ldan pa/byang chub sems dang 'di de 'dzan thams cad kyi rgyudal
rtog tumanyam par bzhag pa/ bskal pa thams cad du gnas shade spyod pa las phyir mi ldog pa'i rgyud dang ldan pa dus gsum thams cad tshul rjes su rtogs pa'i rgyud dad ldan pa 'jig rten gyi khams than
cad kyi gling yongs su 'khul ba'i rgyud la mkhas pa/sems can thams cad kyi/deg ba'i sems rnam par zhi bar byed pa rgyud dang ldan pa// sems can thams cad kyi dag pa'i sems yongs su 'phel ba'i
rgyun dang ldan pa// sems can thams cad 'khor ba'i rgyun las pa re ldog par byed bab rgyud dang ldan pa de dag gi spyod pa shes pa 'am yon na brjod bdanus re skan// de la 'di skad ces
bya'o g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas te gus par bkur bskyed nas nor bzangasan tu dus lho phyogs rgyud du song/ spyan ras gzagis dbad drang srong lha'i rje rnam spyod pa// rin chen ra yi
sul na gnas par ris kyang mang// de chen sna tshogs rdo rje'i ri yi sman ljongs na// bad+mo'i snyid pa'i seng ge 'i khri lo brtan par 'dug/ lha dang lha mni klu dang srazhi pomi 'am ci// rgyal
dbas kyis bskor cing de la chos kyad stan// mthong nas nor bzangs dga' ba tshad med skyes par gyur/ khastan te yon tan rgya mtsho'i skad la phyag 'tshal nas// can s/
bzad pa'i spyod pa bdag gse 'thob 'gyur bar// 'phags pas thugs rje bskyed de gdams shing bslab par gsal// bsod nams brgyabs brgyan pa'i drind lag bskyar skye// 'do sngani dra ba/
rgya chen bzang po rab ston pas// nor bzangs spyi bor bzhag ste sems can rnam dag pa// spyan gzigs kyi dpa da des bsag pa/sa tshig 'dasems// sangs rgyas sras po ngani rnam tharagacig sgo/

shes yo shas skade po rgyal ba kun gyi thugs rjes skyug/ 'gro ba thams cad bskyab cing yodas su bsdu phyir byung// kun tu bdag nyaderang la khyams ra bzhin du rgyu// 'gro ba mang po thams cad sdug bsngal
kun las skyob// gang rnams dam du bdes shang dgru lag phyin pa dang/ lus la gzer tsang de bzhun btson rar btsud pa yang// ngayi mad thos bcings shang bzir ba thar par 'gyur// rgyal po dag la nyis
pa'i yon byas gsad spangs pa// de tshe de dag da yimade skad dran 'gyuran// mad go 'phangs de yi lus la pag par mi 'gyur te// mtshon rnon btab kyad de dag mi 'dzug rgyal bor 'gyur// dubar
ngo'i 'khor du phyin dang gang rnams rtsod gyur pa// dgra rnams kun las rgyal brgyur grags pa thob par 'gyur// grags dang grogs dang rigs dang nor rnams 'aphel bar 'gyur//nga yimade drag de dag
tsaman/ thub bamed par 'gyur// gdags nga yi mi de ni rjes su dran byas pa// de dag rkun pos 'jigs dgo dgra sa ba jags zhags bun te// seng ge don gzig gcan gzan g.yag rgod sprul gang yang//
dgra rnams kun las rgyal zhade 'jigs pamed par 'gyur/ gang rnams las nga yi med zhag dran byas na// sdang ba'i sems kyis kaltadas su bor gyur tam// sel mdag lci me rab tu 'bar/
bar bar gyur kyang// me mas pad+mes gad pa'i tshul gter du 'gyur/ da yamangaskad 'grab yud tsam rjes dran// rgya mtsho'i rgyun der da yi nad du 'tshar ma 'gyur// chubosam khyer ma yi
dbus su bdag mi 'gyur// den med kun tu mi 'gyur rten rnams 'grub par 'gyur// shari sgrog dbyig btsangs lcags sgrig de bzhan ltung rnams dang// brnyasangashad khyud pasad de ba zhi brade cing
bslus pa dang// sbyosashade nga sdogs te gshe dang sku phab rnam pa las// ngayi mad tsam dran par byasun thar pa thob// gang rnams shar ganyer sna tshogs glags lta ji snyed dang// gang rnams rtag tu
zha sdod mi snyan rjod pa rnams// ngayimang thos dran byas/ snyan par rjod par 'gyur/ mthong pa tsam gyisame la byams pa'i sems kyang skye// nga yi med tsam la la gang gas dran byas na// gnod
ba'i de'i dur la ngas sngags dang bya da byed pa'i// dgra rnams rtag tu de yi zal rgyas sho par 'gyur// ma lus dug ga sa de yi lus la mi tshugs sa// la las gang gis nga yi mdi tsan dran byos//
daklu dbang sAni tshog sam khab 'deshaza thams cad dang// grul bus srul po 'tshabyed gtum pa'i sems ldan dang// mdangs 'phrog 'jags byed rmalam 'od bar/
ma zhi bar bgyur// da yi ming ni skad ge yud tsam dran byas kyang// pha dang ma nad gnyen bshes mdza' ba kun dang yang// 'bral bar 'gyur ldang dang 'grogs par de bzhAne mni/
nor zad mi 'gyur ba medas pa'i dngos su 'gyur ro// de yi ming gi rjes su la la dran byed na// 'di nas shaba'os mnar med sems dmyal ma'agro ste/ dbyal sad skye gnas la dgasam khem gnas
sumani// sems can dag pa lha dang ma yi gnas su skye// nga yi mnge na la la dang gse dran byas na/ dmus 'ang zhar pa ban pa zha bar ma 'gyur te// 'thed po 'do bar mi 'gyur gsal smra ba khyu
sdug 'gyur// bskal pa bye ba mad par dbang po kun ldan bagyur/ la la gang gis nga ya mang ni rjes dran n// sems can dag pa 'di nas shi 'gros phyogs bcu yi// 'jig rten khams su
sangs rgyas mngon sum skye bar 'gyur// sangs rgyas mthod 'gyur de dag rjes kyang shes par 'gyur// 'di dang de bzhin gzhan dag thabs mang ji snyed kyis// 'gro ba sems can du 'dul gzhal dad
zad minus// sangs rgyas sras pa ngas ni rnam thar gtsuge bsgom te//yon tan can gyi yon tan thams cad ngas ma shes// de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa' gzhan du ma 'gro ba zhes bya ba//
dbyAk+ka/ shar phyogs nas namam ba'i dbyangs las 'das te mdzad kyi 'jig rten gyi khams kyi khor yug gi rtsamer 'dug go/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan du mi 'gro bsam ded kyi 'jig rten gyi khams len
yul ga rtsomo la skad gnyis ma thag tu/semazed kyi 'jig rten gyi khams 'di rnam pa drug tu g.yos terani bo'i nad bzhin du kun nas gnas par gyur cudachub sems dpa' gzhan du mi 'gro ba des

nyi ma dang zla ba'i 'od thams cad bral gyis non pa dang/ lha dang klu dang/ gnod sbyin dang/ dritsadang/ lha ma yin dang/ nam mkha' 'di dang mi'am ci dang/ lto 'phye chen po dang/ brgyadan dang/ tshangs pa dang/ 'jage rten

gyi mgon po dang me dang rin po che dang/ glog dang/ skar ma'i 'od kyad ze'i khyis zhen pa de lta bu'i dalus las bkya ste/ sems can dmyal ba chen po nag kyar snang bar byas/ kha sang gi skye gnas dang gshin rje'i

'jig rten gyi lam gyi rgyud thobs pa thams cad kyang snang bar byas te/ ngan song gi sdug bsngal thams cad khyad de ma thag tu zhago/ sems can thams cad kyi nyon mdos pa dnganyams su mi gnod par gyur to// mya ngan

gyi zug rdu dang sdug bsngal snatshogs kyan rtsa ba'i bar gyur to// sangs rgyas kyi zhade 'di thams cad dub da rin po phyi'i sngon gyi char bab ste/ me tog dang/ sos dang/ bdug pa dang/ 'phreng ba dang/ byug pa
dang/ phyi ma dod/ na bza' dang/ gdugs dad rgyal mtshan dang/ padan gyi rgyan thams can dad ldan pa'i mchod pa sna tshogs kyi sprashe gyin yang mno par phab ste/ bcom ldan 'das dang
na ba der song ngo// de'i lus de'i gzugs bar nan sems can thams cad kyi gnas su snang ba ste/ bsam pa jilta ba bzhin du sam par byed pa la mngon par gzhol bas/ ni gru 'dzazhi
jul byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi dang ra po'i drung dub da nga ni par snang ngo// de nas byang chub sems dpa' snga nas gzigs kyi dbad pes/ tshong dpen gyi bu nor ba zangs
la 'di skad ces smras sa// rags kyi bu khyod kyis byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dum 'gro ba 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'di'i nyin pa mthong ngam/ smras pa/ 'phags pa mthong ngo/ snus pa/ rigs kyi
bu byang chub sems dpa' gzhan du 'gro ba'i gan du songal/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang/ dzaltar nan tan du bya ba dus shig la
da nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gabregs kyi dbang po'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras gzigs kyi da bad pa la lan
brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su pa skor ba byas nas/ byang chub sems dpa' spyan ras galpags kyi debad pa'i drung nas song ngo// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor badrangs// byang chub sems
dpa' naras gzigs kyi dbang po'i yo shes kyi gde ma red pa'i sems kyis/ spyan ras gzigs kyi dbang po bltas pas kyang ma ngogs pa'i n du bsgo ba dang mi 'gal bar byang chub sems dang 'a

[4]gzhan du 'gro ba gang na ba der snyed ste/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan du 'gro ba'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal nas/ mdun du 'dug ste thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras go ba phags pa bdag gis

bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ltar byang chub sems da pas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang/ ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/ 'bags ba ni byang chub
sems dang 'ams la gdams dag dar rjes su bstan pa mdzad do zhes bdag kas thes na/ji ltar bya da chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang/ ji ltar nan tan du bgyi ba
'phags pas bdag la bshad du gsol/ des smras pa// rigs kyi bu nga ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa'i sgo kun tu 'gro ba theb pago smas pa// 'phags pa khyod kyi
bzhi gshegs pa gang gi zhabs kyi drung nas/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa sgo kun tu 'gro ba zhes bgyi ba 'di brnyes/ 'jig rten gyi khams de ni 'di nas ji sridatsan mchas/'ag rten gyi kham
de nas bzhud zhus na ji srid zhu lags/ snus pa/ rigs kyi bu gnas 'dan lha dang/ ma dang/ lha ma yan du bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang/ dag phyed dang bram ze khams pa'i skye dgus kyang shes par dka' ste/

don byed chub sems dpa'i mthu dang byang chub sems dpa'i brtson 'grusam ldog pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa mi 'a phreg pa'i yul te/ de ni rigs kyog dag khag bshes gnyen gyis yongs su ma zin pa/
sang sa rgyas kyis ma dgod sa pa// dag pa len pa ma bsags pa/ bsam pa yongs su ma dag pa/ byang chub sems dpa'i dbang pom theg pa// shes rab kyi mig dang ma ldan ba rnams/
kyis thes pa ma/ yodas su gzung ba bam/ 5dems pa 'am/ khyed du chud par bya ba nam nus so// smras pa/ sangs rgyas kyi mthu dang dag ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gzungs kyis/ dad pa dang mes pas/
bgyin 'o pags pas bdag la bka' mi stsal tam/ des smras pa// rigs kyi bu dan shar phyogs kyi ba jig rten gyi khams dpal gyi de pe dang ldan pa// de bzhi gshegs pa dpal kun nas yang
dag par 'byung ba'i sangs rgyas kyi zhade nas 'das ste/de bzhin gshegs pa dpal kun nas yang dag par 'byung ba'i zhabs kyi drung nas/ des byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa sgo kun tu 'agro ba 'di

thob pe// degs kyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams dpal gyi snyan pa dang ldan pa de nas da sad nas ni/ bskal pa sangs rgyas kyi zhange brjed dumed pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul nyane tuphra ba med nag 'das te/

sems bskyed pa der zhade yang gom pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du med pa'i rdul shani tus pa skyed cage bar ro// gom pa re res kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhade brjed dumed pa'i rdul shan tuphra ba skyed kyi sangs
rgyus kyi yod 'das te/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing de dag thams cad kyang de bzhin gshegs pa dang ldan par shes te/ sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das de dag thams cad la'ang de bzhin gshegs pa'i mchod pa rgyun
wa med pa yod kyi rang bzhani chos nyidi mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rgyas btab pa/ de bzhin gshegs bas gnang ba// byang chub sems dpa'i dga' ba yongs su bskyed pas mchod pa byas so// 'jig rten gyi

khams de dag zha sems can gyi khams rgya mtshoji snyed pa de dag thams cad kyang mthod ste/ de dag thams cad kyi sems mtsho'ang khong du chud de// de dag thams cad kyi dbang ba'i 'khor 'ong yongs su shes
shad bsam pa dang mes pa ji lta bzhin du gzugs kyi lus yongs su bstan te// chos kyi dbyangs rab tu bsgrags so// 'od kyi da skya'i 'khor yongs su bkyago yo byad sna tshogs phun sumatshogs/
ngas kyang nyeb sdud de// rang gi lus kyang de dag la byan gyis babs te/ de ni yongs su smin par bya ba dang gdul pa'i sbyor brgyud 'chad pa'i phyir ro// shar phyogs nas ji ltar 'das pa
de bzhin du lho phyogs dang/ nub phyogs dang/ byang phyogs dang/ bya shar gyi phyogs mtshams dang/ shar lho'i phyogs mtshams dang/ lhonub kyi phyogs mtshams dang/ nub byang gi phyogs mtshamA
dang 'og dang steng gi phyogs nas kyang de bzhin te/ ragis kyi bu ngasazhi byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa sgo kun tu 'gro ba zhes bya ba 'di shes par zad na/ das byang chub sems dpa' phyogs/
kun tu mngon par gzhalo ba/ tha mi dad pa'i yi shes kyi yul dang ldan pa/ mas kyi dpa nges thams cad du lus rnam par bkod pa/ de sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa dang/ mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du
'thun par spyod pa// zhade thams cad lus gusergyas par 'gengs ba/ chos thams cad kyi rgyud kyi rjes su song ba/dus gsum kyi rgyud mnyam panyadedu gyur ba/ chos kyi phyogs kyi rgyud dang

mnyam ba nyid du gyur pa'i lus dang ldan pa// 'gro ba pa'i rgyud thams cad du rnam par snang ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i rgyud thams cad la rnam par rtog pa med pa chags pa med pa'i rgyud thams cad khong du chud pa/

gnas med pa rgyud la rab tu gnas pa de dag go na dngashes pa'i m/ yon tan brjod par yang nus re skan/ sang rig sa kyi bu lho phyogs kyi rgyud 'di nyidin grong khyer sgo dang ldan pa zhig bya ba yod de/ den lha lhachan
po zhes bya ba'i lha 'dug gas/ de'i gan du sango la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang/ ji ltonan tan du bya ba drisangagage/ den tshod dpon gyi

bunor babrangs kyase/ byang chub sems dang ba gzhan du ma 'gro ba'i skar pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal to/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan dum 'gro ba la lan brgya skyed du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas
nas yang dang yang bstas te/ byang chub sems dpa ba gzhan du ma 'gro ba'i drung nas song ngo// de nas tshong dpon gyi pu ner bzangs byang chub sems dang 'i spyod pa rgya chen po'i rjes su song ba'i
