nams dang ldan pa/ byang chub sems dpa' gzhan du mi 'gro ba'i yo shes kyi spyod yul 'ded pa'i ngang tshul can/ mngon par shes pachen po mngon par bsgrub pa'i yul yon tan gyi khyad par du lta ba/
brtson 'grus brtan pa'i go cha rab tu dga' ba khyad par thob pa// bsam gyis ma khyab pa'i rnam par thar pas rnam par rtse ba'i rjes su sad ba'i bsam pa dang ldan pa de/ byang chub sems pa yon tan
gyi sa la zhi zhin tan du byed tadi da ba dza'i gyi na lan rnam par spyod/ gzungs kyis la rab tu gnas par byed/ smon lam gyi sa lazhi 'jug par byed/ tha dad pa yang dag par shes pa'i sa la ni rjes

su sleb/ stebs kyi sa la na yongs su sgrub cung mthar gyis grong sbyar sgo dang ldan pa gang na ba der song ste/ lha lha chen po kun tu dris pa dang/ de la 'gro bgad pas bstan pa/ rigs kyi du ba der/ lha lha chen po
grong khyer gyi lam gyi bsad na bdag nyid shin tu che bas sems can rnams la chos ston cing 'dug go/ de nas tshong dpe gyi munyer bzangs lha lhachen pa gang na ba der sado ste/ lha lha chen po'i
rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal taM/ mdun du 'dug ste thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags pa bdag gis blon med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub sems bskyed na/ jiltar
byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang/ jiltar nan tan du bgyi ba ma 'tshal te/ 'phags pa ni byang chub sems dpa' rnams la gdams ngag dang rjes su bstan pa/
mdzad do zhes bdag gis thosan/ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bgyi ba dang (jiltar nan tan du bgyid 'phags pas bdag la bshad dugasalo/
wa pa chen pos lag pa bzhi phyogs bzhir brkyang ste/ rgya mtsho chen po bzhi las shar tu myur ba'i shugs kyis du blangs te bdag gi gdeng bkus nas/tshod da pen gyi bu nor bzangasal
sa gsar gyi me tog gse gter te 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnams ni mthong bar tan tu dka' ba ste/ gos par yang rab tu dga' go/skyes bu mchog gamago bu ts+tshar kan 'jig

rten gyi phul du bya ba yin pas/ de mtshar rmad du byung ba yin te 'jig rten gyi gnas su gyur pa'o// 'gro ba'i rten du gyur pa'o// sems can rnams la snang ba chen po' byin pa'i// lam rmongs ba rnams la lam

bde ba ston pa 'o// chos kyi tshul du gzud pa la mgon du gyur pa'o// thams cad mkhyen pa'i grong khyer du phyin par bya ba la ded dpon chen por gyur pa ste/ del lo 'di snyam du sems so// byang chub sems
da pa bsams dpa' chen po rnams kyi mde ni sems dAm med pa rnams la rang gi lus kyi gzugs brnyan ston cing/ lus rnam par dag pa rnams la mngon par smad pa dang/ dag gi nyes pa spangs pa rnams
dbyangs kyi snang ba yongs su gzhon par byed pa dang/bsam pa dag pa rnams la dus thams cad du mngon sum du gyur pa gnas pas lta ba ngan pa 'dzem pa yin par bsams so//rigs kyi gu kho bos ni
byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa sngon gyi drag thob pa'o/ sa pa/ 'dwags pa byang chub sems dpa'-im par thar pa na gyi dra ba da'i yul ji lta bu zhig mchis/[ਮਾਲਸ਼]

[p]pas tshe dpon gyi bu nor bzungs kyi mdun dur chen po tsam gyi gser gyi phung pa dang/ dngul gyi phung po dang/ ba rma phung pe dang/ shel gyi phung po dang/ nusar gal ba'i phung pa dang/ asmagar ba'i phung pa dang/

nor bu nani pe dang gas snang ba'i phung pa dang/ nor bu rin pa ni dri ma med pa snyad pa'i phung po dang/ nor bu rin po che rnam par snang ba'i bud pa dang/ nor bu rin po cha phyogs kun tu manga'o pa'i bud bo dang/ gtsug gi

nor bu rin po che dang/ rtsod pan gyi bud pa dang/ nor bur po che sna tshogos kyis mo do'i phung pa dang/ dpung rgyan gyi phung po dang/ rnatsha lan gyi phung po dad gdu bu'i phung pa dang/ skarags kyi phung pa dang/ rkang

gdub kyi phung pa dang/ mu tig dmar po'i dra ba'i phud pa dang/ nor bu rin po che snatshegs kyi phung pa dang/yan lag dang nyin lag thams cad kyi rgyan gyi phung pa dang/ nor bu rin patsha yid bzhin gyi rgyal po'o phud/
ba dang/ me tog thams cad dang/ stes thams cad dang/ bdug pa thams cad dang 'phred pa thams cad dang/ phyug pa thams cad dang/ phyi ma sa cad dad gas thams cad dang//
gdugs thams cad dang/ rgyal mtshan thams can dang/ lha'i ba dan thams cad dang/ rol mo brdud pa thams cad dang/ rol me dkrol ba thams cad dang/ 'dod pa'i yul thams cad dang/ bum phyi ba rgya
steng grangs med pa dag kyang nye bar bstan nas/ tshod dpon gyi bu nor bzang la 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu 'di dag las khyen la sbyin pa mad pa na byi tsag/ bsad namasam pa nigyis shig/
khyu// de bzhin gshegs pa rnams las chod chug/ sems can mang po na sbyin pas bsdu ba'i dngos pos yongs su bsdus te/ gterang pha rol tu phyin pa la khyed cag khajag
zhan ni ba' subs shagi/ gtang por dka' ba yongs su gtong ba ni stag cig/ rags kyi bu khyed la khebs ji ltar ye bud kyi rnam pas bstod pa 'di bzhin du snyan pa'i bsam pa dang ma bral ba'i
sems can tshad med ra dag gso bsam pa rgyud kyang gtod bas yongs su sga ba byed de// sangs rgyas dang/ chos dang/ dge 'dun dang/ byang chub sems dapa' dang/ dag pa'i bshes gnyen
rnams 'bad dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed de blon med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par skul ba byed do// rags kyi bu gzhan yang khe na sems can 'ded pa'i dga' bas
med pa yul gyi lengs spyod pa yongs su chags pa rnams la yul de dag ma sdug par byan gyis slob go/ khro bsazho pa dad/ngargyal can dang/ rgyugs sha'i dregs pa dang/ a ba tshar/
gcad pas 'dul ba rnams la ni gtum zhing sun po ltar mi sdug la 'jigs pa ni lus sha za khrag 'thung ba'i tshul dang ldan par bstan te/ rlog pa dang snyoms pas 'khrugs pa de dag thams cad zhu bar
byed de// lo la can brtson 'grus bar ba'i sems can rnamos la ma dad/ rgyudang/ rgyal pa dang/ rkun patong/ gnad pa ri'ajagesal yongs u bstan cing skye bar bya ste brtson 'grus
[z/]rtsem pa bsed par byed de/ de ltar thabs de dang de dag gsalarol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi phyogs dang mthun pa rab tu gzhom pa dad/ pha rol tu phyin pa thams cad kyi tshogs bsags pa dang/
sgrub pa'i ri'i g.yang sa'i lam thams cad 'dus yang dag par bzla ba dang/ sgrub pa med pa'i tsheg la gzud pa'i phyir mi dge ba thams cad las rnam par bzlog ste/ dag ba thams cad phun sum

tshig sa pa la yang dag par dgod par byed do// rags kyi bu kho po'i ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa sngashegyi dra ba 'di gas par zad na/ khe bas byang chub sems dang ba dbang po ltar nye'o/
mangs ba'i lha ma yin rab tu 'dzem pa// nu ltar 'gro ba thams cad kyi sdug bsngal gyi mi'i phud pa zhi bar byed pa// me'i phung po ltar 'gro ba thams cad kyi srid pa'i chu skems pa/ rlung ltar 'dzin
pa'i mgo par chags pa thams cad kyi rim par 'byor ba/ de ji ltar bdag gi 'du shes su ba'i brag rab tu sAl ba de dag gi spyod pa shes pa 'am/ yon tan brjod par nus re skan/ sado rigs

kyi bu 'dzam bu'i gling 'di nyid kyi yul ma ga d+ha'i snying po byang chub na sa'i lha mo brtan m zhes bya ba 'dug gas/ de yin du sad la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab

par bya ba dang/ ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzad s kyis/ lha lha chen po'i rked pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/lha lha chen po la lan brgya stod dumar g.yas
phyogs su bskor ba byas nas pad dad skad du bltas te lha lha chen pa'i drung nas seng de do/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu zher ba zangs mthar gyis yul ma ga lha'i snying po byang

chug tu ga 'i lha mkhan kha gang na ba der sad pa dang/ de 'gro bab tshos lha ma bcasteng phrag bcugami la gnuge 'di skad ces 'dzor to// sems can thams cad kyi skyon du 'gyur gzhag ni 'di nas tshur 'dod do//

de bzhin gshegs pa'i snyade ba can sems zhathams cad kyi ma rig pa'i sgo nga'i sbubs badral bar 'gyur ba zhag zhi 'di nas tshur bod ngo// tshes kyi rgyal pa'i rogs su phyud ba chags pa med rung dri ma med babs/

kyi rgyal po'i go ba yang dam pa 'thob par ba rgyur ba zhige ni 'di nas tshur ded de 15shes kyi mthu bo che rdo rje mtshon chacan dpa' bo phas kyil ba'i 'khor thams cad rang du 'dul ba zhig ni 'di nas tshur 'od de

zhes nas/ de'i mdo la lha mo brtan ma la sogs pa sa'i lha mo brgya stong phrag banus sa chen po rab tu bskyod de/ 'brug sgra zab mo lta bu'i sgrachen po grags par byas nas/ stong gsum gyi steng chen po'i 'jig rten

gyi khams byed che na des snang bar byas te/ lus ni po che'i rgyan dang lhab lhub thams cad kyis shan tu brgyan nas/ glog gi 'phreng ba tshog sanam mkha'i dbyings las 'gyu zhaji snang ba lta bu sha stag tu byas te/

shade thams cad kyi myu gu'i skyabar byed/ me tog bshade thams cad ni kha 'bu bar byed/ chu klung gi rgyun thams cad ni 'bab par byed mtshodang/ mtsho'u dang/ lum thams cad ni rgyas par byed/ spos chu'ichen pa

ra da tu 'bab par byed/ me tog gi rab tu 'thor ba'i rlung chen po ni ldang bar khyed Da sal snyan bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong ni rab tu sgra sgrogs bar byed/ lha rdzas kyi gzhal med khang dang rgyan gyi tshigs mang ba
rab tu 'khrol bar byed/ baglang dang/ khya mchog dang/ glang pa dang/ stag dang/ ri degs kyi dbang po na rab tu 'byin par byed/ lha dang/ lham yin dang/ klu dang/ 'byung po'i dbang po rnams drug
sgra kyin par byed/ ri'i dang da po chen po rnams ni phan tshun thug par byed/ gter gyi tshogs bye ba brgya stong ni mngono'abyang bar byed cing sa'i 'og nas 'thon te/ nga da nas sa'i lha mo brtan
mas/ tshod dpan gyi bu nor bzad g la 'di skad ces smras sa/ rigs kyi bu khyed 'dir 'ongs pa legs so// sa'i phyogs 'di ni sngon khyed kyi gnas su gyur te/ kho mo mngan sum du dge ba'i chu

ba bskyed pa yanin/de'i rnam par sman pa'i phyogs 'ga' tsam lta bar 'ded dam/de nas tshong dben gyi bu sur bsngangs kyis/sa lham brtan pa bskyed pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ sa'i lha mo ba rtan
gal lan brgyastad du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas// sa'i lha mo brtan pa ba mdun du 'dug ste thal mo sbyar nas bde skad ces smras so/kha phags ma btsal la// de nas sa lha mo brtan

pas rkang pa 'a mthale gyis sa chen po la brdabs te/ rin po che'i gter bye ba brgyastod grangs med pas rab tu brgyan pa bstan nas 'di skad ces smras so// rigs kyi bu rin pa che'i gter bya pa khrag khrig brgya
steng 'di dag kyang khyed kyi rjes su 'brang ba'o// khyod kyi sngon du 'gro ba'i// khyod kyis ci dgar spyad pa 'o// khyod kyi bsadonams kyi rnam par smin pa las byung ba// khyod kyi bsod nams kyi/

stebs kyis bsrungs pa'o// 'di las med ste khyed kyis ci dgos pa de dag gyaseshage/ rigs kyi bu ga na yang bo min byang chub sems dang ba rnam par thar pa ye shes thub par dka' ba'i snyade po can theb pa ste/

de ltar kho ma byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa bde dad ldan pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa mar me mdzad tshun chad du byang chub sems dang de rjes su 'brang zhing rtag tu srung ba la zhugs pa ste/ de tshun chad du rigs
kyi du kha mi na byang chub sems dpa'i sems kyi byed pa la rnam bar byed de// yashes kyi yul la 'jug go/ skyen lam gyi dkyil da bar bdo du chud par byed de// byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa nag pan/
dag pa rjes su rtogs par byed do// tade de 'dzin thams cad kyi tshul kyi rjes su 'brang go/ byang chub sems dar ba mngon par shes pa thams cad dang sems chen pos rgyas par 'gengs sako/byang chub sems

dpa' thams cad kyi stobs kyis dbang sgyur ba dang/ zhing gi dra ba thams cad rgyas par dgang ba dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyis lung bstan pa yang dag par mnod pa dang/ dus thams cad du mngon par

'tshang rgya ba yang dag par bstan pa dang chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i tshul thams cad dang/ mdo sde yang dag par brjod pa'i chos kyi sprinagyi tshul thams cad dad mas snang ba chen pos snang bar bya ba'i

tshul dad/ sems can thams cad yongs su sman par bya ba'i tshul dad/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam bar d thul pa thams cad yang dag par ba stan bab tshul bshad rjes su rtogs par byed de/ gang dag par 'dzan te//
yang dag par nod do// rigs kyi bu byang chub sems dpa' rnam par thar pa ye shes thug khar dka' ba'i skade po cag 'di'ang bskal pa rab kyi rtsa ba ni tu phra ba nyid kyi ba re la de ga da ba lo

tsag tu/ 'jig rten gyi khams zla ba rgyal mtshan zhes bya bar bskul ba snang bas rnam par brgyan pa la/ de bzhin gshegs pa spyan bzang pa las theb lta/ rigs kyi bu de ltar kho me byang nub sems dpa ba rnam
par thar pa shes thub par dka' ba'i snying da can de la yongs su dpyad dpyad/ rnam bar dpyad dang byed/ ni tu dpyad dpyod/ yang dag par dge la bar byed de/ shin tu rgyas par byed byed pas/ ba/
pa bcud de la thug gi bar du de bzhin gshegs pa mthong ba dang ma bu'al// desrade kyi bar gyis khemed baban gshegs pa dgra bgopa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas sangs rgyas kyi zhing brjod du
med pa'i dad brjod du med pa'i rdul shAn tu phra ba skyed 'gi bsnyen bkur to// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thams cad skad po byang nub tugshegs pa rim par 'dul bar mthong ste/ khe man de bzhin
gshegs pa de dag thams cad kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba mngon sum du mthong ba'i// rigs kyi bu khems byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa shes thub bar dkob ba'i nang pe ma rishes bar zad/
kho tshos byang chub gnas dang ba de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi zhal nang du 'brang ba/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi gsung gi rjes su 'brang ba/ deng zhan gshegs pa'i ye shes
'jug par dka' ba la rag tu zhugs pa/ sems kyi skad cag gas tshes kyi dbyas thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pa 'i shugs dang ldan pa/ de bzhi gshags pa dang mnyam pa nyid du gyur pa'i lus dang
ldan pa// sangs rgyas thams cad kyi dgongs pa drim med pa'i sAde par gyur pa// sangs rgyas byung ba thams cad du rtag tun ngon par bsgrubs ba/ sangs rgyas kyi 'phrin las tha mi dad pa nyar gyur

ba de dag gi spyod pa shes pa 'am/ yon tan brjod par nus re skanasengarags kyi bu 'dzam bu'i gling 'di nyid kyi yul ma ga d+ha zhes bya ba/ sred khyer ser skya'i gnas shes bya ba yod de/ de namtshan mo'i

lhamedapyod dang ldan pa zhes bya ba 'dug gas// de'i gan du sod la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang/ ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig/ de nas tshong

bon gyi bu ner ba zad s kyis// sa'i lha mo brtan pa'i nang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ sa'i lha mo brtan pa lalan brgyastod du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas yang dang yang bltas te/ sa'i
lhame brtan nga 'i drung nas sed do/ de nas tshod dpon gyi bu nor bzangs/ sa'i lha mo brtan pa'i gdams ngag rjes su dran par byed cade/ byang chub sems dpa'i ma bar thar pa yo shes thub/

par dkar ba'i snying po can de rjes su dran par bya ba dang/ byang chub sems dang 'i tade de 'dzin bsgom pa de rang tu gnas par bya ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa bi chos kyi tshul de yi rjes su bsam pa dang/ byang chub sems/

da pa'i rnam par thar pas rnam par lta ba de la rnam par dpyad pa dang/ byang chub sems dbe rnam par thar pa'i mishes/na tu phra ba de la rnam par blta ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa'i mi shes/

rgya mtsho de la 'jug par bya ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa'i yis tha dad pa de la yid ches par bya ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa ba ringashas shatu sbyang ba de rjes su rtogs par bya ba dang/

byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa'i ye shes rgya mtsho de la 'bab par bya ba byed 'de/ grong khyer chen po ser skya'i gnas gang na ba der kun te/ grong khyer chen po ser skya'i gnas la g.yas phyogs su bskor
nas/ shar phyogs legs kyi grong khyer gyi sgo nas sad ste/ nyim nub nas ring po malen pa zhake tu grong khyer gyi lam gyi sumamado'i dbus shagan/ byang chub sems dpa'i gdams ngag 'thun par
len pa de/ mtshan me'i lham dpyod dad ldan pa 'thad par 'dod rung/ dag ba'i bshes gnyen yod na sangs rgyas kyi ye shes 'thob par 'gyur bar nges pa'i blo gros dang ldan pa// ye shes kyi mag

mi kun tu lta ba'i yul gyi rang bzhin rgya byin gyi rlabs dang ldan pa// phyogs thams cad du mngon par gzhol zhing dag pa'i de shes gnyen blta ba'i sems kyise mas pa dang/ yi shes chen po snyade bor gyur pa'i 'du
shes kyi sems dad ldan pa dmig/sa pa thams cad la rab tu zhugs pa'i ye shes kyi mig dang ldan la chos kyi dbyangs kyi tshul thams cad du mi shesargya mtsho'abyam klas pas rgyas par

'gengs pa dang da ldan pa'i teng nge ba dzan gyi mog gas phyogs thams cad du shes bya'i rgya mtsho la rnam par lta ba/ yi shes chen po'i mig 'thob par bya ba lar da tu gzhol shang bsan pa rtse gcig tu bzhag na 'dug/

'dug pa dang/ mtshan mo'i lham dpyod dang ldan pa de grong khyer chen po ser skya'i gnas kyi steng gnam mkha'i dbyings la/ nor bu rin po chasna tshogs dpe med pa'i khang pa ba rtsa gas pa zhige na/ rin po che'i seng ge 'i
khri chen po skyes zhum pa thams cad kyi rablo'i snyade po can zhig la/ lus kyi nad sog gsar gyi kha dag tu 'dug pa/ sku 'jam zhang mad la mnom du bdug pa// mig dkar nag 'byes pa/gzugs bzad
pa shin tu mdzes pa// bltan sdug ra// lus rgyan dang lhab lhub thams cad kyis klubs/shing brgyan pa// kha dog bsgyur ba'i gos bgos pa/tshangs pa'i gtsug tor gyi rtsod pan zla ba'i dkyil 'khor gyis
brgyan pa thegs pa// lus largyu skar dang/ gza' dang/ skar chen dang/ skadama'i tshogs thams cad kyi gzugs brnyan snang bar gyur pa 'dug par mthong ngo// des sems can gyi khams yangs par mi
khamo ra dang ngan na do dang/ ngan 'gro dang/ log par ltung ba nas/ sems can ji snyed cig yongs su bkrol ba da dag thams cad kyang de'i ba spu'i sbubs su chud par mthod dang// ji snyed cig mtho/

[6-]kyi 'jig rten du bsad pa dang/ ji snyed cige nyan thes dang/ rang sangs rgyas kyi byang nub dang/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du yongs su smazhi bar byas pa de dag thams cad kyang de'i ba spu'i spubs su rnyed par

labyed dang// lus mngon par bskyag pa dang/ gzugs mngon par bsgrub pa dang/ kha dag mngon par bsgrub pa'i thabs sna tshogs kyis ji snyed cig yongs su smin par byas pa de dag kyang de'i ba spu'i sbubs su

chud par mgrodang// nga re mngon par bsgrub pa dang/ dbyangs kyi yan lag mngon par bsgrub pa dang/ skad kyi tshul sna tshogs yongs su sbyar ba ji snyed cag gas yongs su sman par byas pa de dag kyang de'i ba spu'i sgo
nas rjes su brjod pa thos sa// dus mngon par bsgrub pa dang/ bsam pa dang mas pa ji lta ba bzhin dusems can gyi rjes su 'brang bar bya ba dang/ byang chub sems da pa'i spyod pa dang/ byang chub sems

dpa'i rnam par gnon pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i tade de 'dzin gyis rnam par 'phrul pa ba sgo dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i khyu mchog gi 'thu byung ba dang/ byang chub sems dang rnam par byed pa dang/

byang chub sems dpa' yongs su lta ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' rnamA par lta ba dang/ byang chub bams dpa' rnam par 'phrul pa dang/ byang chub sems dang 'i skyes bu seng ge chen po'i rnam par bsgyings
pa dang/ byang chub sems da pa'i rnam par thar pas rnam par rtsa ba ji snyed cage gas des sems can yongs su snyan par byas pa de dag kyang de'i ba lcab sbubs su chud par mthed do// des thabs sna
tshogs dang ldan pa'i chos kyi tshul rgya mtsho de dag mthong zhing thos nas dga' rangs te mgu zhang nyams bde/tshim zhing yade bde ba skyes nas/mtshan me'i lha mo dang dud dang ldan pa de la
lus thams cad kyis babanas phyag 'tshal talas nas/mtshan mo'i lha mo dpyadadang ldan pa la 'an bcasteng dumar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ mtshan mo'i lha mo dpyad dang ldan pa'i mdun du
'dug ste// thal mo spyar nas 'di skad ces skyas sa/ lha mo bdag gso bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed de/ de ltar bdag gis dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi bde gyi rlabs kyis
gad sargyas kyi yon tan thams cad 'byung bar yod dag par mthong bas/ dag ba'i bshes gnyen gyi phyag tu bdag nyid zer ba lags na/ lha me shul gang la brtazhan byang chub sems dpa' stebs nu'i sar
byung bar 'gyur ba'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i shul bdag la bshad du gsal/ de skad ces smras pa dang/ mtshan ma'i lham dpyod dad ldan pas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la 'di skad ces

lcasaM sa// rigs kyi bu de ltar khyed dge ba'i bshes gnyan gyi byin gyis non te/ dag ba'i bshes gnyen gyi tshig mnyan par 'dod pa dang/ dag pa'i gshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag la nan tan du byed pa legs so

legs so// rigs kyi bu du byed ni de ltar dag pa'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams dag la nan tan du byed pas/ gdon mi za bar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu nye bar 'gyur ro// gas kyi bu kho
[z/ ]min byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa sems can thams cad kyi mun pa rnam par sel ba'i chos kyi snang bas 'gro ba rnam par 'dul ba'i sgo thob pa ste/ bsam pa mi mnyam pa dang ldan pa'i
sems can rnams la byams pa'i sems dad ldan pa de// ma dag btilas kyi la zhugs pa rnams la snyade rje'i sems dang ldan pa'o// dge ba'i las kyi lam la zhugs pa rnams la dga'
ba bsems dang ldan pa// sems mnyam pa dang ma nyam par ldan pa'i sems can rnams la mi gnyis pa'i snyims dang ldan pa'o// kun nas rten mengs pa rnams la rnam par sbyang ba'i sems dang
ldan pa'o// nyam da par gyur pa rnams la yang dag par zhugs pa'i sems dang ldan pa'o// dma' ba la mes pa rnams la yangs pa mes pa yodas su bskyed pa'i sems dang ldan pa'o//dbang pa

zhum ba rnams la brtson bgrus chen pa'i shugs rnam par spel ba'i sems dang ldan pa'o//'khor ba la mngon par mes pa rnams la 'khor nga'i rgyud kyi 'kher le las rnam par bzlog pa'i sems dang ldan pa'o//nyan

phas dang rad sangs rgyas kyi theg pa la mngon par mes pa'i sems can rnams la thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam la dged pa'i sems dad ldan khago/rigs kyi bu de ltar khamed lta bu la sems dang ya de la bya bar ldan la/

byang chub sems dbab rnam par thar pa sems can thams cad kyi mun pa rnam ba/ la bab sa kyi snang bas 'gro ba rnam par 'dul ba'i sgo 'di dang yang ldan pas/sems can gang ji snyed mug mun nag smag tu gyur pa kim la/
[4/ ]@#// mi nyal bar gyur/ 'byung po'i tshogs ni sgyubar gyur/ rku chos mang bas na rgyas par gyur/ sems na ma bsun pa'i tshul nan phyogs su rgyabar [“]gyur/ sbyan stug po nag pas ni kun nas

khebs par gyur/ dud pa dang rdul gyi tshogs kyis ni kun nas 'grigs par gyur/ ji cha mi bzad pa/sa ni rab tu btags par gyur/ zla skar gyi tshogs ni mi snang bar gyur/ mag gas bya ba'i mthun med par gyurapa'i
mun pa/ sems can gang ji snyed cage rgya mtshol dadam/ thang la sbyang dam/ ri la spyod dam/ nags tshal gzhan n spyod dam/ yul gzhan na phyed dam/ grong gzhan n spyod dam/ phyogs gzhan na phyed dam

phyogs mtshams gzhan n spyod dam/ lam gzhan na skyed kyang rung ste/ rgya mtsho la spyod byed pas gu bub par gyur pa 'am/ thang la spyod spyod pa las nyam nyes pa bam/ ra la spyod spyod pa las ga yang
chen por lhung par gyur pa 'am/ 'brog dgen pa la phyed phyed pa las kha zas kyis 'phongs par gyur pa 'am/ nags tshal thebs par snga'i zad zade la thegag pa bam/ tshul ma yin pa'i nyam nyes
shag tu gyur tam/ yul gzhan spyod byed pa las chem pas bcom pa 'am/ grong gzhan na spyod byed pa las ma bstun pa'i tshul can gyis gtsos pa'i m/ phyogs gzhan n sded spyod pa las 'breg rmas pa mi

phyogs mtshams gzhan na spyod spyod pa las mgo rmongs pa 'am/ lam gzhan na spyod spyod pa las nya zhe gyur kyang rung ste/rigs kyi bu kho me ni sems can de lta bu dag la thapas sna tshogs kyi sgo nas skyangs su gyur par byed

bal ba ste// 'di ltar rgya mtsho chen po la spyod byed pa rnams kyi rlung sngon la bo gter ba dad mu'i reg pa gdang pa dang/ rlung mi bzad pa'i dkyil 'khor bzlog pa dang/ rlabs kyi shugs chen po zhi bar bya ba dad gong
gi 'jigs pa las thar par bya ba dang/ phyogs bstan pa dang/ chu'i lam legs par dmigs pa dang/ 'gram bstan pa dang/ rin po che'i gling du phyin par bya ba'i phyir lab yodas su sten te/ yongs su

sdud pa'i gzugs dang/ ded dpon gyi gzugs dang/ rta'i rgyal po chen pa rdzob chen gyi gzugs dang/ glang po bo rgyal pa'i gzugs dang/ rus sbal gyi rgyal pa'i go zugs dang/ lha ma pa'i gyi rgyal nga bo gzug/
dad nam mkha' ldang gi rgyal po ni gzugs dang/ mi 'am ci'irgyal po'i gzugs dang/lta 'phye chen po'i rgyal po'i gzugs dang/ rgyugatso'i lha'i gzugs dang/ mnyan nga'i gzugs kyis skyabs su

gyur par byed de// dge ba'i rtsa ba de'ang 'di ltar sems can thams cad sdug bsngal gyi phung pa thams cad las yongs su bzlog pa'i phyir skyabs su gyur par shegog cig ces yongs su sde'i//thang 'a skyed
pa'i sems can mun pa chen po shAn tu gnas pa'i nam la/ sa gzhi 'od m dang/ tsher ma dang/ gseg ma dang/ gyo mes gang ba/ sbrul gdug pa gtum po shin tu mang ba thag thub dang mi bde ba'i lamanan/

rdul dang phyag dar shin tu 'thul ba/dzin drag pos brtags pa/tshub dang grang ba'i sdug ngasngal yod pa/sbrul dang gcan gzan gyis bag tshab yod pa/thang mi dang chom po bar gyur pa zhape la/ mgo 'khor bar gyur pa'i
[rsp]// sems can rnams la nyima'i gzugs dang/ zla ba'i gzugs dang/ skya rengs 'char ba'i gzugs dang/ skar mdab chen po'i gzugs dang/ glog gi 'phreng ba 'byung ba'i gzugs/
dang/ ni po tsho'i bod kyi gzugs dang/ gza'i ba khar gyi gzugs dang/ rgyuskar dad skar ma'i tshogs kyi gzhal med khang gi bod kyi gzugs dang/ lha'i gzugs dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i gzug

kyis skyabs su gyur pa byed do// sems kyang dag pa'i nus ba 'das nyon mongs pa'i mun pa thams cad rnam par bsal ba'i phyir sems can thams cad kyi skyabs su de ga nuseg par skyed do// ri'i g.yang sa la
spyod de 'chi bas 'jigs skrag pa rnams kyi sreg dbyung ba dang/ grags pa 'ded pa'i dbang du gyur pa dad/ snyan pa dang/ sbra'i rgyal mtshan 'ded pa dang/ ladas spyod tshel ba dang/ 'dod pa'i zil gyis
nor dang/ mo cad yongs su btsal ba la brtson pa dang/ 'jig na gyi phun sum tshogs pa 'dod rung brtson pa dang/ bu dang chung ma gtong mi phod pas thegos par gyur pa dang/ lta ba'i thabs pe'akhyamA
ba dang/ sdug bsngal dang/ 'jigs pa sna tshogs kyis gtses pa rnams la'ang thabs sna tshogs kyi sgo nas skyabs su gyur par byed de/ 'di ltar ri'i phug dang bya skyabs mngon par bsgrub pa dang/ dazhing

glu thog dang rtsa ba bzar rung ba mngon par bsgrub pa dang/chu'i lam dang numag mngon par bsgrub pa dang tsha ba dang grang ba'i gnyen po mngon par bsgrub pa dang/ yang dag pa lam bstan pa dang/ ka la bde

rtsa ka'i sgra skad bsgrags pa dang/ rma bya'i rgyal po skadakazhi pa'i dbyangs dang [？ ]sman 'bar bas snang ba'i gzugs dang/ ri'i lha'i 'od kyi gzugs dang/ ri'i khug dang/ su dang ltes su ga ste/ sdug
kha sngal sna tshogs kyis gtsos pa'i sems can rnams kyi mun pa'i rab rib rnam par bsal ba dang/ sa'i gzhi mnyam par mngon par bsgrub pas skyabs su gyur par byed do/ sems can ji ltar bdag
gas sems kyang ral sred pa 'di dag yongs su bskyabs pa de bzhin du/ 'khor nga 'iri'i lam rgyud g.yang sa la gnas shangeg shi'i gdon gyis zin pa de dag gi skyabs su'ang po dag rgyur bar shog cige par

bskyed te/ nags tshal gis pa'i du bas thegs pa'i sems na na/tshan ma mun pa'i mun nag gis rnyed de/ shang dang shang thun 'dzings pa'i gseb shan tu nyam nga ba dang/ chu dang/ rtsa dang/ sdud pa dang/ 'a dri
nang gse lam rtsod pa dang/ shinge/ ngashade phan sna tshogs kyi nags tshal thanges pa'i nang du phyin te/ stag gis thos pas skrag pa'i snyade can/ donam thub bas sems 'khrugs par gyur ba dang/ 'jigs
ga dang/ 'tsho ba dang/ ma deb/'a ba sna tshogs kyis nyams mi pade ba 2 nags tshal stug po nas 'byung ba'i phyogs ma shes pa rnams la/ kho mo'i bde bar 'gro ba'i lam yongs su ston par byed de/ sems
kyang 'di ltar dag pa'i rtsa ba 'dase sems can lta ba thabs pa sna tshogs la gnas pa/ srid pa'i du bas 'khAs bar gyur pa/ 'khor ba'i sdug bsngal sna tshogs kyis gtsos pa rnams sdug
[#/ ]/bsngal thams cad las yongs su 'grel par shog cig bar skyed do// 'brog dgon pa la skyed pa'i sems can mun pa'i nang na 'then pa rnams kyang thabs kyi sgo sna tshogs kyis

sa bde ba yongs su bskyed cade lam bstan te/ de dag 'jigs pa med pa dang nga de ba la rab tubakod pa nas/ sems kyang dag pa'i rtsa ba 'dis sems zhan 'bor ba'i 'brog dgon pa na 'thom pa// ngan sed thams

ts+tsa cad kyi lam du zhugs pa rnams sdug ngasngal thams cad las yongs su bkral te/ shin tu phun sum tshogs pas bde ba'i thams cad mkhyen pa'i lam la rab tu dgod par bya ba shog cig par nga skyed do//

a ba sa kyi bu yul dang ljongs la chags pa'i sems can angan par chags pa'i rgyu las byung ba'i sdug po sngal nyams su myed par gyur pa rnams la'ang/ kho me na skyo bar bya ba'i thabs sna tshogs kyis yul la
klu mno bar chags pa de las gyen du skyed par byed// sems kyang 'diltar dag ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can thams cad phud pa la mngon par chags pa las gyen du bskyod de/ gnas med pa'i thams cad
mkhyen pa'i yashes la dgod par bya bar sheg nage par bskyed do// rigs kyi bu kho man grong na spyod pa'i sems can khyame dang gnas kyi bcade bas glags pa rnams mtshan mo mun pa nag ba shanitu gnas/

pas rtsod pa'i nang na/ khyim gyi den sna tshogs nyams su gnod pas sdug ngasngal bar gyur pa rnams kyang skyo bar 'gyur ba'i sgo sna tshogs kyis skyobar byas te/chags pa med pa'i sems yongs su bskyed nas tshes

kyi spyin pa sa yongs su bzung ste/ tsham par byas nas rten pa med pa'i chos la bkod de/ sems kyang 'di ltar dge ba'i rtsa ba 'dis sems can skye mad drug gi grong la gnas pa rnams 'khor ba'i lam gyi rgyud

kyi skyed yul las khyenadu bskyod de/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes kyi spyod yul la dgod par bya bar sheg nug par skyed do// rigs kyi bu gang yang mtshan mo mun pa shin tu gnag pa'i nang na shar phyogs la
sags pa'i phyogs dang/ phyogs mtshams re rer shugs bslad par gyur pa// sa'i phyogs mnyam pa la ma mnyam pa'i g.yang sar 'dushes pa dang/ sgang bu la gshod du 'du shes par gyur te/ phyogs kyi lam

dang sod la mgo na bor bar gyur pa de dag la'ang/ kho mo'i thabs sna tshogs kyis snang bar byas te phyir 'byung ba rnams la ni sgo yongs su ston te//rtal bar bden pa rnams lan mu stags yongs su ston to/
rgyal bar 'dod pa rnams la ni gru yongs su ston to// khyim du 'gro bar 'dod pa rnams lan khyime yongs su ston te// rnam par lta ba 'ded pa rnams la ni phyogs yongs su ston te/sa'i gzhi marngo ba dang
dma' ba yongs su sten to// sa'i gzhi phyogs mnyam pa dang mnyam pa dang gzugs kyi rnam pa sna tshogs kyang yongs su ston to// lam gyas dub pa rnams la grong dang/ grod khyer dang/ ljongs dang/

khams dang/ rgyal pa'i pho brang kha kher yang yongs su ston to// tsha ba dang skom pas mnar ba rnams la'ang mtshodang/ mtsho'u dang/ lum dad/ rdzing dang/ rdzing bu dang/ chu klung dang/ nags tshul dang/
tsaka/ @#// bza' shing gir ba dang/ kun dga' yid du 'ong ba yongs su ston to/ sdug ba dang bral zhing phrad par bad pa rnams la pha dang/ ma dang/ bu dang/ chung ma dang/ mdza' bo dang/
blon po dang/ mnyen thashes dang/ yid du 'ong ba'i gzugs kyi rnam pa sna tshogs yongs su ston te/ soms kyang ji ltar bdag gis sems can mtshan mo mun pa mun gnag gis chod pa// mig rab rib kyis/
klu nyams pa/ phyogs bslad pa/ lam 'khor ba rnams la gzugs kyi rnam pa sna tshogs rnam par dmigs par bya ba'i phyir snang ba bskyed de/ khod byas pa de bzhin du bdag gis yun 'di bo nas 'khor
ba'i mun pa na gnas pa'i sems can yang dag pa nyid kyi phyogs la bslad pa/ marig pa'i mun par 'thoms pa/ ye shes kyi mig mi shes pa'i ling tog gis chen ba/ 'dus shes dang/ sangs 9/
lta bas phyin ci log tu gyur pa/ mi rtag pa la rtag par 'du shes pa// sdug bsngal ba la bde bar 'du shes pa/ bdag med pa la bdag tu 'du shes pa/ ma sdug ba la sdug par 'du shes pa/ bdag
dang / sems can dang/ srog dang/ gso ba dang/ gang zag tu 'dzin pa dam po la gnas pa/ phung po dang/ khams dang/ skyamachon la gnas pa/ rgyu dang 'bras bu la mgo 'khor ba/ mi dag pa'i
las kyi lam gyi phyogs su zhugs pa// srog gcod pa/ ma byin par len pa/ 'dod pas log par g.yas pa/ brdzun du smra ba/ bra ma zer ba/ ngag rtsub bo 'byin// tshig bkyal pa smra ba/
chags sems dang ldan pa/ gnod sems kyi sems dang ldan pa/ log par lta ba can/ phar mi shes pa/ mar mi shes pa/ dag sbyong dang bram zer mi shes pa/ dbang po mi shes pa// skyes
bu dam pa mi shes pa/ chos ma yin pa la chags shing zhen pa// mitshul ba'i 'dod pas zil gyis non ba/ log pa'i chos kyis yongs su 'khris pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa la skur pa/
'debs pa/ chos kyi 'khor lenub par bya ba la shugs pa/ bdud kyi rgyal mtshan 'dzin pa/ byang chub sems dpa' la gnod par byed pa/ theg pa chen po la zhe sdang ba/ byang chub kyi sems
la mos pa sdong bar byed pa// byang chub sems dpa' la mi snyan du rjod pa/ snodaa skabs par snying ring ba/ gnod pa ma byas pa dgrar len ba/ 'phags pa la skur pa 'debs ra// skyes
bu dam pa ma yin pas spyod pa'i chos kyi spyod yul can/ mchod rton dang dge 'dun gyi dngos po la 'khu ba/ pha ma la log par sems pa/ mtshams med pa'i las byed ba/ g.yasachen bo la
mngon par bltas pa'i sems can rnams kyimajig pa'i mun pa shes rab kyi snang ba chen pos bsal te/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag pas bskul nas/ theg
ba chen po kun tu bzang pos stobs bcu'i yi shes kyi sa'i lam yongs su ston bar gyur cig/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sa dang/ de bzhin gshegs ba'i yul dang/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i
@#// ye shes tshul rgya mtsho dang/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi spyod yul dang/ sangs rgyas kyi yul dang/ stobs bcu yongs su grub pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi gzungs kyi
stobs dang/ sangs rgyas thams cud kyi sku mchog tu gyur pa yongs su ston bar shog cig/ yongs su bstan nas kyang sangs rgyas thams cad kyi mnyam pa nyid kyi gnas la rab tu dgod par shog cig pas/
bskyod do// rigs kyi bu kho mo na sems can yun ring po nas ni zhing nad kyis yongs su skyo ba/ lus nyam chung ba dang rga pa/ rgapa'i zil gyis non pa dang mgon man ngag dang/ 'phongs
shing dbul ba dang/ log par lhung ba dang/ yul gzhan du phyin pa dang/ phyogs log par zhugs pa dang/ btson ra na 'dug pa dang/ chad pas bcad pa dong nyes byung ste rgyal pos gsad
bar bkrib rnams kyang srog dang bral gyis 'jigs pa las yongs su bskyab pa'i phyir gnas so// rigs kyi bu de ltar kho mo sems can nad pa rnams kyi nad thams cad ni thabs thams
cad kyis gso bar nan tan du byed do// rgas pa dang/ rga ba'i zil gyis non pa rnams la ni bsnyen bkur dang/ rim gro dang/ yo byad kyis mi 'phongs par yongs su sdud byed do// mgon med
ba'i sems can rnams la mgon byed do// 'phongs shing dbul ba rnams zhi'or dang gser gyi phung pos yosasu sdud do// log par ltung ba rnams ni don 'thun pas yongs su sdud do//
0 yul gzhan du phyin pa rnams ni rang gi yul du phyin par byed do// phyogs log par zhugs pa rnams ni phyogs gnor bar 'dzud do// btson ra na 'dug pa rnams btson ra nas thar pa byed do//
chad pas gdud bzhi chad pa'i sdug bsngal las grol bar byed do// nyes pa byung ste rgyal pos gsad nga ra bkrib rnams ni srog gi dbugs phyin pa thob par byed de/ sems kyang bdag ji ltar
sems can bde dag 'jigs pa dang gnod pa sna tshogs las yongs su skyob tsang mgon byed pa de bzhin du/ bdag gis 'di rnams bla na med pa'i chos kyi yongs su bsdu bas yongs su bsdus
de nyon mongs pa thams cad las yongs su dgrol bar bya'o// skya ba dang/ rab dang/ na ba dang/ 'chi ba nga/ mya ngan dang/ sngags 'don pa dang/ sdug bsngal ba dang/ yid mi bde ba
dang/ 'khrug dza las yang dag par bzla bar bya'o// ngan song dang log par ltung ba'i 'jigs pa thams cad las yongs su dgrol bar bya// dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gzugs la rab tu dgod
bar bya'o// chos rin po che sbyin pa'i yos su bsdu bas yongs su bsdu bar bya'o// kha na ma tho ba med pa'i las la rab tu dgod par bya'o// de bzhin gshegs pa'i sku rnam par dag pa la yang
dag par bskul bar bya'o// rga shi yongs sumed pa'i dbyings shin tu rtogs pa la rab tu dgod par bya bar bskyod do// rigs kyi bu kho mo ni sems can log pa'i lam la zhugs pa// lta ba'i
rnam pa rdzibs po sna tshogs la mngon par zhen pa// leg par rtog pa'i spyod yul can lus dang/ ngag dad/ yid kyi las nyam nga ba'i 'grub pa la yongs su sbyod
pa brdzu la zhugs dang dka' thub sna tshogs ' gnas pa/ yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas ma yin yang yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas su 'du shes pa/ lus gdung ba dang
yongs su gdung ba la rab tu brtson pa// mtshodang/ mtsho'u dab lu ma dang/ rje bu dang/ chu klung dang/ ri'i gzar dang/ phyogs dang/ phyogs mtshams la 'dud cing phyag 'tshal bal
mos pa// sdig pa'i grogs po'i dbang du gyur pa rnams la'ang thabs sna tshogs kyis mgon du gyur par byed de/ de dag sdig pa'i lta ba'i rnam pa dang/ ngan song thams cad kyi g.yad sar
ltung ba'i lam las rnam par bzlog go/ 'jig rten pa'i yang dag par lta ba la rab tu bkod cing/ lha dang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa la'ang yongs su 'god do// sems kyang ji ltar bad/
gis sems can 'di dag nyam nga ba'i nan tan dang stag bsngal las yongs su bkrol ba de ngazhin du/ bdag gis sems can thams cad kyang 'phags pa 'jig rten las 'das pa'i thad
rol tu phyin pa'i lam la bkod de/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las phyir mi ldog par byas la/ kun tu bzang po'i smon lam chen pos thams cad mkhyen pa nyid la dgod par bya'o// sems
can gyi rnams thams cad ma dul gyi bar du byang chub sems dpa'i sa las kyang mi g.yo bar bya bar skyed do// de nas mtshan mo'i lha mo dpyid dang ldan pas/ de'i tshe byang chub
sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa'i phyogs sems can thams cad kyi mun pa rnam par sal ba'i chos kyi snang bas 'gro ba rnam par 'dul ba'i sgo 'di nga rnan te bstan par bya ba'i phyir/ sangs rgyas
kyi byin gyi rubs kyis phyogs bcur rnam par bltas te/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la tshegs su bcad pa 'di dag pas so// gtimug ma rig mun nag bsal don du// sems can phan
phyir kho mo chos ston te// dus la bsdad cing 'gro ba bde bar byas// 'di ni rnam thar tshul mchog zhi ba yin// kho mos byams yangs shin tu sbyang ba byas// bskal pa mas+sa' yas sngon chad yin
tu bsgoms// des na 'jig rten rgyus bkang snang bar byed// nor bzas ba rtan ngas tshul 'di shes par gyis// de mo'i snying rje rgya mtsho tshad med do// 'di las dus gsum rgyal ba 'jig rten 'byung/
des na 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal zhi bar byed// nor bzangs brtan pas tshul 'di shes par gyis// 'jig rten bde ba mngon par bsgrub pa dang// ma byas 'phags pa'i bde ba mngon bsgrub cing//
jis ni kho mo dga' mgur 'angs par byed// rgyal sras khyod kyis tshul 'di shes par gyis// sangs rgyas stobs rnams yongs su sbyong byed cing// nyan thos ya zhes rnam thar 'bras bu dang//
[s/ ]@#// 'dus byas skyon las rtag tu phyir phyogs kyis// rgyal sras khyod kyis tshul 'di shes par gyis// kho mo'i mig ni rgya che yongs su dag/ des ni phyogs bcu'i zhing rnams mang/

pha mthong// zhing byings de dag kun gyi rang byung rnams// byang chub shing dbang drung na bzhugs par ma thong// sangs rgyas sku ni mtshan gyis yongs brgyan cing// bod bzang rnam pa sna tshogs kun 'gyur de/
ba spu kun nas bod ther mang bgyid pa'i// saMngs rgyas 'khor dang bcas pa kho mosa mthong// zhing dungs de dag kun gyi soms can rnams// shi 'pho skye ba'i sgog yang kun mthong ste// byas pa

sku de dag 'gro rgyud rgya mtshon// 'khor zhing rang rang las kyang myong bar byed// kho mo'i rna ba rgya mtsho rnam dag ste// der ni sgra rnams ma lus yongs su 'du// 'gro ba kun gyi sgra skad rgya mtsho dag/ kun
kyang thosanasaM dran pas yongs su'adzin// dbyangs kyi yan lag sgra skad thams cad kyis// dpe zla med pa'i gsung ni rab brgyan te// sa ni rgyal ba 'khor lo rab tu skob// de dag kho mos thos shing
dran pas 'dzin// kho moT sna yi mthu yas rnam dag ste// chos tshul rgyu mtsho dag la thogs pa med// rnam thar gnas rnams kun tu rab 'jug pa'i// tshulani rgyal sras khyod kyis shes par
gyis[;]kho mo'i lce zhi rgya cher rab tu yas// srab cing mdog dmar rin chen bod du dag/ sems can bsam pa ji bzhin des shes byed// rgyal sras khyod kyis tshul 'di shes par gyis// kho
mo'i chos lus shin tu rnam dag ste// dus gsum kun tu 'od gsal rab tu gnas// gzugs lus sems can bsam pa ji bzhin te// de dag kun gyi dad pa'i dbang du mthong// kho mo'i sems
na chags med zag pa med// sgra dbyangs sprin gyi nga'o ji bzhin te// de yi khongs su mi mchog kun chud kyang// de la kho mo rnam par rtog pa med// zhing gi dbyings kyi sems can bsamami khyab//
de dag sems kyi rgya mtsho kho mos shes// de dag dbang po bsam pa rab shes kyang// de la kho mo rnam par rtog pa med// kho mo'i rdzu 'phrul rab yangs shin tu grub// des na bsam yas zhing
yang rab tu spyod// lus kyi 'od dang mthu yang de bzhin te// des sems can gdul dka' shin tu 'dul// kho mo'i bsod nams rnam yas yodas su dag/ kun tu rgyan byed zad pa med pa'i
mdzod// des na rgyal ba rnams la mchod pa byed/ 'gro ba thams cad nye bar 'tsho ba'ang yis// kho mo'i shes rab rnam yangs shin tu dag/ des n chos mang rgya mtshorab tu shes// 'gro ba kun
gyi the tsom yongs su gcod// rgyal sras khyed kyis tshul 'di shes par gyis// dus gsum kun la kho mo zhugs gyur pas// sangs rgyas rgya mtsho kun kyang mthong zhing shes// de dag smon lam la
yang rab tu zhugs// tshul 'di dpag yas rab tu rdzogs pa yi// rdul mang kun la zhing rnams rgya mtsho mthong// de dag dus gsum 'jug pa'i ng de bzhin te// de dag kun gyi sangs rgyas rgya mtsho
mthong// 'di ni kun tu gnas pa'i tshul gyi sa// rnam par snang mdzad byang chub sangs rgyas te// phyogs rnams kun gyi zhing rnams yongs pa gang zhing// rdul snubs kun gyi
@# byang chub shing drung na// zhi ba'i chos rnams gsung du sgrog pa ltos// de nas tshong dpon gyi bunor babrangs kyis/ mtshan mo'i lcamo dpyod dang ldan pa la 'di skad ces smras so//

lha mo khyod blan med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu zhugs nas ji srid cig lags/ de lta khyod tshul ba lta bu sa sems can gyi don bgyi ba la sta gon du zhugs pa'i rnam pas thar pa de na khyod
kyis bar s saji srid rtseg lags/ de skad ces smras pa dang/ mchon mo'i lha mo dpyad dang ldan pas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzas la 'di skad ces smras so// gas kyi bu sngon 'das pa'i/

dus ri rab kyi rtsal shin tu phra ba snyad kyi bskal pa'i yang pha rol gcig tu bskal pa rab tu zhi ba'i 'od ces bya ba/ sangs rgyas bye ba phrag lnga brgya skyes pa byang// de'i 'jig rten gyi khams ni rin chen
dang 'byung ba zhes bya bar gyur do// 'jig rten gyi khams de'i klong bzhi ba 'bring po rin chen zla ba sgron ma'i 'od ces bya ba de na/ rgyal po'i gnas pad+mo'i 'od ces bya ba yod de/ rgyal po'i gnas

nga' rgyal po chos rab mu stagasashes bya pa chos dang 'thun pa'i rgyal po 'khor los sgyur ba/ gling bzhi la dbang ba yin po tshosna bdun dang ldan pa byung ste/ des sa chen po de bad ra dang rgya mtsho
bcas pa'i mthas za/ tugs par chos kyis rgyal bar byas nas bde bar gnas par byas so ]rgyal po chos rab mu stegs de'i btsun mo chos kyi blo gros bla ba zhes bya ba byung ste/ de srid la

'dod pas myong shing dga' bar rtse rtse bas rub nas nam gyi gung la btsun mo'i 'khor gyi gnas su phyin te nyal la// de nas rgyal po'i gnas pad+mo'i 'od de'i shar phyogs kyi nags tshal chen po zhi ba'i

dpa la 'byung ba zhes bya bar rin po che'i rgyal po rgyan thams cad kyi 'od dang ldan pa'i lcan can/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pas byung ba'i byang chub kyi shing chen po'i drung du de bzhin
gshegs pa chos thams cad rab tu sgrog nga 'i rgyal bo zhes bya ba/ bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon pa sangs rgyas nas/ de'i mthus 'jig rten gyi khams rin po che

dpal 'byung ba rnams nyid 'od chen po kha dog du ma can gyis rgyas shing gang bar gyur to// rgyal po'i gnas pad+ma'i 'od ces bya ba de na/ mtshan mo'i lhamozla ba ni tun ma par dag pa'i 'od ces bya ba
'dug 'dug ste/ dargyal po'i btsunamo chos kyi blo gros bla ba'i gan du songan/ rgyan dkrol ba'i sgras sad pas byas te 'di skad ces smras so// 'di ltar rgyal po'i btsunamo shes pa
gyis shig/ nags tshal chen po zhi ba'i dpal 'byung bar de bzhin gshegs pa chos thams cad rab tu sgrog pa'i rgyal po zhes bya ba bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu mngon par/
sangs rgyas so// de nas des rgyal po'i btsun mo de'i mdun du/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan bsngags pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul dang/ byang chug/
sems dpa' kun tu bzang bo'i spyod ba dang/ smon lam rgya cher bshad do// rigs kyi bu rgyal bo'i btsunamo dbang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'od kyis snang bar gyur te/ bsam pa thag
bas bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu yang dag par zhugs nas/ des de bzhin gshegs pa de dang/ byang chub sems dpa' dang/ nyan thos kyi dge 'dun du bcas pa la
chod pa dang 'am gro cher byas so/ pa/ rigs kyi bu de la ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus kyi rgyal po'i btsun mo chos kyi blo gros zla ba zhes bya ba de gzhan zhig yin pa tsam du sems na
ni de ltar mi blta ste/ khomon de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po'i btsun mo chos kyi blo gros zla ba zhes bya bar gyur to// rigs kyi bu kho mo ni mos pa'i sems bskyed pa de dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa

rdzu la bskyod pa'i dag ba'i rtsa ba des bskal pa rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyad tshun chad du nam yang ngan 'gro log par ltung bar ma skyes te/ soms na dmyal bar ma yin// byol song gi skye gnas su
mo ma yishego/ yid gs sum yin// nam yang 'gi sa dma' bar ma skyes so// nam yang dang nga po dang mi ldan par ma gyur to// nam yang sdug bsngal bar ma gyur te/ de ltar kho mos rtag

[o ]bar lha'i nang du na lha'i bdag nyid che ba nyid thob// mi'i nang du ni mi'i bdag nyid che ba nyid thob ste/ 'di ltar sangs rgyas dang byang chub sems dpa'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang yang ma bral//
dus sha bar yang ma skyes so// rigs kyi bu de ltar kho mos sangs rgyas gtsug nas gtsug tu dge ba'i rtsa ba bskyed do// bskal pa'i rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyad cig tu lam bde
zhing mnyam pa nas lte kho mad par phyin kyang/ de tsam gyis kho mo'i byang chub sems dpa'i dbang po yongs su grub par ma gyur te/ rirab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba stod kyi bskal pa de dag ni 'dus/

bskal pa bzang po 'di'i snga rol gyi na bskal pa chen po stong phrag bcu'i thog ma la bab pa de'i tshe/ 'jig rten kyi khams ga bri brjid rdul gyi dri ma med pa zhes bya bar/ bskal pa mya ngan med cing

rdul dang bral ba zhes bya ba byung ste/ rigs kyi bu 'jig rten gyi khams gabri brjid rdul gyi dri ma med pa'i dar la de ni/ kun nas kho mos la rnam par dag bag gyur te/ des sangs rgyas lnga brgya byung
dro sangs rgyas lnga brgya po de dag gi thog ma la de bzhin gshegs pa mkhyen pa dang zhabasasu ldan pa// bde bar gshegs pa/ 'jig rten mkhyen pa/ banamed pa ]skyes bu 'dul ba'i kha lo

sgrub ba/ lha dang mi'i ston pa sangs rgyas bcom ldan 'das 'a ba rgyal mtshan spyan yangs shing zhi ba'i dpal zhes bya ba 'jig rten du byung ste/ de'i tshe kho mo'i yang tshong dpon snyan pa rnam par gragrwa
pa'i bu mo shes rab snang ba'i dpal zhes bya ba gzugs mdzes shing bzang la blta na sdug pa kha dog shin tumadzes zhing rgyas pa dang ldan pa zhig tu gyur te/ mtshan mo'i lcam

zla ba shin tu rnam par dag pa'i 'od ces bu ba de'ang smon lam gyi dbang gyis/ gling bzhi pa'i 'jig rten gyi khams rdul dang bral ba'i rgyal po'i gnasargyal mtshan sna tshogs su mtshan mo'i lha mo mig
rnam par dag pa zhes bya bar gyur te/ des kho mo mtshan mo mi nyal tsam zhig na/ pha ma nyal bar gyur pa dang/ khyig de bang yongs su bskyod de/ 'od chen pos snang bar byas nas rang gi gzu/
bstan te/ sangs rgyas kyi yon tan bsngags pa brjod nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa thog ma mngon par sangs rgyas nas zhag bdun len te/ snying po byang chub la bzhugs pa de bstan to// de nas
kho mo pha ma dang gnyen bshes kyi tshogs chen po dang 'grogs te/ mtshan mo'i lhamo shin tu rnam par dag pa'i zla ba'i 'od sngon du bda' nas/ de bzhin gshegs pa de'i zla sngar phyin to// de nas kho

zla mos de bzhin gshegs pa de la mchod pa rgya chen po byas te/ de bzhin ba/ gas pa de'i zhal mthong ma thag tu ting nge 'dzin 'gro ba 'dul zhing sangs rgyas mthong bar byed pa zhes bya ba dang/ ting nge 'dzin/

dus gsum gyi byings la shes kyi snang ba'i dkyil 'khor ces bya ba'ang thob par gyur to// de thob pas kyang 'o go bskal pa ri rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyan po de dag kyang rjes su dran par gyur to//
[z/ ]bomo'i byang chub kyi sems de'ang mngon du gyur te/ de ltar kho mos de bzhin gshegs pa de las chos bstan pa thos te/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa sems can thams cad kyi mun ba

rnam bar sel ba'i chos kyi snang bas 'gro ba rnam par 'dul ba'i sgo 'di'ang thob par gyur to// de thob pas kyang 'jig rten gyi khams sas rgyas kyi zhing bcu'i rdul shin tu phra ba snyed lus kyis rgyas
par 'gengs te/ 'jig rten gyi khams de dag tu sems can ji snyed cig skyes pa de dag thams cad kyang kho mo'i mig lam du snang zhing/ bdag nyid kyang de dag thams cad kyi zhabs kyi drung na 'dug bas

shes so// 'jig rten gyi khams de dag tu sems can ji snyad cig skyes pa de dag thams cad kyang kho mo'i mig lam du snang ste/ de dag gi sgra skad rnam pa tha dad pa'i brdabang rab tu shes so// sogs dang/
bsam pa dang/ dbang po dang/ mos pa'i ng rab tu shes so// sngon gyi mtha'i dge ba'i bshes gnyen rnams kyi drung du yongs su smin pa'i ng rab tu shes so// de dag la bsam pa ji lta ba bzhin du
tshim par 'gyur ba'i lus kyang yongs su ston to// kho mo'i rnam par thar ba de 'ang sams kyi skad cig re re la rnam bar 'pha la ti/ rnam par thar pa'i sems de'i 'og ma'i sems kyis sangs rgyas

kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams brgya'i rdulashin tu phra ba snyed lus kyis rgyas par 'gengs so// de'i 'og ma'i soms kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams stong gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed lus kyis
rgyus par 'gengs so// de'i 'og ma'i sems kyis sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams brgya phrag stong gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed lus kyis rgyas par 'gengs so// de

bzhin du sems kyi skad cig re'i zhing sangs rgyas kyi zhing 'jig rten gyi khams brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa'i rdul shin tu phra ba stod kyi bar dag kyang lus kyis rgyas par 'gengs so// sangs
rgyas kyi zhing de dag na de bzhin gshegs pa ji snyad ruge bzhugs pa de dag thams cad kho mo'i mig lam du snang ste/ bdag nyid kyang de dag ga zhabs kyi drung du na 'dug bar shes so// sangs rgyas
bcom ldan 'das de dag gis chos bstan ba de dag thams cad kyang len to// 'dzin to// yongs su 'dzin to// nye bar 'dzin to// de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi sngon kyi tshul rgya mtsho dang so

lam rgya mtsho la'ang 'jug go/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa de dag thams cad kyang rang gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag par bya ba'i phyi'i mgo par sgrub po////
sems can ji snyed cig 'jig rten gyi khamasargya mtsho'i dag tu skyes par gyur pa de dag thams cad kyan kho mo'i mig lam du snang ste/ sems can de dag gi bsam pa dang/ dbang po dang/ mos

ba'i bya brag ji snyed pa de snyad kyi bye brag tu de dag yongs su smin par bya ba dang gdul ba'i phyir lus byin gyis rlob sta/ de ltar kho mo'i rnam par thar pa de ni sems kyi skad cig re re la'ang/ chos kyi
0 dbyes 'byam kus pa rgyas par 'gengs pa'i tshul gyis rnam par 'phel lo// rigs kyi bu kho mo'i byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par rgyab pa sems can thams cad kyi mun pa rnam par sel ba'i chos kyi
snang bas 'gro ba rnam par 'dul ba'i sgo 'di nyes par zad/ kho mos byang chub sems dpa' matha'adang dbus na dpa'i byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang smon lam gyis byung ba/
chos kyi dbyings rgya mtsho'i tshul 'byam kas ba bdal pa la 'jug par dbang sgyur ba/ byang chub sems dpas yang dag par bsgrub pa'i ting nge 'dzin yashis rdo rje'i dang 'a gyis rnam par rtsa ba dang//
'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs thams cad yang dag par gzung ba la smon lam chen pos byung kha/ 'jig rten gyi khams 'dus kus ba thams cad sems kyi skad
cig gcig gis yongs su dag par bya ba'i bsod nams kyi rgya mtsho chen po yongs su grub pa/ sems kyi skad cig re re la sems can gyi khams thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang gdul ba'i ye
bshes la dbang sgyur ba/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du sems can thams cad kyi sgrib pa'i mun pa thams cad rnam par sel ba'i yongashes kyi nyi ma'i mig dang ldan pa// soms can gyi
khams thams rtsed la theg pa chen po rnam par dmigs par bya ba'i mthu dang ldan pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi the tsom dang/ rnam nus dang/ yid gnyis kyi rab rib rnam par sel ba'i blo gros kyi
zla ba dang ldan pa/ srid pa'i rgya mtsho thams cad la mngon par chags pa las gyen du bskyod pa'i sgra dbyangs kyi dkyil 'khor rnam par dag pa/chos kyi dbyas thams cad kyi rdul
gyi cha shas la rnam par 'phrul pa yongs su ston pa la dbang sgyur bo/ dus gsum gyi dbyings kyi dkyil 'khor la ye shes dbyer med pa de dag gi sngod pa shes pa 'am/ yon tan brjod pa 'am/ sngod
yul la 'jug pa 'am/ rnam par thar pas rnam par rtses yongs su bstan par nus re skan/ song rigs kyi bu yul ma ga rgya 'di nyid kyi snying po byang chub la kho mo bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i
byang chub tu sems skyed skyed pa/ yang dang yang skul skul ba'i mtshan mo'i lha mo kun tu zab pa'i dbal dri ma med pa'i 'od ces bya ba 'dug gis/ de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas
[& ]byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la bslab par bya ba dang/ ji ltar nan tan du bya ba dris shig/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzas kyis/ mtshan mo'i lha mo dpyod dang ldan pa la tshigs
su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// khyod sku shin tu rnam par dag pa mthong/ mtshan gyis rnam brgyan pa bi ji bzhin du// 'jig rten kun las mngon 'phags 'jig rten du// phun sum
tshogs sku 'jam dpal bzhin du mdzes// khyod kyi chos sku'in tu rnam dag ste// dus gsum kun tu mnyam zhing rnamami rtog/ der ni 'jig rten ma lus kun 'du ste// 'byung zhing rnam par 'jig
kyang chags mi mnga'// lamargyud 'jam klas thams cad kun tu yang// khyod kyi sku ni gzugs brnyan rnam par phye// skar chen zla skar rgyu skar tshogs bzhin du// spu rtse kun la'ang khyod ni/
bdag gis mthong// khyod kyi thugs yangs shin tu rnam dag ste// phyogs rnams kun gyi nam mkha'i dbyings su rgyas// der ni ma mchog kun kyang yongs su 'du// khyod la ye shes mi rtog dam
pa mnga'// zhing gi rdul snyed rnam pa sna tshogs sprin// khyod kyi sbra rtsi kun nas mngon 'thon pa// rgyal mang sna tshogs char 'bebs shing// phyogs bcu'i sangs rgyas zhabs drung rgyas par 'gengs//
'gro ba kun snyad lus rnams mtha' yas pa// khyod kyi sku rtsi kun nas mngon 'thon cing// phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten rgyas par yongs bkang nas// sna tshogs thabs kyis sems can rnam par
spyod[;]sdu byes kun la bsam yas zhing gi rnams// sna tshogs rgyan ldan rnam pa tha dad mthong// lam rgyud sems can khyod kyis rnam sbyangs pa// ji su dade dag bsam bzhin kun kyang byung// gang/
zhig khyod kyisamtshan thos dgar 'gyur ga/ de dag thob bya legs thob legs par 'tsho// sems can gang gis khyod kyi sku mthong ba// byang chub lam la mngon du bstas par 'gyur// de lta
thos nas rab tu sems dag pa la// mthong ba tsam gyis nyon mongs zhi mdzad pas// bskal pa bsam yas ngan song gnas kyang rung// khyod kyi 'al blta'i don du mos par bgyi// zhing rnams
stong gi rdul snyed lus byas te// de snyed bskal pa brgyud de khyod 'dra ba'i// smra gcig khyod kyi yon tan legs brjod kyang/ legs ba'i mthar phyin nam du'ang mi 'gyur ro/
tsha/ de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo bzangs kyis mtshan mo'i lha mo dpyad dang ldan pa de la tshigs su bcad pa de dag gis mngon par bstod nas// mtshan mo'i lha mo dpyid dad ldan pa'i

lca rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyags 'tshal te/ mtshan mo'i lha mo dpyod dang ldan pa de la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas yang dang yang bltas te/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen la bsnyen
pakur bya bsam ngoms bzhin du/ mtshan mo'i lha mo dpyad dang ldan pa'i drung nas song ngo// bam po dgu bcu rtsa dgu pa// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu

nor bzangs/ mtshan mo'i lha mo dpyad dang ldan pa thog ma byang chub tu zhugs pa'i byang chub kyi sams kyi dkyil 'khor yongs su dag pa ni khong du chud par byed/ byang chub sems dpa'i snying po yang dag
par byung ba lan rjes su dpyad byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam rgya mtsho la ni yongs su 'jug/ byang chub sems dpa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i lam na yongs su sbyong/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa'i dkyil
'khor ni yongs su gnon/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khor ni rgya chen byed/ byang chub sems dpa'i 'byung ba rgya mtsho ni rjes su 'brang/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i snang ba chen po rgya mtsho

lani rnam par lta/ 'gro ba thams cad yongs su bskyab pa la gzhol pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i snying rje chen po'i sngon ni rgya cher byed/ mtshan mo'i lha mo dpyid dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' kun tu

bzang po'i spyod pa dang/ smon lam gyi dkyil 'khor ni zhing thams cad du phyi ma'i mthar byin gyis brlabs pas mngon par bsgrub cing/ mtshan mo'i lha mo kun tu zab pa'i dpal dri ma med pa'i bod gang na ba

der song ste/ mtshan mo'i lha mo kun tu zab pa'i dpal dri ma med pa'i 'od kyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ mtshon mo la mo kun tu brab pa'i dpal dri ma med pa'i 'od la lan brgya stong du mar
g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas/ mtshan mo'i lha mo kun tu zab pa'i dpal dri ma med pa'i 'od kyi mdun du 'dug ste/ thal mo sbyar nas 'di skad ces smras so// 'phags ma bdag gis bla na med
pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed na/ ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i sa la spyod pa dang/ ji ltar 'byung ba dang/ ji ltar nan tan du bgyid pa ma 'tshol to//
smras pa/ rigs kyi bu de ltar khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems bskyed cing/ byang chub sems dpa'i sa la spyad pa dang/ 'byung ba dang/ yongs su 'grub
pa 'dri ba legs so legs so// rigs kyi bu chos bcu dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i rnams byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la yongs su grub pa yin te/ bcu gang zhe na/ 'di lta sta
nubya/ bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mngon du gyur par mthong ba'i ting nge 'dzin thob pa rnam par dag pa dang/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi sku mtshan sna tshogs dad ldan pa rnam par blta
ba'i mig rnam par dag pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i kha dog rgyu mtsho mtha' dang dbus med pa rnamapar dmigs par bya ba la 'jug pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos snang ba'i dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho
tshad med pa la chos kyi dbyings thams cad kyi tshad 'jug pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi ba spu'i sgo nas 'od zer rgya mtsho sems can thams cad dang mnyam pa dad/ sems can sna tshogs kyi

don du bkye ba la 'jug pa dang/ ba spu'i bu ga re re nas 'od 'phro ba rin bo che thams cad kyi kha dog tu 'dug pa rgya mtsho ston pa rang/ sems kyi skad cig re re la sangs rgyas kyi sprul pa rgya mtshos chos kyidabyings
thams cad rgyas par bkang zhing/ sems can 'dulaba'i byin gyi rlabs la 'jug pa dang/ de bzhin gsheg pa'i gsur sems can thams cad kyi dbyangs kyi yan lag dang ldan pas dus gsum du byung
ba'i chos kyi 'khor lo'i sgra sgrogs pas/ mdo sde thams cad kyi sbyin gyi 'brug sgra 'byin pa'i dkyil 'khor la 'jug pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi mtshan rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med pa la'ajug pa dang/
sangs rgyas kyi rnam par 'phrul pa bsamagyisami khyab pa yongs su bstan pas sems can 'dul ba la 'jug pa ste/ rigs kyi bu chos bcu po 'di dag dang ldan pa'i byang chub sems dpa' rnams/ byang
chu sems dpa'i spyod pa la yongs su grub pa yin no// rigs kyi bu kho mo ni byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa bsam gta' khri ba'i bde bas kun tu rnam par gnon pa thob pa ste/ gos kyi
bu kho mos na de'i mthus dus gsum dug shegs pa'i de bzhin gshegs brngams cad kyang mthong ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa la'ang 'jug go/ 'khor

gyi dkyil 'khor rgya mtsho dang/ ting nge 'dzin mtha' dang dbus med pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa rgya mtsho dang/ sngon gyi tshul rgya mtsho dang/ mtshan rgya mtsho la'ang 'jug go/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag
gichos kyi bakhor lo rab tu 'khor ba rnam tha dad pa la'ang 'jug go/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i skutshochod sna tshogs dang/ dbyangs kyi yan lag rnam pa tha dad pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa de
ngag gi chos kyi dbyings mtha' dang dbus med pa'i sku la'ang 'jug ste/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag la dngos por mngon par zhen pa'i ng med do// deci'i phyir zhen/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams
cad du bzhud pa 'di dgas pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag bzhud pamed pa'o// rang bzhin gyis byung ba med pas na de bzhin gshegs pa de dgazhi byon pa med pa'o// mi skye ba'i chos nyid dang/
mnyam pa'i sku mnga' ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ni maskyes pa'o// mi skyo ba'i mtshan nyid dang r-in pa'i phyi/ de bzhin gshegs ba de dag ni ma 'gags pa'o// sgyu ma'i rnam pa lta
dbur mthong zhing rnam par dmigs pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag na bden pa ma yin pa'o// 'gro ba thams cad kyi don du byung ba'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa
de dag ni brdzu nga ma yin pa'o// shi 'pho dang skya ba lasa rnam par 'das pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ni 'pha ba med pa'o// chos kyi rang bzhin gyis 'jigs pa med pa'i chos nyid pa/
pa'i phyir/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag gi 'jig pa med pa'o// ngag gi lam thams cad las yongs su 'dus pa'i phyi'i/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag thums cad ni mtshan nyid gcig pa'o/
chos kyi mtshan nyid kyi rang bzhin gyi mthar thug pas/ de bzhin gshegs pa de dag ni mtshan nyid mi mnga' ba'o// bags kyi bu kho mo ni de ltar de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad khong du chud par byed
cing byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa bsam gtan zhi ba'i bde bas kun tu rnam par gnon pa 'di/ dengazhin gshegs pa'i bsam gtan gyi dkyil 'khor snang bas shin tu rgya che ba byed
[¥ ]do shin tu yangs par byed do// khong du chud par byed do// rtogs par byed do// mnyam par byed do// mngon par bsgrub bo// gzhi snyoms par byed do// rab tu 'jug go/ rnam par
'bal bar byed do// nges par soms so// nye bar rtog go/ dran par byed do// spyod yul du byed do// brtan par byed do// snang bar byed do// rab tu brjod do// rnam par sbyod do//
rnam par 'byed do// tshogs su byed do// yid ches bar byed do// yongs su rtog pa thams cad rgyu ba med pa'i snying rje chen bo de la gnas te/ sems can thams cad yongs su bskyab ba la
yang dag par gnas par spyad par sems rtse gcig tu bya ba'i phyis/ bsam gtan dang po sgomamo// yid kyi las thams cad nye bar zhi bar bya ba dang/ ye shes kyi stobs dang/ mthus/
sems can thams cad yongs su bsdu ba la dga' ba'i bdeb la sems rtse gcig tu bya ba'i phyir/ bsam gtan gnyis pa sgomamo// 'khor bar log par zhugs pa la btang snyoms su byas te/
sems can thams cad kyi rang bzhin nges par rtogs par bya ba'i phyir/ bsam gtan gsum pa sgom mo// sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa dang sdug bsngal rab tu zhi bar bya ba'i phyir//
bsam gtan bzhi pa sgom mo// thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi smon lam gyi dkyil 'khor shin tu yangs par bya ba dang/ ting de 'dzani rgya mtsho thams cad mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas par byab dang/
byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa rgya mtsho thams cad kyi tshul la 'jug par bya ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par rtse ba'i yo shes thams cad mngon par shes por bya ba dang/ byang chub
sems dpa'i spyod ngas rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad mngon par bsgrub par bya ba'i phyi/ sgo kun nasachos kyi nga nges la 'jug pa'i yi shes kyi tshul yongs su sbyong zhing/ byang chub sems dpa'i
rnam par thar pa bsam gtan zhi ba'i bde bas kun tu rnam par gnon pa 'di sgom mo// rigs kyi bu de ltar kho mo rnam par thar pa 'di sgom zhing thabs kyis sems can yongs/
su smin par byed do/ 'di ltar nub mo zhibar gyur pa'i tshe dga' ba la myos par gyur pa'i soms can rnams kyi mi sdug pa'i 'du shes skyed do// mi dga' ba'i 'du shes dang/ yongs su skyo ba'i 'du
shes dang/ bgegs su 'gyur ba'i 'du shes dang/ 'ching ba'i 'du shes dang/ srin mo'i 'du shes dang/ mi rtag pa'i 'du shes dang/ sdug bsngal ba'i 'du shes dang/ bdag med pa'i 'du
shis dang/ rje med pa'i 'du shes dang/ gzhan la rag las pa'i 'du shes dang/ rgashi'i 'du shes dang/ 'dod pa'i yul dang/ longs spyod thams cad la dga' ba med pa'i 'du shes spyod
de sems can de dag kyang soms de la yongs su sgom pas/ 'dod pa'i dga' ba thams cud la mngon par dga' ba med pas chos la mos pa'i dga' ba la 'jug cing khyim nas khyim med par

cha rab tu 'byung ngo// de dag dgon pa la gnas pa'i tshe'ang chos dang 'thun pa'i dad pa yongs su skyed de/ sgra chen po 'jigs pa mi snyan pa'i sgra skad thams cad kyang zhi bar byed do// mtshan ma zhi ba
gyur pa las sangs rgyas kyi chos zab mo'ang yang dag par ston to// spang ba dang 'thun pa'i rkyen kyang nye bar ston to// khyim gyi sgo'ang rnam par 'byed do/ lam yad yongs su ston to// snang bas
kyar mngon par byed do// mun pas chod pa'i ng rnam bsamalato// 'jigs pa'i ng med par byed do// rab tu byung ba la'ang yang dag par bsngags bar byed do// sangs rgyas kyi legs pa'i ng brjod
de chos kyi legs ba dang/ dge 'dun gyi legs pa dang/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi legs pa'i ng brjod do// dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro ba la'ang bsngags pa byed do// rigs
kyi bu kho mo rnam par thar pa 'di la sgom zhing/ sems can rnams kyi chos ma yin pa'i 'a dod chags kyi zhen pa rnams kyi chos ma yin pa'i 'dod chags kyi yos su rtog pa rnams kyang med par byed do//
tshul ma yin pa'i 'dod pasazhon pa rnams dang/ log par yongs su rtog pa'i spyod yul can rnams kyi yodas su rtog pa de dag dang/ yid la bya ba de dag kyang med par byed do// sdig to mi dge ba'i
chos m skyes pa rnams mi skya ba dang/ sdig to'i yongs su rtog pa skyes par gyur pa rnams kyang med par 'gyur ba'i rkyen nye bar bslab bo// dge ba'i yongs su rtog pa pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa
dang / spyod pa dang ldan pa dang/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i yashas su 'byung ba'i smon lam mngon par bsgrub pa dang ldan pa dang/ byams pa'i tshul dang ldan pa dang/ sems can rnams la snying rjerman/

pos rgyas par ba'o/ngas ba dang ldan pa dang/ lha dang mi'i bdeba'i rnam pa sna tshogs yongs su skyed pa dang ldan pa'i yongs su rtog pa skyed pa dang/ skyes nas kyang tshul sna tshog sakyi rkyen nye bar sgrub par byed pa
nas thams cad mkhyen pa nyid dang 'thun pa'i rkyen kyang nye ba'i sgrub par byed de/ rigs kyi bu kho mos byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa bsam gtan zhi ba'i bde bas kun tu rnam/

par gnon pa 'di shes pa ra zad// kho mos byang chub sems dpa'i kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang/ smon lam gyis byung ba'i byang chub sems dpa' rnam pa mtha' yas pa'i chos kyi dbyings kyi ye shes rab tu
thob pa/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad kyis rnam par spel ba'i sams dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yi shes kyi mthusasamasakyi snang ba rab tu thob pa/ de ba zhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi
yul la gnas pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ gnas thams cad du sgrib pa med pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi smon lam yongs su rdzogs pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ zhing rgya mtsho thams cad

du zhugs pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ sangs rgyas rgya mtsho thams cad mthong bar bya ba la zhugs pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos kyi sprin gyi char yang dag par gzung ba'i sems

dang ldan pa/ sems can thams cad kyi ma rig pa'i mun pa rnam par sel ba/ 'khor ba'i bde ba la dga' zhing sred pa zad cing mthar phyin par 'gyur ba'i lam gyis thams can mkhyen pa nyid du snang ba skyor pa'i

soms dang ldan pa de dag gi spyod pa shes pa 'am/ yon tan brjod par nusa'i skazhu/ song rigs kyi bu 'di nyid de dang yang rgyang mi 'ong ste/ rnam par snang mdzad kyi snying po byang chub kyi g.yas rol zhig na/ mtshan
00mo'i lha mo rab turaga' ba'i mig 'gro bar rnam par snang ba zhes bya ba 'dug gis/ de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i las la brtson par bya ba drisashig

dunas mtshan mo'i lhamo kun tu zab pa'i dpal dri ma med pa'i 'od kyis/ de'i tshe byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa bsam gtan zhi ba'i bde bas kun tu rnam par gnon pa 'di nyid brnan te bstan par bya ba'i
phyir tshong dpon gyi bum bzad s la tshigs su bcad de smras pa/ dus rnams kun tu byung ba'i bde gshegs rnams// mngon du bya bar mos pa'i sems ldan pa// de dag mig yas rnam par dag
par 'gyur// des ni sangs rgyas rgya mtsho mthong bar 'ong// rgyal ba'i sku gsal dri ma med la ltos// mtshan gyis yongs su brgyan pas shin tu mdzes// rgyal ba'i rnam par 'phrul pa chos dbyings rnams//

skad cig re res rgyas 'gengs de la'ang ltos// byang nub shing drung sangs rgyas gdan rab la// bde gshegs rnam par snang mdzad mngon sangs rgyas// chos dbyings yangs pa rgyas pa khyab mdzad cing// 'groba'i
bsam pa ji bzhin 'khor lo skor// rgyal ba'i chos nyid lus med rab zhi ba// gnyis med rang bzhin med pa thugs chud nas// gzugs sku bgrang ngo mtshan gyis brgyan pa yis// 'gro ba ma lus ng kang
zhing ston pa mdzad// sangs rgyas sku'i rgya che bsam mi khyab// chos kyi dbyangs kun yongs su rgyus bkang zhing// de'i kun tu mnyam par snang ba ste// rgyal ba thams cad kun tu ston pa mdzad// zhing
rnams kun gyi rdul rab phra ba stod// bod kyi dkyil 'khor mnga' ba'i sangs rgyas sku// kha dog bzang bo gzhan dang gzhan snang bas// chos dbyings rgyas nga la skad cig re res 'ge dra//
rgyal ba'i ba spu'i sgo nas 'od zer sprin// rgyal che bsam yas mi zad mngon 'byung ba// de dag 'gro ba ma lus 'gengs byed cing// srog chags rnams kyi nyon mongs gdung ba sel// sangs rgyas
sprul pa rgya mtsho ma zad pa// rgyal ba'i sdu yi 'khor nas yongs bton cing// chos dbyings yangs pa rgyas par kun bkang ste// srog chags rnams kyi sdug bsngal ngan song sol// sangs rgyas
gsung snyan rab tu sgroga mdzad pa// byangs kyi yan lag rgya mtsho sgra 'od can// chos ma chen po rab tu 'bebs pa mdzad// srog chags byang chub bsam pa yongs su spyod// bskal pa rgya mtsho
sbyar pa spyod pa'i tshe// 'dis ni sngon chad yongs su bzung mdzad pa// de dag kun gyis rgyal ba rnam snang mdzad// zhing rnams kun tu gzugs bar n mtshan nyid mthong// de bzhin gshegs pa 'jig
rten kun tu byung// sems can re re kun la'ang mngon par zhugs// mos pa'i tshul bzhin sbyor yul gzhan dang gzhan// de dag kho mos kun tu shes mi nus// rgyal sras dam pa thams cad ma lus
bar bde bar gshegs pa'i myu gcig rtse las 'byung// rnam thor de la gang rnams bsam yas pa// de dag thams cad kho mos shes mi nus// kho mo'i 'dab na gnas pa'i lha mo 'di//
ma 'jig rten mgon la mngon 'gyur rab tu dga'// yid du snang ba 'od 'phromig ces bya// de la byang chub spyod pa ci 'dra dris/// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/ mtshan

mo'i lha mod kun tu brab pa'i dpal dri ma med pa'i 'od kyi rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal te/ mtshan mo'i lha mo kun tu zab pa'i dpal dri ma med pa'i bod lalan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su
bskor ba byas nas yang dang yang bltas te/ mtshan mo'i lha mo kun tu zab pa'i dpal dri ma med pa'i bod kyi drung nas song ngo// de nas tshong dpon gyi bu mo bzangs dge ba'i bshes gnyen
gyi gdams ngag gis byin gyis brlabs pa/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi tshig la nan tan du bya ba'i sams yadag par skyes pa/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi sman pa la nad pa lta bu'i 'du shes kyis yongs
su spyad pa'i sems dang ldan pa// dag ba'i bshes gnyen mthong ba yid la byed po ma 'khrugs pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen blta ba la sgrib pa'i ri thams cad rnam par gtor ba'i rgyag

red ba'i sAms dang ldan pa/ drag snga'i bshes gnyena mthong apa lasems can gyi khams thams cad yongs su bskyab pa'i snying rje chen po'i tshul rgya mtsho la 'jug pa thob pa'i sems dang ldan pa/ dge ba'i

bshes gnyen mthong ba la chos kyi dbyingesakyi tshul rgya mtshob ye shes snang ba rab tu thob pa'i sems dang ldan pa de/ mtshan mo'i lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i mig 'gro bar rnam par snang ba gang na ba der song ngo//
de nas mtshan mo'i lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i mig 'gro ba'i rnam par snang bas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzas de bas kyang dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi drung du kha gro ba dge ba'i rtsa ba'i
tshogs las byung bas yongs su smin par bya ba'i phyir/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro ba tshog sachen po las byung bar byin gyis brlabs so// dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro ba rnam
par gnon pa chen por byin gyis brlabs so// dge ba'i bshesaganyen gyi drung du 'gro ba brtson 'grus kyi las 'jug par dka' bar byin gyis brlabs so// dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro bo
bsdad nyid shin tu legs par byin gyis brlabs so// duge ba'i ngo shes gnyen gyi drud du 'gro ba phyogs mtha' dang dbus med pa la 'jug par byin gyis brlabs so// dge ba'i bshes
gnyen gyi drung du bgro ba yun ring por gnas pas byung bar byin gyis brlabs so// dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro bdon mtha' yas pa yongs su rdzogs pa'i rnam par dmigs pa 'byung
bar byin gyis brlabs so// dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro ba lam gyi rgyan mtha' dang dbus med pa'i tshogs kyis yodas su gnon par byin gyis brlabs so// dge ba'i bshes gnyen
gyi drud du 'gro ba sgo kun nas rnam par gnon pas gyur bar byin gyisabarlabs so// dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro ba g.yo ba med par 'ong bsa rnam par gnon par byin gyis brlabs so//
de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshogs kyi brtson 'grus la rab tu brtson pas/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro ba dang/ smon lam chen mo rgya mtsho/
mngon par bsgrub ba'i rnam par gnon pas/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro ba dang/ sems can gcig gi don du phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa'i mur thug par sdug bsngal nyams su blang ba'i
zhe non bas/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro ba dang/ rdul shin tu phra ba gcig la chos kyi dbyings thams cad du sgra sgrog cing/ yun ring por gnas pa'i rnam par gnon pa dang/ brtson
'grus chen po'i go bgos pas/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro ba dang/ phyogs rgya mtsho 'byams pa thams cad du shugs kyis 'gro bas/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi drung du 'grog
dang ba snga'i sbubs gcig tu phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal par byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa la gnas pas/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro ba dang/ byang chub sogs dar 'i spyod pa la gnas
nas kyang/ sems kyi skad cigare re la thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes 'gas pa la gnas par bya bas/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro ba dang/ dus gsum du gshags pa'i re
bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i rgyan dang/ lam yongs su gnon pa zhe non pas/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro ba dang/ chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul gyi rgyun du zhugs pa'i las
yongs su gnas pas/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro ba dang/ chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul thams cad la dmigs pa las ma g.yos par/ chos kyi dbyis kun/
tu rgyas par 'gengs pas/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi drung du 'gro bas/ mtshan mo'i lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i mig 'gro ba rnam par snang ba gang na ba der phyin pa dang/ des mtshan mo'i lcamo rab tu
dga' ba'i mig 'gro ba rnam par snang ba bcom ldan 'das kyi 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor nas nig ge'i khrim tog gi snying bo can la 'dug cing/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin kun tu bzang po'i dga'
tsha ba yang sang dri med pa'i shugasakyi rgyal mtshan la mnyam par bzhag mthong ngo// de'i ba sdu'i bu ga thams cad nas sbyin pa la sogs pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa mngon par ston
pa'i sprin sems can thams cad mngon par dga' ba/ soms can thoms cad kyi yid du 'ong ba/ sems can thams cad kyis bltan nyams su bde ba/ sems can thams cad kyis blta na sdug pa

rnam pa sna tshogs 'byung ba'ang mthong ste/ 'di ltar sems can thams cad la phan gdags shing rtsod pa med par bya ba dang/ dngos po thams cad la 'phangs pa' rtsi ba med par bya ba dang/ sems can thams
cad la sbyor ba mtshungs pas yongs su gtang bar bya ba dang/ sems can thams cad la mnyam pa'i sems su bya ba dang/ sems can thams cad la brnyas pa med par yongs su gtang ba dang/ nang
dang phyi'i dngos po thams cad yongs su gtang ba dang/ dka' ba chen po yongs su gtang bar bstan pa dang/ 'jig rten thams cad du sems can gyi bsam pa ji bzhin gyi sbyin pa'i spyod ba yongs su

bstan par bya ba'i phyir/ sems can thams cad kyi bsam ba ji lta ba bzhin du rnam par dmigs pa dang 'thun pa'i sgras/ sbyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su ston pa'i sprin dang/ dus gsum du byungaba'i byang chub
sems dpa' rnams gtang bar dka' ba yongs su gtong ba'i sprul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sprin 'thon nas/ phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khams 'byam klas par gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad
kyis rnam par dmigs par gyur pa mthong ngo// 'di lta ste/ byang chub sems dpa'i khyu mchog gi mthu byung ba dang/ rnam par 'phrul pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa thob pas/ ba spu'i bu ga thams cad nas
sems can thams cad dang mnyam pa'i skye ba sna tshogs su sprul pa'i lus kyi sprina mngon par 'thon te/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad du gtogs pa'i soms can thams cad la rgyas par khyab bar byas
nas mngon sum du brtul zhugs thams cad kyi yi dam las mi g.yo bar yongs su ston pa dang/ sems can gyi khams dang mnyam pa'i dka' thub dang/ brtul zhugs kyi dkyil 'khor sna tshogs rab tu
ston pa dang/ 'jig rten thams cad du gnas ba med pa dang/ yul thams cad la ltos pa med pa dang/ 'khor ba thams cad du gnas pa las phyi'i phyogs pa dang/ lha dang mi'i phun sum tshogs pa rgud
pa'i sgor gzhol ba yongs su ston pa dang/ mi sdug pa'i dkyil 'khor rab tu ston pa dang/ 'jig rten gyi sdug pa'i 'du shes kyi phyin ci log rnam par zlog pa dang/ mi rtag pa dang/
g.yo ba dang/ 'jig ba dang/ 'gyur ba'i chos nyid yongs su ston pa dang/ 'du byed thams cad kyi chos nyid sdug bsngal zhing bdag med pa yongs su ston pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i yul la gnas pa/
tsa dngami 'dral bar mos par byed pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i tshul khrims shin tu rag ra ra bya ba'i phyir/ sems can thams cad la yang dag par skul ba dang/ sems can thams cad kyi bsam pa
ji lta ba bzhin gyi sgras tshul khrims kyi sbyor pa yongasasu ston pa dang/ sems can thams cad yongs su tshim par byed pa'i tshul khrims kyi dri zhim po yongs su ston par byed cing sems can thams cad
yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo// ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas sems can thams cad dang mnyam pa 'a lus kha dog sna tshogs su sprul pa'i sprin 'thob te/ yan lag dang nying lag thams cad kyang
nyams su bzod pa sems can thams cad la yongs su ston pa/ sems can thams cad kyis lus la gnod par mtho btsams kyang nyams su bgrod par byed pa dang/ sems can thams cad
! kyis tshul dang mi 'dra ba'i tshig gis skyo ba dang/ brgyad pa dang/ smad pa dang/ bskyung ba dang/ brdeg pa dang/ bsdigs pa nyams su bzod par byed pa yongs su ston pa dang/ sems can thams
tha cad kyis ma bskul ba yongs su ston pa dang/ rim gror byas pa dang rim gror ma byas pa thams cad kyis mtho ba dang dma' bar mi 'gyur ba yongs su ston pa dang/ sems can thams cad la nga rgyal
med ba yongs su ston pa dang/ chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin la bzod pa mi zad pas ye shes ma zad pa yos su ston pa dang/ sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa thams cad yongs su spang ba'i phyir/
bzod pa'i spyod ba yongs su ston pa dang/ sems can thams cad kyi lus dbyibs mi sdug cing kha dog mi mdzes pa'i gzugs rnam par zlog par byed pa dang/ sems can thams cad la de bzhin gshegs

pa'i sku mdog rnam par dag pa bla na med pa yongs su ston cing/ sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo// ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas sems can thams cad dang mnyam pa'i skye ba sna tshog sakyi lus
kha dog dang/ dbyibs dang/ chuzheng sna tshogs su sprul pa'i sprin 'thon te/ sems can rnams kyi bsam ba ji lta ba bzhin du rgyas par khyab par byas nas/ thams can mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshogs chen po la
brtson 'grus kyis sngon du 'dong ba yang dag par ston po dang/ bdud kyi dkrugs ma thams cad rnam par 'thor ba'i brtson 'grus dang/ byang chub tu brtsams pa mi 'khrugs mi zlogs pa'i brtson 'grus dang/
sems can thams cad 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho las rab tu bsgral ba'i brtson 'grus dang/ mi khom pa dang/ ngan song dang/ ngan 'gro dang/ log par lhung ba'i lam thams cad rnam par zlog pa'i brtson 'grus/
@#// dang mi shes pa'i 'i rnam par gtor ba'i brtson 'grus dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad mchod cing bsnyen bkur bya bas yongs su mi skyo ba'i brtson 'grus dang/ sangs
rgyas thams cad kyi chos kyi kha khor la yang dag par blang ba dang/ yodas su gzung ba'i brtson 'grus dang/ sgrib pa thams cad kyi rab tu gzhom zhing rnam par gtor ba'i brtson 'grus dang/ son sa/
pa/ ]can thams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang/ gdul bsami skyo ba'i brtson 'grus dang/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yongs su dag par bya ba'i brtson 'grus dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i
brtson 'grus rnam par dag pazla na mad pa yongs su ston cing/ sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo// ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas lus sna tshogs kha dog dang dbyibs rnam pa tha dad bar
sprul ba'i sprin 'thon te/ thabs sna tshogs kyis sems can rnams kyi dga' ba yongs su skyod pa dang/ yid mi bde ba rnam par zlog pa dang/ 'dod pa'i dga' ba thams cad rnam par smon pa dang/ ngom
shis pa'i chos nyid 'jig rten du sgrogs pa dang/ dbang po bsdams pa la sems can rnams rab tu dgod pa dang/ chongs pa'i sbyor ba blan med pa yang dag par bsngags pa byed pa dang/ 'dod pa'i 'jig rte
laM bdud kyi yul 'jigs pa dang bcas par yongs su ston pa dang/ 'dod pa'i dga' ba dang bral ba rnams la 'jig rten gyi 'dod ba dang dga' ba'i yul thams cad yongasu ston pa dang/ chos la mos
shing dga' ba la sems can rab tu dgod pa dang/ mthar gyis bsam gtan dang/ de de 'dzin dang/ snyoms par 'jug pa'i sgo mngon par sgrub pa dang/ sems can thams cad kyi nyon mongs pa thamA
cad rnam par bsal ba la nges par rtogs pa'i sems yongs su rjod pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin rgya mtsho'i rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad yongs su ston pa dang/ byang chub sems pa'i
mngon par shes pa dang/ rnam par 'phrul pa dang/ khyu mchog gi mthu byung ba yongs su ston pa byed cing/ sems can thams cad kyi dga' ba yongs su skyed pa dang/ spro ba 'phal bar bya ba dang/ nyams
bde ba yongs su bskyed pa dang/ yid mi bde ba bzlog pa dang/ sems skyon med pa yongs su bsgrub pa dang/ sems las su rung bar bya ba dang/ bsam pa rnam par sbyang ba dang/ dbang po gsal bar bya ba

dang/ lus kyi bde ba yongs su spyad pa dang/ chos la dga' ba'i shugs rnam par 'phel bar bya ba byed cing sems can rnams yongasasu smin par byed pa mthong ngo// ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas skye ba thamA
cad dang 'dra ba'i lus kyi sprin sna tshogs 'thon te/ zhing thams cad kyi khongs su chud pa'i sems can thams cad kyi yid bzhin du bstan pa'i phyir/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gan du 'gro bas skye ba
mad pa yongs su ston pa dang/ slob dpon dang/ bla ma dang/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen la rim gro bya ba dang bsnyen bkur bas skyo ba med pa yongs su ston pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi chos
kyi 'khor lo 'khor ba yang dag par blang yongs su gzung bas skyo ba med pa'i brtson 'grus yongs su ston pa dang/ sangs rgyas rgya mtsho thams cad khong du chud par bya ba'i tshul yang
