dag bar brjod ba dang/ chos kyi sgo rgya mtsho thams cad rnam bar 'byed pa dang/ chos thams cad kyi mtshan nyid dang/ rang bzhin dang/ tshul mngon par brjod pa dang/ chos thams cad ting nge 'dzin gyi
sgos yongs su ston pa dang/ sems can thams cad kyi dri ba dang the tshom rgya mtsho rnam par sol bas shes rab kyi yul yongs su ston pa dang/ sems can thams cad kyi lta ba'i rishin tu 'jom pa'i shes
ba rdo rje yongs su ston pa dang/ soms kyi skad cig gcig dang ldan pas sems can thams cad kyi ma rig pa'i mun pa rnam par sel ba'i shes rab kyi nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor 'char ba yongs su
ston pa byed cing/ sems can thams cad kyi dga' ba yongs su skye bar bya bas sems can thams cad yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo// ba spu'i sgo thams cad nas kha dog dang byibs
zla bsam gyis ma khyab pa'i lus mang bo 'gro ba thams cad dang mnyam pa'i sprul pa'i sprin 'thon te/ bsam pa dang mos pa ji lta ba bzhin dusems can thoms cad la mngon du gnas shing sgra skad sna
tshogs kyis yongs su sbyang ba bstan pas/ 'jig rten pa'i bsod nams dang bsod nams ma yin pa mngon par ston pa dang/ 'jig rten pa'i bya ba thams cad rab tu rgyu ba dang/ khams gsum pa 'byung
bo thams cad yos su snon pa dang/ khams gsum pa thams cad las 'byang ba'i phyogs yang dag par brjod pa dang/ lta ba'i mya ngan mi bgrod pa thams cad las 'byung ba'i phyogs yang dag par/

bstan pas/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam gyi khyad par yongs su brjod pa dang/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa'i lam las yongs su bzla ba yang dag par ston pa dang/ rim gror byas pa dang rim
grolan byas dag la byams sdang gis gos pa mad pa yongs su ston pa dor/ 'khor ba dang mya ngan las 'das pa'i sgo 'du gnas pa yang dag pa za ston pa dang/ dga' ldan gyi gnas la sogs pa gcig nas gcig

rgyu rgyun mi 'chad pa yongs su ston pa dang/ snying po byang chub tu song zhing mngon par rdzogs par 'tshang rgya bar rgyun mi 'chad pa yongs su ston pa byed cing/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du sems can yongs su

smin par byed pa mthong ngo// ba spu'i sgo thams cad kyi ba sdu'i sgo re re nas kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyad kyi lus sprul pa'i sprin 'thon te/ sems can gyi 'jig rten thams cad la/

mngon sum du gnas shing/ byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang smon lam yongs su brjod pa dang/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad rnam par dag pa'i mthar thug nga kasmon lamagyi khyad par yongasasu
brjod pa dang/ sems kyi skad cig re re la 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad yongs su dag par bya ba yongs su brjod pa dang de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad la mchod cing rim gror bya ba rgyun mi
'chad pa yongs su brjod pa dang/ sems kyi skad cig re re la chos kyitshul rgya mtsho thams cad la 'jug pa rgyun mi 'chad pa yongs su ston pa dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho

thams cad rdul shin tu phra bsnyad kyis kyi dbyings kyi tshul rgya mtsho la 'jug pa rgyun mi 'chad pa yongs su ston pa dang/ zhing thams cad du phyi ma'i mtha'i bskal pa'i mur thug par gnas shing thams
cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi lam rnam par dag par bya bar yongs su brjod pa rgyun mi 'chad pa yang dag par ston pa dang/ sems kyi skad cig re re la de bzhin gshegs pa'i stobs la 'jug pa rgyun mi 'an

pa yang dag par brjod pa dang/ dus gsum gyi tshul rgya mtsho thams cad la 'jug pa rgyun mi 'chad pa yongs su ston pa dang/ zhing thams cad du rdzu 'phrul gyis rnam pa 'phrul pa yongs su bstan pa rgyun mi

'chad pa yang dag par ston pa byed cing/ byang chub soms dpa'i smon lam dang spyod pa yongasaM su bstan pas sems can thams cad thams cad mkhyen pa nyi mar ba tu 'god pa mthong ngo// ba spu'i sgo thams cad kyi ba
spu'i sgo re re nas kyang 'gro ba thams cad kyi sems dang mnyam pa'i lus kyi sbal nga 'i sprin mad po 'thon te/ sems can thams cad la mngon par gnas shing/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid kyi tshogs kyi
stobs mu med pa yongasasu ston pa dang/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i goms kyi stobs mi zad pa dang/ mi 'jigs pa dang/ chud mi za ba'i chos can yongs su ston ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i spyod

tsa ba thams cad yongs su bsgrub pa'i stobs phyir mi ldeg cing phyir mi ldog la thug pa med pa dang/ rgyun med pa dang bla na med pa yongs su ston pa dang/ byang chub sems dang ba rnams kyi stobs 'khor ba'i nyes pa//
thams cad kyis mi gos pa yodas su ston pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnams kyi stobs bdud kyi dkyil 'khor thams cad rnam par 'thor ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi stobs nyon mongs pa

thams cad kyi dri mas nya bar nyon mongs pa med pa yongs su ston pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams kyi stobs las kyi sgrib pa thams cad kyis rnam par 'thor ba yongs su ston pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'/

rnams kyi snying rje chen po'i stobs bskal pa thamasacad du gnas kyang byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pas skyo ba med pa yongs su ston pa dang/ byang chub sems dang ba rnams kyi stobs sangs rgyas zhing thams cad yong
su bskyod rung bskul bas// sems can thams cad rab tu dga' bar byed pa yongs su ston pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa' rnams/kyi stobs bdud dang phas kyi rgol ba'i tshogs thams cad rab tu 'joms

ba yongs su ston pa dang/ chos kyi 'khor lo bskor ba'i ye shes kyi stobs chen po 'jig rten du rab tu rjod pa byed cing/ sems can thams cad thams can ma khyenabanyid du yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo//
ba spu'i sgo thams cad kyi ba spu'i sgo re re nas kyang lus kyi sprul ba rgya mtsho kha dog mtha' yas pa/ 'gro ba thams cad kyi sems dang mnyam pa'i sprin/ phyogs bcu mtha' yas pa'i sems can gyi
khams su rgyas par 'gangs pa 'thon te/ sems can rnams kyi bsam pa dang mos pa ji lta ba bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa dang/ ye shes kyi rnam par gnon pa yongs
su ston pa dang soms can gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad la 'jug pa'i yongashes yongs su ston pa dang/ sems can thams cad kyi sems rgya mtsho la 'jug pa'i ye shes yongs su ston pa dang/
sems can thams cad kyi dbang po rgya mtsho yongs su shes pa'i yo shas yongs su ston pa dang/ sems can thams cad kyi sbyor pa rgya mtsho la 'jug pa'i ye shes yongs su ston pa dang/ sems can
N+Dams cad yongs su smin par bya ba dang/ gdul ba'i dus las mi 'da' ba yi shes yongs su ston pa dang/ chos kyi dbyings thams cad du grags par sgrog pa'i ye shes yongs su ston pa dang/
sems kyi skad cig re re la chos kyi dbyings thams cad du ye shes kyi tshul rgya mtshos rgyas pas 'gos pa'i yo shes yongs su ston pa dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams rgya mtsho thams cad 'du ba dang 'jig
ba'i yi shes yos su ston pa dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams thams cad kyi gzhi dang/ byibs dang/ rgyun rnam par dgod pa'i yi shes yongs su ston pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thums
cad kyi mchod pa rnam par sprul te smra na sngar phyin nas mchod cing rim gro byed pa dang/ chos kyi 'khor lo'i sprin yang dag par 'dzin pa'i ye shes yongs su ston pa byed cing/ de ltar ye shes kyi
[z]pa rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su ston pas sems can rnams kyi dga' ba skyed pa dang/ soms dang bar byed pa dang/ rab tu dga' ba skyed pa dang/ mas pa 'bal bar byed ba dang/ yid mi bde ba rnam
par zlog pa dang/ sams rnam par sbyong ba dang/ sems skyon med pa skye bar byed pa dang/ dbang po gsal bar byed pa dang/ mos pa'i stobs yongs su skyod pa dang/ thams cad mkhyen pa nyid las phyir mi

ldog par byed pa mthong ngo// pha rol du phyin pa'i spyod pa yongs su bstan pas 'jig rten du ji ltar sems can yongs su smin nga ra gyur pa mthong ba de bzhin du/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos thams cad rab
tu sgrog pa'i tshul gyis mtshan mo'i lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i mig 'gro bar rnam par snang ba'i thog ma sems bskyed nga 'i tshogs dang/ dgu ba'i bshes gnyen bsnyen bkur ba'i thabs dang/ de bzhin gshegs

pa'i zhabs kyi drung du phyin cing mchod pa dang rim gro byas patshul dang/ dge ba'i chos spyad pa'i thabs ji sku da pa dang/ sbyin pa'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pas gtong bar dka'apa yongs su gtong ba dang/ tshul khrimA

kyi pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su sbyangs pa'i thabs dang/ rgyal srid kyi dbang phyugachen po dang/ 'khor mang po dang/ longs spyod kyi bang chen po yos su gtang ste mngon par byung ba'i thabs ji snyed pa dang/
'jig rten gyi dka' ba'i spyor pa brtul zhugs dang dka' thub chen po'i dkyil 'khor la bzod pa mngon par bsgrubs paji snyad cig yod pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i brtul zhugs yang dag par
blang ba'i sbyor ba la mi g.yo bar bya ba ji snyed cig yod pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i yid m brtan pa'i chos rgya mtsho sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi nyes byas pa dang/ ngan du smra ba dang/

nyes par spyod pa thams cad bag la zha bar byed pa'i sbyor ba dang/ lus dang sems kyi gnod pa nyams su bzod par byed pa'i sbyor ba ji snyed cig yod pa dang/ chos thams cad 'jig pamed pa'i chos nyid lab brod

pa dang/ chos thams cad la yid ches ba'i bzod pa dang/ chos thams cad kyi rang bzhin nges par rtogs pa'i bzod pa ji snyid cig yod pa dang/ thums cad mkhyan ba nyid du rtsom zhing sbyor ba'i brtson 'grus ji snyed

cig yod pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi chos thams cad yongs su sgrub pa'i brtson 'grus ji snyed cig yod pa dang/ brtson 'grus kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa ji snyed pa thams cad dang/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu

phyin pa'i tshogs dang/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa la brtson par bya ba dang/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa bsgrub pa rnam par dag pa'i spyod pa ji snyed cig yod pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i

ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob pas rnam par 'phrul pa ji snyad cig yod pa dang/ ting nge 'dzin gyi sgo rgya mtsho la 'jug pa ji snyad cig yod pa dang/ bsam gtan gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa ji snyad pa thams cad

kho dang she sa rab kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshogs ji snyed cig yod pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i shes rab chen po'i nyi ma'i dkyil 'khor rnam par sbyang ba'i tshul ji snyad cig yod pa dang/ shes rab chen po'i

sprin yongs su 'du ba'i tshul rjesnyad cig yod pa dang/ shes rab kyi gal chen po'i tshogs ji snyad cig yod pa dang/ shes rab kyi rgya mtsho chen po la rnam par dpyad pa'i tshul dang sbyor ba ji snyad pa thams cad dang/

thabs chen po la mkhas pa'i tshul gyi sbyor ba ji sI dacig yod pa dang/ thabs chen po la mkhas pa yongs su dag par bya ba dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba ji snyed pa thams cad dang// byang chub sems dpa'i smon

lam gyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i lus ji snyed cig yod pa dang/ smon lam chen po'i pha rol tu phyin pa yongs su grub pa ji snyed cig yod pa dang/ smon lam chen po'i pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa ji snyed cig yod pa

dang smon lam chen po'i pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba ji snyed pa thams cad dang/ stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa thob par bya ba'i tshog sachen po ji snyed cig yod pa dang/ stobasakyi pha rol tu

phyin pa'i rkyen du gyur pa ji snyid cig yod pa dang/ stongs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul rgya mtsho chen po ji snyad cig yod pa dang/ stobs kyi pha rol tu phyin pa shin tu bstan pa ji snyed cig yod pa dang/ stobs kyi pha

rol tu phyin pa dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba ji snyed pa thams cad dang/ ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i sbyor ba ji snyed cig yod pa dang/ ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa rnam par dag pa'i tshulaji snyed cig yod pa dang/

yongashes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i phyogs ji snyed cig yod pa dang/ ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i rjes su 'brang bar bya ba ji snyid cig yod pa dang/ ye shes kyi pha rol tuphyin pa 'bum klas pa ji snyed cig yod pa
dung ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul la yang dag par gzhol bar bya ba ji snyed cig yod pa dang/ ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i tshul rnam par dmigs par bya ba ji snyed cig yod

nga dang/ ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa 'byam klas pa'i rjes su 'brang bar bya ba ji snyid cig yod pa dang/ ye shesakyi pha rol tu phyin pas rgyas par 'gangs pa ji snyed cig yod pa dang/ ye shes kyi pha rol tu

phyin pa'i rgya chen po ji snyid cig yod pa dang ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i lcan ji snyad cig yod pa dang/ ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i yongs su grub par bya ba dang ldan pa'i sngon gyi sbyor ba ji snyid pa thamA cad

dang / ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa'i spyod pa'i rnam par rab tu phye ba la 'jug pa 'byung bar yongs su bsgrub pa ji snyad cig yod pa dang/ ye shes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa la yang dag par gzhol bar bya ba'i tshul dang ldan

ba'i chos rnams dang/ chos yongs su bsdu ba dang/ ches kyi ye shesakyi rjes su 'brang ba dang/ las kyi ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang pa dang/ zhing gi ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang/ bskal pa'i yi shes kyi

rjes su 'brang ba dang/ dus kyi ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang/ sangs rgyas 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang pa dang/ sangs rgyas kyi ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang// byang chub sems dar khe ye shes kyi

rjes su 'brang ba dang/ byang chub sems dang 'i sems yos su 'byung ba'i ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang/ byang chub sems dang 'i rnam da ra dgod pa'i yi shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i

'byung ba'i yi shesakyi rjes su 'brang ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i rab tu 'jug pa'i ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang// byang chub sems dpa'i smon lam gyi nges shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang/ byang

chub sems dpa'i chos kyi 'khor lo'i yishesakyi rjes su 'brang ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos rnam par 'byed pa'i yi shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos rgya mcho'i tshul gyi ya

shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang/ byang chub sems rar 'i chos gang chen mtsho'i ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i chos kyi rgyud kyi yo shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i

chos kyi gter gyi ye shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba dang/ byang chub sems dang 'i chos kyi lugs kyi ya shes kyi rjes su 'brang ba ji snyad cig yod pa dang/ mtshan mo'i lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i mig 'gro bar rnam par snang ba'i

yashes kyi pha rol tu phyin pa dang ldan nga 'i byang chub sems dang 'i spyod pa ma tha' dang dbus med pa'i dmigs pa can de dag thams cad de'i ba spu'i sgo thams cad kyi ba spu'i sgo re re nas mngon par 'thon te/ sems can
gyi lus kyi sprin kha dog sna tshogs can du mngon par mched cing sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo// 'di lta ste/ 'og min dang/ shin tu mthong ab dang/ gya nom snang ba dang/ ma
dros pa dang/ mi che ba'i gtsang ma'i gnas kyi lha lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo// de bzhin du 'bras bu che ba dang/ bsod nams 'pha' pa
dang/ sprin dang bral ba'i lha lta bu'i lus kyi sngon du mngon par 'thob cing samasacan yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo// dge rgyas dang/ tshad med dge ba dang/ dge bachung/

bab lha lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo// kun snang dang ba dang/ tshad med snang ba dang/ snang ba chung ngu'i lha lta bu'i lus kyi sngon du mngon
par 'thon rung sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo// tshangs chen dang/ tshos lha nye phan dang/ tshangs pa kun sa kyi lha lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon bar 'jog cing sems can yongs
su smin par byed pa mthong ngo// dbang sgyur gyi lha'i rgyal po lha mo'i tshogs dang lha'i bu dang bcas pa lta bu'i lus kyi ljin mngon par 'thon cing sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo//

smo/ lha'i rgyal po rab 'phrul dga' lha mo'i tshog so dang lha'i bu dang bcas pa lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon pa'i sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo// rang dga' ldan gyi lha'i rgyal po lha mo'i

tshog sa dang lha'i bu dang bcas pa lta bu'i lus kyi sngon du mngon par 'thon rung sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo// rab mtshe ma'i lha'i rgyal po lha mo'i tshogs dar la'i bu dang bcas pa lta

bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo// lha'i rgyal bo brgya byin lha mo'i tshigs dang lha'i bu dang bcas pa lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon da/da 'thon
cing sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo// dri za'i rgyal bo gnas srung po dang/ dri za'i bu dang/ dri za'i bu mo lta bu'i lus kyi sbyin du mngon par 'thon cing sems can yongs susnyen/
dpar byed pa mthong ngo// grul bum gyi rgyal po 'phags skyes po dang/ grul bum gyi bu dang/ grul bum gyi bum lta bu'i lus kyi sngon du mngon par 'thon rung sems can yongs su smin pa
byed pa mthong ngo// klu'i rgyal po mig mi bzad dang/ klu'i bu dang/ klu'abu mo lta bu'i lus kyi sngon du mngon par 'thonacing sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo// gnod sbyin
gyi rgyal po chen po ngal bso bo dang/ gnod sbyin gyi bu dang/ gnod sbyin gyi bu mo lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing sems can yongs su sman par byed pa mthong ngo// ma 'am ci'i
rgyal po sdong po dang/ mi 'am ci'i bu dang/ mi 'am ci'i bu mo lta bu'i lus kyi sngon du mngon par 'thon cing sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo// lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po blo gros/
bzang po dang/ lto 'phya chen po'i bu dang/ lto 'phye chen po'i bu mo lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo// nam mkha' lding gi dbang po
shugs drag stobs chen dang/ nam mkha' lding gi bu dang/ nam mkha' lding gi bu mo lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo// lham yin
bya dbang po sgra gcan dang/ lham yin gyi bu dang/ lha ma yin gyi bu mo lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo// chos kyi
rgyal po gshen rje dang/ gshin rje'i bu dang/ gshin rje'i bu mo lta bu'i lus kyi sngon du mngon par 'thon rung sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo// mi'i dbang po dang/ skyes pa dang/
bud med dang/ khye'u dang/ bu mo thams cad lta bu'i lus kyi sngon du mngon par 'thob cing sems can smin par byed pa mthong ngo// de bzhin du 'gro ba'i rgyud thams cad du gtogs pa'i soms

can thams cad lta bu'i lus kyi sngon du mngon par 'thon cing sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo// nyan thos dang/ rang sangs rgyas dang/ drang srong thams cad lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon

pas 'thon rung sems can yongs su smin par byed pa mthong ngo/ rlung dang/ chu dang/ me'i phung po'i lha lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon cing sems can yongs su smin par byed pa ma thong ngo//
rgya mtshodang/ chu klung dang/ ri dang/ nags tshal dang/ lo tog dang/ rman dang/ shing dang/ sa'i lha lta bu'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon rung sems rus yongs su smiM/
par byed pa mthong ngo// babra' shing gar ba dang/ grong khyer dang/ snying po byang chub dong 1 nyin bar dang/ mtshan mo dang/ nam mkha' dang/ phyogs dang/ rkang gis 'gro ba dang/ lus
xxx
bcu rgyas par bkang ste/ chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul 'jam klas pa thams cad du sems can thams cad la mngon par gnas shing sems can yongs su smin par byed pa'i bar du mthong ste/ ma tshan
mo'i lha mo zab tu dga' ba'i miga'agro ba rnam par snang ba'i sems thog ma bskyed pa'i tshogs la sogs pa// sngon gyi tshorabs la yongs su bsgrubs pa'i dag ba'i sems gcig nas gcig tu brgyud de
rgyun ma chad pa'i tshul ji snyed pa dang/ byang chub tu sems bskyed pa'i bsngag pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud ring 'dab chags pa dang/ shi 'pho dang skye ba yongs su bzung ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud
cing 'dab chags pa dang/ lus yongs su bzung ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud ceng 'dab chags pa dang/ ming gi 'khor lo gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang/ dgo ba'i
bshes gnyen gyi gan du 'gro ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang/ sangs rgyas byang skyo bsnyen bkur ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang/ chos kyi
tshig dang yi ge blangs pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud de bodab chags pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i lamakyi nan tan gyi sems gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang/
ting nge 'dzin rab tu thob pa gcigs gcig tu brgyud phying 'dab chags pa dang/ teng nge 'dzin thob pas sangs rgyas mthong ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa
dang zhing mthong ba'i mig gis rgyas par bkang ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang/ bskal pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i ye shes kyi 'khor lo 'dab chags
ba dang/ chos kyi dbyings khong du chud pa'i ye shes gcig nas gcig tu brgyud ci 'dab chags pa dang/ sems can gyi khams la rnam par lta ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud rnying 'dab chag
pa dang/ chos kyi dbyings kyi tshul rgya ma gtogs pa'i sems can pha la shi 'pho dang skye ba shes pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud pa'i 'dab chags pa dang/ lha'i rna ba yongs su dag pa rtogs nga na
byed pa 'i shes pa gcig nas gcig du brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang/ sems can gyi khams thams cad kyi sems la rnam par lta zhing dbyangs la 'jug pa'i sgo gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing
'dab chags pa dang/ thog ma lha'i mig la zhugs pa'i sgo gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang/ thog ma lha'i rna ba rnam pas dmigs ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dag
chags pa dang/ thog ma sems can pha rol gyi sems shes pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud chung 'dab chags pa dang/ thog ma bdag dang sems can pha rol du gyi sngon gyi gnas rjes su dran pa
shes pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cad 'dab chags pa dang/ thog ma dngos po med pa la rab tu gnas te mngon par 'du bya ba med pa'i rdzu 'phrul thob ba'i rkyen gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab
chags pa dang/ rdzu 'phrul chen po'i rnam par gnon pas phyogs rgyas par 'gengs ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang 2 byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa thob pa gcig
nasagacig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa rgya mtsho tshul bsam gyi mi khyab pa la 'jug pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud 'di 'dab chags pa dang/ byang
chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyis rnam par 'phrul ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par gnon pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags
ba dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i yongs su gnon pa gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cid 'dab chags pa dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i med du bya ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud ceng 'dab chags pa dang//
byung chub sems dpa'i lam la 'jug pa gcig nas gcig tu rgyud cing 'dab chags pa nas/ mtshan mo lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i mig 'gro bar rnam par snad pa'i byang chub sems dpa'i shes
zhin tu phra ba gcig nas gcig tu brgyud cing 'dab chags pa ji snyed pa de dag thams cad de'i ba sdu'i sgo thams cad nas sprul pa'i lus kyi sprin du mngon par 'thon te/ sems can rnams la chos
'chad pa dang/ yang dag par ston pa dang/ gsal bar byed pa dang/ yongs su ston pa dang/ rjes su brjod pa dang/ rab tu 'byed pa dang/ shin tu rgya cher byed pa dang/
[» ]bgrang ba dang/ nges par ston pa dang/ rnam par rig par byed pa dang/ chu bar bsgrub pa mthong ste/ la la lani rlung gi dkyil 'khor shin tu 'khrugs pa'i sgra skad kyis chos ston ba mthong ngo//

phats+tshA/ la la la ni chu'i phung po rab tu rlob pa'i sgra skad kyis/ la la la ni ma'i lce shin tu rdzob pa'i sgra skad kyis la la la ni rgya mtsho'i 'brug gi sgra skad kyis/ la la la ni sa yongs su g.yos pa'i
sgra skad kyis/ la la la ni ri chen po phan tshun thug cing 'thab pa'i sgra skad kyis/ la la la ni lha'i grong khyer g.yos pa'i nga ro snyan pa'i sgra skad kyis/ la la la'i gzhalamed khang thug cing
'khrol ba'i sgra skad kyis chos ston pa mthong ngo// la la la na lha'i dbang po'i skad kyis/ la la la klu'i dbang po'i skad kyis/ la la la ni gnod sbyin gyi dbang po'i skad kyis/ la la la
rgyun dri za'i dbang po'i skad kyis/ la la la ni lha ma yin gyi dbang po'i skad kyis/ la la la nam mkha'i lding gi dbang po'i skad kyis/ la la la na mi 'am ci'i dbang po'i skad kyis/ la la la
ni lto 'phye chen po'i dbang po'i skad kyis/ la la lani mi'i dbang po 'i skad kyis/ la la la ni tshangs pa'i dbang po'i skad kyis la la la ni lha mo'i glu'i byangs kyis/ la la lan lha rdzas

tsha[d ]kyi rol mo legs par rlangs pa'i dbyangs kyis/ la la la zhi nor bu rin po che'i sgra dbyangs kyis/ la la la ni sems can gyi ris thams cad kyi skad kyi sna tshogs kyis/ mtshan mo'i lha mo rab tu
dga' ba'i mig 'gro bar rnam par snang ba'i rnam par thar pa'i yul sems can rnams la rab tu rjod pa mthong ngo// de bzhin du byang chub sems dpa'i lus kyi sprin gyis byang chub sems dpa'i sgra skad/
snatshogs dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa'i sprul pa'i sku'i sngon gyis de bzhin gshegs pa'i gsung rnam pa tha dad pa'i dbyangs kyi yan lag gi tshul gyis/ mtshan mo'i lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i
mig 'gro bar rnam par thar pa'i yul thog ma sims bskyed pa dang bcas pa yongs su byar sta/ grub cing yang dag par 'dus pa dang bcas pa// rnam par thar pa'i rnam par rtse ba dang bcas pa/
sems can thams cad la rnam par dgas par byed pa mthong ngo// de'i sprul pa'i gzugs kyi sprin re res kyang/ sams kyi skad cig re re la phyogs bcu'i 'jig rten gyi khamasakyi sangs rgyas kyi
zhing brjod du med pa'i yang brjod du med pa rnams sbyong ba mthong ngo// sems can rgya mtshomatha' yas pa dag kyang ngan song gi sdug bsngal thams cad las rnam par 'grel pa ma thong ngo// sems
can gyi khams mtha' dang dbus med pa dag kyang mi'i phun sumatshogs pa la rab tu 'god pa mthong ngo// sems can rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med pa dgakyang 'khor ba rgya mtsho las gyen du skyod pa mtho
[s/]@#/ ngo sems can rgya mtshomatha' dang dbus med pa dag kyang nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyis la rab tu 'god pa mthong ngo// sems kyi skad cig re re kha sems can rgya mtshomatha' dang
dbus med pa dag kyang stobs bcu'i ye shes kyi sar 'dzud patshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis mthong ngo// sgrosaso// rnam par dpyad do// zhugs so/ khong du chud do// nges par rtogs so//
rjes su shes so// rjes su 'brangs so// rjes su zhugs so/ mnyam pa nyid du rlon gyis brlabs te/ de ni mtshan mo'i lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i mig 'gro bar rnam par snang ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i rnam

par thar pa kun tu bzang po'i dga' ba shin tu yangs pa'i rgyal mtshan bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang/ khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba'i byin dang sngon skal ba mnyam par sbyar pa dang/ de bzhin
gshegs pa'i byin gyi rlabs kyis byin du brlabs pa dang/ dag ba'i rtsa ba rnam par smin pa bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang/ byang chub sams dpa'i spyod pa kun tu bzang po'i snod du gyur ba'i phyir ro/
de nas tshong dpon gyi bunor bzangs byang chub sems dpa'i dga' ba'i shugs drag po gangs chen mtsho snang ba chen po rab tu thob pa// phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyig byin/

gyis brlabs pa des/ mtshan mo'i lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i mig 'gro ba'i rnam par snang ba'i mdun du 'dug ste thal mo sbyar nas/ mtshan mo'i lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i mig 'gro bar rnam par snang ba latshul/
dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag gis mngon par bstod do// rgyal ba'i chos rnams shin tu zab// de la khyod kyis bskal pa tshad med bslabs// bsam pa ji bzhin gzugs rnams kyis//
'gro ba kun kyang 'jig rten rim pas bsdus// bdag med mgon med log pa yi// 'du shes rtag tu 'khrul pa mkhyen gyur nas// rdzu 'phrul rnam pa du ma yis// lus dang dbang phyug ston mdzad 'gro ba 'dul//
shin tu rims bral rab tu zhi// chos sku gnyis med rnam par dag pa mngang// 'gro ba ma lus gnyis gnas pa// sprul pa'i sprin sgra 'brug gis rnam par 'dul// phung po khams dang skye mched la//
khyod ni nam yang mi gnas ni rten te// yan lag kun rgyas gzugs mchog dang// dbang phyug yongs su bsgrags pas 'gro ba 'dul// phyi dnganang las rnam par grol// gnyis las gyur ba'i mtsho las
'phags gyur kyang// 'khor ba'i rgya mtsho mtha' yas pa'i// gzugs brnyan 'gro ba'i rgyud du rab tu so// khyod la g.yo ba mi mnga' ste// nam yang rlom sems g.yo ba'i spros mi mang// 'jig
rten sprosamos byis pa rnams// chos kyi rang bzhin bstan cing 'dul ba mdzad/ ting 'dzin rgya mtsho kun spyod pas// bskal pa mang po'i rtse gcig sgrub bzhugs kyang// phyogs bcu'i bde gshegs
mchod don du// sdu rnams rtse las sprul ba'i sprin kyang bskyed// sangs rgyas stobasal 'jug pa'i tshul// skad cig re re mtha' yas thugs su chud// sems can bsdu ba'i sbyor ba rnams//
so so'i skyon bzhin go bar bgyi bas bstan// khyod kyis srid pa'i rgya mtsho dag/ las kyi rnam bris sna tshogs gzugs gzigs shing// chos kyi sgrib pa mang pa'i lam bstan te//
sems can kun kyang rnam par sbyong ba mdzad// khyod skumtshan bris rnam dag kyang// kun tu bzang po'i sngon pa dam pa yis// sems can bsam pa'i dbang tshul du// khyod ni lha mo'i sku gzugs stonu
de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor ba grangs kyis/ mtshan mo'i lhamo rab tu dga' ba'i mig 'gro bar rnam par snang ba la tshul dang 'dra ba'i tshigs su bcad pa de dag gis mngon pa la bstod de 'di skad ces

smras so/lha mo khyod bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu zhugs nas ji srid cig la gas/ lha mo khyod kyis byang chub sems dang 'i rnam par thar pa kun tu bzang bo'i dga' ba shin tu yangs shing dri ma med
pa'i shugs kyi rgyal mtshan 'dirdzong nas ji srid rtsig lags// de nas mtshan mo'i lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i mig 'gro bar rnam par snang bas/ tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs la tshigs su

bcad de smras pa// dran pa bskal pa mang 'das pa/ zhing gi rdul snyad de yi snga rol na// zhing na rin chen martog bad byung// de yi bsal ba zhi ba'i dbyangs shes bya// gling bzhi bye ba khrag khrigaste// brgya

stong phrag bcu rnams kyis yongs su gang// tshad med rin chen ri bo 'dra// gling bzhi'i bar ma bzang po rnam par bkram// rgyal po'i pho brang bye ba brgya// stong phrag bcu rnams ya ngas su tshang ba ste//
[a]rgyal po'i pho brang mdangs dga' ba// dbus na gnas pa'i ljos kyi rgyal mtshan 'od// der ni phyogs kyi dbad bo sa yi bdag/ 'khor los sgyur ba mngon par gzugs bzang byung// mtshan rab sum//
cu gnyis dang ldan// de yi lus kyang dpa byad bzang pos brgyan// pad+mo'i sbubs nas rdzus te byung// gas 'a gyi mdog bzang 'od 'byung lus dang ldan// 'dzam bu'i rgyal mtshan thams cad du//
mkha kha las 'gro 'ang 'od kyis de 'gengs so// de yi bun stong tshang ste// kun kyang yan lag dam pa'i gzugs dang ldan// blon po mkhas shing gsal ba dang// mdzangs shing yid gzhungs bya ba shin
tu mang// btsun mo bye ba phrag bcu tshang// lhamo ji bzhin dga' ba'i tshul la mkhas// de dag phan sems bde sams kyis// rgyal po de la nye ba'i yid du gnas// rgyal po de'i sa chen de// ri dang khor
khug kun gyi mtha' klas pa'i// gling bzhi phun sum tshogs pa dag/ kun kyang chos kyi stobs kyis gnas par byed/ kho mo 'khor los sgyur pa yi// btsun mo tshangs pa'i sgra skad rin chen lus//
gsar gyi mdog 'chang dri med 'od// dpag tshad stong du bod kyis rgyas par 'gengs// nyi mnub par gyur nas kyang// rgyal bo sras dang 'khor bcas gzims gyur nas// rol mo'i dbyangs kyang char/
gyur te// kho mos lan bde bar nyal nyalan/ nam gyi phyed tsam gung zhig la// sangs rgyas dpal gyi rgya mtsho byung bar gyur// de tshe rgyal bas rnam 'phrul pa// phyogs bcu rgyas par bkang ste
bstan pa mdzad// rgyal ba'i 'od zer rgya mtsho yis// zhing gi rdul snyed 'jig rten khyab par 'gyur// rnam 'phrul sku rnams sna tshogs kyis// phyogs bcu thams cad/
malus rgyas par bkang// sa rnams ra dang bcas bar g.yos// rgyal ba byung zhes sgra yangs yongs su brjod// lha dang lha min ma dang klu// kun kyang rgyal ba byung bas rab tu dga'// sangs
rgyas ba spu'i sgo kun nas// sprul pa'i rgya mtsho mang po mngon par byung// dosan phyogs bcu rgyas bkang nas// 'jig rten bsam pa brkon du chos kyang bstan// rnam 'phrul mtha' yas de dag/
kyang rgyal bas thams cad bdag gi rmi lam bstan// zab mo'i 'brug sgra thos gyur nas// khong du chud pas kho mo dga' yid gyur// mtshan mo'i lha mo stong skyed kyang// kho mo'i steng gi bar/
snang mkha' gnas shing// rgyal ba'i legs pa brjod byas nas// kho mo sad par smra zhing brjod// lha yi blo gros btsun mo longs// codakyi rgyal ba'i khams su rgyal ba skyes// bskal pa rgya mtsho brgyu
dag tu// de 'dra'i phun sum tshogs pa rnam dag dkog/ kho mo dga' 'gyur sad par gyur// 'od gsal drisor rnam dag mthong// 'od bzang de ni ga las blta ba lta na// byang chub shing rgyal drung gi
rgyal ba mthong// mtshan nyid sum cu gnyis kyis brgyan// ba su kun nas 'od zer rgya mtsho bkye// ri rab ji bzhin mngon par 'phags// rgyal ba g.yas g.yos kun tu 'ang de bzhin no// mthong nas kho mo

00 'ab dga' ste// de 'drar 'gyur bar sems kyang yongs su bskyod// sangs rgyas rnam 'phrul yangs mthong nas// kho mos smon lam shin tu rgya chen btab// kho mos rgyal po bzhengs su gsol// de yi 'khor dang

bud med tshogs kyang bslang// sangs rgyas 'od yangs mthong gyur nas// kun kyang bde ba'i lus su gyur// rgyal bo de dang lhan cig tu// bzhon pa bye ba srog chags khrag khrig ges// yongs su bskor te dpung bcas pa//

rgyal ba'i spyan sngar kun kyang dong// lo grangs stong phrag nyi shur yang// kho mos rgyal ba de la mchod bkur byas// na chen bdun yang yon du phul// rgya mtsho yongs dang bcas pa'i sa yang gsol/ mdo sde rgya mtsho yon/

tan snga la// smon lam mtsholas yongs su byung ba'i rgyan// kun kyang de bzhin gshegs las byung// bsam pa ji bzhin 'gro bar de bzhin bstan// mtshan mo'i lha mo ji snyed cig/ de tshe snying brtser kho mos phan

bstan ba// de 'drar gyur te myos bsal zhes// kho mosamos pa yongs su skyes par gyur// kho mo'i smon lam de 'dra'isims// thog ma byang chub mchog tu skyes par gyur// 'khor ba'i rgya mtshogs pa'i tshe// srid pa'i

mtshos de ni zhig mgyur// sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig rnams// kho mos dad pa bskyod de mchod pa byas// 'khor ba'i lha dang mi dbus su// yul gyi dga' dang bde la mngon par smon// rgya la ba'i dang po dpal gyi mtsho//de ya/

'ogam yon tan sgron maste// rgyal ba gsum pa rin chen dpal// sangs rgyas bzhi panam mkha'i shes rab bo// rgyal ba lnga ba me tog mchog/ rgyal badrug pa chags med zla ba'i blo// rgyal ba bod rgyalachos kyi zla// brgyad pa
chab rtsi/ @#// ye shes dkyil 'khor snang ba'o// rin chen 'od 'phro ri sgron te// rgyal ba dgu pa de tsho byung bar gyur// bcu pa dus gsum bod dbyangs te// de dag kho mos dad pas mchod// bcu po de la
sogs pa dag/ ma yi dbang po dam pa kun mchod de// tshul gyis rgya mtsho 'dis zhugs pa'i// mig ni de srid yun gyis thob ma gyur// de 'og zhing gi mtshams sbyor ba// rin chen thams cad 'od ces

tsa bya ba byung// bskal pa lha yi dpal zhes bya// sangs rgyas lta brgya de la byung bar gyur// thog ma zla ba'i dkyil 'khor byung// gnyis pa nyi ma'i sgron ma mngon par skyes// snang ba'i rgyal mtshan sangs rgyas
gsum// de yi 'og tu rin chen ri bo'o// me tog 'od 'phro rgya mtsho sgron// ma yi dpa' dang lha yi dpal gyi mchog/ snang ba'i rgyal po bod kyi dpal// bcu pa ye shes kun snang rgyal po'o// bcu po//
de la sogs pa dag/ sa yi dbang po de dag kho mo yis// phung po'i gnas la dad dga' zhing// gnas mad chos la gnas kyi blosamachod do// de 'og de yi mtshams sbyor ba/ 'jig rten khams bzangs

byung bar gyur pa// pad+mo'i sgron ma sprin gyi dpal// de tshe'i bskal pa tshangs pa'i 'od ces bya// de la rgyal ba tshad med de// de dag 'khor dang bcas pa kho mosamachod// rgyal ba dodag tham sa cad las// rim gro chen

posakho mos rmos kyang thos// rgyal pa'i dang po rin chen ni// de yi 'og ma yon tan rgya mtsho ste// rgyal ba chos dbyings dbyangs kyi dpal// chos rab rgya mtsho sgrog pa bzhi pa'o// chos kyi rgyal mtshan gzungs kyi
'od[;]chos stobs 'od dang nam mkha'i blo gros te// chos 'od rib sngo mthon dang// de dag tha ma'i mtshan ni sngon dpal lo// bcu po de la sogs pa dag/ ma yi dam pa de dag kun mchod de// rgyal ba'i

rgya mtsho 'dir zhugs pa'i// chos nyid de ni dag ma gyur// de yi'og tu de bzhin gshegs// nyisa'i sgron ma dpal gyi dpal zhes bya// zhing gi sangs rgyas yod pa ste// de la bskal pa zla ba'i dang labyug

ngo de la stong sa bcu byung ba'i// bye ba brgyad cu yongs su tshang ba ste// de dag kun la'ang mchod pa'i sgo// rgya che mtha' yas yide bod du ma byas// thog mar byung ba dri za'i rgyal// de yi 'og tu sangs rgyas shing
rgyal te// rgyal ba gsum pa yon tan ri// de yi 'og tu rin chen spyan gshegs so// rnam par snang mdzad 'od kyi rgyan// chos kyi rgya mtshosangs rgyas gzi brjid dpal// 'jig rten dbang po 'od bzung
dad la// kun gyi tha ma chos 'od rgyal po'o// bcu bo de la sogs pa dag/ bde gshegs de dag thams cad mchod byas kyang// chos kyi rgya mtshor 'jug pa yi// yoshes kho mos thob par ma gyur to// de yi
'og tu zhing dag pa// rdo rje'i rang bzhin ma phyad gzi brjid brtan// kun tu 'od sprin ming ldan byung// rgyan gcig kun nas mdzes par gnas pa'o// de la sems can dag pa mang// nyon mongs dri mas

nyon mongasashin tu nyung// bskal pa rab zhi blo gros 'od// sangs rgyas stong rnams byung bas rnam par brgyan// rgyal ba'i dang po rdo rje gtsug/ gnyis pa chags med stobs mnga'i mtshan ldan pa// rgyal ba
chos byed s gzugs brnyan dang// phyogs rnams kun tu sgron ma gsal ba'i bdag/ rgyal ba lta pa thugs rje'i 'od// rgyal ba drug pa brtul zhugs rgya mtsho'o// bde gshegs brjod/

'khor sgron ma dang// brgyad pa chos kyi dkyila 'khor snang ba ste// snang ba rgya mtshos brgyan pa dang// de dag tha ma zhi ba'i rgyal po'o// bcu po de la sogs pa dag/ mi yid m pa de kun kho mos mad// chos nyid
nam mkha'amanyam pa 'di// rang bzhin yongs su kun nas dgang ste// de 'phags shing zhing gi rnams// 'byam klas kun tu spyod myur ma dag go/ de yi 'og tu mdangs dga' ba'igi/ zhing ni sngos sgron

sngon gyi dpal zhes bya/ kun nas nyon mongs yongs su dag/ de yi bskal pa legs par byung zhes bya// rgyal ba bye ba de tsho byung// de dag kun gyis de tsho bskal pa brgyan// mgon po de dag chos gsung ba//

kho mos dran pa'i stobs kyis yongs su bzung// rgyal ba'i dang po grangs ya sa te// chos kyi rgya mtsho shugs drag dang la gyi rgyal// chos dbang rgyal po yon tan sprin// chos kyi dpal dang lha yi cod pan no//

ye shes 'od 'phro gzi brjid dang la// rkang gnyis dam pa bdun pa de yin no// rgyal ba brgyad ba nam mkha'i dbyangs// dag pa kun tu 'byung ba'i sgron ma ste// de dag snga ma'i sangs rgyas ni// mdzod spu'i
dpal gyi bod kyi blo gros te// rgyal ba mi mchog de dag la// mchod pa byas kyang chags med de ma sbyangs// de yi 'og ma rgyas rab can// rin chen sna tshogs kun tu gnas pa ste// 'jig rten rnam

bar phye ba'i mtha'// rin chen rgyal mtshan blo gros mchog/ de tshe'i bskal pa'i snying po'i tshogs// de la sangs rgyas brgya phrag lnga byung ste// rnam thar chags med 'di 'dod cing// rang byung de dag
thams cad kho mos mchod// thog ma'i mtshan ni yon tan 'khor// zhi ba'i dbyangs dang rgya mtsho phun sum tshogs// zhima'i gzi brjid dang la gyi bdag/ mtshan gyi sprin sgra dbyangs shes byab
dang// chos dbang rgyal po yon tan bdag/ bsod nams ra rapa zhi ba 'od kyi rgyal// bcu po de la sogs pa dag/ rgyal ba de dag kun kyang kho mos mchod// rgyal ba'i lam ni ngor spungs te/ dad la/
rgyal ba kun kyang yang dag gzhol/ 'on kyang du dung rgyal ba yi// tshul 'di'i 'jug pa'i bgrod pa ma thob bo// de 'og yid 'ong 'od ldan pa// yongs su dag pa'i 'jig rten khams byung ste// nyid dbyangs
'phrang pa'i blo gros can// soms can nyon mongs ltung ba'i gnas yin no// bskal pa bad zhing mngon dga' ste// de la sangs rgyas bya ba brgyad cu byung// ma mchog de kun kho mos mchod// rgyal ba
mchog gi lam yang rnam par sbyangs// rgyal ba'i dang po me tog brtsegs// rgya mtsho'i snying po yang dag 'byung ba'i mchog/ lha dbang gtsug phud rin chen gtso// gser gyi ri bo rin chen brtsegs pa
dang / chos kyirgyal mtshan nor gyi dpal// de dag kun gyi tha ma yishas blo// bcu po de lasogs pa dang// lha dang mi gtso de dag kho mos mchod// de 'og mtshams sbyor zhing 'byung ba// sprul pa bzang
po'i rgyal mtshan sgron ma ste// bskal pa stong gi dpal zhes bya// de la sangs rgyas bye ba khrag khrig drug/ zhi ba'i rgyal mtshan zhi gnas dpal// zhi ba'i sgron ma sprin gyi rgyal po'i dpal//

snang ba'i 'od kyi rgyal po dang// rnam par sprin mched nyi ma'i gzi brjid dang// chos kyi sgron ma dpal gyi ri/ 'od 'phro'i dpal dang lha'i snying po'i dpal// de dag tha mar byung ba// sang ga'i sgra sgrogs
mkhas pa sgron ma'o// bcu po de la sogs pa dag/ bde gshegs zla ba de dag kho mos mchod// 'on kyang tshul mtsho 'dir 'jug pa'i// bzod pa kho mos rdzong par ma gyur to// de 'og mtshams sbyor zhing

byung ba// kun tu snang ba'i dpal zhes bya ba ste// bskal pa gzhasamad rnam par brgyan// de la sangs rgyas bye ba sum cu drug/ dang po yon tan kun tu sprin// de yi 'og na sangs rgyas nam mkha'i thugs//

sangs rgyas legs byung rnam brgyan dang// rgya mtsho'i chos kyi spre sgra sgrog pa'i dbyangs// rgyal ba chos dbyings gsung dbyangs dang// sprul pa'i sprin sgra snyan pa'i dpal mnga' dang// sangs rgyas phyogs kun gzi

brjid dang// chos kyi rgya mtsho yos byung sgra dbyangs dang// yon tan rgya mtsho dpal gyi ston// rgyal ba'i nyi ma dgu pa byung bar gyur// de dag kun gyi tha ma ste// rin chen dpal sgron yon tan dpal mchod do//

chen dpal sgron yon tan dang la// rkang gnyis dam pa byung bar gyur pa'i tshe// khe mo lha mo zla bzhin te// mi yi dam pa byung tshemachod pa byas// rgyal ba des ni kho mo la// mdo sde smon lam rgya mtsho 'byung ba'i
thabargyan// gnas med rgyun kyang rab tu bshad// thos nas kho mos dran pa'i stobs kyis gzung// kho mos mig yangs de thob ste// tinge 'dzin zhi dang gzungs kyi stobs kyang thob// skad cig re rer zhing

brgyud pa'i/ rgyal ba rgya mtsho mad po'ang kho mos mthong// byams tshula kun tu snang ba'i sprin// byang chub sems rab mkha' dang mnyam pa ste// snying rje'i snying pos brgyan pa dang// sangs rgyas stobs kyi
du yangs pa'i skyes// 'gro ba phyashe ci log gyur te// rtag dang bad dang gtsang dang bdag zhan pa// gti mug mdongs gyur ma rig bsgribs// nyon mongs 'khrugs shing log pa'i 'du shes pa/ lta ba'i rnam

ba stag la spyod// lam gyi 'gro rgyud nyam nga'i srid dbang gyur// rnam pa sna tshogs bye brag tu// las kyi rnam par bris pas kun byung ba// 'gro rgyud kun gyi shi 'pho'i sgor// skye bar 'gyur bas kun tu skyer
gyur cing// skya dang da gi gnod po rnams// lus dang sems kyisanyams su myong gyur pa// mthong nas de dag phan bde'i phyi'o// 'je rnams 'byam klas thams cad kyi// stobs bcu gang las byung ba yi//

bla na med pa'i sems kyang kho mos bskyed// de las smon lam sprin byung ba// 'gro ba kun la bde bar gzhol ba'i mchog/ tshogs rnams 'byung ba mtha' yas dang// lam tshul rgya mtsho rtogs pa'i ng de nas/
byung [;]'jug pa'i sprin yangs thob gyur pa// lam rgyud kun tu sgo gsal shugs ldan te// pha rol phyin gyi sprin yangs pa'i ng// chos dbyings 'byam kas kun tu rnam par 'gyed// sa gnon shugs drag yabs
ldan dang// dus gsum rgya mtsho'i tshul gyis rnams la// chags pa med pa spyod par gyur// skad cig gcig gis rgyal ba kun drung 'gro// gzhan yang rgyal sras kho mos ni// spyod pa ku'u
bzang po yongs su gson// chos dbyings bye phrag bcu rnams kyi// rgya mtsho'i tshul la'ang kho mo sa rtogs par 'jug/ jigs kyi bu de la ji snyam du sems// de'i tshe de'i dus na rgyal po 'kho

los sgyur ba sangs rgyas kyi rigs kyi rgyun ma gcod pa la zhugs pa mi'i bdag po zhes bya ba byung pa de gzhan zhig yin pa tsam du sems na ni/ rigs kyi bu de ltar mi blta ste/ 'jam dang la gzhon nur gyur pa de'i

tshe de'i dus na rgyal po mi'i bdag po zhes bya ba 'khor los sgyur pa sangs rgyas kyi rigs rgyud mi ba/cud pa la zhugs pa'o// kho mo sad par byed pa'i mtshan mo'i lha mo de ni byang chub sems dpa' kun tu bzang pos

sprul pa'o// rigs kyi bu de la ji snyam du sems/ de'i tshe de'i dus na 'khor los sgyur pa'i btsun mo bud med rin po che thabrang po'i blo gros ma zhes bya ba byung ba de gzhan zhig yin pa tsam du sems na ni/

nga ltar mi blta ste/ kho mo de'i tshe de'i dusan 'khor 'acos sgyur ba'i btsun mo bud med rin po che bzang po'i blo gros ma zhes bya bar gyur te/ kho mo mtshan mo'i lha mo des sad par byas nas/ sangs rgyas
blta ba la yang dag par bskul te// rigs kyi bukho mosani bla na med pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i byang chub tu sems de srid cig nas bskyed de/ de ltar kho mo sems bskyed pa de'i mthus bskal pa

sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra bsnyadadu nam yang ngan song log par ltung ba'i ma skyes te/ rtag tu rgyun ma chad par lha dang mi'i 'gro ba'i rgyud la rten cing/ thams cad du'ang de bzhin gshegs pa blta ba
dang ldan par gyur to// tha mar re gos bcom ldan 'das de bzhin gshegs pa dgra bcom pa yang dag par rdzogs pa'i sangs rgyas po'i chen dang la gyi sgron ma yon tan rgyalamtshan mthong ba tsam gyis/
byang chub sems dang ba rnam par thar pa kun tu babrang po'i dga' ba shin tu yangs shing dri ma med pa'i shugs kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba 'di thob ste/ de thob pas kho mo soms na yongs su smin par

bya ba dang/ gdul ba'i don du sbrum pa 'di lta bu s sta gon du gnas pa yin no// rigs kyi bu kho mos byang chub sems dad 'i rnam par thar pa kun tu basrung po'i dga' ba rgya chen po'i shugs kyi rgyal mtshan
'di shes par zad na/ kho mos byang chub sems dpa' de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi skabs kyi drung na 'khod cing/ sems kyi skad cig re re la thams cad mkhyen pa nyid du 'jug pa'i shugs drag po rgyu/

mtsho chen po rab tu thob pa/ 'jug pa'i sgo thams cad la soms kyi skad cig re re zhing smon lam chen po rgya mtshos 'jug pa rab tu thob pa/ soms kyi skad cig re re zhing smon lam rgya mtsho thams cad kyi tshul la

ma'i mtha'i bskal par spyad pa'i dkyil 'khor mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas pa/ sbyon pa re re la'ang lus sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed mngon par bsgrub pa la mkhas pa/ lus re res
kyar chos kyi byings kyi tshul rgya mtsho thams cad rgyas par 'gengs pa la mkhas pa// chos kyi dbyangs kyi tshul rgya mtsho re re la'ang sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad du sems can rnams kyi bsam

pa ji lta ba bzhin du 'us rnam par dmigs pa'i sbyod pa yongs su ston pa la mkhas pa// zhing thams cad du'ang zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba thams cad la de bzhin gshegs pa rgya mtsho mtha' dang dbus med pa la 'jug

par mkhas pa// de bzhin gshegs pa re re zhing yang chos kyi dbyings kyis klas par rgyas par 'gangs nga 'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa la 'jug par mkhas pa// de bzhin gshegs pa re re'i sngon

tsho gyi mtha'i bskal pa la byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i tshogs yongs su bsgrub pa yang dag par bsdus pa la 'jug par mkhas pa// de bzhin gshegs pa re re'i chos kyi 'khor lo'in tu yangs pa yang dag pa
byung ba dang yongs su gzung ba la mkhas pa// dus gsum thams cad kyi de bzhin gshegs pa'i rnam par 'phrul pa'i tshul rgya mtsho la 'jug par mkhas pa de dag gisbyod pa shes pa 'am/ yon tan brjod par
nus re skan/ song rigs kyi bu de bzhin gshegs pa'i 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor gyi dkyil 'khor 'di nyid na/ kho mo dang rgyang mi ring ba zhig na mtshan mo'i lha mo sems can kun tu skyong ba'i gzi brjid
dpal zhes bya ba 'dug gis/ de'i gan du song la ji ltar byang chub sems dpas byang chub sems dpa'i spyod pa'i dkyil 'khon la 'jug par bya ba dang/ ji ltar yongs su sbyang bar bya ba dris shig/
de nas tshong dpon gyi bunor bzangs kyis/ mtshan mo 'i lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i mig 'gro bar rnam par snang ba'i rkang pa gnyis la spyi bos phyag 'tshal to/ mtshan mo'i lha mo 'gro bar rnam
par snang ba la lan brgya stong du mar g.yas phyogs su bskor ba byas nas yang dang yang bltas te/ mtshan mo'i lha mo 'gro ba'i rnam par snang ba'i drung nas song ngo/
'phags pa sangs rgyas phal po che zhes bya ba theg pa chen po'i mdo bam po brgya tham pa// de nas tshong dpon gyi du nor babrangs/ mtshan mo'i lha mo rab tu dga' ba'i mig 'gro bar rnam par

snang ba'i byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa kun tu bgrang po'i dga' ba shin tu yangs shing dri ma med pa'i shugs kyi rgyal mtshan de la mos par bya ba dang/ khong du chud par bya ba dang/ rtogs pas

bya ba dang/ shes par bya ba dang/ yid ches par bya ba dang/ rab tu gzhol bar bya ba dang/ rgyas par dgang ba dang/ rjes su shes par bya ba dang/ rjes su dran par bya ba dang/ rjes su gzhol bar byab dang/
sgom par byed cing/ dag ba'i bshes gnyen gyi gdams ngag la nan tan du bya ba dang/ gdams ngag rjes su bstan pa la bar chad ma da par bya ba'i phyir/ mtshan mo'i lhamo rab tu dga' ba'i mig 'gro bas/
rnam par snang bas 'gro kar gtams pa rjes su dran pa byed cing/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen blta ba'i rjes su sems pa'i dbang po'i dkyil 'khor dang/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen mthong ba thob pa bya ba la
yang dag par sbyod pa phyogs kun tu mngon par bltas pa dang/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen btsal bas yid la bya ba nga rgyal thams cad bral ba dang/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen bsnyen bkur

ba'i mthu tshogs chen po yongs su bsgrub bar zhonon ba dang/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen pa dang rgyud kyi tshul gcig tu gyur pa'i dge ba'i rtsa bas dge ba'i bshes gnyen gyi thabs mkhas pa'i spyod pa thams cad
tshul bsam pa mi phyed pas zhugs pa// dge ba'i bshes gnyen la brtan pa yongs su 'phel bar bya ba la brtson 'grus kyi shugs chen po rgya mtsho yongs su skyes ba/ bskal pa thams cad du dge ba'i bshes

gnyen mnyam pa nyid khong du chud pas gnas par bya ba'i smon lam dang ldan pa de/ mtshan mo'i lha mo sems can kun tu skyong ba'i gzi brjid dpal gyi drung du song ngo// de de ltar 'gro ba'i tshe/ mtshan mo'i lha mo soms

can kun tu skyong ba'i gzi brjid dpal gyis byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar ba 'jig rten thams cad mngon du gyur pas 'gro ba rnam par 'dul ba ston pa'i khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba yongs su bstan pa'i phyir/

mtshan dang dpe byad bzang pos yongs su grub pa'i lus bstan te/ mdzod spu nas 'od zer ye shes kyi bod kun tu snang ba dri ma med pa'i mdangs kyi rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba 'od zer gyi 'khor mtha' dang dbus med pa dang ldan

pas bkye'o// des 'jig rten thams cad snang bar byas nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor badrangs kyi spyi bor 'dug ste lus thams cad du khyab par gyur to// tshong dpon gyi bunor babras la 'od zer des reg par gyur ma

[52/ ]thag tu de nyid kyi mod la teng nge 'dzin shin tu rdul dang dra phab zhes bya ba'i dkyil 'khor thob par gyur to// de thob pas mtshan mo'i lhamo rab tu dga' ba'i mig 'grobar rnam par snang ba dang/ mtshan mo'i lha mo

sems can kun tu skyong ba'i gzi brjid kyi dpal gnyis kyi bar gyi lam na sa'i dkyil 'khor yod pa de la mo'i rdul shin tu phra ba 'am/ chu'i rdul shin tu phra pa 'am/ sa'i rdul shin tu phra ba 'am/ rdo rje'i rdul

shin tu phra ba 'am/ nor bu ri'i po che'i rgyal po dam ba sna tshogs kyi rdul nyin tu phra ba 'am/ ma tog dang sngos dang/ phyi ma'i rdul shin tu phra ba 'am/ rgyun thams cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba 'am/ dmigs pa thams

cad kyi rdul shin tu phra ba ji snyed cig yod ba'i rdul shin tu phra ba de dag thams cad la rdul phra mo re re zhing yang 'jig rten gyi khams sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shin tu phra ba snyad chu'i phung po dang bcas/ me'i phung po dang/
bcas/ rlung gi phung po dang bcas/ sa'i phung po dang bcas/ 'jig rten gyi khams kyi mtshams dang bcas/ gzhi dang bcas/ rten dang bcas par dbyibs sna tshogs can/ sa gzhi rnam pa tha dad ba/

sAtshogs dang ldan pa// 'i 'khor snatshogs can/ chu klung dang mtsho snatshog sakyis brgyan pa/ rgya mtsho sna tshogs kyis kun nas 'khor ba/ lha rdzas kyis khyim sna tshogs kyi rgyan dang ldan pa// shing sna tshogs

kyis yongs su gang ba/ nam mkha'i dbyings kyi rgyan sna tshogs can/ lha'i grong khyer gyi khyim gyi rgyan dang bcas pa/ klu'i grong khyer gyi khyim gyi rgyan dang bcas pa/ gnod sbyin gyi grong khyer gyi khyim gyi rgyan

@#// dbabacas pa// dri za'i grong khyer gyi khyim gyi rgyan dang bcas pa// lha ma yin gyi grong khyer gyi khyim gyi rgyan dang bas nga// nam mkha' lding gi grong khyer gyi khyim gyi rgyan dang bcas pa[}}]

mi 'am ci'i grong khyer gyi khyim gyi rgyan dang bcas pa/ lte'aphye chen po'i grong khyer gyi khyim tshu rkyen dang bcas pa/ mi'i grong khyer gyi khyim gyi rgyan dang bcas pa/ phyogs dang phyogs mtshams thams cad na
rnam par gnas pa'i sems can thams cad kyi grong khyer gyi khyim gyi gnas dad/ sems can dmyal ba'i 'jig rten gyi yul dang/ byol song gi skye gnas kyi 'jig rten gyi yul dang/ gshin rje'i 'ge

rten gyi yul dang/ mi dang mi ma yin pa'i lam gyi rgyud kyi shi' bo dang skye ba'i yul dang bcas pa/ skye ba sna tshogs kyis ma 'dres pa'i rgyud mtha' yas pa'i bye brag la yongs su gzhol ba rnams 'du zhi

'jig par gyur ba mthong ngo// 'jig rten gyi khams de dag kyang rnam pa sna tshogs su mthong sta/ 'jig rten gyi khamasal lan kun nas nyon mongs der mthong ngo// la la ni yongs su dag par mthong ngo// la la
shin du kun nas nyon mos bar mthong ngo// la lan lam gyi rgyud yongs su dag par mthong ngo// la la ni kun s nyon mongs pa la yongs su dag par mthong ngo// la la ni rnam par dag pa kun nas nyonamong
blo par mthong ngo// la larishin tu yongs su dag par mthong ngo// la lan gzhi mnyam pas mthong ngo// la lan spyi'u tshugs su gnas par mthong ngo// la la ni sbrel zhing 'dug par mthong ngo//
'jig rten gyi khams de dag gi sems can gyi lam gyi rgyud dang/ sam sa can gyi skye gnas thams cad na/ mtshan mo'i lha mo sems can kun tu skyong ba'i gzi brjid dang lasems can so so nas 'dul
ba'i rkyen bzhin du 'jig rten thams cad la ma 'dres par yongs su bstan pa'i phyir/ sems can thams cad la mngon du gyur par gnas par mthong ngo// sems can che'i tshad rnam pa ji lta bu dang ldan/

ra dang/ mos pa'i spyod yul rnam pa sna tshogs can dang/ lus rnam pa ji lta bu dang ldan pa dang/ ngag rnam par phye ba dang/ nges pa'i tshig gi 'du byed kyi tha snyad rnam pa ji lta bu dang ldan pa dang/ sbyor bas/

rnam pa ji lta bu dang ldan pa dang/ dbang gi rnam pa ji lta bu dang ldan pa rnams yongs su smin par bya ba dang/ gdul ba'i don du sems can thams cad la ma 'dres par mngon sum du gnas pa mthong ngo// de yang/

'di lta ste/ sems can dmyal ba'i lam gyi rgyud du gtogs pa'i sa ma sa can rnams kyi sems can dmyal ba'i sdug bsngal dang 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang/ byol song gi skye gnas sna tshogs su skyes pa/
sems can rnams kyi gcig la gcig za ba'i 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang/ gshen rje'i 'jig rten gyi lam gyi rgyud du gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi bkres pa dang skom pa la sogs pa'i sdug
bsngal gyi 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang/ klu'i 'jig rten gyi lam gyi rgyud du gtogs pa'i sems can rnams kyi klu'i sdug bsngal dang 'jigs pa thams cad rnam par bzlog pa dang/ 'dod
pa'i khams su gtogs pa'i sems can thams cad kyi 'dod pa'i khams kyi sdug bsngal dang 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang/ ma'i 'jig rten gyi lam gyi rgyud du gtogs
pa'i sems can rnams kyi mtshan mo mun pa mun nag gisachod pa'i mun pa'i 'jigs pa thams cad rnam par bzlog pa dang/ mi snyan pa dang/ bsngags pa ma yin pa dang/ grags ba ma yin pa'i sgra
dang tshigs su bcad pa la mngon par zhen pa'i sems can rnams kyi grags pa ma yin pa dang/ bsngags bam yin pa'i 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog ba dang/ 'khor gyi 'jigs par lhung ba'i sa/
can rnams kyi 'khor du bag tsha ba'i 'jigs ba rnam par bzlog pa dang/ 'chi bas 'jigs shing sdang ba'i sems can rnams kyi 'chi ba'i 'jigs ba rnam par bzlog pa dang/ ngan song gi ga yang sas
'jigs shing sdang ba'i sems can rnams kyi ngan song gi g.yang sus 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang/ 'tshe ba med pas 'jigs shing skrag pa'i sems can rnams kyi 'tsho ba med pa'i 'jigs
pa rnam nga ba bzlog pa dang/ dge ba'i rtsa ba chud zos kyis 'jigs shing bag tsha ba'i sems can rnams kyi dge ba'i rtsa ba chud zos kyis 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang/ byang chub kyi sems
nyams kyis 'jigs shing bag tsha ba'i sems can rnams kyi byang chub kyi sems nyams kyis 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang/ sdig to'i grogs po dad phrad kyis 'jigs shing bag tsha
ba'i sems can rnams kyi sdig to'i grogs po dang phrad pa'i 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang/ dge ba'i bshes gnyen dang bral gyis dogs shing bag tsho ba'i sems can sbrums kyi dge ba'i
bshes gnyen dang bral ba'i 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas kyi sa snang gis 'jigs shing bag tsha ba'i sems can rnams kyi nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyas
kyi sar lhung ba'i 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang/ 'khor ba'i gnas sna tshogs kyi sdug bsngal gyis 'jigs shing skrag pa rnams 'khor ba'i gnas sna tshogs kyi sdug bsngal gyis 'dzin
pa rnam par bzlog pa dang/ sems can skal ba mi mnyam pa dang phrad kyis 'jigs shing bgo skyob rnams kyi sems can skal ba mnyam pa dang phrad pa'i 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang/
dus mi bzad par skyes kyis 'jigs shing bag tsha ba rnams kyi dus mi bzad par skye ba'i 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang/ rigs ngan par skyes kyis 'jigs shing bag tsha ba rnams kyi rigs
ngan pas skye ba'i 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang/ sdig to'i las byas kyis 'jigs shing bag tsha ba rnams kyi sdig to'i las byed pa'i 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang/ las dang nyo
mos pa'i sgrib pas 'jigs shing sdang ba rnams kyi las dang nyon mongs pa'i sgrib pa'i 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang/ 'du shes kyi rnam pa sna tshogs kyi gnas dang 'ching bas 'jigs shing
sngang ba rnams kyi 'du shes kyi rnam pa sna tshogs kyi gnas dang 'ching ba'i 'jigs pa rnam par bzlog pa dang/ sems can thams cad la so sor mngon du gyur pa'i gzhas pa mthong
ngo [;]'ang lta ste/ sgo nga las skyes pa'i sems can dang/ mngal nas skyes pa dang/ drod gsher las skyes pa dang/ rdzus te skyes pa dang/ gzugs yod pa dang/ gzugs med pa dar/ 'du
pa/ shes yod pa dad/ 'du shes med pa dang/ 'du shes yod pa bar ma yin bdu shesamad pa'i ng ma yin pa'i sems can thams cad yongs su bskyab pa'i smon lam gyi stobs mngon par sgrub pa dang/ byang
chub sems dpa'i ting nge 'dzin gyi shugs drag po dang rnam par gnon pa shin tu yangs pa'i stobs dang/ byang chub sems dpa'i mngon par shes pa chen po stobs dang/ mthu dang/ byang chu'i sems dpa' kun

tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang/ smon lam mngon par bsgrubs pa'i stobs kyis snying rje chen po'i tshul rgya mcho'i shugs drag po shin tu skyes pa'i phyir/ 'gro ba thams cad du thogs pa med pa'i byams pa chen pos
rgyas par dgang ba dang/ sems can thams cad kyi bde ba yongs su bsgrubs pa dang/ dga' ba'i shugs rnam par 'phel bar bya ba dad/ sems can thams cad yongs su bsdu ba'i yi shes rab tu

bsgrub pa'i phyir/ byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa rgya chen po'i rnam par 'phrul pa dang/ khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba dang ldan pas zhing thams cad yongs su dag par bya ba la mngon du gyur par gnas
par mthong ngo// chos thams cad kyi rgyus shes par bya ba la mngon du gyur pa dang/ sangs rgyas thams cad mchod cing rim gros bya ba la mngon du gyur pa dang/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bstan

pa yongs su gzung ba la mngon du gyur ba dang/ dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad bsags pa la mngon du gyur pa dang/ byang chub sems dar 'i spyod pa thams cad rnam par 'phel bar bya ba la mngon du gyur pa dang/
sems can thams cad kyi sams la sgrib pa med par mngon du gyur par gnas pa dang/ soms can thams cad kyi dbang po yongs su smi ka bas bya ba la mngon du gyur par gnas pa dang sems can thams cad kyi
mos pa rgya mtsho rnam par sbyang ba la mngon du gyur pa dang/ sems can thams cad kyi dbang po'i chos rnam par bzlog ba la mngon du gyur pa dang/ sems can thams cad kyi ma shes pa'i mun pa rnam par
bsal ba la mngon du gyur cing/ thams cad mkhyen pa'i ye shes snang ba yos su bskyod pa'i don du gnas pa mthong ngo// de nas tshong dpon gyi bunor bzongs kyis mtshan mo'i
ma sems can kun tu skyong ba'i gzi brjid dpal gyi byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa'i khyu mchog gi mthu phyung ba dang/ rnam par 'phrul pa 'jig rten thams cad la mngon par gnas shing/

'gro ba rnam por 'dul ba ston pa bsamagyis mi khyab pa de lta bu mthong nas rab tu dga' ba skyes te/ spro ba chen po'i shugs drag po rgya mtshorab tu thob nas// mtshan mo'i lha mo sems can kun tu skyong
dba'i gabri brjid dpal la lus thams cad kyis phab ste phyag byas nas sa gyen du bltas so// de nas mtshan mo'i lham sems can kun tu skyong ba'i gzi brjid dpal gyis byang
chub sems dpa'i gzugs dang mtshan rnam par dag pa de mi snang bar byas te/ mtshan mo'i lhamo gzugs su byas nas/ rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad 'byin cing 'dug par gnasaso/
de nas tshong dpon gyi bu nor bzangs kyis/ mtshan mo'i lha mo sems can kun tu skyong ba'i gabri brjid dpal gyi mdun du 'dug ste thal mo 'a nas/ de'i tshe tshigs su bcad pa 'di dag smras so//
khyod kyi sku yadamtshan rab rgyan gyis brgyan// shAn tu bzang zhing mdzes pa bdag gis mthong// nam mkhab skar ma'i tshogs kyis brgyan pa bzhi// dpe byad bzang pos rnam par bris pa mthong//
'od kyi 'khor can sku bzang dam pa'i mchog/ mtha' yas zhing gi rdul khams mang bo snyad// kha dog sna tshogs rnam pa'i dpe tshul du// phyogs rnams kun gyi dbyings su khyab pas gang// 'od zer dra/
ba mang po 'gro sems mnyam// khyod nib sbya'i sgo nas 'gyod pa mdzad// 'od zer sgo la pad+mo yid 'ong gnas// khyod kyi sprul pa 'gro ba'i sdug bsngal sel// losakyi na bun sprin du chags pa 'gyed//
'gro ba'i gzugs su gnas te kun nas mdzes// me tog sgo rnams kun nas 'gye mdzad pas/ chos byes bzhugs pa'i rgyal ba kun tu khyab// khyod kyi phrag pa'i lhun sangs 'phags pa ni// zhi

[o chen 'od 'phro ri bo ra rab 'dra// dri med de ni 'gro ba kun tu gsal// gti mugamun naga rnam par Mbazlog pa mdzad// khyod kyi dri med zhal mdog bzang po las// na bun sprin dang nyi ma yangs pa 'byung
khyod kyi chema' 'khob 'dra 'od bzang ba// rnam par snang mdzad spyod yul yangs pa 'byin// khyod kyi sman nas zla skar 'od 'byung ba// rtagatu dri med sprin ltar mang ba ste// de dag phyogs bcu'i
bkang zhing 'gro ba rnams// rab tu snang byed 'jig rten rab rib sel// khyod kyi mtshan las 'gro ba'i lus mnyam pa'i// sprul pa rgya mtsho phyogs su khyab par 'phro// de dag chos dbyings yangs
par rgyas 'gangs shing// sems can tshad med tshogs rnams yongs su 'dul// khyod kyi sku ni 'byam klas phyogs su snang// 'gro ba kun la mngon gyur dga' ba skyed// rgyal po me dang rkun po chus bskyed/
pa'i 'jigs pa thams cad rnam sel zhi bar mdzad// gang tshe khyod kyi spyan sngar bdag btang nas/ yon tan rnam par soms shing nyer phyin pa// de tshe 'od zer dri med 'khor bzang pa// khyod kyi
zhal gyi smin mtshams gseb nas 'thon// phyogs rnams rgya mtsho brgyu mang snang mdzad nas// 'jig rten snang ba rgya che yongs bskyed de// rnam 'phrul rnam pa mang po rnam bstan nas// de tsho bdag
gi lus kyi gsobatu zha// gang cho'od kyi 'khor gyis bdag reg pa// de tshe bde ba rmad byung yangs pa myong// gzungs dang ting 'dzin brgya mang yongs su non// phyogs bcu'i rgyal ba dpag yas
mthong bar gyur// gom pa rnam bor gyen du bteg pa la'ong// rdul phran grangs snyad tshulani bdag gis rig/ rdul phran shin tu phra ba gcig la yang// zhing gi rdul snyed
zhing rnams mthong bar gyur// rdul la gnas kyang rnam pa tha dgu ste// zhing mang brgya ni shin tu nyon yang mongs// de yi 'gro ba sdug bsngal nyams su myong// chong du zhing lce sngags yongs su
'don// zhing mang ba la kun nas nyon mongs dag/ den sdug bsngal mang zhing bde ba chung// rgyal ba thugs rje can yang der skye ste// rgyal ba'i nyan thos rang rgyal de bzhin no// zhing tshul la la
yongs dag nyon mongs te// byang chub sems dpa'i gnas bzung mang pos brgyan// stsam pa bud med yongs brgyan blta na sdug/ skyon med rgyal ba'i gdung yang rgyun ma 'chad// zhing rnams

rgya mtsho yangs shing dri med pa// rdul la gnas shing mnyam pa'i gzhi dang ldan// de dag bskal pa brgyayang sngon gyi tshe// rnam par snang mdzad spyod mdzad yongs su sbyangs/ dazhing rnams 'byam kas
kun na rgyal ba dag/ shing dbang dam pa'i drud du gshegs pa ston// rnam par 'phrul zhing byang chub 'tshang yang rgyu// chos kyi 'khor lo bskor cing 'dul ba ston// rnam par snang mdzad spyod yul
yangs pa la// khyod kyang kun tu rjes su bzhud par mthong// mchod pa stong phrag tshod med khrag khrig gis// rgyal ba kun la mngon par mchod mdzad mthong/// de nas tshong dpon/

'a gyi bu nor bsrangs kyis tshigs su bcad pa de dmag sa nas/ mtshan mo'i lha mo'i sems can kun tu skyong ba'i gzi brjid dar la la 'di skad ces smras so// lhamo byang chub sems dpa'i rnam par thar pa de

de lta bu'i zab pa ni ngo mtshar chen/ rnam par thar pa de'i ming ni ci zhes bgyi/ de khyod kyis brnyes nas yun ni ji srid cig lags/ byang chub sems dar sa ji ltar nan tan du bgyis na rnam par thar pa de yos
su dag par 'gyur// snas pa/ rigs kyi bu gnas 'di ni lha dang bcas pa'i 'jig rten dang/ nyan thos dang rang sangs rgyus su bcas pas yid ches par dka' ba ste/ datsa'i phyir zhe na/

'di ni byang chub sams dang 'a kun/tu bzang po'i spyod pa dang smon lam khong du chud pa rnams kyi spyod yul te/ 'di ni byang chub sems dang 'a snying rje chen po lhur len pa/ 'gro ba thams cad yongs su bskyab
pa la zhugs pa/ mi khom pa dang/ ngan song dang/ ngan 'gro'i lam thams cad rnam par bzlog pa la zhugs pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag nga byan med par bya ba la
zhags pa/ sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad na bzhugs pa'i de bzhin gshegs pa'i rigs rgyun mi gcad pa la zhugs pa/ sangs rgyas thams cad kyi bstan pa yongs su gzung ba la zhugs pa// bskal pa

thams cad du byang chub sen sa dpa'i spyod pa la gnas pas gnas par bya ba'i smon lam chen po rgya mtsho la zhugs pa/ chos rgya mtsho thams cad la sgrib pa med pa'i ye shes snang ba rnam par sdung ba la zhugs
kha skad cig re re zhing dus gsum gyi tshul rgya mtsho thams cad du ye shes snang bas rnam par gnas par rab tu thob pa rnams kyi yul te/ 'on kyang de bzhin gshegs pa'i byin/
gyi 'bas kyis bstan par bya'o// bags kyi bu sngon 'das pa'i dus bskal pa sangs rgyas kyi zhing gi rdul shAn tu phra ba skad cig gi pha rol tu/ 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par snang mdzad/

T+Tha gzi brjid dpal zhes bya bar bskal pa rdul dang bral ba'i dkyil 'khor ces bya ba byung ste/ bskal pa de la sangs rgyas rab kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyed byung bar gyur to// 'jig rten gyi khams rnam pas
snang mdzad gzi brjid dpal zhes bya ba de ni/ rin po che thams cad kyi sprin gyi rgyan gyis brgyan pa ste/ rdo rje las byas pa'i gzhal med khang dang gnas kyis yongs su mdzes pa'i byas pa'o// 'jig

rten gyi khams de'i gan ni rin po che'i rgyal po dri ma med pa'i bod kyi rgya mtsho las blangs pa ste/ lcan dang lus ni nor bu rin po che'i sngos thams cad kyi rgyal po las gyur pa'o// de na dbyibs kun tu
zlum pa ste/ rnam par dag cing kun nas nyon mongs pa// lhab lhub thams cad kyi sprin gyi spu res kun nas khyab pa/ cha ni po che'i khor yug rgyan thams cad dang ldan pa/ 'an po che stong gis yongs
su bskor ba/ gling bzhi pa bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gisashin tu brgyan par brgyan pa ste/ de la gling bzhi pa la la ni kun nas nyon mongs pa ste/ sems can kun nas nyon mongs pa'i las dang

khams ldan pa rnams kyi gzhasaso// la la na kun nas nyon mongs shing rnam pa'i dag pa ste// sems can las 'dren ma dang ldan pa rnams kyi gnas so// la la ni rnam par dag cing kun nas nyon mongs pa ste/
sems can yongs su dag cing kun nas nyon mongs ba/ dge ba'i rtsa ba sbyangs pa khan ma tho ba chung ba rnams kyi gnas so// la la si tu yongs su dag pa ste/ byang chub sems dbab dag pa rnams kyi

gnas so/ 'jig rten gyi khams rnam par snang mdzad gzi brjid dpal zhes bya ba de ba shar phyogs kyi khor yug mtshams na/ gling bzhi ba rin po che me tog sgron ma'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba rnam par dag cing kun

nas nyon mongs pa// masmos ma skyes pa'i 'bras la yongs su spyod pa/ sdon gyi las kyi rnam par smin pas mngon par grub pa'i khang pa brtsegs pa'i gnas dang gzhal med khang la yongs su spyod pa// 'khor/

kun nas yid bzhin gyi shang gis 'khor ba/ spos kyi shing sna tshogs kyi lhun las sbos kyi spre'u rgyun mi 'chad par 'byung ba 'phreng ba sna tshogs kyi shing las 'phreng ba'i sprin rgyun mi 'chad par 'byung ba/ ma tog sna

tshogs kyi shing las me tog kha dog dang dri bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i sprin gyi char rgyunami 'chad par 'babapa/ phyi ma kha dog sna tshogs kyingeshing gi las las spros ni po che'i rgyal bo thams cad kyi phye mkhi char rgyun mi

'chad par 'bab pa/ na po che'i shing sna tshogs las nye po tsho'i 'bru mang po 'phrul ba'i kha dog snang bas shin tu snang bar byas pa/ lha rdzasakyi rolamo sna tshogs kyi shing 20sa sil snyan sna tshogs kyi sprin rlung gis skyod
cing nam mkha'i dbyings las sgra dbyangs snyan pa'i byung ba/ nyin mtshan gyi bde ba nyimadang zla bas byung ba// nor bu ri'i po che kun tu snang bsagazhi byas pa'is rab tu mnyam par gyur pa ste/

gling bzhi pa der rgyal po'i pho brang bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong byung ba'i rgyus te/ rgyal po'i pho brang de dag re re zhing yang chu klung stong gis yongs su bskor ba'o// chu klung de dag thams cad kyang lha rdzas kyi ma togosil

mas gang ba'o// lha rdzas kyi rol mo dang glu'i sgra skad snyan cing yid du 'ong ba 'byin pa'o// chu 'gram zhi po tsho'i shing yid du 'ong bas rnam par brgyan pa'o// zhi po che sna tshogs kyis shin tu brgyan pa'i

gru phan tshun du rgyu ba'o// bde ba sna tshogs kyi dga' bas yongs su spyad du yod pa'o// chu klung gi mtshams kyi gzhi ni re dgana'ang grong khyer bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu un nas gzhas pa ste/ grong

khyer de dag re zhang yang grong rdal bye ba khrag khrig brgya phrag stong gis yongs su bskor ba'o// grong dang/ grong khyen dang/ grong rdal de dag thams cad kyang lha rdzas kyi bza' shing gi ra ba dang//

gzhal med khang dang/ khang pa bye ba khrag khrigabargya phrag stong gi 'khor gyis yongs bskor ba'o// gling bzhipa de'i 'dzam bu'i gling gi dbus na rgyal po'i pho brang dbu ma ni po che'i me tog sgron ma zhes bya ba
yod par gyur te/ de'i skyid cing longs spyod phun sum tshogs pa dang ldan la/ rtag tu la legs shing bdeba'i rnam pa thams cad dang ldan pa'o// lha dang mi mang pos yongs su gang ba'o//
0bsems can dge ba bcu'i las kyi lam dang ldan pa rnams kyi gnas su gyus pa ste/ rgyal po'i kho brang rin po che'i ma rtog sgron ma zhes bya ba de na/ rgyal po rnam par snang ba rin chen pad+mo dpal
gyi gtsug dud snying po zhes bya ba 'khor los sgyur ba gling bzhi la dbang ba/ pa'i snying po la rdzus te byung ba/ ma chen po'i mtshan sum cu rtsa gnyis kyis lus shin tu brgyan pa// chos dang ldan
pa chos kyi rgyal po rin po che bdun dang ldan da kas par gyur to// de la budapa' zhing rtul phod la yan lag dam pa'i gzugs dang ldan pa/ gzhan gyi 'khor rab tu 'jom pa/ rnam pa thams

cad yongs su tshang ba'i yan lag dam pa dang ldan pa stong tshang bar byung ngo// de'i btsun mo'i 'khor gyi budad kyang bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcu yod par gyur te/ de dag kun kyang 'khor los

sgyur ba'i skal ba dang mnyam pa'i dge ba'i rtsa ba las byung ba 'thun par spyod pa// rin po che'i rgyan dang 'khrungs su byung ba/ dge ba'i sems dang ldan pa// lha'i bu mo dang khyad par med par badra pa'i
gzugs can/ 'dzam bu chu klung gi gser gyi ba dog lta bu'i mdog dang ldan pa'i lus can/ lus kyi ba spu las lha rdzas kyi spos stsa tshogs 'byung ba/ lus lasalha rdzas kyi 'od dri zhim po dris med/

ba rab tu 'gyed pa sha stag go/ de'i blon po bye ba phrag bcu byung ste/ blon po rin po chal sogs pa dag go/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po rnam par snang ba ri'i chen pad+mo dpal gyi gtsug dud snying po de'i
btsun mo dam pa bud med rin po che dar la gyi bzhin yongs su rgyas pa tes bya ba/ gzugs mdzesang sdug la blta na yid du 'ongar/ kha dog bzang po shin tu rgyas ba'i
dam ba dang ldan pa// skra mthon mthing du 'dug ba/ mgo dkar gnag 'byes pa// mdog gser gyi bdog tu 'dus pa/ tshongs pa'i dbyangs dang ldan pa/ lus las bod rtag tu 'byung ba//

'khor kun tu dang gatshad stong gi tshad du 'od kha dog du ma dang ldan pa/ lha rdzas kyi dri zhim po can 'gyed pa byung ngo// rgyal po'i btsun mo dpal gyi bzhin yongs su rgyas pa zhes bya ba de las/bumo bad+ma

bzang mo yig yid du 'ong ba'i dpal gyi zla ba zhes bya ba yan lag thams cad tshang ba/ gzugs mdzes shing sdug pa/blta na yid du 'ong ba/ 'jig rten thams cad kyis bltan mngoms pa byung bar gyur te/ rigs kyi bu

'di lta ste/ dper na 'khor los sgyur ba'i rgyal po la blta na su'ang ngom par mi 'gyur ba de bzhin du/ 'khor los sgyur ba'i bu mo parlobasrang mo mig yid du 'ong ba'i dus de la blta bas kyang su'ang ngoms par mi
gyur te// shes rab kyis yos gu doms par 'gyur ba ma gtogs so// de'i tshe de'i dus na sems can rnams kyang tshe dpag tu med par gyur te/ tshel gcig tu ngesar med pas bar ma dor 'chi ba ni yod

do deb des na sems can rnams kyi dbyibs sna tshogs dang/ kha dog sna tshogs dang/ ming sna tshogs dang/ 'gis sna tshogs dang/ tshe'i tshod sna tshogs dang/ chu zheng rnam pa tha dad pa dang/ mos pa dad

stobs dang// brtson 'grus dang/ mthu rnam pa tha dad pa dang/ yid du 'ong ba dang/ yid du ma 'ong ba rnam pa tha dad pa dang/ yangs pa dang/ dma' ba la mos pa sna tshogs kyang yod par gyur te/ de la sems can ji snyed

cig kha dog bzang bo dang yangs pa la mos pa dang/ yan lag tshang ba dang blta na sdug cing yid du 'ong bar gyur pa de dag ni 'di skad ces 'dzeb to// kye ma dag nga na khyed pas kha dog ches bzang ngo zhes zer ro// de bzhin

dusems can ji nad cig lus kyi dbyibs legs pa dang ldan par gyur pa de dag kyang sems can lus kyi dbyibs mi sdug par gyur pa rnams la rlom lding byed du gsod do// de dag de ltar gcig la gcig khyad du gsod

pa las byung ba'i mi dge ba'i rtsa bas tshe'i tshad las kyang yongs su bri bar gyur to// kha dog dang/ stobs dang/ bde ba los kyang yongs su bri bar gyur to// rgyal po'i pho brang rin po che'i me tog sgron ma de'i byang phyogs

'gas na snying po byang chub kyi shing kun tu grags pa'i chos kyi sprin sgra'i rgyal mtshan zhes bya ba/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi snying po byang chub kyi rgyun skad cig re re la yongs su ston ra/ rtsa ba rin po rgyal po

rdorje ltar sra zhing mi 'jig pa/ nor bu rin po che thams cad las grub pas lcan tu yangs shing rgyas pa/ sdong po dang/ yal ga dang/ lo ma dang/ 'dab ma dang/ me tog dang/ 'bras bu rin po che thams cad kyi rgyu las

grub pa/ kun tu ma mnyam par rnam par bkod cing kun tu khyab pa'i yal ga dang ldan pa/ rgyan kun tu rgyas par 'gengs shing mi zad pa dang ldan pa/ rin po che sna tshogs kyi 'od 'phro ba dang 'od zer kun tu snang bar 'gyed
pa de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yul gyi rnam par 'phrul pa'i bungs rjes su sgrog pa yod de/ snying po byang chub pa'i mdun rolan spos chu'i mtsho rin po che'i me tog dang/

glog dang/ chos kyi 'brug sgra'i sprin gyi dbyangs shes bya ba yod de/ de ni rin po che'i shing bye ba khrag khrig brgya stong phrag bcus kun nas bskor ba ste/ zhi po che'i shing dedag thams cad kyang byang chub
kyi shing gi byibs su 'khod pa sha stag go/ spos chu'i mtshochen po rin po che'i ma tog dang/ glog dad/ chos kyi 'brug sgra'i sprin gyi dbyangs shes bya ba de'i 'gram thams cad kyang/ nor bu

na na po che thams cad bkram zhing rnam par bkod pa// bzhi po che thams cad kyi 'phreng ba sna tshogs su dkrigs pa'o// rin po che rnam par dag pa las byas pa'i khang pa sna tshogs kyi rgyun gyis yongs su

brgyan pa'i// rgyan rnam par dag pa sna tshogs kyi rgyan gyis shin tu brgyan pa'o// snying po byang chub deb 'khor thams cad kyang nor bu bzhi po che'i khang pa brtsegs pa chen po rgyan bsam gyis mi khyab pa dang ldan

pa pad+mo'i snying po can sha stag gis yongs su 'khor ba ste/ sbos chu'i mtsho chen po rin po che'i ma tog dang/ glog dang/ chos kyi 'brug sgra'i sprin gyi dbyangs shes bya ba de'i dbus nas pad+mo'i rgyal
tshe bo lo ma'i mtshams nas dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yul rnam par ston pa'i 'od zer gyi sprin gyi rgyan ces bya ba byung bar gyur te/ pad+mo chen po de la de bzhin gshegs pa rab

tsha kyi rdul shin tu phra ba snyad de dag gi nang nas bskal pa'i thog ma pa// de bzhen gshegs pa ye shes rin po che'i bod kun tu 'phro ba'i dpal yon tan dpal gyi rgyal po zhes bya ba byung bar gyur te/ dge

bskal pa de la thams cad kyi thog mar bla na med pa yang dag par rdzo gas pa'i byang chub tu mngon par rdzogs par sangs rgyus te/ des bo stong phrag du ma zhig tu chos bstan pas sems can yongs su sne par
mdzod nas/ lo stong phrag phrag bcul 'od zer snang ba'i rnam par ba phrul pas yongs su smin par mdzad do// de bzhin gshegs pa de lo stong phrag bcu na 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i tshe/ pad+mo'i
rgyal bo chen po lo ma'i mtshams nas dus gsum gyi de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yul rnam par ston pa'i 'od zer gyi smin gyi rgyan ces bya ba de las/ soms can thams cad rdul dang 'byed pa'i

sgron ma zhes bya ba'i 'od zer byung bar gyur te/ 'od des phog pa'i sems can rnams kyis kyang lo stong phrag bcun ni de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung bar 'gyur po zhes bya ba shesaso// lo stong phrag dgu lha dbazhe

gshegs pa de 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i tshe/ byang chub kyi shing de las rdul dang bral ba'i dpal gyi snying po zhes bya ba'i bod zer byung ste/ bod zer des phog pa'i sems can de dag gis kyang

gzugs thams cad shigecu phra ba mthong bar gyur to// lo stong phrag brgyad na de bzhin gshegs pa 'byung ngo zhes bya ba'i tshe/ byang chub kyi shing chen po de nyid las 'od zer sems can thams cad kyi las rnam
par smin pa'i dbyangs zhes bya ba byung ste/ des phog pa'i sems can de dag thams cad kyis kyang rang rang gi las rgya mtsho khong du chud bar gyur te/ las dran nga 'i ye

shes kyang thob par gyur to// lo stong phrag bdun na de bzhin gshegs pa de 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i tsho/ byang chub kyi shing de nyid las 'od zer dge ba'i rtsa ba thams cad yang dag par 'byung

pany+tsa ba'i dbyangs shes bya ba byung ste/ 'od zer des sems can dadag la phog nas dbang po nyams pa med cing yongs su myong bar gyur to// lo stong phrag drug na de bzhin gshegs pa de 'byung bar 'gyur sgo
zhes bya ba'i tsho/ byang chub kyi shing chen po de nyid las bod zer sangs rgyas kyi yul bsam gyis mi khyab pa'i debyangs shes bya ba byung ste/ des sems can de dag la phog nas bsam pa rgya chen pos

rnam par 'phrul par gyur to// le stong phrag lnga na de bzhin gshegs pa de 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i tshe/ byang chub kyi shing chen po de nyid las 'od zer sangs rgyas kyi zhing thams cad yongs su

dag par sgra 'byin pa'i gzugs brnyan rnam par dmigs pa zhes bya ba byung ste/ des soms can de dag la phog nas sangasany+tsakyi zhing rnam pa thams cad du 'ongs su dag par mthong bar gyur to// lo stong

phrag bzhi na de bzhin gshegs pa de 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i tsha/ byang chub kyi shing chen po de nyid las 'od zer de nga zhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yul tha mi dad pa'i sgron ma zhes bya ba/
tsa3/byung ste/ des sems can de dag la phog nas de bzhin gshegs pa de'i rnam par 'phrul pa thams cad du song ba la zhugs par gyur ko/ le stong phrag gsum n de bzhin gshegs pa de 'byung bar
'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i tshe/ byang chub kyi shing chen po de las 'od zer 'gro ba thams cad la mngon du gyur pa'i sgron ma zhes bya ba byung ste/ des sems can de dag la phog nas de bzhin gshegs pa
dbang mngon du mos pas mthong bar gyur to// lo stong phrag gnyis na de bzhin gshegs pa de 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i tshe/ byang chub kyi shing chen po de las 'od zer dus gsum gyi ye shes kyi

glag gi sgron ma zhes bya ba de bzhin gshegs pa rngams cad kyi sngon gyi tshul rab tu sgrog pa byung// des sems can de dag la reg nas de bzhi gshegs pa de'i sngon gyi tshul rgya mtsho la rtog cing 'jug pa'i

gyur to// lo stong na de bzhin gshegs pa de 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i tshe/ byang chub kyi shinge chen po de las 'od zer ye shes rab rib med pa de bzhin gshegs pa'i sgron ma zhes bya ba byung ste/
des sems can de dag la phog nas de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi rnam par 'phrul pa dang/ zhing thams cad dang/ sems can thams cad mthong bar 'gyur ba'i mig kun tu lta ba thob pas

gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa de lo brgyan 'byung bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i tshe/ byang chub kyi shing chen po de nyid las 'od zer 'gro ba thams cad kyis sangs rgyas mthong ba rnam par smin pa'i dge ba'i
rtsa ba las byung ba zhes bya ba byung ste/ des sems can de dag la phog nas de bzhin gshegs pa skyo ba'i 'du shes thob par gyur to// de bzhin gshegs pa de zhag bdun na skye
bar 'gyur ro zhes bya ba'i tshe/ byang chub kyashong chen po de nyid las bod zab sems can thams cad rab tu dga' ba dang/ so ba dang/ mos ba yongs su 'byung ba'i dbyangs shes bya ba byung ste/ des

sems can de dag la phog nas sangs rgyas mthong bar 'gyur ba'i dgab ba'i shugs chen bo skyes par gyur to// shes kyi bu de lta'i 'od zer gyis yongs su smin par bya ba'i tshul tshod med pa rnam ba de lta bu s
lo stong du sems can rnams yongs su smin par mdzad nas zhag bdun pa la thug pa dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams de thams cad yongs su bskyod tshul tshad med bas yongs su bskyod nas shin tu dag par byin gyis

brlabs so// phyogs bcu'i de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi sangs rgyas kyi zhing yongs su dag pa jisnyad pa rgyan bsam gyisam khyab pa rnam pa sna tshogs dang ldan pa de dag thams cad kyang sangs rgyas kyi zhing der
sems kyi skad cig re re la yongs su bstan par gyur to// de nas zhag bdun pa tha mal bab pa dang/ 'jig rten gyi khams de sems can sangs rgyas mthong bar 'gyur bar yongs su smin pa de dag thams
cad snying po byang chub tu mngon par gzhol bar gyur to// de nas 'jig rten gyi khams de'i 'khor yug thams cad dang/ ri rab thams cad dang/ ri thams cad dang/ muklung thams cad dang//
tsa rgya mtsho thams cad dang/ shing thams cad dang/ sa'i gzhi thams cad dang/ grong khyer thams cad dang/ ra ba thams cad dang/ gnas thams cad dang/ gzhal med khang thams cad dang/
gos dang/ rgyun dang/ longs spyod thams cad dang/ rol mo'i shing thams cad dang/ rol mo brdung ba'i dbyangs thams cad dang/ sprul pa'i rgyan thams cad kyi dmigs pa re re las kyang
yeng zhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi yul dang/ ma thu'i sgra rab tu sgrog pa'i sngos dang/ bdugaspos thams cad kyi sprina mngon par thon te zhi po che 'od 'phro ba'i sprin dad/ sa dang/

bdug spos thamasacad kyi 'od 'phro dam pa dang/ spos rin po che thams cad kyi gzugs kyi sprin dang/ gos nepo che dang/ rgyan rin po che thams cad kyi sprin dang/ zhi po che'i me tog sna tshogs kyi mi red/

kyi sngon dang/ phyi ma sna tshogs kyi sprin mdapo de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi 'od zer gyi sngon ma nga ston pa// de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi bod kyi dkyil 'khor gyi sprin rab tu 'gyed pa/ rol

mo brdung ba dang dkrol ba thams cad kyi sprin yongs su ba khrol cha de rdung ba/ de bzhi'i gshegs pa thams cad kyi smon lam gyi sgra skad kyi sprin rab tu 'byin pa/ de bzhin gshegs pa thams cad kyi dbus kyi
